Enakana Moseseme ranjama pere dupwana siyamo doko nyepala wambu dupwa keta pyarenda lanyi pisiya. Pisapala baame dopa leya. Mawa pii peparae joo karo dokopa Kamongo dokome nakama pipya kana minyuo lalu lao leyamo pii dupwa ranjama dakeme kiso pii kapa wai wara pisi silyamo, leya.
Mosesemoo Erone Natapi Apiyumoo dee Isaraele wambunya akali kyawa akalisa yanda ipingi nyepo dusipa pipya yuu kyau dokona pulyuo peyami.
Papala Isaraele wambunya Anatu doko angi kandeyami. Kandeyaminyi dokopa banya kimbu siyamo dokona isarena kata kana kameya mende sapaiya lenge dokome wasisi siya. Kana doko kala ama muku wakasa yake dopale ingyuo siya.
Isaraele akali mupwa dusipame Anatu kandeyaminyipape baame nakama randa maiyuo pyaa naya. Enakana nakama pyaso piso nenge ipwape neyami.
Kamongo dokome Mosese lamaiyuo, Emba yuu kyau namba karo dakena ipupi. Epo kararene dokopa wambu dupwa lowa peparae kapa mana nyerami lao kana para lamana pyao reteyono dolapo jero.
Mosesepa banya nyisingi Josuapa rapa rapa pyuo oteyambinyipa Mosese baa yuu kyau poo pyasi dokona kanda soo pulyuo peya.
Moseseme akali mupwa dupwa lamaiyuo, Namba kamba kapu kyuo epelyambipi lao isaro karalapape. Eronepa Uapa nakama pipya role pyao karaminyi. Dokona nakama mendali randa mende paleya kande dokopa akali dolapome lao rolakarambiŋi nakamba keta maiyuo pupwape, leya.
Mosese baa yuu kyau Sainai dokona pulyuo peyamo dokopa kopa dokome yambe piya.
Kamongona lepo lepo pyuo yanga paupau lenge doko yuu Sainai kyau dokona isa epeya. Epeyamo doko Isaraele wambu dupwame Kamongona yanga paupau lenge doko isare dopale ingyuo yuu kyau dokona rao kareyamo kandeyami. Dokopa yuu gii pakinyamange kopa dokome yuu kyau doko yambe pyaro karalu kareya. Kareyamopa yuu gii yanda ipingi nyepo dokona kopa rakapana sukusa Kamongo dokome Mosese lao kee leya.
<range>
Kee leyamo dokopa Mosese baa kopa rakapana sukusa dokona pao yuu kyau dokona pulyuo peya. Papala baa yuu kyau dokona yuu gii akalisa kisima dee kukwama akalisa kisimako kareya.


















































































































































































































































Yuu Sainai kyau dokona Kamongome Mosese pii lamaiyuo otapala kana para dolapona baa rangeme mawa pii dupwa pyao palyapala maiya.
Mosese baa isa epa nao yuu kyau dokona andarele kareyamopa wambu dupwame kandapala Erone kareyamo dokona sukusa sukusa pyuo epapala dopa lamaiyuo, Namwa Isipi kareyamanopa nyuo lanyuo epeyamo akali Mosese doko epapu apa pilyamo lao soo gisa nalyamano. Dokona mee bange anatu lao mende wasakape. Dokome namwa lanyuo penale, leyami.
Dokopa Eroneme nakama lamaiyuo, Nakamana endape wanepe wanakepe dupwana kana golome kalena pingi bange dupwa nyepala namba karo dakena minyuo ipupwape, leya.
Dokopa wambu peparaeme kana golome kalena pingi bange dupwa nyisa nyepala minyuo epo Erone maiyami.
Dokopa baame kana golo kalena pingi dupwa nyepala kiso lili lao ipwa ingiya. Ingiyamopa yuwale mena bulamakao dopale ingyuo apu rao reteyaminyi dokona golo ipwange doko kulimbwanyi pyambuya. Pyambuyamopa golo dokome bulamakao ikyane wasiya. Dokopa wambu dupwame lao, Isaraele dupwa dake namwana anatu yuu Isipi yaki nyuo lanyuo epeyamo dokoŋo, leyami.
Dokopa Eroneme golome wasisi mena bulamakao kareyamo lenge kambu dokona kana pyare mende leya. Lapala lao, Rakya Kamongo doko kingi ketae pyambuo lakando nenge andake kiso mairama, leya.
Leyamo dokopa yuu gii mende dokona wamba yangama dokopa wambu dupwame mena lapo minyuo epo pyao kiso maiyuo dee lapo dupwa nakama pipya Anatumoo mona mendaki palyuo kiso maiyuo piyami. Pipala nakama nenge nao piso kopetame pyuo ipwa biya nao kepo pyuo peteyami.
Dopa piyaminyisa Kamongo dokome Mosese lamaiyuo lao, Embena wambu yuu Isipi yaki nyuo lanyuo epee kande dupwame namba mata joo yulu koo pilyaminyi dokona dakepa aopa waiya lao lupyuo puu, leya.
Dopa lao, Nambame nakama mawa pii lamaipala moko minyuo pinya leyono doko yaki nyuo otami. Dopa pipala nakama kana golo kiso lili lapala mena bulamakao mende wasami. Wasapala doko lakando mena pyao kiso maimi. Maipala nakamame lao, Dake namwana anatu namwa yuu Isipi yaki nyuo lanyuo epeyamo dokoŋo, lami.
Nakamana mona kana poko pilyaminyi doko namba silyu, leya.
Namba nakama pipya imbuo pyao kokwa sero dokona epapu embame namba daa lao kata rokwa napipi. Dopa pirunu dokopa embape embena para pyarene dupwape jingi para pyao andakinyi pyambwaro, leya Kamongome.
Leyamopape Moseseme banya Kamongo Anatu doko kando poraiyuo piso sokondali pyuo lao, Kamongo embame embena wambu dupwa kyawa lete nyuo yuu Isipi piso embena porainya renge dokome nyuo minyuo epee dupwa akipamo nakama kando imbumi kumarese?
Isipi wambu dupwame dopa lao, Embena wambu yuu Isipi yaki nyuo lanyuo pee dupwa yuu kyau dokona pyao kumuo kokwa soo nembalu nembo nembalana lanyuo pee lyamo lao akipamo laramisi? Dokona imbwa nao embena suu pingi alowa pipala embena wambu dupwa keta randa doko mai napipi.
Embena kendemande akali Aporakame Aisake Jekopemoo dusipana lao suu pyaro karape. Karo nakama kando embena pii lalu lao lao, Nakamana wane manjiraminyi dupwa kamame wakasa yakena bui dopale ingyuo ando kararami. Nakamana para pyaraminyi dupwame yuu mairu lalu lao leene doko nakamana ingyuo dokona palyuo karalu kararami leene doko suu pyaro karape, leya.
Leyamosa Kamongo dokome banya wambu dupwa randa maiyuo pyalana suu piyamo doko alowa pipala pyaa naya.
Dokopa Mosese yuu kyau doko yaki nyuo kana para lamana paki pakipi mawa pii dupwa pyasi paleyamo dolapo soo lupyuo peya.
Anatumi baa rangme kana para lama wasapala dolapona mawa pii peparae pyao reteya.
Wambu dupwame pii porakai leyaminyi doko Josuame sepala Mosese lamaiyuo lao, Wambu dupwa paliminyi yuu dokona yanda pyuo pii laminyi doko silyu, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Moseseme lao, Doo letaminyi dokome yanda pyuo wini pipala letaminyi ingya naope panda pyao anamasi minya napala ee lenge dopale ingya naope pilyamo. Doko mee kenane poponge epelyamo, leya.
Lapala Mosese baa yuu paleyaminyi dokona repetale epo karo mena bulamakao dokope wambu rae maiyuo kenane pyao malya pyao kareyaminyi dupwape kandeya. Kandapala baa ama imbumi kumapala kana lama soo epeyamo dolapo yuu kyau dokona isarena pyao pisiyasa poro leya.
Dopa pipala baame mena bulamakao wasiyaminyi doko nyepala isarena kiso kuku piya. Pipala kuku pisi dupwa nyuo ipwa dokona pyasiya. Pyasapala Isaraele wambu dupwa kamuo nena leya.
Dokopa Moseseme Erone kando lao, Wambu dupwame emba kando aki koo mende pimisa embame nakama yulu koo andake dake kapa pinya lao panda maipisi? leya.
Dokopa Eroneme isingi lao, Embame namba kando imbwa napipi. Wambu dapwa rangeme porayapala yulu koo doko pimwalinya suu pyao karenge doko emba soo otelene.
Wambu dupwa dopa lanyuo, Mosese Isipi karo namwa nyuo lanyuo epeya doko epapu baa apa pilyape lao see nalyamano dokona epapu embame anatu mende namwa lanyuo para lao wasakape, leyami.
Dopa leyaminyi dokopa kana golome wasisi kalya pingi bange dupwa minyuo epo jinya leyo. Dokopa wambu lapome bange reteyaminyi dupwa nyisa nyepala jiyami. Jiyaminyi dupwa isare dokona pyao pyambuyu dokopa bulamakao ikyane dake mee maso sipuro epeya, leya.
Erone baame Isaraele wambu dupwa poraiyuo rapu pii nayamosa mee bolombalo lao karo yulu kopetame pyuo kareyaminyipa yanda pimwai dupwame nakama kando giyuo kareyami. Dopa piyaminyi doko Mosese kandeya.
Kandapala Mosese baa yuu paleyaminyi kame kambu doko karapala poraiyuo kyakale lao, Nakama lapo Kamongona wambu ingyuo karaminyi dupwa namba karo dakena ipupwape, leya. Leyamo dokopa Lipae wambu peparae dupwa baa kareyamo dokona epo malu palyiyami.
Baame nakama lamaiyuo lao, Kamongo Isaraele wambunya Anatu dokome nakama peparae langyuo, Mendaki mendaki lao embena wua gela doko nyuo minyapala yuu palaminyi dokona kanda kanda kame kambu dakena piso pao paki oto embena yangonepe puu minyingipi dee parali maki palengepe dupwa pyao kumakalapape letamo, leya.
Leyamo yuu gii dokopako Lipae akali dupwame warombo sepala wambu ama malu taosande rema (3,000) pyao kumuyami.
Dokopa Moseseme Lipae akali dupwa lamaiyuo lao, Nakamana yangongepe ikinyingipi dupwa pyao kumakami dokona nakama yapasi ingyuo Kamongona purisi karaminyi. Dokona Kamongo dokome nakama elyape keta pisapya, leya.
Yuu gii yangama dokopa Moseseme wambu dupwa lamaiyuo, Nakamame yulu koo dae pimi dake kamame koo ingyuo pelyamo. Dokona epapu namba yuu kyau Kamongo karamo doko dee kamba paro. Papala nambame nakamana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakana lao piso sero dokopa baame kame sakara rapisi, leya.
Lapala Mosese kamba kapu kyuo pulyuo papala Kamongo doko lamaiyuo, Wambu dupwame yulu koo andake pyuo kana golome anatu wakale wasapala doko lakando karami.
Dokona nakamana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakamipi. Kame sakami nare ramo doko buku embena wambu dupwa kingi pyao palyingi dokona nambana kingi palamo doko kwuanyi nembakape, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Kamongo dokome isingi lao, Doko wambu namba kando koo piminyi dupwana kingi dupwa nambana buku dokona pali nana lao kwuanyi nembaro, leya.
Dokona epapu nambame emba langiyunu yuu dokona wambu dupwa lanyuo pupi. Parene dokopa nambana aŋala dokome emba rapu pyuo karara. Dopa piramopape wambu dupwa koo piyami dokona randa mairunu yuu gii doko pyaka sera, leya.
Wambu dupwame Erone kando mena bulamakao ikyane golome wasakana leyaminyi dokona Kamongo dokome anga ikyane mende wambu keta peeya.
Kamongo dokome Mosese lamaiyuo lao, Embape embena wambu yuu Isipi yaki nyuo lanyuo epee dupwape yuu dake yaki nyepala nambame Aporakame Aisake Jekopemoope dee dupwana para pyaraminyi dupwape kando yuu mairuŋu lao lalu lao leyono dokona pupwape.
Nambame aŋala mende nakama rapu pinya lao mapanyi peeyapala nambame Kenane rangepe Amo rangepe Ipi rangepe Perasi rangepe Iti rangepe dee Jepusi rangepe peparae ralinyi nembaro.
Dokopa nakama yuu keyange amenge kapape pingi dokona parami. Dopa pyuo paraminyipape nakama waiya lao mona kana pokonge dokona nambame katasa nakama pyao kokwa soo nembasaroŋo namba range role pyao paa narama, leya.
Wambu dupwame pii porai doko sepala nakama kondome kumuo ee lao mona kendo karo nakamana kalya pingi bange dupwa dee nyuo pirami ingya nayami.
Dopa piyaminyi dokopa Kamongome Mosese kando wambu dupwa lamainya lao lao, Nakama wambu mona kana pokonge dapwa namba nakama role pyao mee kuki lama pao lapuli doko nambame nakama pyao kokwa soo nembalu nembo nembapuli. Namba nakama keta aki mende piru lao suu pyarole. Epapu nakamana kalya pingi bange dupwa kako lao nyisa nyelapape, leya.
Leyamo dokona lao nakama yuu kyau Sainai yaki nyuo papeyaminyi dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwa kalya pingi bange dupwa pyuo kara nayami.
Yuu dupwana mendepe Isaraele wambu komau anda dupwa pyuo palenge dokopa Mosese baame komau anda poo pyasi doko nyepala yuu palenge dokona mee mende nanesale ingyuo piya. Pipala doko komau anda dokona Kamongo karenge doko leyami. Dokopa wambu lapo Anatu pii mende piso selana masiyami dupwa dokona pao pii lamaiyami.
Yuu gii lapo Mosese komau anda dokona panya peyamo dokopa wambu dupwa peparae nakamana komau anda kambu dokona kando karo pao konandeyamo dokopa kaeyami.
Enakana Mosese baa andakare pao oteyamo dokopa kopa rau doko epo komau anda kambu dowa dokona siya. Dokopa kopa rakapana piso Kamongome Mosese pii lamaiya.
Dokopa wambu dupwame kopa rau komau anda kambu dokona epo siyamo doko kandapala aopa wapambu pii pyaro pangu soo Anatu lakandeyami.
Doko wambu puu minyingi dupwa rolae lenge kambu kando pii lenge dokoko suu pyao Kamongome Mosese role pyao karo lenge kambu kando pii lamaiya. Lamaipala Mosese baa wambu dupwa palenge yuu dokona peya. Dopa pyuo peyamopape banya nyisingi wane parange akali Nanena ikinyingi Josua lenge doko komau anda dokona yaki nyii nao mee andakare kareya.
Dokopa Mosese Kamongo doko lamaiyuo lao, Doko kinyi. Emba namba langyuo, Wambu dapwa minyuo yuu dokona puu lee. Leenepape embame wambu mende nambapa role parambi peeyaro lao namba langi nae. Embame lao, Namba emba soo oto rae mailyu, lee.
Epapu embame namba kando rae mairi ramo doko embena rapa rapa piinyi dupwa namba langipi. Dokona nambame embena yulu pyakao emba rae maiyuo puu paro. Dee wambu rara dake emba rangena ingyara lao rombo palyinyi doko suu pyao karape, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Kamongo dokome lao, Namba nakama role paramanopa nakamame anamasi minyuo wini pirami, leya.
Dokopa Moseseme isingi lao, Emba namwa role pyao paa narama ramo doko namwa yuu dake yaki nyelapa lao laa napipi.
Emba namwa pipya paa narama ramo doko embame embena wambupi nambape kando rae mailiŋi lao apa pyuo wambu mendeme soo nyerase? Emba namwa pipya role parama ramo doko wambu dupwame namwa rara wakaleŋe lao soo nyerami, leya.
Dokopa Kamongome Mosese lamaiyuo lao, Nambame emba soo giso rae maiyuo pilyu dokona embame piso silinyili pyuo piru, leya.
Dokopa Moseseme piso soo lao, Embena yanga paupau lao lepo lepo pingi doko namba lasaka pii, leya.
Kamongo dokome isingi lao, Nambame nambana yanga paupau lenge peparae emba lasaka pyuo embena lenge kambu dokona nambana kingi poo pyasi doko polo langiru. Namba Kamongo doko. Namba rangeme mendali sakame kumuo kondo nyiso kararo laro ramo doko sakame kumuo kondo nyiso kararo.
Mendeme namba kandapala lete paa nange dokona emba nambana lenge kambu doko kanda laa naro.
Dopa piramopape emba kanana ketae karare lao namba karo dakena paki panda mende silyamo.
Nambana yanga paupau lao lepo lepo pingi doko embena lenge kambu dokona eparamo dokopa nambame kana dokona kata silyamo koko dokona emba palyapala nambana kingi dokome emba yambe pyaro. Yambe pyapala namba pao otaro.
Pao otapala enakana nambana kingi neta nyero dokopa embame nambana matarena yeelyo kandare. Nambana lenge kamburena kanda nare, leya.
Kamongome Mosese lamaiyuo lao, Kana wambo dopale ingyuo embame kana lama kunjo wasape. Wasarene dokopa kana wambo embame pyao poro leene dolapona pii paleyamo dupwa nambame dee kamba pyao retaro.
Rakya yangama rapa rapa pipala yuu kyau Sainai dokona epo ketae nambapa role pyao kararamba.
Wambu mende role pyao epa nara. Dee yuu kyau dupwana mendasape wambu mende kara narami. Mena sipisipipi panda mena bulamakaope dupwame yuu kyau wangu kipwa kipwa isako nao pii nana, leya.
Dokona lao Moseseme kana lama kamba kunjo wasiya. Wasapala Kamongome lamaiyamuli pyuo wamba yangama dokopa yuu kyau Sainai dokona soo pulyuo peya.
Dokopa Kamongo baa kopa rakapana isa epo dokona baapa role kareya. Karo dokopa banya kingi poo pyasi Kamongo doko leya.
Dokopa Kamongome Mosesena lenge kambusa papala kee lao lao, Namba Kamongo doko Anatu kondome kumuo nyiso karenge. Dopa pyuo karo dokopa namba waiya lao imbwa nange. Dee namba yaki nyii nao mona retenge renge andake doko nakama keta palyingi.
Nambame nakamana para pyasi dupwana mendeme mende manjipa pyuo penge ama malu soo kaeyo dupwa keta lalu lao leyonde pyuo pyuo koo pingi peparae kame sakamyuo karenge. Dopa pirunupape endangi rakangepe koo piraminyi dokona palyuo nambame nakamana ikinyingi wanengepe apusingipi kauwangepe dee dupwana para pyasi wambu rara lama manjiraminyi dupwape randa malisa nao mairu.
Mosese baa waiya lao yuu dokona wapambu pii pyaro piso Anatu lakandeya.
Lakando baame lao, Kamongo embame namba kando angi rae mairi ramo doko namwa pipya emba role pyao mona ipu lao piso silyu. Wambu dapwa mona kana pokolyaminyipape embame namwana koo peparae nyuo kame sakapala namwa emba rangena wambu ingyuo manjo nyepe, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Kamongome Mosese lamaiyuo lao, Epapu nambame Isaraele wambu dupwa keta kana minyuo lalu lao lenge pii doko retelyo. Nambame yuu muu dakenape mendasa wambu rara palaminyi dupwa ketape yulu pii nangende Isaraele wambunya lenge kambu dokona piru. Nambame yulu mende wambu kando yamarangyuo kararaminyi doko nakamana lao pyakaro dokona wambu peparaeme namba Kamongo dokome aki yulu andake lapo pilini lao kandarami.
Nambame nakama epapu mawa pii jilyu dupwa warombo soo karalapape. Nakama paraminyi dokona nambame wambo pao Amo rangepe Kenane rangepe Iti rangepe Perasi rangepe Ipi rangepe dee Jepusi rangepe peparae neta pyao ralinyi nembaro.
Kando pupwape. Papala nakama yuu dokona range wambu dupwa pipya pelyaminyi pii lalu lao laa nalapape. Dopa pirami ramo nakama randa nyuo koo keta pao konena lyakaro karele lasarami.
Dopa pyuo kara nao nakamana nenge kiso maingi kana pyare dupwa lalyuo nembalapape. Nakamana isa pote poo pyasi lenge dupwa pyao lalyalapape. Lalyapala dee nakamana isa lapo kando Asera enda anatu lenge doko pyakepo muu muu pinyi nembo pipwape.
Nakamame anatu wakale lapo lakanda nalapape. Namba Kamongo dokome nambana wambu dupwa yulu kopetame dopale dupwa pinya lao yaki nyii nao nakama nambana iki ingyuo karamili yaka lao suu pilyu.
Doko wambu dupwame mee bange anatu lenge doko mena pyao kiso mainya lao nakama dokona role pyao yalya kando pisala ipupwa lao piso seraminyi dokopa wambu dupwana anatu nenge kisaraminyi doko walu lapala nyuo nasaramiŋi dokona yuu range wambu dupwa kando pii lalu lao laa nalapape.
Dokona nakamana ikinyingi dupwame yuu wakale range enda dupwa nyerami ramo enda dupwame nakama kata koo dokona lanyuo paraminyisa nakamame namba angi suu pyaa napala mee bange anatu kyambo lenge dupwa lakandarami ingilyamo.
Nakamame kana golope kulingipi dupwame mee bange anatu lao wasapala lakanda nalapape.
Nakama Borete Isi Pyambwa Nange Nenge Nenge yuu gii doko minyuo karalapape. Karapala nambame langiyunuli pyuo nakama borete isi pyambwa nange doko kana Apipi dokona yuu yanda ipingi dusipana narami. Kana Apipi dokona nakama yuu Isipi yaki nyuo epeyaminyi dokona ingyuo narami.
Nakamana wane ane mupwa manjiraminyi peparaepe bulamakao kali mupwape mena sipisipipinya kali mupwape manjiraminyi dupwa peparae nambana ingyara.
Dopa piramopape nakamame mena donge wambo mandenge dupwa ropo pyao nyuo mena sipisipi ikyane dupwa panda nyuo kiso jerami. Dopa pyuo kiso jii narami ramo doko dongena mange dupwa minyuo roo pyarami. Dopa pipala nakamana wane wambo mandenge dupwa ropo pyao range nyerami. Dokona mendeme nenge kiso jii napala mee nambana arapu dokona epo maro laa narami.
Dokona nakamame yulu pirami lao yuu gii pakinyamange silyamo. Sipyamopa yuu gii yanda ipingi dokona yulu pii nalapape. Dee yuu ape ape pingi dokopape witi jingi lyingi dokopape yuu gii yanda ipingi dokona kamame pii narami.
Nakamame witi jingi kanda soo mupwa lyuo nyeraminyi dokopa wambu nenge nao nyuo malu palyingi doko yaki nyii nao minyaro karalapape. Karapala nakamana isa jingi poo relyamo lyuo anda kauwa dokona piso nenge nenge yuu gii doko minyuo karo pipwape.
Ee kana yaka lao yuu gii rema larapu nakamana akali dupwa peparaeme namba Kamongo doo Isaraele wambunya Anatu lakandarapu pinya.
Nambame nakamana lenge kambu dokona wambu rara dupwa pyao ralinyi nembaparono dokopa nakamana yuu doko konda pyuo andake ingyakaro. Dokopa nakama nenge nyuo malu palyuo naraminyi yuu gii rema dusipana mendemepe nakamana yuu doko nyuo isa palyuo anamasi minya narami ingilyamo.
Namba mena pyao kiso jeraminyi dokopa nakamame borete isi pyambwange doko role pyao kisa nalapape. Dee Pasopa Nenge Nenge yuu gii dokona mena pyao kisaraminyi dokona mena injisipi rakya yangamana lao mende reta nalapape.
Dokona ee kana yaka lao witi jingi mupwa kanda soo lyeraminyi dupwa Kamongona anda dokona minyuo ipupwape. Dee mena sipisipi ikyanepe mena meme ikyanepe kisaraminyi dupwa endanginya anju ipwange kamuo nyepala pyambuo kisa nalapape, leya.
Lapala Kamongo dokome Mosese lamaiyuo, Pii dasipame nambame embape Isaraele wambupi pipya kana minyuo lalu lao leto dokoŋo pyao retape, leya.
Dokopa kukwa yuu gii akalisa kisimako korakama yuu gii akalisa kisimako dusipana Mosese baa nenge ipwape naa nao Anatupa role pyao kareyambi. Dokopa baame pii kana minyuo lalu lao lenge mawa pii akalisa dusipa kana para dolapona pyao reteya.
Mosese baa yuu kyau Sainai dokona karo mawa pii akalisa pyasi palenge kana para lama soo lupyuo peya. Peyamo dokopa baa Kamongopa pii lao kareyambinyi dokome banya lenge kambu doko yanga paupau leya. Leyamopape baa soo gisa naya.
Dopa piyamopa Eronemoo wambu dupwa pipya Mosesena lenge kambu doko yanga paupau lao lepo lepo piyamo doko kandapala nakama repeta panya pakayami.
Dopa piyamopape Mosese nakama kee leya. Leyamo dokopa Eronemoo Isaraele wambunya akali mupwa dupwa pipya baa kareyamo dokona peyami. Peyaminyipa Moseseme nakama pii lamaiya.
Enakana dokopa wambu peparae Mosese kareyamo dokona sukusa sukusa pyuo epeyami. Dopa piyaminyipa Kamongome yuu kyau Sainai dokona mawa pii maiyamo dupwa peparae wambu dupwa lamaiya.
Mosese baame wambu dupwa pii lamaiyuo otapala dokopa komau mendeme banya lenge kambu doko yambe piya.
Yuu lapo Mosese baa Kamongona komau anda dokona Kamongo pii lamaila papapu dokopa lenge kambunya komau yambe pingi doko neta nyingi. Dee baa kamanda epo dokopa Kamongome pii lamainya lao lamaingi dupwa peparae Isaraele wambu dupwa lamaipa pingi.
Dokopa wambu dupwame banya lenge kambu doko yanga paupau lao lepo lepo pilyamo kandenge. Dokopa banya komau dokome lenge kambu yambe pingi doko pyaro karelyamopa pao yuu gii mendepa Kamongo pii lamaila panya dokopa nyisa nyingi.
































































































































































































Nakama yuu Isipi yaki nyuo epapeyaminyi dokopa enakana ee kana lapona kana mupwa dokona yuu gii mupwa dokopa Kamongona komau anda doko kanda soo piyami.
Moseseme isa yuu dokona susa pyao isa retapala wangu dupwa isa pyano piya. Dopa pipala wangu dokona isa lapo palyiya. Palyapala komau anda dokona kambu dowa dokona isa pote lapo pyaneya.
Dopa pipala Kamongome pinya leyamuli pyuo baame komau anda doko komau mendeme wambo kaowapala dee enakana mendeme kamba lapo pyuo doko kao piya.
Kaowapala baame kana para dolapo nyepala Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote dokona palyiya. Palyapala baame isa lama bokote pinjingi kingi minyingi dolapona pyambwapala bokote doko upi leya.
Upi lapala baame bokote doko minyuo pao komau anda dokona retapala komau mendeme nee pyuo yukunyi palyiya. Dopa piyamo doko baame Kamongome leyamuli pyuo Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko yambe pyao reteya.
Baame misi anda komaumi wasisi dokona taepo doko komau yukwaro kareyamo dokona kamarena kingi kyairena reteya.
Kamongome leyamuli pyuo borete Kamongo kiso maingi dupwa taepo dokona ketae reteya.
Baame misi anda komaumi wasisi dokona lambe kisingi bange doko minyuo pao taepo kanda kanda kingi rolaerename reteya.
Retapala baame Kamongome leyamuli pyuo lambe dupwa Kamongona lenge kambu dokona kaiya.
Baame kana golome wasisi kana pyare lasi minyuo pao komau anda kambu konando penge dokona komau yukwaro kareyamo lenge kambusa andakare reteya.
Retapala Kamongome leyamuli pyuo rendamu kyaa keyange pingi bange dupwa dokona kisiya.
Komau anda kambu konandowame dokona komau doko yukunyi palyiya.
Doo komau yukuyamo dokona lenge kambusa kamarena mena pyao kiso maingi kana pyare lasi doko reteya. Reteyamo dokona baame Kamongome leyamuli pyuo mena pyao kiso maiyuo witi jingi dupwa kiso maiyuo piya.
Pipala mena pyao kiso maingi kana pyare dokope komau andape kanya dokona wate pingi disi warake doko retapala dokona ipwa kamuo simbuo reteya.
Kamongome lamaiyamuli pyuo Mosesemoo Eronemoo Erone banya ikinyingimoo yuu gii lapo nakama komau andape kana pyare lasi dokonape pena dokopa kingi kimbupi wate pipa pingi.
<range>
Komau anda dokope bange kiso maingi kana pyare dokope laparae nyuo sukusa palyuo kame awali lao piya. Pipala kambu konando penge dokona komau doko yukunyi palyiya. Dopa pipala Moseseme yulu peparae pyuo oteya.
Misi anda komaumi wasisi dokona kopa dokome epo yambe piya. Dokopa Anatunya yanga paupau lenge renge dokome leya leya piyamo dokome komau anda doko palyuo simbuya.
Dopa piyamosa Mosese komau anda dokona kolando paa naya.
Kopa komau anda dokona siyamo doko sipuro peyamo dokopa iki Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu paleyaminyi doko yaki nyuo yuu mendasa parapu paleyami.
Kopa doko mee dokona sulu siyamo dokopa nakama paleyaminyi yuu doko yaki nyuo paa nayami.
Yuu gii peparae korakama dokopa nakama kata papyuo kareyaminyi dokopa kopa dokome Kamongo karamo lao lasaka pyuo komau anda ketae siyamo doko kandeyami. Dee kukwa dokopa komau anda ketae isare rao kareyamo kandeyami.








































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Eronena ikinyingi dolapome Kamongona lenge kambu dokona isare kopetame kiso kareyambinyisa nakamba kumuyambinyipa enakana Kamongome Mosese pii lamaiya.
Dopa lamaiyuo, Embame yangone Erone lamaiyuo, Panda Kamame Poo Pyasi dokona namba kopa rakapana epo Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote roma dokona ketae epengeŋe dokona yuu gii angi rolae dokopa iki komau andake yukwaro karamo dokona matarena baa epapa pinya lamairi. Daaŋa lapala larono dokona palyuo pii napala kamba lara ramo doko baa pyao kumakaro.
Wambo baame mena bulamakao kali dusa kanya kanyande wambunya koo dupwana kame sakaminya lao pyao kisakamyuo dee sipisipi kali doko isarena kiso mukunyi nembo maiyuo karapala dokopa Panda Kamame Poo Pyasi dokona sukusa para, leya.
Dokopa enakana Kamongome dopa pinya lamaiya. Erone baa andakare Panda Kamame Poo Pyasi dokona panya karo dokopa ipwame wate pipala purisinya komau dupwa nyuo wapwara. Komau rasisi mende wapupala dee komau keyange londe mende pee pipala dokona ketae marapu mendeme rambu lao wapu pipala komau mendeme kyawa dokona andu pinyi palyara.
Isaraele wambu peparaeme Erone mena meme kali lama wambunya koo dupwana lao pyao kiso mainyale lao maiyuo dee sipisipi kali mende isarena kiso mukinyi nembena lao maiyuo pirami.
Erone baame mena bulamakao mende banya rangena koo dupwanape banya ree palunya koo dupwanape lao pyao yangara.
Dokopa baame Kamongona komau anda kambu konandowame dokona mena meme kali lama nyepala minyuo para.
Baame kana lama nyepala mende Kamongonaŋa lao mende Asasele lengendenaŋa lao reto pipala kana dolapo kanda nao karo mende ipyuo nyera.
Ipyuo nyeramo dokopa mena meme Kamongonaŋa lao rombo palyaramo doko Eroneme wambunya koo dupwana lao pyao kisakamira.
Mena meme Asasele lengendenaŋa lao rombo palyaramo doko lenge rape rape Kamongo maipala yuu muiyane dokona Asasele keta mainyi nembara. Dopa piramo dokome wambunya koo dupwa nyuo nembakamira.
Erone baame banya ree palu dee baa rangepena koo dupwana lao bulamakao kalinde pyao kisakamyuo
dokopa isare pee nembenge kapa mendena isa lengya nyuo simbuo reto dee kingi kape laparaena kete pyao rendamu bange kyaa pingi mende nyuo pipala Panda Kamame Poo Pyasi dokona peparae minyuo para.
Papala dokopa Kamongona lenge kambu dokona bange rendamu pingi doko isarena retara. Retaramo dokopa rendamu pingi bange dokona sukwa dokome Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote roma doko yambe pyara. Yambe pyaramo dokona Erone baame doko kandapala kuma nara.
Baame mena bulamakao kali dokona ranjama lapo nyepala kingi pambu dokome minyuo pyarenda lanyi bokote roma lenge kambusa pisara. Pisapala dee Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote seramo dokona lenge kambusa yuu yanda ipingi nyepo ranjama dokome pyarendanyi pisara.
Pisapala baame mena memende wambunya koo dupwana lao pyapala dokona ranjama nyepala Panda Kamame Poo Pyasi dokona minyuo epo bulamakaona ranjama dokome wambo piyamuli pyuo baame bokote roma dokonape Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote dokona lenge kambusa dokonape pyarendanyi pisara.
Yulu dopa piramo dokopa Panda Kamame Poo Pyasi doko pyuo elya pinyi retara. Isaraele wambu nakama keyange ingya nao Anatupa kamba koo lao kareyaminyisa banya Panda Kamame Poo Pyasi doko kokwa siyamisa piyamo dokona Eroneme baa dopako pira. Yuu paleyaminyi doko poo pyasi ingya napyamo sukusa dokona Anatunya komau anda karapyamosa Erone baame dopako pira.
Erone baame banya koope dee banya ree palunya koope Isaraele wambu peparaena koope dupwa nyuo kame sakaminya lao yulu piramo mange dokopa komau anda andakare dokona wambu mendepe pisa nara.
Dokopa baame Anatunya lao kana pyare lasi dokona kiso mukinyi nembo maingi doko elyape inginyi pyambuo para. Dopa pyuo dokopa mena bulamakao kalinya ranjamape dee memena ranjama lapo nyepala kana pyare pinjingi kisima siyamo dusipana raeyo reto pira.
Banya kingi pambu dokome ranjama doko nyepala kana pyare lasi dokona yuu yanda ipingi nyepo pyarenda lanyi pisara. Dopa piramo dokome Isaraele wambunya koo dupwame kana pyare lasi kokwa siyaminyi doko keyange inginyi pyambuo poo pyarasa pira.
Eroneme Panda Kamame Poo Pyasipi Kamongona komau anda panda wakalepe kana pyare lasipi dusipana mondo lao pyuo rolo otapala dokopa mena meme mende lenge rao Asaselena rombo palyisi doko kararamopa Kamongo keta minyuo epo maira.
Maipala banya kingi dolapo memena ayemba dokona ketae retaro karo Isaraele wambunya yulu koope kamba lao Anatu mata maiyuo yulu pingipi polo lamaiyuo memena ayemba keta pisara. Pisapala akali mendeme meme doko nyuo lanyuo neta para lao rombo palyiyami dokome yuu muiyane dokona meme mapanyi nembara.
Mena meme dokome Isaraele wambunya koo dupwa nyepala paleta wambu pali nange panda keroŋo mendena para.
Yulu doko pyuo otapala dokopa Erone baame Panda Kamame Poo Pyasi dorena kolandalana karo purisi komau wapuyamo dupwa Kamongona komau anda dokona papala roko neta nyuo retara.
Retapala baame yuu poo pyasi dokona wate pipala rangena komau doko nyuo wapupala pao baa rangenape dee wambu dupwanape koo dupwana lao mena isarena kiso mukinyi nembara.
Baame kana pyare lasi dokona wambunya koo dupwana lao mena pyao kiso maiyamo dokona kapa rukisi dupwa kisakamira.
Akali mena meme Asaselena lao yuu muiyane dokona mapanyi nembala peyamo doko pao yuu paleyami dokona epana dokopa komau yanengepe wambo wate pipala sukusa kolando epara.
Purisi dokome mena bulamakao kali dee memepe dolapona ranjama nyepala lanyuo Panda Kamame Poo Pyasi dokona koo dupwana nyuo kame soo nembakana lao minyuo kolandeya. Bulamakaope memepe dolapona yanenge ingi minjupi dupwa peparae yuu kame netarena minyuo papala kisinyi nembara.
Akali kisinyi nembaramo doko yuu paliraminyi dokona kapu kyuo sukusa epana dokopa yanenge komaupi wate pipala epara, leya.
Nakamame yuu gii doko kame see napala minyuo karalu kararami. Kana yanda ipingi dokona yuu gii akalisa dokopa Isaraele wambu rangepe dee karala papingi dupwa nakama role pyao palaminyi dupwape nenge wasaka pyuo yulu minyanda nao mee pisirami.
Yuu gii dokopa purisi dokome yulu Kamongome pinya leyamuli pyuo piramopa Kamongome nakamana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakaramopa elyape ingyuo kararami.
Yuu gii doko ama poo pyasi ingyuo sera. Dokopa nakamame nenge wasaka pyuo yulu pii nao mee imambu soo pisirami ingilyamo. Yuu peparae mawa pii dapwa minyuo kararami.
Akali mendeme purisi mupwana yulu pyuo karalana rakangena panda nyeramo doko nakamame rolae pyuo rombo palyuo baa Anatunya yulu iki lili pyuo pinya lao larami. Laraminyi dokopa baame wambunya koo dupwa nyuo kame sakamira lao Anatumi leyamuli pyuo pira. Dopa pyuo pinya piso dokopa purisimi komau wapungi doko nyuo pee pipala
Panda Kamame Poo Pyasipi Kamongona komau anda panda wakalepe kana pyare lasipi purisi akalipi Isaraele wambu peparaepe Anatunya lenge kambu dokona poo pyasi ingyuo sera lao koo dupwa nyuo nembakamira.
Yulu dopale dokopa yuu peparae kaeya nao pipa pyuo kararami. Purisi mupwa baame ee kana yaka lao Isaraele wambu dupwana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakamyuo Anatunya lenge kambu dokona rolae ingyuo petena lao pipa pira, leya. Dokona Kamongome leyamuli pyuo Moseseme piya.














































Kamongome Mosese Isaraele wambu dupwa lamainya lao lamaiyuo,
Namba nakamana Kamongo Anatu poo pyasi karo dokona lao nakama poo pyasi karalapape, leya.
Nakama mendaki mendaki lao suu pingi dokona embena endangi rakangepa dolapo angingyuo karambinyi lao rape rape lao suu pyaro karalapape. Karapala nambame leyonoli pyuo koro petenge gii doko minyaro karalapape. Namba Kamongo doko nakamana Anatuŋu karo.
Namba kame soo yaki nyuo kingimi wasisi dupwa anatuŋu lao mona nyii nalapape. Mee kapa pyakepasi dupwame kiso wambu ingyuo wasapala anatuŋu lao lakanda nalapape. Namba Kamongo doko nakamana Anatu doko namba karo kande.
Nakama mona mendare palyuo yalya kando karo mena pyao kisaraminyi dokopa mawa pii lapo langyuo kandapi dupwa minyuo suu pyao kisarami ramo dokopa mona yuu lao nyero.
Minju angi dupwa pyao kisaraminyi yuu gii dokopape panda dokona yangamape dolapona iki napala yuu gii repo pyuo siya kande dupwa naa nao mee kisinyi nembarami.
Mena yuu repona seramo doko poo pyasi ingya naramosa mendeme napala banya kiso jipyamo doko nyakami nao kaeyaro.
Daaŋa lapala enda akalipi mendeme yuu repo pyuo seramo doko nao lara ramo dokopa bange nambapa lao kiso jisi doko pao mee inginyi pyambuo pirasa pira. Dokona lao baa mee nambana wambuko ingyuo kara nana lao raka lanyi nembaro.
Nakamana ee dokona witi jingi wambu piyamopa pyakepo manjo kande dokopa kame nemba nembasa petamo dupwa petena kaeyalapape. Dee lapo suku dupwana kalyinyi palyiyami kande dupwa dee pao pyakepo manjo nyii nalapape.
Nakamana isa girapo ee dokona jingi lyiyami kande dokopa kana pope dee lapo isapasipi dupwa dee nyela paa nalapape. Pendewa wambu dee wambu wakale lapo nakamana yuunya epo petenge dupwana ingyuo sakaminya kaeyalapape. Namba Kamongo doko nakamana Anatu ingyuo karapunu pilyamo.
Nakama mendena waa naa nao mendena bange doko pii panga soo nyakami nao dee kyambo pii laa nao pipwape.
Wambu mendali kando kinyi lapunu pilyamo lao sinya lapala nambana kingi lapala lamaiyami kande doko dee alowa pii nalapape. Lapala kaeyarami ramo doko seramo dokome nambana kingi doko uki minyuo lara ingyasara. Namba Kamongo doko nakamana Anatuŋu karo.
Nakamame mendalinya bange dupwa waa nyakamyuo pyao koo keta palya nalapape. Akali mendeme embena yulu pyakanya lao nyii kande dokopa yuu gii rolae dokopa banya yole maiyakamipi. Rakya jimwa lao reto yuu mendeko yanga napipi.
Wambu lenge koo dupwa lukumao simili lao bange lapo pao wambo reto kalepoe dupwa kando pii langa lao pii nalapape. Namba Kamongo doko nakamana Anatuŋu karo dokome nakama namba mupwa lao suu pyao pako karalapape.
Nakamame kote mende siyami kande dokopa kinyi lao rolae pyuo lakamipape. Nakamame wambu koo dupwa nyisaramisa kote pii doko mee wini lasarami doko kaeyalapape. Dopako pyuo wambu lapo kingi lengepe dee namba petengepe mupwa ingyuowale kandale lao pako mona manjipala mee nyisaramisa kote doko mee wini lasarami doko ama daa.
Wambu mendena lao wakale dupwa kyambo lamaiya nalapape. Wambu mende moŋo andake nyeramopa kote lakamiraminyipa embena piimi nyisare kata siya kande dokona nyisape. Namba nakamana Kamongo karapunu pilyamo.
Embena andare mendeme emba keta kopetame pyuo pisiya kande doko baapa lao imbu singi doko suu pyanyi pyano kara napipi. Dopa pyuo koo doko emba keta manjo kara narowale lao suu pyao baapa isa piso lao rolapala dokopa banya lao koo mende pii naresa pira.
Embame koo dokona isingi yano nyelana suu pyaa nao dee koo embapa piramo wambu dokopa imbu paleta kara nao pipi. Emba rangena yongo mona nyuo karene doko suu pyao parali maki palenge wambu dupwa mona reto karape. Namba Kamongo doko karo.
Nambana mawa pii letamuli pyuo minyalapape. Nakamana mena bulamakao dupwa mena rara wakale dupwa pipya pyaso kepo pyuo yakane manja kaena dee waingi rara lama minyuo pyaso ee mendakinya wara pii nalapape. Komau eleko rara lamame pyaso wapu nalapape.
Akali mendeme banya kendemande wanake doko akali mendena kalya pyuo mairamo doko yapa nara ramo doko akali kalya pyakamira dokopa yuu lapo role pyao palirambi ramo pyao kuma nao mee kote serami. Renge doko wanake baa akali banya mee kendemande pyuo pisirako.
Dokona lao nyerambinyi akali baame sipisipi kali mende namba Kamongona komau anda kambu kolandowame dokona banya koo pipu dokona lao pyao kisala epenale.
Koo Anatu baapa ingyuo piyamo doko nyuo nembakana lao purisi akalimi mena sipisipi pyao kisaramo dokopa Anatumi nyuo kame sakamira.
Nakama yuu Kenane epo kando nyepala dokopa jingi lyingi isa rara dupwa wara piyami kande dokopa koo ingyasaraŋa ee kana remana naa nao wasaka pyuo kararami.
Ee kana kisima doko epeya kande dokopa ee isa jingi dupwa peparae lyepala namba keta joo nambana kingi ketae pyambuli lao piramisa pira.
Dopa piraminyipape ee kana kingi paki dokopa kanda soo isa jingi lyuo narami. Nakama dopale pirami ramo dokopa isa jingi lyuo kakana pira. Namba nakamana Kamongo Anatuŋu karo.
Minju lapo ranjama paleta siya kande doko naa nalapape. Pipu mauli ropaka kemalipi kingi lenge dokona mendepe nakamame minyalyuo pyuo laa narami.
Nakamana kyawa wangupi angasi pinjingi dupwape pyakepowape pisarami doko daaŋa leto.
Nakama yongo kamu kepaope dee enda akalipi mende kumuyami kande dokopa yanenge kunjowape pii narami. Namba doko Kamongo karapunu pilyamo.
Nakamame nakamana wanene dupwa mee bange anatuŋu lenge tembole anda dupwana kepo yulu pingi dokona pyuo petena lao maiya nalapape. Daaŋa lao maiyuo larami ramo dokopa namba yaki nyepala mee bange anatuŋu lao suu pingi doko mana nyeraminyipa nakamana yuu andape dupwa pamuku yulu dokome simbwara ingilyamo.
Koro petenge yuu gii doko yaki nyii napala misi lao namba lakandenge panda doko kyawa nyuo minyuo karalapape. Namba Kamongoŋo karo.
Nakamame wambu lapome wambu kumasinya imambu pipya ropaka piso singi dupwa keta papala ropaka piso sisaramiŋi doko daa leto. Dopale dupwana pao kale yuku soo pisirami ramo doko nambapa kopeta kapeta kwaeyo sera ingilyamo. Namba nakamana Kamongo Anatuŋu karo.
Nakamame endemo alemope dupwa angingyuo karaminyiŋi lao suu pyao rape rape lao karalapape. Namba Kamongo doko mupwaŋa lao suu pyapala pako karalapape.
Nakamame yuu wakale wambu karala papingi nakamana yuu palaminyi dupwa kando kopetame pyuo randa mai nalapape.
Nakamana rara pipya yulu pyuo nenge rambo lao pilyaminyi doko suu pyaowako doloma pipya pipwape. Nakama range doko mona reto karaminyi suu pingi mendaki dokonako palyuo doloma mona retalapape. Nakama yuu wakale Isipi wambunya yuu dokona karala papingi ingyuo kareyami kande doko apiyakalende ingyuo kareyamape lao dokona suu pyalapape. Namba nakamana Kamongo Anatu dokome leto.
Mendeme nakamana bange mende ropo pyao nyelena epeya kande dokopa sikyali pyuo kandapala kuki andake lao nyuo makande pirami dokopa kyambo mendena palyapala uli pili laa nalapape.
Kandokondali pyuo angi dokona sikyali pyuo nyuo makande pyuo kapa kapa ingyuowape lao kenda bange peparae rolae dokona sikyali pipwape. Renge dokona namba nakamana Kamongo Anatuŋu karo. Nakama Isipi dokona kareyaminyipa nambame nyuo lanyuo dae epeyo kande dokome karo lapunu pilyamo.
Namba Kamongo dokome mawa piipi mana pii dupwape jiyu kande dupwa poraiyuo minyuo karalapape.




















































































Kamongome Mosese lamaiyuo,
Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu gii mupwa Anatunya kingi ketae minyalyuo lao elyambu pyuo nenge nao misi andake lao kararaminyi dokopa apa pyuo kararami lao lamaiya.
Yuu pakinyamange dusipa nakamana ingyuo silyamoŋo dusipana yulu pirami. Yanda ipingi dokopa imambu soo pisirama lao suu pyalapape. Yuu gii dokona yulu pii napala elyambu pyuo misi lao pisirami. Yuu anja lapona karare dokona pii mende daa. Koro petenge yuu gii doko namba Kamongona ingyuo silyamo.
Dakepa nambana yuu gii andake dusipana wambu peparae nyuo malu palyuo misi lena lao lao retelyo. Yuu gii angi rolae doko pyaka seramo dokopa embame wambu dupwa dopa pinya dopa pinya lao lamairi.
Kamongo kingi ketae pyambuo nenge Pasopa Nenge doko kana mupwa yuu gii akalisa ipisu kisima dokona neta anda penge dokopa pyaka sepa pingi.
Kana dokona yuu gii akalisa ipisu kingi paki dokopa borete isi pyambwa nao nenge yuu gii doko pyaka sepa pingi. Pyaka sepa piramo dokopa nakama borete isi pyambwange doko naa narami.
Yuu gii mupwa dokopa nakama yuu peparae yulu pinginyili pyuo pii napala nambana kingi iki suu pyao lakando pisirami.
Yuu yanda ipingi nyepo Anatu baa nenge kiso mairami. Yuu gii yanda ipingi dokona nakamana nenge nenge yulu dupwana mende minyanda napala misi lao mee pisirami.
Nakama Kamongome yuu jipyamo dokona epapala dokopa witi eepe wara pyuo manjo nyiyami kande dokopa wambo kyawa nyuo puu pyarami doko purisi akali dupwa mairami.
<range>
Koro petenge yuu gii dokopa yangamana Kamongome nakama kando rolae petaminyi lao soo nyinyaleŋe purisi dokome witi yama doko Kamongo maiyakara.
Yuu gii witi jeraminyi dokopako nakamame mena sipisipi kali yakane ee kana mendaki pasi yanenge kwaeyo rete pyuowape pii nange mende namba joo isarena kiso sunjura pinyi nembarami.
Dokopa role pyapeta nenge reto jerami dokona ingyuo palawa kilokerame lama nyuo isa olipi ipwange pipya pyasapala kiso jerami. Dokona kyaa dokome Kamongo baa soo epe sera. Dokonako ingyuo waene ipwange sanapenge kuki mendakinya (lita mendaki) minyuo konda pyuo jerami.
Nakamame Anatu bange ene maipa napala dokopa witi wambo wambu pingi dupwana kyakape kisasipi witimi wasisi boretepe dupwana mendepe naa narami. Naa naraminyi doko nakamana para pyasi wambu dupwame ee kana peparae dopako pyulu pyuo kararami.
Koro petenge yuu gii dokopa yangamana witi jingi yama mende namba jepala dokopa koro yanda ipingi ingilyape lao yaka lao kararami.
Koro yanda ipingi paparamopa dee yangama (yuu gii 50) dokopa namba Kamongo doko witi enenge lapo jerami.
Ree palu mendaki mendaki laome borete lama lama lao minyuo epo bange angi jilyamanoŋo lao soo jerami. Palawa kilokerame lama nyepala isi kuki pyambuo borete mendaki mendaki lao waso kisapala nakamame witi wambo wambu piyamo jiyaminyili pyuo namba Kamongo dokona lao jerami.
Bange lapo opetae konda pyuo kiso jepenge. Nakamame sipisipi yakane yanda ipingi nyepo ee kana mendaki pasipi bulamakao kali mendaki meme lamape pyao jerami. Mena mumba palyuo yanyi nyuo pisi dupwa jii narami. Bange dusipa Kamongo keta minyuo epo isareme kiso sunjura pinyi nembo jerami. Joo karo dokopa waene witipi opetae dokona konda pyuo jerami. Dokona kyaa dokome namba Kamongo dokome epe soo kararo.
Mena meme kali mendeme koo dupwana lao pyao kiso dee sipisipi yakane kali ee kana mendaki pasi lama nyuo pipala mona mendaki palyuo yalya kando karalana lao jerami.
Purisi dokome boretepe mena sipisipi yakane lamape namba Kamongo doko purisi dupwana lao jilyuŋu lao jera. Jeramo bange dusipa poo pyasi ingyuo para.
Yuu gii dokopa nakamana nenge nenge yulu dupwana mende minyanda napala misi lao mee pisirami. Pisiraminyi dokopa nakamana para pyasi wambu dupwame yuu muu dupwana karo yaka lao dopako pyulu pyuo pyuo kararami.
Nakamana ee dokona witi jingi wambu piyamopa pyakepo manjo kande dokopa kame nemba nembasa petamo dupwa petena kaeyalapape. Dee lapo suku dupwana kalyinyi palyiyami kande dupwa dee pao pyakepo manjo nyii nalapape. Pendewa wambu dee wambu wakale lapo nakamana yuunya epo petenge dupwana ingyuo sakaminya kaeyalapape. Kamongo doko nakamana Anatuŋu.
Kamongome Mosese kando lao,
Kana yanda ipingi dokona yuu gii mupwa dokopa yuu gii angingyuo imambu soo mee pisirami. Dopa pyuo pisiraminyipa bikuli pii laramo dokopa misi lala epo nyuo malu palyarami.
Dokopa nakamana nenge nenge yulu dupwana mendepe pii napala namba Kamongo doko nenge kiso jerami, leya.
Kamongome Mosese dopa lamaiya. Kana yanda ipingi nyepo dokona yuu gii akalisa dokopa bange lapo wambunya koo dupwana nyuo kame sakaminya lao jerami. Yuu gii dokopa nenge wasaka pyuo misi iki kingi wapambupi lakao pisipala namba Kamongo nenge kiso jerami.
<range>
Namba nakamana Kamongo Anatu dokome nakamana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakara lao nakama yulu pii nao mee kararami.
Daaŋa lapala nakama wambu dupwana mendeme yuu gii dokopa nenge nara ramo doko baa nambana wambu ingyuo kara nara.
Mendeme yuu gii dokona yulu pyuo lara ramo doko namba Kamongo rangeme baa pyao kumasero.
Mawa pii dake nakamana para pyao parami dupwane ingyara. Yuu anjale palyuo kararami dokona pii mende daa.
Imambu singi yuu gii angingyuo suu pyao karo yuu gii mange mendaki neta yapao sii piramo dokona piso pao yuu gii akalisana dee neta yalu piramo dokopa nenge kuki injisi mendepe naa narami, leya.
Kamongome Mosese kando pii dapa lao Isaraele wambu dupwa lamainya leya.
Kana yanda ipingi dokona yuu gii akalisa ipisu kingi paki dokopa anda kauwana nenge nenge yuu gii doko pyaka sera. Pyaka sepala yuu yanda ipingi dusipana mee sooko para.
Koro dakena yuu gii mupwa dokopa nakama rangena yulu yaki nyepala nyuo malu palyuo namba lakando misi lao pisirami.
Koro dakena yuu gii yaka lao nakamame namba nenge kiso jerami. Jepala yuu gii mange lama karo dokona kamba epo nyuo malu palyuo lakando piso nenge kiso jerami. Yuu gii doko mee misi iki lao piso yulu pii narami.
Yuu gii andake dusipana nakama malu palyuo piso namba lakando nenge kiso joo bange kiso sunjura pinyi nembo witipi waenepe joo mena pyao kiso joo nambame nakama yuu peparae dopa pipwape dapa pipwape lao langiyunuli pyuo piraminyi dokopa nambana kingi ketae pyambuo kararaminyisa pira.
Nakamame koro petenge yuu gii dokopa imambu soo nambana lao suu pyao piso bange maipa pyuope bange joo pii lalu lao lasi dupwana manda manjo paramo dupwa joope dee range lapo maso jimwali lao suu pyao kararaminyipape nakama yuu gii andake dasipa opetae poraiyuo minyuo misi lao bange joo kararami.
Nakamana ee dokona nenge manjo nyuo otapala dokopa kana yanda ipingi dokona yuu gii akalisa ipisu kingi paki dokopa nyuo malu palyuo yuu gii yanda ipingi nyepo nambame langiyunuli pyuo pyuo pisirami. Yuu gii dusipana yuu gii mupwa doko angingyuo imambu soo pisirami.
Nakamame yuu gii mupwa dokona nakamana isa jingi lyingi dupwana lyuo nyuo dee yala isa wangyape isa yoko malu mandenge wangya dupwape lakyuo nyuo pipala yuu gii yanda ipingi nyepo nakamana Kamongo Anatu dokona lenge kambu dokona baapa lao ketae nembo rae maiyuo pisirami.
Kana yanda ipingi dokona yuu gii yanda ipingi nyero yuu gii mupwa ingyuo nambanaŋa lao retarami. Nakamana para pyasi wambu dupwame ee kana peparae dopako pyulu pyuo pyuo parami.
Nakama Isaraele enda akalipi dupwa anda kauwa dupwana yuu yanda ipingi nyepo palyuo kararami.
Dokona lao nakamana para pyasi dupwame nakama dopa pyuo palyuo kararaminyi kandapala dokopa Kamongo dokome Isaraele wambu yuu Isipi dokona kareyaminyi dupwa nyuo lanyuo epeyamopa nakama anda kauwa dupwana palena leyaŋa lao soo nyerami. Baa nakamana Kamongo Anatu.
Dopako pyuo Moseseme Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu gii andake dupwa apa pyuo minyuo pyuo Kamongona kingi ketae palena lao pyuo kararami lao lamaiya.














































































































































































































































































































































































































Kamongome Mosese kando dopa lamaiyuo, Eronemoo banya ikinyingi dusipape
Isaraele wambu dupwa nyuo elyape keta pisinya lao pii dapakale lena lamairi, leya.
Kamongome nakama nyuo elyape keta piso isaro pyuo pinya.
Kamongo baame anjiki pyuo ipyapala mona keyange palyuo nakama keta pyakao karena.
Kamongome nakama kando rae maiyuo poraiyuo suu pyao nakama mona kyuu lao singi renge doko jinya.
Kamongome dopa lao, Mendeme nambana kingi lao Isaraele wambu dupwa elyape keta pisinya lao ateŋa larami ramo dokopa nambame nakama nyuo elyape keta pisaroko, leya.

































































































































Kamongona komau anda doko piyaminyi yuu gii dokopa kopa dokome epo yambe piya. Kukwama dokopa kopa doko isare dopale ingiya.
<range>
Kopa doko soo minyalyuo neta peyamo dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwame nakamana komau anda wambu paleyaminyi dupwa lalyuo soo panda pao yuu mendasa kopa isa epeyamo dokona kamba komau anda dupwa pipwa piyami.
Kamongome nakamana komau anda dupwa lalyuo soo pena lao leyamuli pyuo piyami. Dopako pyuo baame komau anda dee pinya leyamo dokopa piyami. Kopa doko komau anda dokona ketae mee siyamo dokopa wambu dupwa mendasa paa nao yuu dokona mee palyuo kareyami.
Kopa doko komau anda dokona yuu gii malu mee sulu siya dokopa wambu dupwame Kamongo kando warombo sepala yuu mendasa paa nayami.
Yuu lapo kopa doko yuu gii kuki lama iki komau anda dokona ketae siya. Yuu peparae Kamongome leyamuli pyuo mee karo panda dee kata nyuo pao piyami.
Yuu lapo kopa doko kukwa piso sepala soo pao yangeya. Dee kopa doko minyalyuo peyamo dokopa aopa wambu dupwa kata nyuo peyami. Dopa pyuo korakama panda kukwa kopa doko minyalyuo peyamuli pyuo wambu dupwa kata nyuo papapu piyami.
Yuu gii lama panda kana mende kuma soo panda ee kana mende epo pao piyamopape kopa doko komau anda ketae mee sulu siyamo dokopa wambu dupwa yuu doko yaki nyuo mendasa paa nayami. Dopa piyamopape kopa doko sipuro peyamo dokopa wambu dupwa peyami.
Kamongome Mosese keta leyamo pii doko warombo sepala wambu dupwame komau anda pyuo dee lalyuo soo peyami.
































Wambu dupwame yuu kyau poo pyasi mende kingi Sainai lenge doko yaki nyepala yuu gii rema nembo peyaminyi dokopa Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko soo wambako pao nakama paliraminyi yuu pandape lasaka pira lao koto peyami.
Nakama paliraminyi panda dorena papapu piyaminyi dokopa Kamongona kopa doko yangama pao alemanji sepapu piya.
Piyamo dokopa Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko soo panya kata nyuo peyaminyi dokopa Moseseme lao, Kamongo emba sipurape. Embena yanda pimwai dupwape dee wambu lapome emba kando awa nao epe kanda nao kareyami kande dupwa ralinyi nemba, leya.
Dopako pyuo Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko soo pao kaeyaminyi dokopa Moseseme lao, Kamongo Isaraele wambu malu mee dupwa keta kapu kyuo ipu, leya.
Wambu dupwame embone pisa nao randa nao karo Kamongo kando mumu lao kareyami. Kareyaminyi dokopa Kamongo baame pii doko sepala imbwuapala isare doko wambu dupwa keta rena lao pyambuya. Pyambuyamo dokopa isare dokome komau anda pyuo paleyaminyi yuu andape pinjingi pakirena reya.
Dokopa wambu dupwame Mosese kando nyisinya lao ee leyami. Leyaminyisa baame Kamongona kingi lao ateŋa leya dokopa isare doko kunjo isa peya.
Kamongona isare dokome nakama keta rao kareyamosa dokona yuu doko kingi Tapera leyami. (Kingi Tapera doko Ipuru pii isareme renge dopale lenge.)
Yuu wakale range wambu lapo Isaraele wambu dupwa pipya role pyao peyaminyi dupwame minju ama namane lao suu piyami. Suu piyaminyi dokona Isaraele wambu nakama range mumu lao karo, Namwa iki minju lapo sipyali doko namwa kapa karamwali, leyami.
Lapala namwa yuu Isipi dokona karo kau oma naramanuli pyuo nao karenge. Nao karenge doko namwa mendeme ropo pyao naa nange. Namwa yuu Isipi dokona ropetape pambekinipi ananepe nenge dopale lapope neyama kande.
Dopa piyamanopape epapu namwana porai doko isa pao kapa ingya nao petamano. Yuu yangara kwuara piramo dokopa nenge myana dakeko silyamo. Doko iki nelyamano. Mendeme kapa narama mende see nalu nao nalyamo.
Myana doko ee waingi ama kuki dopale. Kala doko kwai kaulya kapa kaa renge dopale.
Kukwama pipya dokopa role pyapeta nenge myana dupwa wambu paleyaminyi dokona isa epeya. Yangama dokopa wambu dupwame nenge myana doko yapo nyepala waingi dupwa pyao injo palawa ingiyami. Dopa pipala kiso bolo pyapala nao nenge kake palawa dopale waso neyami. Dopa nenge borete olipi ipwange pyambuo kisilyaminyi rende pingi dopale ingiya.
<range>
Wambu dupwa nakama liti pira liti pira pyuo kaparo karo komau anda kambu konandowame dupwana mumu leyaminyi pii doko Mosese siya. Siyamo dokopa Kamongome wambu dupwa kando imbwayamo dokona Mosese soo yamaranguya.
Yamarangupala Mosese baame kamongo kando dopa lao piso soo, Akipamo embame namba keta randa jilisi? Akipamo embame namba kando rae mai nalese? Akipamo embame namba wambu dapwa rapu pyakao karape, leese?
Nambame wambu dupwa pyuo wasa nao dee manjo minyuo pyuo epa nayo. Nakamana rora ambasupi dupwa kando embame yuu enenge mairu lao lalu lao leene dokona akipamo embame namba endangi dupwame nyaŋa kingi kalengena reto kupyuo papingi dopale ingyuo nakama lanyuo yuu dokona puu leese?
Wambu dapwa kapa narami lao nambame anjarae minju nyerose? Nakamana minju dokona lao piso sepa sepa pyuo jii jii letaminyi.
Namba rangeme iki wambu dupwa kapa pyuo rapu pii naro ingilyamo. Kenda doko nambame kapa pyuo piru ingya nalyamo.
Embame namba kando dopa piri ramo doko embame namba sakao karapala pyao kumakare. Dokopa kenda namba keta jiinyi dupwa dee nyii nalu naro, leya.
Kamongome Mosese lamaiyuo, Wambu dupwame akali lapo mupwa ingyuo karaminyi lao suu pilyaminyi dupwana akalisa yanda ipingi nyepo dupwa nyuo malu palyapala nambana komau anda dokona namba keta lanyuo epare. Epapala nakama emba kararene dorenako karena lamairi.
Namba isa epapala dokona nakama pipya pii langiru. Dee nambame Imambunya porainya renge nambame emba jiyunu dupwana lapo nyuo nakama mairu. Dokopa akali dupwame emba nyiso wambu dupwa rapu pyuo yulu pyakamiraminyi dokopa embame iki yulu pii nare.
Dakepa wambu dupwa lamai. Rakya nakama minju naraminyi dokona nakama rapa rapa pyuo ama poo pyasi wakasa ingyuo karalapape. Nakama minju lapo opetae namwali lao lao dee yuu Isipi dokona mondo lao kareyamaŋa lapala mumu leyaminyi doko Kamongome siya. Sepala epapu Kamongome minju dupwa nakama jeramo dokopa narami.
Nakama yuu gii mendaki panda lama panda kingi paki panda akalisa panda akalisa lama dopakale iki nao kara narambi.
Dopa piramopape kana mendaki nao otarami. Yuu gii dokopa nakamana kale kata dokona nenge myana neta eparamopa nalana rae mai narami. Kamongo nakama keta dae karapyamo doko kame soo mata maiyuo karo baa kando mumu lao namwa yuu Isipi yaki nyii namwali doko kapa ingyapyali leyaminyi dokona dopako pira, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Mosese baame Kamongo lamaiyuo, Nambame wambu ama malu mee (600,000) dupwa lanyuo pelyonopape embame lao, Kana mendaki dokona minju kapa narami lao mairu lapi.
Wambu dupwa kapa sikya pyuo narami lao mena bulamakao sipisipipi pyao kapa mairamisi? Ipwa kota dokona kau oma silyamo dupwa peparae nyimili nakama kapa sikya pyuo namilisi? leya.
Kamongome isingi lao, Mendeme nambana porainya renge doko kata lyokwarase? Namba lalono doko pyaka soo pira panda pii nara lao repeta kandarami, leya.
Dokopa Mosese baa neta papala Anatumi lamaiyamo dupwa wambu dupwa lamaipala baame akali mupwa akalisa yanda ipingi nyepo dusipa banya komau anda nemba nemba roya karena lao lamaiya.
Yuu gii dokopa Kamongo kopa rakapana isa epapala baa pii lamaiya. Baame Imambunya porainya renge lapo Mosese maiyamo dokona nyepala akali mupwa akalisa yanda ipingi nyepo dusipa maiya. Imambu doko nakama keta epeyamo dokopa nakamame pii andake lao poropeta akali lengenyili pyuo leyami. Leyaminyipape waiya lao oteya.
Akali mupwa akalisa yanda ipingi nyepo dupwana akali lama nakambana kingi Elitate Mitate lenge dolapo Kamongona komau anda dokona paa napala paleyaminyi yuu dokona mee kareyambi. Kareyambinyi dokopa Imambu doko nakamba keta epo maralyiya dokopa poropeta ingyuo pii andake lao kareyambi.
Dokopa wane parange mende Mosese kareyamo dokona makando papala Elitate Mitatepa pelambinyi lao lamaiya.
Nanena ikinyingi akali Josua lenge wane parange karo pao Mosese nyiso kareyamo dokome Mosese kando pii lamaiyuo lao, Nambana akali mupwa nakamba kaena lape, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Moseseme isingi lao, Embame nambana lao poraiyuo suu pilisi? Nambame Kamongo dokome banya wambu peparae poropeta ingyuo pii andake larami lao nakama keta banya Imambu doko maipyali yaka lao suu pilyu, leya.
Lapala Mosese baamoo akali akalisa yanda ipingi nyepo dusipape komau anda paleyaminyi dokona dee kapu kyuo peyami.
Dokopa aopa Kamongome porambaiye doko ipwa kota pete repeta piso minyiyamosa yaka kewale lenge kiwaki dopale soo epeyami. Soo ketae epo pai koe minyiya. Dopa piyamo dokopa yuu paleyaminyi dokona isa epo piso yuu wangu paki pakipi dupwana kuki nanesale peyami.
Yuu gii dokopa piso yangama pao kukwape dee yangama dokope wambu peparae yaka kewale yapo nyuo kareyami. Wambu mendaki mendaki lao yaka kewale dupwa kilokerame taosande mendaki (1,000) sikyali dopale nyiyami. Nakama paleyaminyi yuu dokona awali lao yaka kewale dupwa oo lena lao raeyo neta pyao reteyami.
Nakama yaka minju malu mee kapa naramili lao mee siyamopa Kamongome wambu dupwa kando imbwaya. Imbwuapala nakama keta sukusa anga pingi renge andake mende maiya.
Wambu dupwame minju namwali lao suu piyaminyi dupwa dokona malu piyaminyi dokome yuu doko kingi Minju Nyuo Napuli Lao Suu Pingi Malu Pingi Yuu doko, leyami.
Dokona piso wambu dupwa yuu Aseroti dokona papala komau anda pyuo paleyami.
Mosese baame Kusi enda mende nyiyamo dokona Miriamepa Eronepame Mosese kando iso leyambi.
Lapala nakamba dopa lao piso soo, Kamongome Mosese keta iki pii lamaipyase? Baame nambwa keta dopako pyuo pii lamai napyase? leyami. Leyambinyi pii doko Kamongome siya.
Mosese baa akali ama inyimungu karenge. Yuu muu peparaena baa yale mendali daa.
Dokopa aopa Kamongome Mosese Miriame Eronemoo dopa lamaiyuo, Nakama rema dusipa nambana komau anda dokona imili lao suu pilyu, leya.
Dokopa nakama peyami dokopa Kamongo doko kopa rau londe siyamo dokona rakapana isa epo komau anda dokona kambu konandowame karapala pii lao Erone Miriamepa kyakale leya. Kyakale leyamo dokopa nakamba repeta peyambi.
Peyambinyi dokopa Kamongome lamaiyuo, Epapu nambana pii doko selapape. Poropeta dupwa nakamba pipya karenge dokopa namba rangeme nakama keta pano epo repa repa pyuo dee kombeyame pii lamaiyuo pingi.
Dopa pilyunupape nambame nambana kendemande akali Mosese pii lamaingi doko wakaleko. Nambame Isaraele wambu dupwa peparae baa keta maiyuo rapu pingi mupwa ingyuo nakama rapu pyuo karena leyo.
Dokona lao nambame baa rolae lenge kambu kando pii lamaiyuo kongwalu palyuo lamai nao angi rolae lamaingi. Dokopa baame nambana yanga paupau lenge renge doko angi kandenge. Apa pyuo nakambame paka nao nambana kendemande akali Mosese yanda pimwaiyuo pii lambisi? leya.








Kamongome Mosese lamaiyuo,
Rara akalisa ipisu lama dokona akali mupwa mendaki mendaki lao rombo palyuo nyepala yuu Kenane nambame Isaraele wambu mailyu dokona apa pyuo silyape lao waa kando kandala pena lao mapanyi nemba, leya.






















Yuu apa pyuo silyamo lao kando peyaminyipa yuu gii akalisa kisima nembo pao kandapala yuu Katese lenge yuu muiyane Patane dokona singi Mosese Eronemoo Isaraele wambu dupwa peparae pipya dokona kareyaminyi dokona kapu kyuo epeyami. Epapala nakama kandeyaminyi dupwa polo lamaiyuo dee isa jingi minyuo epeyaminyi dupwa lasaka pyuo piyami.
<range>
Akali dusipame Mosese lamaiyuo, Namwa yuu kandala pumwa kandape doko ama yuu amenge pingi keyange dokona nenge malu singi. Dokona isa jingi lapo minyuo imwa dupwa dae silyamo kandape, leyami.
Dopa pipyamopape yuu range wambu dupwa ama porai wakasapya. Nakamana taone andake dupwana kana kame awali lao palenge dokona mendeme sukusa panya saka nange. Dee yuu dokona namwame akali reeko Anakena para pyasi kareyaminyi dupwa kandeyama.
Amaleke rara dupwa yuu dokona donorena palenge. Iti Jepusi dee Amo rara dusipa yuu kyau pyalya pyana pingi dorena palenge. Dee Kenane rara dupwa ipwa kota Metitaraniane lenge repeta palyuo ipwa Jotane epo penge dorena palyuo pingi.
Wambu dupwame Mosese kando mumu leyamisa akali Kelepe lenge dokome mumu laa nao elya kalo karalapa. Namwa porayapala kapa winimi pirama dokona epapu namwame yuu doko pyao nyela parama ingilyamo, leya.
Dopa leyamopa akali Kelepe role pyao peyaminyi dupwa dopa leyami. Wambu ama porai wakasa namwa yale daa. Dokona namwame kapa pyuo nakama poraiyuo pyala paa narama.
Akali yuu waa kando kandala peyaminyi dusipame Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu dokona lao kyambo lamaiyuo, Yuu range wambu dupwame kapa nao palirami lao nenge angi mende yuu dokona anda nangepya. Dopako pyuo wambu peparae namwa kandeyamano dupwa londeko kareyami. Namwa akali Anakena para pyasi wambu ama reeko wakasa kareyaminyi kandeyama.
Dokona namwa goemba dopakale ingilyamo lao suu pyao dee nakamame namwa kandapala dopako pyuo suu pilyaminyi lao masiyama, leyami.
Kukwa dokopa wambu dupwa ee andake lao pii porakai leyami.
Wambu dupwa Mosese Eronepa kando mumu lao lao, Yuu Isipi dokonape panda yuu muiyane karamano dakenape kumuyamali doko kapa ingyapyali.
Akipamo Kamongo dokome namwa yuu dokona lanyuo pelyase? Yanda pyuo karo dokopa nakamame namwa pyao kumakarami. Pyao kumakapala nakamame namwana enda wanepe dupwa puu maiyuo nyerami. Yuu Isipi dokona kamba kapu kyuo parama ramo doko kapa ingyara, leyami.
Dokona lao nakama range mendeme mendali kando lao, Namwa range akali mupwa mende rombo palyapala yuu Isipi dokona dee kamba monale, leyami.
Leyaminyi dokopa Mosese Eronepa wambu kareyaminyi lenge kambu dokona pangu siyambi.
Nanena ikinyingi Josua lengepe Kelepe Jepuna ikinyingipi yuu dokona waa kando kandala peyambinyi dolapome kondome kumapala nakambana komau minyuo kanguyambi.
Kangupala dokopa wambu dupwa kando lamaiyuo, Namwa yuu kandala peyama kande doko ama keyange wakasa.
Dokona Kamongome namwa kando rae maira ramo doko baame namwa nyuo yuu dokona lanyuo papala yuu amenge pingi nenge malu andenge doko namwa jera.
Dokona Kamongo kando kamba lao apiyanda pii napala yuu range wambu dupwa kando paka nalapape. Paka nao namwame nakama kapa mee manda rasi pyao anamasi minyarama. Kamongo doko namwa keta karapyamo dokome nakamana mee bange anatu lao lakandenge dupwa nyuo anamasi minyiyamo dokona lao namwa paka nao karamana, leyambi.
Wambu yuu dokona palenge dupwa peparae kapa pyuo kaname pyao kumakamwalinya suu piyami. Dopa piyaminyipape aopa Kamongona komau anda ketae dorena Kamongona yanga paupau lenge renge dokome epo kendale piyamo dokopa kandeyami.
Kamongome Mosese lamaiyuo, Yuu gii akipare nembo wambu dupwame namba mata joo yaki nyuo kaeyaramisi? Wambu dupwa keta nambame yulu kanda nange dupwa pipunupape yuu gii akipare wambu dupwame mona kana poko namba kapa ingingi lao suu pyaa naramisi?
Nambame yanyi renge peyapala wambu dupwa pyaro. Dopa pirunupape nambame emba rakange kyawa inginyi pyambwaronopa rara enenge andake ingyuo dee porainya renge doko palyuo simbwaramopa rara wamba paleyami dupwa isa palyuo kararami, leya.
Dopa leyamo dokopa Mosese baame Kamongo lamaiyuo, Embame embena porai renge dokome yuu Isipi dokona karo wambu dupwa nyuo lanyuo epee. Embena wambu dupwa kando embame yulu piinyi doko Isipi range dupwame seraminyi dokopa
nakamame wambu yuu dakena palenge dupwa lamairami. Kamongo emba namwa keta epo karenge doko wambu dapwame soo otelyaminyi. Embena kopa doko namwa kareyama dokona epo siyamo dokopa emba epo panee. Dee korakama namwa penge dokopa emba wambo pao kopa rau londe ingyuo dee kukwa dokopa emba isare ingyuo pao pingi doko silyaminyi.
Epapu embame embena wambu dupwa pyao kumakare ramo doko wambu rara wakale dupwame emba pilini doko sepala dopa lao,
Kamongo dokome yuu mairu lalu lao leyamo dokona kapa pyuo wambu dupwa lanyuo epa nara ingyapyasa yuu muiyane dokona nakama pyao kumapya, larami.
Dokona lao epapu Kamongo ateŋa leto. Embena porai doko namwa lasaka pyuo emba piruŋu lalu lao leeneli pyuo piri. Emba dopa lao,
Namba Kamongo, doko waiya lao imbwa nao wambu dupwa ama mona reto yaki nyii nao koo pyuo mata jilyaminyipape kame sakamingi. Nakamana endangi rakangepe koo pingi dokona nambame ikinyipi wanengepe apusingi kauwangepe dupwa koo keta palyuo pyao randa mairu. Randa maiyuo nakamame para pyao wane manjo manjo paraminyi dupwa randa maiyuo piru, lee.
Embena mona retenge doko kamame wakasa alowa pii nange leene dokome embame wambu dapwa yuu Isipi yaki nyuo epeyaminyi dokona piso pao dakepa nakamana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakaminyili pyuo kame sakamipi, leya.
Kamongome isingi lao, Embame namba piso silinyili pyuo nambame wambu dupwana koo nyuo kame sakamiru, leya.
Dopa pirunupape namba lete karo nambana yanga paupau lenge renge doko yuu dakena pano silyamo dokona kinyi lengenyili pyuo lalu lao lao,
Wambu dapwana mendemepe yuu dokona sukusa pao pali nara. Nakama nambana yanga paupau lenge renge dokome epo kendale piyasa kandeyaminyi dokope dee yuu Isipi dokonape yuu muiyane dokonape yulu mendeme pii nange dupwa piyunu kandeyami. Kandeyaminyipape nakamame nambana maka nange renge doko makande pipa pyuo nambana pii warombo see napala kamba leyami.
Nambame nakamana rora ambasu dupwa yuu doko mairu lao lalu lao leyo dokona nakama paa narami. Nakamame namba mata jilyaminyi dupwana mendemepe yuu dokona kapa pao kara nara.
Dopa piramopape nambana kendemande akali Kelepe banya mona wakale palyuo karo namba yaki nyii nange dokona baa yuu waa kando kandala peyamo dokona nambame baa lanyuo paro. Dokopa yuu dokona yuu angi lama lama dupwana Amaleke wambupi Kenane wambupi dupwa epapu palaminyi banya para pyaramo dupwana ingyara.
Dokona rakya nakama dee kapu kyuo yuu muiyane dokona ipwa kota pete Kone lenge doko kanda kanda parami.
Kamongome Mosese Eronepa lamaiyuo lao,
Yuu gii akipare nembo wambu koo pingi dapwame namba kando mumu lao kararamisi? Doo mumu letaminyi dasipa yakana namba silyu.
Dokona epapu nakambame nakama dopa lao isingi lamaiyuo, Namba Kamongo dopa leto. Nambame kinyi kinyi lalu lao lao, Mende pyakapili lao piso siminyili pyuo nakama keta pyakaro, leto.
Nakama kumaraminyi dokopa nakamana yanenge kaoma dupwa yuu muiyane dokona muu raleya lao nembarami. Namba kando mumu lao karaminyi dokona nakama ee kana akalisa lama pasi dupwana mendalimipi yuu dokona paa narami.
Nakama yuu dokona pao palirami lao lalu lao leyonopape nakama mendemepe pali naraminyipa akali Kelepe Josuapa iki yuu dokona pao palirambi.
Nakamame namwana wane wanake dupwa karapusi pyao nyerami lao leyami. Dopa leyaminyipape nakamame yuu doko rae mai nao paa narama leyaminyi dokona nambame wane wanakepe dupwa lanyuo paronopa nakama rangena yuu ingyara.
Nakama yuu muiyane dakena kumarami.
Nakamame namba epe kanda nao mata joo kareyaminyi dokona nakamana wane wanakepe dupwa randa nao ee kana akalisa kisima dusipana yuu muiyane dakena ralo papyuo kararami. Dopa pyuo papyuo karo pao nakama peparae kumaraminyipa wane wanakepe dupwa yuu dokona parami.
Nakamame koo piyaminyi dokona ee kana akalisa kisima randa nao kararami. Yuu doko yuu gii akalisa kisima nembo kando papyuo kareyaminyi dokona ee kana akalisa kisimako randa nao kararami. Nambame nakama kando rae mai nalene lao soo nyerami.
Nakama wambu koo pingi dupwa nyuo pyasapala namba kando mata joo karaminyi dupwa keta nambame lapunuli pyuo piru lao lalu lao leto. Yuu muiyane dakena nakama peparae kumarami lao namba Kamongome lalu lao lapu.
Moseseme akali lapo yuu doko apiyakale lao kandala pena leyamopa nakama pao kapu kyuo epapala kyambo leyaminyi dokome wambu dupwa Anatu kando mumu leyami.
Dokona Kamongome nakama keta anga pingi renge maiyamosa nakama kumuyami.
Dopa pyuo kumuyaminyipape akali akalisa ipisu lama yuu doko apiyakale lao kandala peyaminyi dusipana Josua Kelepepa iki mee lete kareyambi.
Kamongome leyamuli pyuo Moseseme Isaraele wambu dupwa kando lamaiyamo dokopa nakama soo mona randayami.
Dokopa wambu dupwa wamba yangama sipurapala yuu kyau pyalya pyana pingi dokona ketae pulyuo yuu enenge nyela pao karo lao Kamongome yuu jero lao lalu lao leyamo dokona epapu namwa rapa rapa pisi karamano kapa parama. Namwa koo piyama lao silyamano, leyami.
Dopa leyaminyipape Moseseme lamaiyuo, Akipamo epapu nakamame Kamongo kando kamba letamisi? Nakama embone pisa nara.
Nakama paa nalapape. Nakama pipya Kamongo role kara nalyamo dokona nakamana nyisu petenge dupwame nakama anamasi minyarami.
Nakama Amaleke wambu dupwape Kenane wambu dupwape pipya yanda pyalana pao lenge kambusa kararaminyi dokopa nakama yandana kumarami. Nakamame Kamongome langiyamuli pyuo moko minyuo pii nayaminyi dokona Kamongo nakama keta role kara nara, leya.
Dopa leyamopa Mosese baape dee Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote dokope paleyaminyi yuu doko yaki nyuo paa nayaminyipape nakama yuu kyau pyalya pyana pingi dokona mee langa pulyuo panyako suu piyami.
Pulyuo peyaminyi dokopa Amaleke wambupi Kenane wambupi yuu dokona paleyaminyi dupwame nakama pyao isa palyapala pyao peta pao yuu Orima pyambuo kaeyami.






























































































































































Ee kana enenge dokopa Isaraele wambu peparae dupwa yuu muiyane Sene lenge dokona epapala yuu Katese dokona paleyami. Paleyaminyi dokona enda Miriame baa kumuyasa malu piyami.
Dokopa nakama malu palyuo paleyaminyi yuu dokona ipwa epa nayamosa wambu dupwame mona mendare palyuo Mosese Eronepa kando mumu leyami.
Mumu lao lao, Namwana yangonge dupwa Kamongona komau anda lenge kambusa dopa pyuo namwa kukuyamali doko kapa ingiyali, leyami.
Akipamo embame namwa yuu muiyane dakena lanyuo epeese? Namwana mena dupwa pipya kumaramiŋi lao dae lanyuo epeese?
Akipamo embame namwa yuu Isipi yaki nyuo yuu koo mende anda nange dakena lanyuo epeese? Isa pikipi isa girapope isa pomekanetepe jingi dupwa yuu dakena kara nao dee kamame ipwa kuki mendepe epa nao pingi lamo, leyami.
Leyaminyi dokopa Mosese Eronepa wambu malu palyuo peteyaminyi dupwa yaki nyepala Kamongona komau anda kambu konandowame dokona pao kareyambi. Karapala wapambu pii pyapala pangu siyambinyi dokopa Kamongona yanga paupau lenge renge doko pano epeyamo kandeyambi.
Dokopa Kamongome Mosese pii lamaiyuo,
Pangali isa Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote lenge kambusa silyamo doko nyepala embapa Eronepa wambu peparae epena lao nyuo malu palyalapape. Dopa pipala nakamana lenge kambu dokona karo kana doo dumu petamo doko kando pii lamaipi. Dopa pirinyi dokopa ipwa potemo epara. Dopa pipala kanana ipwa potemo eparamo doko wambupi nakamana mena dupwape narami.
Kamongome leyamuli pyuo papala Moseseme pangali doko nyiya.
Baapa Eronepa kana peteyamo lenge kambusa dokona wambu peparae nyuo malu palyapala Moseseme lao, Nakama mona kana pokonge dupwa selapape. Nambwame kana dakena nakamana ipwa epena lao nyakarambase? leya.
Lapala Moseseme banya pangali isa doko minyalyapala yuu lama lao kana dokona piya. Piyamo dokopa ipwa ama soo kaeyo malu mee epeyamopa mena wambupi peparaeme neyami.
Dopa pyuo neyaminyipape Kamongome Mosese Eronepa lamaiyuo, Kamongome Isaraele wambu keta banya porai renge poo pyasi kapa lasaka pira lao soo nyii nambinyi dokona nambame nakamba yuu jero lalu lao leyono dokona wambu dupwa lanyuo paa narambi, leya.
Isaraele wambu dupwame Kamongo kando mumu lao kareyaminyipa Kamongo baa poo pyasinyi lao nakama lasaka piyamo yuu doko Meripa lenge.
Mosese baa yuu Katese karo akali lapo pii minyuo yuu Itome kiŋi doko lamaila pena leya. Papala nakamame lao, Pii dake embena akali yango Isaraele rara dupwa peyami. Namwa randa neyamano dupwa emba silini, leyami.
Namwana rora ambasu dupwa yuu Isipi dokona papala ee kana malu nembo kareyami. Kareyaminyi dokopa Isipi wambu dupwame nakamape namwape kopetame pyuo randa jiyami.
Dokopa Kamongome namwa nyisinya lao baa kande ee lao kareyama. Ee lao kareyamano doko sepala yuu Isipi yaki nyuo lanyuo pena lao banya aŋala mende peya. Epapu namwa yuu taone Katese lenge embena yuu liti dokona karamana.
Embena yuu dokona sukusa kata pupwa, lape. Namwape namwana mena bulumakao dupwape kata yaki nyuo wangu embena ee dupwanape isa girapo ee dupwanape paa narama. Paa napala embena ipwa kamuo nenge yuwale dupwana kamuo naope pii narama. Namwa kata andake dokonako pao karo pao embena yuu doko yaki nyerama, leyami.
Dopa leyaminyipape Itome wambu dupwame nakama isingi lamaiyami. Namwana yuu dokona nakama kapa pyuo epo paa narami. Nakama panya lao eparami ramo namwame nyisa epapala nakama pyarama.
Dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwame lao namwa kata andake dokona iki parama. Dokopa namwape namwana mena dupwamepe nakamana ipwa dupwana mende narama ramo namwame ropo pyakarama. Namwame mee kata dokona sukusa panya suu pilyamano, leyami.
Dopa leyaminyipape Itome wambu dupwame dee kamba lao, Nakama dakena epa narami lapala nakamape yanda singi porai malu mee dupwamepe Isaraele wambu dupwa pyala epeyami.
Itome wambu dupwame nakamana yuu dokona Isaraele wambu dupwa epo paa narami leyaminyisa Isaraele wambu dupwa kapu kyuo kata wakalena peyami.
Isaraele wambu dupwa peparae yuu Katese yaki nyuo yuu kyau Ori lenge yuu Itome liti dokona singi dokona epo pyaka siyami.
Dokona Kamongome Mosese Eronepa lamaiyuo lao,
Nambame Isaraele wambu yuu mairu lao lalu lao leyo dokona Erone baa kapa paa nara. Yuu Meripa dokona nambame pii langiyunuli pyuo pii nayambi dokona baa kumara.
Dokona Eronepa banya ikinyingi Eliasapa lanyuo yuu kyau Ori dokona papala Eronena purisi komau wapungi doko kolo nyuo Eliasa wapwakamiri. Erone baa dokona kumara, leya.
<range>
Kamongome leyamuli pyuo Moseseme piya. Nakama wambu peparae malu palyuo kareyaminyi lenge kambu dokona yuu kyau Ori lenge dokona pulyuo peyami.
Dokopa Moseseme Eronena purisi komau dupwa roko nyepala Eliasa wapwakamiya. Wapwakamiyamo dokopa Erone yuu kyau dokona kumuya. Dopa pyuo kumuyamo dokopa Mosese Eliasapa lupyuo epeyambi.
Epeyambinyi dokopa wambu peparaeme Erone kumapya lamo leyambinyi doko siyami. Sepala nakama peparae yuu akalisa rema baa kondo lao kumanda peteyami.
Yuu Arate yuu Kenane donorena singi dokona kiŋi Kenane akali mende Isaraele wambu dupwa Atarimi kata dokona epelyaminyi leyaminyi siya. Sepala baame nakama pyao wambu dupwana lapo puu maiyuo nyuo piya.
Piyamo dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwame Kamongo kando pii lalu lao leyami. Namwame wambu dupwa pyao isa palyalapa lao embame jere ramo doko namwame nakamape nakamana yuu taonepe emba keta julu joo jepala peparae pyao kokwa soo nembarama, leyami.
Pii leyaminyi doko Kamongome sepala nyisiyamopa Kenane range dupwa pyao isa palyiyami. Dokona lao Isaraele wambu dupwame nakamape nakamana yuu taonepe pyao nembalu nembo nembapala yuu doko kingi Orima, leyami.
Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu kyau Ori yaki nyuo kata mende soo ipwa kota pete Kone lenge penge dokona pao yuu Itome awali lao panya peyami. Panya peyaminyipape nakama makapala
Anatu Mosesepa kando kamba lao mumu leyami. Yuu muiyana nenge ipwape see nange dakena kumaramiŋi lao akipamo embame namwa yuu Isipi yaki nyuo dae lanyuo ipisi? Namwame nenge koo dapwa rae maiyuo kamba naa narama, leyami.
Dokopa Kamongome wambu pingi kau lapo nakama keta peyamosa kau dupwame Isaraele wambu malu piyamisa kumuyami.
Dokopa Mosese kareyamo dokona wambu dupwa epapala dopa lamaiyuo, Namwa embapa Kamongopa kando kamba lao karamwano doko koo pimwa. Dokona epapu Kamongome kau dapwa nyuo nembakana lao ateŋa lakape. Leyaminyi dokopa Moseseme wambu dupwana lao ateŋa lakamiya.
Dokopa Kamongome Mosese lamaiyuo, Kone kana dokona lapo nyepala kau ingyuo pyuo wasapala isa lomasi dokona yukunyi palyape. Dokona kau menge dupwame wambu mende narami dokopa kau dake kandapala dokopa baa mee ingyara, leya.
Leyamo dokona Moseseme kone kana dokome kau mende wasapala isa dokona yukunyi palyiya. Kau menge dupwame wambu mende neyaminyi dokopa kau wasisi yukunyi palyiyamo doko kandapala mee ingiya.


























Isaraele wambu dupwa paleyaminyi yuu doko yaki nyuo ipwa Jotane neta potemenge dorena ingyuo yuu Jereko paki siyamopa yuu Moape lama lama dokona komau anda pyuo paleyami.
Moapena kiŋi Sipona ikinyingi Beleke lenge dokome Isaraele wambu dupwame Amo wambu dupwa kando yulu mende piyaminyi doko soo
baamoo banya wambupi dupwa peparaeme Isaraele wambu dupwa ama soo kaeyo epo piyaminyisa kando pakayami.
Moape range wambu dupwame Mitiane range akali mupwa dupwa kando leyami. Mena bulamakao kalyuwame rambe akipi nenge kandale doko suu pyao wambu dae epelyaminyi dupwame oo repeta namwana bange dupwa peparae ukiaki minyuo kokwa serami.
Dokona lao kiŋi Belekeme wai minyingi akali lapome Beona ikinyingi Belame yuu Peto ipwa Yuporisa repeta yuu Amau dokona kareyamo doko epena lao lamaila pena leya. Wambu wai pii minyuo pao dopa leyami. Beleke nakama dopa langyuo, Yuu mendakinya wambu peparae Isipi yaki nyuo dae epo yuu dakena wakale wakale raeyo palipala namwana yuu dake nyelana letaminyi doko emba sipili yaka lao langilyu lapya, leyami.
Wambu dupwa ama malu mee namwa isa palyilyaminyi dokona emba waiya lao epo nambana lao nakama koo keta palyuo mende pyakape. Dopa piri ramo namwame kapa pyuo anamasi minyuo yuu dakena pyao ralinyi nembarama rapisi. Embame wambu dupwa elyape keta petena lapinyi dokopa elyape keta petaminyiko. Randa maiyuo koo keta pena lapinyi dokopa kooko keta pelyaminyi. Doko namba silyu.
Dokona lao Moape rangepe Mitiane rangepe akali mupwa dupwame Isaraele wambu dupwa randa maiyuo koo keta pena lara lao Belame kareyamo dokona papala kana mone maiyuo Belekena pii doko lamaiyuo piyami.
Piyaminyi dokopa Belameme nakama lamaiyuo lao, Epapu kukwa nembo dae palimanalese. Dopa pyuo palirama dokopa Kamongome namba pii langiramo dusipa rakya nambame nakama langiru. Dokona lao Moape range akali mupwa dusipa Belamemoo pipya paleyami.
Anatumi Belame kareyamo dokona epapala piso soo, Akali embamoo petaminyi dasipa apimoose? leya.
Baame isingi lao, Yuu Moape range kiŋi Beleke dokome pii langyala pena lapyasa imi.
Doko wambu lapo Isipi yaki nyuo dae epapala yuu dakena wakale wakale nyuo yoko lapala palaminyi lapya. Baame wambu dupwa pyao ralinyi nembaro lao nambame banya lao wambu dupwa randa maiyuo koo keta palyakape lapya, leya.
Anatumi Belame lamaiyuo, Akali dasipa pipya role pyao paa napipi. Nambame Isaraele wambu dupwa elyape keta pisingiŋi dokona randa maiya napipi.
Dokopa yangama Belame Belekena wai pii minyuo epeyaminyi akali dupwa lamaiyuo, Anda kapu kyuo pupwape. Kamongome namba nakama role pyao paa napipi letamo, leya.
Dokopa akali dusipa Beleke kareyamo dokona peyami. Papala dopa lamaiyuo, Namwa pipya role pyao epa naro lapya, leyami.
Dokopa Belekeme akali wambo pena leyamopape enakana konda pyuo akali kamongo dupwa pena leya.
Akali dupwa Belame kareyamo dokona papala Beleke pii leyamo dupwa lamaiyuo, Namba keta epa naroŋo lapala yulu mende wakale pii napipi.
Nambame emba kando yano pyao bange joo kamonganyi pyambuo embame langirinyili pyuo pyakao piru. Dokona wambu dapwa randa maiyakala ipupi lapya, leyami.
Dopa leyamopape Belameme isingi lao, Beleke baame namba kana kulingipi golope banya anda dokona singi dupwa peparae jeramopape namba Anatumi langilyamuli pyuo kamba laa naro ingilyamo. Kamame randa kuki laponape Kamongo nambana Anatunya pii kuki mende iki kapa isa pena lapala piru ingya nalyamo.
Dopa pipyamopape akali lapo dae paleyami dopale ingyuo nakama epapu kukwa dae palimanale. Dokona Kamongome namba pii lapo dupwana lao langilyape mee lao sero, leya.
Kukwa yuu gii dokopa Belame paleyamo dokona epapala Anatumi dopa lamaiyuo, Akali dusipame emba role pyao mona lao piso simi ramo doko panya rapa rapa pii. Dopa pirinyipape nambame langiru doko iki piri, leya.
Dokona lao yangama dokopa Belame sipurapala mena donge mende nyepala piso Moape akali kamongo dupwa pipya role pyao peyami.
Belame banya mena donge matana piso banya kendemande akali lama pipya role pyao peyamisa Anatumi imbwaya. Imbwayamo dokona nakama panya peyaminyi dokona Kamongona aŋala mendeme kata roko kareya.
Dokopa aŋala dokome kata dokona wua gela minyaro kareyamo mena donge dokome kandapala panya peyamo kata doko yaki nyuo ee yuu dokona peya. Peyamo dokopa Belameme mena donge doko pyaroko pyapala kapu kyuo kata dokona lanyuo epeya.
Dokopa isa girapo ee paki paki pinya kata kuki sukusa siyamo dokona nemba nemba dolapona kana kame piru kareyamo kata dokona aŋala doko kareya.
Dokopa donge dokome aŋala doko kandapala pakao pupuli lao kata koteyamo dokopa kana kame dokona Belamena kimbu doko pyao pisiya. Pyao pisiyamo dokopa Belameme donge doko pyaroko piya.
