Nakamame namba kame soo kaepala yuu nyuo palya panya pilyaminyi dokona mee bange anatuŋu lao lakandenge dupwa lakandaramilyamo.
Dopa piraminyi dokopa nambame nakama kando imbwuapala kyawa yaki nyuo kaeyaronosa koo keta palyuo kwaeyo parami. Randa wakale wakale dupwa epo nakama keta paliramopa nakanjo sepala dokopa namba nakamana Anatu nakama pipya kara nalyane dokona randa nyilyamano lao soo nyerami.
Dopa pyuo soo nyeraminyipape nyisalana suu pyaa naro ingilyamo. Renge doko nakamame kopetame pyuo mee bange anatuŋu lao lakandenge dupwa mona maiyuo lakandelyaminyi Kamongome Mosese lamaiya.
Embame dakepa kenane dake pepa pyapala Isaraele wambu nakama mana lamairi. Dokopa kenane dokome nakama pipya nambana usinisi ingyuo yango palyuo pyasi palira.
Nambame nakama yuu amenge pingi nakamana rakange kyawa dupwa kando mairuŋu lao lalu lao leyo dokona lanyuo paro. Paronopa nakamame nenge nalana suu pyaraminyi dupwa kapa nao mona minyarambu mona nyeramo kararami. Dopa piraminyipape namba mata jepala mee bange anatuŋu lao lakandenge dupwa mona nyuo lakando kararami. Nakamame namba epe kanda nao yaki nyepala nambana mawa pii palenge kamba lao nembarami.
Randa koo malu mee nakama keta epara. Dopa piramopape kenane para pyao nyerami dupwame pyao kararami dakeme nambana usinisi ingyuo koo piyaminyi dupwa lasaka pira. Nambame yuu mairuŋu lao kaeyasi kandale dokona lanyuo papa naronopape epapu nambame dopa pyuo suu pyao karaminyilyamo lao soo karapunu pilyamo, Anutumi Mosese lamaiya.
Yuu gii mendaki dokopako Moseseme kenane doko pyao retapala Isaraele wambu dupwa mana lamaiya.
Mange dokopa dee Anatumi akali Nanena ikinyingi Josua baa lamaiyuo, Paka nao mona porayapala karape. Dopa pyuo embame Isaraele wambu yuu nambame mairuŋu lao kana minyuo lalu lao leyo kande dokona lanyuo pareŋe namba embapa role kararo, leya.
Dokopa Moseseme Anatunya mawa pii dupwa bukunya piya. Pyao dokopa mendaki mendepe isa nemba naya.
Pyao otapala dokopa baame Lipae purisi Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko rapu pyuo karenge akali dupwa lamaiyuo,
Buku Anatunya mawa pii pyasi palenge dake nyepala Kamongo nakamana Anatunya Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote repeta retarami. Dokome banya wambu dupwa kopetame pisaraminyi lao lasaka pyuo serasa pira.
Nakama mona kana pokapala kambako lao parami doko silyu. Namba ene kumapa nalyo dakepa Kamongopa kamba lao karaminyi dokona kumaro dokopa angingyuo suku manjo kamba laramilyamo.
Nakamana rara dupwana akali kyawa iso karaminyi dupwape isingi akali dupwape pii lamairuŋu nambana lenge kambu dokona sukusa sukusa pyuo epena lao nyuo malu palyarami. Nambame yake yuupa dolapo nambana usinisi ingyuo sinya laro.
Kumaparo dokopa wambu dolomame ama koo angingyuo karo nambame nakama pii mana lamaiyuo dupwa kamba lao nembarami doko silyu. Dopa pyuo yuu gii ene eparamo dupwana Kamongome daa lenge dupwa pyuo kararami dokome baa imbwanyi pyambuo randa nyeramilyamo, leya.
Enakana Moseseme kenane pii peparae lamaiyamo dokopa Isaraele wambu peparaeme soo kareyami.
Isa yuu yakepe dolapo pii lalopono dupwa selapa. Kale yukupala nambana pii sokondali pipwape.
Nambana mana pii doko apu dopale ingyuo isa epara. Eparamo dokopa isa yuu dokona pipyae lenge lenge papyuo ipwa ingyuo pete sera. Nambana pii doko apu raa raa pyao ee nyaŋa dupwana epenge dopale ingyara.
Nambame Kamongona kingi doko lakandaro dokopa banya wambu dupwame baame yulu andake pilyamo lao polo larami.
Kamongo baa nakamana kyawa minyuo iso karenge ama porai wakasa. Baame yulu peparae dupwana mende kyai pii nao rolae iki pingi. Nakamana Anatu baa alowa pii nao kinyi angi dokona palyuo karenge. Baame rolae ingyuo karo wambu peparae keta kapa kapa pingi.
Dopa pyuo karapyamopape nakamame baa yaki nyuo kaelyaminyi dokona banya wambu angingyuo kapa kara narami ingilyamo. Nakamame yulu koo pyuo minyako pyuo karaminyi.
Nakama kopyali kyawa sisingi pali nange dupwa dopa pyuo nakamame Kamongo doko rape rape lao kararamisi? Baa nakamana rakange dokome nakama wasiya. Baame nakama rara andake ingyuo wasinyi pyambuya.
Yuu gii kamame yuu wamba epo peyamo dupwana lao suu pyalapape. Dokopa apa piya lao nakamana rakange dupwa piso soo langinya lalapape. Yuu wamba piyamo dupwa akali alemo dupwame langinya lao piso selapape.
Kamongo Ama Ketae karenge dokome wambu rara wakale wakale dupwa yuu kapa paliraminyi dupwa rombo palyuo mokwa soo maiya. Wambu anja palirami lao rombo palyiya. Baame rara mendaki mendaki lao rapu pira lao aŋala mende rombo palyiya.
Dopa piyamopape Jekopena para pyasi wambu dupwa baa rangena ingyara lao rombo palyiya.
Baame nakama yuu muiyane mende see nange penda penda dokona nyepo nyuo pambu lao papyuo kareyaminyipa kando nyiya. Baa range poraiyuo iso karengenyili pyuo konambe ingyuo nakama kako pyao mondo lao rapu piya.
Yaka kambeme yakane bii lena lao mana lamaiyuo banya papake pee letamopa epo petenge doko suu pyao Kamongome Isaraele wambu dupwa isa paa nana lao banya arapu dokona lanyuo papiya.
Yuu liti wakale dupwana mee bangeme wasisi anatu dupwana mendeme nyisa naya. Kamongo baame iki banya wambu dupwa laminyuo peya.
Dopa pipala nakamame yuu kyau singi yuu dupwa isinya leya. Iso karo yuu dupwana ee dupwana nenge andeyamo dupwa nakama neyami. Nakama kana dupwana amburali ipwange lyiyamo kando nyiyami. Dee nakamana isa olipi dupwa kana yuu dupwana mena mena lao andeya.
Nakamana mena bulamakao memepe dupwana anju ipwange endange palyuo kareyamopa kamuo nyiyami. Mena bulamakao sipisipi memepe dupwa kameya rondo lasiko minyiyami. Nenge witi elyapepe dee waene ipwange keyange rae mairamili dupwape nao kareyami.
Kamongona wambu dupwa kamongoyaminyipape nakama mona kana poko kamba leyami. Dopa pyuo nakama mendasape kakasera kando lao nenge pyano sepala ando ama rondo lasi ingyuo kareyami. Nakamana Anatu dokome nakama wasiyamo doko kame soo kaepala dee nakama lete wai pyao nyingi akali porai doko mata maiyami.
Nakamame isa kanapeme wasisi dupwa kando lakandeyami dokome Kamongopa yango palyinyi pyambuyami. Dee yulu koo piyaminyi dokome Kamongo imbwanyi pyambuyami.
Nakamame mee imambu koo anatu angi daa dupwa keta mena pyao kiso maiyuo kareyami. Mee bange lapo Isaraele akali nakamana imbwange kauwangepe dupwa wamba nyuo pyuo warombo soo kara nayami dupwa lakando kareyami.
Nakamame nakamana Anatu dokome nakama lete wai pyao pyuo nyingi porai dokome nakama letena renge maiyamo doko kame siyami.
Kamongome banya ikinyingi wanengepeme dopa pyuo koo piyaminyi doko kandapala imbu singi nyepala nakama mata maiya.
Anatumi lao dokopa, Wambu mona kana poko namba yaki nyuo kaelyaminyi dupwa nambame nakama kamame nyisa naro. Dopa piru dokopa nakama apa pyuo kararamipi lao lenge makande pyuo kando kararole.
Nakamame nakamana isa kanapeme mee bange wasisi anatu dupwame imbu singi nyakayaminyisa mee bange anatu angi daa dupwana yango palyuo karo. Dokona lao wambu rara angingyuo kara nalyaminyi dupwa keta nakama imbu singi nyinyi retaro. Dopako pyuo wambu kopyali minyingi dupwa keta nakama pipya yango palyinyi pyambwaro.
Nambana imbu singi dokome isare kekenge ingyuo boletoko lapala isa yuunya bange peparae rara. Dopa pyuo rao isa yuu koko dono kando nyepala yuu kyau dupwana pingi moko minyuo rara.
Nambame nakama keta randa maiyuo karalu kararo dokopa nakama pipya pimwaiyuo nambana wanga walakape peparaeme minyuo pyaro.
Nakama lopo yanenge isasape dokome kumarami. Nakama anga yakaneme koo mange naramo kumarami. Nambame mena suwape rae lenge dupwape dee kau wambu nenge dupwape nakama keta ralinyi peyaronopa dupwame wambu dupwa pyao narami.
Yanda andake sipurarasa wambu dupwa kata barete dupwana pyasi serami. Anda dupwana yamarangusi sepala kumarami. Dopa piramo dokopa mapwae parangepe dupwa kumarami. Wane nyaŋa dee alemope peparae popo paa nao kumarami.
Wambu mendemepe nakama suu pyao kara narami lao nambame nakama pyao otapuli lao suu piyu.
Dopa lao suu piyunupape namba rangeme pyao minjuku minyinyi nembeyo dokome nakambana yanda pimwai dupwame nambana wambu dupwa pyao isa palyilyamano kae lao nanga kapape lyinya lao panda maiya naro ingilyamo, leya.
Isaraele wambu dupwa kyawa sisingi bolombalo lao mona kuki mendepe pali napyamo karaminyi.
Yanda pimwai dupwame nakama akipamo anamasi minyiyamipi lao soo nyii nalyaminyi. Apa pyuo piyape lao soo gisa nalyaminyi.
Apa pyuo lama ikimi taosande akalisa anamasi minyuo dee mendakimi taosande mende pyao isa palyuo piyape? lao suu pilyaminyi. Renge doko nakamana Kamongo Anatu dokome nakama yaki nyuo kaeyasa piya. Nakamana Anatu Porai dokome nakamana yanda pimwainya kingi rakana palyakamiyasa piya.
Yanda pimwai dupwame nakamana anatuŋu lenge dupwa angi mende daalyamo. Isaraele wambunya Anatu doko ama porai wakasande karamo lao silyaminyi.
Nakamana yanda pimwai dupwa yuu Sotoma Gomorape koo keta paleyami dopale ingyuo pelyaminyi. Nakama girapo isa jingi kau pingi lyingipi dee jingi napala kumungi lyingipi dopale ingyuo pelyaminyi.
Kaumi wambu pinginya ipwange dokome waene wasingi dopale ingyuo pelyaminyi.
Kamongo nakamana yanda pimwaimi dopande pyuo karaminyi lao soo karamo. Baame yuu gii angi pyaka sera mendepa randa mairuŋu lao isaro karamo.
Kamongome koo pirami dupwana bakeme pyuo isingi pyakamira Yuu gii nakama randa narami doko repeta ipyamo pilyamo. Dokopa isa paomene.
Kamongo banya wambu dupwa rale male lapala poraiyapa naramo kararaminyi dokopa koo dupwa neta rekya lanyi nembo nyera. Banya yulu pingi dupwa iki ingyuo saka nao karelyaminyi kandapala dokopa sakame kumuo nyisara.
Dopa pyuo banya wambu dupwa nyisapala dokopa piso soo lao, Nakamana mee bange anatu poraiŋi lao keta pyamalyiyaminyi dupwa anja karamisi? lara.
Nakama mena pyao kisiyaminyi dupwana kapa rukyuo maiyuo ipwa waene nena lao maiyuo piyami dupwame dakepa nyisala epena larami. Dakepa randa dokona nenge rekya lao nyera dokona pyakao epena larami.
Namba doko iki Anatu ingyuo karo. Wakale dupwa Anatu angi mende daa. Nambame pyao kumasepala dee lete renge maingi. Nambame wambu pyao ranjama nyepala dee pyuo nyingi. Nambame pilyunu dupwa mendeme yanda pimwaiyarami ingya nange.
Kinyi kinyi namba Anatu mee karawako karenge dokome kingi minyalyuo lalu lao leto.
Nambana yanda pingi wua gela doko nanga sepala rolae pyuo nambame yanda pimwai pipya koo dupwana yano nyuo dee nambapa epe kanda narami dupwa pipya randa mairu ingilyamo.
Wambunya ranjama dupwa nambana wanga walakape nenge dupwana ropo lao lyuo karara. Nambana wua gela dokome wambu namba yanda pimwaingi dupwa pyao kumakaro. Mendeme nambapa yanda pimwaiyara doko lete karena laa naro. Dopa pyuo ranjama nyuo pyasipi karapusi palengepe dupwa kumarami.
Dokona yuu mure lao Kamongona wambu dupwa lakandarami ingilyamo. Kamongome banya wambu pyao kumakaelyaminyi dupwa isingi pyao randa maira ingilyamo. Dokopa baame banya yanda pimwai dupwa keta yano nyuo banya wambu dupwana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakamyuo pingi, leya.
Isaraele wambu dupwa seramiŋi lao Mosesepa Josua Nanena ikinyingi dokopame kenane dake kamba lao lao piyambi.
Moseseme Anatunya mana pii dupwa wambu lamaiyuo otapala
dokopa baame lao, Nakama epapu mawa pii dapwa peparae langilyu dupwa warombo soo minyuo pyuo karamape lao kandokondali pyuo karalapape. Dopako pyuo nakamana wanenge ikinyingipi dupwame Anatunya mana pii peparae yaki nyii nao rape rape lao minyarami lao nakamame nakama kamba lamaiyuo lamaiyuo pirami.
Mana pii dapwa mee pii yeelyo ingya nalyamo. Pii dupwame nakama palyuo kararami dokopa pingi pyaramo kararami ingilyamo. Dokona pii dupwa warombo soo rape rape lao minyuo karapala nakama ipwa Jotane yalo yuu nyuo palya panya pilyaminyi dokona yuu gii malu palyuo kararami ingilyamo, leya.
Yuu gii mendaki dokopako Kamongome Mosese lamaiyuo,
Yuu taone Jereko kanda kanda Moape wambunya yuu dokona yuu kyau Apirame singi dupwana papala yuu kyau Nipo dokona pulyuo pao karapala nambame Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu Kenane mainya pilyunu doko kandape.
Kandapala dokopa embena yangone Erone yuu kyau Oo dokona karo kumunya dopaleko ingyuo emba yuu kyau dokona karo kumare.
Renge kumarambinya doko nakamba laparaeme Isaraele wambunya lenge kambu dokona namba rape rape lao kara nayambi. Dee nakamba yuu muiyane Sini dokona yuu taone Katese repeta ipwa Merepa mare dokona karo nakambame wambu dupwana lenge kambu dokona namba kando nambana kingi ketae pyambwa nayambi.
Embame yuu angi doko nanesale karo kandare. Dopa pyuo kandarenepape namba Isaraele wambu yuu mairunu dokona emba sukusa paa nare, leya.
Moseseme baa Anatunya pii lamaingi akali dokome yuu gii repeta kumara ingiyamo dokopa Isaraele dupwa elyape keta pisara pii dapwa lamaiya.
Kamongo doko yuu Sainai kyau dokona piso epeya. Epo yuu Itome neta pyakaenge dorena neta potemengenyili pyuo epo dokopa baa yuu kyau Parane piso banya wambu keta neta ranyi pisiya. Aŋala taosande akalisa baa pipya kareyaminyipa banya kingi rolaerena isare uliyapu rao kareya.
Kamongome banya wambu dupwa mona reto kyawa minyingi dokona lao namwa banya kimbu silyamo dorena pangu sepala baame langilyamuli pyuo warombo singi.
Namba Moseseme Mawa Pii langiyu dupwa namwame yaki nyii nalyamano. Namwana yuu liti dakena mawa pii dapwa wakasale ingyuo nyuo retarama ingilyamo.
Isaraele wambu dupwana mupwape dee rara peparaepe nakama mendakinya pyasiyaminyi dokopa Kamongo baa epo nakama Isaraele wambu dupwana kiŋi ingyuo kareya, leya.
Dokopa Moseseme akali Urupenena rara dokona lao lao, Banya rara andake ingya napyamopape kapa pyuo rembe naa nana, leya.
Jutana rara dokona lao lao, Kamongo embame nyisapili lao kee laraminyi doko sepala rara wakale dupwa pipya deyako nyuo pyasapala nakamana yanda pimwai pipya yanda pimwaiyakamiri, leya.
Lipaena rara dokona lao dopa lamaiya. Emba Kamongo dokome kana Urimi Tumimi dolapo keta karo Lipae rara dupwa emba mende pipyali yaka lao suu pingi doko pano lasaka pyakamingi. Embame yuu Masa dokonape dee ipwa Merepa dokonape apa pilyamipi lao kandalana makande pyuo kandee dokopa nakama rolae pyuo yaki nyii nao karaminyi kandee.
Nakamame endangipa rakangepa kandowape dee pemalenge yangongepe kando sakao pyuo kareyaminyipape embena mawa pii dupwa kamame ama porai wakasa minyuo pyuo emba rape rape lao kareyami. Dopa pipala embena mawa pii dupwape kana minyuo lalu lao lenge pii dupwape mondo lao minyuo kareyami.
Dopa pipala embena wambumi Mawa Pii dupwa warombo soo minyinya lao mana lamaiyakarami. Nakamame embena kana pyare dokona mena pyao kiso joo kararami.
Dupwana lao Kamongo embame nakamana rara dupwa porai ingyuo penale lao wai kisakamipala nakamana yulu pyuo pii laraminyi dupwa epe sakamyuo karape. Dopa pyuo dokopa nakamana yanda pimwai dokona mende dee sipura nana lao pyao ruki ruki lanyi nembakamipi, leya.
Benjamenena rara dokona lao dopa leya. Rara dake Kamongome mona retapala kyawa minyuo karapenge. Kwuara yangara piramo yaka lao baame nakama koo keta pali nana lao baa nakama pipya role pyao karenge, leya.
Josepena rara dokona lao dopa leya. Kamongome nakamana yuu doko elyape keta pisinyi pyambuo apunda peyakamyuo dee yuu dokona ipwa guu lamu lae pyuo karakamyuo pinya.
Kamongome yuu dokona neta petenge yuu ingyuo pipwakamipala nenge wambu pyuo poo rakamyuo pinyale. Dopa piramopa panyi apundape kana peparaena enengeme kamonganyi nembo manjo nao karenale.
Nakamana yuu kyau mee sulu singi dupwa pyuo wara piraminyipa nenge keyange dupwame simbwaro karena.
Nakamana yuu doko mena nengepe keyange dupwame mee poro lao keta pyao sinya lao Kamongo baa keta keyange renge palenge yuu isoko dokona isare kekenge ingyuo rao epo Mosese keta pii leyamo dokome dopa pyuo elyape keta pisara. Josepe baame yangonge dupwana kyawa ingyuo kareyamo dokona Josepena rara dupwa keta renge keyange dapwa epena.
Josepe baa bulamakao kalinya porai renge dopale palenge. Dee yulu pingi bulamakao kali okese lenge dokona kyawa kulinya nenge potemo epenge dopale ingyuo nyuo pee pipala karara. Banya kyawa kulinya nenge kyai doko Manasana akali taosandeme poraiyuo karaminyi. Dokona mendeke ingyuo Eporaimena wambu ama malu taosande akalisa (10,000) karaminyi dopale. Manda manjo pao piramopa porai dokome yuu liti wakale dupwana wambu rara dupwa pyao Suu lanyi kipwa kipwasa palyuo karara, leya.
Sepyulane Isakana rara dolapona lao dopa lamaiyuo, Sepyulane ipwa kotana pao bisinase yulu doko pyuo kakana pinya dee Isaka banya bange dupwame banya yuu dokona pyuo andanyi nembara.
Nakamame wambu yuu muu wakale range dupwa nakamana yuu kyau dokona epena lapala bange Kamongome letamuli pyuo pyao kiso maiyuo ipwa kota dokonape kee kama dupwanape bange seramo nyuo kamongarami, leya.
Gatena rara dokona lao dopa lamaiya. Kamongo Anatu nakamana yuu andake ingyanyi nembeyamo dokona kingi doko lakandalapape. Gatena rara dupwame mena laeneme isaro soo ayemba kingipi pyanyi nembalamuli pyuo pyao karenge.
Isaraele mupwa dupwame yuu mokwa siyaminyi dokopa Gatena rara dupwa yuu keyange amenge pingiko nyiyami. Nyiyaminyi yuu doko nakamana akali mupwa dupwa iki kapa nyerami ingiya. Isaraele akali mupwa dupwa malu palyuo kareyaminyi dokopa nakamame Kamongona lowa piipi mawa piipi dupwa warombo siyami, leya.
Danena rara dokona lao dopa lamaiya. Dane mena laene yakane dopale ingyuo yuu Basane karo pyakao neta epenge, leya.
Napatalaina rara dokona lao dopa lamaiya. Napatalaina rara doko Kamongome epe kandapala mena wai kiso nenge andakamyuo kamonganyi nembenge. Nakamana yuu mendaki dokonako pao yuu dulurena piso epo ipwa Galili pete dokona suu lapala dee lama donorele para.
Asana rara dokona lao dopa lamaiya. Asana rara dokona rara doloma nyuo isa palyili lao ee wara pyuo nao mena wai kiso pirasa banya yangonge dupwame baa mona reto epe kando karena. Banya yuu dupwa olipi isa dupwame kamonganyi nembena.
Banya yuu taone dupwana kapa kararami lao ane isa dupwame kambu kii palyinya. Baa keta pundu yandape epa naramo karena, leya.
Isaraele wambu dupwa selapape. Anatu mende nakamana Anatu kamame andake neta renge dokome yake dorena piso oko soo epo dee kopa rakapana dokona piso nakama nyisala epenge kandale dopale mende kara nalyamo.
Anatu baa yuu peparae nakama kyawa minyuo karenge. Banya kingi dolapome nakama paka pyao soo karalu karenge. Nakamame pyao pelyaminyi dokopa baame nakamana yanda pimwai dupwa pyao ralinyi nembakange. Dopa pyakapala nakama langyuo, Pyao kokwa selapape, lao langingi.
Dokopa Jekopena para pyasi dupwa mona seramo piso palyuo pilyaminyi. Yuu dokona pundu yandape mende pisa napyamopa yake dokona piso pipyae kondanyi yuu dokona pisilyamo dokona witi jingipi ipwa waenepe mondo lao andara.
Isaraele wambu nakama raeme kumulyaminyi kande. Kamongome nakama nyiso lete nyipyamo dopale ingyuo yuu liti menge dupwa Kamongome nyisapyamo kara nalyaminyi. Kamongo baa nakamana konambe wua gelape ingyuo baa nenge nyakalyamo. Dopa pipala nakamana yanda pimwai dupwame sakame kumuo karamili lao piso soo epeyami kande dokopa nakama pyao kalya pisi pisi pyuo anamo kararami.
Mosese baa yuu lama yuu Moape dokona singi piso Nipo kyau lao siyamo dokona pao yuu kyau Pisika yuu taone Jereko doko neta pyakaenge dorena siyamo dokona mandarena peya. Pao dokona kareyamo dokopa Anatumi yuu andake doko peparae lasaka piya. Lasaka piyamo doko yuu Giliate wambunya yuu dokona piso lasaka pyuo pao Dane wambunya taone dokona peya.
Yuu lasaka piyamo dupwa Napatalai wambunya yuupi Eporaime wambupi dee Manasa wambupinya yuupi Juta wambunya yuu soo pao neta yalyingi kata dorena piso pao ipwa kota Metitaraniane pete dokonape liti pyuo suu lao lasaka piya.
Juta wambunya yuu donorena pao yuu Jowa dokona piso yuu lama lama soo pao yuu taone Jereko isa malu bona isa yale andenge dokona suu lao lasaka piya.
Dokopa dokona karo Kamongome Mosese baa dopa lamaiya. Wamba nambame Aporakame Aisake Jekopemoo nakamana wai kiso nyeraminyi dupwa mairu lao lao kana minyuo leyono yuu doko dakeŋe. Dokona nambame emba mee kanda lao pilyu. Dopa pipunupape nambame emba dokona puu laa nalapono, leya.
Dokopa Kamongona kendemande Mosese baa Moape wambunya yuu dokona Kamongome dopande piraŋa leyamuli pyuo kumuya.
Dopa piyasa Kamongome Mosese yuu Moape dokona yuu taone Betepiyo lama kanda kanda singi dokona nyuo malu piya. Dopa pyuo malu piyamopape yuu dusape panda dasape malu pisi karamo lao malu piya doko mendemepe kando soo gisa nalyaminyi.
Mosese baa ee kana andete mendaki dee akalisa lama (120) nembo karapala kumuya. Baa lenge nyuope pii nayamo mee kana yale doko karo kumuya.
Isaraele wambu dupwa banya lao yuu gii akalisa rema Moape yuu dokona kumanda ee lao peteyami.
Ee lao piso oteyaminyi dokopa akali Nanena ikinyingi Josua mona palenge renge palyuo pyoko pyoko leya. Renge doko Mosese baame banya panda nyera lao rombo palyuo dokopa leyamuli pyuo piya. Isaraele wambu nakamame Mosese keta Anatunya mawa pii epeyamo dupwa Josuame leyamo dokona rape rape lao minyiyami.
Mosese kumapeyamo mange dokopa enakana Isaraele wambunya poropeta baa yale mende sipuro kara naya. Kamongopa baa angi rolae lenge kambu kando pii lenge.
Kamongome Mosese keta yulu wambumi pii nangepe yulu wambumi kando yamarangungipi Isipi kiŋipi dee dokona isingi akalipi minyanyi palyuo yuu liti doko peparaena piyamo dopale mende poropeta akali mendemepe pii naya.
Moseseme Isaraele wambunya lenge kambu dorena pakanyi pyambuo yamarangunyi sero yulu andake pingi dopale poropeta mendeme kapa pirami ingya nange.
Kamongona kendemande akali Mosese kumapeyamo dokopa enakana Mosesena nyiso yulu pingi akali Nanena ikinyingi Josua doko kando Kamongome pii lamaiya.
Baame lamaiyuo lao, Nambana kendemande akali Mosese doko kumapya dokona epapu rapa rapa pipala embape dee Isaraele wambu peparaepe ipwa Jotane doko yalo pao yuu nambame nakama mailyunu dokona sukusa pali pupwape.
Mosese lamaiyunuli pyuo nakama kimbu kimbu kalyuo eparami yuu peparae embape nambana wambu dupwanape lao retakayo, leya.
Nakamana yuu liti make doko yuu muiyane dokona pisipala pao yuu Lepanone kyau dupwana suu lara. Dee ipwa andake Yuporisa lenge dokona piso pao Itai wambunya yuu peparaena piso pao neta anda pao yalyingi dorename ipwa kota pete andake Metitaraniane lenge dokona pao nakamana lili ingyara.
Josua emba lete kararene yuu gii dusipana mendemepe emba nyuo isa palyuo wini pira ingya nalyamo. Namba Mosese keta pyakamyuo kareyonoli pyuo emba keta dopako pyakao kararo. Dee yuu peparae namba emba role karo emba yaki nyuo kaeyaronde daa.
Embame mona kumapala yulu dokona pilyuŋu lao suu pyao kandokondali pyuo poraiyuo pepe. Dokona lao nambame nakamana rora ambasu dupwa keta yuu mairu lao lalu lao leyono dokona nakama palyuo kararaminyi dokopa emba wambu dapwana mupwa ingyuo iso karare.
Dokona kando mona kumapala porai ingyuo karo nambana kendemande akali Moseseme Mawa Pii emba jiya dusipa peparae warombo soo minyuo pyuo karape. Mawa Pii peparae dupwana mende yaki nyii napipi. Dopa pyuo karo dokopa kata peparae papirinyi dupwana kapa ingyara.
Embame Mawa Pii buku doko kambunya lao lao pyuo karape. Yuu peparae kukwa korakama lao mana nyepala pii dokona pyasi palamo dusipa peparae suu pyanyi pyano piso dokopa warombo sepe. Dokopa emba au pyuo keyange ingyuo elyape keta pare.
Nambame emba kando, Mona kumapala porai ingyuo yulu dokona kandokondali pyuo karape lao mana langiyu kande. Dokona lao namba embena Kamongo Anatu emba anja panda parene dupwana role pyapeta paramba dokona paka nao mona nemba nao poraiyuo karape, lao Kamongome leya.
Dokopa Josuame akali mupwa dupwame wambu palyuo petaminyi yuu dokona papyuo pii lamainya lao lamaiyuo,
Yuu gii rema paparamopa ipwa Jotane doko yalo nakamana Kamongo Anatu dokome yuu jipyamo dokona karala paramaŋa dokona nenge lapo rapa rapa pinya lena leya.
Josuame akali Urupene rarape Gatena rarape dee akali Manasana rara pingyasi pakipi lamaiyuo lao,
Kamongona kendemande akali Mosese dokome nakama langiya kande. Doko nakamana Kamongo Anatu dokome ipwa Jotane epenge yuu neta pyakalyingi dorena nakama rangena ingyara lao jeraŋa, leya.
Nakamana enda wanepe dee mena bulamakaope dupwa dae kararaminyipa nakamana yanda singi dupwa yanda pingi bange dupwa minyuo nakamana Isaraele yango dupwa enakao epena lapala nakama nyiso wambo parami. Pao nakamana Kamongo Anatu dokome ipwa Jotane epenge yuu neta anda pao yalyingi dorena maipyamo dokona kapa pao kararami doko kandapala kaeyarami. Kapa kareyami kande doko kandapala Isaraele rara dupwa peparae nakama kapu kyuo epo ipa Jotane neta epenge yuu dorename akali Moseseme nakamba yuu rangena lao jiyamo dokona palyuo kararami, leya.
<range>
Leyamo dokopa nakamame Josua isingi lamaiyuo lao, Embame pii peparae namwa langilinyili pyuo pirama dee embame anja pupwa larenele pyuo parama.
Namwame yuu peparae Mosesena pii warombo singi dokoko suu pyao embena pii warombo serama. Dokona embena Kamongo Anatu Mosese role karenge dokoko suu pyao emba keta role pyao karena.
Namwana wambu dupwana mendeme embena yulu dupwana pisalya pisana pyuo dee embena pii larene dupwana lapo kamba lao pirami dupwa pyao kumakarama. Dokona mona kumapala porai ingyuo yulu doko kandokondali pyuo pyuo karape, leyami.
Dokopa Josuame akali lama yuu Akasia wambu palyuo paleyaminyi dokona yaki nyuo yuu Kenane doko yalu pyuo kandala pena leya. Yuu Kenane doko kando nyepala yuu taone andake mende Jereko lenge doko angingyuo poraiyuo kandena leya. Nakamba yuu Jereko dokona epo yuu gii kukwa dokopa enda pamuku mende kingi Oreapa lenge dokona anda pali peyambi.
Kukwa dokopa Isaraele akali lapome yuu doko yalu pyuo kandala imi leyaminyipa Jereko kiŋi dokome siya.
Sepala dokona lao baame Oreapa keta pii nembapala lao, Akali embena anda petambinyi dolapome yuu dake peparae yalu pyuo kandala imbi. Dokona nakamba kamanda lanyuo ipupi, leya.
Leyamo dokopa enda dokome isingi lao, Kinyi akali lapo nambana anda iminyipape nakamba anja range lao namba see nalyo. Doko nakamba neta anda pupyamopa yuu taone kambu kii doko palyapa naminyipa nambana anda yaki nyuo pumbi. Doko anja pelyambinyi lao piso see napu. Embame pumbinyi dokona waiya lao moko minyuo pare ramo doko kapa kando nyere, leya. (Enda Oreapame akali dolapo anda ketae dorena lanyuo papala puu yaki dopale reteya dokona minyalyapala yalu pyuo koko petena leya.)
<range>
<range>
Dokopa kiŋinya akali lapo yuu taone doko yaki nyuo papeyami dokopa kambu kii doko paleya. Nakama Isaraele akali lama yalu pyuo yuu waa kandala epeyambi dolapo koto pao ama nanesa wakasa kata ipwa Jotane yalo penge dokona peyami.
Yuu gii kukwa dokopa akali dolapo luu palipa nayambinyipa enda Oreapa doko anda ketae dokona peya.
Papala nakamba lamaiyuo lao, Kamongo dokome yuu dake nakamba jipyamo doko namba silyu. Doko yuu dakena range wambu peparae dupwa nakamba kando pakalyaminyi.
Nakama yuu Isipi yaki nyuo epeyaminyipa Kamongo dokome ipwa Kota Kone lenge doko soko rali piyamopa nakama dokona kata siyamo epeyami doko namwa siyama. Dee ipwa Jotane epenge yuu neta pyakalyingi dorena Amote akali kiŋi lama kingi Sayone dee Oke lenge dolapo pyao kumakayami doko namwa siyamako.
Namwa doko siyama dokopa aopa pakayama. Nakama ama porai ingilyaminyi leyami doko sepala namwana porai renge doko isa puu pao peya. Nakamana Kamongo Anatu doko yake panda ketae dokona baako karenge dee isa yuu pandape peparaena baako karenge.
Epapu banya kingi lao, nambame nakamba anjiki pyuo rapu pilyu doko suu pyao nakambame nambana ree palu dupwa anjiki pyuo rapu pyakaramba lao lalu lao lalapape. Dee nambame nakamba kinyi angiŋi lao suu pyaroleŋe yulu mende pyuo lasaka pipwape.
Pipala nambana anyipi rakanepe kakingipi pemalengepe dee dupwana ree palu peparaepe kyawa lete nyakaramaŋa lao namba kando lalu lao lalapape. Dee namwa pyao kumakana lao kyawa yaki nyii nalapape, leya.
Leyamo dokopa akali dolapome enda doko lamaiyuo lao, Namwa letamanuli pyuo pii narama ramo doko namwana Anatu dokome namwa pyao kumakana. Nambwa yulu pimbwano doko embame mendali lamai nare ramo doko Kamongome yuu dake namwa jeramo dokopa emba poraiyuo rapu pyuo kararama lao lalu lao letambano, leyambi.
Enda Oreapa banya anda doko pyuo pao yuu taone dokona kana kame dokona suu lasindena palenge. Dokome akali dolapo puu karapala windowa kata dokona isa pena lao malyiya.
Dopa pipala enda dokome nakamba lamaiyuo, Kiŋi dokona akali dupwame koto kando nyisarimiŋi yuu kyau pingi dulunya papala yuu gii rema yalu pyuo karalapape. Kararaminyipa akali dusipa anda kapu kyuo eparaminyipa nakamba range kata nyuo parambi, leya.
Dokopa akali dolapome enda doko kando lao, Nambwame emba kando pii lalu lao lenge doko minyuo kararamba, leyambi.
Dokona embame dopa pepe. Namwame embena yuu dakena sukusa epo pyao nyela epeyama kande dokopa puu kone dokome windowa kata nambwa pupwa lao nembelene dokona puu pyanyi palyape. Palyapala embena endakinyi rakanepe dee embena kakingi pemalengepe dee embena rakanena ree palu wambu dupwape malu palyuo embena anda dokona petena lare.
Doko kaepala mendali anda doko yaki nyuo nyisa kama epo paramo dokopa pyao kumarami ramo doko baa rangena yulu. Dokona namwana yulu mende daa. Dopa piraminyipape mendali embena anda dokona pisipala randa nyera ramo doko namwana yulu.
Dopa piramopape embame nambwa yalu pyuo epo pelyambano doko wambu dupwa lamairi ramo doko nambwame emba keta lalu lao letambano pii doko minyaro kararamba ingya nara, leyambi.
Dokopa enda baame kapa lapala nakamba pena leya. Dopa pipala enda dokome puu kone doko windowa dokona puu pyanyi palyiya.
Dokopa akali yalu pyuo yuu waa kandala epeyambi dolapo yuu kyau dokona papala yalu piyambi. Dokopa kiŋi dokona akali dupwame yuu wangu dupwana yuu gii rema nakama koteyami. Koteyaminyipape koto kando nyii napala nakama kapu kyuo Jereko epeyami.
Dokopa enakana akali lama dolapo yuu kyau dokona lupyuo epo ipwa yalapala kapu kyuo epo Josua peteyamo dokona peyambi. Papala yulu peparae piyamo dupwa baa lamaiyambi.
Lamaipala dee lao, Kamongo dokome yuu doko peparae namwa jipyamo doko nambwa silyambano. Doko wambu yuu dokona palaminyi dupwa peparaeme namwa kando pakalyaminyi, leyambi.
Yuu gii yangama dokopa Josuamoo dee Isaraele wambu peparaepe wamba sipurapala Akasia dokona palyuo paleyaminyi doko yaki nyepala ipwa Jotane maresa peyami. Papala ipwa Jotane yalo parama lao komau anda pipala isaro kareyami.
Yuu gii rema papeyamopa akali mupwa dupwame wambu paleyaminyi dupwana papyuo dopa lamaiyami.
Purisi dupwame nakamana Kamongo Anatu dokona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko soo wambao paraminyi kandapala dokopa nakamana pinji pyapala komau anda dupwa lalyuo nyepala moko minyuo pupwape.
Nakama wambape dae kamame epa nange kandale dokona purisi dupwame nakama kata lasaka pyuo parami. Dopa piraminyipape Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko soo parami dokona repeta paa nalapape. Mee mende donosale kilomita mendaki dopale ingyuo matarena pupwape, leya.
Dokopa Josuame wambu dupwa dopa lamaiyuo, Rakya Kamongo dokome wambumi yulu pii nange lapo nakama keta piraŋa dokona nakama rapa rapa pyuo poo pyasi ingyuo karalapape, leya.
Lapala baame purisi dupwa lamaiyuo, Wambu dupwa enakana epenaleŋe nakama Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote soo wambo pena leya. Leyamo dokopa nakamame baa leyamuli pyuo peyami.
Dokopa Kamongo dokome Josua lamaiyuo lao, Epapu nambame mende pirunu dokome Isaraele wambu dupwame kando emba akali andakeŋe lao yako lao ketae pyambuo kararami. Dee namba Mosese role kareyo doko suu pyao embapa karambinyi lao soo gisarami.
Dee purisi akali Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote soo parami dupwa lamaiyuo, Nakama ipwa doko kando nyepala dokopa ipwa dokona papala ipwa kee kama repeta pao karena lape, leya.
Dokopa Josuame wambu dupwa lamaiyuo, Dae epapala nakamana Kamongo Anatumi pii mende langira doko selapape.
Nakama parami dokopa baame Kenane wambupi Iti wambupi Ipi wambupi Perasi wambupi Gukasi wambupi Amote wambupi dee Jepusi wambupi dupwa pyao ralinyi nembara.
Kamongo yuu muu peparaena iso karenge dokona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote ipwa Jotane yalo wambo soo peyami kande dokopa Kamongo lete karalu karenge doko nakama pipya karapyalyamo lao soo gisarami.
Dokona epapu Isaraele rara akalisa ipisu lama dusipana akali mendaki mendaki lao rombo palyuo nyelapape.
Purisi akali dupwame Kamongo yuu muu peparaena iso karenge dokona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko soo pao ipwa dokona kimbu kararaminyi dokopa ipwa Jotane doko epa nara. Epa naramopa ipwa doko yuu kyau dopale ingyaro karara, leya.
Nenge nenge mandenge yuu gii dokopandeme ipwa doko wakasa paleya. Dokopa wambu dupwa komau anda pyuo paleyami yuu doko yaki nyepala ipwa doko keno pena peyami. Peyaminyi dokopa purisi dupwa Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko nyepala soo wambo peyami. Dokopa purisi dupwame ipwa dokona moko palyeteyaminyi dokopa ipwa doko soko rali piya.
<range>
Dulurename yuu nanesa yuu Atae lenge yuu Saretane repeta singi dokona ipwa doko yuu kyau dopale ingyaro kareya. Dee ipwa lano pao Ipwa Kumungi dokona penge doko soko rali piyamosa wambu dupwa awa pyuo yalo yuu angi Jereko dokona repeta parami ingiya.
Wambu dupwa peparae yuu oo lasi dokona pao kareyaminyipa purisi dupwame Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko ipwa Jotane dokona sukusa mee yuu oo lasi ingyuo siyamopa sakaro kareyami. Karapala wambu peparae wangu dumarena pao oteyaminyipa purisi dupwa kaeyami.
Wambu rara peparae Jotane yalo papeyami dokopa Kamongo dokome Josua lamaiyuo,
Rara akalisa ipisu lama dupwana akali mendaki mendaki lao rombo palyuo nyepe.
Nyepala purisi dupwa ipwa Jotane anda suku dokona kareyaminyi panda dokona rolae kana akalisa ipisu lama nyinya lamaipi. Lamaipala kana dupwa nakama nyepala soo epapala nakama rengya kukwa komau anda pyuo palirami dokona isa retena lao lamaipi, leya.
Dokopa akali akalisa ipisu lama Josuame rombo palyiyamo dusipa kee leya. Lapala lao,
Nakamana Kamongo Anatunya Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote soo paraminyi dokona nakama wambo pao Jotane sukusa pupwape. Papala nakama kana mendaki mendaki lao nyepala langena soo ipupwape. Eparaminyi dokopa Isaraele rara peparaena kana mendaki mendaki lao ingyara.
Wambu dupwame kana dusipa kandapa pirami dokopa Kamongo dokome yulu pipyamo doko suu pyapa pirami. Dokona rakyame nakamana wane wanake dupwame kana dupwana lao aki renge palamo lao piso serami.
Piso seraminyi dokopa embame nakama lamaiyuo, Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko ipwa dokona yalo minyuo peyama dokopa ipwa Jotane doko soko rali piya, lare. Dokona Isaraele wambu dupwame kana dusipa kandapala yuu dakena dopande piyaŋa lao suu pyao kararami, leya.
Akali dupwame Josuame leyamuli pyuo piyami. Kamongome Josua lamaiyamuli pyuo kana akalisa ipisu lama (12) ipwa Jotane dokona sukusa nyiyami. Isaraele rara peparaena suu pyao kana mendaki mendaki lao nyepala soo pao komau anda pyuo paleyami yuu dokona isa reteyami.
Purisi dupwame Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko soo pao ipwa Jotane sukusa kareyaminyi panda dokona Josuame kana akalisa ipisu lama (12) kamameko nyepala isa reteya. (Kana dusipa dakepa mee dokona silyamo.)
Kamongo dokome Josua wambu pinya lena leyamo yulu dupwa pilyamipi lao purisi dupwa ipwa Jotane suku dokona mee isaro kareyami. Doko Moseseme leyamuli pyuo piyami. Dokopa wambu dupwa waiya lao ipwa doko yalo peyami.
Wambu dupwa peparae ipwa dumarena peyami dokopa purisi akali Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote siyami dupwa soo wambo peyaminyipa wambu dupwa enakana peyami.
Dokopa akali Urupene rarape Gatena rarape dee akali Manasana rara pingyasipi dupwa Moseseme pinya lao lamaiyamuli pyuo yanda pinya rapa rapa pyuo wambo peyami. Wambu menge dupwa enakana peyami.
Peyaminyi dokopa Kamongona lenge kambu dokona akali taosande akalisa kisima (40,000) yanda pinya rapa rapa pyuo yuu pau lama lama Jereko repeta singi dokona yalo peyami.
Yuu gii dokopa Kamongome yulu piyamo doko Isaraele wambu dupwame kandapala Josua baa akali kamame andake lao soo nyiyami. Nakamame Mosese yako lao banya kingi ketae pyambuo karenge doko suu pyao banya yuu gii kareyamo dusipana nakamame Josua yako lao banya kingi ketae pyambuo kareyami.
Dokopa Kamongome Josua lamaiyuo, Purisi dupwame Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko ipwa Jotane sukusa yaki nyuo soo nyisa epena lena leya.
<range>
Leyamo dokopa Josuame leyamuli pyuo piyami.
Dokopa purisi dupwa ipwa kee dokona epo kando nyepeyami dokopa ipwa doko yuu mendaki aopa epo papala dee paleyamuli pyuo paleya.
Wambu dupwa kana mupwa dokona pao yuu gii akalisa dokopa ipwa Jotane doko yalo peyami. Papala yuu Jereko neta epenge dorena yuu Gilikale lenge dokona komau anda piyami.
Dokona kana akalisa ipisu lama ipwa Jotane dokona nyiyami dusipa apu rao pisiya.
Baame Isaraele wambu dupwa lamaiyuo, Rakyame nakamana wane wanake dupwame kana dupwana aki renge palase lao piso siyami kande dokopa
ipwa Jotane doko soko rali piyamopa mee yuu oo lasi siyamo dokona Isaraele wambu dupwa kata poko pyao peyaminyi dokona lao lamainya leya.
Nakama lamaiyuo, Nakamana Kamongo Anatu dokome ipwa kota Kone lenge doko soko rali piyamo doko suu pyaoko dee ipwa Jotane doko dopako piyamo dokopa yalo epeyama.
Renge dokona lao isa yuu dakena wambu peparaeme Kamongona porainya renge doko andake wakasaŋa lao soo gisarami. Dee nakamame nakamana Kamongo Anatu doko lakando kingi ketae pyambuo karalu kararami ingilyamo, leya.
Isaraele wambu dupwa ipwa Jotane dokona sukusa kata pena lao ipwa Jotane doko Kamongome soko rali pipya leyami doko yuu Amote wambunya kiŋi ipwa Jotane neta yalyingi dorena karenge peparaepe dee Kenane wambunya kiŋi dupwa peparaeme ipwa kota Metitaraniane lenge kipwa kipwa dokona palenge dupwapeme siyami. Dokona lao Isaraele wambu epelyaminyi lao suu pyao nakama pakapala nakamana porainya renge doko isa peya.
Dokopa Kamongo dokome Josua lamaiyuo, Kana nenge karenge wakasa lapome wua kema lapo ingyuo wasapala dupwame Isaraele akali dupwa yanenge kalomakaminya leya.
Dokona lao Josuame wua kema lapo wasapala yuu kyau kingi Yanenge Kalomenge lenge dokona nakamana yanenge kalomakamiya.
Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu Isipi yaki nyepala epeyaminyi dokopa wanepe akalipi peparae yanenge kalomo otasi kareyami.
Dopa piyamopape nakama yuu muiyane dokona ee kana akalisa kisima kata pao kareyami dokopa wane dupwa mandeyaminyi dupwa nakamana yanenge kalomakami nayami. Dopa piyamo dokopa Isipi yaki nyuo epeyaminyi
akali kapa yanda piramili dupwame Kamongo kando kamba lao kareyamisa yuu muiyane kata papeyaminyipa peparae kumuo oteyami. Baame akali kumuyaminyi dupwa lamaiyuo, Yuu amenge pingi ee nengepe ando kamonganyi nembenge doko nakama jeroŋo lao nakamana rora ambasu dupwa pipya lalu lao lao lamaiyunu nakama doko kapa kanda narami lao lalu lao leyamuli pyuo piya.
Dokopa nakamana ikinyingi nakamana panda nyiyami dupwa yuu muiyane dokona pao karo yanenge kaloma nayami. Dokona lao Josuame nakamana yanenge kalomakamiya.
Yanenge kalomenge yulu doko otapeyamo dokopa rete dupwa umbwa pilyape lao rara peparae nakamana komau anda pipala paleyami dupwana peteyami.
Dokopa Kamongo dokome Josua kando lao, Nakama Isipi wambunya kendemande ingyuo yulu pyakamyuo kareyamisa elyange renge nyiyami doko epapu nambame nyisa nembakapu. Renge dokona yuu doko kingi Gilikale lenge. Kingi Gilikale lenge doko bange nyisa nembenge dopale.
Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu Gilikale yuu anda lama lama dokona yuu Jereko repeta singi komau anda pyuo palyuo kareyami. Dokopa nakamame kana dokonako yuu gii akalisa ipisu kisima dokona kukwa Nenge Pasopa neyami.
Yuu gii dokopa yangama yuu Kenane dokona nenge andenge lapo kanda soo neyami. Doko witi kisasipi dee nenge borete isi pyambwa nao wasisipi neyami.
Dokopa nenge myana lenge Isaraele wambu dupwa mee maipa piyamo doko Anatumi dee kamba maiya naya. Dokopa nenge yuu Kenane dokona andeyamo dupwa nao palyuo karo piyami.
Josua baa yuu Jereko dokona repeta karo baame akali mende banya lenge kambu siyamo dorena wua gela minyaro kareyamo doko kandeya. Kandapala dokopa akali baa kareyamo dokona papala dopa lao piso soo, Emba namwana yanda singi dokona mendepe panda namwana yanda pimwaisi? leya.
Leyamo dokopa akali dokome isingi lao, Namba embena yanda singi daa. Dee namba embena yanda pimwai daa. Kamongona ami dokona namba mupwa ingyuo karenge, leya. Leyamo dokopa Josua baa yuu dokona pangu sepala akali dokona kingi ketae pyambuo lakando lao, Namba embena kendemande yulu pyakange akali. Embame namba apa pyakapili lao suu pilisi? leya.
Leyamo dokopa Kamongona ami dokona mupwa ingyuo karenge dokome Josua kando lamaiyuo, Embena kimbu suu doko nyisa nyepe. Renge dokona lao yuu emba karene doko kamame poo pyasi wakasa, leya. Dopa pinya lao Josua lamaiyamuli pyuo piya.
Isaraele wambu dupwa repeta epeyamisa yuu Jereko dokona kana kame kambu dupwa upi lapala Isaraele dupwa epasaramiŋi lao poraiyuo kando kareyami. Dopa pipala mendali baa yuu taone doko yaki nyuo kama paa nana lao dee mendali kama karo andakare epa nana lao piyami.
Dokopa Kamongo dokome Josua lamaiyuo, Nambame yuu Jerekope dokona kiŋipi yanda singi porai karaminyi dupwape emba keta retelyo.
Dokona yuu gii pakinyamange dusipana yuu peparae yuu mendaki larapu embape embena yanda singi dupwape pipya yuu taone andake doko awali lao maki maki pyuo kimbu pyao piso kata parami.
Purisi akali yanda ipingi wakale wakale bikuli dusipa minyuo nakama Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko soo parami dokona wambo pena. Yuu gii yanda ipingi dokopa purisi dupwame bikuli poo laraminyi dokopa embape embena yanda singi dupwa pipya yuu yanda ipingi nyepo taone andake dokona awali lao maki maki pyuo kimbu pyao piso kata parami.
Dokopa nakamame bikuli pii mende imambu see nao poo londe mende larami. Doko emba aopa sepala dokopa wambu peparaeme pii ketae palyuo laraminyipa yuu taone andake dokona kana kame awali lao karenge doko lalyuo bolombalo lao isa para. Dokopa ami yanda singi peparae yuu taone andake dokona sukusa rolae parami, Kamongome leya.
Leyamo dokopa Josuame purisi dusipa kee lao dopa leya. Nakamame Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko nyelapape. Nyepala akali yanda ipingi nyepo dusipame bikuli minyuo wambo pupwape.
Lapala dokopa baame akali dupwa lamaiyuo, Yuu taone andake dokona awali lao kanda soo maki maki pyuo kimbu pyao piso pena leya. Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote soo parami dokona yanda singi lapo wambo iso pena leya.
Dokopa nakamame Josua lamaiyamuli pyuo piyami. Yanda singi lapo kamame wambo peyami. Peyaminyi dokopa purisi akali yanda ipingi nyepo dusipame bikuli poo lao peyami.
Dokopa dee purisi akali wakale lapome Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko soo peyami. Kamame enakana yanda singi lapoko peyami. Dopa pyuo peyaminyi dokopa bikuli poo lao peyami.
Dopa piyaminyipape Josuame banya akali dupwa lamaiyuo, Pii poraiyuo laa nana dee isa isa pii kuki mendepe laa nana ama daa, leya. Nambame langirunu dokopa nakamame kapa larami, leya.
Dokona lao baame purisi dupwa lamaiyuo, Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko nyepala soo yuu mendaki yuu taone andake dokona awali lena leya. Leyamo dokopa nakama dopa pipala komau anda pyuo paleyami dokona dee kamba kapu kyuo epapala kukwa dokopa paleyami.
Yuu gii dokopa yangama wamba kukwa Josua baa sipureyamo dokopa yuu lapo ingyuo banya yanda singi lapo yuu taone doko awali lao wambo peyaminyi dokopa purisi akali yanda ipingi nyepo dusipame enakana bikuli poo lao peyami. Peyaminyi dokopa dee purisi akali wakale lapome Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko soo peyami. Kamame enakana yanda singi lapo peyami. Dopa pyuo peyaminyi dokopa bikuli poo lao peyami.
<range>
Yuu gii lapo dokona nakama yuu taone andake dokona kamba yuu mendaki awali lao maki maki pyuo kimbu pyao piso papala nakama kapu kyuo komau anda paleyami yuu dokona dee epeyami. Nakama yuu gii pakinyamange nembo mee dopako pyuo kareyami.
Yuu gii yanda ipingi dokopa nakama yango rali piyamo sipuro papala wambo piyami dopaleko ingyuo yuu taone andake doko awali lao yuu yanda ipingiko maki maki pyuo kimbu pyao piso kata peyami. Yuu gii doko iki yuu yanda ipingi dopa piyami.
Yuu yanda ipingi awali leyami dokopa purisi dupwame bikuli pii repeta lalana piyami. Dokopa Josua banya akali dupwa pii poraiyuo lena leya. Lapala baame lao, Kamongo dokome yuu taone andake doko nakama jipya, leya.
Yuu taone andake dokope bange peparae singi dupwape yaka lao pyao kokwa soo nembarami. Dopa pyuo nakamame Anatu bange maingi doko suu pyao pirami. Dopa pipala namwana akali lama yuu dake waa kandala epeyambinyi dokopa pamuku enda Oreapa nakamba yalu pyuo pisiyamo doko dee banya ree palu dokope yaki nyuo kaeyarami.
Dopa pipalape bange pyao kokwa soo nembaraminyi dupwana mende nyii nalapape. Doko daaŋa lapala nyerami ramo doko Isaraele wambu dupwa koo keta pao randa andake nyerami.
Bange peparae kana kulingipi kana golope kone kanape anepe dusipame wasisi dupwa peparae Kamongona lao liti pyuo retarami. Kamongona kana retenge dokona retarami.
Dokona lao purisi dupwame bikuli poo leyami dokopa akali dupwame aopa sepala nakama pii poraiyuo kaeyo leyaminyipa kana kame awali lao paleyamo doko lalyuo bolombalo lao isa peya. Dokopa yanda singi dupwa yuu kyau dokona pulyuo papala yuu taone andake dokona sukusa rolae pao yuu doko nyiyami.
Nyepala nakamana wua gela dupwame yuu dokona wambu peparae peteyami dupwa piyami. Enda akalipi endemo alemope dee mapwae parangepe dupwa pyao kumakayami. Nakamame mena sipisipi mena dongepe mena bulamakaope dupwa peparae pyao kumakayami.
Dokopa Josuame akali lama yuu yalu pyuo waa kandala peyambinyi dolapo lamaiyuo, Nakambame baa kando lalu lao lao lamaiyambinyili pyuo enda pamuku dokona anda papala baape banya ree palu dupwape nyuo minyuo nyisa ipupwape, leya.
Dokopa nakamba papala enda Oreapa banya endangi rakangepa dee banya pemalenge dupwape dee banya ree palu dupwa pipya nyuo minyuo nyisa epeyambi. Nakamba wambu ree palupi dee kendemande wambupi dupwa peparae lete kararami lao Isaraele wambu komau anda pyuo paleyami dokona repeta minyuo epo pisiyami.
Dokopa enakana nakama yuu taone andake doko isare palyiyamisa rao yuu minyiya. Dokona bange siyamo dupwa role pyapeta reya. Reyamopape bange kana golope kana kulingipi kone kanape anepe dusipame wasingi dupwa nakamame nyepala Kamongona kana retenge dokona reteyami.
Dopa piyamopape Josuame akali lama yalu pyuo yuu Jereko doko waa kandala pena leyamo dokopa pamuku enda Oreapa dokome nyuo yalu pyuo pisiyamo dokona Josuame baape banya ree palu dupwape lete wai pyao nyiya. Banya para pyasi dupwa yuu Isaraele dokona karo yuu gii dakepa palu karaminyi.
Yuu gii dokopa Josuame repe repe pii lamaikondali pyuo lao, Wambu mendeme yuu taone Jereko dake kamba pira ramo doko Kamongome baa koo keta pisara. Dokona lao mendeme anda dokona pinya suu pyao kana susa retaramo dokona ikinyingi mupwa doko kumara. Dee mendeme kana kame kambu dupwa wasera ramo dokona ikinyingi enakana mandenge doko kumara.
Dokona lao Kamongo doko Josuapa role pyao kareyambisa banya kingi doko yuu muu dupwana raeyo soo kapa kapa piyami.
























































































Josuame yuu taone Jereko pyao kokwa soo dee yuu dokona kiŋi pyao kokwa soo piya. Dopa pipala yuu Eyai dokona dopako pyuo piyamo doko leyaminyi Jerusaleme range kiŋi banya kingi Atoniseteke lenge dokome siya. Sepala Gipione wambu dupwame mona siyamopa Isaraele wambu dupwa pipya manda rao peteyami doko leyaminyi siyako.
Dokona lao Jerusaleme wambu dupwa ama pakayami. Renge dokona lao yuu taone wakale wakale kiŋi iso kareyaminyi dupwa yuu Gipione doko andake dopale. Yuu Eyai doko mee taone kuki iki. Dee yuu Gipione range yanda singi dupwame yanda poraiyuo pingi.
Dokona lao akali Atonisetekeme pii nembo akali Oyame yuu Eperonena kiŋi dokope akali Pirame yuu Jamurana kiŋi dokope akali Japia yuu Lakisinya kiŋi dokope dee akali Depa yuu Ekelonena kiŋi dokope dopa lamaiya.
Gipione range wambu dupwame Josuamoo Isaraele wambu dupwa pipya mona sipyamopa puu minyuo pisiminyi dokona nakama dae epapala nambamoo pipya Gipione range wambu dupwa yanda pyuo pyamanale, leya.
Amote kiŋi kingi paki dusipame Jerusaleme range kiŋi dokope Eperone range kiŋi dokope Jamura range kiŋi dokope Lakisi dee Ekelone range kiŋi dolapope nakamana yanda singi dupwa peparae nyuo malu palyuo yuu Gipione doko awali lao karo yanda piyami.
Dokopa Gipione range dupwame Josua yuu Gilikale paleyamo dokona pii wai nembo leyami. Embame namwa yaki nyii napipi. Emba waiya lao aopa epo namwa nyiso lete wai pyao nyelase. Amote kiŋi yuu kyau dupwana palenge dupwa peparaeme malu palyapala namwa pyala epelyaminyi, leyami.
Leyaminyi doko sepala Josua banya yanda singi peparae dupwa pipya yuu Gilikale yaki nyepala nyisala peyami.
Peyaminyi dokopa Kamongome Josua lamaiyuo, Ama paka napipi. Wambu dupwana mendeme emba pyao isa palya narami. Nambana porainya renge dokome embame wambu dupwa nyuo anamasi minyare, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Josua dee banya yanda singi dupwape kukwa yuu Gilikale dokona karo yuu Gipione peyami. Papala Amote wambu dupwa rapa rapa pii nayaminyipa nakamame wambu dupwa walu lao piyami.
Amote wambu dupwame Isaraele yanda singi dupwa epeyaminyi kandeyaminyi dokopa Kamongome nakama pakanyi pyambuya. Pyambuyamo dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwame Amote wambu yuu Gipione dokona pyapala yuu Beterome kyau kata kuki mendena pyao lano ralinyi nembeyami. Ralinyi nembo pao yuu Aseka dee Maketa yuu donorena singi dokona pyambuyami.
Isaraele wambu dupwame peteta peyaminyi dokopa Amote wambu dupwa lano makando peyaminyipa Kamongome yake dokona piso randake kapa isa peyapala wambu malumee pyao kumakaya. Isaraele wambu dupwame wambu pyao kumakayaminyipape randake kapame kamame wakasa pyao kumakaya.
Kamongo dokome Isaraele akali dupwa nyisiyamopa Amote akali dupwa pyao wini piyami. Yuu gii dokopa Josuame Kamongo pii lamaiya. Baame Isaraele wambunya lenge kambu dokona dopa leya. Neta, yuu Gipione kanda kanda dokona mee rao kara. Kana, yuu Ainjalone rapu dorena kanda kanda mee rao kara.
Isaraele wambu dupwame ene wini pinya piyaminyi dokopa neta kanape dolapo mee romo pii nao rao karalu kareyambi. Dopa piyamo dokopa yake suku dokona neta mee rao karalu kareya. Dopa piyamo dokopa yuu yangama piso pao yuu kukwa opetaeko rao karalu kareya. Dopa piyaŋa lao Akali Rolae Pingi Dupwana Buku dokona pyasi palamo.
Yuu wamba kanda soo dokopa piso pao epapupi yulu dopale pyuo Kamongome mee akalinya pii mendepe warombo see nange. Isaraele wambu dupwame yanda pyuo kareyaminyipa Kamongome nakama poraiyuo nyiso kareyamo piyami.
Enakana dokopa Josuamoo banya yanda singi dupwa pipya nakama paleyaminyi yuu Gilikale dokona dee kapu kyuo peyami.













































































































































































































































































































































































































Josuame Isaraele rara dupwa peparae kyakale lao nyuo yuu Sikeme dokona malu palyiya. Baame akali kyawape akali mupwa ingyuo karengepe jasi akalipi Isaraele wambunya iso karengepe dupwa peparae epena lao kyakale leyamo dokopa wambu dupwa peparae Anatunya lenge kambu siyamo dokona epo kareyami.
Dokopa Josuame wambu dupwa peparae kando lamaiyuo, Kamongo Isaraele wambunya Anatu dokome pii dake dopa letamo, leya. Ama yuu wamba nakamana rora ambasu dupwa ipwa Yuporisa wangu pakirename kareyaminyi dokopa bange wakale anatuŋu lao lakando kareyami. Nakamana rora amabasu dupwana akali mendaki baa Tera lenge doko Aporakamepa Nayopana rakange.
Yuu gii dokopa nakamana kauwange Aporakame ipwa Yuporisa wangu pakirename kareyamopa nambame nyuo lanyuo yuu Kenane peparae dokona sukusa mondo lao laminyuo peyo. Papala dokopa banya para pyasi ree palu andake inginyi pyambuyu.
Nambame baa wane Aisake maiyu. Maipala nambame dee Aisake keta Jekope Isopa maiyu. Dee yuu kyau kuki pingi singi yuu Itome lenge doko Iso banya yuu inginya lao maiyu. Dopa piyunupape nakamana rora ambasu Jekope lenge banya wane wanakepe dupwa pipya yuu Isipi dokona lano peyami.
Dokopa enakana nambame Mosese Eronepa mapanyi peyapala yuu Isipi keta randa andake pena leyo. Dopa leyonopape nambame nakama nyisa nyiyu.
Nakamana rora ambasu dupwa yuu Isipi kareyaminyipa nambame neta nyuo lanyuo epeyo. Lanyuo epeyonopa Isipi range wambu dupwame mena matana pisope dee mena oseme ipyuo penge uliuli dupwana piso pyao peta ralyuo nyela epeyami.
Epeyaminyi dokopa nakamana rora ambasu dupwa ipwa kota Kone lenge dokona kando nyepala namba keta ateŋa lao kandokondali pyuo nyisinya lao piso soo leyami. Leyaminyi dokopa nambame Isaraele wambupi Isipi wambupi dupwana kanya dokona liti pyuo yuu doko iminjanyi pyambuyu. Pyambwapala nambame Isipi range dupwa ipwa kota dokome nyuo yambe pyapala ipwame nena leyo. Nambame Isipi wambu dupwa keta yulu piyu doko nakama soo nyilyaminyi. Nakama yuu muiyane dokona ee kana malu mee nembo paleyami.
Ipwa Jotane yuu neta pyakayo epenge dorena Amote wambu palenge dokona nakama nyuo lanyuo epeyo. Epeyo dokopa wambu dupwame nakama piyaminyipape nambame nakama nyisiyunusa wambu dupwa nyuo pyao anamasi minyiyami. Nakama pao kareyaminyipa nambame doloma pyao kokwa siyunusa nakamame nakambana yuu doko nyiyami.
Dee yuu Moape dokona kiŋi akali Beleke Sipona ikinyingi dokome nakama piya. Baame Biona ikinyingi Belame kareyamo dokona pii nembo piso soo nakama keta randa palena lakana leya.
Dopa piyamopape nambame Belameme pii leyamo doko sakame napuli lao suu piyu dokona baame nakama keta elyape pisiya. Dokona lao nambame nakama Beleke keta kingi raka lao nyiyu.
Dokopa nakama Jotane oko soo Jereko epeyami dokopa Jereko range akali dupwame nakama piyami. Dokopa Amote wambupi Perisi wambupi Kenane wambupi Iti wambupi Gukasi wambupi Ipi wambupi dee Jepusi wambupi dupwa peparaeme nakama yanda pyuo kareyaminyipape nambana porainya renge dokome nakama anamasi minyiyami.
Nakama epeyaminyi dokopa namba wambo pao wambu dupwa pakanyi andake pyambuyu. Dopa pyuo nakamame Amote kiŋi lama pyao raliyaminyisa piya. Nakamana yandape wua gelape dupwame mendali piyaminde daa.
Nambame yuu mendena nakamame mende yulu pyuo wara pii nange dokope dee taone nakamame waso pii nayami dupwape nyuo jiyu. Dokona lao epapu dakepa nakama yuu dokona karapala isa girapo olipipi dupwa nakamame wara pii nayami dupwana jingi lyuo nao palaminyi, Kamongome dopa letamo lao Josuame leya.
Dopa lapala Josua pii konda pyuo leya. Epapu dakepa Kamongo doko rape rape lao banya yulu rolae pyakamyuo yaki nyii nalapape. Nakamana rora ambasu dupwa yuu Mesopotemia dee yuu Isipi dokona bange wakale anatuŋu lao lakandeyami dupwa nyuo nembalapape. Nembapala nakamame Kamongona yulu iki pyakamilapape.
Dokona lao nakamame Kamongona yulu dokona pinya lao suu pyaa narami ramo nakamame mendena yulu pyakamirami lao suu piyami kande doko dakepa rombo palyuo lalapape. Nakamana rora ambasu dupwa yuu Mesopotemia dokona karo bange wakale anatuŋu lao lakandeyami dupwape panda yuu Amote karaminyi dokona wambunya anatu wakale dupwana lao rombo palyuo lalapape. Dopa piraminyipape nambamoo nambana ree palu dupwape Kamongona yulu pyakamirama, leya.
Leyamo dokopa wambu dupwame isingi lao, Kamongo Anatu yaki nyii napala anatu menge dupwana yulu pyakami narama ingilyamo, leyami.
Lapala namwana Kamongo Anatu dokome namwana rakange dupwape namwape yuu Isipi dokona kendemande yulu pyakamyuo kareyamano dokopa neta nyuo lanyuo epeya. Epeyamo dokopa yulu andake piyamo dupwa namwame kandeyama. Namwa panya peyamano dupwana akali rara wakale wakale dupwame namwa pyalana piyaminyipape Anatumi namwa nyuo retaro karo nyiso lanyuo peya.
Namwa epeyama dokopa namwana Kamongo Anatu dokome Amote wambu yuu dakena palenge dupwa pyao ralinyi nembakaya. Nembakayamo dokona lao namwa opetae Kamongona yulu pyakamirama. Baa namwana Anatu, leyami.
Leyaminyi dokopa Josuame wambu dupwa kando dopa lamaiyuo, Nakamame Kamongona yulu kapa pyakami narami ingilyamo rapisi. Baa Anatu poo pyasi wakasa dokome kyambo anatu dupwa lakanda narami lao suu pilyamo. Baame nakamana koo dupwa nyuo kame saka nara ingilyamo.
Dee mende nakamame Anatu yaki nyepala rara wakalena kyambo anatu lenge dupwana yulu pyakamyuo kararami ramo Anatu baame nakamana yanda pimwai ingyuo randa joo pira. Wamba baame nakama keta elyape ingyuo pisiyamopape epapu baame nakama pyao kokwa sera, leya.
Leyamo dokopa wambu dupwame Josua lamaiyuo, Doko daa. Namwame Kamongona yulu pyakamirama, leyami.
Leyami dokopa Josuame isingi lamaiyuo, Kamongona yulu pirama lao nakama range lalu lao lao karaminyi, leya. Leyamo dokopa nakamame dopa lao, Kinyi. Namwa rangeme lalu lao letamano, leyami.
Leyaminyipa Josuame lamaiyuo, Nakamame pii doo letaminyi dokona rara wakalena kyambo anatu nyisa nembapala Kamongo Isaraele wambunya Anatu doko iki yapalyepala mona kapu kyuo maipwape, leya.
Leyamo dokopa wambu dupwame Josua kando isingi lao, Namwana Kamongo Anatunya yulu pyakamyuo banya pii dupwa laramuli pyuo warombo soo kararama, leyami.
Leyaminyi dokona Josuame kana minyuo lalu lao lenge pii wambu dupwana lao pyao palyiya. Pyao palyapala yuu Sikeme dokona baame nakamame mawa piipi mana piipi minyuo pyuo kararami lao maiya.
Maipala Josuame mawa pii dupwa buku Anatunya lowa pii pyasi palenge dokona pyao reteya. Retapala kana andake mende nyepala Kamongona misi lenge panda dokona isa oke lenge kareyamo renge dokona reteya.
Retapala Josuame wambu dupwa lamaiyuo, Kamongome namwa pii langipyamo dupwa peparae kana dakeme sipyamosa namwame yuu peparae kana kandapala kana minyuo lalu lao lenge pii dokona lao suu pyarama. Suu pyapala kana dokome lasaka pili lao nakamame namwana Anatu baa kando kamba laa naramisa pira ingilyamo, leya.
Lapala dokopa Josuame wambu peparae dupwa nakama rangena yuu wakale wakale dupwana pena leyamopa peyami.
Enakana Josua Nanena ikinyingi baa Kamongona kendemande akali ee kana andete mendaki dee akalisa mendaki (110) nembo karapala kumuya.
Kumuyamo dokopa nakamame banya yuu angi dokona yuu Timinate Sera lenge dokona malu piyami. Yuu kyau kingi Gasi lenge dulurena yuu Eporaime kyau pyalya pyana pingi dokona malu piyami.
Josua baa lete kareyamopa Isaraele wambu dupwame Kamongona yulu pyakamyuo kareyami. Dopa pyuo karapala Josua kumapeyamo dokopa Kamongona yulu pyuoko kareyami. Karapala nakamana akali kyawa ingyuo karenge Kamongo banya wambu dupwana lao yulu andake pyakamiyamo dupwa rangeme kandeyaminyi dupwa lete kareyaminyi dokopa Kamongona yulu pyuo kareyamiko.
Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu Isipi yaki nyuo epeyaminyi dokopa Josepena kuli yeelyo minyuo epapala yuu Sikeme dokona malu piyami. Yuu malu piyaminyi doko akali Jekope baame Amo yuu Sikeme dokona rakange ingyuo kareyamo dokona ikinyingi dupwa kana kulingi andete mendaki (100) dokome ropo pyao nyiyamo doko Josepena para pyasi wambu dupwana ingyuo nyiyami.
Eliasa Eronena ikinyingi kumuyamo dokopa banya ikinyingi Pineyasena yuu Gipia dokona malu piyami. Yuu taone Gipia doko yuu Eporaime kyau kuki pingi singi dokona siya.




































Kamongona aŋala doko yuu Gilikale piso pao yuu Bokimi dokona peya. Papala baame Isaraele wambu dupwa lamaiyuo, Nambame nakama nyepala yuu Isipi doko yaki nyuo nakama lanyuo pao yuu nambame kana minyuo kinyi lalu lao nakamana kauwange dupwa kando leyono dokona lanyuo epeyo. Dokona nambame nakama kando pii kana minyuo leyo dokona dee lili pii naro, leya.
Dee nakamame wambu yuu dakena palaminyi dupwamoo pipya kana minyuo pii laa narami. Nakamana mena pyao kiso anatu lao maingi doko pyao lalyinyi nembarami, langiyu. Langiyunu kande doko pii nayami. Pii napala yulu piyaminyi doko range soo kandalapa.
Dokona lao nambame nakama epapu langilyu. Nakama yuu dokona sukusa paraminyi dokopa nambame wambu dupwa neta ralinyi nembaka naro. Wambu dupwa nakamana yanda pimwai ingyarami. Wambu dupwana mee bange anatunya lao makande piraminyi dokopa nakamame koo piramisa pira, leya.
Aŋalame dopa leyamo dokopa Isaraele wambu peparae pii doko sepala nakama ee leyami.
Ee leyaminyi dokona nakamame yuu doko kingi Bokimi leyami. Nakamame yuu Bokimi dokona Kamongo lakando mena pyao kiso maiyami.
Josuame Isaraele wambu dupwa kapa pena lao nembeyamopa nakama akali dupwa mendaki mendaki lao pao nakamana yuu range dokona palengenyili pyuo pao kareyami.
Josua baa ee kana malu kareyamo dusipana Isaraele wambu dupwame Kamongo dokona lao suu pyao banya yulu piyami. Dee enakana Josua baa kumapeyamo dokopa akali lapo Kamongome Isaraele wambu keta yulu piyamo peparae soo giso rapu pyuo kareyami dokopa Isaraele wambumi kaeya nao Kamongona yulu pyuo kareyami.
Kamongona kendemande akali Josua baa akali Nane lenge dokona ikinyingi baa ee kana andete mendaki dee akalisa mendaki (110) karapala kumuya.
Dokopa banya yanenge nyepala yuu banya range dokona malu piyami. Yuu kyau Gasi lenge dokona dumarena pao yuu kyau malu singi Eporaime lenge dokona yuu mende Timinati Erese dokona malu piyami.
Dee banya rara yango nyuo doo baamoo kapa kapa ando laeyuo kareyaminyi opetae kumuyami. Dee dokona enakana wambu ando kareyaminyi dupwame Kamongo baa nyuo kame soo dee Kamongome yulu peparae Isaraele wambu dupwa keta piyamo doko see nayami.
Enakana Isaraele wambu dupwa Kamongona lenge kambu dokona yulu koo pyuo anatu angi daa kingi Bealo lenge dupwana yulu pyuo kareyami.
Karo nakama Kamongona kingi yaki nyiyami. Anatumi nakamana kauwange dupwa yuu Isipi yaki nyuo lanyuo epeyamo doko soo gisa nayami. Nakamame kanda soo wambu rara wakale role pyao paleyaminyi dupwana kyambo anatu kingi lakando kareyami. Nakamame mata punjinyi nembo mee kyambo anatu dupwana lao kingi leyaminyi dokopa Kamongo baa imbwaya.
Nakamame Kamongo Anatu kando dee kingi ketae pyambuo lakanda nao dokopa wambu wakalena kyambo anatu Bealo Asetatepa lenge dolapona lao yulu pyuo kareyami.
Dokopa Kamongo Anatumi Isaraele wambu dupwa kando ama wakasa imbwaya. Imbwuapala waa nyingi wambu dupwame nakama pyao bange nyerami, leya. Kamongo baame dee lao, Yanda pimwai dupwa palu awali lenge dupwame epo sukusa sukusa pipala Isaraele wambu dupwa pyao dee nakama iso karena leya. Dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwa nakama range kapa mendasa alyasa minyuo kararami ingya naya.
Yuu peparae nakama yanda pela peyaminyi dokopa Kamongome wamba leyamuli pyuo nakama kyawa yaki nyuo koo keta pumili lao yanda pimwaiya. Dopa piyamosa nakama ama randa andake nyuo kareyami.
Randa nyuo kareyaminyi dokopa enakana Anatumi Isaraele wambu dupwa yanda pimwai dupwa keta kiiramo nyeraŋa lao lita akali porai lapo maiya.
Dopa pyuo lita maiyamopape Isaraele wambu dupwame nakamana lita dupwa kando pii soo nyii nayami. Nakama Kamongo kame soo kaepala kyambo anatu dupwana lao iki kingi lakando kareyami. Nakamana rakange akali dupwa Kamongona mawa pii leyamo dupwa warombo soo pyuo kareyaminyipape wane nakamana enako mandeyami dupwa pii see nao kamba lao kareyami. Kareyaminyipape Kamongome lita akali maipapu pyuo kareya. Yuu gii dokopa akali doko Kamongome nyisapapu pyuo kareya.
Lita akali dupwa lete kareyaminyi yuu gii dokopa Kamongome yanda pimwai dupwame wambu dupwa pyao anamasi minya nana lapala nyiso karapa piya. Dopa pyuo dokopa wambu dupwa randa nyuo mona kendo pisipala Kamongo doko kando ee leyaminyisa dokona Kamongome nakama kondo sakame kumuo karapa piya.
Piyamopape lita akali dupwa kumuyaminyi dokopa Isaraele wambu nakama kapu kyuo wambarae yulu pingi dokona pipa piyami. Nakamana rora ambasupi koo piyami dokona nakamame koo dokona konda konda pyuo pao andakyapa piyami. Dopa pyuo nakamame kyambo anatu dupwana kingi ketae pyambuo dupwana yulu pyuo nakamana mona kana pokapala simbi simbi pyuo yulu koo dokona pyuo karapa piyami.
Dokopa Kamongome Isaraele wambu dupwa kando ama wakasa imbwaya. Imbwuapala baame lao, Pii lalu lao lenge dokona nakamana kauwange dupwa kando dopa pipwape lao leyono doko kokwa soo yaleyami, leya. Dee lao, Nambame leyonuli pyuo Isaraele wambumi rape rape lao soo nyii nayaminyi dokona
Josua kumuyamo dokopa akali yuu rara wakale range yaki nyiyamo dupwa dakena kararaminyipa nambame ralinyi neta nembakami naro, leya.
Dopa pyuo nambame nakamana kauwange dupwa lamaiyunuli pyuo moko minyuo piyami doko waiso namba larono doko moko minyuo piramipi lao kandaro, leya.
Dokona Kamongo dokome akali rara wakale dupwa yuu dokona mee karena leya. Lapala baame nakama waiya lao ralinyi nembope dee Josuame isinya lao kingi rakana palyuope pii naya.































Akali Iyuti baa kumapeyamo dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwame Kamongona lenge kambu dokona kambako yulu koo ama malu mee piyami.
Dokopa Kamongome nakama kyawa yaki nyiyamopa akali Jepene lenge baa kiŋi yulu pyuo yuu Kenane lenge yuu taone andake Aso lenge dokona rapu pingi dokome Isaraele wambu pyao anamasi minyiya. Jepene banya yanda singi ami mende mupwa ingyuo rapu pingi akali kingi Sisira lenge baa yuu Arosete Akoimi lenge dokona paleya.
Akali Jepene banya mena oseme ipyuo penge uliuli andete mange mendaki (900) siya. Siyamopa baame Isaraele wambu dupwa kopetame randa andake maiyuo ee kana akalisa lama iso kareya. Kareyamo dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwame ee andake lao Kamongome nakama nyisinya leyami.
Depora baa poropeta enda akali Lapitote lenge dokona etenge. Enda baa peteyamo yuu gii dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwame pii lapo piso soo kareyaminyipa baame Anatunya pii isingi yano pyao lamaiyuo peteya.
Piso yuu Orama dee yuu Betelepa lenge kanya dokona yuu kyau malu singi Eporaime lenge dokona bona isa dopale mende kareyamo dokona isa renge dokona isa peteya. Dokona Isaraele wambu dupwa epapala enda baame yapalya yapana pyuo pii angi yano pyao laramo doko sela epeyami.
Dokopa enda baame akali Bereke lenge doko epena lao wai nembeya. Bereke baa Apinome banya ikinyingi baa yuu Napatalai lenge taone andake Ketese lenge dokona kareya. Bereke epeyamopa baa lamaiyuo, Kamongo Isaraele wambunya Anatu dokome dopa pipi lao langipya. Dee embame Napatalai rarape Sepyulane rarape dolapona akali taosande akalisa (10,000) dupwa nyuo yuu kyau Tapo dokona lanyuo pare, langipya, leya.
Nambame Sisira baa akali Jepene lenge dokona yanda singi ami akali mupwa ingyuo karenge doko lanyuo eparo. Eparonopa embapa ipwa Kisone dokona yanda pirambi. Akali Sisira banya mena oseme ipyuo papingi uliuli dupwape yanda singi dupwape reto kararamopape nambame emba pyao anamasi minyingi renge jeronopa baa anamasi minyare, langipya, leya Deporame.
Dokopa Bereke baame enda Depora lamaiyuo leya. Emba namba role pyao epare ramo doko kapa paro. Dee emba daa lare ramo dokopa namba opetae paa naroko, leya.
Enda baame isingi leya. Kapa letene. Namba role pyao paramba. Role pyao parambano dokopa Anatumi enda doko keta yulu andake mairamopa enda dokome akali Sisira pyao anamasi minyara. Minyaramo dokona wambumi embame pyapiŋi lao kingi ketae pyambuo laa narami, leya. Lapala dokopa enda Depora baa sipurapala Bereke baapa role pyao yuu Ketese dokona peyambi.
Dokopa Bereke baame Sepyulane rarape dee Napatalai rarape peparae kyakale lao yuu Ketese dokona epena leya. Dokopa akali taosande akalisa (10,000) baame leyamuli pyuo epeyaminyipa enda Depora baa opetae role pyao peyami.
Dokopa akali Ipua lenge yuu Kene range doko banya komau anda yuu Ketese repeta isa oke lenge mende karenge yuu Sananimi lenge dokona piya. Akali yuu Kene range dupwa yaki nyuo kakondo pao yuu mendena peya. Mosese banya imwange Opape lenge dokona rara wai kiso karenge rara dupwa Kene lenge.
Dokopa mendeme Sisira lamaiyuo, Bereke akali Apinome banya ikinyingi baa yuu kyau Tapo lenge dokona pulyuo pupya, lamaiya.
Leyamo dokopa banya akali dupwa peparaepe mena oseme ipyuo penge uliuli andete mange mendaki (900) dupwape epena lao kyakale leya. Nakama epeyaminyi dokopa yuu Arosete Akoimi yaki nyuo ipwa Kisone mare dokona nembeya.
Dokopa dee Depora baame akali Bereke lamaiyuo leya. Mee pao pilinyili pyuo pupi. Epapu yuu gii Kamongome Sisira baa pyao ralinyi nembalase lao yuu gii jilyamo. Jepala Kamongome emba dopa pii lao kata lasaka pyuo karamo, leya. Dokopa Bereke baa yuu kyau Tapo lenge doko yaki nyuo banya akali taosande akalisa (10,000) dupwa pipya lupyuo peyami.
Dokopa akali Bereke banya yanda singi akali dupwa pipya epeyaminyipa Kamongo mende piyamo dokona Sisiramoo banya yanda singi dupwape dee banya mena oseme ipyuo penge uliuli dupwape minyuo pyasapala mona nembo apa piramape lao see nayami. Dokopa Sisira baa mena oseme ipyuo penge uliuli dokona peteyamo doko yaki nyepala baa ralo peya.
Sisira baa ralo peyamo dokopa banya ami peparae yuu Arosete Akoimi dokona panya ralo peyami. Peyaminyi dokopa Berekemoo banya yanda singi dupwapeme peteta papala mende nyisa para kando lao pyao malu palyiyami.
Sisira baa ralo pako pao dokopa enda Jaele lenge Kene rara akali Ipuana etenge banya komau anda dokona pao kando nyiya. Nambana kiŋi Jepene yuu Aso karenge doko akali Ipua manda rao role pyao palyambinyi lao suu pyapala Sisira baa dokona peya.
Peyamo dokopa enda Jaele baame akali Sisira baa epena lapala lamaiyuo, Emba nambana komau anda dakena andakare epena leya. Lapala dokopa, Emba paka napipi, lamaiya. Dokopa akali baa komau anda dokona andakare peyamo dokopa anda donge dokona komau porai lapome nee pipala yalu pyuo petena leya.
Dokopa akali dokome enda baa lamaiyuo, Embame namba ipwa nano pilyamo nalana kamuo jinya leya. Dokopa enda dokome menana yanenge ipwa pee yale wasisi dokona susu ipwange peteyamo doko nyepala nena lao nyuo maiya. Maipala napeyamo dokopa Sisira dee kamba yalu piya.
Enakana akali baame enda doko kando lamaiya. Emba anda kambu repeta roya kararenepa wambu mendeme emba kando wambu mende dae ipyape leyami kande doko daaŋa lape, leya.
Lapala Sisira baa maka piyasa baa luu andake paleya. Baa paleyamo dokona enda Jaele dokome ama mende dee isa wangya mendepe nyepala minyuo elya kalo peya. Papala isa dokome akalinya rambusa dokona suu lapala ama dokome pyao kareyamosa kolapala isa pinjingi paki yuu dokona yalyiya. Dopa piyamosa baa kumuya.
Enakana akali Bereke baa Sisira mendasa karara lao koto epeya. Dokopa enda Jaele baa kama papala akali baa kando pii lamaiyuo, Akali kotelene doko lasaka pirowale. Emba dae ipu, leya. Enda baame Bereke nyuo lanyuo andakare peya. Papala komau anda dokona isa wangya karenge dokome banya kyawa doko pyao rambuki nyepala kumuyamo doko lasaka piya.
Yuu gii dokopa Anatumi Isaraele wambunya lao akali Jepene baa yuu Kenane wambunya kiŋi doko anamasi minyuo nyuo isa palyiya.
Dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwame Jepene baa kando rondanyi pyuo randa maiyuo yanda pimwaiyuo karo pao baa pyao kokwa soo nembalu nembo nembeyami.
Yuu gii dokopa enda Deporapa akali Bereke Apinomena ikinyingi dokopame kenane dake piyambi.
Isaraele wambu dupwana lita dupwame angingyuo yanda pelana suu piyami. Wambu dupwa rae maiyuo mee yanda pela peyami. Dokona lao Kamongo doko lakandalapape.
Kiŋi dupwa selapape. Nakama kamongo dupwa warombo soo karalapape. Isaraele wambunya Anatu Kamongo doko kando namba kenane pyao kurulu rambyalupi lao piru.
Kamongo, emba yuu Siya dokona yuu kyau singi dupwa dee yuu Itome yaki nyepala epene dokopa yuusili minyapala yake dokona piso apu epeya. Kinyi, kopa dokona piso ipwa kulimbwanyi peyo epeya.
Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Anatunya lenge kambu dokonape dee yuu kyau Sainai dokona Kamongona lenge kambu dokonape piso yuu kyau dupwa yuusili minyili lao pyuku pyuku leya.
Dokopa akali lapo mena kamele maki maki pyuo lanyuo mata dupwana bange keyange reto kana nyuo bisinase pyuo papingi dupwa akali Samika Anatinya ikinyingi ando kareyamo yuu gii dokopape dee enda Jaele ando kareyamo yuu gii dokopape yuu dokona kata sukusa dopa pyuo paa nayami. Dee wambu lapo kata londe panya peyami dupwa nemba nemba kata kuki dupwana iki peyami.
Isaraele wambu dupwame nakamana taone dupwa kame soo yaki nyiyami. Depora, emba ene epapa naenepa mende pii nao mee kareyami. Emba Isaraele wambunya endangi dopale ingyuo epee.
Enakana Isaraele wambu dupwa mee bange anatuŋu lenge enenge dupwa rombo palyuo nyiyami dokopa yuu dokona yanda sipureya. Dokopa Isaraele yanda singi akali taosande akalisa kisima (40,000) dupwana mendalipi konambe kakupi minya nayami.
Nambana mona doko Isaraele wambunya yanda singi dupwana akali iso karenge dupwa keta silyamo. Dee wambu lapo mee rae maiyuo yanda pela peyaminyi dupwana keta silyamoko. Kamongo doko lakandalapape.
Wambu mena donge kewa lengena mata dokona isa petenge bange retapala petaminyi dupwape dee nakama mee kata papingipi pii dake polo lamailapape.
Selapa. Wambu pii malu lao ipwa kamuo nyingi yuwale repeta karaminyi dupwame Kamongome anamasi minyiyamo dupwanape dee Isaraele wambu dupwame wini piyaminyi dupwana lao lao karaminyi. Dokopa Kamongona wambu dupwa nakamana yuu taone andake karenge dupwa yaki nyepala nakama lano epeyami.
Dokopa lao, Depora emba wambo puu. Kenane mende pyao wambo pupi. Akali Bereke Apinomena ikinyingi wambo pao embena karapusi wambu dupwa lanyuo puu, leyami.
Dokopa enakana akali yaki nyii nange dupwa nakamana lita dupwa keta epeyami. Dokopa Kamongona wambu dupwa baa keta epo rapa rapa pipala yanda pela epeyami.
Yuu Eporaime wambu dupwa nakamana yuu dokona piso akali Benjamenena rara wambu dupwana matarena epo yuu anda lama lama dokona epo sukusa pyaka siyami dokopa yanda singi isingi akali dupwa yuu Maki piso epeyami. Dee akali mupwa dupwa yuu Sepyulane dokona piso epo piyami.
Isakana rara dokona akali mupwa dupwa poropeta enda Depora role pyao epeyami. Kinyi, Isakana rara dee Bereke opetaeko epeya. Dokopa nakama Bereke moko minyuo yuu pau lama lama dokona peyami. Dopa piyamopape Urupenena rara dupwa lili pyuo pingisi palipala nakama parama panda paa narama lao see nayami.
Akipamo nakama mena sipisipi dupwa pipya karo kaeyamisi? Nakama kareyami doko mena sipisipi rapu pingi akali dupwame mena sipisipi kee larami doko selana kareyamisi? Waa. Urupenena rara dupwa lili pipala pingisi paleya. Dokona nakama parama panda paa narama lao see nayami.
Dokona Gate rara dupwa ipwa Jotane neta pyakalyingi dorena kareyami. Dokopa Danena rara dupwa sipu dupwana yulu pyuo karo kaeyami. Dokopa Asana rara dupwa ipwa kota kipwa kipwa wangu dupwana kareyami. Doko nakama ipwa kee kama dupwana mee kareyami.
Dopa piyaminyipape Sepyulane wambupi dee Napatalai wambupi dupwa nakama kumarami dokona suu pyaa napala nakama range kumuo maiyuo yanda pingi yuu dokona yanda pyuo kareyami.
Dokopa yuu Tanake dokona ipwa Meketo repeta dokona kiŋi dupwa epapala yanda piyami. Yuu Kenane kiŋi dupwame yanda piyaminyipape nakama kana kulingi mendepe nyuo lanyuo paa nayami.
Bui dupwa yake dokona pyakando pyuo oko soo peyami. Dopa pyuo peyaminyi dokopa nakama Sisirapa yanda pimwai ingyuo piyami.
Ipwa Kisone lenge doko palipala nakama peparae soo peya. Dokona namba porai ingyuo karo kimbu pyao piso paro.
Dokopa mena ose dupwa poraiyuo makando nakamana kimbu dupwame yuu pyao inju epeyami.
Kamongona aŋala dokome lao, Yuu Metose keta randa maipwape. Dee yuu dokona palaminyi dupwa keta randa maipwape. Nakama yanda singi dopale ingyuo epo Kamongo nyiso banya lao yanda pela epa nayami.
Dokona enda Jaele lenge Kene rara akali Ipua lenge dokona etenge baa embone piso petenge. Enda wakale komau anda dupwana petenge dupwa embone piso pisiminyipape enda Jaele baa kamame wakasa embone petenge.
Dokopa akali Sisirame ipwa naro jinya lao piso siyamopape enda dokome susu ipwange maiya. Pere ama keyange mendena susu ipwange angi retapala minyuo epo maiya.
Maipala enda baame komau anda puu anjingi isa pirimi dopale mende kingi pakirena minyiya. Dee kingi paki dokome yulu pingi akali mendena ama doko nyuo minyiya. Dopa pipala minyuo pao akali Sisira pyao banya kyawa kuli doko poro leya. Poro lapala enamba dokona arekyo piya.
Dokopa akali doko ruki maki lao Jaelena kimbu siyamo dokona pao paleya. Palipala akali baa kumuya.
Dokopa Sisirana endangi dokome windowa kata dokona karo ikinyingi doko anda epelyape lao mee kandaro kareya. Karo dokopa enda baa range piso soo lao, Akipamo akali dokona mena osena uliuli ipyuo penge doko enakana ingyuo epelyase? Dee akipamo banya mena ose dupwa mona palyuo kamba kapu kyuo epelyamisi? leya.
Dokopa banya soo gisingi enda dupwame isingi lamaiyuo,
Nakama bange koto nyuo mokwa soo lili pyuo nyilyaminyi ingilyamo. Doko wanake mapwae nyuo yanda singi dupwa lama larapu nyilyaminyi. Dee komau keyange kamonganyi nembenge dupwa akali Sisira dokona lao nyakamilyaminyi. Dee mola suku pisi ama keyange dupwa enda kuini dokona mangena sera lao nyakamilyaminyi, leya. Leyamo doko sepala Sisirana endangi dokome poraiyuo suu pyao peteya.
O Kamongo, embena nyisu petenge dupwa dopale ingyuo kumunya. Dopa piraminyipape embena puu minyingi dupwa neta potemo epo rao karenge doko suu pyao karena. Dee yuu palu kareyami dokona ee kana akalisa kisima dusipana manda rengepe mona kyuu lao singi rengepe siya.
Isaraele wambu dupwame dee kamba Kamongo kando koo piyami. Piyaminyisa Kamongo dokome ee kana yanda ipingi dusipana Mitiane wambu dupwame nakama iso rapu pyuo karena kaeya.
Dokopa Mitiane wambu dupwana porainya renge dokome Isaraele wambunya porainya renge nyuo isa palyiya. Dokona lao Isaraele wambu kananda dupwanape dee yuu kyau dupwana laponape yalu piyami.
Yuu lapo Isaraele wambu dupwame ee wai dupwa randa leyaminyi andeyamo dokopa Mitiane rara dupwape Amaleke rara dupwape dee yuu muiyane dokona wambu palenge rara dupwamepe role pyao epo Isaraele wambu dupwa yanda pyuo pyapa piyami.
Nakama yuu dokona komau anda pyuo palipala yuu donorena nanesale ingyuo yuu Gasa pao ee nengepe dupwa peparae pyao nembapa piyami. Nakama mena bulamakaope dee mena sipisipi mena dongepe dupwa nyepala Isaraele dupwa keta bange mende reto palena lao yaki nyii nayami.
Nakama menape dee komau andape dupwa minyuo epo aimbu malu mee epenge dopale ingyuo epeyami. Dokopa nakamape dee nakamana mena kamele dupwa peparae mendeme kapa yaka lalana saka naya. Doko nakama epapala yuu doko pyao kokwa soo nembo otalu oto oteyami.
Dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwame mende nakamba range nyiso wambu dupwa isingi pyarami ingya naya.
Dokopa Mitiane wambu dupwame nakama randa maiyuo kareyaminyisa Isaraele wambu dupwame Kamongo kando nyisinya lao kee lao piso siyami.
Piso siyaminyipa baame poropeta akali mende nakama keta peyamo dokome Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Anatu dokona wai pii doko minyuo epeya. Kamongona wai pii dapa lao, Nambame nakama yuu Isipi dokona kendemande ingyuo kareyaminyipa kiiramo nyuo minyuo epeyo.
Nambame nakama Isipi wambu dupwana kingi rekya lao nyiyu. Dee yuu dakena wambu dupwame nakamba piyaminyi dokopa kyawa lete nyuo piyu. Nakama wambo epeyaminyi dokopa doloma pyao ralinyi nembeyo. Ralinyi nembapala nambame nakamana yuu doko nyepala jiyu.
Nambame nakamba langyuo, Namba nakamana Kamongo Anatu dokoŋo. Yuu nakama epapu palaminyi dokona Amote wambunya mee bange kingimi wasisi anatuŋu lao lakandenge dupwa lakanda nalapape, langiyu. Langiyunupape nakamame nambana pii see nayami, leya.
Dokopa Kamongona aŋala mende yuu kingi Opora lenge dokona epeya. Epapala akali Apisasena rara dokona akali Joase lengena yuu dokona epo banya isa oke renge dokona peteya. Mitiane akali dupwame kanda naramiŋi lao Joasena ikinyingi Gitione doko waene kingingi dokona witi jingi dupwa pyao inju baa yalu pyuo kareya.
Kareyamo dokona Kamongona aŋala doko papala baa dopa lamaiyuo lao, Emba akali paka nao dee porai wakasa ingyuo karenge. Kamongo emba keta karamo, leya.
Dokopa Gitioneme baa lamaiyuo, Namba pii mende piso sipuli leto. Kamongo doko namwa keta role pyao karara ramo doko akipamo yulu dupwa namwa keta pilyase? Yulu ama keyange wakasa Kamongo dokome pingi dupwa apa pilyase? Baame yuu Isipi dokona piso nyuo lanyuo epeyamo doko namwana rakane dupwame dopa pyuo epeyama lao langiyami. Kamongo dokome namwa kame soo kaepala Mitiane wambu dupwa keta yaki nyuo pyambuya.
Dokopa Kamongo dokome baa isingi lamaiyuo, Embena porainya renge andake doko paleta papala Isaraele wambu dupwa Mitiane wambu dupwa kiiramo nyela puu. Namba rangeme emba puu lao langilyu, leya.
Dokopa Gitione isingi lao, Dopa piramopape nambame apa pyuo Isaraele kiiramo lete nyerose? Nambana rara kuki Manasana rara andake dokona petamano doko kamame porai daa. Dee nambana ree palu dokona namba akali kamame numi daa. Namba mee akali kuki ingyuo karenge, leya.
