Leyamo dokopa Kamongo dokome isingi lamaiyuo, Nambame emba nyisaroŋo dokopa embame kapa piri. Embame akali mendaki pyao injinyi nembenge doko suu pyao Mitiane wambu dupwa pyao injinyi nembare, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Gitioneme isingi lao, Emba namba kando rae mairi ramo doko emba Kamongoŋo lao namba yulu andake mende pyuo lasaka pii.
Namba nenge lapo minyuo epo jerowaleŋe emba yaki nyuo paa napipi, leya. Leyamo dokopa aŋala dokome isingi lao, Namba dakena kararonopa emba kapu kyuo epare, leya.
Dokona lao Gitione baa banya anda papala mena meme yakane mende pyao kiso dee nenge palawa sikyali kilokerame akalisa dopale nyepala isi pyambwa nao borete waso kisiya. Kisapala mena angi doko nyuu pisiki minyasi dokona palyuo mena ipwange supu doko pee sosepyane dokona kyano pipala minyiya. Minyuo Kamongona aŋala doko isa oke renge dokona peteyamo dokona epapala nenge dupwa maiya.
Dokopa aŋala dokome baa lamaiyuo, Mena dokope borete dupwape kana dakena retapala mena ipwange supu dokome ketae kulimbunya leya. Leyamuli pyuo Gitioneme piya.
Dokopa Kamongona aŋala dokome kingi pyasinju lapala banya pangali minyiyamo pinjingi dokome nenge dupwana warendeya. Warendeyamo dokopa isare kana dokona piso epapala menape boretepe dupwa reya. Dokopa aŋala doko baa pana naya.
Gitione doko Kamongona aŋala namba kandapulyamo lao suu pyapala baame yamarangyuo pakame kumuo lao, Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa. Nambame embena aŋala dokona lenge kambu rolae kandapu. Dokona lao namba keta aki mende pyakarese? leya.
Dopa leyamopape Kamongo dokome baa isingi lamaiyuo, Manda rao mona kyuu lao seramopa emba kuma nareŋe dokona lao paka napipi, leya.
Dokopa Gitioneme bange kiso maingi kana pyare lao Kamongona lao wasapala baame kingi lao, Kamongo doko mona kyuu lao singi, leya. Doko akali Apiasena rara dokona yuu kingi Opora lenge dokona bange kiso maingi kana pyare doko mee perao karamo.
Yuu gii kukwa dokopa Kamongo dokome Gitione lamaiyuo, Embena rakanena mena bulamakao kali mende nyuo dee bulamakao kali wakale ee kana yanda ipingi pao otasi doko nyuo pipala embena rakanena kana pyare lasi doko anatu angi daa Bealo lenge dokona lao singi doko lalyuo nembape. Dee enda kingi Asera lenge anatuŋu lao lakandenge dokona lao suu pyao isa pote repeta perao karamo doko pyakepo nembape.
Yuu mundu ketae dakena embena Kamongo Anatu dokona lao kana pyare lasi keyange mende wasape. Wasapala isa pote doko kando enda kingi Asera lenge anatuŋu lao lakandenge pyakepapinyi doko isa ingyuo kisapala mena bulamakao kali lapo doko nyuo kana pyare lasi dokona pyao yangape.
Dokona lao Gitioneme banya kendemande akali akalisa nyiya. Nyepala Kamongo baame pinya lao lamaiyamuli pyuo piya. Baame wambu yuu taone dokona palenge dupwape dee banya ree palu wambu dupwape kando pakapala korakama pii naya. Dokona lao baame kukwa dokopa piya.
Yuu gii yangama dokopa wambu yuu taonena palenge dupwa wamba kukwa sipurapala nakamame anatu angi daa kingi Bealo lenge dokona mena pyao kiso maingi kane pyare lasi dokope dee isa pote kando enda kingi Asera lenge anatuŋu lao lakandenge pyakepasi siyamo kandeyami. Dee mena bulamakao kali lapo ingyuo doko kana pyare lasi enenge piyamo dokona yangasi siyamo doko kandeyami.
Dokopa nakama mendeme mende piso soo lao, Yulu dake apimi pipyase? leyami. Lapala nakama pii malu lao mendali pisalya pisana pipala akali Gitione Joasena ikinyingi dokome pipyalyamo lao kando nyiyami.
Kando nyepala nakamame Joase lamaiyuo, Embena ikinyi dokome anatu angi daa Bealo lenge dokona kana pyare lasi doko lalyuo koo inginyi nembo dee enda kingi Asera lenge anatuŋu lao lakandenge dokona isa pote pyakepanyi nembapyamo dokome namwame baa pyao kumakamanale. Dokona lao embame baa dae minyuo ipu, leyami.
Joaseme wambu banya lenge kambu dokona mumu lao kareyaminyi dupwa kando lao, Nakama anatu angi daa Bealo lenge doko nyisamwali yaka lao suu pyao karo pii poraiyuo letamisi? Mendeme banya lao kingi lara ramo doko yuu yangapa naramopa baa pyao kumakarami. Kana pyare lasi lalyuo isa pupya doko banya doko doŋo. Dokona lao Bealo baa anatu angi ramo baa rangeme nyiso kyawa lete nyinya leya.
Doko Joaseme lao, Anatu angi daa kingi Bealo dokona kana pyare lasi doko lalyuo isa pupya dokona baa rangeme kyawa lete nyinya leyamo dokona Gitione banya kingi alowa pipala Jerembealo leyami.
Dokopa Mitiane wambu peparaepe Amaleke wambu dupwape dee yuu muiyane dokona wambu palenge dupwape peparae nyuo malu palyapala ipwa Jotane doko yalo papala yuu lama lama kingi Jeserele lenge dokona komau anda pyuo paleyami.
Kamongona imambu dokome Gitione baa keta maralyiyamo dokopa baame bikuli poo lao Apisana rara dupwa baa moko minyuo epena leya.
Dee baame yuu Manasa andake dokona wangu paki pakipi laparaena pii wai nembo wambu dupwa kee lapala baa moko minyuo epena lena leya. Lapala baame dee akali Asana rarape Sepyulanena rarape dee Napatalaina rarape dupwa wai nembeyamosa nakama baa keta pakalana kimbu soo epeyami.
Dokopa Gitioneme Anatu kando lao, Embame lao dokopa embame namba keta Isaraele wambu dupwa nyiso kyawa lete nyero lee kande doko, leya.
Kapaŋa. Namwa witi pyao injingi panda dokona nambame mena sipisipinya imanji lapo yuu dokona retelyo. Doko wamba yangama dokopa pipyae dupwa mena sipisipinya imanji dokona pisipala yuu dokona pisa nara ramo doko embame namba keta Isaraele wambu dupwa kyawa lete nyere lyamo lao sero, leya.
Dokopa leyamuli pyuo piya. Doko yangama dokopa Gitione baa palu sipurapala baame mena sipisipinya imanji doko kingiya dokopa disi mende ipwange dokome soo simbwaya.
Dokopa Gitioneme Anatu kando lao, Nambapa imbwa napipi. Yuu mendaki dee kamba pii mende larole. Doko dee kamba yuu mendaki mena sipisipinya imanji dokome makande mende piruli. Yuu gii dakepa mena sipisipinya imanji doko oo lapala yuu doko rombe lena laa, leya.
Yuu gii dokona kukwa dokopa Gitioneme dopa pyakana lao leyamuli pyuo Anatumi piya. Yangama dokopa mena sipisipinya imanji doko oo lasi siyamopape yuu doko pipyaeme rombe lao siya.
Yuu gii mendepa Gitionemoo banya akali peparae dupwa pipya wamba kukwa sipurapala ipwa guu Arote lenge dokona wangu dorena komau anda pyuo paleyami. Dee Mitiane wambu dupwa nakama paleyami dokona dumurena ingyuo yuu lama lama mendena yuu kyau Mora repeta komau anda pyuo paleyami.
Dokopa Kamongo dokome Gitione lamaiyuo lao, Akali embame retaro karene dupwa nambame kandapu dokopa ama malu ingilyamo. Dokona nambame Mitiane wambu pipya pyao wini pela paase lao kapa nyisaro ingya nalyamo. Nakamame nakama malu dokona mee wini pimwa lao suu pyapala nambame angi nyisapi lao suu pyaa narami.
Dokona embame wambu dupwa lamaiyuo, Nakama lapo pakayami kande dupwa anda kapu kyuo paraminyipa namwa lapo yuu kyau Giliate dakena pisimanale lena leya. Leyamo dokopa lao akali ama malu mee taosande akalisa lama ipisu lama (22,000) anda peyaminyipape akali taosande akalisa (10,000) piso kaeyami.
Dokopa Kamongome Gitione lamaiyuo, Emba kamame akali soo kaeyoko retaro kareneŋe nakama lanyuo ipwa mare dokona pupi. Dokopa nambame dokona lili pyakaro. Dokopa nambame akali mende embapa role parambi laro ramo doko kapa baa para. Dee akali mende embapa paa narambi laro ramo doko baa paa narako, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Gitioneme akali dupwa lanyuo ipwa dokona peya. Peyamo dokopa Kamongo dokome baa lamaiyuo, Akali lapo suwa ingyuo ipwa kekengeme nyuo naraminyi dupwa yapalyuo nyepe. Dee akali lapo wapambu pii pyaro piso ipwa naraminyi dupwa yapalyuo wakale ingyuo nyepe.
Akali andete remame (300) ipwa kingi kapena ranju nyuo neyami dee menge dupwa wapambu pii pyaro piso neyami.
Dokopa Kamongo dokome Gitione lamaiyuo, Akali andete remame (300) ipwa kingi kapena reto ranju nyuo naminyi dusipa pipya nambame emba kyawa lete nyuo Mitiane wambu pyalase lao wini pingi renge jeroŋo dokona akali menge dupwa anda pena lao lamaipi, leya.
Lapala Gitione baame warame wasisi ipwa penge dupwape bikuli dupwape yapo nyepala akali andete rema (300) dusipa iki mee karena lapala wakale dupwa peparae anda pena leya. Dokopa Isaraele wambu paleyaminyi isa lunga lunga yuu lama lama dokona Mitiane wambu komau anda pyuo paleyami.
Yuu gii kukwa dokopa Kamongome Gitione kando lamaiyuo, Nakama sipurapala Mitiane wambu komau anda pyuo palaminyi dupwa pyala pupwape. Dokona lao nakamame kapa wini pirami lao nambame nyisaro, leya.
Dopa piraminyipape emba pyala pana pakare ramo doko embena kendemande akali Pura dokopa embapa Mitiane wambu anda pyuo palaminyi dokona pupwape.
Dokopa emba pii laraminyi dupwa sepala poraiyaramopa kambu minyuo pyare, leya. Dokona lao Gitionepa banya kendemande akali Purapa nakambana nyisu petenge dupwa paleyaminyi dokona wangu dokona peyambi.
Dokopa Mitiane wambupi Amaleke wambupi dee yuu muiyanena akali rara lapo dupwape aimbu ama malu wakasa dopale ingyuo pau dokona muu rale lao raeyami. Dee nakamana mena kamele ama malu wakasa ipwa kota kee kama wangunya singi dopale ingyuo kareyami.
Dokopa Gitione repeta epo pyaka sepeyamo dokopa akali mende banya puu minyingi mende kombeya lamaiyuo paleyamo siya. Akali dokome lao, Namba kombeya pipu doko nenge borete balimi wasisi dokome namwana komau anda karaminyi dokona bele bele epapala komau anda mende pyapya. Dokopa komau anda doko boo lapala rambi kuiyuo yuu dokona isa sipya, leya.
Dokopa banya puu minyingi dokome isingi lao, Doko mende lao pii napya. Isaraele akali Gitione baa akali Joasena ikinyingi dokona wua gela dokoŋo, leya. Lapala Anatumi namwana yanda singipi peparae dee Mitiane wambupi pipya nyuo isa palyuo baa wini pingi renge maipya, leya.
Gitioneme akali dokona kombeya doko soo dee dokona renge doko soo pipala baa wapambu pii pyaro piso Anatu lakandeya. Dopa pipale baa enakana Isaraele wambu paleyami dokona kamba papala lao, Sipuralapape. Kamongo dokome Mitiane yanda singi dupwa isa palyuo nakama wini pingi renge jilyamo, leya.
Baame banya akali andete rema (300) dusipa lili pyuo lane rema ingyuo wasapala akali mendaki mendaki lao bikuli maiyuo dee warame wasisi ipwa penge dokona kendapuli yama koko palena lapala maiyuo piya.
Dopa pipala baame nakama lamaiyuo, Namba wambu palaminyi anda pinjingi wangu dusa paro dokopa namba kandaro karapala nambame piyu kande dopa pyuo pipwape, leya.
Nambape dee nambana lane dupwape namwana bikuli poo leyama kande dokopa Mitiane wambu pyuo paleyaminyi dokona awali lao pao nakamana bikuli poo lao pii poraiyuo lao lao, Namwa Kamongona dee namwa Gitionena lao lalapape, leya.
Yuu gii doko repeta andasukulya ingyala epeyamopa yanda singi kambu iso kareyaminyi dupwa alowa pyuo wakale karala epapeyaminyipa Gitioneme banya akali andete mendaki (100) dusipa komau anda paleyaminyi wangu dokona epo kando nyiyami. Kando nyepala nakamana bikuli dupwa poo lao dee warame wasisi ipwa penge minyuo kareyaminyi dupwa pyao yuunya piso poro lao piyami.
Dokopa dee lane lama dolapo dopako piyami. Pipala nakama peparaeme kendapuli dupwa kingi kyairename minyiyami dee rolaerename bikuli dupwa minyapala pii poraiyuo lao, Wua gela doko Kamongona dee Gitionena, leyami.
Dokopa wambu doloma komau anda paleyami yuu dokona awali lao akali dupwa karo pao suu leyami dokopa nakamana nyisu petenge Mitiane range yanda singi dupwa ala lao ralo bolambalo lao peyami.
Gitionena akali dupwa nakamana bikuli poo lao kareyami dokopa Kamongo dokome nyisu petenge wambu malu kareyami dupwa rangena wua gela dupwame mende pyapa pyapa pyuo pinya lao yulu piyamosa piyami. Nakama ralo makando pao yuu Saretane kata dokona pao yuu Betesita kando nyiyami. Nakama yuu taone Epolo Melola lenge yuu Tapate repeta singi dokona peyami.
Dokopa Napatalaina rara akalipi Asana rara akalipi dee Manasana rara akali peparaepe dupwa Gitioneme kee lapala nakamame Mitiane rara dupwa peta ralu pyao nembeyami.
Dokopa Gitioneme yuu kyau pyalya pyana pingi dupwana singi yuu Eporaime lenge dokona pii wai nembo lao, Nakama lupyuo epo Mitiane wambu dupwa pyala ipupwape. Mitiane wambu dupwa yalo pasaramiŋi lao ipwa Jotanepe dee ipwa kuki epengepe dupwana karo pao yuu Bete Bara dokona poraiyuo iso karalapape, leya. Leyamo dokopa Eporaime akali dupwa kee lao sukusa sukusa pipala ipwa Jotane dee ipwa kuki epenge dupwana karo pao yuu Bete Bara dokona poraiyuo kando iso kareyami.
Dokopa nakamame Mitiane akali mupwa lama mende Sipi lenge dee mende Orepe lenge minyarapala nyiyami. Dokona akali Orepe doko kana mende kingi Orepe lenge petenge dokona pyao kumakayami. Dee akali Sipi doko banya waene ipwange kingingi panda dokona pyao kumakayami. Nakamame Mitiane wambu dupwa mee peteta ralyuo pao dokopa akali Orepena ayemba pukusipi dee akali Sipinya ayemba pukusipi dolapo minyuo epo Gitione baa ipwa Jotane neta pyakaenge yuu dorena ingyuo kareyamo doko maiyami.
Dokopa Eporaime akali dupwame Gitione lamaiyuo, Embame Mitiane wambu pyala panya dokopa akipamo embame namwa langya naese? Akipamo embame namwa dopa pyuo piisi? Nakama dokona lao mona randame kumuo kamame wakasa imbuo leyami.
Dopa leyaminyipape baame isingi lao, Nambame mende piyunu doko nakambana piminyi dokopa kapa pyuo manda manja nalyamo. Nakama Eporaimena akali dupwame kamame kuki mende piminyi dupwame nambana akali rara peparaeme pimwa dupwa kuki koole ingyuo nyuo isa palyilyamo.
Kamongona porainya renge dokome nakamame akali Sipi dee Orepepe pyao kumakayami. Dokona nambame makande mende pyuo manda manja nayo, leya. Baame dopa leyamo dokopa nakambana imbu singi ama wakasa doko isa peya.
Yuu gii dokopaleko Gitionemoo banya akali andete rema (300) dusipa epapala ipwa Jotane doko yalo peyami. Nakama ama mako lopo piyamopape nakamana nyisu petenge dupwa peteta ralyuo pyaoko kareyami.
Nakama yuu Sakote dokona epeyaminyi dokopa baame yuu range akali dupwa lamaiyuo, Nambana akali dapwa ama mako lopome kumulyaminyi dokona nenge borete lapo maiyakalapa. Nambame Mitiane kiŋi Salemuna Sipapa peteta ralyuo pyala papilyu, leya.
Dopa leyamopape yuu Sakote dokona akali mupwa dupwame lao, Nakamame akali Salemunapa Sipapa minyarapala angi nyii nami. Dokona akipamo namwame embena yanda singi dupwa nenge maiyakaramase? leyami.
Dokopa Gitioneme lao, Kapaŋa. Kamongo dokome Salemuna Sipapa nyuo namba keta jera dokopa nambame yuu muiyane dokona nepereke isape ikyaikyape andenge dupwame nakama pyaro, leya.
Lapala Gitioneme yuu Penele dokona papala wambu dupwame banya yanda singi dupwa borete maiyakana leya. Leyamopape yuu Penele range wambu dupwame yuu Sakote range dupwame leyaminyi pii mendaki dokoko isingi leyami.
Leyaminyi dokona baame nakama isingi lamaiyuo, Mitiane wambu dupwame namba pyao kumaka naraminyipa mee lete kapu kyuo eparo. Epapala dokopa nambame nakamana anda londe doko pyao lalyaro, leya.
Dokopa akali Sipa Salemunapa nakambana yanda singi dupwa pipya yuu Kariko dokona kareyami. Yuu muiyane dokona akali palenge rara dupwana yanda singi taosande akalisa ipisu kingi paki (15,000) mee lete kareyami. Kareyaminyipape akali yanda singi ama soo kaeyo (120,000) pyao kumakayami.
Gitione baa yuu Nopa dee yuu Jokope dolapona neta potemenge dorena ingyuo yuu muiyane kipwa kipwa kata dokona peya. Papala yanda singi ami dupwa kamenge kareyaminyipa walu lao pyao minyaro nyiya.
Dokopa yuu Mitiane kiŋi akali lama Sipa Salemunapa dolapo ralo makando peyambi. Dopa pyuo peyambinyipape baame peteta papala nakamba minyaro nyiya. Dokona lao nakambana yanda singi dupwa peparae ama pakame kumuo kareyami.
Gitione baa yanda pyuo karo kamba kapu kyuo kata Etese rambu rambu dokona epapala dokopa
yuu Sakote range akali parange mende minyaro nyepala baa yuu Sakote dokona api mupwa ingyuo karamo lao piso siya. Dokopa akali parange dokome yuu Sakote dokona akali mupwa isingi dupwa akalisa yanda ipingi dee ipisu yanda ipingiko nyepo dusipana kingi pepana pyao retakamipala Gitione maiya.
Dokopa Gitione baame yuu Sakote dokona akali dupwa kando lamaiyuo, Namba nakamame nyisa narama lao kamba leyaminyi dokona lao suu pyalapape. Nambame akali Salemuna Sipapa waiya lao minyaro nyii nalene lapala nakamame nambana yanda singi dupwa makame kumuo lopo epeyami dupwa nenge maiya narama ingilyamo leyami kande. Kapaŋa. Akali dolapo dae karambiny leya.
Lapala dokopa enakana baame yuu muiyane dokona nepereke ikyaikyape lapo nyepala dupwame minyuo yuu Sakote dokona akali mupwa dupwa randa maiyuo piya.
Baameko yuu Penele dokona anda londe mende pisi karenge doko pyao lalyiya. Lalyapala taone dokona akali dupwa pyao kumakayami.
Enakana Gitioneme Sipa Salemunapa piso soo, Nakambame yuu Tapo dokona akali pyao kumakayambi dupwa lenge kambu apyakalese? leya. Dokopa nakambame isingi lao, Akali dupwa embena lenge kambu nyingi. Dee peparae nakama kiŋinya ikinyingi yale, leyambi.
Dokopa Gitioneme lao, Nakama nambana yangonge. Namba rangena endangi dokome mandenge. Namba laokondali pyuo lalu lao leto. Nakambame akali dupwa pyao kumaka nayambili doko nambame nakamba pyao kuma napuli, leya.
Lapala baame banya wane ikinyingi mupwa Jeta lenge doko lamaiyuo, Nakamba pyao kumakana leya. Dopa leyamopape wane dokome banya wua gela doko nyisa nyii naya. Baa wane kuki iki doŋo lao suu pyapala rakangeme pinya leyamo doko sepala waiya lao pii naya.
Dokopa akali Sipa Salemunapame Gitione lamaiyuo, Akalinya yulu doko akali baa rangemeko pingiŋi dokona emba rangeme nambwa pyao kumakana leyambi. Dokona lao Gitioneme nakamba pyao kumakapala dokopa mena kamele dolapona mange dokona kalya pingi bange singi dupwa roko nyiya.
Dokopa enakana Isaraele wambu dupwame Gitione lamaiyuo, Embame Mitiane wambu dupwa keta namwa kiiramo nyipi dokona namwana akali mupwa ingyuo karalase. Enakana embena para pyasi wambu dupwame namwana akali mupwako ingyuo karo parami, leyami.
Dokopa Gitioneme isingi lao, Namba nakamana mupwa ingyuo kara naro dee nambana ikinyingi dokona mendepe mupwa ingyuo kara narami. Kamongo dokome mupwa ingyuo nakama iso karara, leya.
Lapala baame lao, Nambame pii mende nakama keta piso serowale. Doko nakamame wambu pyapala kalena palyingi bange uriŋi nyiyaminyi dupwa namba jepape, leya. Mitiane wambu dupwa Isimaelena rara dokona karenge dupwa nakambana kalena uriŋi palyingi.
Leyamo dokopa wambu dupwame isingi lao, Namwame dupwa rae maiyuo emba jerama, leyami. Lapala komau mende yuu dokona pee lao kwuapala nakamame kalena uriŋi nyiyaminyi dupwa reteyami.
Golome wasisi kalena uriŋi Gitioneme nyiyamo dupwa kilokerame akalisa lama ingiya. Dee Mitiane kiŋi dupwana molape kalya pingi bangepe komau muku lapo wapungi dupwape mena kamele mange dokona kalya pingi dupwape opetae nyepala uriŋi role pyao makande pyuo sikyali pii nayami.
Gitioneme golo dupwame anatuŋu lao mende wasapala banya yuu range taone Opera lenge dokona pisiya. Isaraele wambu peparae Anatu angi doko kame sepala bangeme wasisi anatuŋu lao lakandala peyami. Dopa piyamo dokona Gitione baa dee banya ree palu wambu dupwa pipya konena nyuo pyamalyiyasa piya.
Isaraele dupwame Mitiane wambu pipya pyao wini pipala dee dokona pako kara nayami. Yuu doko ee kana akalisa kisima mee manda rao siyamopa palyuo karo pao Gitione baa kumuya.
Gitione baa banya rangena yuu dokona kapu kyuo papala palyuo kareya.
Baa enda malu nyiyamo dokome wane akalisa yanda ipingi nyepo (70) mandeya.
Dee yuu Sikeme dokona baame enda mende nyiya dokome wane ane mende mandeya. Doko Gitioneme banya kingi Apimaleke leya.
Dokopa Gitione akali Joasena ikinyingi doko baa alemo ingyuo kaepala kumuyamopa akali Apiasena rara dokona yuu taone Opera dokona rakange Joasena malu karenge dokona baa malu piyami.
Gitione baa kumapeyamo dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwa dee kamba Anatu yaki nyepala nakamame mee bange anatu kingi Bealo lenge dupwa lakandeyami. Lakando nakamame nakamana mee bange anatu Bealo Bereti lenge doko waso nakamana anatuŋu lao lakandeyami.
Dopa pipala nakamana nyisu petenge dupwame pyalana awali lao kareyaminyi dokopa nakamana Kamongo Anatumi nakama nyiso kyawa lete nyiyamo dokona yulu pyakamyuo lakanda nayami.
Gitioneme Isaraele wambunya lao yulu keyange piyamopape Isaraele wambu dupwa Gitionena ree palu kando nyiso rae maiyuo pii nayami.
Akali Gitionena ikinyingi Apimaleke lenge doko banya endanginya wambu ree palu dupwa palenge yuu taone Sikeme lenge dokona peya. Papala nakama lamaiyuo lao,
Yuu Sikeme akali dupwa anjuku nakamame rae mailyamisi? lao piso sinya leya. Doko akali Gitionena ikinyingi akalisa yanda ipingi nyepo dusipa peparaeme gapomane ingyuo nakama iso kararamisi panda dee akali mendaki mendeme pirase? lao piso sinya leya. Apimaleke doko nakamana yongo ranjamape mendaki doko nakama suu pyalapape, leya.
Dokopa banya endanginya wambu ree palu dupwame pii dokona banya lao yuu Sikeme akali dupwa lamaiyakamiyami. Dokopa akali yuu Sikeme range dupwame suu pyapala Apimaleke baa namwana ree paluŋu lao letamo dokome moko minyuo pirama, leyami.
Lapala nakamame kana kulingi akalisa yanda ipingi nyepo mee bange anatuŋu lao kingi Bealo Beriti lenge dokona tembole andana nyepala maiyami. Maiyaminyi kana dokome akali koo pyuo kapa ingyuo kara nange lapo baa role epena lao kana reto sukusa ropo pyao nyiya.
Nyepala baa rakangena anda yuu Opera dokona papala kana mendena ketae dokona Gitionena ikinyingi banya yangonge akalisa yanda ipingi dusipa pyao kumakaya. Dopa piyamopape wane Joteme Gitionena ikinyingi kamame enakana doko baa ralo pao yalu piyasa Apimaleke baame pyao kumaka naya.
Dokopa Sikeme wambu peparaepe dee yuu Betemilo rangepe dupwa opetaeko Sikeme dokona isa oke poo pyasi mende karenge dokona papala akali Apimaleke baa nakamana kiŋi inginya lao leyami.
Leyaminyipa Jotememe pii doko sepala baa yuu kyau Gerisimi lenge dokona ketae pulyuo papala wambu peparae kando pii ketae palyuo lao, Nakama yuu Sikeme akali dupwa nambana pii selapape. Dopa pirami ramo Anatumi nakamana pii larami doko sakarako rapisi.
Yuu mendepa isa dupwa nyuo pyaso karo nakama rangena kiŋi mende rombo palyelana leyami. Nakamame olipi isa doko kando lao, Emba namwana kiŋi ingyape, leyami.
Doko olipi isa dokome isingi lao, Nambana jingi lyepala mamba wele kingapala wambunya kingipi bange anatuŋu lenge dupwana kingipi minyalyingi. Nambame nakama iso yulu piru ramo dee jingi lyii narosa pira ingilyamo, leya.
Dopa leyamo dokopa isa dupwame piki isa doko kando lao, Emba epo namwana kiŋi ingyape, leyami.
Leyaminyi dokopa piki isa dokome isingi lao, Nambame nakama iso rapu piru ramo dokopa nambana jingi rende pingi doko yaki nyuo lyii nasaro, leya.
Dopa leyamosa isa dupwame girapo isa doko lamaiyuo lao, Emba epo namwana kiŋi ingyape, leyami.
Leyaminyipape girapo isa dokome isingi lao, Nambana waene ipwange doko nyepala mee bange anatupi dee wambu dupwape rae mainyi pyambungi doko namba nakama iso rapu piru ramo doko dee jingi lyii nasaro, leya.
Dokona lao isa dupwa peparae nepereke isa doko lamaiyuo lao, Emba epo namwana kiŋi ingyalase, leyami.
Leyaminyi dokopa nepereke dokome isingi lao, Nakamame namba angingyuo nakamana kiŋi wasalana suu pyarami ramo doko nambana wangya isarena dokona nakama epo rau lao pisi ipupwape. Dopa pii narami ramo doko nambana isa kuki reke reke dupwana isare potemapala isa sita yuu Lepanone dokona karenge dupwa rara, leya.
Dokopa Jotememe deeko lao, Nakamame akali Apimaleke kiŋi karena leyaminyi dokopa angi kinyi angingyuo suu pyapala leyamisi? leya. Gitione baame yulu keyange pyakayamo dokona nakamame Gitionena lao poraiyuo suu pyao dee banya wambu ree palu dupwa kandokondali pyuo rapu pyuo piyamisi? leya.
Nambana rakaneme nakamana lao yanda pyakaya kande. Mitiane wambu pipya nakama kyawa lete nyipuli lao piyasa baa randa neya.
Dopa piyamopape epapu nakamame nambana rakanena ree palu dupwa mata maiyakapala kana mendaki dokona banya ikinyingi akalisa yanda ipingi nyepo dusipa pyao kumakapala dee banya ikinyingi Apimaleke lenge Gitione banya kendemande wanake dokome mandeya doko nakamana ree palu dokome nakamame baa yuu Sikeme kiŋi ingyuo wasiyami, leya.
Epapu nakamame Gitionepa banya ree palu dupwa ketape yulu pyuo kinyi angingyuo rolae piyami kande doko nakama Apimaleke kando rae maiyuo kararami. Dee baame nakama kando rae maiyuoko karena.
Dopa pii narami ramo doko isare uliyapu doko Apimaleke keta epapala Sikeme akali dupwape Betemilo akali dupwape rao pinya. Yuu Sikeme akali dupwa ketape dee Betemilo akali dupwa ketape isare uliyapu epapala Apimaleke rena.
Dokopa banya yangonge Apimaleke doko pakapala Joteme baa ralo pao yuu Biya dokona palya peya.
Dokopa Apimaleke baame ee kana rema Isaraele wambu dupwa iso rapu pyuo kareya.












































































































Isaraele wambu dupwame Kamongo kando kamba lao yulu kooko pyuo kareyamisa baame Pilisitia wambu dupwame Isaraele wambu dupwa ee kana akalisa kisima iso karena lao yaki nyiya.
Dokopa akali mende kingi Manoa lenge yuu taone Jora range dokona kareya. Baa akali Dane lengende kareya dokona rara. Manoa banya etenge doko wane manji nao mee ingi poraiyuo petenge.
Dokopa Anatunya aŋala mende baa peteyamo dokona epapala lamaiya. Emba wane manji nao mee petenge kandale doko epapu emba repeta wane rombanda ingyaramopa wane ane manjiri, lamaiya.
Emba sepe. Ipwa waene biyape panda nenge koope dupwana mende naa napipi.
Dee dopa pyuo emba wane rombanda ingyaramopa wane ane manjiri doko embame wane banya kyawasi doko pyake pakami nare. Wane baa banya mandenge yuu gii eparamo dokopa baa Nasaraite ingyuo karo baa rangeme Anatu mona peparae maira. Wane baame kanda soo yulu piramo doko Pilisitia wambu dupwame Isaraele wambu dupwa randa maiyuo karaminyi dokona Isaraele wambu dupwa rekya lao nyera, leya.
Enakana enda baa anda pao akalingi lamaiyuo, Anatunya akali mende namba pisipu dokona ipya. Ipyamo dokopa banya lenge kambu doko Anatunya aŋala dopale ingyapyamosa namba paka pipya. Dokopa nambame yuu anja karo ipya lao piso see napu. Dee aŋala banya kingi namba langi napyako, leya.
Dopa pipyamopape akali baame namba langyuo, Embena rombanda wane paliramopa wane ane manjiri, lapya. Baame namba langyuo, Ipwa waenepe ipwa ama porai dupwape nenge koope dupwa naa nao pepe. Doko wane baa range peparae Anatu maira. Baa kararamo yuu gii dusipana Nasaraite akali ingyuo karara, lapya, leya.
Dokopa Manoame Anatu lao ateŋa leya. O Kamongo, embena akali pena lapipya doko dee kamba namba keta epena. Epapala dokome nambwa langyuo, Wane angi manjipala dokopa dopa pilapape lao langinya, leya.
Anatumi Manoa piso soo leyamuli pyuo piya. Banya aŋala dee kamba kapu kyuo enda baa ee dokona peteyamo dokona epeya. Dokopa enda banya akalingi role pyao ee dokona kara nayambi.
Dokopa enda baa makando akalingi lamaiyala peya. Akali wamba namba pii langiya kande doko epapu dee epamo, lamaiya.
Dokopa Manoa sipurapala etenge peyamo dokona peya. Pao aŋala kareyamo dokona papala baa piso soo, Emba akali wamba nambana enda doko kando pii lami dokose? leya. Dokopa aŋala baame, Kinyi letene dokoŋo, lamaiya.
Enakana akali Manoa baame leya, Epapu dee emba letene doko angi pyaka seramo dokopa wane baa apa pirase? lao piso siya. Dee baa aki yulu pirase? lao piso siya.
Kamongona aŋala baame Manoa lamaiyuo, Embena enda doko yulu peparae nambame lamaipunyili pyuo pyuokondali pinya leya.
Enda baa isa girapo jingipi ipwa waenepe biyape nenge koope dupwa naa nao baa yulu peparae namba lapunyili pyuo pinya leya.
Dokopa baa Kamongona aŋala lao soo gisa napala Manoa baame aŋala doko lamaiyuo, Emba paa napipi. Namwame emba mena meme kumambona doko pyao yangakamanale, lamaiya. Dokopa aŋala baame Manoa isingi lamaiyuo lao, Namba dae pisipuli doko embena nenge doko namba naa napuli. Emba rapa rapa pipuli lao suu pii kande doko Kamongo keta pyao kiso mairi, leya.
<range>
Dokopa Manoa baame aŋala doko lamaiyuo, Embena kingi doko nambwa langi. Dokopa nambwame embena pii lao langipi doko kinyi angilyamo lao sepala nambwame embena kingi ketae nembo lakandaramba, leya.
Aŋala baame Manoa piso soo lamaiya, Akipamo embame nambana kingi api lao piso silisi? Nambana kingi dokona lao wambu dupwa yamarangyuo poraiyuo suu pingi.
Doko sepala Manoame mena meme kumambona doko nyepala dee nenge witi jingi lapo nyuo lanyuo papala kana pyare lasi dokona Kamongo yulu wambumi pii nange dupwa pingi doko keta kiso maiya.
Dokopa isare kyau ulingi kana pyare lasi dokona piso yake dokona peyamo dokopa Manoa etengepa kandeyambinyipa Kamongona aŋala role pyapeta peyamo doko kandapala nakambana lenge kambu yuu kandapala mukumbalu siyambi.
Manoa etengepa dee aŋala doko kanda nayambi. Dokopa Manoa baa akali doko angi Kamongona aŋalalyamo lao siya.
Manoame etenge kamba lamaiyuo, Anatu kanda nange doko kandalyambano dokona nambwa kumarambana pilyape? leya.
Dokopa etengeme isingi lao, Kamongome nambwa pyalana pili doko baame nambwana mena yangambwa doko kando rae mai napyali. Rae mai napala nambwa lasaka pyuo dee pii angi langyuo pilamo kandapi doko pii napyali, leya.
Enda baa wane nyaŋa mandeya. Wane banya kingi Samasone leyambi. Wane baa andeyamo dokopa Anatumi baa elyape keta pisiya.
Baa yuu Jora dee Esataolepana kanya dokona akali Danena rara wambu paleyaminyi dokona kareyamo dokopa Kamongona Imambu dokome baa kanda soo arombanyi nembeya.
Samasone yuu Timina dokona lano peyamo dokopa Pilisitia wanake mende kareyamo kandeya.
Kandapala wane dokome anda papala rakange endangipa lamaiyuo, Namba Pilisitia wanake mende kandapu doko nambana etenge ingyara nyakarambi, lamaiya.
Dokopa banya rakange endangipame lamaiyuo, Wane emba apa pipyasa pao Pilisitia wambu rara wakale mona kapu kyaa nange dokona enda doko nyelana letese? Emba wanake lapo embena rangena ree palupi dee namwana rara dokonape kanda nalese? leyambi. Dokopa Samasone baame rakange lamaiyuo, Namba wanake doko kando rae mailyu. Embame wanake dokoko nyakare, leya.
Banya rakange endangipa nakamba Kamongome Samasone baa rapu piya dokome dopa pinya leyamo doko soo gisa nayambi. Kamongome Pilisitia wambu dupwa pyaraŋa lao suu piya. Yuu gii dokopa Pilisitia wambu dupwame Isaraele wambu dupwa iso kareyami.
Samasone banya rakange endangipa role pyao yuu Timina dokona peyami. Papala nakama isa girapo ee dokona sukusa peyaminyi dokopa yuu dokona mena laene mendeme Samasone baa kando gasimwa poko baa nalana epeya.
Dopa piyamopape Anatunya Imambu dokome Samasone baa porainyi pyambuyamopa baame mena laene doko kingimi minyuo kumuya. Mee wambumi mena meme ikyane minyuo kumungi dopale ingyuo piya. Dokopa Samasone baame dopa pelono lao rakange endangipa lamai naya.
Enakana Samasone baame pao wanake doko kando pii lamaiya. Lamaipala baame wanake doko kando rae wakasa maiya.
Dokopa yuu gii kuki lama epo papeyamopa Samasone baame wanake doko nyelana suu pyapala peya. Peyamo kata angi doko yaki nyepala mena laene piyamo kumasi doko kandala peya. Papala dokopa amburali ama malu epo kapo karo mena laene yongo kumasi koko dokona lyiyamo kandeya.
Kandapala Samasone baame kingi pyambwapala amburali lyuo nyiya. Nyepala baa kata pao dokopa nama peya. Pao banya rakange endangipa kando nyepala lapo maiyamo neyambi. Dokopa Samasone baame mena laene yanenge kumasi dokona amburali kapa lyipu lao endangi rakangepa lamai naya.
Samasone banya rakange baa wanake dokona anda peyamo dokopa wane wanyane dupwame pinginyili pyuo Samasone baame yuu dokona nenge andake rapa rapa piya.
Dokopa Pilisitia wambu dupwame baa kandapala nakamana parange akali akalisa rema dusipa baamoo pipya role pyao karena lao lanyuo epo kareyami.
Dokopa Samasone baame nakama lamaiyuo leya. Nambame nakama kando pii lapo piso serowale. Enda nyuo nenge nenge yuu gii yanda ipingi nyepo dusipa ene epapa naramopa nakamame pii doko kapa polo larami ramo nambame komau ama porai akalisa rema dee komau peparae wapungi akalisa rema jero. Dee nakamame rolae langi narami ramo doko namba komau ama porai akalisa rema dee komau peparae wapungi akalisa rema jerami, leya. Dokopa nakamame baa kando leyami. Embena pii piso singi angi doko namwa semanale laa, leyami.
<range>
Dokopa Samasone baame nakama lamaiya. Nenge malu nenge dokona ingi dokona nenge sipurao neta epeya. Porai mende keta rende pingi epeya, leya. Yuu gii rema peyamopape wambu dupwame pii doko akinde lao lamailana saka nayami.
Yuu gii kisima dokopa nakamame Samasone banya etenge lamaiyuo, Embena akalinyi kando panga soo pii Samasoneme lapya doko embame piso sepala namwa embame renge angi doko langinya. Embame namwa langi nare ramo doko namwame embena rakanena anda doko yangarama dokopa emba opetae rare. Namwana bange dupwa mee waa nyerama lao namwa kee lao ipupwa lamisi? leyami.
Dokopa Samasonena etenge baame ee lao pao akalingi lamaiya. Embame namba mona reta nalene lao masilyu. Embame namba awa nalene lao suu pilyu. Embame nambana wambu dupwa kando pii piso singi lapo piso sipipya dupwana namba renge angi doko langi nalene, lamaiya. Dokopa Samasone baame etenge doko lamaiyuo, Nambana rakane anyipi dolapo polo lamai napunu dokona dee emba akipamo langirusi? leya.
Dokopa enda baa akalinginya lenge kambu dokona eeko lao yuu gii yanda ipingi nenge malu palyuo nao peteyaminyi dokopa peteya. Dee yuu gii yanda ipingi lumwa dokopa baame kaeya nao eeko leyasa Samasone baame etenge angi polo lamaiya. Dokopa enda baame pii renge sepala banya wambu dupwa polo lamaiya.
Lamaiyamo yuu gii dokopa akali yuu dokona range dupwame neta anda panya piyamopa Samasone lamaiyuo, Aki mende amburali ipwange rende pingi dopalese? Dee aki mende ama porai wakasa mena laene dopalese? lao Samasoneme wamba piso siyamo dokona isingi lamaiyami. Dokopa Samasone baame isingi lao, Nakamame nambana etenge doko isa pii lamaiyaka namili doko pii renge lamai napuli. Dee nakama soo laa namili, lamaiya.
Lamaiyamo dokopa Kamongona Imambu dokome Samasone baa porainyi pyambuya. Pyambuyamo dokopa baa yuu Asekelone dokona lano papala akali akalisa rema pyao kumakaya. Kumakapala nakamana komau keyange dupwa roko nyepala akali wambo banya pii leyamo dokona yano pyao leyami dupwa maiya. Maipala Samasone baa imbumi kumuo yuu doko yaki nyuo kaepala kapu kyuo rakangena anda peya.
Peyamo dokopa banya etenge doko nyepala akali mende Samasonepa wamba role pyao puu minyuo kareyambi doko maiyami.
Enakana yuu gii lapo epo papeyamopa witi jingi kanda soo lyuo nyingi dokopa Samasone baa etenge peteyamo dokona mena meme ikyane lanyuo etenge kandala peya. Papala enda banya palenge panda dokona panya lao suu piya. Dokopa enda dokona rakange dokome baa kapa paa nara daa, leya.
Lapala baame Samasone lamaiyuo, Nambame emba enda doko kinyi kinyi awa nalene lao suu piyu. Suu pyapala enda baa embena puu minyingi akali baa nyinya lao maiyu. Dokona suu pyao emba epapu banya kakingi kuki baa mapwae au pingi keyange petamo doko nyelase, lamaiya.
Samasoneme lamaiyuo, Dakepa nambame kapa pyuo Pilisitia wambu dupwa kando randa mende mairu, leya.
Dopa lapala Samasone baa papala yana suwa kararope andete rema (300) nyuo malu palyiya. Palyapala lama larapu nyepala kanya dokona kendapuli palyarapu kunali dolapome puu piya.
Enakana Samasone baame kendapuli dokona isare kainyi palyapala yana suwa kararope dupwa Pilisitia wambunya witi jingi ee andake dokona nembeya. Nembeyamo dokopa papala Pilisitia wambunya witi jingi lyingi dee witi singi pyake pasi dupwape isa olipi lenge ee dokona karenge dupwape ama peparae rao oteya.
Enakana Pilisitia wambu dupwame ee doko kandapala lao, Apimi pipyase? lao piso siyami. Dokopa Samasone Timina akalinya imwange dokome pipyalyamo. Banya etenge doko rakangeme nyepala akali wakale maipya dokona imbwuapala pipyalyamo, leyambinyi siyami. Sepala Pilisitia wambu dupwame epapala enda dokopa banya rakangepa dee banya andape isare palyuo kisiyami.
Dokopa Samasoneme lao, Dopa piminyi dokona nambame kinyi kinyi leto. Nakama kando isingi kooko piru. Pipala namba yaki nyuo puu pao paro, leya.
Lapala Samasone baame Pilisitia akali dupwa pipya yanda pimwaiyapala akali ama malu baame pyao kumakaya. Enakana yuu Etame lenge dokona kananda mende karenge dokona pao palu karo piya.
Pilisitia wambu dupwa nakama epo yuu Juta dokona komau anda pyuo palyuo kareyami. Karo dokopa yuu taone Liya dokona papala wambu dupwa pyao bange dupwa minyarambu nyuo piyami.
Dokopa Juta akali dupwame Pilisitia akali dupwa piso soo leyami. Akipamo nakamame namwa pyao ralinyi nembo namwana yuu doko nyakalyamisi? leyami. Dokopa nakamame isingi lamaiyuo, Namwame Samasone baa puu maiyuo retalena epelyamano. Baame namwa kando piyamuli pyuo baa isingi pyarama, leyami.
Doko sepala Juta range akali taosande rema (3,000) nakama yuu Etame lenge kananda karenge Samasone baa palu kareyamo dokona papala Samasone kando dopa lamaiyami. Pilisitia wambu dupwame namwa iso karaminyi doko emba see nalese? Embame aki mende piinyisa namwa keta randa dake epelyase? leyami. Dokopa baame isingi lamaiyuo, Nakamame namba dopa piyamiŋi dokona nambame nakama dopako piyu, leya.
Nakamame baa lamaiyuo, Namwame dae epo emba puu pyao nyepala Pilisitia wambu dupwa maiyalena epamano, leyami. Dokopa Samasoneme nakama lamaiyuo, Nakama rangeme namba pyaa narama lao kinyi kinyi langilapa, leya.
Dokopa nakamame baa lamaiyuo, Daa, pyaa narama. Namwame emba mee puu pyao nyepala Pilisitia wambu dupwa keta mairama, leyami. Lapala nakamame puu enenge lamame pakapala Samasone baa puu pyapala lanyuo kananda yaki nyuo epeyami.
Baa yuu Liya dokona epeyamo dokopa Pilisitia wambu dupwame pii poraiyuo lao kando nyela epeyami. Dokopa Kamongona Imambu dokome baa porainyi pyambuyamopa banya kingi dokona puu piyaminyi dupwa isareme rasi ingyuo roko isa peya.
Dokopa baame mena dongena angapu kuli kyaka kenda pingi doko kandapala kingi pyambwapala minyalyuo nyiya. Nyepala dokome wambu taosande mendaki (1,000) pyao kumakaya.
Dopa pyuo pyapala Samasone baame kenane pyao rae maiyuo dopa leya. Dongena angapu kuli dokome minyuo akali taosande mendaki dupwa pyao kumakapu. Dongena angapu kuli dokome akali malu konda konda pyuo pyao malu palyapu, leya.
Pii lao otapala dokopa Samasone baame mena dongena angapu kuli doko pyao nembeya. Nembeyamo yuu angi pao siyamo doko Angapu Kuli Kyau, leyami.
Samasone baa ipwa nano wakasa piyasa baame Kamongo Anatu piso soo leya. Embame namba yulu andake dake jipinyipa wambu malu pyao karapunupape epapu ipwa nano dokome namba kumaro ingilyase? Dee rara wakale Pilisitia wambu Anatu suu pyaa nange dupwame nyuo puu maiyuo nyeramisi? leya.
Dokopa Anatumi yuu ipwa epa nange dokona kapa ipwa epena leyamopa yuu Liya dokona ipwa guu lao epeya. Dokopa Samasone baa ipwa doko neya. Neyamo dokopa banya porainya renge dee epo paleya. Dokona lao ipwa kingi doko Akali Kyakale Leyamo Dokona Ipwa Guu Lenge, leyami. Ipwa doko dakepa yuu Liya dokona epo karamo.
Samasone baa ee kana akalisa lama dusipana Isaraele wambunya lita akali ingyuo kareya. Kareyamopa Pilisitia wambu dupwame Isaraele yuu dokona iso kareyami.
Samasone baa dokona karo yuu Gasa dokona pao enda pamuku mende kando nyepala enda dokopa role pyao paleyambi.
Dokopa yuu Gasa range wambu dupwame Samasone baa epo kareyamo doko kandeyami. Kandapala nakama yuu dokona pao karo awali lapala baa paramo lao kukwa dokopa yuu taone andake kame kambu dokona iso kareyami. Doko yuu gii kukwa dokopa nakama elya kalo karo yuu yangaramo dokopa baa neta eparamo pyamanale lao suu pyao kareyami.
Samasone baa palyuo soo pao andasukulya ingiya. Dokopa sipurapala taone andake dokona kame kambu dowa doko minyuo romo pyuo lalyepala pote isa dusipape dee kambu kii paleta nyuo banya lange dokona reteya. Retapala yuu kyau mende Eperone kandanyi peyo karenge dokona pulyuo soo papala kando kareya.
Enakana dokopa Samasoneme enda Delaela lenge yuu Soreke pau lama lama dokona palenge doko kando ama mona wakasa reteya.
Dokopa Pilisitia akali kamongo kingi paki nakama enda doko kareyamo dokona papala lamaiyami. Embame akali doko kando kyatepa pyuo baa ama wakasa porailyamo doko renge akipi lao sepe leyami. Namwame apa pyuo banya porailyamo renge doko nyuo anamo pirama lao sepe. Baa namwa pyaa nana lao puu maipi, leyami. Dopa pirinyi dokopa namwame mendaki mendaki lao kana kulingi taosande mendaki ipisu andete mendaki (1,100) dupwa jerama, leyami.
Doko sepala Delaela baame Samasone piso soo, Emba ama wakasa porailini renge doko langipi. Wambu lapome emba puu maiyuo emba poraiya nalase lao pirami doko apa pyuo piramisi? lao pisiya.
Samasone baame isingi lamaiyuo leya. Nakamame namba yanda imbu kyaka yanda ipingi dusipame puu mairami ramo dokopa namba poraiya naro. Ama pyuku lasi akali menge dopale ingyaro, lamaiya.
Dokopa Pilisitia akali kamongo lapome yanda imbu kyaka yanda ipingi nyepa minyuo epo enda Delaela doko maiyaminyipa dusipame enda baame Samasone puu maiya.
Enda baame akali dupwana lapo iso anda luu palenge donge mendena yalu pyuo petena leyamo dupwa simili lao enda baame pii poraiyuo leya. Samasone, Pilisitia dupwa epelyaminyi, lamaiya. Dokopa yanda imbu puu maiyamo doko isareme rao rokonge dopale ingyuo waiya lao rokoya. Dokopa nakamame baa yalu pyuo nyisapyamopa porailyamo renge doko aki lao soo gisa nayami.
Delaelame Samasone kambako lamaiyuo, See, embame namba kando mee male lao kyambo langilini. Doko kaepala wambu lapome emba apa pyuo puu mairamisi dokona lao namba angi rolae langipi, leya.
Dokopa Samasoneme enda doko dee lamaiyuo, Nakamame puu enenge wambo mende pii nangendeme namba puu mairami ramo doko namba kapa poraiya nao ama pyuku lasi wambu menge dopale ingyaro, lamaiya.
Doko sepala Delaela baame puu ama enenge lapo nyepala dokome Samasone baa puu maiya. Maipala enda baame pii poraiyuo lao, Samasone, Pilisitia wambu dupwa epelyaminyi, leya. Doko akali lapo anda donge pakirena iso yalu pyuo kareyami dupwa simili lao leyamo dokopa Samasoneme puu banya kingi dokona piyamo doko minyuo rokoyamopa mee isa peya. Puu enenge doko rokoyamo dokopa puu doko nyuu puu kuki dopale ingyuo rokoya.
Delaelame Samasone kando leya. Embame yuu peparae male lao namba kyambo langyuo karene. Doko kaepala namba langyuo, Wambu lapome emba apa pyuo puu mairami lao langipi, leya. Dokopa Samasone baame enda doko lamaiyuo, Masini dokome komau waso puu isa palyuo ketae palyuo pingi kandale. Masini dokona nambana kyawasi wanyama yanda ipingi nyepo dusipame isa palyuo ketae palyuo pipala pyao gii lao piri ramo dokopa namba ama poraiya nao pyuku lasi akali menge dopale ingyaro, lamaiya.
Delaela baame elya kalo pii isa isa lao anjiki pyuo pisipala Samasone nyuo luu palyiya. Palyapala baa luu paleyamo dokopa banya kyawasi wanyama yanda ipingi nyepo dusipame masini dokona isa palyuo ketae palyuo pipala pyao gii lao piya. Pipala dee pii poraiyuo lao, Samasone, Pilisitia wambu dupwa epelyaminyi, leya. Leyamo dokopa Samasone lenge rao roya pisipala banya kyawasi dusipa range mee ipyuo nyiya.
Dokopa enda dokome baa lamaiyuo, Akipamo embame namba mona retelyo letese? Angi kinyi mona reta nalene. Embame yuu gii rema namba kando mee male male lao kyambo langyuo minyoko pipi. Dee emba ama porailini renge doko namba langi nalene, leya.
Lapala enda baame yuu peparae poraiyuo kaeyo piso siyamosa akali baame pii doko soo makapala kumarolyamo lao suu piya.
Suu pyapala dokopa Samasone baame angi renge rolae enda baa polo lamaiya. Namba porailyu doko nambana kyawasi doko pyakepa nange dokome pilyu. Dee yuu gii mandeyamo dokopa namba Anatu lao rombo palyuo Nasaraite akali ingyuo karara, aŋalame leya. Dokona nambana kyawasi doko pyake pyara ramo dokopa nambana porai doko pao otapala namba kapa poraiya naro. Namba dokopa ama pyuku lasi akali menge karaminyi dopale ingyaro, lamaiya.
Dokopa Delaelame ama kinyi Samasone baame langilyamo lao soo nyepala baa rae maiyuo Pilisitia kamongo akali dupwa keta pii waili nembeya. Nakama yuu gii mende kamba epena lao lamaiya. Akali baame epapu angi kinyi doko namba langipya, lamaiya. Lamaiyamo dokopa Pilisitia akali dupwame sepala nakamana kana dupwa minyuo epeyami.
Enda dokome pii anjiki pyuo isa isa lao Samasone nyuo enda banya pai dokona kyawa pyare lao nyuo luu palyiya. Luu paleyamo dokopa enda baame akali mende epena leya. Akali dokome epapala Samasonena kyawasi wanyama yanda ipingi nyepo dusipa pyake panyi nembeya. Nembeyamopa enda baame makande pyuo Samasone pyalereyamo dokopa baa ama poraiya naya. Banya porainya renge pao oteya.
Enda baame pii ama ketae palyuo lao, Samasone, Pilisitia dupwa epelyaminyi, leya. Dokopa Samasone baa roya pisipala namba panju pingi doko suu pyao mee parolyamo lao suu piya. Doko Kamongome baa kyawa yaki nyiyamo doko see naya.
Dokopa Pilisitia akali dupwame baa minyarapala nyiyami. Nyepala banya lenge dolapo lukunyi nembeyami. Nembapala nakamame baa lanyuo yuu Gasa dokona lanyuo peyami. Papala puu sane lapome kingi kimbupi dokona puu piyami. Samasone baa yulu pinya lao kana andake lapome nenge witi jingi dupwa lukuo dee pyao inju palawa inginya lao pingi dokona pyuo karapusi anda paleya.
Dokopa Samasone banya kyawasi doko kamba dee epanya kanda soo epeya.
Pilisitia kamongo akali dupwa nakama epo malu palyapala nenge keyange dupwa nyuo nakamana anatu lao isa kanape lapome wasapala dokona nenge kuiyuo maiyuo loma soo rae maiyuo lakandeyami. Dokona kingi Dakone lenge doko lakando nakamame kenane pyao nambana anatu dokome nyiso jipyamopa namwana yanda pimwai Samasone baa nyilyamano lao rae maiyami.
Dee wambu dupwame rae maiyuo kenane pyao nakamana anatu doko kingi lakando lao, Namwana anatu dokome emboneme jipyamopa namwana yanda pimwai wamba namwana yuu andape pyao kwaeyanyi nembo dee namwana akali malu pyao kumako piya kande doko nyuo anamasi minyilyamano, leyami. Lao nakamana monarename range ama rae maiyuo leyami. Samasone baa kyakale lao epena lapala namwame baa kando ikitokondo male lao baa kando lamanale, leyami. Lapala dee nakamame Samasone karapusi anda paleyamo doko epena lao nyuo lanyuo neta epeyami. Epapala nakamame baa kando male lao giyalya giyana pyuo dokopa anda dokona pote isa londe lama ralipi kareyamo dokona baa kanya karena leyami.
<range>
Dokopa Samasoneme wane kuki mendeme baa nyiso kii minyuo kata lasaka pyuo papiyamo doko lamaiyuo, Embame nambana kingi doko nyuo pote isa repeta ralipi karamo dokona namba minyuo pao angi dokona minyasakana. Nambame isa dolapo minyaro karapuli, leya.
Anda dokona kamongo akali kingi paki dusipa dee enda akalipi taosande rema (3,000) epo anda yangi dupwana ama kete pyao Samasone baa isa karo baa kando ikitokondo giyalya giyana pyuo lao peteyami.
Dee Samasoneme dokopa ateŋa lao, Kamongo Andake Mupwa Wakasa, embame namba suu pyape. Anatu embame namba yuu gii mendaki iki porainya renge kamba jii. Dopa piri dokopa dokome yuu mendakinde nambana lenge lama dolapona reke lao Pilisitia wambu dapwa pyarowale, leya.
Dopa lapala Samasone baame anda kanya dokona isa pote londe wara pyuo piyaminyi dolapo minyaro kareya. Karapala banya kingi dolapome isa dolapo minyuo poraiyuo suu leya.
Dokopa baame pii ketae palyuo lao, Namba Pilisitia dupwa pipya role pyao kumarowale, leya. Lapala akali banya porainya renge dokome anda doko suu leyamosa anda doko boo lapala kamongo akalipi dee mee wambu peparae pyao kumakaya. Samasone baame wambo wambu malu pyao kuma siyamopape enakana dokopa wambu ama malu wakasa pyao kuma soo dee baa opetae kumuo piya.
Dokopa banya yangongepe dee banya ree palu dupwa epapala banya yanenge doko nyiyami. Nyepala nakamame lanyuo anda papala baa yuu Jorapa dee Esataolepa kanya yanyanda dokona malu piyami. Wamba banya rakange Manoa malu piyaminyi dokona baa malu piyami. Samasone baa Isaraele wambu dupwa rapu pyuo kareyamopa ee kana akalisa lama epo peya.



















































































































































Kamongo akali dupwame Isaraele wambu dupwa isiyami. Yuu gii dokopa yuu dokona lopo andake siya. Dopa piyasa yuu Beteleme yuu andake yuu Juta dokona singi range akali banya etengemoo ikinyingi dolapo pipya yuu Moape dokona yuu gii lapo karala peyami.
Akali banya kingi Elimeleke lenge. Banya etenge Nayomi ikinyingi dolapona kingi Malone Kiliyonepa lenge. Nakama yuu Beteleme range. Yuu doko kingi Eporata lenge. Yuu Juta dokona singi. Dokona nakama yuu Moape papala palyuo karo piyami.
Elimeleke kumapeyamo dokopa Nayomi baa banya ikinyingi dolapo pipya palyuo karo piyami.
Dokopa wane dolapo Moape enda lama nyiyambi. Enda mende Opa lenge mende Uruti lenge. Enakana ee kana akalisa dopale epo papeya.
Epo papeyamopa Malone Kiliyonepa dopako pyuo kumuyambinyipa Nayomi baa iki pyarepala peya. Akali wanepe kumuo oteyaminyipa baa iki peteya.
Kamongo Anatu dokome banya wambu dupwa nyiso ee nengepe mailyamo leyami doko Nayomi baa siya. Sepala banya enda aeyange dolapo pipya yuu Moape yaki nyuo panya rapa rapa piyami.
Nakama yuu Moape yaki nyepala yuu Juta dokona kapu kyuo peyami.
Katasa pawali pyuo karo dokopa Nayomimi enda aeyange dolapo lamaiyuo leya. Nakambana yuu range dokona kapu kyuo pao endakinyi dolapo pipya role pyao pisirambi pena leya. Nakambame nambape wambu kumuyami dupwape rapu piyambi dokona Kamongona keyange renge doko nakamba keta palena leya.
Nakambame akali dee kamba nyepala mona seramopa pisirambi lao Kamongo Anatumi kata wapwakana leya. Dopa lapala enda dolapo nyinyi pisala pena leya. Dokopa ee andake lao yamarangupala dopa lamaiyambi.
Daaŋa nambwa embamoo pipya embena wambu petaminyi dokona parama, leyambi.
Nayomimi isingi lao, Nambana anyi dolapo daaŋa range lambuo pupwale. Akipamo nakamba nambamoo pipya role pyao paramase? Apa pyuo nambame wane lama manjirunu nakamba nyerambi ingilyase?
Namba emo otelyo dokome dee akali nyero ingya nalyamo dokona nakamba kapu kyuo anda pupwale. Namba akali nyelana suu pyao peto lapulipi panda epapu kukwama akali nyepala wane manjiru ingilyamo lapulipi doko.
Nakamba kapa pyuo isaro pisipala anda parambinyi dokopa nyerambi lapulisi? Ene andarande dokona lao mendali nyerambi kata pyakepelyase? Nambana anyi dolapo dopa pirambi doko kapa ingyuo paa nara doko silyambinyi. Kamongo Anatu dokome namba kyawa yaki nyuo koo keta pisapya dokona nakamba kondome kumulyu, leya.
Dopa leyasa deeko ipwa kuku nyuo ee leyambi. Lapala Opa baame enda aeyange doko yako lao nyinyi pyuo petena lapala baa banya wambu dupwa keta range peya. Dopa pyuo peyamopape Uruti baame aeyange yaki nyii nara ingiya.
Dopa piyasa kandapala Nayomimi Uruti lamaiyuo, Kanda, embena enda yango doko banya wambupi dee banya mee bange anatuŋu lengepe dupwana range pana pelyamolamo dokona anda range role pyao pupwa.
Dopa leyamopape Urutimi isingi lamaiyuo dopa leya. Nambame emba yaki nyii lao pisa napipi. Dopako pyuo embapa role pyao paa napipi lao kata rokwa napipi. Emba anja mendasa parene dupwana namba paro. Emba anja mendasa palirinyi dupwana namba paliroko. Embena wambu dupwa nambana wambuko dee embena Anatu doko nambana Anatuko ingyara.
Emba anja mendasa kumarene dokona namba kumaro. Dokonako namba malu pirami. Namba kinyi kinyi kana minyuo lalu lao leto. Yuu gii lete pisirunu dokopa embapa wakale wakale lili pyuo pisa naro. Daa lapala dopa piru ramo doko Kamongo Anatunya randa andake doko namba keta epo palena leto, leya.
Uruti Nayomipa role pyao paramba lao suu pyao oteyamo kandapala Nayomimi dee mende lara ingya naya.
Nakamba pao karo yuu Beteleme dokona pao pyaka siyambi. Pao pyaka siyambinyi dokopa wambu dupwame mona nembo kando nyiyami. Kandapala enda dupwame doko Nayomisi? piso soo leyami.
Namba Nayomi laa nalapape. (Kingi doko rae maingi dopale.) Anatu Porai Wakasa dokome randa andake jiya. Renge dokona namba kingi Mata lalapape, leya. (Kingi doko ingi randange dopale).
Namba dae yaki nyuo peyo dokopa bange malu siya dae anda kapu kyuo ipunu dokopa Kamongo Anatumi namba kingipa lanyuo ipya. Kamongo Anatu Porai Wakasa dokome namba randa joo elyape keta palya napyamo dokopa akipamo namba kingi rae maingi doko letaminyi?
Pii dake Nayomi yuu Moape yaki nyepala enda aeyange Moape range doko rolo pyao yuu Beteleme epeyambi doko. Nakamba Beteleme epo pyaka siyambi doko yuu gii isa bali jingi kanda soo lyingi dokopa epeyambi.
Nayominya akalinginya akalyanda dokona akali mende Bawase lenge. Baa akali numi ingyuo kareya. Akali doko Nayominya akalingi Elimeleke kumuyamo dokona ree palunde kareya.
Urutimi Nayomi lamaiyuo leya. Anyi yulu akali dupwa bali jingi pyakepelyaminyi dokona yaki nyerami dupwa yapo nyela parowale. Akali lapome namba kapa nakamana ee dokona yulu pii larami ramo dokopa nakamana matarena karo bali jingi yaki nyerami dupwa mungyala paro, leya. Dokopa Nayomi baame isingi lamaiyuo, Nambana anyi emba kapa pela pale, leya.
Dokopa Uruti baa ee mendena papala yulu akali dupwame bali jingi pyakepo peyaminyipa baa matarena enakapala bali jingi yaki nyiyami dupwa yapo nyuo peya. Uruti baa kamenge ingyako Elimelekena ree palu kulisa akali Bawasena ee dokona peya.
Dokopa Bawase baa yuu Beteleme dokona karo epapala banya yulu akali dupwa kando lamaiyuo, Kamongo Anatu nakama pipya role pyao karena leya. Dokopa yulu akali dupwame isingi lao, Kamongo Anatumi emba elya pyuo nyisoko karena leyami.
Dokopa Bawaseme banya kendemande akali yulu rapu pingi doko piso soo, Enda mapwae karamo doko apinyase? leya.
Kendemande akali dokome isingi leya. Enda doko yuu wakale Moape dokona rangende Nayomi anda epeyamo dokopa role pyao epeyambi dokoŋo.
Dokopa namba piso sokondali pyuo lapya, Namba yulu akali pilyaminyi dokona bali jingi pyakepasi dupwa malu palyuo karala pupuli yaka lapya. Dopa lapala enda baa yangamana piso yulu pyuo pao ene dae ee andana imambu soo petamo, leya.
Enakana Bawaseme Uruti lamaiyuo, Ee wakale mendasa bali jingi pyakepasi mungyala paa napala ee dakenako nambana kendemande enda dupwa pipya pyuo karena leya.
Anja bali jingi lyuo karaminyi lao karo kandapala dokona role pyao karalapape. Emba lao nembo pii nana lao akali dupwa lamaipu. Ipwa nano piya kande dokopa ipwa kamunyi pisingi pee dokona petamo doko napapu piri, leya.
Dokopa Urutimi ponga napala yuunya lenge kambu suu lapala Bawase lamaiyuo leya. Namba yuu naneta range doko akipamo namba kando rae maiyuo rau lao pii letene? leya.
Bawaseme isingi leya. Embena akalinyi kumapeyamo dokopa embena aeyane doko yulu pyuo nyiso petene dupwa peparae langiminyi sipu. Embena rakane endakinyipi yaki nyuo embena yuu range doko yaki nyuo epo wambu emba soo gisa nange dupwa pipya palyuo karo pilini doko namba silyu, leya.
Emba dopa piinyi renge dokona Kamongo Anatumi yano nyuo jinya. Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Anatu dokona awa piruŋu lao epee dokona lao masa narene dokona yano andake apeto jinya, leya.
Namba embena kendemande dupwa pipya kapa makande minya napyamopape embame namba anjiki pyuo pii langipinyi dokome namba porainyi pyambulini, leya.
Nenge nenge mange dokopa Bawaseme Uruti kando leya. Emba dae repeta epapala borete kunjasi silyamo dokona nyepala waene dokona poeyapapu nare, lamaiya. Dokopa Uruti baa yulu akali dupwa pipya role pyao peteyaminyipa Bawase baame nenge bali jingi kisasi dokona nyuo Uruti maiya. Dokopa Uruti baa nao sikya piyamopa lapo kakana mee siya.
Nenge nao otapala Uruti baa bali jingi mungyala peya. Dokopa Bawase banya yulu akali dupwa lamaiyuo, Uruti baa bali jingi mungyuo yulu pinyale. Nakamame giyalya giyana pii nalapape lao poraiyuo lamaiya.
Bali nyuo simu pyao puu pyasi dupwana lapo ipyuo nyuo nyisa retarami dokopa Urutimi yapo nyuo epenale lao lao nemba nalapape, leya.
Dokopa Uruti baa ee dokona bali jingi yapo nyuo kareyamopa neta anda peyamo dokopa pyuo oteya. Dee bali jingi mungyuo nyiyamo dupwa kusapeme pyao lukwapala kapa angi nenge dupwa malu palyiyamopa pao sikyali kilokerame akalisa ingiya.
Bali jingi dupwa manjo anda peya. Papala bali jingi mungiyamo dupwa aeyange lasaka piya. Dopako pyuo nenge nao malasi minyiya dupwa maiyuo piya.
Dokopa Nayomimi Uruti baa kando leya. Epapu yuu anja emba bali jingi dupwa mungyuo karalene? Dee ee apinyandena yulu pyuo karapi? Kamongo Anatumi emba kando rape rape lapya doko elyape keta pisinya leya. Dokopa Urutimi Nayomi lamaiyuo, Ee range akali doko kingi Bawase lengendena yulu pyuo karapu, leya.
Dokopa Nayomimi Uruti lamaiyuo, Kamongo Anatumi piru lenge doko isa paa nange dokome wambu lete karaminyipape kumuyaminyipape dupwa nyisingi dokome Bawase baa elyape keta pisaramopa karena leya. Nayomimi leyamo dokonako lao, Akali doko baa nambwana ree palu dokona baame rapu pyuo nyisaraliŋi, leya.
Urutimi Nayomi lamaiyuo, Bawaseme namba pii doloma langipyamopape pii anginde langipya doko emba bali ee dokona nambana kendemande dupwa pipya yulu pyuo karo bali otaramo dokopa kaere, lapya, leya.
Nayomimi Uruti lamaiyuo, Kinyi anyi emba ee yulu mendena dokona pare ramo dokopa minyoko pirami dokona Bawasena yulu wambu dupwa pipya kararami doko keyange, leya.
Dokopa Urutimi Bawasena yulu wambu dupwa pipya role pyao pyuo karo bali witipi oteyamo dokopa kaeya. Uruti baa aeyange Nayomi dokopako role pyao palyuo karo piya.
Enakana Nayomimi Uruti lamaiyuo, Nambana anyi akali mende koto kandakaro. Dokopa emba kapa pyuo anda paliri.
Akali banya kendemande enda role pyao yulu pyakamyuo karapinyi Bawase kandapi doko nambwana anginde lyakande. Pii dae sepe. Rengya kwualepalepa Bawase baa bali kapa lukuo karara.
Dokona emba wate pyuo mondo lapala mamba wele kyaa pingi lapo yangapala komau keyange lapo nyuo pipala Bawase baa bali jingi pyao kararamo dokona pale. Dokopa pao dusa karalyane lao see nana lao pao kararenepa baa ipwa nengepe nao otenale lao karape.
Bawase baa luu palyuo seramo dokona anja palamo lao panda kandapala dokopa pao porangelye kimbu yambe pyaramo doko nyuo minyalyapala emba kimbu seramo dokona paliri. Dokopa Bawaseme emba dopa pyuo piri lao langira, leya.
Urutimi isingi lamaiyuo, Emba yulu pipi letene dusipa piru, leya.
Dopa lapala Uruti baa bali jingi pyao lukungi panda dokona papala aeyangeme leyamo pii dokona mende isa nemba nao piya.
Yuu gii dokopa Bawaseme ipwa nengepe napala baa sikya piyamopa rae maiyuo papala bali jingi pyakepasi malu palyiyami dokona palyuo siya. Siyamo dokopa Uruti ama elya kalo papala porangelye yapunaro paleya doko minyalyapala kimbu siyamo dokona pao luu palyuo siya.
Kukwa yuu gii dokopa Bawase baa walu lao lenge rapala parali paki kapu kyuo karo kandeyamo dokopa enda mende banya kimbu siyamo dokona palyuo siyamo kando yamaranguya.
Kandapala Bawaseme, Emba apisi? lao piso siya. Dokopa isingi lao, Namba Uruti embena kendemande enda doko. Emba ree palu akalyanda mendaki ingyuo emba kapa pyuo rapu piri ingilyamo dokona embame namba yokoya pyalase, leya.
Dokopa Bawaseme Uruti lamaiyuo, Nambana rakane, embame ree palunya yulu rape rape lao embena aeyane doko keta piinyako doŋo epapu akali kamongo pendewape dupwa apetarapu paeyo kara napinyi dokome yulu keyange wakasa pilini dokona Kamongo Anatumi emba keta elyape pisinya leya.
Kapa nambana rakane emba paka napipi. Yuu dae range wambu dupwame emba enda keyange lao soo otelyaminyi. Embame mende pyaka larene dokopa pyakaro.
Embame namba ree palu mendaki lapi doko kinyiŋi. Emba isaro piruliko doŋo dopa pipyamopape akali mende ree palu sukusa mende karamoko namba mee mende umbiliŋi.
Epapu kukwa dae palyuo kaepala yuu yangaramo dokopa akali dokome emba kapa rapu piru letape lao pyasaka pyuo sero. Akali baame kapa lara ramo doko keyangeko dee daa lara ramo doko Kamongo Anatu karalu karenge doko keta kana minyuo lalu lao lamaiyuo leto. Nambame emba nyepala rapu piru leto. Emba kapa luu pali puu, leya Bawasame.
Dokopa Uruti baa Bawasena kimbu siyamo dokona palyuo karo yangapala ene yangalana endenge siyamo dokopa wambu lapome kanda nana lao peya. Renge doko Bawaseme Uruti lamaiyuo, Emba dae epapala paene lao see nana lao pena leyamuli pyuo peya.
Enakana Bawaseme Uruti lamaiyuo, Embena komau andu pyuo ipinyi doko dasa minyuo epo pee lena leya. Minyuo epo pee leyamo dokopa Bawaseme bali jingi sikyali wakasa kilokerame akalisa lama ingiyamopa nyuo kulimbwakamiya. Dopa pipala nyuo manjo pena lapala minyalyakamiyamopa nyepala manjo anda taone dokona peya.
Uruti baa aeyangena anda peya dokopa aeyangeme piso siya. Mona, apa pyuo pao epelene? leya. Dokopa Urutimi lao Bawaseme nenge maiyamopape dee pii leyamopape dupwa peparae lamaiya.
Dopako pyuo Urutimi aeyange lamaiyuo, Bawaseme anda mee kingipa paa nare lapala bali jingi malu dapwa baame jipyamo manjo epano, leya.
Dokopa Nayomimi isingi lamaiyuo, Nambana anyi emba mali soo apa pilyamo lao kando piso kaeyape. Bawase baame sepala kaeya nara pii lao otapalako kaeyara, leya.
Bawase baa wato lenge mare Beteleme kame kambu konando penge mare dokona pao peteya. Dokopa aopa Elimelekena tee palu repeta Bawaseme arome piyamo akali doko epeya. Dokopa Bawaseme akali doko lamaiyuo, Nambana puu minyingi dasa epo pisipunya, leya. Leyamo dokopa papala isa peteya.
Dopa lapala Bawaseme taone dokona range akali kamongo akalisa mendaki nyepala opetae isa petena leyamo dokopa peteyami.
Enakana Bawaseme Elimelekena ree palu kulisa doko kando leya. Epapu Nayomi yuu Moape piso anda kapu kyuo epapala nambwana ree palu Elimelekena yuu dupwa ropo pyao mainya lao letamo, leya.
Dopa pilyamo lao langinya suu pyapunde dokome lalono, leya. Epapu dakepa emba ropo pyalana suu pyare ramo doko kamongo akalipi mee wambupi petaminyi lenge kambu dokona ropo pyalase. Dee emba daa lao suu pyare ramo doko namba langiri. Wambo doko embame ingyuo ropo pyare. Namba matasa kandapi. Emba kaere ramo dokopako nambame ropo pyaroŋo namba langipi, leya. Akali dokome isingi lao, Nambame ropo pyaro, leya.
Enakana Bawaseme leya, Emba Nayomi keta yuu ropo pyare ramo doko Uruti yuu Moape range enda waiya doko embena etene ingyare. Dokopa yuu doko pao wambu kumuyaminyi ree palu dokona ingyuo sera.
Dokopa akali dokome Bawase isingi lamaiyuo, Namba ropo pyaro doko rolae ingipyamopape yuu doko ropo pyaro dokopa namba rangena moyange dupwa kwaeyara ingilyamo dokona namba kaeyarowale. Namba ropo pyapengele doko embame ropo pyalase, leya.
Yuu yango alowa pyuope dee yuu ropo pyaope yulu pipala dokopa Isaraele dokona dopa pyuo rolenge. Yuu ropo pyao maingi akali dokome banya kimbu suu doko neta nyepala ropo pyala epenge akali doko maingi. Dopa pingi renge doko Isaraele wambu dupwa pii lamwa doko epapu otelyamo lao lasaka pingi.
Akali dokome Bawase lamaiyuo, Embame ingyuo ropo pyalase lapala banya kimbu suu neta nyuo Bawase maiya.
Bawaseme akali kamongo dupwape mee akali dupwape lamaiyuo leya. Malone Kiliyone Elimelekemoona moyange bange peparae Nayomi keta ropo pilyunu dokona nakama peparae epapu usinisi ingyarami.
Pii mende doko Uruti yuu Moape range Malonena enda waiya doko nambana etenge ingyara. Dopa piramo dokopa akali kumuyamo dokona moyange bange dupwa banya ree palu dupwa keta sera dokopa akali dokona kingi isa paa nana lao nyuo kalyapusa pilyamo. Epapu dokona nakama usinisi ingyalapape, leya.
Dokopa mee wambupi kamongo akalipi dupwame lao, Epapu namwa usinisi ingyuo karamano, Kamongo Anatumi enda dake embena anda ipyamo doko keta Oresolo Liyapa Isaraele wane wai kisinyi pyambuyambi dopale inginyi pyambunyale. Yuu Eporata dokona emba kamongo ingyuo kararenepa yuu Beteleme dokona embena kingi ketae penale, leyami.
Kamongo Anatumi wane wanekepe enda mapwae dake keta jeramo manjarambinyi dupwa Peresena ree palu Juta Tamapana ikinyingi dopale ingyara, leyami.
Dokopa Bawaseme Uruti nyepala lanyuo banya anda peya. Dokopa Bawase Urutipa paleyambinyi dokopa Kamongo Anatumi enda doko keta wane mende maiyamopa mandeyambi.
Enda dupwame Nayomi lamaiyuo, Kamongo doko lakandamana, leyami. Yuu gii dakepa Kamongo Anatumi apusinyi mende emba rapu pira lao jipya. Wane doko banya kingi ketae paramopa Isaraele wambu dupwame soo kapa piraminyipa karenale.
Wane dokome emba emarene dokopa rapu pyuo nyisaramopa rae maiyuo manda rao emo pare. Embena aeyane wane manjakapya dokome emba mona retelyamo dokona ikinyi yanda ipingi nyepome emba nyisaramili doko suu pyao aeyaneme kapa pipya lyamo, leyami.
Nayomimi wane doko kupyuo mona anda pyambwapala mondo lao rapu pyuo peteya.
Enda range ree palu sukusa lapome wane banya kingi Opeta leyami. Dee enda dupwameko lao wane doko Nayominya, leyami. Wane baa ando karo banya mandeyamo doko Jese lenge. Jese baa Dapitinya rakange.
Pii dake Peresena rara dokona piso pao Dapiti mandeyami. Akali Peresa dokome Esarono mandeya, Esaronome Orame mandeya, Orameme Aminatape mandeya, Aminatapeme Nasano mandeya, Nasanome Samone mandeya, Samoneme Bawase mandeya, Bawaseme Opeta mandeya, Opetame Jese mandeya, Jeseme Dapiti mandeya.

Akali mende Eporaime rara dokona Elekana lengende yuu taone Orama lenge doko yuu Eporaime doko yuu kyau pyalya pyana pingi dorena siyamo dokona palyuo kareya. Baa Jerokamena ikinyingi. Banya kauwange Eliyu lenge. Baa Toyunya ree palu dokonande dee banya rara kuki Supi lenge.
Elekana baame enda lama nyiya. Nyiyamo dolapona kingi Ana Peninapa lenge. Penina baa wane mandeyamopa Ana mee pote peteya.
Elekana baame ee kana peparaena lao banya taone Orama lenge dokona palyuo Kamongo Porai Wakasa dokona lao lakando mena pyao kiso maiyala yuu Sailo dokona peya. Yuu Sailo dokona Ilaina ikinyingi Opini Pineyasepa dolapo Kamongo dokona purisi akali ingyuo kareyambi.
Elekaname banya mena pyao kiso maiyuo dokopa lapo etenge Penina maiyuo dee banya wane dupwa mendaki mendaki lao maipa piya.
Maiyuo karo dokopa enda Ana baa kandokondali pyuo maipa piya. Kamongome enda Ana banya ingi poraiyamopape akali baame mona andake reteya.
Dopa piyamopape Kamongo baame Ana wane mende maiya nalyamo lapala Penina baame enda yango doko kando giyalya giyana pyuo pendewa nembele lao peteya.
Ee kana peparaena dopa pyuo karalu kareyambi. Dopa pyuo Kamongona anda peyaminyi yaka lao Peniname Ana imbu singi nyakamipako piyasa eeyoko lao piso nenge dupwa naa napa piya.
Akalingi Elekaname baa piso soo, Ana, emba apa pipyasa eeyoko lao petene? Akipamo nenge doko wasaka pilipi? Akipamo yuu peparae mona kendame kumuo pisipa pyuo karepe? Wane akalisa mandeyambali doko embame namba mupwa lao suu pyaa napilisi? lao piso siya.
Yuu mendepa yuu Sailo dokona piso nenge nao otapeyaminyi dokopa Ana baa roya kareya. Dokopa Ilai purisi akali doko Kamongona tembole anda kambu banya petenge mare dokona peteya.
Aname Kamongo lao ateŋa lao dokopa ingi rando ee andake lao ateŋa lao peteya.
Baame lalu lao lenge pii doko alowa pii nara ingyuo lao, Kamongo Porai Wakasa embame namba embena kendemande enda kandape. Randa nyilyu dokona nambana lao suu pyapala kame soo kaeya napipi leya. Embame ikinyingi mende joo lare ramo doko nambame baa emba keta pyamalyapala lalu lao lenge pii ingyuo lao kyawasi rokwa nao mee kareta karena laro, leya.
Enda Aname Kamongo kando ateŋa lao rokonda nayasa Ilaime kambu kandaro siya.
Baame kambu romo romo pyuo ateŋa leyamopa pii angi lumbu laa nayasa Ilaime baa biya napala pyuo pisamo lamo lao suu piya.
Suu pyapala, emba rangeme biya napala peto lao kopyali minyuo pisa napipi. Biya naa kaepala mee petengenyili pyuo pisipi, lamaiya.
Dopa leyasa Aname isingi lao, Akali pii doko kinyi letende daa. Namba biya mende naa napu. Namba randa nyepala Kamongo baa keta ateŋa lao polo lamaiyalono.
Namba enda kyakangendeme lao petamo lao suu pyaa napipi. Namba kopyali pakana palipyasa dokona rae mai napala dopa pyuo ateŋa lao pisano, leya.
Dopa lapeyamo dokopa Ilaime lao, Mona kyuu lao seramo pupi. Isaraele wambunya Anatu dokome kee lapinyi doko jinyale, leya.
Leyamopa Aname lao, Embame namba kondo karalu karape lao lamaipala peya. Papala nenge nao mona rando peteya doko kame soo kaeyo peteya.
Dokona yangama Elekana banya ree palupi wamba kukwa sipurapala Kamongo mona maiyuo kingi lao lakandeyami. Lakandapala nakamana anda yuu Orama dokona peyami. Papala Elekana Anapa role piyambinyipa Kamongome ateŋa lao peteyamo dokona lao pii kapa wai pyakamiya.
Dokona lao baa wane ingiyamopa wane ane mandeya. Manjipala Ana baame wane kingi Samyuele leya. Samyuele leyamo renge doko nambame Kamongo piso siyu dopaleŋe lao lamaiya.
Elekana banya ree palu pipa yuu Sailo dokona ee kana yaka lao yuu gii dokopa Elekana baame mena pyao kiso Kamongo mainginyili pyuo maiyala penge yuu gii doko kamba epeyamopa peyami. Kamongopa kiso mairuŋu lao lalu lao leyamo doko opetaeko kiso maiyala peya.
Dopa piyamopape Ana baa paa napala banya akalingi ene panya kareyamopa lamaiyuo, Wane anju naa naramo dokopa Kamongona anda karalu kararaŋa lao lanyuo paroŋo leya.
Dopa leyasa Elekaname isingi lamaiyuo, Anju pyakapala dokopa Kamongona anda pareŋe suu pyao leteneli pyuo anda mee pisipi, leya. Dopa lapala, Dee Kamongo dokome embena pii lene doko angi leyamuli pyuo pyaka sakana leya. Dopa leyasa Ana anda dokona wane anju maiyuo piso kaeya.
Enda Ana banya wane anju pyakapala baa kuki ingiyamopape lanyuo panya dokopa mena bulamakao kali angi mendepe nenge palawa kilokerame akalisape ipwa waene lapope nyuo pipala lanyuo Kamongona anda yuu Sailo dokona peyambi.
Papala mena bulamakao doko pyao retapala wane doko lanyuo Ilai kareyamo dokona peyambi.
Aname Ilai kando lao, Pii mende langirole lapala lamaiyuo, Namba enda mende dakena karo Kamongo lao ateŋa lao kareya kande dokoŋo lao kando soo gisa nalepe? leya.
Nambame wane dake jinya lao Kamongo dokona ateŋa leyonopa angi leyono doko dake jiyaŋa leya.
Renge dokona lao baa Kamongo manjo mailyuŋu. Baa kararamo gii dusipana Kamongona ingyuo karalu kararaŋa, leya. Dopa lapala dokona karo Kamongo lakando kingi leyami.
Ana baame dopa pyuo ateŋa lao peteya. Kamongome nambana monarena rae maiyanyi pyambwapya. Baame mende pipyamo dokona lao rae mailyu. Nambana randa jingi wambu dupwa kando giyalya giyana pilyu. Anatumi nyisapya dokona namba raeme kumulyu.
Mendali Kamongo poo pyasi dopale ingyuo kara nalyamo. Mendali Kamongo dokopa manda manjo karande daa. Anatu baa namwana konambena mendeke ingyuo karamo dopale ingyuo karande daa.
Kamongo doko baa Anatu karamo dokome akalinya pilyaminyi dupwa soo karamo. Yulu koo keyangepena yapalya yapana pyuo lao karenge. Dokona lao emba piimi range yuku napala mangalyilinyi doko kaeyape. Pelyanyi nembo range mupwa lao suu pyao pii leene doko kui lape.
Ami yanda singi porai dupwana yanda imbu dupwa rokapyamopape poraiya nange dupwana yulu doko andelyamo.
Nenge kakana silyamo nao pisamo dupwa nenge isa pelyamo. Dokona lao yulu mendena pyakamipala nenge nyuo narami. Lopange dupwa dee lopa nalyamo. Ingi porailyamo petenge doko wane yanda ipingi nyero kando nyilyamo. Wane malunya endangi doko wane mendepa role pali nalyamo.
Kamongome pyao kumasepala dee lete nyingi. Baame wambu kumuo penge panda nembapala dee nyingiko.
Kamongo baame akali lapo pendewa inginyi pyambwapala menge dupwa kamonganyi pyambungi. Baame lapo inyimungyu kuki ingyuo kararaminyipa menge dupwa andake ingyuo karena lao pingi.
Baame pendewa pelyamo palyuo karenge dupwa nyiso dee yangilyamo pee paro singi dupwa nyuo minyalyuo pingi. Baame nakama kiŋinya akali mupwa dupwa pipya puu minyinyi pyambungi. Baame nakama yulu andakena wambumi ketae nembaramili dupwa maingi. Yuu doko Kamongome kanda soo susa pyao waso reteyamo silyamo. Yuu dokona baame bange peparae konda pyuo wasiinyi pyambuya.
Kamongome wambu banya yulu kare kare soo pyuo karenge dupwa kyawa minyingi. Dopa pilyamopape yulu koo pingi dupwa iminjingi dokona nyuo ope ape pokenge. Akali rangena poraindeme koo dupwa nyuo kalyuo anamengende daa.
Kamongome yake panda piso pii porakaiyuo lapala banya nyisu petenge dupwa pyao kokwa sinyi nembara. Kamongome yuu muu peparaena wambu nakama yapalya yapana pyuo lara. Baame banya kiŋi doko porai renge maipala banya rombo palyisi kiŋi dokome wakale dupwa pyao isa palyinya lao pira, leya Aname.
Dokopa akali Elekana banya yuu Orama dokona dee lambu peya. Peyamopape wane doko purisi akali Ilai yuu Sailo dokona Kamongona yulu pyuo kareyamo dokona role pyao nyiso kareya.
Ilaina ikinyingi dolapo kapa kara nayambi. Nakamba Kamongome mende lalyamo lao kale yuku see nayambi.
Purisi dolapome mena minju naramili pyuo nyinya lao mawa pii retenge doko kaepala yalalya yalana piyambi. Dopa pyuo akali mendeme mena pyao kiso maiyala epeyamo dokopa purisinya kendemande akali dokome isakuli paka rema karetande minyuo epenge.
Epapala mena minju rao karenge penge dokona ene rao karelyamo dokona rano karapala dokona pare peta epelyamo doko purisinya ingingi Ilaina ikinyingi dolapome yuu Sailo dokona Isaraele wambu dupwame mena pyao kiso maiyala epeyaminyi dokona dopa pipa pyuo kareyambi.
Koo mende opetaeko pyuo mawa pii dokona yaleyambi. Mena kapa dorena kisinyi ene nembapa nayami dokopa purisi akalinya kendemande dokome epapala mena pyao kiso maingi akali doko kando lao purisi baa mena lapo isarena kisara lao kyaka maikamipi lenge. Mena sanena kisasi doko rae mai naraŋa kyaka mainya lenge.
Dokopa baame isingi lamaiyuo, Kapa kisinginyili pyuo kisa paramanopa nyelapaleŋe leya ramo dokopa kendemandeme lao, Daaŋa dakepa namba jepe. Daaŋa lapala jii narami ramo dokopa rolae nyoloponoŋo lenge.
Kamongo mena pyao kiso maingi dokona Ilaina ikinyingi dolapome male male lapala mambu inginyi palyiyambinyisa Kamongo dokome ama koo pilyambinyi lao suu piya.
Wane Samyuele baa komau yapasinde wapwaro karo Kamongona yulu dokona kaeya nao piya.
Banya endangimi rakangepa ee kana yaka lao mena pyao kiso maipa pinginyili pyuo maiyala pao karo dokopa ikinyingi banya komau kimbunya pao suu lao pee pingi mende waso minyakamyuo papa piya.
Dokopa Ilaime Elekana etengepa yako lao lamaiyuo, Elekana emba Kamongome enda dake keta wane lapo wane Anatu maipinyi dokona panda nyinya lao jera lapa piya. Dopa lapa piyamo dokopa anda papa piyambi.
Kamongome enda Ana elyape keta pisipala wane rema wanake lamape dee konda pyuo maiya. Wane Samyuele Kamongona yulu dokona moko minyuo pyuo karo ando peya.
Ilai baa emo oteyamo dokopa ikinyingi dolapome Isaraele wambu dupwa keta yulu apa pyuo pyakamilyambinyi lao soo kareyamopa enda Kamongona komau anda kambu konandowame dokona yulu pingi dupwa pipya reto palambinyi leyaminyi siya.
Sepala nakamba lamaiyuo, Wambu peparaeme nakamba yulu koo pilyambinyi lao langimiŋi. Akipamo koo doko pilyambisi? leya.
Rakane nakambame yulu koo dopale doko yaki nyuo kaeyapenge lao silyu. Kamongona wambu dupwame kando mambo pyao letaminyi doko kwaeyo pelyamo.
Akali mendeme akali yango mende kando koo pirande ramo doko Kamongome banya lao pii lakamira ingilyamo. Dopa pipyamopape akali mendeme Anatu kando koo pira ramo doko apimi soo lakamirase? leya. Dopa leyamopape Kamongome pyalana suu pyao oteyamo dokome nakambame rakangena mana pii doko mende lalyamo lao sakami nayambi.
Dokopa wane Samyuele baa Kamongopa mee wambupinya lenge kambu dokona rolae wakasa pyuo ando pelyamo lao kandeyami.
Kamongona pii dake poropeta mendeme minyuo epo Ilai lamaiyala epeya. Embena imbwange akali Erone banya ree palu pipya kiŋi Perona karapusi yulu pyakamyuo yuu Isipi paleyamo dokopa namba rangeme epo baa keta maro leyoŋo, leya.
Isaraele doloma kareyaminyipa banya ree palu doko nambame rombo palyuo purisi wambu ingyuo rendamu pingi kiso maingi kana pyarena kiso yulu pyuo karo purisinya komau wapuo nambana yulu dokona soo karena leyo. Nambame kana pyarena kisiyaminyi rao kareyamo dokona nakama lapo kata rolaena kapa nyinya leyo.
Akipamo nakama yama lenge kambu nyepala nambana kisakana lapu dupwa napuli napuli lao suu pilyamisi? Akipamo nambana wambu dupwame namba pyao kiso jiminyi dokona kapa palenge angi dusa ingyuo Ilai embena wane dolapo namba lakandarenele pyuo lakanda minya minya pyuo nao karena lapala kaelese?
Ilai embena ree palu dee embena rarape dupwa namba Kamongo Isaraele wambunya Anatu dokome purisi yulu yuu peparaena piramiŋi lao langyuo kaeyo leyo kande. Dopa leyoko doŋo dee dakepa nakambameko pyakamili lao suu pyaa nalyo. Nakambame pingi kandale doko suu pyao mendeme namba lakanda minya minya pirami dupwa kando isingi dopako pyuo lakando dee namba kilya kandanyi nembarami dupwa isingi kilya kandaroko.
Epapu embena ree palu dee embena rarape dokona wanyane akali dupwa langa kanya pyao kumakaronopa pyuo mendalipi karo emapala kuma narami. Gii doko epapu dakeŋe.
Nambame Isaraele wambu doloma renge keyange mairunu dupwana kando gyaa soo yango palyuo kararaminyipape nakamana ree palu dokona mendepe karo emaraminde daa.
Dopa piramopape embena ree palu dokona mende lete wai pyaronopa baame purisi yulu pyakara. Pyakaramopape baa lenge koo ingyuo saka nalya nana pyuo mee isa sulu sulu karara. Embena para pyao nyerene wakale dupwa peparae randako nao kumuo parami.
Dopa pyuo embena wane Opini Pineyasepa yuu gii mendaki dokonako kumarambinyi kandarene dokopa namba leto dake kinyi lalyane lao panaramo kandare.
Nambame purisi mende yulu kare kare soo pyuo dee nambame yulu peparae suu pilyu dokona moko minyuo pirande kando rombo palyaro. Nambame baa para pyao nyeraminyi dupwape kiso mairunupa dupwame yuu peparae nambame kiŋi mende rombo palyarono lenge kambu dokona nambana yulu pyakao kararami.
Embena para pyao nyeraminyi dupwana lapo lete kararami ramo dupwame nenge nalena dokopa purisi pisiramo dokona papala kana nengepe jinya lao kee lao dee purisi dupwa nyisamape lao poraiyuo piso soo pirami.
Yuu gii dusipana wane Samyuele baa Kamongona yulu pyakamyuo akali Ilaime yulu pinya leyamuli pyuo pyuo kareyamo dokopa Kamongo keta piso pii kuki iki epo dee pii repa repa yuu gii lapo iki pepapu piya.
Yuu gii kukwama mendepa Ilai baa oo repeta lenge kwaeyara ingiyamo doko banya luu palenge rate dokona paleya.
Dokopa panda poo pyasi Anatunya Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote siyamo dokona Samyuele baa luu paleya. Paleyamo dokopa yuu yangapa nayamopa lambe doko mee rao kareya.
Dokopa Anatumi Samyuele lao kyakale leyamo dokopa Samyuele Yaa, leya.
Yaa lapala Ilai paleyamo dokona makando papala lamaiyuo, Namba kyakale lapi dokona dae epelyo, leya. Leyamopape Ilaime isingi lao, Nambame kyakale laa napu. Dee pali puu, leya. Dokona lao Samyuele dee kamba pali peya.
Pao palipiyamo dokopa Kamongome dee kamba Samyuele lao kee leya. Kamongo dokome yuu mendepape pii lamai nange dokona wane dokome doko Kamongome lalyamo lao soo nyii naya. Dokona lao baa sipurapala Ilai paleyamo dokona papala lao, Embame namba kee lalene doko namba dae epelyo, leya. Leyamopape Ilaime isingi lao, Nambana wane, nambame emba kee laa nalonoŋo. Emba kamba kapu kyuo pali puu, leya.
<range>
Kamongome yuu rema ingyuo Samyuele kambako kyakale leya. Dokopa Samyuele sipurapala Ilai paleyamo dokona papala dee lao, Embame kyakale lalene dokona dee epelyo leya. Dokopa Kamongome wane doko kee lalyamo lao Ilaime soo nyiya.
Soo nyepala dopa lamaiya. Dee pali pupi. Palirene dokopa dee kyakale lalyiyasili dokopa Kamongo embena kendemande doko dae soo palo lape, leya. Dopa lamaiyamo dokopa Samyuele dee pali peya.
Pao palipiyamo dokopa Anatu epo dokona karapala dee wambo leyamo doko suu pyao, Samyuele, Samyuele, lao kee leya. Dokopa Samyueleme isingi lao, Laa, embena kendemande doko soo palamo, leya.
Dokopa Anatumi dopa lamaiyuo, Nambame Isaraele wambu dupwa keta randa andake mende peeyaronopa wambu peparae doo seraminyi dupwa yamarangyuo mona nembo kararami, lao lamaiya.
Yuu gii doko pirunu dokopa Ilaina ree palu dupwa keta randa wakale wakale mairuŋu lao leyonuli pyuo maiyuo otaro, leya.
Nambame baa wamba lamaiyuo epeyo. Doko banya wane dupwame namba kando koo laminyi dokona nambame banya ree palu dupwa randa maiyuo karalu kararo, leyo. Doo koo laminyi doko Ilai baa kando soo karapalape mende pyalana pyuo kaena laa nange.
Dokona lao nambame Ilaina ree palu wambu dupwa kando lalu lao lao, Nakamana koo dupwa nyuo nembara lao mena pyao kiso maingipi mee bange maingipi kata mende see nalu nao nara ingyara, leya.
Dopa pipala Samyuele baa mee rate dokona palu siyamopa yuu yangeya. Dokopa baa sipurapala pao Kamongona anda kambu doko kii lumbuya. Lumbwapala pii repa repa piyamo dupwana lao Ilai lamaiyalana pakaya.
Dokopa Ilaime baa kyakale lao, Nambana wane, Samyuele, leya. Leyamo dokopa Samyuele isingi, Yaa, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Ilaime piso soo lao, Kamongo dokome emba apa langipyase? Namba kando mende leya kande doko kalyamaka napipi. Emba doo langipyamo dupwa peparae namba langya nare ramo dokopa Anatumi emba randa andake jera, leya.
Dokopa doo lamaiyamo dupwa peparae Samyuele Ilai polo lamaiya. Mendepe kalyamo palena lao kaeya naya. Dokopa Ilaime lao, Baa Kamongoŋo. Baa range keyangeŋe lao mende pinya suu pilyamo doko mee kapa pira, leya.
Samyuele ando oteyamo dokopa Kamongo doko baa keta role pyao kareya. Role pyao karapala Samyueleme pii leyamo dupwa angi kinyi dokonako pinya lao piyasa angiko pyuo peya.
Dokona Isaraele wambu yuu pinjingi paki piso pao paki suu lao dupwa peparaeme Samyuele baa Kamongona poropeta angi lao soo nyiyami.
