Dokopa akali Ayitopele doko akali Epesalome dokome Dapitinya kiŋinya yulu isa nembalana leyamo dokona rae mailyamo lao lamaiyaminyi Dapiti siya. Sepala baame ateŋa lao lao, Kamongo, akali Ayitopele pii dopa pinya dapa pinya laramo dupwa kopyali ingyuo pena lao kyawa sisingi bolombalo lanyi nembape, leya.
Dapiti yuu kyau ketae lakandenge panda angi doko kando nyela peyamo dokopa banya mona reto puu minyingi akali Asai lenge yuu Aki range dokome banya komau dupwa minyuo pilyuo awai kyawasinya pyao pipala peteyamo kando nyiya.
Kando nyepala Dapitimi baa lamaiyuo lao, Emba namba role pyao epare ramo doko embame namba nyisa nare ingilyamo, leya.
Dopa pirinyipape embame namba nyiso yuu taone dokona kapu kyuo papala akali Ayitopele kiŋi doko kando pii dopa pinya dapa pinya lao lenge dupwa pipya pimwaiyuo role karape. Karapala Epesalome lamaiyuo, Emba Kamongo doko. Nambame embena rakanena pii soo yulu pyuo kareyono doko suu pyao epapu nambame embena lao pyakaro, lena leya.
Dokopa purisi akali Satoko Apaitapa dokona kararambi lyakande. Dokopa embame kiŋinya anda piso pii serene dupwa peparae kaeya nao akali dolapo lamaipi.
Nakamba nakambana ikinyingi Aimase Jonatanepa reto karambinyi dokome emba pii serene dusipa peparae nyuo simu pyao maipala nakambame namba langyala pena lare, leya.
Akali Epesalome doko epeyamo dokopa Dapitinya puu minyingi akali Asai doko kapu kyuo yuu taone dokona epeya.
Dapiti baa yuu kyau ketae yaki nyepala lupyuo donorena peyamo dokopa aopa Mipiposetana kendemande akali Sipa lenge dokome baa kando nyiya. Sipa baame borete andete lamape isa girapo jingi yando enge kareta andete mendakipi dee isa jingi kana poo renge simu pyasi andete mendakipi menana yanengeme pee wasisi ipwa waene paleta mendepe pipala dupwa peparae mena donge lamana retapala minyuo epeya.
Epeyamo dokopa kiŋi Dapitimi baa piso soo lao, Bange dupwame peparae emba apa pirisi? leya. Dokopa Sipame isingi lao, Mena donge dupwa embena ree palu dupwana piso papirami. Nenge boretepe isa jingipi akali dupwa narami. Dee ipwa waene doko nakama yuu muiyane dokona pao maka piramo dokopa narami, leya.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome baa piso soo lao, Embena akali mupwa Solena kauwange Mipiposeta lenge baa anja karase? leya. Leyamo dokopa Sipame isingi lao, Banya kauwange Solena kiŋi yulu doko rolo otapala Isaraele wambu dupwame baa keta jimili lao suu pyapala baa Jerusaleme dokona karamo, leya.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome Sipa lamaiyuo lao, Bange peparae Mipiposetana ingyuo singi dupwa embena ingyara, leya. Dokopa Sipame isingi lao, Namba embena kendemande akali. Emba kiŋi andake doko, nambame yuu peparae emba rae mainyi pyambuo karapuli yaka leto, leya.
Kiŋi Dapiti baa yuu Bakurimi dokona pao pyaka siyamo dokopa akali mende Solena ree palu karengende kingi Simai lenge akali Gerana ikinyingi dokome baa kando nyepala randa maiyuo koo keta palyuo lao nembeya.
Dopa pipala Dapiti baa banya akali dupwape dee banya isingi akali dupwamepe nyuo kako pyao nee piyaminyipape Simai baame kana lapo nyepala Dapitimoo banya akali mupwa pipya peyaminyi dokona pyao pyambuo piya.
Pyapala baame lao nembo lao, Emba neta puu. Emba wambu pyao kumakange akali doko. Emba akali koo pingi doko. Emba puu pao puu, leya.
Emba Solena panda nyepala kiŋi ingyuo karene. Dopa pipala Solena ree palu wambu malu pyao kumakalene. Dokona Kamongo dokome emba soo otapala emba nyuo alowa pipala embena ikinyi Epesalome doko namwa Isaraele wambunya kiŋi ingyuo karena lao romba palyapya. Emba wambu pyao kumungi dokona Anatumi emba pyao kokwa soo nembalopyamo, leya.
Akali Apisai lenge enda Seruyana ikinyingi dokome kiŋi doko kando lao, Emba kiŋi andake doko. Akipamo akali kopyali dakeme suwa ingyuo randa jinya lao kaelese? Namba dokona dumu pao banya mange puku pyala puu larene, leya.
Kiŋi dokome akali Apisaipa dee banya yangonge Joapepa kando lao, Doko nakambana yulu mende daa. Kamongo dokome pinya lao lamairamo dokona baa namba randa jera ramo doko api rolae pingipi mendeme piso soo akipamo pilyamo larami ingilyase? leya.
Dokopa Dapitimi akali Apisaimoo banya akali mupwa dupwape peparae lamaiyuo lao, Namba rangena ikinyingi dokome namba pyao kumakalana pilyamo dokona akipamo Benjamenena rara dokona akali dakeme doo pilyamo dokona kando yamarangyuo mona nembaramisi? leya. Kamongo dokome namba kando pinya lao pii koo dupwa lena lao lamaipyamo pilyamo dokona baa yaki nyuo panda maiyuo yulu koo doko pinya kaeyalapape, leya.
Kamongo dokome nambana mona randalyo doko kandapala namba koo keta palyuo pii lapyamo doko alowa pyuo namba elyape keta pisara rapisi.
Dokona lao Dapitimoo banya akali dupwape kata nyuo peyaminyi dokopa Simai baa yuu kyau kipwa kipwa dorena kanda kanda pyuo paowali pyuo karo dokopa pii koo dupwa lao kanape yuu kulipi dupwa pyao pyambuo piya.
Dokopa kiŋi dokope banya akali dupwape pao ipwa Jotane doko kando nyiyami. Dopa pyuo nakama kata pao karo maka pyuo kimbu randa pyuo piyasa ipwa mare dokona imambu soo peteyami.
Akali Epesalomemoo dee Isaraele akali lapo baa role kareyami dupwa peparaepe Jerusaleme sukusa peyami dokopa akali Ayitopele baa opetae dokona role pyao kareyami.
Dapiti banya mona kulisa reto puu minyingi akali Asai lenge dokome Epesalome kando nyepala lao, Kiŋi doko palu karalu karena. Kiŋi doko palu karalu karena, leya.
Dokopa Epesalomeme Asai baa piso soo lao, Embena mona kulisa retenge dee embena puu minyingi Dapiti doko apa pipyase? Emba akipamo baa role pyao paa napisi? leya.
Dokona Asaimi isingi lao, Namba apa pyuo parose? Namba Kamongomepe wambu dupwamepe dee Isaraele peparaemepe rombo palyiyaminyi kiŋi dokona daerename ingyuo karo.
Nambana akali mupwa dokona ikinyingi dokona yulu pyakami naro ramo nambame apinya yulu pyakamirusi? Nambame embena rakanena yulu pyakamiyu doko suu pyao epapu nambame embena yulu pyakaro, leya.
Dokopa Epesalomeme kapu kyuo Ayitopele piso soo, Epapu namwa dae karamano. Dokona namwame apa piramase? Embena suu pilini dupwa namba serole langipi, leya.
Dokopa Ayitopeleme isingi lao, Embena rakanena enda lapo konda pyuo nyiyamo dupwa anda yuupi rapu pyuo petena lapala peyamo dupwa kepo pyuo nyela puu. Dokopa embame embena rakanepe kinyi angi nyisu piso yanda pimwai ingyapilyamo lao Isaraele peparaeme soo nyerami. Soo nyepala wambu peparae embena pii lareneli pyuo pyuo kararami, leya.
Dokona lao nakamana kiŋinya anda dokona yangi ketae dulunya komau anda mende Epesalomena pyakamiyami. Dokopa wambu peparaena lenge kambu dokona andakare papala rakangena enda lapo konda pyuo nyiyamo dupwa pipya kepo pyuo nyiya.
Yuu gii dusipana Ayitopelena pii leyamo dupwa sepala Anatumi lele leyasa wambu peparaeme moko minyuo piyami. Wamba Dapitimi warombo soo piya. Dee enakana Epesalome baame opetaeko warombo soo pinya piya.
Kuki enakana Ayitopeleme Epesalome lamaiyuo lao, Nambame akali taosande akalisa ipisu lama (12,000) rombo palyapala rengya kukwa akali dupwa pipya role pyao Dapiti paramo dokona moko minyuo parole.
Baa makame kumuo mona kumapala yame yame laramo pisira. Mange dokopa baa pakame kumuo pisiramopa banya akali dupwa ralo parami. Dokopa nambame kiŋi doko iki pyao kumakaro.
Enda akali nyingi dupwa kapu kyuo akalingi karenge dokona epenge dopale ingyuo akali menge dupwa lanyuo emba petene dokona eparo. Embame akali mendaki iki pyalena suu pyapi doko pyao kumakare ramo dokopa endakalipi menge dupwa yanda pii nao kapa palyuo kararami, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Isaraele akali mupwa dupwamepe dee Epesalome baamepe pii doo leyamo doko keyange ingyuo pelyamo, lao siyami.
Epesalome baame lao, Epapu Asai baa opetae epena lao kee lalapape. Laraminyi dokopa baame pii laramo dupwa namwa semanale, leya.
Akali Asai doko epeyamo dokopa Epesalome baame lamaiyuo lao, Pii dake akali Ayitopele dokome namwa langipyaŋa. Namwa doko moko minyuo pemase? Dee daa ramo doko embame namwa apa pirami lao langipi, leya.
Asaimi isingi lao, Pii Ayitopeleme epapu nakama langipya doko kwaelyamo, leya.
Embena rakane dokope akali menge dupwape nakama yanda ama poraiyuo pyuo yanda nengena petenge doko emba silini. Dee nakama mena marakae dupwana yakane waa nyakamingi dokopa pondoma pyuo nalana pingi dopale ingilyaminyi. Dee embena rakane doko yandana yulu soo oto pyuo retenge dokome baa kukwa dokopa banya akali dupwa pipya pali nange doko emba silini.
Epapu dakepa baa kananda mendenape panda yuu mendasa yalu pyuo sera ramo soo pilyamo. Dopa pipala Dapiti baame aopa embena akali dupwa minyarapala pyara. Dopa pyuo pilyamo laraminyi sepala wambu dupwame embena akali dupwa pyao anamasi minyuo isa palyilyamo larami.
Dapitimi dopa piramo dokopa embena rakane doko yanda singi andake wakasa dee banya akali dupwa yandana soo otenge doko Isaraele wambu peparae soo otelyaminyi dokona mena laeneme bange mendepe paka nange dopale ingyuo yanda singi porai yanda pingi dupwa pakao pyuo penge dupwa mee pakarami.
Dokona nambana mana pii emba langilyu doko. Yuu pinjingi pakirena piso pao yuu pinjingi paki suu lao Isaraele akali peparae ipwa kee ipwa kota marengena singi dopale ingyuo nyuo pyasape. Pyasapala nakama lanyuo emba rangeme Dapitinya lenge kambu dokona yanda pela pupi, leya.
Namwame Dapiti baa yuu anja angi karamo doko koto nyerama. Koto nyepala namwame Dapiti baape banya akali dupwape mende piraŋa lao see nao kamenge kararaminyipa namwame nakama pyarama. Namwa Dapiti baape banya akali dupwape peparae pyao kumakarama dokopa mendepe lete kara nara.
Baa yuu taone mendena pao yalu pira ramo doko namwana wambu dupwame puu londe lapo minyuo epapala yuu taone doko puu dokome palyuo awali lapala ipyaraminyi dokopa lalyuo isa yuu pau lama lama dokona para. Dokopa kana kuki mendepe yuu kyau ketae dokona see nara, leya.
Akali Epesalomemoo dee Isaraele akali peparae dupwame lao, Akali Ayitopelena pii doko keyange ingyapyamopape akali Asainya doko ama keyangelyamo, leyami. Kamongome akali Ayitopelena pii keyange doko minyuo pii narami dokopa randa andake doko akali Epesalome keta epara lao soo nyiya.
Enakana Asai baame mana pii akali Epesalomemoo Isaraele akali mupwa dupwape lamaiyamo dokope dee Ayitopeleme lamaiyamo dokope purisi akali Satokopa Apiatapa lamaiya.
Dokopa Asaimi konda pyuo lao, Epapu waiya lao Dapiti keta pii wai nembapala yuu muiyane ipwa keno paenge doko yuu gii kukwa mende nembo pali nana. Epapu dakepa baape banya akali dupwa pipya peparae nyepala pyao kumaka nanaleŋe dakepa aopa ipwa Jotane doko yalo pena lena, leya.
Dokopa akali Apiatana ikinyingi Jonatanepa dee akali Satokona ikinyingi Aimasepa yuu Jerusaleme repeta yuu Enerokele lenge dokona isaro kareyambi. Doko nakamba taone dokona sukusa parambano dokopa wambu dupwame kandasarami lapala piyambi. Dokopa kendemande wanakendeme mende piyamo dokopa yuu peparae lao nakamba lamairapu piyamosa nakambame pao kiŋi Dapiti lamaila parapu piyambi.
Dopa piyambinyipape yuu gii mendepa wane mendeme nakamba kandapala baame akali Epesalome lamaiyamosa nakamba yuu Bakurimi dokona akali mendena anda papala waiya lao yalu pela peyambi. Dokopa banya anda repeta dusa banya yuwale singindena nakamba dokona koko pao yalu pyuo peteyambi.
Dokopa akali dokona etenge dokome bange komau porai lapo nyepala yuwale kambu dokona yambe piya. Pyapala wambu mendemepe soo giso kanda naramiŋi lapala nenge witi jingi dupwa ketae dokona minyuo raeyo reteya.
Dokopa Epesalomena akali mupwa dupwa anda dokona epapala enda doko piso soo lao, Aimase Jonatanepa anja karambisi? leyami. Dokopa enda dokome isingi lao, Nakamba ipwa doko yalo papambi, leya. Dokopa akali dupwame nakamba koto peyami. Peyaminyipape koto kando nyii napala nakama kapu kyuo Jerusaleme peyami.
Enakana nakama yaki nyuo peyaminyi dokopa Aimase Jonatanepa yuwale dokona peteyambi doko nyisa epeyambi. Epapala pii dupwa Dapiti lamaila peyambi. Akali Ayitopeleme baa keta yanda pyuo pii lao reteyamo dupwa lamaiyambi. Lamaipala lao, Waiya lao ipwa doko yalo pupi, leyambi.
Dokopa Dapitimoo banya akali dupwa pipya ipwa Jotane doko yalo peyami. Pao yuu yango rali dokopa nakama peparae ipwa dumurena yalo pao oteyami.
Dokopa akali Ayitopele banya pii leyamo dupwa moko minyuo pyakami nayamisa banya mena donge doko nyepala piso para dokona rapa rapa pipala banya rangena yuu taone dokona peya. Enakana banya rangena yuupi bangepe dupwa peparae rapa rapa pyuo rolo otapala baa rangeme puu neya. Dopa piyamosa banya wambu ree palu malu pingi yuu dokona malu piyami.
Akali Epesalomemoo Isaraele akali dupwa pipya Dapiti pyala pao ipwa Jotane doko yaleyami yuu gii dokopa Dapiti baa pao yuu taone Makanaimi lenge dokona pyaka siya.
(Dokopa Epesalomeme akali Joapena panda nyuo akali Amasa doko yanda singi ami dupwana mupwa ingyuo isinya lao rombo palyiya. Amasa baa Isimaelena rara akali Jeta lenge dokona ikinyingi. Banya endangi doko Apikale lenge, Apikale baa akali Nasena wanenge dee akali Joapena endangi Seruya lenge dokona kakingi.)
Epesalomemoo dee banya akali dupwa pipya yuu Giliate dokona komau anda pyuo paleyami.
Yuu gii dokopa Dapiti baa yuu Makanaimi epeyamo dokopa akali remame baa kando nyiyami. Akali Sopi Nasena ikinyingi yuu taone Orapa Amone singi dokona rangepe Maka Amielena ikinyingi yuu taone Lotepa rangepe dee Basilai yuu Orokelimi yuu Giliate singi dokona rangepe dusipame kando nyiyami.
Kando nyepala nakamame Dapitimoo banya akali dupwapena perepe penge warame wasisipi luu palenge komaupi nengepe minyuo epo maiyami. Dopa pyuo nenge witi jingipi bali jingipi palawape witi kisasipi mee binipi dee bini piipi amburali ipwangepe bulamakao susu ipwangepe dee nenge wasisi sisi lengepe mena sipisipi lapope dupwa peparae minyuo epo maiyuo piyami. Doko Dapitimoo banya akali dupwape yuu muiyane dokona kata papipala lopome kumuo ipwa nano kumuo maka pipyamo epelyaminyi lao soo nyepala nenge maiyami.
<range>
Kiŋi Dapitimi banya akali dupwa peparae nyuo malu palyiya. Palyapala akali dupwa lili pirapu akali taosande mendaki lili wakale piya dee andete mende ingyarapu lili wakale pirapu karo piya. Dopa pipala akali mupwa iso laminyaraminyi dupwa lili dupwana mendaki larapu karo peya.
Dopa pipala yanda angi pyala pena lao dokopa baame liti remana ingyuo wakale wakale akali Joapemoo dee Joapena yangonge akali Apisaimoo dee yuu Gati range akali Itaimoome pipya role pyao laminyuo iso pena, leya. Lapala kiŋi dokome banya akali dupwa lamaiyuo lao, Namba range nakama pipya role pyao paro, leya.
Dokopa nakamame isingi lao, Emba namwa pipya epa nare. Namwa lapo kapu kyuo ralo makando paramanopape panda pingisi paki pyao kumakaraminyipape dokona nyisu petenge dupwa keta mende ingya nara. Dopa piramopape emba angingyuo pyalena lao karaminyi. Renge doko embame kyawa nyepala namwa taosande akalisa (10,000) ingilini. Dokona emba mee yuu taone dakena piso kaepala namwa nyisaramili lapo peyarapu pepe, leyami.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome isingi lao, Nakamame mende keyange lao suu pyaraminyi doko nambame piru, leya. Lapala baa kame kambu kii wangu dokona kareyamopa banya akali dupwa kimbu pyao piso liti taosande mende ingyarapu andete mende ingyarapu pyuo peyami.
Baame akali Joapemoo Apisaimoo dee Itaimoo pii lamaiyuo lao, Nambana kingi dokona lao akali parange Epesalome doko randa maiyaka nana, leya. Doko Dapitimi banya akali mupwa dupwa peparae pii dake lamaiyamopa yanda singi dupwa peparaeme soo oteyami.
Dokopa Dapitinya yanda singi ami dupwa pao yuu kipwa kipwa dorena papala yuu Eporaime imwa dokona nakama Isaraele pipya yanda piyami.
Dapitinya akali dupwame Isaraele akali dupwa pyao wini piyami. Dopa pyuo yanda isare rao pipala pyao wini piyaminyipa yuu gii dokopako akali ama malu taosande akalisa (20,000) kumuyami.
Yuu muu kipwa kipwa dokona yanda doko pyuo andakyapala akali yandana kumuyaminyipape daa mee lapo kamame wakasa ingyuo imwa dokona kumuo peyami.
Dokopa aopa akali Epesalome dokome Dapitinya akali lapo kando nyiya. Epesalome baa mena donge matana piso peya. Pao isa kameya mende oke lenge kareya dokona isa lungwa lungwarena peyamosa isa wangya dokome banya ayemba rambuki nyepala mee yukwaro kareya. Dokopa mena donge doko makandoko peyamopa baa yeelyo isa dokona pero kareya.
Dokopa Dapitinya akali dokona mendeme kandapala akali Joape doko kando lamaiyuo lao, Nambame Epesalome baa isa oke mendena yukwaro karapyamo kandapu, leya.
Dokopa Joapeme isingi lao, Embame kandapala dokopa akipamo aopa pyao kumaka napisi? Embame baa pyapili doko namba rangeme emba kana kulingi akalisa dee marapu mende pipala emba jipuli, leya.
Dopa leyamopape akali dokome isingi lao, Embame namba kana kulingi taosande mendaki jipilinyipape nambame kiŋinya ikinyingi doko yango palyili lao nambana kingi kuki dokona mendeme minyalyuo pyaa napuli, leya. Doko kiŋi dokome lao, Nambana lao suu pyao akali parange Epesalome doko randa maiyaka nalapape, lao embamoo akali Apisaimoo dee Itaimoope pii lao langiyamo doko namwa peparae siyama kande.
Kiŋi baame mende pingi dupwa peparae soo otenge dokona nambame banya pii warombo see napala baa pyapuli doko dopa pyuo pyapi lao pii baa sipyali. Sepala baame namba randa jipyali embame namba nyisa napili, leya.
Dokopa Joapeme lao, Yuu gii malu nembo namba embapa pii laa naramba, leya. Lapala Epesalome baa isa oke dokona lete yukwaro kareyamopa kaku rema nyepala Epesalomena kyangali dokona pyao pisiya.
Dokopa Joapena yanda singi akali akalisame karo awali lapala Epesalome baa angi pyao kumakayami.
Doko Joapeme yanda piyama doko kaena lao bikuli poo lena leyamo dokopa banya yanda singi malumi Isaraele dupwa peta ralyuo piyami dupwa yaki nyuo kaepala anda epeyami.
Dokopa nakamame akali Epesalomena yongo doko nyepala imwa dokona yuwale kyuwa mendena malyiyami. Malyapala kana malumi ama ketae reto yambe pyao pulyuo nyiyami. Dokopa Isaraele akali peparae mendaki mendaki lao nakama rangena anda dupwana ralo makando peyami.
Epesalome banya kingi dokona lao mendeme panda nyera wane ikinyingi mende manja naya dokome baa lete kareyamo yuu gii dokopa banya kingi doko ota naramopa suu pyao kararamiŋi lao kana londe mende Kiŋinya Yuu Pau Lama Lama dokona yuu apu rao pisiya. Pisiyamo yuu gii dokona piso pao dakepape wambu dupwame kana doko Epesalomena Kana lenge.
Dokopa akali Aimase Satokona ikinyingi dokome Joape lamaiyuo lao, Kamongo dokome banya nyisu petenge dupwa pipya kiŋi doko kyawa lete nyuo nyisapyaŋa lao wai pii keyange doko minyuo kiŋi petamo dokona lamaila makando paowa, leya.
Dokopa Joapeme lao, Daa. Epapu emba wai pii keyange lapo minyuo paa nare. Doko kiŋinya ikinyingi doko kumapyamo dokona yuu gii mendepa emba minyuo pare. Epapu daa, leya.
Dokona banya kendemande akali Itiopia range doko lamaiyuo lao, Emba doo pipyamo kandapi dupwa kiŋi doko lamaiya puu, leya. Dokopa kendemande akali dokome Joape kando pangu sepala makando peya.
Aimase suu lao lao, Namba mende pira dupwana mende masa nalyoŋo. Wai pii doko kamame minyuo parole, leya. Dokopa Joapeme isingi lao, Nambana ikinyingi, emba dokona yano mende nyii nare doŋo akipamo dopa pinya suu pilisi? leya.
Aimaseme kamba lao, Mende pira dupwana wari laa nalyo mee panya suu pilyu, leya. Dokopa Joapeme lao, Doko kapaŋa puu, leya. Dokona lao baa kata dokona makando lupyapala yuu Jotane Pau Lama Lama dokona suku suku papala Itiopia akali doko yaki nyuo baa wambo peya.
Yuu taone dokona kame kambu dowa kamandape dee andakarepe kanya iki siyamo dokona Dapiti baa peteya. Dokona yuu taonena kambu isingi akali mende kana kame doko ketae pulyuo peya. Papala kambu dorena ketae anda yangi ingyuo perao karenge dokona kareya. Karapala dokopa akali mende baa iki makando repeta repeta epeyamo doko kandeya.
Kandapala baame isa kee lapala kiŋi doko lamaiya. Dokopa kiŋi dokome lao, Baa iki epara ramo doko baame wai pii keyange mende minyuo epara, leya. Dokopa akali makandeyamo doko makando repeta repeta epeya.
Dokopa dee isingi akali dokome akali mendeko iki makando epeyamo kandeya. Kandapala baame akali kame kambu dowa dokona iso karenge doko kee lapala, Kanda. Akali mendeko makandelyamo, leya. Dokopa kiŋi dokome isingi lao, Akali dokome opetae wai pii keyange mende minyuo epelyamo, leya.
Dokopa isingi akali dokome lao, Nambame kandapu dokopa akali wambo makandapya doko Aimasena makandenge dopale ingyapya, leya. Dokopa kiŋi dokome lao, Baa akali keyange. Baame wai pii keyange mende minyuo epo pilyamo, leya.
Dokopa Aimaseme kiŋi doko pii ketae palyuo yako lapala banya lenge kambu siyamo dokona pangu soo dopa lamaiyuo, Embena Kamongo Anatu lakando karape. Renge dokona lao akali dupwame emba kiŋi andake doko isa nembalana lao karaminyi dupwa keta baame anamasi minyingi renge doko jiya, leya.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome piso soo lao, Akali parange Epesalome doko kapa lete karase? leya. Aimaseme isingi lao, Kamongo, embena akali mupwa Joapeme namba puu lapyamo dokopa wambu peparae mona rando pii malu lao akema lalya lana pyuo karami. Doko piminyipape doko apa pipya lao namba langi nami, leya.
Doko kiŋi dokome baa lamaiyuo lao, Dumbisa karena leya. Dokopa baa dokona papala kareya.
Dokopa Itiopia kendemande akali doko epapala kiŋi doko lamaiyuo lao, Emba kiŋi andake doko, nambame wai pii keyange mende minyakao ipu. Epapu Kamongo dokome wambu emba kando pimwaiyuo nyuo isa palyalana kareyami dupwa isa palyuo anamasi minyakapya, leya.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome piso soo lao, Akali parange Epesalome kapa lete karase? leya. Dokopa Itiopia kendemande akali dokome isingi lao, Kamongo, baa keta mende pipyamo doko embena nyisu petenge dupwape dee emba mata joo penge dupwape peparae keta pipyali yaka lao suu pilyu, leya.
Kiŋi Dapiti baa Epesalomena lao ee lao kumanda petamo lao Joape lamaiyaminyi siya.
Kiŋi doko banya ikinyingi doko kondo kumanda petamo leyami doko sepala Dapitinya akali malu dupwa rae maiyuo wini pingi renge paleya doko alowa pipala mona randame kumuo kumandako peteyami.
Nakama yanda singi dupwa yandana pakao nyisa papala elyapala elya kalo karenge dopale ingyuo yuu taone dokona elya kalo sukusa dee peyami.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome banya lenge kambu yambe pyapala ee poraiyuo lao lao, O nambana ikinyingi. Nambana ikinyingi Epesalome. Epesalome nambana ikinyingi, lao ee leya.
Dokopa Joape baa kiŋinya anda papala kiŋi doko kando lao, Epapu embena akali dupwa koo pepeya ingyuo wasinyi pyambuo pelyamo. Akali embena ikinyi wanenyepe lete nyiminyipape dee embena etene dupwape enda lapo konda pyuo nyingi dupwape lete nyiminyi dupwa koo inginyi nembapi kandapi.
Embame wambu emba mona retaminyi dupwa kando yanda pimwailini. Dee emba kando rae mai nami wambu dupwa kando mona minyarambu karalene. Embena akali mupwa dupwape mee akali dupwape angi mende daa lao suu pilini. Nambame Epesalome baa epapu lete epapala namwa peparae kumamwali doko emba kuki rae maipili lamo lao kandelyo.
Epapu papala embena akali dupwa anjiki pyuo pii lamaila pare. Dopa pii nare ramo doko nambame Kamongona kingi lao rakya yangama dokona mendaki mendepe embamoo role kara narami, leto. Emba palu karenge yuu gii dupwana randa andake koo nao palu karare, leya.
Dokopa kiŋi doko roya karapala yuu taone dokona kame kambu repeta peteya. Banya akali dupwame baa dokona petamo leyami doko sepala nakama peparae dokona pao malu palyiyami. Yuu gii dokopa Isaraele peparae ralo wakale wakale pyuo nakama rangena anda dupwana peyami.
Yuu Isaraele dokona peparae nakama range lao laiya lao apyanda pyuo lao nakama range lao lao, Kiŋi Dapitimi namwana nyisu petenge dupwa pipya kyawa lete nyiya. Namwa Pilisitia wambu pipya kyawa lete nyiya kande. Epapu Epesalomena reke lao ralo papala yuu yaki nyuo pelyamo, leyami.
Namwa akali Epesalome doko namwana kiŋi ingyara lao kyawa dokona mamba kulimbuo kisakamyuo rombo palyiyama. Dopa pyuo rombo palyiyamanopape baa yanda dokona piyaminyisa kumuya. Dokona lao akipamo mendeme kiŋi Dapiti doko kamba minyuo dae eparamo dokona lao laa nalyamisi? leyami.
Pii doo Isaraele wambu leyaminyi doko Dapiti keta waiya lao peya. Dopa piyamosa baame purisi akali Satoko Apiatapame Juta akali mupwa dupwa piso sela pena leya. Isaraele akali namba kiŋi dee karapili lao suu pilyaminyipape akipamo nakama enakana kiŋi doko banya anda dokona minyuo eparami ingilyase?
Nakama nambana ree palu, Nakama nambana yongo mendare dee ranjama mendaki. Dokona nakamame akipamo namba enakana lanyuo eparamisi? leya.
Dapitimi Amasa lamainya lao lamaiyuo, Emba nambana ree palu. Epapu dakepa nambame emba Joapena panda joo yanda singi dupwana mupwa ingyuo karape leto. Nambame dopa pii naro ramo dokopa nambana Anatumi namba randa jinya leto, leya.
Nakama Dapitinya pii doko sepala Juta akali peparae mona piyasa baa keta mona maiyuo pyamalyapala baamoo banya akali mupwa dupwa peparaepe kamba kapu kyuo epena leyami.
Baa kapu kyuo epeyamo dokopa katasa ipwa Jotane pona dokona Juta akali lapo yuu Gilikale dokona kiŋi akali ipwa dokona yalo lanyala epeyaminyi dupwa kando nyiya.
Yuu gii mendaki dokopako Benjamenena rara akali Simai lenge Gerana ikinyingi yuu Bakurimi range doko ipwa Jotane dokona Dapiti kando nyela epeya.
Epo dokopa Benjamenena akali rara taosande mendaki (1,000) dee akali Sipa lenge Solena ree palu dokona kendemande karenge dokopa dee banya ikinyingi akalisa ipisu kingi paki dusipape dee banya kendemande akali akalisa lama pipala nyuo ipwa Jotane dokona kiŋi doko kando nyela epeyami. Epeyaminyi dokopa kiŋi baa banya akali dupwape ene epapa nayaminyisa nakama ipwa Jotane dokona epeyami.
Nakama kiŋi andake dokope banya wambu pipya epeyaminyi dupwape ipwa doko yalo lanyala epo dee kiŋi dokome leyamuli pyuo pirama lao ipwa yalo peyami. Kiŋi doko ipwa dokona yalo panya rapa rapa piyamo dokopa akali Simaimi baa range pyakao papala kiŋinya lenge kambu siyamo dokona pangu siya.
Sepala lao, Emba kiŋi andake doko, yuu Jerusaleme yaki nyinyi yuu gii dokopa nambame kopetame piyu doko nyuo kame sakape. Dokona dee nambapa yanda pimwaiyuo minyaro karo suu pyao karalu kara napipi.
Namba koo piyuŋu doko namba silyu. Renge dokona namba mendaki dokoko yuu dulurena rara dokona piso epapu epapala emba kiŋi doko yako lao nyela epelyo, leya.
Leyamo dokopa akali Apisai Seruyana ikinyingi dokome ketae palyuo pii lao, Kamongo dokome kiŋi karena lao wasiyamo doko keta koo mende palena leyamo dokona Simai baa pyao kumakamana, leya.
Dopa leyamopape Dapitimi Apisaipa banya yangonge Joapepa lamaiyuo lao, Nakambana suu pingi doko apimi piso silyase? Nakambame namba randa jelana letambisi? Namba dake epapu Isaraele wambunya kiŋi ingyuo karo dokona epapu Isaraele wambu kuki mende kumunya lao randa mai narama, leya.
Lapala baame Simai lamaiyuo lao, Nambame emba pyao kumaka narami lao lalu lao langilyu, leya.
Dokopa Mipiposeta Solena kauwange akali doko kiŋi doko yako lao nyela epeya. Doko baa kiŋi doko Jerusaleme yaki nyiyamo yuu gii dokopa Mipiposeta banya angasipi kyawasipi dupwa rokwa nao dee kimbu dupwa wate pii nao komau dupwa wate pii naope piyamopa pao kiŋi doko wini pipala kamba kapu kyuo epeya.
Mipiposeta baa kiŋi doko yako lao nyero lao Jerusaleme piso epeyamo dokopa kiŋi dokome baa lamaiyuo lao, Mipiposeta akipamo emba nambapa role pyao epa naese? leya.
Baame isingi lao, Emba kiŋi andake doko, nambana kimbu dolapo koo doko emba silini. Dokome namba embapa role pyao parambaŋa lapala nambana kendemande akali doko lamaiyuo, Nambana mena donge dokona piso embapa role parambaŋa komau kwuo rapa rapa pyakana leyonopape baame namba kyambo langipala pyaka naya.
Emba kiŋi andake doko. Baame nambana lao kyambo langiya. Dopa leyamopape emba Anatunya aŋala dopale dokome embame kandarene rolara dupwa pepe.
Emba kiŋi andake doko. Nambana rakanena ree palu dupwa peparae kokwa soo kumunginya pyambuili doko rolae ingiyali. Dopa piyamopape embame embena rate dokona nenge nala ipu lee kande. Emba kiŋi andake doko. Nambame emba keta anjiki pyuo nyisa laope bange mendepe jii lao piso serono kata mende see nalyamo, leya.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome isingi lao, Emba dee kamba lama konda pyuo laa nare ingilyamo. Embapa Sipapa Solena bange dupwape dee yuu dupwape mokwa soo nyerambi lao suu pyao otapu, leya.
Mipiposetame isingi lao, Sipa baa dupwa peparae nyinya kae, Emba kiŋi andake doko anda lete ipi dokona namba rae mailyu. Dokona mende nyii naro, leya.
Akali Basilai yuu Giliate range doko opetaeko yuu Orokelimi yaki nyuo kiŋi doko ipwa Jotane keno epena piyamo doko nyiso nyela epeya.
Basilai baa akali alemo. Baa ee kana akalisa mange lama (80) ingiya. Doko baa ama akali kamongo ingyuo bange malu retenge. Dokome kiŋi doko yuu Makanaime dokona peteyamo dokopa nenge dupwa maiya epeya.
Epeyamo dokopa kiŋi dokome baa lamaiyuo lao, Nambame emba rapu piruŋu Jerusaleme namba role pyao bona epena leya.
Dopa leyamopape Basilaimi isingi lao, Namba yuu gii malu palu kara naro doŋo. Emba kiŋi andake dokopa namba akipamo Jerusaleme parambase? leya.
Namba ee kana akalisa mange lama (80) karamo dokona dee bange mendeme namba rae mainyi pyambwa nara. Namba ipwa nengepe napu dupwana rende pingi palipyamo naa nalyo. Dee kenane pyami dupwa see nalyo. Emba kiŋi doko nambame emba randa jisasaroŋo daa leya.
Nambame yano andake dupwa nyii naro ingilyamo. Dokona lao namba mee kuki lama emba role pyao ipwa Jotane keno unipili papala kaeyo emba puu larole, leya.
Lapala nambana anda papala nambana ree palu dupwana malu anda repeta kumaro kapu kyuo parole. Dake nambana ikinyingi Kimikame lenge embena yulu pyakara. Emba role nyuo lanyuo pupi. Emba kiŋi andake doko, embame keyange lao suu pilini dupwa banya lao pyakamipi, leya.
Kiŋi dokome isingi lao, Nambame baa lanyuo papala yulu embame pipili lao suu pilini dupwa piru. Dee embame mende pyaka lao piso serene dupwa pyakaro, leya.
Dokopa Dapitimoo banya akali dupwa pipya ipwa Jotane doko yalo dumurena peyami. Dokopa baame akali Basilai doko nyinyi pipala yako lao elyape keta pisiyamopa anda kapu kyuo peya.
Kiŋi doko ipwa yalo oteyamo dokopa Juta akali peparaemepe dee Isaraele akali pingyasi lapomepe baa kako pyao nyiso minyuo peyami. Baa yuu Gilikale dokona peyamo dokopa akali Kimikame baa dokona role pyapeta peyambi.
Dokopa Isaraele peparaeme kiŋi peteya dokona papala baa kando lao, Emba kiŋi andake dokope embena ree palu wambu dupwape embena akali dupwape akipamo namwana yangonge Juta akali dupwame keyange pilyamano lao suu pyao nakama nyepala Jotane yalo minyuo rapu pyuo pumisi? leyami.
Juta akali dupwame isingi lao, Namwa doo pimwano doko kiŋi doko namwa pipya mendarendeme pimwaŋa. Dokome nakama akipamo imbu singi manjinyi pyambwarase? Baame namwa nenge ropo pyao joo dee bange mende joope pii napya, leyami.
Leyaminyi dokopa Isaraele akali dupwame isingi lao, Kiŋi Dapiti baa nakamana rara angingyuo karapyamopape namwa rara akalisa karo nakama mendaki iki isa palyilyamano. Dokona lao akipamo nakamame namwa kilya kando lao karamisi? leyami. Lapala namwa wambo suu pyao kiŋi doko dae lanyala eparama lao leyama doko kame see nalapape, leyami. Leyaminyipape Juta range dupwame Isaraele wambunya pii isa palyili lao poraiyuo leyami.

















































Kamongo baame Dapiti banya nyisu petenge akali Solemoo dee akali lapo dupwa keta baa kyawa lete nyiyamo dokona kenane dake Dapitimi Kamongo doko kando piya.
Kamongo doko nambana kyawa lete nyuo alya isa ingingi akali. Baa kame porai dopale ingyuo namba kako pyaro karenge.
Nambana Anatu doko nambana alya minyingi akali dokona namba baa keta kyawa lete epelyo. Baame konambe dopale ingyuo namba alya minyingi. Dee baa nambana lete wai pyao nyingi akali wambu dupwame namba pyalana randa jilyaminyi dokopa baame namba keta alya minyuo nyisingi.
Nambame Kamongo doko kee letono dokopa baame nambana nyisu petenge dupwa keta kyawa lete nyuo nyisingi. Dokona Kamongo lakandamanale.
Ipwa kota kasakole minyuo ipwa marengena epenge dopale ingyuo kumungi renge dokome namba nyuo sukusa pyambuya. Dee ipwa kasakole minyingi dopaleko ingyuo randa renge dupwame namba nyuo bwuakiki piya.
Kumungi rengena randa dokome namba keta kako piya. Dokopa malu andana kone dokome nambana lao makaro siya.
Dokopa namba randa nao karo Kamongo doko kee leyo. Nambame nambana Anatu doko nyisinya lao kee leyo. Dokopa banya tembole anda dokona karo baame nambana pii soo namba nyisinya lao ee leyono doko siya.
Dokopa yuu dupwa pyuku pyuku lao romo romo piya. Anatu baa imbwayamosa yake doko ama romo romo piya.
Dokopa banya gyaa kata dokona isare sukwa potemo epeya. Dee isare rao uliyapu nyingi lelenge dupwape dee sungwa lengya dupwape banya nenge kata dokona epeya.
Dokopa baame yake doko nyuo karalyapala banya kimbu isarename kopa pupuri rau dokopa role pyapeta baa isa epeya.
Baa aŋala dokona mata dokona piso isa epeya. Epapala baa poo raiyana papake dopale ingyuo dokona piso kata papiya.
Baa range iminjingi dokome yambe piya. Dopa pipala baa kopa romende ipwa malu petenge dupwame baa keta piso kako piya.
Baa peteyamo dokona yuu pele pipala isareme rasi sungwa lengya dupwa lele pyao soo ketae peya.
Dokopa Kamongo dokome yake dokona piso yuu gala leya. Leyamo dokopa Anatu Porai Wakasa dokona pii doko wambu peparaeme siyami.
Akali mendeme banya nyisu petenge dupwa wanga dupwame pingi dokopa nakama ralo penge doko suu pyao yuu pele piyamo dokopa banya nyisu petenge dupwa wakale wakale pyuo makando peyami.
Dokopa Kamongo dokome banya nyisu petenge dupwa kando mena nalena pingi ingyuo imbu singi manjo pii poraiyuo lao piyamopa banya pii doko poo raiya andakeme bange minyalya minyana pingi doko suu pyao ipwa kota pete isa donorename dupwa epo maro leya. Dee yuu dokona isa susa pingi bange dupwa mee epo panembena siya.
Kamongo dokome yake panda piso isa epapala namba nyiya. Baame namba ipwa koko dupwana paleyono dokopa nyisa ipyuo nyiya.
Baame nambana nyisu petenge ama porai palenge dupwa keta baame kiiramo nyiya. Dee lapome namba awa nayami dupwa keta opetaeko kiiramo nyiya. Nakama ama porai wakasa dokome namba anamasi minyaro ingya nalyamo.
Namba randa nyuo kareyono dokopa nakamame namba minyarapala nyiyami. Dopa piyaminyipape Kamongo dokome namba alya isa ingyuo kyawa lete nyiya.
Nambana randa epeya dupwana baame namba neta nyuo nyisiya. Baame nambapa rae maiyuo epe kandeya dokome namba kyawa lete nyuo nyisiya.
Namba rolae pingi dokona Kamongome namba yano pyakange. Namba koo mende pii nange dokona baame namba elyape keta pisingi.
Nambame Kamongona lowa dupwa warombo singi. Nambame nambana Anatu kando mata maiyuo kapu kyuo paa nange.
Nambame banya lowa dupwana peparae letamuli pyuo kando minyuo pyuo karenge. Banya mawa pii dupwana namba kamba lao warombo see nangende daa.
Nambame koo mende pisarono kando lao nyokonyuo karenge dee namba koo mende pii nange doko baa silyamo.
Dokona lao namba rolae pingi dokome baame namba yano jingi. Renge doko baame namba keta koo mende pali nange doko baame soo gisingi.
Kamongo wamba lapome emba poraiyuo suu pyao yaki nyii nao karenge dupwa kando embame nakama keta lalu lao leeneli pyuo poraiyuo suu pyaoko karenge. Dee wambu lapo kopetame pii nao kata rolae dokona iki pyuo karenge dupwa kando embame keyangeko pingi.
Wambu mendeme poo pyasi ingyuo karenge ramo doko keta embame baa embena poo pyasi renge doko lasaka pingi. Dopa pinginyipape wambu mende yulu koo pingi ramo doko keta embame yano pyao randa maingi.
Embame wambu range kuki ingyuo inyimungu karenge dupwa kyawa lete nyingi. Dopa pinginyipape wambu range mupwa lao suu pyao ulipili ingingi dupwa kando embame nyuo isa palyingi.
Emba Kamongo doko, Nambana kendapulinya mendeke ingyuo karenge. Dee embame namba keta iminjingi dupwa nyuo nembakapala yanganyi retakange.
Embame nambana nyisu petenge dupwa pyaa lao namba porainya renge jingi. Dee embame namba porainya renge jingi dokopa nyisu petenge dupwana yuu taone dupwana kana kame dupwa mee pyao lalyuo kokwa soo nembenge.
Anatu doko, banya yulu pipyamo dupwa ama mondo lao rolae ingyuo pelyamo. Dee baame mende lalu lao lapyamo pii dupwa kinyi angingyuo pelyamo. Dopa pyuo wambu lapo baame kyawa minyinya lao koto parami ramo dupwa keta baa konambe dopale ingyara.
Kamongo baa iki doko Anatu. Dee Anatu baako nambwana nee isa ingyaro karamo.
Anatu doko namba porainyi pyambuo namba anja panda anja dupwana penge dokopa iso karenge.
Baame namba mena diya lenge lukuma nao kata papingi dopale ingyuo papi lao pingi. Dee namba yuu kyau dupwana kata papyuo karenge dokopa baame namba nyisingiko.
Doko yanda enekongo porai dupwa minyuo yanda piriŋi lapala baame namba yanda dupwana mana langingi.
O Kamongo, Embame namba alya isa ingyuo karo lete wai pyao nyingi. Embena nyisapinyi renge dokome wambu peparaena lenge kambu dokona nambana kingi doko ando pelyamo.
Dopa pipala embame nambana yanda pimwai dupwame minyarapala nyisasarami lao iso karapinyipa namba isa paa nange.
Nambame nyisu petenge dupwa peta ralyuo pyapala anamasi minyingi. Nambame kaeya napala nakama pyao kokwa soo nembapala dokopa kaenge.
Dopa pipala nambame nakama pyao isa palyingi dokopa nakama sipuro epa nange. Nakama nambana kimbu isarena kumasi singi.
Embame yandana namba porainya renge jingi. Nambame nyisu petenge dupwa pipya pyao anamasi minyare lao nyisingi.
Embame nambana nyisu petenge dupwa namba kando makando pena lao pingi. Dokopa wambu namba epe kanda nange dupwa nambame pyao kokwa soo nembenge.
Dokopa nakama wambu lapome nyisamili lao kotelyaminyipa mendemepe nakama kyawa lete nyuo nyisa nange. Nakamame Kamongo doko nyisinya lao kee letaminyipape baame nakama isingi yano pyaa nange.
Nambame nakama pyao inji ranji pingi dokopa nakama sinjimu dopale ingingi. Dopa pipala nambame nakama katana wara silyamopa kalyuo papingi dopale ingyuo isa palyingi.
Embame wambu namba kando kamba lao mata joo kareyaminyi dupwa keta namba kyawa lete nyuo nyisingi. Embame wambu rara peparae keta namba kiŋi kara lao rombo palyapala iso karenge. Wambu namba kando see nange dupwame nambana yulu pyakalyaminyi.
Dopa pipala wambu yuu wakale range dupwame nambana lenge kambusa pangu singi. Nakamame nambana pii sepala dokopa warombo singi.
Nakamana paka nange renge doko isa penge. Dopa pilyamopa nakamana anda porai dokona piso walu walu lao nyisa epo nambana arapunya role pyao karala epenge.
Kamongo doko lete karalu karenge. Baa nambana nee isa ingyuo karenge doko lakandena. Anatu porainya renge palenge dokome namba lete wai pyao nyingi dokona kingi ketae pena lao leto.
Nambame nyisu petenge dupwa isa palyuo anamasi minyare lao nyisingi. Nyisapala baame wambu rara lapo dupwa namba isarena karena lao pingi.
Nambana nyisu petenge dupwa keta baame nyiso neta nyingi. Kamongo nambana nyisu petenge dupwa isa palyuo anamasi minya lao nyisingi. Embame namba alya isa minyuo karapinyipa akali wambu pyao randa maingi dupwame namba pyao kumaka nalyaminyi.
Dokona lao wambu rara peparaena lenge kambusa karo nambame emba lakandelyo. Nambame emba kando lakando kenane pilyu.
Namba banya kiŋi Dapiti dokome nyisu petenge dupwa anamasi minyare lao Anatumi porainya renge jingi ingyuo karenge. Baame namba banya rombo palyiyamo akali doko mona kulisa retenge. Dopa pipala namba Dapiti ketape dee nambana para pyaramo dupwa ketape mona reto karalu karara.
Dapiti akali Jesena ikinyingi dokome Kamongome mupwa inginyi nembeya. Akali doko Jekopena Anatu dokome baa kiŋi ingyuo rombo palyiya dokome kenane pii keyange dupwa Isaraele wambunya pyao retakamiya. Dokona pii dake Dapitimi lumwa pyuo leya.
Kamongona Imambu dokome namba keta pii letamo. Banya wai pii dupwa nambame lakare lao jingi.
Isaraele wambunya Anatu dokome pii leya. Isaraele wambunya konambe ingyuo alya isa ingingi dokome namba langyuo lao, Kiŋi akali kata rolae dokona iki wambu dupwa iso karo dee Anatu lengenyili pyuo iso karenge doko
wamba yangama kopa yake dokona see nalyamopa neta iki rao karenge dopale ingilyamo. Dee baa apunda epo sokwa pelyamopa netame isako dupwa leya leya pinyi pyambungi dopale ingilyamo.
Kamongome namba kando pii kana minyuo lalu lao leya dokona Anatumi nambana manjirunu dupwa elyape keta pisinyi pyambwakara. Dee pii angi kinyi walengena palyuo yaki nyuo kaeya naro, leya. Pii lalu lao lapala alowa pii nange dokona namba moname nyilyamo. Dokona Anatumi namba dopa pyuo angi pyakaramo dokopa anamasi minyuo kararo.
Dopa piramopa akali Anatu suu pyaa nange dupwa nepereke neta nembenge dopale ingyuo nembenge. Dokopa wambu mendemepe kingimi minyandara ingya nange.
Mendeme puu reke karenge doko minyandalena suu pyarami ramo doko bange aneme wasisipi dee kakupi lapo nyepala minyarami. Dokopa nepereke puu doko isareme rao otalu oto otara.

























































Kiŋi Dapiti baa ando emo ingiyamo dokopa banya kendemande akali dupwame porangelye yambe piyaminyipape baa mee kupwame kumuoko palyuo siya.
Dokopa banya akali mupwa dupwame baa lamaiyuo dopa leyami. Emba kiŋi andake doko, namwame enda mapwae mende embapa role pyao palyuo emba rapu pira kotakamanale. Kota kando nyakaramano dokopa wanake dokome emba kupyaro paliramo emba kupwa nao paliri, leyami.
Lapala nakamame Isaraele yuu muu dupwa peparaena enda mapwae keyange mende petape lao koto kareyami. Koto karo yuu Suneme lenge dokona wanake mende kingi Apisake lenge peteyamo kando nyiyami. Nyepala baa lanyuo kiŋi peteyamo dokona peyami.
Peyaminyipa enda mapwae ama keyange wakasa dokome kiŋi baa iso rapu piya. Dopa piyamopape enda dokopa angi nyii nao mee palyuo kareyambi.
Dokopa akali Epesalome baa kumuyamo dokopa akali Atonainja lenge Dapiti Akitipana ikinyingi doko wane mupwa doko baa kuma nao mee lete ando kareya ingiya. Baa akali elyape ingyuo ando kareya Dapitimi wane doko pyalana pyuo laa nange. Dokona Atonainja baa kiŋi karapuli lao suu pyao kareya. Baame mename uliuli ipyuo pengepe mena osepe dupwa baa rangena lao reteya. Dee baa rapu pirami akali dupwa akalisa kingi paki karo piyami.
<range>
Baamoo akali Joape enda Seruyana ikinyingimoo purisi akali Apiatamoo role pyao pii lao kareyami. Kareyaminyipa nakamba pipya lao banya yulu dokona renge palyuo poraiyuo lakamiramba, leyambi.
Dopa leyaminyipape purisi akali Satokomoo Benaya Jiyoatana ikinyingimoo dee poropeta Netanemoo Simaimoo Oraimoo dee Dapiti banya yongo rapu pyuo karaminyi akali dupwamepe Atonainja banya pii leyamo dorena kara nayami.
Yuu mendepa Atonainjame bange mena sipisipipi bulamakaope dee mena bulamakao yakane rondo lasipi lapo Kau Kana lenge dokona ipwa Enerokele guu lenge doko repeta kiso maiya. Maipala baame kiŋi Dapitinya ikinyingi menge dupwape dee kiŋi Dapiti banya akali mupwa yuu Juta range dupwape nenge malu palyuo kisiyamo dokona epena leya.
Leyamopape banya yangonge Solomonemoo poropeta Netanemoo Benayamoo dee kiŋinya yongo rapu pyakamyuo karenge dupwape epena laa naya.
Enakana Netane baa Solomonena endangi Betesepa lenge peteyamo dokona papala baa piso soo dopa leya. Emba Akitinya ikinyingi Atonainja baa rangeme kiŋi karalana lao rombo palyapya doko see napisi? Dokopa kiŋi Dapiti pii dokona mendepe ama see nalyamo, leya.
Embame embapa embena ikinyingi Solomonepa range lete kyawa doko kame pyuo minyaramba lao masiyambi kande doko nambame pelapa lao langirunuli pyuo pelapape, leya.
Yuu gii aopa dakepa kiŋi Dapiti petamo dokona papala piso soo lao, Emba kiŋi andake doko, embena panda doko nambana ikinyingi Solomoneme nyepala baa kiŋi ingyuo karara lao lalu lao lao namba langya naese? Dokona lao, Akipamo akali Atonainja baa kiŋi karase? leya.
Dopa lapala dokopa Netaneme konda pyuo lao dopa leya. Emba kiŋi Dapitipa pii lao kararambi dokopa nambame epapala embame pii letene dokonako lareneli pyuo kamba laokondali pyuo lakaro, leya.
Dokona lao Betesepa baa kiŋi banya luu palenge panda paleyamo dokona kandala peya. Peyamo dokopa baa ama alemo ingyuo oteya. Dokopa yuu Suneme range wanake dokome kandokondali pyuo rapu piya.
Dokopa enda Betesepa baa kiŋi paleyamo dokona lenge kambusa pangu siya. Dokopa kiŋi dokome baa piso soo lao, Emba aki nyerese? leya.
Enda dokome isingi lamaiyuo dopa leya. Emba kiŋi andake, embame embena Kamongo Anatunya kingi lao lalu lao lapala nambana ikinyingi Solomone baa embena mata kiŋi ingyuo karara lao namba kando lee kande leya.
Dopa leenepape Atonainja baa kiŋi karo otapya dokona mendepe emba see nalene kande.
Baame mena bulamakao kali malupi mena sipisipipi dee mena bulamakao ikyane rondo lasipi lapo pyao yangapala embena ikinyingi dupwape purisi akali Apiatamoo dee Joape embena yanda singi ami dupwana mupwa ingyuo karenge dokomoo epena lapala embena ikinyi Solomone iki epena laa napyapya, leya.
Emba kiŋi andake doko Isaraele wambu peparaeme apimi embena panda nyuo kiŋi karena lao langilipi lao embako isaro karaminyi.
Embame laa nare ramo doko emba kumaparene dokopa nambana ikinyingi Solomonepa nambapa emba mata kando lao kararambi lao wambu dupwame suu pyarami, leya.
Enda doko mee pii lao kareyamopako akali Netane baa kiŋinya anda dokona epeya.
Epeyamo doko dopa pyuo poropeta doko epo karamo lao kiŋi doko lamaiyami. Dokopa Netane baa andakare papala kiŋinya lenge kambu dokona isa pangu siya.
Sepala baame lao, Emba kiŋi andake doko akali Atonainjame doko embena panda nyuo kiŋi ingyara, lapisi?
Yuu gii mendaki dokopako baa mena bulamakao kali malupi sipisipipi mena bulamakao yakane rondo lasipi pyao yango maiyala paamo. Papala baame embena ikinyingi dupwa peparae epena lapya. Lapala Joape embena ami yanda singi dupwana mupwa dokope Apiata purisi akali dokope pipala epena lapya. Lapyamopa epapu dakepa nakama baamoo pipya role pyao piso nenge nao pii ketae palyuo poraiyuo lao Atonainja emba kiŋi ingyuo palyuo karalu karape, letaminyi.
Dopa pipyamopape nambamoo purisi akali Satokomoo Benayamoo dee Solomonemoo nenge nala ipupwa laa napya.
Embame yulu doo pipyamo dupwa kando kapa lao suu pyapala embena akali mupwa dupwa kando lamaiyuo, Embena kiŋi yulu doko apimi nyera lao lamai naese?
Kiŋi Dapitimi enda Betesepa baa dee kapu kyuo epena leya. Dopa leyamosa enda baa epapala Dapitinya lenge kambu siyamo dokona kareya.
Epo kareyamo dokopa Dapitimi enda lamaiyuo dopa leya. Nambame Kamongo lete karalu karenge dokome namba randa malu nao kareyonopa kiiramo nyiyamo dokona kingi lao lalu lao lao,
Epapu nambame emba kando Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Anatunya kingi dokona lao embena ikinyingi Solomone baa nambana panda nyuo kiŋi ingyuo karara lao lalu lao leyo kande doko alowa pii naro, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Betesepame pangu sepala lao, Nambana kamongo baa karalu karena leya.
Leyamo dokopa kiŋi Dapitimi akali Satoko Netane dee Benayamoo epena leya. Nakama epeyaminyi dokopa baame akali dusipa lamaiyuo dopa leya.
Nakamame nambana yulu pyakange akali mupwa dusipa nyuo lanyuo nambana ikinyingi Solomone baa nambana mena ose matana piso papingi dokona petena lapala lanyuo ipwa guu lao epenge yuu Giyone dokona pupwape.
Yuu dokona Satoko Netanepame baa Isaraele wambunya kiŋi karena lao kyawana mamba kisakamirambi. Dopa pirambinyi dokopa bikuli poo lao pii poraiyuo lao lao, Kiŋi Solomone doko palu karalu karara lena, leya.
Lapala baa anda kapu kyuo nambana kiŋi ingyuo petenge seya dokona pisa epeya kande dokopa baa eparamuli pyuo ipupwape. Nambame Solomone baa mupwa ingyuo nambana panda nyepala Isaraele wambupi dee Juu wambupi iso karara lao rombo palyiyu dokona baa nambana panda alowa pyuo nyera, leya.
Benayame isingi lao, Embame letenyili pyuo pirama. Dokona Kamongo Anatumi emba letene doko kapa lena, leya.
Emba kiŋi andake doko, yulu pyuo karene dokopa Kamongo baa emba nyiso role kareya dopako pyuo Solomone nyiso kararamopa emba kiŋi yulu piinyi andanyi pyambuyamopape banya yulu pyuo wambu isaramo doko kamame ulipili ingyuo ando para, leya.
Lapala Satoko Netane Benayamoo dee akali kiŋi rapu pyuo karenge dusipame Solomone baa kiŋi Dapitinya mena osena mata dokona petena lapala rapu pyuo lanyuo ipwa guu lao epenge yuu Giyone dokona peyami.
Papala Satokome olipi ipwange petenge penge Kamongona komau anda dokona nyuo minyuo peyamo doko nyepala Solomone kiŋi ingyuo karena lao mamba kisakamiya. Kisakamipala dokopa nakamame bikuli pii poo lao wambu peparae pii poraiyuo lapala Solomone baa kiŋi ingyuo karalu karena leyami.
Lapala nakama peparae Solomone epeyamuli pyuo kapu kyuo epo rae maiyuo pii ketae palyuo lao kurulu dupwa lao pii poraiyuo lao epeyaminyisa yuu dupwa pyuku pyuku leya.
Atonainjamoo dee banya upunili wambu dupwa peparaepe nenge nao oteyami dokopa pii poponge doko siyami. Dokopa Joapeme bikuli pii leyami doko sepala dopa leya. Aki rengendena yuu taone dokona pii palase? leya.
Pii lao otapa nayamopa Jonatane purisi Apiatana ikinyingi doko epeya. Epeyamo dokopa Atonainjame baa lamaiyuo lao, Akali keyange doko, pii keyange mende minyuo epenge epeleneŋe andakare ipu, leya.
Dokopa Jonataneme isingi lamaiyuo, Kondo. Nambame pii angi mende minyuo epa nalyoŋo. Doko kiŋi Dapitimi banya kiŋi yulu Solomone nyinya lao rombo palyapya, leya.
Kiŋi Dapitimi akali Satoko Netane dee Benayamoo dee banya akali baa rapu pyuo karenge dupwape pipala Solomone rapu pyuo iso nyela pena lapya. Lapyasa akali dusipame baa kiŋinya mena osena mata dokona petena lapala lanyuo pumi, leya.
Papala Satoko Netanepame kiŋi karena lao ipwa guu lao epenge yuu Giyone dokona kiŋi wasambipya. Dopa pipala dokopa baa lanyuo yuu taone dokona rae maiyuo pii poraiyuo lao pumisa dokome yuu doko wambu dupwa kilyipu kilyipu karaminyi doko emba selenelyamo.
Solomone baa epapu kiŋi ingilyamo, leya.
Dee mende palamo. Dapitinya yulu pyakamingi akali mupwa dupwame kiŋi Dapiti baa ketae pyambwala papala dopa leyami. Embena Kamongo Anatumi Solomone embapa manda manja naramopa baa mupwa wakasa ingyuo karena lena. Baame iso kararamo dokopa elyape wakasa ingyuo pena, leyami. Dokopa kiŋi Dapitimi banya luu palenge panda dokona pangu soo Anatu ketae pyambuo lakando ateŋa leya.
Lapala nakama lamaiyuo, Kamongo Isaraele wambunya Anatumi nambana ikinyingi dokona mende kiŋi karena lapala nambame kando karape letamo dokona baa lakandamana, leya.
Dokopa Atonainjana upunili wambu dupwa pakapala nakama sipuro yoko lapala kata wakale wakale dupwana peyami.
Atonainja baa kiŋi Solomone kando pakapala Kamongona komau anda dokona konando papala Anatu mena pyao kiso maingi kana pyare laro karenge dokona papala pinjingi dusipa minyaro kareya.
Karapala baame dopa leya. Kiŋi Solomone namba pyao kumasa naro lao wambo lalu lao lena lao karamo leyami doko kiŋi Solomoneme soo kareya.
Sepala Solomoneme isingi lao, Baa kapa warombo soo rape rape lao karara ramo doko banya kyawasi dokona kuki mendepe minyanda narami. Dopa pii nara ramo doko baa kumara, leya.
Lapala dokopa kiŋi Solomoneme akali Atonainja lanyuo lano epena leya. Dopa leyasa Atonainja baa kiŋi kareyamo dokona epapala wapambu pii pyao pangu siya. Dopa piyasa kiŋi Solomoneme baa anda pena leya.
Dapiti baa oo repeta kumara ingiyamo dokopa banya ikinyingi Solomone epena lapala mana pii lumwa pyuo dopa lamaiya.
Nambana kumarono yuu gii doko repeta epelyamo. Dokona emba kando porayapala akali ingyuo karape.
Karo dokopa embena Kamongo Anatumi aki mende pii lao laramuli pyuo pyuo karape. Banya mawa pii dupwa Mosesena lowa pii dokona pyasi palamo dupwa warombo soo minyuo pyuo karape. Dopa pirinyi dokopa emba anja panda anja dupwana yulu pirinyi dupwana kapa palyuo para.
Nakamame banya pii warombo serami ramo doko Kamongome namba langyuo lalu lao lao langiya doko yaki nyuo kame soo kaeya nara. Dopa lao lalu lao langyuo, Nambana para pyasi dupwame nakamana suu pingi monape peparaeme banya mawa pii dupwa kandokondali pyuo warombo soo kararami ramo doko Isaraele dupwa rapu pyuo iso kararami, leya.
Pii mende palamoko. Akali Joapeme Isaraele wambunya yanda singi mupwa lama Apena Nuana ikinyingi dokopa Amasa Jetana ikinyingi dokopa namba keta pyao peyo piya kande doko suu pyape. Akali dokome namwa manda rao kareyamano dokopa yanda dokona akali lapo pyao kumakayami kande doko yano nyuo piya. Akali dolapome koo mende pii nayambinyipa mee piyamosa banya yulu doko namba keta ipyamosa randa nyilyu.
Dokona emba mende piri doko silini. Doko embame baa mee wambu kumungi dopa pyuo kumunya lao yaki nyii napipi.
Namba embena yangone Epesalomeme pyalana piyamo pakao ralo peyono dokopa nakamame namba anjiki pyuo nyisiyamiŋi. Dokona yuu Giliate range akali Basilainya ikinyingi dupwa embame kando anjiki pyuo nyiso karape.
Dokona akali mende opetae Simai lenge akali Gerana ikinyingi akali Benjamenena yuu dokona yuu taone Barumi lenge singi dokona range dokome namba yuu Makanaime dokona pena peyono yuu gii dokopa baame namba koo keta paliri, leya. Dopa piyamopape ipwa Jotane mare dokona baame namba kando nyiyamo dokopa nambame baa kando Kamongo dokona kingi lao lalu lao lao nambame baa nyuo pyao kumaka naro, leyo.
Dopa leyonopape embame baa randa mai napala mee karena kaeya napipi. Emba apa piru lao doko silini dokona angi kandapala baa pyao kumakape, leya.
Dapiti baa kumuyamo dokopa banya yuu taone dokona malu piyami.
Baa ee kana akalisa kisima Isaraele wambunya kiŋi ingyuo kareya. Karapala ee kana yanda ipingi nyepo yuu Eperone dokona kiŋi yulu pyuo kareya dee yuu Jerusaleme dokona ee kana akalisa rema dee ipisu remako nembo kiŋi yulu pyuo karo piya.
Dokopa enakana Solomoneme banya rakange Dapitinya panda nyuo baa kiŋi kareya. Karapala banya kiŋi yulu piyamo doko kandokondali pyuo minyaro karo piyamosa yulu doko ando peya.


































Yuu Isipi kiŋi dokona wanenge doko nyepala Solomoneme kiŋi dokopa kando puu minyuo kararamba lao lalu lao leya. Baame enda doko nyepala minyuo pao Dapitinya yuu taone dokona reto palyuo karo banya andape tembole andape dee yuu Jerusaleme kana kame awali lao dupwape pyuo oteya.
Tembole anda doko Kamongona lao pyakamipa nayaminyi dokona wambu dupwame kana pyare lasi wakale wakale dupwana mena pyao kiso maiyuo kareyami.
Dokopa Solomoneme Kamongo mona retapala banya rakange Dapitimi mana leyamo dupwana moko minyuo piya. Dopa piyamopape baame mena dupwa opetae pyao kumakarapu kana pyare lasi wakale wakale dupwana kiso maipapu piya.
Yuu mendepa baa yuu Gipione lenge dokona mena pyao kiso maiyala peya. Peyamo renge doko kana pyare lasi dokona singi doko ama wambumi soo otenge dokome peya. Baame wamba dokona kiso mukinyi nembo maingi doko andete lapo malu dopale kiso maingi.
Yuu gii kukwa dokopa baa paleyamo dokona kombeyame Kamongo pano epapala baa piso soo lao, Nambame emba aki mende jii lao suu pilisi? leya.
Dokopa Solomoneme isingi lao, Embame embena kendemande akali nambana rakange Dapiti doko kando embame yuu peparae mona retenge renge andake doko lasaka pii. Dopa piinyipa baame embena lenge kambu dorena kinyi rolae pyuo kareya. Dopa pyuo kareyasa embame baa mona retalu retenge renge andake doko lasaka pyuo puu pelyoŋo lao dokopa banya wane epapu banya panda nyuo iso karamo doko mai.
O Kamongo Anatu, namba wane kuki dee wambu dupwa kapa isaro ingya napyamopape embame namba kiŋi ingyuo rakanena panda nyii, lene.
Dokona wambu embena rangena ingyarami lao rombo palyiinyi dupwa pipya namba dae role pyao karamano. Wambu ama kamame malu soo kaeyo mendemepe yaka lao sukusa kapa paa narami.
Dokona lao keyange koopena wakale wakale doko anjuku lao soo nyuo dee kata rolae dokona soo rolo piru ingilyamo dokona embena mona palenge singinya renge doko namba jepe. Jii nare ramo doko embena wambu malu dapwa nambame apa pyuo reto karo rapu pyakarose? leya.
Solomoneme dokona lao piso siyamo dokopa Kamongo doko rae maiya.
Rae maipala Kamongome baa lamaiyuo lao, Emba rangena yuu gii londe palyuo kararene dokonape kamongo ingyuo bange malu retarene dokonape panda embena nyisu petenge dupwa pyao anamasi minyuo kararene dokonape piso sepengeli doko kaepala embame wambu dupwa rolae rapu pyuo kararoŋo lao singinya renge jii lao piso silini.
Dokona embame piso silini dupwa nambame piru. Pipala nambame emba singinya renge konda pyuo joo dee soo nyinginya renge joo piru doko wambu mendemepe wamba nyii nalu nange dee mendemepe rengya nyii nalu naramiko doko jero.
Embame piso see napinyi lapo opetaeko nambame emba jero. Emba palu kararene yuu gii dusipana peparae kiŋi menge dupwa nyuo isa palyuo bange malu seramopa emba ketae pyambuo kararami.
Embena rakane Dapiti piyamo doko suu pyao embame namba rape rape lao nambana mawa piipi lowa piipi dupwa warombo soo minyuo pyuo karare ramo doko yuu malu palyuo karare lao yuu gii londe jero, leya.
Enakana Solomone sipurapala kandeyamo dokopa Kamongo dokome kombeyame pii lamaiya ingiyamosa baa soo gisiya. Dopa pipala baa yuu Jerusaleme papala Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote siyamo dokona lenge kambusa roya karapala bange kiso mukinyi nembo dupwape dee nyuo malu palyuo yalya kando piso bange maingi dupwape Kamongo maiyuo piya. Enakana dokopa banya akali mupwa peparae malu palyuo nenge kiso maiya.
Yuu gii mende pamuku enda lama kiŋi Solomone peteya dokona epo kareyambi.
Dokona mendeme lao, Emba kiŋi andake doko, enda dakepa nambapa anda mendakinya palenge. Enda baa peteyamopa namba anda dokona wane nyaŋa mandeyo.
Nambana wane doko mandeyono yuu gii lama epo peyamopa baa waneko nyaŋa mandeya. Nambwa lama dolapo iki anda dokona peteyamba dokopa mendalipi epa nayami.
Yuu mendepa kukwa baame parali paki kapu kyama pao banya nyaŋa dokona ketae kalyiyamosa porambaiye nyii napala kumuya.
Dokopa enda baa kukwa sipurapala namba luu paleyonopa wane nambana ikinyingi namba repeta paleyamo doko nyuo minyuo pao banya luu palenge panda dokona peya. Papala enda baame wane kumasi doko nambana panda reteyapya.
Yuu gii yangama dokopa namba lenge rapala wane anju mairu lao piyu dokopa wane kumasi dake siyamo kandeyo. Kandapala namba repeta suu lao kandeyo dokopa doko nambana wane dokona lenge kambu nyii naya, leyo, leya.
Leyamo dokopa enda mende dokome lao, Daa wane lete doko nambana. Kumasi doko embena, leya. Dokopa enda wambo dokome lao, Daa wane lete doko nambana. Kumasi doko embena, leya. Dokona lao nakamba kiŋinya lenge kambu dokona apyanda piyambi.
Dokopa kiŋi Solomoneme lao, Nakamba mendeme lao wane nyaŋa lete doko nambama dee kumasi doko mendenaŋa lao letambinyi, leya.
Lapala baame wua gela mende nyela pena leya. Leyamo dokopa nyuo minyuo epeyaminyi dokopa
baame lao, Wane lete doko kanya dokona lama pyuo kunjapala paki enda mende maiyuo paki enda mende maiyuo pinya, leya.
Endangi angi dokome banya mona retenge renge doko banya wane keta peparae peyasa baame kiŋi doko lamaiyuo lao, Emba kiŋi andake doko, wane doko pyaa napala enda doko mai, leya. Dopa leyamopape enda mende dokome lao, Nambwa dalapona mendepe jii napipi. Suu pilini dokona palyuo lama ingyuo kunjape, leya.
Dokopa Solomoneme lao, Wane doko pyao kumaka kae. Enda wambo doko wane dokona endangi angi doko lamoŋo. Wane doko enda doko range mainya, leya.
Isaraele wambu dupwame Solomonena yulu nyuo rolo piyamo doko sepala dopa pyuo kapa ingya nao apyanda pisi seramo dupwa Kamongome rolena lao singinya renge maiyalyamo lao soo nyiyami. Dopa pipala nakama peparae baa ketae pyambuo kareyami.




















Kiŋi Airimi lenge yuu Taya range doko Dapitipa yuu peparae puu minyuo karenge. Doko Solomone baa kiŋi ingyuo rakange Dapitinya panda nyiya leyami doko sepala baame pii minyakamingi akali lapo Solomone peteya dokona pena leya.
Dokona Solomoneme wai pii doko kapu kyuo Airimi lamaiya.
Nambana rakane Dapitimi yuu muu baa nyisu petenge dupwa pipya yanda yaki nyii nao mee pyulu pyuo piyami. Dokona banya Kamongo dokome banya nyisu petenge dupwa pipya pyao wini pii lao wini pingi renge ene maipa nayamo dokopa banya Kamongo Anatu lakandenge tembole anda doko pyakamiru lapala kapa pii naya doko emba silini.
Dopa piyamopape nambana Kamongo Anatu dokome nambana yuu lili dupwana manda rao mona kyuu lao singi renge jipya. Dokona nambana nyisu petenge mende kara nalyaminyi. Dee namwa pyao minyarapala nyeraminyi kata mende see nalyamoko.
Kamongo dokome nambana rakane Dapiti kando lalu lao lao, Embena ikinyi nambame embena mata kiŋi wasaro dokome nambana tembole anda doko pyakara, leya. Dokona epapu nambame tembole anda doko nambana Kamongo Anatunya lakandenge anda doko pyakamiru lao suu pilyu, leya.
Emba soo otelene. Embena akali dupwa isa pokonge yulu doko soo otenge. Dopa pyuo nambana akali dupwa isa pokalena saka nange. Dokona lao embena akali lapo yuu Lepanone dokona isa sita lapo nambana pokakanale pena lape. Larenepa nambana akali dupwa nakama pipya role yulu pirami. Piraminyipa embame bange aki mende larenyili pyuo embena akali dupwa ropo pyakaro.
Airimi baa Solomonena wai pii doko nyepala ama rae wakasa maipala baame lao, Dapiti banya panda nyepala wambu rara andake dokona kiŋi karara lao Dapitinya ikinyingi keyange singi renge doko maiyamo dokona lao epapu Kamongona kingi lakandamana, leya.
Lapala Airimimi wai pii lapo dee kapu kyuo Solomone lamaiyuo lao, Namba embena wai pii doko nyipu. Nyepala embame piso sipinyili pyuo piru lao rapa rapa pilyu. Nambame isa sitape dee siya isape dupwa rapa rapa pyakaro.
Nambana akali dupwame yuu Lepanone piso isa pote dupwa minyuo epo ipwa kota dokona peyarami. Dokopa yuu emba rombo palyiinyi dokona soo pao retena lao isa para para dopale ingyuo nyuo pyaso puu pyarami. Soo pao retarami dokopa nambana akali dupwame puu polarami dokopa embena akali dupwame nyepala iso kararami. Dokopa embena yulu doko nambana akali dupwa nenge maso mairinyipa nao karena lao namba suu pilyu, leya.
Lapala Airimimi isa sitape dee siya isa potepe Solomoneme nyelana suu piyamo dupwa maiya.
Dokona Solomoneme nenge witi sikyali taosande lama ama malu dee isa olipi ipwange ama maluko soo kaeyo ee kana yaka lao banya akali dupwa maiyuo nenge pyakamiya.
Kamongo dokome banya lalu lao leyamo doko kame see napapu karapala Solomone singinya renge doko maipapu piya. Akali Airimi Solomonepa keta mona kyuu lao singinya renge doko paleyamosa nakamba mona mendaki palyuo yulu dupwa dopa piramba dopa piramba lao lao palyiyambi.
Kiŋi Solomoneme akali taosande akalisa rema Isaraele peparaena rombo palyuo nyepala yulu pinya leya.
Lapala akali Andonirame lenge doko baa mupwa ingyuo dokona rapu pinya leya. Baame akali dupwa lili rema pyuo lane mendaki akali taosande akalisa ingyapala lane mendaki mendaki lao larapu yuu Lepanone dokona kana mendaki yulu pyuo karo dee kana lama larapu anda karo pinya leya.
Dokopa Solomoneme akali taosande akalisa mange lama (80,000) karo nyepala yuu kyau dupwana kana dupwa pyao nyinya leya. Dee akali taosande akalisa yanda ipingi nyepome (70,000) kana dupwa soo pena leya.
Dee akali mupwa taosande rema dee andete remameko yulu dupwana mupwa ingyuo isinya leya.
Kiŋi Solomoneme leyamuli pyuo nakamame kana andake keyange tembole anda dokona susa sera dupwa nyiyami.
Solomonena yulu pingi akali dupwape Airiminya yulu pingi akali dupwape dee yuu taone Bipilose range akali dupwapeme tembole anda pirami dupwana isa kanape dupwa rapa rapa piyami.














Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu Isipi yaki nyuo epo kareyaminyipa ee kana malu (480) epo papeyamopa kiŋi Solomone dokome Isaraele iso kareya. Iso kareyamopa ee kana kisima papeyamopa kana lapo kingi Sipi lenge dokona Solomoneme tembole anda pinya kando soo piya.
Doko andakare dorena puu rombo minyuo makande pyuo isa makando akalisa lama ipisu yanda ipingi (27 mita) dopale ingiya. Dee wangu dolapona isa makando mange mendaki (9 mita) ingiya. Dee ketae dorena makande piyaminyi isa makando akalisa mendaki ipisu rema dee mende pakirena opetae (13.5 mita) dopale ingyuo piya.
Dokopa panda konandowame doko makande pyuo isa makando kisima dee pakirena (4.5 mita) dopale ingiya. Dee wangu dolapona tembole anda angi dopale ingyuo isa makando mange mendaki karo (9 mita) dopale ingiya.
Anda dokona apya windowa kamarename kuki ingyapala andakarerena andake ingyuo sinya lao wasiyami.
Panda poo pyasi wangu dolaponape dee matarenape panda lama konda pyuo reteyami. Anda dokona anda liti rema ingyuo kamba kamba kareya. Dokona panda kuki lapo opetae kunjo reteyami.
Urumu mendaki lao wambo isa anda dokona apya doko kameya pyuo pyapala mende kanya dokona apya doko maena ingyuo pyao karo pipala kamame ketae doko kamame maena kuki ingyuo sukusa paowale kareyami. Anda liti dokona ketae pulyuo pyuo dokopa apya parali dolapo kukinya pyambuo kareyamisa andakare andake ingiya. Isa anda doko isa makando lama dee kuki mende konda pyuo dopale ingiya (2.2 mita). Kanya anda doko isa makando lama dee pakirena dee kuki konda pyuo dopale ingiya (2.7 mita). Ketae anda doko isa makando rema dee kuki konda pyuo dopale ingiya (3.1 mita).
Tembole anda doko pimiŋi lao ama doope wua jaa laope dee mee bange kela kalope dupwame panasara lapala kana tembole anda dokona palyuo piraminyi dupwa kana apuro nyiyaminyi mare dokona piso rapa rapa pipala peyami.
Anda liti lamape remape panya dokopa lora makayami doko yuu dulurena kanda kanda makayami.
Dopa pyuo kiŋi Solomoneme tembole anda pyuo oteya. Baame isa siya polaŋe pisi dokome ketae lulyano ingyuo lambuo laeyo pyuo waso dee dokomeko anda yangi ingyuo kaowa piya.
Anda liti rema dokona pinjingi dusipa isa makando dee kuki konda pyuo dopale kapa kapa pyuo ketae pyambuo piyami. Panda poo pyasi kamarena dokona siya isa dokome pyuo nyokonyapala dokopa wakale panda netarena konda pyuo reteyami.
Kamongo dokome Solomone lamaiyuo dopa leya,
Emba nambana lowa peparaepe dee mawa pii peparaepe warombo soo minyare ramo doko embena rakane Dapiti keta lalu lao leyono doko emba keta pyakaro.
Embame tembole anda pilini dakena namba nambana Isaraele wambu dapwa pipya sukusa dokona role pyao karo nambame nakama kame soo yaki nyii naro, leya.
Dokona lao Solomoneme tembole anda doko pyuo oteya.
Anda apya andakare dorena isa panda dokona piso pulyuo isa kingi sita lenge dokome kalya pyuo ketae peyami. Dee isa panda doko siya isa dokome wasiyami.
Dee andakare sukusa dokona urumu mende kingi Kamame Poo Pyasi lenge doko tembole anda matarena ingyuo piyami. Doko makande pyuo isa makando mange mendaki karo (9 mita) londe dopale ingiya doko isa sita make dokona lili pipala isa panda dokona piso pao ketae yangi dokona suu lao piyami.
Dee urumu Kamame Poo Pyasi lenge dokona panda mende kambusa siyamo doko makande pyuo isa makando akalisa ipisu mange lama karo (18 mita) londe ingyuo waso reteya.
Dee isa sitame wasisi polaŋe dupwa isa jingipi kipwa pengepe isame wasisi bange dupwame kalya piyami. Pipala andakare peparae dupwa isa sitame wasisi polaŋe dupwame kaname kame pyuo apya wasiyami dupwa kanda nana lao yambe pyao oteyami.
Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko retarami ingiya dokome tembole anda matarename dokona panda sukusa doko wasiyami.
Doo panda sukusa andakarelyamo doko makande pyuo isa makando mange mendaki karo (9 mita) londe dee isa makando mange mendaki karo (9 mita) ketae ingyuo dee isa makando mange mendaki karo (9 mita) oko soo dopale ingyuo piya. Dupwa peparae kana golo karo pisa nange dupwame nee piyami. Dee kana pyare lasi doko isa sita dupwana polaŋe dupwame yambe piyami.
Dopa pipala tembole anda andakare apya dupwa kana golo dupwame yambe piyami. Dee kana golo kii puu dupwame panda sukusa kambu konandowame dokona yukuyami. Dokona apya opetaeko kana golo dupwame yambe piyami.
Dee tembole anda andakare apya dupwa peparae kana golo dupwame yambe piyami. Dee urumu Kamame Poo Pyasi dokona kana pyare lasi singi dupwa opetaeko kana golo dupwame yambe piyami.
Aŋala lama olipi isame wasisi dolapo urumu Kamame Poo Pyasi dokona reteyami. Dolapo laparae makande pyuo isa makando kisimako dee pakirena (4.5 mita) londe dopale ingyuo reteyami.
Laparae wangu dolapona mendare ingiya dee pinjingi dolapo mendareko ingiya. Dolapo laparae mendena mendena pyuo papake lamako karenge. Dolapo makande pyuo isa makando londe lama dee kuki mende (2.2 mita) dopale ingiya. Dokona lao papake pinjingi mendena dokome pao mende dokona doko kando nyiya. Doko makande pyuo isa makando pao kisima dee pakirena (4.4 mita) dopale ingiya.
<range>
<range>
Nakambame dolapo laparae maki pyuo urumu Kamame Poo Pyasi dokona pisiyami. Nakambana papake dolapo laparaeme pyasinju laro karo mendena dokome mende kando nyuo mendena dokome mende kando nyuo pipala pao panda suku dokona kando nyinya lao pyuo dee paki lama dolapome pao apya doko kando nyinya lao pyuo piyami.
Aŋala lama wasisi dolapo kana golo dupwame yambe pyao nyiyamo siyambi.
Dokopa panda angi andake dokope panda ama sukusa andakare dokope peparae isame wasisi bange yala isape isa jingipi aŋalape dupwame kalya pyuo waso pisiyami.
Dopa pipala isa panda dupwa kamame kana golo dupwame yambe piyami.
Yambe pyapala olipi isame kambu dowa lama maki pyuo wasapala urumu Kamame Poo Pyasinya kambu konando penge dokona palyiyami. Kambu dowa pinjingi peyamo ketae dulurename anda kuki mende piyami.
Pipala kambu dowa dolapo isame wasisi bange yala isape isa jingipi aŋalape dupwame kalya pyuo wasiyami. Dokona kambu dowa dolapope aŋala dupwape yala isa dupwape peparae kana golo dupwame ketae minyarambu nyuo yambe piyami.
Dopa pipala panda angi andake kambu konando penge wangu dolaponape dee ketae lambuo palyingi dokonape olipi isame wasiyami.
Dee siya isame kambu lama wasiyami.
Dolapo isame wasisi bange yala isape isa jingipi dee aŋalape dupwame kalya pyuo waso pisiyami. Bange dupwame kana golome kapa kapa pyuo kalya pyuo yambe piyami.
Kana kunjasi pote rema wara piyami dokona kanda kanda anda poo pyasi dokona andakarena ingyuo isa sita mendaki lao retarapu dee kana rema lao retarapu dokome pyuo nenge lyolo piyami.
Ee kana kisima dokona Solomoneme kiŋi yulu pyuo kareyamo yuu gii dokopa kana lapo kingi Sipi lenge dokona tembole anda doko pinya kanda soo puu rombo minyuo isa susa reteya.
Dopa pipala ee kana akalisa ipisu mendaki karo dokona Solomonemeko isiyamopa kana mange lama karo doko kana Bulu lenge dokona rapa rapa pyuo reteyamo dopale angi dokonako palyapala tembole anda doko pyuo oteya. Tembole anda angi doko Solomoneme ee kana yanda ipingi nembo pyuo oteya.



















































Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko yuu Sayone kiŋi Dapitinya taone dokona silyamo doko nyuo soo tembole anda dokona monaleŋe lao Solomoneme Isaraelena rarape akalyandape dupwana akali mupwa ingyuo karenge dupwape peparae baa karo dokona epena lao kee leya.
Nakama peparae kana kingi Etanimi lenge dokona nakamame kauwa anda pipala palyuo nenge nenge gii doko pyaka siyamo dokopa malu palyiyami.
Dokopa lita akali dupwa peparae epo malu palyiyaminyi dokopa purisi dupwame Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko minyalyapala soo pao
tembole anda dokona peyami. Dokopa purisi dupwamepe Lipae akali dupwamepe Kamongona komau anda dokope dee bange dokona singi dupwa peparaepe nyuo minyuo tembole anda dokona peyami.
Kiŋi Solomonemoo Isaraele wambu peparaepe epo Kamongona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote siyamo dokona lenge kambusa karo mena sipisipi dee mena bulamakaope dupwa ama malu soo kaeyo kapa yaka lao ota narami ingyuo pyao kiso maiyami.
Dokopa purisi dupwame Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko tembole anda andakare urumu Kamame Poo Pyasi dokona aŋala lama wasisi kareyambinyi dolapo isarena lunga lunga reteyami.
Dokopa nakambana papake dolapome bokote dokope bokote singi isa kalya isa dolapope yambe piya.
Dopa piyamo dokopa wambu mendeme urumu Kamame Poo Pyasi dokona lenge kambu siyamo dokona karapala isa kalya isa dokona pinjingi dolapo rolae kandarami ingiya. Dee mendasa karo kapa kanda narami ingiya. (Yuu gii pii dake Buku dakena pii dake pyao reteyaminyi yuu gii dokopa isa kalya isa dolapo yuu dokona mee siya.)
Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu Isipi piso epeyaminyi dokopa Kamongome nakama pipya kana minyuo lalu lao leyamopa Moseseme yuu kyau Sainai dokona karo pii dupwa kana lamana pyasi doko Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote dokona palyiyamo dolapoko iki paleya.
Purisi dupwa tembole anda doko yaki nyuo kama epeyaminyi dokopa aopa kopa dokome soo simbwapala
Kamongona yanga paupau lenge dokome nakamana lenge kambu dupwana lepo lepo piyasa nakamana yulu dupwana kamba kapu kyuo andakare pela parami ingya naya.
Dokopa Solomoneme ateŋa lao, Kamongo, Embame neta doko yake dokona rao karena leenepape emba kopape yuu iminjingipi dupwana mee kararo lee kande.
Dopa leenepape epapu nambame embena lao tembole anda kamame keyange wakasa doko pyakapu. Panda dokona emba epo karalu karare.
Wambu dupwa dokona kareyaminyi dokopa kiŋi Solomone kapu kyepala nakama kandaro karapala Anatu baame nakama elyape keta pisinya lao piso siya.
Baame lao, Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Anatu doko lakandamana. Nambana rakane Dapiti kando lalu lao leyamo doko alowa pii nalyamo, leya.
Kamongome lao, Nambana wambu dupwa yuu Isipi piso lanyuo epeyono dokopa Isaraele wambunya yuu dupwana nambame yuu taone mendena tembole anda pipala namba dokona lakandaramiŋi lao rombo palya nayo. Dopa pii nayonopape nambame Dapiti emba nambana wambu dupwa rapu pyakape lao rombo palyiyu, leya.
Lapala Solomoneme deeko lao, Nambana rakane Dapitimi Isaraele wambumi Kamongo Anatu lakandarami lao tembole anda mende pinya lao rapa rapa piya.
Piyamopape Kamongo dokome baa lamaiyuo lao, Emba nambana lao tembole anda pyakapulinya kumulini doko kapaŋa.
Dopa pipinyipape embame tembole anda doko pii nalu nao nare, langilyu. Doko embena wane emba rangena ikinyi angi dokome nambana tembole anda doko pyakara, leya.
Dokona epapu Kamongo dokome banya pii lalu lao leyamo doko retaro karamo. Namba Isaraele wambunya kiŋi ingyuo nambana rakanena panda nyuo nambame Isaraele wambu nakamana Kamongo Anatu lakando kararami lao tembole anda doko pyakamiyu.
Namwana rora ambasu dupwa baame yuu Isipi piso lanyuo epo Kamongome kana minyuo lalu lao pii leyamo kana dolapona palenge bokotena palyingi doko opetae tembole anda dokona retara lao nambame panda wasakamiyu, Solomoneme leya.
Dokopa wambunya lenge kambu dupwana Solomone papala kana pyare lasi dokona lenge kambusa kareya. Karapala banya kingi ketae pyambwapala ateŋa lao,
Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Anatu, mendasa yake panda ketaepe isa yuu dakenape Anatu emba yale mende kara nange. Embena wambu dupwame emba kando mona kare kare karo embame larene dupwa pyuo palyuo karo piraminyi dokopa embena kana minyuo lalu lao leene pii doko embena wambu dupwa keta reto karo nakama mona reto karenge.
Nambana rakane Dapiti kando lalu lao leene doko embame minyaro karene. Epapu pii peparae pyaka silyamo.
Dokona epapu Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Anatu, nambame ateŋa lao, embame lalu lao lenge pii lapo nambana rakane kando lao doko opetaeko yaki nyii nao minyuo karape. Banya para pyaramo dupwame nambana rakangeme emba warombo soo kareyamuli pyuo piraminyi dokopa nakamana mendeme Isaraele wambunya kiŋi ingyuo yuu peparae rapu pyuo karara lao lalu lao leepya.
Dokona lao Isaraele wambunya Anatu, epapu embena kendemande akali nambana rakane Dapiti kando pii leene dupwa peparae angingyuo pinya leya.
Dopa piramopape Anatu, emba kinyi angingyuo isa yuu dakena palyuo karo pilisi? Yake peparae emba kapa karare ingya nalyamo. Dokona apa pipala emba tembole anda piyunu dakena kapa kararese?
Kamongo nambana Anatu, namba embena kendemande akali. Nambana ateŋa pilyu doko sakape. Sakapala epapu nambame emba pii piso silyu dupwa pyakape.
Tembole anda dakena lakandaramiŋi lao embame rombo palyii dokona kukwa korakamape rapu pyuo karape. Nambame tembole anda dakena lenge kambu pyambwapala ateŋa laro dokopa sakape.
Yuu dakena nakamame lenge kambu pyambwapala ateŋa leyami kande dokopa embena wambu dupwana ateŋa dupwape nambana ateŋa dupwape sakape. Embena anda yake panda dokona karo sepala namwana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakape.
Wambu mendeme wambu mendale yango kando koo pipyaŋa lapala baa pii naroŋo lao lalu lao lara lao tembole anda dakena embena kana pyare lasi dokona lanyuo eparami.
Eparaminyi dokopa O Kamongo yake panda karo sepala embena kendemande dupwa iso rolo pinya karape. Mendeme kokwa soo koo piya kande doko baa randa maipi. Dee mendeme koo pali nalyamo lao suu pyao rolae pyuo kareya kande doko kiiramo nyepe.
Embena Isaraele wambu dupwame emba keta koo piraminyi dokona nakamana nyisu petenge dupwame nyuo isa palyarami. Dokopa dee nakama emba keta kapu kyuo epapala tembole anda dakena nakamana koo dupwa nyuo kame saka lao epo inyimungu piso seraminyipa
emba yake panda dokona karo nakamana pii sakamipi. Embena wambu dupwana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakamipala nakamana rora ambasupi yuu mainyi dokona minyuo pupi.
Embena wambu dupwame emba kando koo piraminyisa embame apu epa nana lao minyarene dokopa dee nakamana koo dupwa kaepala polo lapala tembole anda dakena lenge kambu maro lao epo inyimungu piso ateŋa laraminyipa
emba yake panda dokona karo nakamana ateŋa doko sakamipi. Isaraele wambu dupwana koo dupwape dee kiŋi dokona koo dupwape nyuo kame sakamipi. Dopa pipala yulu rolae dokona pinya lao mana lamaipi. Mana lamaipala, O Kamongo embena wambu dupwa palu karo pirami lao embena yuu angi ingyuo maiyalu maiyuo mainyi dakena apu epo karena lape.
Dopa pipala yuu dakena lopo andake seramo panda wambu peparae yanyi andake pyaramo panda poo raiya andake minyapala ee dupwa kumaramo panda aimbu malu ee naraminyi panda embena wambu dupwa nakamana nyisu petenge dupwame pyalana piraminyi panda yanyi angape nakama keta palira dokopape
nakamana ateŋa doko sakamipi. Embena Isaraele wambu dupwana mende mona randame kumuo tembole anda dakena lenge kambusa nakamana kingi pyambwapala ateŋa larami dokopa
nakamana ateŋa doko sakamipi. Embena anda yake panda dokona karo nakamana ateŋa sakamipi. Sepala nakamana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakamyuo nakama nyisape. Embame iki isa akalinya mona suu pingipi dupwa soo gisilini. Wambu yulu wakale wakale pilyaminyili pyuo yano pyakamipi.
Dokona lao embena wambu dupwame embame namwana rora ambasupi yuu mainyi dokona palu karo yuu peparae emba warombo sinya.
Wambu rara wakale yuu nanesa palenge mendeme embena kingi andake dokope embena yulu andake dokope embena wambu keta piinyi dupwape sepala emba lakandala epo tembole anda dakena ateŋa lala eparamo dokopa
<range>
banya ateŋa doko sakamipi. Yake panda emba palenge dokona karo banya ateŋa doko sakamipala emba pii lao piso seramo doko pepe. Dokona lao wambu yuu muu peparaena karenge dupwame embena Isaraele wambu dupwame emba soo nyuo warombo soo kararaminyili pyuo pirami. Dokopa nakamame tembole anda nambame piyunu dake emba lakandenge panda lao soo nyerami.
Embena wambu dupwa nakamana nyisu petenge wambu dupwa pipya pimwaiyuo yanda pela pena lao lamairinyi dokopa nakamame emba kando ateŋa larami. Yuu wakale wakale dupwana karo yuu taone embame rombo palyiinyi dakepe dee tembole anda nambame embena lao pyakayono dakepe kandaro karo ateŋa leyami kande dokopa
nakamana ateŋa dupwa sakamipi. Emba yake panda dokona karo nakamana ateŋa dupwa sakamipala nakamana nyisu petenge dupwa kapa anamasi minyarami lao poraiyuo nyisape.
Wambu mendeme koo pii narande daa. Dokona embena wambu dupwame emba kando koo piraminyipa emba imbwuapala nakamana nyisu petenge dupwame nakama pipya pyao wini pinya lapala nakama yuu wakale dupwana karapusi ingyuo lanyuo pena lao pepe. Dopa pirinyipa yuu doko nanesa wakasa ingyaramopape
embena wambu dupwana ateŋa laraminyi doko sakamipi. Yuu dokona nakamana koo dupwana lao kondapala polo lao kopetame kareyami dupwana lao ateŋa leyami kande dokopa, O Kamongo nakamana ateŋa doko sakamipi.
Tembole anda nambame embena lao pyakayono dokope embame namwana rora ambasupi yuu mainyi dakepe dee yuu taone embame rombo palyiinyi dakepe dupwana kandaro piso yuu dokona angi kinyi nakamana koo dupwana polo lao ateŋa larami ramo dokopa
nakamana ateŋa doko sakamipi. Embena anda yake panda dokona karo sepala nakama sakame kumuo nyiso karape.
Nakamana koo dupwa peparaepe dee emba kando mata jilyaminyi dupwape nyuo kame sakamipi. Dopa pipala nakamana nyisu petenge dupwame nakama keta anjiki pyuo pinya lao pyakamipi.
Nakama embena range kipungi wambu. Yuu Isipi dokona randa andake nao kareyaminyi dokopa nakama nyuo minyuo epee kande.
Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa, embena Isaraele wambu dupwape nakamana kiŋi dokope kando anjiki koo pyuo dee nakama embame dopako pyuo nyisalase lao piso soo kee larami dokopa nakamana ateŋa doko sakamipi.
Embame wambu dupwa embena range ingyara lao wambu peparaena rombo palyii kande. Namwana rora ambasu dupwa Isipi yaki nyuo minyuo epeene dokopa embena kendemande akali Mosese keta nakama dopa lamai.
Solomoneme baa kana pyare lasi lenge kambu siyamo dokona wapambu pii pyaro piso kingi ketae pyambuo Kamongo kando ateŋa leya. Ateŋa lao otapala baa roya kareya.
Wambu nyuo malu palyuo peteyami dupwa keta Kamongona elyape keta pisingi renge doko peena lao baame pii poraiyuo lao piso siya. Baame lao,
