Dopa lapala baame wai pii minyingi akali mende Ilaisa nyela pena leya. Yuu gii dokopa Ilaisa baa banya anda akali andapae lapo baa kandala epeyami dupwa pipya role peteyami. Wambo kiŋinya wai pii minyingi doko epapa nayamopa Ilaisame akali andapae dupwa lamaiyuo, Akali wambu pyao kumakaenge dokome mendali dae namba pyala pena lalamo lamo. Epapu baa dae repeta epeya kande doko kambu dowa doko upi lapala baa andakare epa nana lamailapape. Kiŋi baa enakana oo repeta epara, leya.
Pii dake lao oteyamopa aopa kiŋi doko epo pyaka sepala dopa leya. Randa dake Kamongo dokome namwa jilyamo. Dokona baa mende pira lao akipamo namba lama opetae isaro kararope? leya.
Ilaisame isingi lao, Kamongo dokome aki letamo lao see. Yuu gii dapwa pipya rakya embame Samaria makete dokona witi kilokerame rema panda bali kilokerame pakinyamange emba kana kulingi mendaki maiyuo ropo pyare ingilyamo, leya.
Akali kiŋi dokopa role pyao pao baa nyiso karenge dokome Ilaisa lamaiyuo, Doko pii nara ingilyamo. Kamongo baa rangeme apunda waiya lao dakepa pena laramopape doko kapa ingya nara. Dokopa Ilaisame isingi lamaiyuo, Embame doko piramo kandare. Kandarenepape embame nenge dupwana lapo nyuo naa nare, leya.
Akali kisima nakamana yanenge dokona rete rapa pingi dokome randa nao karenge dusipa yuu taonena kana kame kambu dokona kamandarena karapala nakama range mendali kanda kanda pyuo dopa leyami. Akipamo namwa dakena isaro karo namwa kumaramase?
Dopa piramopape namwa yuu taone sukusa dokona papala lopome kumarama dokome paa narama ingilyamo. Dopa piramopape namwa dakena kararama ramo namwa kumaramakolyamo. Dopa piralyamo dokona namwa Siria wambu dupwa komau anda pyuo palimi dokona monale. Dokona namwa kando koo andake ingyuo pyakarami doko namwa pyao kumakarami. Dee mende ramo namwa kyawa minyuo kaeyakarami rapisi, leyami.
Dopa lapala yuu kwuala peyamo dokopa nakama Siria wambu komau anda pyuo paleyami dokona peyami. Dopa pyuo pao repeta kando nyiyaminyi dokopa mendali dokona kara nayami.
Kamongo dokome Siria ami yanda singi dupwa sinya lao yanda singi mena ose matana pisope dee mena oseme ipyuo penge uliuli pii lenge dopale ingyuo leya. Dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwame Iti wambunya kiŋipi dee Isipi wambunya kiŋipi dee nakamana ami yanda singipi dupwa nakama pyala pena lao kana maimilyamo lao Siria dupwame suu pyao kareyami.
Dokona lao Siria wambu dupwa nakamana mena osepe dongepe dee komau andape dupwa yaki nyuo nakama kuma narama lao pyako wakale wakale peyami. Dokopa yuu anda paleyami dupwa singi dopale ingyuo sinya lao mee yaki nyuo peyami.
Dokopa akali kisima komau anda pyuo paleyami dokona kaepeta dusa pao kando nyepala komau anda mendena kolando peyami. Papala nenge ipwape doo siyamo dupwa nyuo neyami. Napala kana kulingipi dee kana golope dee komaupi lapo siyamo kandeyami dupwa nyiyami. Nyepala anda doko yaki nyuo papala bange dupwa yalu piyami. Pipala kambako kapu kyuo epeyami. Epo komau anda mendenako konando peyami. Papala doo piyami dopako pyuo bange siyamo dupwa nyiyami.
Enakana nakama range mendeme mende kando lao, Namwa dapa pii napala namwa wai pii enenge doko sepala retaro kara narama ingilyamo. Namwa pii doko rakya yangama lamairama lapala kaeyarama ramo doko namwa randa nyerama. Dokona lao yuu gii dakepa aopa papala kiŋinya akali mupwa dupwa lamaila mwua, leyami.
Dokona lao nakama Siria wambunya komau anda pyuo paleyaminyi doko yaki nyepala yuu taone Samaria dokona kapu kyuo peyami. Papala kame kambu dokona akali iso karenge dupwa kee leyami. Lapala lamaiyuo lao, Namwa Siria wambu palimi dokona pumwa doko mendali kandope pii mende soope pii nalamano. Dee mena ose dongepe dupwa anjaro palimi. Komau anda dupwa Siria wambumi yaki nyuo peyaminyi dopaleko karapya, leyami.
Dokopa kame kambu dokona iso karenge akali dupwame pii doko arome pyao leyaminyisa pii doko pao kiŋinya anda dokona polo lamaiyami.
Dokopa yuu doko mee kukwa ingyuo kareyamopa kiŋi doo rate dokona luu paleya doko sipurapala banya akali mupwa dupwa lamaiyuo lao, Siria wambu dupwame namwana lao mende lao lao rapa rapa pyuo retakami doko nakama langiruwale. Nakamame dae namwa lopo andake sipyamo doko soo nyimi. Soo nyepala dokona lao nakama palimi anda yuupi dupwa yaki nyepala yuu muu wangu kipwa kipwa dupwana yalu pela pumi. Nakamame namwa yuu taone dake yaki nyepala nenge koto parami dokopa nakamame namwa lete minyaro nyepala yuu taone doko nakama nyerama lao suu pyami, leya.
Dokopa banya akali mupwa dupwana mendeme lao, Wambu yuu taone dakena dae petaminyi dapwa wambu wambo lapo kumuyami kande dopale ingyuo kumalaminyi. Dokona lao namwame akali lapo mena ose kingi paki pyarepala pao karaminyi dakena piso pena lama. Lapala namwame apa pilyape lao kandamanale, leya.
Dokopa nakama akali lapo rombo palyapala kiŋi dokome mena oseme ipyuo papingi uliuli lamana piso pena leya. Papala Siria yanda singi dupwa apa pimi lao karo kando sepala epena leya.
Dokopa akali dupwa Jotane nanesale pao karo kandeyami dokopa Siria dupwa pyako pao bange dupwape komau dupwape yaki nyiyami dupwa siyamo kandeyami. Kandapala nakama kapu kyuo epo kiŋi doko lamaiyami.
Dokopa Samaria wambu dupwame Siria wambu dupwa anda pyuo paleyami dokona papala bange peparae nyuo oteyami. Dokopa Kamongome leyamuli pyuo nenge witi keyange kilokerame rema ingyuo panda nenge bali jingi kilokerame pakinyamange ingyuo ropo pyao maiyuo kana kulingi mendaki nyiyami.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome akali mupwa baa nyiso role pyao papiyambi doko yuu taone kame kambu dokona iso karena leya. Kiŋi doko wamba Ilaisa kandala peyamo dokopa dopa pira leyamuli pyuo akali mupwa doko wambu dupwame baa kalyuo injiyamisa baa kumuya.
Ilaisame akali kiŋi doko lamaiyuo, Yuu gii dakepa rakya nenge witi keyange kilokerame rema ingyuo panda nenge bali jingi kilokerame pakinyamange ingyuo dupwa Samaria makete dokona kana kulingi mendaki maiyuo ropo pyarami, leya.
Dokona lao akali mupwa dokome isingi lao, Dopa pii nara Kamongo dokome epapu dakepa aopa apu peyapyali doko dopa pii napyaliko, leya. Leyamo dokopa Ilaisame isingi lao, Dopa piramo doko emba angi kandarenepape nenge angi mende naa nare, leya.
Doo leyamo dokona ingyuo baa kumuya. Wambu lapo yuu taone dokona kame kambu repeta kareyaminyi dupwame akali iso karenge doko kalyuo injiyamisa baa kumuya.





























































































































































Poropeta akali Ilaisa baa wambu kumungi angande pyapala kumara ingiyamopa luu palyuo siya. Siyamo dokopa Isaraele wambunya kiŋi Joaseme baa kandala peya. Papala baa pii poraiyuo lao ee lao lao, Nambana rakane, nambana rakane, emba Isaraele wambu dupwa porai ingyuo rapu pyuo karenge, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Ilaisame baa lamaiyuo, Yanda wangape lapo nyinya leya. Leyamosa Joaseme yanda wangape dupwa nyiya.
Nyiyamo dokopa Ilaisame pyara doko suu pyao rapa rapa piru karena leya. Dokopa kiŋi dokome lamaiyamuli pyuo rapa rapa piru kareya. Piyamo dokopa Ilaisame banya kingi dolapo kiŋinya kingi dokona ketae reteya.
Dokopa poropeta dokome pii lamaiyamuli pyuo dokopa kiŋi dokome yuu Siria kanda kanda windowa doko lumbuya. Dokopa Ilaisame lao, Wanga doko pinya leya. Dokopa kiŋi dokome piyamo dokopa aopa Ilaisame lao, Emba Kamongona wanga dopale. Emba keta baame Siria wambu pipya pyao wini pira. Emba Siria wambu dupwa yuu Apeke dokona palenge dupwa pyarene pao wini pipala kaeyare, leya.
Dokopa Ilaisame kiŋi doko lamaiyuo, Wanga mende nyepala doloma pipya yuu dokona pyao pisinya leya. Dokopa kiŋi dokome yuu dokona yuu rema pyao pisapala kaeya.
Dopa piyamo dokome Ilaisa imbwuapala kiŋi doko lamaiyuo lao, Emba yuu dokona yuu kingi pakipi dee pakinyamangepe pyao pisapili doko Siria pipya pyao wini pyuo pyao otapili. Doko kaepala epapu embame yuu rema iki pyao wini piri, leya.
Dokopa Ilaisa kumuyasa malu piyami. Ee kana yaka lao Moape rara dupwame Isaraele wambunya yuu dokona pyao nyelana pyuo epeyami.
Yuu gii mendepa wambu dupwame akali mende malu pyuo karo dokopa Moape akali doo epeyaminyi dupwana lapo epeyaminyi kandeyami. Kandapala yanenge kakapange doko Ilaisana malu anda dokona nyuo nembapala nakama makando peyami. Dokopa aopa kumasi yongo doko pao Ilaisana kuli doko kando nyiyamo dokopa akali doko sipuro lete epo roya kareya.












































































































































Ee kana kisima Esekaya yulu piyamo dokopa kiŋi Osea ee kana yanda ipingi nyepo Isaraele yuu dokona kiŋi ingyuo kareya. Dokopa Asiria akali mupwa kingi Salemanesa lenge dokome yuu Isaraele dokona sukusa epo pyao nembo dee Samaria nyuo karapusi palyuo piya.
Karapusi sukusa paleyaminyi pao ee kana rema dokona Samaria doko isa peya. Kiŋi akali Esekayame ee kana pakinyamange dokona kiŋi yulu pyuo kareyamopa Oseame baa ee kana mange mendaki karo kiŋi yulu pyuo kareyamopa Samaria isa peya.
Dokopa yuu Asiria akali mupwa dokome Isaraele wambu dupwa karapusi pyao minyuo yuu Asiria dokona papala wambu lapo yuu taone Ala lenge dokona karena lao dee lapo yuu Gosane dokona ipwa kingi Apo lenge epenge repeta dokona palena lao yaki nyuo dee wambu lapo yuu Mitia taone dupwana palena lao yaki nyiyami.
Doko nakamana Kamongo Anatu warombo see nayami dokona Samaria wambu dupwa nakama isa peyami. Dopa pyuo Kamongome nakama pipya kana minyuo lalu lao leyamo pii doko minyuo pii nayami dee Kamongona kendemande akali Mosese keta lowa pii maiyamo dupwa warombo soo minyuo kara nayami. Nakama dupwana soo nyuope warombo soo minyuo pyuope pirami ingya naya.
Ee kana akalisa ipisu kisima dokona kiŋi Esekaya baa iso kareyamo dokopa yuu Asiria akali mupwa Senakeripi lenge dokome Juta taone kana kame andake awali lao pingi dupwa pyao wini pyuo isa palyiya.
Dokopa Esekayame akali Senakeripi yuu Lakisi dokona kareyamo doko keta pii wai nembo lao, Nambame kopetame pyuo koo piyuŋu dokona embame akali bange mende jii lao pyuo jeroŋo yuu pyao kokwa soo nyilini doko kaeyape, leya. Leyamo dokopa akali mupwa dokome pii isingi lao, Akali Esekaya dokome kana kulingi kilokerame taosande akalisa (10,000) joo dee kana golo kilokerame taosande mendaki (1,000) ingyuo joo pinya leya.
Dokopa Esekayame tembole anda dokona kana kulingi siyamo dupwape dee kiŋinya opisi kana retenge panda dokona siyamo dupwa peparaepe nyuo maiya.
Maipala dee kamame kana golo tembole anda kambu dowa dokona pisingi dupwa rekya lao nyuo dee kambu dowa palyalena isa kareyami dokona baa rangeme rambu lao pisiyamo dupwa nyuo pipala Senakeripi maiya.
Dokopa yuu Asiria akali mupwa dokome yuu Lakisi yanda singi ami ama malu dupwame Esekaya baa yuu Jerusaleme kareyamo dokona pyala pena leya. Peyaminyi dokopa banya akali mupwa rema dusipame dopa pinya dapa pinya lao wambo laminyiyami. Nakama Jerusaleme epo pyaka sepala dokopa panda komau wasingi dokona kata repeta singi dokona kareyami. Kata doko ipwa pete ketae singi doko minyuo epenge suu dokona repeta siya.
Dokopa nakama kiŋi Esekaya epena leyamo dokopa banya akali mupwa rema dusipa nakama kando nyela peyami. Ilikayana ikinyingi kingi Eleakimi lenge akali doko baa kiŋinya anda mupwa ingyuo karenge dokope dee akali Sepena lenge kote singi dupwana pii dupwa pepana pyao pisakamingi dokope dee akali Asapena ikinyingi kingi Joa lenge baa pepa pingi dupwana mupwa ingyuo iso karenge dokope kando nyela peyami.
Dokopa yuu Asiria akali mupwa dusipana mendeme nakama lamaiyuo, Apa pipyamosa kiŋi Esekaya baa range wini pira lao akali mupwa dokome selana letamo, leya.
Baa piso sokondali pyuo lao, Embame pii dupwa yanda pyuo mora petengepe poraingipi dupwa kapa isa palyarami lao suu pilisi? Asiria akali dupwa mata mairu lao apimi emba nyisara lao suu pilisi?
Isipi range dupwame emba nyisarami lao suu pyale pyale karene. Dopa lao suu pyarenepape wambu dupwame yangi lapo pangali ingyuo minyuo paraminyipa yangi punjapala kingi nara. Doko suu pyao wambu mendali Isipi wambunya kiŋi dokome nyisapyali lao baa rungi rungi pingi dokopa dopako pira, leya.
Lapala baa konda pyuo lao, Nakama nakamana Kamongo Anatu keta pyamalyuo karamanoŋo doko namba langiramisi? Esekayame Kamongona lakandenge panda poo pyasipi dee kana pyare lasipi dupwa kokwa sinyi nembeya. Nembapala Juta wambupi dee Jerusaleme wambupi dupwa lamaiyuo, Yuu Jerusaleme kana pyare lasi dokona iki lakando karena, leya.
Lapala lao, Asiria akali mupwa dokona kingi lao nambame nakama nyuo pyasaro dee nakamame kapa akali malu lapo mena ose matana petena lao koto nyerami ramo doko nambame nakama mena ose taosande lama (2,000) jero, leya.
Yuu Asiria range yanda singi isingi akali kuki dokome nakama isa palyilyamo. Dopa pyuo karapyamopape Isipi wambu dupwame nakama nyiso mena ose matana petenge akali dupwape oseme ipyuo papingi uliulipi jerami lao isaro karaminyi.
Kamongome namba nyisa nayamopa nakamana yuu doko pyao kokwa soo nembo nyii naeŋe lao suu pilyamisi? Kamongo baa rangeme embena yuu doko pyao kokwa soo nyuo pipi lao namba langipya.
Dokopa Eleakimimoo Sepenamoo dee Joamoo akali mupwa doko lamaiyuo lao, Arame wambunya pii lao namwa langipi. Pii doko namwa singi. Wambu apya dokona karaminyi dupwa silyaminyi dokome Ipuru pii lao langi kae, leyami.
Dokopa baame isingi lao, Nakamape kiŋi dokope iki mupwaŋa lapala Asiria kiŋi dokome nakama iki pii dupwa peparae lareŋe lao puu leya suu pilyamisi? Daa lyakande. Wambu dae kamena petaminyi dapwa opetae nambame pii lamailyuŋu. Nakama rangena ii dupwa nao dee puu nakama rangena dupwa nao piraminyili pyuo nakama naramiko, leya.
Lapala akali mupwa baa roya karapala Ipuru pii lao poraiyuo kaeyo lao, Asiria kiŋi dokome nakama pii langilyamo doko selapape, leya.
Akali Esekayame nakama koo keta palyuo minyako pii nana lao Asiria kiŋi dokome nakama repe repe pii langilyamo. Esekaya baame nakama kyawa lete nyuo nyisa nara ingilyamo leya.
Nakama Kamongo doko keta poraiyuo pyamalyaramaŋa lao baame nakama anjiki pyuo langi nana. Kamongo dokome nakama kyawa lete nyepala dee namwana yuu Asiria yanda singi dupwame nakamana yuu taone doko baame pyao nyela pena laa nara lao suu pyaa nalapape.
Akali Esekayana pii see nalapape. Yuu Asiria kiŋi dokome nakama yuu taone doko yaki nyepala nakama baa maiyuo oto ipupwa lao letamo. Nakama peparae rangena isa girapo jingi lyuo narami. Dee isa piki jingi nakama rangena isa dokona lyuo narami. Dee ipwa pete yuwale nakama rangena singi dokona kamuo nyuo nao pirami, leya.
Naraminyipa pao kiŋi akali dokome yuu nakamana yale dopale mendenako wangu lakao pisaramopa pisirami. Doko isa girapo eena ipwa waene kapa waso narami dee witi dupwame nenge borete waso narami. Yuu dokona isa olipi andenge dee olipi ipwangepe amburali ipwangepe singi. Nakama baame mawa pii langiramo doko moko minyuo pirami ramo doko nakama kuma nao lete palyuo kararami. Kamongo dokome nakama kyawa lete nyeraŋa lao Esekayame minyako pyuo laa nana.
Yuu Asiria kiŋi doko keta wambu rara wakale lapona mee bange kingimi wasisi anatuŋu lao lakandenge dupwame nakamana yuu dupwa kyawa lete nyuo nyisingisi?
Yuu Amati rangepe Arepate rangepe yuu Sepatipai Sepamame rangepe yuu Ena rangepe Ipa rangepe dupwa peparaena mee bange anja kingimi wasisi anatuŋu lao lakandenge karamisi? Dokona mendeme Samaria wambu dupwa kyawa lete nyiyamisi?
Yuu gii anjokorape yuu muu peparae dusipana mee bange anatu dupwame namwana kiŋi akali doko isa palyuo banya kingi rekya lao nakamana yuu doko nyiso kyawa lete nyiyamisi? Dokona lao Kamongo dokome Jerusaleme nyisaraŋa lao emba aki mendeme suu pyao letese?
Kiŋi Esekayame wambu dupwa elya kalo petena lao lamaiyamuli pyuo nakamame pii kuki mende yano pyaa nao elya kalo peteyami.
Dokopa Eleakimimoo Sepenamoo Joamoo mona randame kumapala nakamana komau dupwa minyuo pilyiyami. Pilyapala Asiria akali mupwa dokome leyamo pii dupwa Isaraele kiŋi doko lamaiyala peyami.
Akali dusipame epo pii lamaiyaminyi doko sepala dokopa aopa kiŋi Esekaya dokome mona randame kumuo banya komau pingi dupwa minyuo pilyapala baa kumanda piso kondome kumuo komau wapungi dupwa wapupala Kamongona tembole anda dokona peya.
Papala baame akali Eleakimi kiŋinya anda iso karenge akali mupwa dokope kote singi dupwana pepa pingi akali Sepena lenge dokope dee purisi andapae dupwape akali Amosena ikinyingi poropeta Aisaya lenge kareyamo dokona pena leya. Nakama opetaeko kondome kumuo komau wapungi dupwa wapuyami.
Wai pii dake baame Aisaya lamainya lao lamaiya. Epapu yuu gii dake randa nyingi yuu gii. Dokona namwa randa nyuo elyame kumulyamano. Namwa enda wane repeta manjalana pingi doko kapa manjira ingya nange dopale ingilyamano.
Yuu Asiria kiŋi akali dokome banya akali mupwa dokome Anatu lete karenge doko kando kilya kando lala pena leya. Embena Kamongo Anatu dokome doo kilya kando letaminyi wambu dupwana pii sepala nakama randa mainya. Dokona lao namwana wambu lapo mee lete piso petaminyi dupwana lao Anatu keta ateŋa lakaminya lena leya.
Dokopa Aisayame kiŋi Esekayana pii doko sepala
dokopa banya pii dake isingi leya. Kamongo dokome emba nyiso kyawa lete nyii naraŋa lao Asiria wambu dupwame pakanyi pyambuo laraminyipape nakama paka nao karalapape, Kamongo dokome nakama langilyamo.
Kamongo dokome kiŋi akali doko pii kyambo lapo sepala banya rangena yuu dokona kapu kyuo pena lao pira. Dokopa Kamongo dokome baa nyepala yuu dokona wambu lapome baa pyao kumakaminya lara, leya.
Yuu Asiria kiŋi akali dokome yuu Lakisi yaki nyepala yuu repeta taone Lipina dokona wambu dupwa pipya pimwaiyuo pyala peyamo doko yuu Asiria akali mupwa dokome leyaminyi siya. Dokona lao baa pii lamaila peya.
Yuu Isipi yanda singi dupwa Itiopia kiŋi akali Tiraka lenge dokome laminyuo epo nakama pyala epelyamo leyami pii doko Asiria wambu dupwa siyami. Pii doko yuu Asiria kiŋi akali dokome sepala pepa pase mende kiŋi Esekaya yuu Juta range maiya.
Pyao maiyuo lao, Anatu emba keta pyamalyuo karene dokome emba isa pao nambana kingi raka dokona palya nareŋe lao langipya. Dopa pyuo langipyamopape dokome emba kokwa soo koo keta nemba nana lape, leya.
Yuu Asiria kiŋi akali dokome yuu muu wakale dupwana mendepe pyao kokwa seroŋo lao suu pingi dupwa pyao kokwa sepala kaenge doko emba singi. Embame suu pyapinyi dokopa emba range kyawa lete nyero lao silisi?
Nambana rora ambasu dupwame yuu taone Gosanepe yuu Arane dee Oresepe pyao kokwa siyami. Kokwa sepala yuu Betetene wambu yuu Telasa palenge dupwa pyao kumakayami. Dokopa nakamana mee bange kingimi wasisi anatuŋu lao lakandenge dupwana mendeme nyiso kyawa lete nyii nayami.
Yuu taone Amati kiŋi dokope yuu Arepate range kiŋipi yuu Separaime kiŋipi yuu Ena kiŋipi dee yuu Ipa kiŋipi dupwa anja karamisi lao pepa piya.
Dokopa kiŋi Esekayame wai pii minyingi akali dupwa keta pepa pyasi minyuo epeyami doko nyepala yaka leya. Lapala baa tembole anda dokona peya. Papala pepa pyasi doko Kamongona lenge kambu siyamo dokona pee lao reteya.
Retapala ateŋa lao, O Kamongo Isaraele wambunya Anatu, lete bange papake karenge ketae embena kiŋi petenge isa dokona petenge. Emba Anatu mendaki iki. Emba yuu muu dupwana rara karenge dupwa peparae isingi. Embame yake yuupi dupwa pyuo wasii.
Epapu Kamongo namwa keta mende pilyamo doko kandape. Kamongo emba lete karenge doko kando akali Senakeripi dokome kilya kando letamo pii dupwa peparae sepe.
Kamongo, namwa peparae silyamano. Doko yuu Asiria kiŋi akali dupwame akali rara malu pyao kokwa soo dee nakamana yuu dupwana mende pulya nana lao apa nyuo pingi.
Pipala nakamana mee bange anatu dupwa kisinyi nembakamingi. Dupwa anatu angi daa isa kanapeme anatuŋu lao mee wambunya kingimi wasisi dupwa kiso nembenge.
Dokona epapu Kamongo namwana Anatu Asiria wambu dupwa pipya namwa kyawa lete nyuo nyisape. Dokona lao yuu muu dupwana wambu rara palaminyi dupwame peparae Kamongo emba iki Anatu lao soo nyinyale, leya.
Dokopa Aisayame kiŋi Esekaya lamaiyuo, Kamongo dokome kiŋi dokona ateŋa doko sepala isingi yano pyapya lao wai nembeya.
Kamongo dokome lao, Senakeripi yuu taone Jerusaleme dokona wambu dupwame emba kando giyuo karenge. Giyuo karapala emba kando kilya kando lao male lalya lana pingi.
Embame api kilya kando letoŋo lao suu pyapisi? Isaraele wambunya Anatu Poo Pyasi doko embame nambana kingi ketae pyambuo laa napi.
Embena wai pii minyingi akali dupwame namba keta emba range lakando embena mena oseme ipyuo papingi uliuli dupwa peparaeme yuu Lepanone dokona yuu kyau kamame ketae dupwa isa palyuo wini pipu laope dee emba range lakando pyuo isa sita lenge ama londe dupwa poko isa palyuo dee isa saiporose ama keyange dupwa poko pao imwa anda suku dokona kando nyipu lapi.
Emba range lakando lao yuu wakale dupwana yuwale apu rapala ipwa kamuo nenge doko lapi. Dee embena yanda singi dupwa yanda makao kimbu pyao piso epo ipwa Naele sokona lao pisimi lapi.
Nambame dupwa peparae yuu wamba rapa rapa pyuo reteyo doko emba kaname see nangese? Epapu dakepa nambame minyuo pulyuo raelyo. Yuu taone kana kame porai awali lao palenge dupwa nyuo koo ingyuo kokwa sinyi nembo pepe lao nambame emba porainya renge jiyu.
Wambu dokona palenge dupwa porainya renge mende pali naya. Dokona pako walu lao mona nembo yamaranguyami. Nakama rambe yuunya andenge panda isako anda yanginya andenge dupwa neta potemenge dorena isasa pyuo piso dokopa rakusi renge dopale ingiyami.
Dopa pipyamopape nambame emba peparae soo otelyo. Emba aki mende pipipi dee anja mendasa pupipi dupwa silyu. Emba nambapa pimwaiyuo imbwapi doko soo otelyo, leya.
Nambame embena imbu singi andake dokope dee range mupwaŋa lao suu pyape dokope namba langiminyi soo nyipu. Dokona nambame embena gyaa kata dokona waeya puu palyaro dee ane bange mende nenge kata dokona palyaro. Palyapala wamba emba epee kata kande dokonako kamba kapu kyuo lanyuo paro, leya.
Enakana Aisayame kiŋi Esekaya lamaiyuo lao, Rengya mende pira dokona wambo dake pilyamo. Ee kana dakenape dee ee kana dumbinyape nakama witi jingi wambunya wara pii nange mee isa yokona poro lao andenge dupwa narami. Dopa piraminyipape ee kana ene eparamo dupwana nakama witi wara pipala pyakepo nyuo narami dee isa girapo wara pipala girapo jingi dupwa narami.
Yuu Juta dokona wambu lapo lete pisiraminyi dupwa au pyuo andapala ee waingi wara pilyaminyipa pingi pyao yuu koko papala jingi kapape pyao andenge dopale ingyuo ando kararami.
Yuu Jerusalemepe dee yuu kyau Sayonepe wambu pisiraminyi dupwa lapo lete ando kararamiŋi lao Kamongo dokome poraiyuo suu pyao leyamuli pyuo kararami.
Asiria kiŋi akali dokona lao Kamongo dokome pii dake leya. Baame yuu taone dakena sukusa pyaka soo dee wanga kakupi kuki mende yanda pimwaiyuo pyao sukusa peya narako. Dee yanda singi kuki mendemepe konambe embo yuu taone dakena repetape epa nara dee yanda singi dupwamepe yuu doko nyelana pyuo karapusi pyao kame pyuo sukusa palya naramiko, leya.
Asiria kiŋi akali doko kata wambo epeyamo dokonako dee kamba kapu kyuo para. Dokopa yuu taone dakena sukusa epa nara. Namba Kamongo dokome lapusa pilyamo, leya.
Nambana kendemande akali Dapiti kando lalu lao leyono dokome namba rangena kingi lao nambame yuu taone dake keta pyamalyapala nyisaro, leya.
Yuu gii kukwa dokopa Kamongona aŋala mende Asiria akali komau anda pyuo paleyami dokona papala akali ama malu (185,000) pyao kumakaya. Yuu gii mendena yangama dokopa nakama peparae kumasi siyami.
Dokopa yuu Asiria kiŋi akali Senakeripi baa yaki nyepala kapu kyuo yuu Ninepa dokona peya.
Yuu mendepa banya mee bange kingimi wasisi anatuŋu lao lakandenge kingi Nisiroko lenge banya tembole anda dokona lakando kareyamo dokopa banya ikinyingi lama mende Aterameleke lenge mende Saresa lenge dolapome nakambana wua gela dokome baa pyao kumakayambi. Kumakapala nakamba range kyawa lete nyuo yuu Ararate lenge dokona peyambi. Dokopa ikinyingi mende Isarone lenge dokome rakangena panda nyuo kiŋi ingyuo kareya.















































Josaya baa ee kana mange lama karo dokopa yuu Juta dokona kiŋi kareya. Karapala ee kana akalisa rema ipisu mendaki baame yuu Jerusaleme doko iso kareya. Banya endangi doko kingi Jetita lenge akali Ataya lenge yuu taone Bosekate range dokona wanenge.
Akali Josayame Kamongo rae mairali yulu dupwa iki pyuo kareya. Dee banya rora ambasu akali kiŋi Dapitimi yulu piyamo dupwana moko minyuo pyuo kareya. Dopa pyuo karapala Anatunya lowa pii dupwa peparae warombo soo rape rape lao pira ingiya.
Ee kana akalisa mange lama karo kiŋi yulu pyuo iso kareyamo dokopa Josayame kote singi dupwana pepa pingi akali Sapane lenge akali Asalayana ikinyingi akali Mesulamena kauwange doko tembole anda dokona pena leya.
Pao purisi mupwa akali Ilikaya pisipyamo dokona papala purisi menge dupwa yulu palipyamopa tembole anda kambu konandowame dokona wambu dupwa keta kana nyiminyi dokona kana namba akipare nyimi lao yaka lao nyela pena leya.
Pao baa lamaipala kana angi dupwa tembole anda doko kwaepyamo dokopa lalyuo waso pingi akali dupwana akali mupwa dupwa mainya lena leya.
Dokopa nakamame kamonda akalipi anda pingi akalipi kana semene minyuo yulu pingi akalipi dupwa peparae kana maiyuo dee isa kanape anda kwaelyamo lalyuo pingi dupwa ropo pyao nyuo pirami.
Dokona mupwa ingyuo yulu pyuo karaminyi akali dupwa yulu rolae pinginde karamiŋi dokome kana dupwa apa pyuo pyao nembami lao piso see narami ingilyamo leya.
Leyamo dokopa kiŋi dokona pii dupwa Sapaneme nyepala akali Ilikaya lamaiyamo dokopa Ilikayame lowa pii dupwa palenge buku doko tembole anda dokona sipyamo koto nyipu lao baa lamaiya. Lamaipala buku doko baa maiyamopa Sapaneme yaka leya.
Lapala baa kiŋi peteyamo dokona kapu kyuo papala lamaiyuo lao, Embena kendemande akali dupwame tembole anda dokona kana sipyamo dupwa nyepala anda kwaelyamo lalyuo pingi akali mupwa dupwa maimipya, leya.
Lapala enakana baame lao, Buku dake akali Ilikayame jipya, leya. Lapala baame kiŋi doko sinya lao pii poraiyuo yaka lao lamaiya.
Buku yaka leyamo doko kiŋi dokome sepala kondome kumuo banya komau doko minyuo kanguya.
Kangwapala baame purisi akali Ilikayamoo akali Sapanena ikinyingi Ayikamemoo dee akali Maekayana ikinyingi Akipomoo dee kote singi dokopa pepa pingi akali Sapanemoo dee kiŋi dokona role pyao nyiso papingi akali Aisayamoo pipya pii dapwa lamaiyuo lao,
Papala buku dakena mana letamo dokona lao Juta wambu peparae dupwana laope dee nambana laope Kamongo doko piso sakalapape. Namwana rora ambasu dupwame buku dakena pinya leyamo dupwa pii nayami dokona Kamongo dokome namwa pipya imbwualyamo.
Akali Ilikayamoo Ayikamemoo Akipomoo Sapanemoo Asayamoo papala poropeta enda Uluta lenge yuu Jerusaleme enenge ingyuo pyuo nyokonyiyami dokona palenge doko piso sela peyami. Banya akalingi doko Salumi lenge akali Tikipana ikinyingi Atasena kauwange doko tembole anda dokona komau dupwa baame rapu pyuo karenge. Nakamame doo piyamo dupwa enda doko lamaiyami.
Dokopa enda baame nakama lamaiyuo, Kapu kyuo kiŋi petamo dokona papala
Kamongo keta pii piso ipyamo dupwa baa lamaila pena leya. Buku dokona pyasi palipyamo kiŋi doko yaka lapyamuli pyuo namba Kamongome yuu Jerusaleme dee wambu dokona palaminyi dupwape randa maiyuo pyaro.
Nakamame namba kilya kando mata joo dee mee bange kingimi wasisi anatuŋu lenge dupwa mena pyao kiso maiyuo dee yulu peparae piminyi dupwame nambana imbu singi doko sipurao nakao pilyaminyi. Dokona nambana imbu singi doko Jerusaleme wambu pipya sipurao epelyamo doko dee lokwalyuo isa paa naralyamo, leya.
Kiŋi baa rangena lao dake namba Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Anatumi letoŋo. Emba buku dokona pyasi palipyamo pii dupwana lao warombo sipilyamo, leya.
Nambame Jerusalemepe dee dokona wambupi dupwa randa mairunu dokona pii sepala nambana lenge kambu dokona embena koo dupwana kondome kumuo inyimungu piso embena komau minyuo kanguo ee lao petee. Nambame yuu Jerusaleme keta randa mairu dokopa wambu dupwa mona nembo pakame kumuo kandena lao piru. Dopa piru dokopa wambu dupwame yuu doko kooŋo larami. Laraminyipape nambame embena ateŋa doko sakapu.
Namba randa mende Jerusaleme peyaro doko emba kumaparenepa peyaro. Nambame emba mee manda rao kuma lao kaeyaro. Akali dupwame wai pii doko minyuo kapu kyuo kiŋi Josaya peteyamo dokona epeyami.
Kiŋi Josaya Juta lita akalipi dee Jerusaleme lita akalipi dupwa peparae kee lao epena, leya.
Lapala nakama malu palyuo purisi dupwape poropeta dupwape dee wambu kamongo pendewa peparaepe role pyao tembole anda dokona peyami. Wambu peparaena lenge kambu dokona kiŋi dokome kana minyuo lalu lao lenge pii palenge buku tembole anda dokona siyamo nyiyami dokona pii paleya dupwa peparae lopo yaka lamaiya.
Baa kiŋinya isa pote karenge dokona makaro karapala banya suu pingi monape dokome Kamongona mawa piipi dee lowa piipi dupwa minyuo karo baa warombo soo kararo dee mawa pii dupwana rolae ingyuo pyuo paro, leya. Dokopa wambu dupwa peparaeme mawa pii dupwa minyuo pyuo kararama lao lalu lao leyami.
Dokopa Josayame purisi akali mupwa Ilikaya lenge dokope banya nyisingi purisi akali dupwape dee tembole anda kambu konandowame dokona yulu palelyamopa rapu pyuo karenge dupwape lamaiyuo, Mee bange kingimi wasisi dupwame enda Asera anatu lenge dokope dee bui dupwape dee mee bange anatu kingi Bealo lenge dokope lakandenge peparae tembole anda dokona kama minyuo epena leya. Lapala kiŋi dokome bange dupwa peparae yuu taone dokona nyisarena yuu pau lama lama kingi Kirone lenge dokona kisiya. Kisapala sungwa lengya dupwa nakama minyuo yuu Betele dokona pena leya.
Yuu taone yuu Juta singi dupwanape dee Jerusaleme repeta yuu dupwanape kana pyare kyambo lenge dupwana mena pyao kiso mainya lao Juta kiŋi dupwame rombo palyiyami purisi dupwape dee purisi peparae mee bange anatu kingi Bealo lenge dokope netape kanape dee yakena bange silyamo dupwape mena pyao kiso maingi dupwa neta pena leya.
Isa pote mende poo pyasi lao waso kalya pipala mee bange enda anatu kingi Asera lenge dopale ingyuo tembole anda dokona pisingi doko nyepala yuu taone dokona minyuo nyisa pao yuu pau lama lama kingi Kirone lenge dokona kisinyi nembeya. Nembapala dokona sungwa lengya dupwa pyao kuku pyuo sinjimu ingyapala wambu peparaena malu pingi yuu dokona pyao wakale wakale pyuo muu raleya lao nembeya.
Tembole anda dokona panda angi sukusa andake singi dokona enda akalipi pamuku yulu pingi doko pyao kokwa sinyi nembeya. (Panda dokona enda dupwame enda Asera anatu lenge doko lakando komau pyuo petenge dupwa waso peteyami.)
Baame purisi lapo yuu taone Juta singi dupwana kareyaminyi dupwa Jerusaleme minyuo peya. Dee yuu muu peparaena kana pyare laro karenge nakama mena pyao kiso maingi dupwa opetaeko lalyuo kokwa soo nembeya. Yuu taone dokona gapomane akali andake Josua dokome kame kambu andake konando penge piyamo dokona kingi kyairename kana pyare lasi kalya pipala mena meme imambu koo palenge dupwa lakandenge dupwa pyao lalyinyi nembeya.
Purisi akali dupwa tembole anda dokona yulu pinya lao panda mai nayami. Dopa pii nayaminyipape purisi yango dupwana nenge borete isi pali nange rapa rapa pyakamingi dupwana mokwa soo maiminyipa nakama nao kareyami.
Dokona lao mendeme banya ikinyingi panda wanengepe dupwa kyambo lenge pandana mena pyao kiso maingi doko suu pyao mee bange kingimi wasisi anatu kingi Moloko doko pyao kiso mairaminyi lapala yuu Topete lenge yuu Inome pau lama lama dokona singi doko kiŋi Josayame pyao kokwa soo nembeya.
Baame kamame Juta kiŋi dupwame mena ose lapo kalya pyuo neta doko lakando maingi dupwa nyuo nembeya. Dee mena ipyuo papingi uliuli lakandenge dokona ingyuo singi dupwa kisinyi nembeya. (Bange dupwa tembole anda kamapi dokona kame kambu dokona repeta retenge. Doko akali mupwa kingi Netane Meleke lenge dokona panda repeta singi.)
Juta kiŋi dupwame kana pyare lapo kiŋi Ayasana panda dokona ketae ingyuo kiŋinya anda yangi dokona piyaminyi dupwa kiŋi Josayame pyao lalyuo isa nembeya. Dee kiŋi Manasame tembole anda kamapi lama dolapona kana pyare leyamo dolapo lalyuo isa nembeya. Dopa pipala baame dupwa peparae muu muu pipala yuu pau lama lama Kirone lenge dokona pyao nembeya.
Nembapala Saitone wambunya mee bange enda anatu kingi Asera lenge Moape wambunya mee bange anatu kingi Kemose lenge dokope dee Amone wambunya anatu kingi Moloko lenge dokonape lakandeyaminyi kana pyare lasi kiŋi Solomoneme Jerusaleme neta pyakaenge dorena ingyuo dee yuu Olipi kyau dumurena ingyuo waso piyamo dupwa kokwa soo nembeya.
Kiŋi Josayame kaname isa pote kareyaminyi dupwa pyao lalyuo muu muu piya. Dee isa pote poo pyasiŋi lao mee bange enda anatu kingi Asera lenge kingi lao lakandenge doko pyakepo nembeya. Dee isa pyananyi palyingi yuu dolapo mee wambunya kuli dokome nee pyuo yambe piya.
Dopa pipala kiŋi akali Jeropome akali Nepetena ikinyingi dokome Isaraele wambu dupwa kata koo lasaka pyuo yuu Betele dokona lakandenge panda doko kiŋi Josayame pyao lalyiya. Lalyapala Josayame kana pyare doko ipyuo nyepala kana dupwa lalyuo muu muu pipala yuu inginyi nembeya. Baame opetaeko isa pote poo pyasiŋi lao mee bange enda anatu kingi Asera lenge kingi lao lakandenge doko kisinyi nembeya.
Enakana Josayame kando pyapiyamo dokopa yuu kyau dokona wambu malu pingi anda dupwa kandeya. Kandapala wambu kuli siyamo dupwa nyiya. Nyepala kana pyare dokona kisiya. Doo pyuo kisiyamo dokona kana pyare doko koo inginyi pyambuo piya. Jeropome baa kana pyare dokona repeta kareyamopa poropeta doko dopa piraŋa lao nolakao leyami dokona angi piya. Pipala kiŋi Josayame awali lao kandeyamo dokopa dopa piraŋa lao pii nolakao lao kareyamo poropeta dokona malu anda doko siyamo kandeya.
Baame piso soo lao, Malu anda doko apinyase? leya. Dokopa Betele wambu dupwame isingi lao, Malu anda doko Juta range poropeta akalinde embame kana pyare dapwa kando pilini yulu dupwa dopa piramiŋi lao nolakao lao kareya kande akali dokonaŋa, leyami.
Josayame lamaiyuo lao, Malu anda doko silyamo dopa piru sinya kaena leya. Lapala banya kuli dupwa nyisa nyii nana leya. Dokona lao banya kuli dupwape dee poropeta Samaria range dokona kuli dupwape nyisa nyii nayami.
Isaraele yuu taone dupwa peparaena kyambo lao lakandenge panda Isaraele kiŋi peparaeme wasiyami dupwame Kamongona imbu singi dupwa sipurao nyakamiyamisa kiŋi Josayame pyao lalyinyi nembeya. Baame yuu Betele dokona kana pyare lasi dupwa kokwa soo lalyuo nembeya dopaleko ingyuo kana pyare lasi yuu dokona siyamo dupwa lalyuo nembeya.
Baame kyambo lenge purisi akali peparae kana pyare lasi nakama yulu pyuo kareyaminyi dupwana pyao kumakaya. Dee mee wambunya kuli dupwa kana pyare lasi peparaena kiso oteya. Dopa pipala baa enakana kapu kyuo Jerusaleme peya.
Kana minyuo lalu lao lenge pii palenge buku dokona lao pyasi paleyamo doko moko minyuo kiŋi Josayame wambu dupwa lamaiyuo lao, Pasopa nenge nenge yuu gii doko suu pyao piso nenge nyuo malu palyuo nao nakamana Kamongo Anatu rape rape lao ketae pyambuo au pyuo minyuo pyuo karena leya.
Yuu gii wamba akali mupwa dupwame rara doko isiyaminyi gii dokona piso pao yuu gii dokopa Juta kiŋi dupwape dee Isaraele kiŋi dupwamepe Pasopa Nenge Nenge Yuu Gii dopale mende au pyuo minyuo pyuo kara nayami.
Dopa pyuo ee kana malu mee nembeyaminyipape kiŋi Josayame ee kana akalisa ipisu mange lama karo (18) iso karapala yuu Jerusaleme dokona Pasopa Nenge Nenge Yuu Gii suu pyao piso nenge nyuo malu palyuo neyami.
Purisi mupwa Ilikayame buku tembole anda dokona koto nyiyamo dokona lowa pii pyasi palenge dupwa uki palira kando lao poraiyuo minyuo reteya. Dokona Josayame yuu Jerusalemepe yuu Jutape dolapona peparae papala pipu lengepe nemonga lengepe dee mee bange waso retapala anatu lao lakandenge dupwape dee kyambo lao lakandenge panda dupwape peparae pyao lalyuo kwaeyo nyuo nembo piya.
Banya mona dokomepe suu pingi dokomepe dee banya porainya renge dokomepe Mosesena lowa dupwa peparae warombo soo minyuo Kamongona yulu pyakamyuo kareya. Wambape enakanape baa yale kiŋi mende kara nayami.
Dopa piyamopape kiŋi Manasame koo piyamo dokona Kamongona imbu singi nyakamiya. Doko yuu gii dokopa kumuo isa paa naya.
Kamongome lao, Nambame Isaraele wambu dupwa keta yulu piyunu dopale ingyuo Juta wambu dupwa nambana lenge kambu dokona nyisa nembaro. Nembapala Jerusaleme taone namba rombo palyiyu dokope dee tembole anda dokona wambu dupwame namba lakandarami ingilyamo lao leyono dokope namba yaki nyuo kaeyaro, leya.
Kiŋi Josayame yulu wakale piyamo dupwa peparae Juta Kiŋi Dupwana Arome Pii dokona pyasi palamo.
Josaya baa kiŋi kareyamo dokopa yuu Isipi kiŋi Nekome Asiria kiŋi doko nyiso ami yanda singi dupwa minyuo ipwa Yuporisa pona dokona lanyuo peya. Dokopa yuu Meketo dokona kiŋi Josayame Isipi yanda singi dupwa kaena lao minyuo nyela peyamosa baa yanda dokona piyaminyi kumuya.
Banya akali mupwa dupwame banya yongo doko nyepala mena oseme ipyuo papingi uliuli dokona pyambwapala minyuo Jerusaleme peyami. Papala baa kiŋi dupwa malu pingi malu anda dokona malu piyami. Dopa pipala Juta wambu dupwame Josayana ikinyingi Joayase rombo palyiyami. Palyapala baa kiŋi inginya lao mamba kisakamiyami.














Jiyoakini baa ee kana akalisa ipisu mange lama karo dokopa baa Juta wambunya kiŋi kareya. Karapala baame yuu Jerusaleme dokona kana rema nembo kiŋi ingyuo iso kareya. Banya endangi doko Nekusitane lenge yuu Jerusaleme range akali Elenatane dokona wanenge.
Jiyoakini banya rakange yulu pingi dupwana mana nyepala Kamongona lenge kambu dokona kooko pyuo kareya.
Banya iso kareyamo yuu gii dokopa kiŋi Nepukatenesana akali mupwa dupwame yuu Bapilone ami yanda singi dupwa lanyuo yuu Jerusaleme pyao nyela epeyami.
Dopa pyuo kareyaminyi dokopa kiŋi Nepukatenesa baa yuu Jerusaleme epeya.
Dokopa kiŋi Jiyoakini banya ikinyingi dupwape banya endangi dokope dee banya akali mupwa dupwape dee kiŋinya anda yuupi dupwana akali mupwa dupwape pipya Bapilone wambu keta peyami. Doko Nepukatenesa baa ee kana mange lama karo wambu dupwa iso kareyamo gii dokopa akali Jiyoakini puu maiyuo nyepala peya.
Dokopa tembole anda dokonape dee kiŋinya anda dokonape bange kulisa rungi rungi pisi singi dupwa peparae nyuo yuu Bapilone minyuo peya. Kiŋi Solomoneme tembole anda dokona yulu piramiŋi lao kana golome bange waso reteyamo dupwa Kamongo wamba lamaiyamuli pyuo Nepukatenesame pyao poro lanyi nembeya.
Akali mupwa peparaepe kiŋinya wane peparaepe dee Jerusaleme wambu peparaepe nyuo pyaso dokopa taosande akalisa (10,000) kiŋi Nepukatenesame puu maiyuo nyuo peya. Papala baame akali mora piso yulu pingi dupwape dee ane dupwame bange wasingi akali dupwape opetaeko yuu wakale mendena karapusi ingyuo nembeya. Dopa pipala wambu pendewale dupwa iki yuu Juta petena lao yaki nyuo kaeya.
Dopa pipala Nepukatenesame akali Jiyoakini baa karapusi ingyuo yuu Bapilone lanyuo peya. Dee kamame banya endangipi etengepe banya akali mupwape dee Juta akali kyawa dupwape opetaeko puu maiyuo minyuo peya.
Nepukatenesame akali kamongo dupwa peparae yuu Bapilone nembo oteya. Nyuo pyaso dokopa taosande yanda ipingi (7,000) ingiya. Dee mora piso yulu pingi akali taosande mendaki nyiya. Dee dokona pyasapala ane isame bange wasingi akali dupwa opetaeko nyuo piya. Doo nyiyamo dupwa peparae akali kuli poraingiko yanda singinyape kapa karapengele akali dupwa nyuo peya.
Nepukatenesame Jiyoakininya apange Matanaya lenge doko Juta wambunya kiŋi ingyuo karena rombo palyiya. Dopa pipala banya kingi alowa pyuo Setekaya leya.
Setekaya baa ee kana akalisa lama ipisu mendaki dokopa Juta wambunya kiŋi kareya. Karapala baa kiŋi ingyuo yuu Jerusaleme dokona iso kareyamopa ee kana akalisa ipisu mendaki epo peya. Banya endangi doko Amutale lenge yuu taone Lipina range akali Jeremaya lengena wanenge.
Kiŋi Jiyoakwimi Kamongo kando koo dokome piyamo dopaleko ingyuo kiŋi Setekayame Kamongo kando kooko pyuo kareya.
Dopa piyamosa Kamongo dokome Jerusaleme wambupi dee Juta wambu dupwape keta ama wakasa imbwuapala banya lenge kambu dokona rekya lao nyisa nembeya.
Setekayame yuu Bapilone kiŋi Nepukatenesa kando kamba lao mata maiya. Dopa piyasa ee kana mange mendaki karo dokopa kana akalisa dokona yuu gii akalisa dokopa kiŋi Setekayame isiyamo yuu gii dokopa Nepukatenesa banya ami yanda singi dupwa peparae epapala yuu Jerusaleme pyao nyiyami. Nakamame yuu taone wangu dupwana komau anda pyuo palyuo wambu dupwa nyisa epa nana lao karapusi pyao yuu taone dokona kana kame mende awali lao piyami.
Kame pisi dokona sukusa palyuo kareyaminyi pao Setekaya baa ee kana akalisa ipisu mendaki ingyuo kiŋi kareya.
Ee kana mendaki dokonako pao kana kisimana yuu gii mange mendaki karo dokopa ama lopo andake kopetame siyamopa wambu dupwa nenge mende pyarepala paramo narami ingya naya.
Dokopa yuu taone dokona kana kame dupwa pyao lalyiyami. Dokopa Bapilone yanda singi dupwame yuu taone dokona karo awali leyami. Dopa piyaminyipape kukwa dokopa yanda singi peparae range kyawa lete nyuo peyami. Nakama kiŋi dokona ee kata doko pao kana kame andake dolapo pyuo epo suu lenge kata kambu dokona nyisa epapala yuu Jotane pau lama lama dorena ingyuo pyako peyami.
Dopa pyuo peyaminyipape Bapilone ami yanda singi dupwame kiŋi Setekaya baa peta pao yuu Jereko repeta yuu lama lamandena minyaro nyiyaminyi dokopa banya yanda singi dupwame baa yaki nyepala peyami.
Setekaya baa minyuo pao kiŋi Nepukatenesa yuu taone kingi Oripila lenge dokona peteyamo maiyami. Dokopa dokona Nepukatenesame pii dupwa piso soo kote leya.
Dokopa Setekaya baa kandako kareyamo dokopa banya ikinyingi dusipa pyao kumakayami. Dokopa kiŋi Nepukatenesame kiŋi Setekayana lenge doko lukunyi nembena leyasa nembeyami. Dopa pipala puu maiyuo minyuo yuu Bapilone dokona peyami.
Ee kana akalisa ipisu mange mendaki karo dokona kana kingi paki yuu gii yanda ipingi dokopa kiŋi Nepukatenesame yuu Bapilone kiŋi kareyamopa akali Nepusaratane baame kiŋi dopa pinya dapa pinya lao karo dee banya yanda singi dupwana mupwa karenge doko yuu Jerusaleme dokona sukusa peya.
Papala baame tembole anda doko kiso kiŋinya anda doko kiso dee wambu kamongo Jerusaleme palenge dupwana anda dupwa peparae kiso piya.
Piyamo dokopa banya yanda singi dupwame yuu taone dokona kana kame doko pyao lalyuo isa palyiyami.
Dokopa Nepusarataneme wambu mora petengepe dee wambu lapo Jerusaleme dokona pyarepala pyao peteyaminyi dupwa dee lapo nakama Bapilone wambu keta rangeme maiyami dupwape nyuo lanyuo Bapilone peya.
Dopa piyamopa wambu muiyane lapo bange see nange dupwa yuu Juta dokona ee yuu dupwanape dee isa girapo ee dupwanape yulu pyuo petena leya.
Dokopa Bapilone wambu dupwame isa potende kone kaname waso karenge doko pyao poro leyami. Dee rate lapo tembole anda dokona siyamo dupwa pyao lalyiyami dee wate pingi disi kamame andake kone kaname wasingi doko pyao poro leyami. Lapala bange kone kana yale dupwa peparae nyuo yuu Bapilone dokona peyami.
Nakamame saporo dupwa nyuo dee kana pyare dupwa au pyuo pee nembenge penge dupwa nyuo yulu bange lambe minyaro karenge dupwa nyuo dee mena pyao kiso maingi dokopa pere mena ranjama warakyuo nyingi dupwa nyuo bange nenge rendamu pingi kiso reto maingi pere warake dupwa nyuo dee kone kana dopaleme bange wasisi tembole anda dokona minyuo yulu pingi dupwa nyuo piyami.
Nakama bange peparae golome wasisipi dee kana kulingimi wasisipi dupwa opetae nyuo peyami dee isare lengya minyuo papingi bangepe dee pere kukipi dupwa peparae nyuo peyami.
Kiŋi Solomoneme tembole anda dokona lao kone kaname bange kameya lapo waso reteya. Dokona rate lapope disi andake mendepe dee isa pote lamape waso reteya. Reteyamo dusipa ama kenda wakasa pingi. Dokome sikyali angi doko kapa pii nange.
Bange dolapo laparae mendare. Mende mendepe laparae mita mange lama karo ketae peya. Dokopa ketae dolapona laparae kone kana pere dopaleme wasisi mita mendaki dee kanya ingiya. Dolapona laparae awali lao kalya pyuo kone kaname waso bange isa jingi pomekeranate yale dupwa yuku awali leyami.
Nepusaratane akali yanda singinya mupwa dokome akali Setaya lenge purisi mupwa dokope akali Sepanaya lenge purisi lanena lapo ingyuo karenge dokope dee akalii rema mendasipa tembole anda dokona mupwa karenge dusipape opetae karapusi pyao minyuo peya.
Yuu taone dokona akali mende yanda singinya mupwa ingyuo iso karenge dokope dee akali kingi paki kiŋi doko dopa pyuo piri dapa pyuo piri lao nyiso lenge yuu taone dokona pyarepala pao kareyami dusipape yanda singi mupwa iso karenge dokona pepa dupwa isakamingi akali dokope dee akali mupwa akalisa pakinyamange dusipape opetae nyuo minyuo peya.
Papala Nepusarataneme Bapilone kiŋi doko yuu taone Oripila lenge yuu andake Amati dokona singi dokona peteyamo doko maiya.
Maiyamopa kiŋi dokome nakama nyepala randa andake maipala nakama pyao kumakaya. Dokona lao Juta wambu dupwa nakamana yuu yaki nyuo karapusi ingyuo minyuo peyami.
Yuu Bapilone range kiŋi Nepukatenesame akali Getalaya akali Aikamena ikinyingi Sapanena kauwange doko Juta wambunya gapomane ingyuo karena lao rombo palyiya. Rombo palyapala wambu lapo karapusi ingyuo nyuo minyuo yuu Bapilone paa napala kareyami dupwana baa mupwa ingyuo karena leya.
Dokopa Jutia akali mupwape dee yanda singi lapope nakama rangeme Bapilone wambu keta mai nao mee kareyami dupwame pii doko siyami. Sepala yuu Misipa dokona akali Getalaya kareyamo dokona peyami. Akali mupwa dusipana mende Isimaele lenge akali Netanayana ikinyingipi Joanane lenge akali Kareyana ikinyingipi Seraya lenge akali Tanumetena ikinyingi yuu taone Netopa range dee mende Jesanaya lenge yuu Makya range dusipa peyami.
Dokopa Getalayame nakama lamaiyuo lao, Nakamame yuu Bapilone akali mupwa dupwa kando paka nalapape lao nakama lalu lao langilyu. Yuu dakena wangu lakao palipala yuu Bapilone kiŋi dokona yulu pyakamyuo kararami ramo dokopa nakama keta yulu dupwana peparae kapa elyape ingyuo para, leya.
Dopa leyamopape ee kana dokona kana yanda ipingi dokopa akali Isimaele Netanayana ikinyingi akali Elisamana kauwange baa kiŋinya ree palu wambu dokome dee akali akalisa opetaeko konda pyuo role pyapeta yuu Misipa dokona papala akali Getalaya doko minyaro nyepala pyao kumakayami. Baame Bapilone akali lapope dee Isaraele wambu lapope role pyao kareyami dupwa opetaeko pyao kumakaya.
Nakama Bapilone wambu dupwa kando pakapala Isaraele wambu peparae pendewa kamongope dee ami yanda singi mupwape dupwa mendaki kata palyapala yuu doko yaki nyuo yuu Isipi peyami.
Akali Ipilimorotake Bapilone wambunya kiŋi ingyuo kareyamo ee kana dokopa baame Juta kiŋi Jiyoakini doko kando anjiki pyuo mona reto karapusi paleyamo doko nyisa pena leya. Doo piyamo doko Jiyoakini baa karapusi pyao minyuo papeyaminyipa ee kana akalisa rema ipisu yanda ipingi dokona kana akalisa ipisu lama yuu gii akalisa lama ipisu yanda ipingi dokopa dopa piya.
Ipilimorotakeme kiŋi menge karapusi pyao minyuo yuu Bapilone peyaminyi dupwa kando anjiki piyamopape baa kiŋi Jiyoakini yulu andake maiyuo kingi ketae pyambuo anjiki pyuo kareya.
Dokona lao Jiyoakini banya karapusi komau alowa pipala kiŋinya nenge nenge dokona nao yuu gii lete kareyamo peparae palyuo karo piya.
Yuu gii peparae baa palyuo karo piyamo dokopa baa nenge narali dupwa maiyaminyi dokoko suu pyao maipa piyami.
...




































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Ee kana mupwa dokopa Kiŋi Sairose baa yuu Pesa dokona kiŋi ingyuo kareyamo dokopa Kamongo dokome Sairosena monarename pyongo pyao lamaiyamopa baame lowa lapo lao wasapala pyao palyapala yuu muu baame rapu piyamo dusipana maiyuo kapa piya. Doo piyamo doko wamba Kamongo Anatumi poropeta Jeremaya keta lamaiyamo pii dupwa angi kinyi ingyuo peya.
Kiŋi Sairose yuu Pesa range dokome pii dake dapa lao leto. Kamongo Anatu yake panda karenge dokome namba rombo palyapala yuu muu peparaena rapu pyuo karo tembole anda andake doko yuu Juta singi dokona yuu Jerusaleme dokona karamo doko kamba pyakape, langiya.
Nakamba Anatunya wambu dupwa Anatu role pyao karena. Dopa piramopa nakama yuu Jerusaleme dokona papala Isaraele wambunya Anatu yuu Jerusaleme dokona lakandenge Kamongo dokona tembole anda doko kamba pyakamipwape.
Anatunya wambu karapusi palyuo kareyaminyi dupwana lapo anda kamba panya nyisarami lao suu pyarami ramo doko nakamana wambu parali maki dupwame dapa pyuo nyisarami. Nakamame kana kulingipi golope nengepe dee mena matana bange pinji reto minyuo paraminyi dupwape mairami. Dupwa mairaminyipape Jerusaleme Anatunya tembole anda dokona baa mairamili dupwa mairamiko, leya.
Juta Benjamenepana rara dokona akali kyawa dupwamepe purisi akali dupwape Lipae akali dupwape dee wambu menge dupwana lapo Kamongo dokome nakamana monarena pyongo pyao lamaiyamo dupwape rapa rapa pipala Kamongona tembole anda Jerusaleme dokona kamba pyakamila parami ingiya.
Dokopa wambu parali maki dupwame nyiso bange malu maiyami. Kana kulingimi wasisi bangepe golope mena matana bange pinji minyuo paraminyi dupwape mee bange keyange lapope dee tembole anda dokona Anatu lakando mairamili bange lapo opetae maiyami.
Kiŋi Nepukatenesame kapope dee bange warake disi yalepe lapo Jerusaleme siyamo nyuo pao banya tembole anda mee bange dupwa anatu lao lakandenge dokona reteya dupwa kiŋi Sairoseme nyuo maiya.
Kiŋi baame bange dusipa akali Mitiretate baa kiŋinya bange peparae iso kareyamo doko keta maiya. Maiyamo dokopa baame bange peparae au pyuo yaka lao pepa pyao nyepala yuu Juta gapomane akali mupwa Sesepasa doko maiya.
Yaka leyamo dusipa pere malawai lasi kana golome wasisi lapo Anatu rae maiyuo maingi bange retenge akalisa rema: 30 pere warake kana kulingimi wasisi lapo Anatu rae maiyuo maingi bange retenge taosande mendaki: 1,000 mee pere malawai lasi akalisa lama dee mange mendaki karo: 29 pere kuki golome wasisi akalisa rema: 30 dee pere kana kulingimi wasisi kuki andete kisima dee akalisa mendaki: 410 dee mee bangeme nenge Anatu pyao kiso maingi dupwa taosande mendaki: 1,000 dusipa ingiya.
<range>
Sesepasamoo wambu karapusi palyuo kareyaminyi dupwa pipya yuu Bapilone yaki nyepala Jerusaleme peyaminyipa bange peparae nyuo pyaso golome wasisi pere dupwape kana kulingimi wasisi pere dupwape dee bange wakalepe ama malu (5,400) ingiya.






































































Kana yanda ipingi pyaka siyamo dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwa lambo lao nakamana yuu taone dupwana kapa paleyami. Palipala enakana nakama peparae yuu Jerusaleme dokona malu palyuo peteyami.
Dokopa Josua Josatakena ikinyingi dokope banya purisi yango lapope dee Serapapele Siyatielena ikinyingi dokope banya ree palu lapo opetae pyasapala Isaraele wambunya Anatu dokona mena pyao kiso maingi kana pyare doko dee kamba piyami. Doo piyaminyi doko Anatunya akali Mosesena lowa pyao reteyamo dokona ingyuo mena pyao kiso Anatu mairamaŋa lao piyami.
Dopa piyaminyipa wambu menge yuu dokona palenge dupwa kando pakayami. Pakayaminyipape nakama kana pyare wamba laro karenge dokonako kamba pipala enakana bange kiso mainginyili pyuo yangama alemanji lao kiso maiyuo kareyami.
Karapala dokopa Anatumi leyamuli pyuo nakama anda kauwa pipala nenge andake malu palyuo nao dee yuu gii yaka lao Kamongome pinya leyamuli pyuo bange kiso maiyami.
Dopa pyuo dupwa nakamame koro petenge yuu gii dusipana nenge dupwa kiso mukinyi nembo maipapu piyami. Kana enenge pyaka siyamo dokona lapo kiso maiyuo wambu nyuo pyaso elyambu pyuo peteyaminyi dokona Kamongo lakando kiso maiyuo piyami. Dee lapo opetae wambu dupwame Kamongo suu pyao mee maiyaminyi dupwa kiso maiyami.
Dokona lao wambu dupwame tembole anda doko dee kamba kanda soo pipa nayaminyipape nakamame kana yanda ipingi nyepo yuu gii mupwa dokona kanda soo mena pyao kiso Kamongo maiyami.
Wambu dupwame kaname anda pingi akali dupwape kamonda dupwape nakamana yulu dokona yole nyerami lao kana piyami. Pyapala yuu taone Taya dee Saitone dolapona wambu dupwame isa sita lapo yuu Lepanone dokona karenge dupwa jinya lao nenge ipwape isa olipi ipwangepe lapo maiyami. Maiyaminyi dokopa isa dupwa ipwa kota dokona sipunya yuu Jopa dokona manjo epeya. Maiyuo peyaminyi dokopa peparae kiŋi Sairoseme kapa leyamuli pyuo piyami.
Nakama yuu Jerusaleme dokona Anatunya tembole anda kareyamo dokona epapala ee kana mendaki kareyami. Karapala ee kana enenge epeyamo dokona kana lama dokopa tembole anda dee kamba pinya kanda siyami. Serapapele Josuamoo dee nakamana akali yango dupwape purisipi Lipae akali dupwape wambu peparae karapusi palyuo karo yuu Jerusaleme kapu kyuo epeyaminyi dupwa pipya role pyao yulu piyami. Lipae akali peparae ee kana akalisa lamape panda ulipilipi nembo andengepe dupwa tembole anda kamba piyaminyi dokona mupwa ingyuo rapu pyuo karena lao rombo palyiyami.
Dokopa Lipae akali mende Jesua lenge dokope banya ikinyingi dee ree palu wambupi Katimielemoo banya ikinyingi dusipape nakama nyuo simu pyapala tembole anda kamba piyaminyi dokona mupwa ingyuo iso kareyami. Wambu dusipa nyuo pyasapala akali Otapiana akalyanda ingyuo kareyami. (Lipae akali Enatatena akalyanda kareyaminyi dupwame nakama nyisiyami.)
Dokopa akali dupwame tembole anda doko kanda soo susa isa reto piyami dokopa purisi dupwa nakamana komau londe dupwa wapupala bikuli dupwa minyaro kareyami. Kareyaminyi dokopa Lipae akali Asapana akalyanda mendaki dupwame sanape dopale lama kingi ralipi minyapala pyao kareyami. Karo dokopa kiŋi Dapitimi mana lamaiyamuli pyuo nakama Kamongo Anatu lakando lao kareyami.
Karapala Kamongo Anatu lakando lao rae maiyuo kenane keyange doko kamba lao lao pyuo kareyami. Dokona Kamongo doko keyange dokome Isaraele wambu dupwa kulisa palyuo mona reto karalu karenge, dopa leyami. Lapala tembole anda doko kanda soo puu rombo minyuo susa kana reto piyami dokome nakama peparae rae maiyuo pii ketae lao Kamongo lakando kareyami.
Dokopa purisipi Lipaepe andapae dupwamepe akalyanda wakale wakale dupwana kamongo dupwamepe tembole anda wambo kareyamo dokona kandenge dokome tembole anda enenge dokona isa susa reteyaminyi doko kando karapala yamarangyuo ee lao kareyami. Dopa pyuo kareyaminyipape wambu menge dokona kareyami dupwa rae maiyuo pii poraiyuo lao kareyami.
Karapala nakamame eepe pii porai rae maiyuo leyaminyi dupwape ketae palyuo yuu wangu paki pakipi peyamosa mendemepe kapa pyuo kenane eepe dupwa soo pakana palyarami ingya naya.









































Dokopa kiŋi Darisimi kiŋi dupwame pii lamaiyuo pepa pyasi yuu Bapilonena reteyami dupwana koto kandena leya.
Dokona koteyaminyipape yuu Mitia yuu taone Ekepatana lenge dokona pepa rongo pisi siyamo dokona pii pyasi dasipa paleyamo doko kando nyiyami.
Ee kana mupwa banya kiŋi yulu kanda soo pyuo kareyamo dokopa kiŋi Sairose baame nakama lamaiyuo tembole anda Jerusaleme karenge doko kamba pinya leya. Dokona wambu dupwame Anatu mena pyao kiso maiyuo dee bange wakale lapo kiso mairami lao pinya leya. Tembole anda isa piso puu rombo minyuo ketae pao doko mita akalisa lama ipisu yanda ipingi (27) ingyuo para. Dee dopako pyuo pinjingi paki piso pao pakirena puu rombo minyuo mita akalisa lama ipisu yanda ipingiko minyarami.
Minyaraminyi dokopa kana dupwa maki maki pyuo mendena mende ketae yuu rema ingyuo retapala kanya raka dokona isa mendaki retarami. Dokopa anda dokona kana paramili pyuo doko kiŋinya anda kana bange silyamo dokome nyuo ropo pyarami.
Dee golope kana kulingipimi wasisi bange lapo dupwa wamba kiŋi Nepukatenesame yuu Jerusaleme tembole anda dokona siyamo dupwa nyepala lanyuo yuu Bapilone pao reteya kande dupwa dee nyuo minyuo pao Jerusaleme tembole anda dokona singinyili pyuo panda rolae dupwana retarami, leya.
Dokopa kiŋi Darisimi dopa lao pepa isingi pyao maiya. O Tatenai, ipwa Yuporisa neta anda penge dorena yuunya gapomane akali mupwa doko dee Setaposenaimoo akali yango isingi yulu role pyao pingi dupwape nakama peparae tembole anda dokona paa napala nyokono karalapape.
Karapala nakamame tembole anda pilyaminyi dokona kopeta kapeta pimili lao maka sukusuku mainyi pyambwaseramiŋi kaeyalapape. Kaepala Juta gapomane akali mupwa doko pipya Juu lita akali dupwamepe Anatunya tembole anda doko wamba kareya dokonako pinya kaeyalapape.
Nambame anda doko nakama nyiso pelapape, leto. Dokona lao anda doko kapa pyuo otarami lao ipwa Yuporisa neta anda penge dorena yuunya piso takisi nyiyaminyi kana dokome anda dokona bange ropo pyao pepengele dupwa waiya lao ropo pyarami.
Yangama yangama lao kaeya nao nakamame purisi akali Jerusaleme range dusipa bange mende see nalyamo lao langiyami kande dokopa maipwape. Anatu yake panda karenge doko pyao kiso mukinyi nembo mairami. Mairami dupwa mena sipisipipi bulamakao yakanepe sipisipi yakanepe lao maipwape. Dee witi jingipi kotape waene ipwangepe olipi ipwangepe dupwa maipwape.
Dopa pyuo mairaminyi dokopa nakamame Anatu yake panda karenge doko rae mainyi pyambuo bange kiso maiyuo dee Anatumi nambamoo nambana ikinyingi dupwape elyape keta pisinya lao ateŋa lakarami.
Lakaraminyi dokopa pii doo leto dupwa akali mende warombo see nara ramo doko banya anda dokona isa pulyaka mende nyepala mumuna pakirena kaku ingyuo nanga lyepala dokome banya yongo dokona arekyaraminyipa banya anda doko lalyuo momo nao ai pyao para.
Anatu yuu Jerusaleme dokona baa lakandarami lao rombo palyiya kiŋi mendemepe wambu rara mendemepe mawa pii dake kamba lao tembole anda kokwa selana lao kararami dupwape pyao kwaeyanyi nembakana leto. Namba Darisimi mawa pii doko ama poraiyuo langilyu. Nakamame warombo soo minyuo karalu karalapape.
Dokopa gapomane akali mupwa Tatenaimoo Setaposenai dee akali yango isingi yulu role pyao pingi dupwape kiŋi banya pii leyamuli pyuo piyami.
Poropeta Akaipa Sekarayapame nakama mona minyarambu porainyi pyambuyaminyisa Juu lita akali dupwame anda doko elya pyuo waiya lao au pyuo oteyami. Wamba Isaraele wambunya Anatu dokomepe dee Pesa wambunya kiŋi mupwa Sairosemoo Darisimoo Atasesisimoo dusipamepe pii reto leyaminyili pyuo pyuo oteyami.
Dokopa kiŋi Darisi kareyamo yuu gii doko ee kana pakinyamange dokopa kana akalisa mendaki ipisu lama yuu gii rema dokona tembole anda doko pyuo oteyami.
Oteyaminyipa Isaraele wambu purisi akalipi Lipae akalipi mee wambu dupwape karapusi ingyuo palyuo karo epeyami dupwa pipya rae wakasa maiyuo tembole anda doko misi lao kii lumbuyami.
Kii lumbuyami dokopa nakamame mena bulamakao andete mendakipi (100) sipisipi andete lama (200) dee sipisipi yakane andete kisimape (400) pyapala Anatu kiso maiyami. Maipala Isaraele akali rara akalisa mendaki ipisu lama palenge doko suu pyao mena meme akalisa ipisu lamako nyepala nakamana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakana lao maiyami.
Maipala Mosesena buku dokona pii leyamuli pyuo purisipi Lipaepe dupwa tembole anda dokona yulu pirami dupwana suu pyao rapa rapa piyami.
Ee kana enenge kana mupwa yuu gii akalisa ipisu kisima dokopa Pasopa Nenge Nenge yuu gii doko pyaka siyamopa wambu karapusi palyuo karo epeyaminyi dupwa rae maiyuo nenge nao peteyami.
Purisi dupwape Lipae dupwape nakama ama yapasi ingyapala poo pyasi wakasa ingyuo peteyami. Dokopa Pasopa Nenge narami lao Lipae dupwame wambu karapusi palyuo paeyo karo epeyami dupwanape purisi dupwanape dee nakama rangenape lao mena pyao kisiyami.
Kisiyaminyi dupwa Isaraele wambu karapusi palyuo karo Jerusaleme dee kapu kyuo epeyaminyi dupwame neyami. Dee yuu dokona wambu Anatu angi suu pyaa nao koo pyuo kareyaminyi dupwana lapo mona kapu kyuo Isaraelena Kamongo Anatu lakando kareyaminyi dupwa opetaeko neyami.
Borete Isi Pyambwa Nao Nenge Yuu Gii doko pyaka siyamosa yuu gii yanda ipingi nyepo dusipana nakama rae maiyuo yalya kando nenge andake kiso nao kareyami. Doo rae maiyaminyi doko Anatumi Pesa wambunya kiŋi doko keta mona rambi lanyi pyambwakamiyamosa nakamana yulu dupwana nyisiyamo dokopa Isaraele wambunya Anatunya tembole anda doko kamba piyami.
Ee kana malu epo papeyamopa akali Atasesisi doko baa yuu Pesa dokona mupwa ingyuo kareyamopa Esera kareya. Eserana rora ambasu wambu dupwana akali Erone baa purisi mupwa ingyuo kareyamo doko rakange angingyuo kareya. Esera baa Serayana ikinyingi. Seraya baa Asarayana ikinyingi. Asaraya baa Ilikayana ikinyingi.
Ilikaya baa Saluminya ikinyingi. Salumi baa Satokona ikinyingi. Satoko baa Akitupinya iki-nyingi.
Akitupi baa Amarayana ikinyingi. Amaraya baa Asarayana ikinyingi. Asaraya baa Merayotena ikinyingi.
Merayote baa Serayana ikinyingi. Seraya baa Usinya ikinyingi. Usi baa Bukinya ikinyingi.
Buki baa Apisuyana ikinyingi. Apisuya baa Pineyasena ikinyingi. Pineyase baa Eliasana ikinyingi. Eliasa baa Eronena ikinyingi.
Esera baa mana nyisi akali. Kamongo Isaraele wambunya Anatu dokome lowa pii peparae Mosese maiyamo dupwa mana nyepala soo gisiya. Kamongo banya Anatumi Esera keta elyape pisakamiyamo dokome baa kee lao piso siyamuli pyuo gapomane akali mupwa dokome baa bange peparae maiya. Atasesisi baa kiŋi karo ee kana yanda ipingi nembo kareyamopa Esera baa Bapilone piso yuu Jerusaleme panya peya. Pao dokopa baame Isaraele akali purisi dupwape Lipae dupwape tembole anda dokona musiki pingipi tembole anda isingipi yulu pingi akalipi lapo lanyuo peya.
<range>
Kana mupwa dokona yuu gii mupwa dokona Bapilone yaki nyepala Anatumi nyisiyamosa kana kingi paki dokona yuu gii mupwa dokopa yuu Jerusaleme epo pyaka siyami.
<range>
Eserame Kamongona lowa dupwa rae maiyuo mana nyepala moko minyuo karo lowa dupwa Isaraele wambu mana lamaiyuo kareya.
Kiŋi Atasesisimi purisi akali Esera lenge dokome mawa pii Kamongome Isaraele wambu dupwa maiyamo dupwa soo giso kareyamo doko pepa pase dapa lao pyao palyapala maiya.
Namba kiŋi Atasesisimi emba purisi akali Esera Anatu yake panda karenge dokona mawa pii dupwa soo gisingi doko pyao jilyu.
Nambame yuu rapu pyuo karenge dokona Isaraele wambupi purisi dupwape Lipae dupwape yuu Jerusaleme panya lao suu pilyaminyi dupwa emba role pyao kapa pena lao lalu lao leto.
Nambamoo namba nyiso yulu pingi akali yanda ipingi nyepo dusipamepe Anatunya lowa dupwa emba keta jiyamo dupwa yuu Jerusaleme dokonape Juta dokonape apa pyuo mondo lao minyuo karamipi lao kandala puu letamano.
Anatu bange reto maingi dupwa nambape namba nyiso yulu pingi akali dusipamepe Isaraele wambunya Anatu banya tembole anda yuu Jerusaleme karenge doko kana golope kana kulingipi maimwali lao suu pilyamano dupwa embame nyepala minyuo pare.
Embame kana golope kulingipi yuu Bapilone dokona nyiinyi dupwape dee bange peparae Isaraele wambupi nakamana purisi dupwapeme nakamana Anatunya tembole anda Jerusaleme karenge dokona mee mailyaminyi dupwa opetae nyuo minyuo pare.
Nakamame kana doko kando mondo lao keyange ingyuo nembo mena bulamakao kalipi sipisipi kalipi sipisipi yakanepe witi jingipi waene ipwangepe ropo pyapala Jerusaleme tembole anda kana pyare lasi dokona reto Anatu mairi.
Maipala kana kulingipi kana golope kakana silyamo dupwame nyepala embape embena akali yango dupwape pinya suu pilyaminyili pyuo Anatumi pimili lao suu pilyamo dokona palyuo pirami.
Bange wakale wakale dupwa tembole anda dokona yulu pirami lao jiyami dupwa peparae yuu Jerusaleme dokona Anatu mairi.
Maipala tembole anda dokona yulu pinya saka nayami kande dokopa nambana kana retenge anda dokona nyere.
Namba kiŋi Atasesisimi akali kana rapu pingi ipwa Yuporisa neta anda penge dorena yuunya karaminyi dupwame purisi akali Esera lenge Anatu yake panda karenge dokona lowa soo gisingi doko bange kee laramo dupwa peparae mainya leto.
Mairaminyi dupwa kana kulingi kilokerame malu mee (3,400) dee witi kilokerame malu mee (10,000) dee waene lita malu (2,000) dee olipi ipwange lita 2,000 opetaeko dusipa iki manda manju mairami. Maipala kota peparae nyimwali lao suu pyaraminyili pyuo kapa mairami.
Dokona nakamame bange peparae Anatumi banya tembole anda dokona nyipuli lao suu pyaramuli pyuo mondo lao maiyalapape. Dokopa Anatumi nambape dee enakana akali nambana panda nyuo kararami dupwape kando imbwa nara.
Nakamame purisipi Lipaepe musiki pingi akalipi tembole andana kama waa nyii nana lao rapu pyuo karenge dupwape yulu pingi akalipi tembole anda dokona yulu wakale mende pyuo karenge wambu dupwape keta takisi kapa nyii nare.
Emba, Eserame Anatumi mona palenge singinya renge jiyamo dokome iso karenge akali lapope kote singi akali lapope rombo palyare. Palyarene dokopa ipwa Yuporisa neta anda penge dorename yuunya wambu Anatunya lowa minyuo karaminyi dupwa rapu pyuo kararami. Kararaminyi dokopa wambu mende lowa dupwana see nayami kande doko mana lamairi.
Mendemepe Anatunya lowa dupwanape kiŋinya lowa dupwanape kamba lara ramo dokopa waiya lao randa nyera. Nyeramo doko pyao kumarami panda yuu mendasa karapusi ingyuo pena larami panda banya yuupi bangepe nyerami panda karapusi dokona palyaraminyi kata dusipana mende randa nyera.
Esera baame lao, Kamongo namwana rora ambasu dupwana Anatu doko lakando karalapape. Baame kiŋi akali doko Kamongona tembole anda Jerusaleme dokona karenge doko angiŋi lao ketae nembara lao banya mona piya.
Anatumi namba kando sakame kumuo kareyamosa kiŋi dokope banya akali nyiso yulu pingi dupwape banya akali mupwa porai renge palenge dupwapeme namba kando rae mailyaminyi. Nambana Kamongo Anatu dokome nambana mona porainyi pyambuyamosa nambame Isaraele rara dupwana akali kyawa malu dupwa kongo piyunusa namba pipya kapu kyuo Jerusaleme epeyami.































































































Akalayana ikinyingi Niyamaya banya arome pii dupwa pyasi palamo. Niyamaya baame dopa leya. Yuu Pesa kiŋi akali Atasesisi baa kiŋi yulu kanda soo pyuo karo enakana ee kana akalisa lama banya yulu minyiyamopa kana Kisilepe dokopa yuu taone mupwa Susa lenge dokona kareyo.
Kareyono dokopa nambana yangonge Ananimoo Juta akali lapo pipya epeyami. Epeyaminyi dokopa nambame Juu akali dupwa pyao kumaka nao yuu wakale mendasa puu maiyuo nyii nayami dokona lao piso siyu. Dopako pyuo yuu Jerusaleme dokona lao opetae piso siyu.
Piso siyunu dokopa nakamame namba langyuo, Wambu yuu Jerusaleme karaminyi dupwa akali dupwa pyao kumaka nao yuu wakale mendena puu maiyuo nyii nayami dupwa nakama randa andake nyuo elyame kumuo karaminyi. Karaminyipa Jerusaleme kana kame kameya awali lao piro karenge doko lalyuo bolombalo lasi silyamo. Dee Jerusaleme kambu dowa kameya dupwa isareme rao lalyuo kokwa siya, leyami.
Leyaminyi doko sepala yuu gii lapo ee lao kumanda peteyo. Pisipala dokopa namba nenge naa nao Anatu yake panda karenge doko ateŋa lao kandalyo kando peteyo.
Pisipala dokopa dopa leyo, O Numi Anatu, Emba Kamongo mupwa wakasa ingyuo karene doko namwa pako karamano. Wambu emba kando mona retenge dupwape embena mawa pii yaki nyii nao minyuo pyuo karenge dupwape pipya emba pii lao kana minyuo kinyi lalu lao lenge doko minyaro karene.
Embena kendemande Isaraele wambu dupwa emba kando koo piyama dupwana kondapala polo langyuo kukwa korakamape ateŋa lao pyuo karo doko emba kando sepe. Kinyi nambape nambana rakangena ree palupi koo piyamako, lamaiyu.
Lamaipala dokopa embena kendemande akali Mosese keta mawa pii jiinyi dupwape moko minyuo pyuo kara nalyamano. Dopa pyuo karo embame namwa pelapa langiinyi dupwa kamba lao yulu kopetame pyuo karamano.
Pii embena kendemande akali Mosese lamaii. Embame baa dopa lamaiyuo, Nakama Isaraele wambu dupwa langirunuli pyuo kara narami ramo dokopa nambame nakama yuu wakale dupwana bolombalo lao nembaro doko kame see nao karape.
Dokopa nakama namba karo dakena dee kamba kapa kyuo epapala nambana mawa pii doko yaki nyii nao minyakao kararami ramo dokopa nakamana wambu dupwa yuu nanesa puu maiyuo nyuo minyuo paraminyipape nambame nakama yaki nyii napala range nyuo sukusa sukusa pipala yuu mupwa enenge mendena namba lakando kararamiŋi lao yapalyo nyepala dokona karalapa lao jero, lamaii kande, leyo.
Lapala dokopa Kamongo doko dapwa embena kendemande emba rangena wambu kandale. Embena porainya renge andake dokome kiiramo nyii dupwa karaminyi.
Embena kendemande akali Niyamayana ateŋa lenge dokope embena Isaraele kendemande wambu menge dupwa emba rape rape lao karalana suu pingi dupwana ateŋa lenge dupwape sepe. Epapu namba embone pisinyi pyambuo akali kiŋi karamo dakeme namba kandapala kondana lao nyisinya lao karape, Anatu lamaiyu. Yuu gii dusipana namba kiŋi akalinya nenge ipwa waenepe minyakamyuo epo maipapu pingi akali ingyuo karapala yulu dupwa pyuo kareyo, leya Niyamayame.
Kiŋi Atasesisi ee kana akalisa lama kiŋi yulu pyuo kareyamo dokopa kana Nisane dokopa ipwa waene siyamo doko nyepala kiŋi doko minyuo pao maiyu. Wamba namba kiŋinya lenge kambu dokona namba mona rando kumasi lenge kambu nyilyunu doko kanda nange.
Rae mai nayo dokona kiŋimi apa pipyasa embena lenge kambu yanga nalyamo lao piso siya. Piso sepala dopa lao, Emba anga pyaa nalyamo. Rae mai napisa embena mona kendo pilini, langiya. Langiyamo dokona namba walu lao pakame kumuyu.
Pakame kumapala kiŋi lamaiyuo, O Kiŋi palu karalu karape. Nambana rora ambasupi yuu dokona malu piyami doko momo nao dee yuu dokona kame kambu dupwa isareme rao kokwa sinyi nembeyaminyi dokome apa pyuo namba porayapala mee mona kyuku renge kararose? lamaiyu.
Lamaiyunu dokopa kiŋimi namba langyuo, Nambame apa pyakapili lao piso silini? leya. Dokona lao Anatu yake panda karamo doko kando piso soo ateŋa leyo.
Ateŋa lapala enakana kiŋi lamaiyuo, Embame embena kendemande akali namba kando ama raeko maiyuo karare ramo doko namba yuu Juta dokona yuu taone andake nambana wambu rora ambasupi karo kumuo peyami dokona taone doko elya pyuo karala puu lao nembape, lamaiyu.
Enda kuini doko baa maki pyuo peteyamopa kiŋi dokome yuu gii akipare karapala eparese lao piso siya. Piso siyamopa namba yuu gii dusipa karapala eparo lao lamaiyuokondali piyu. Dokopa kiŋi dokome namba kapa puu langiya.
Pii mende kiŋi lamaiyuo, Emba namba kando rae mairi ramo doko pepa pase pyapala jere. Jerenepa nambame minyuo pao gapomane akali dupwa yuu doko yuu kiŋi Ipwa Yuporisa Dumarena lenge dokona iso karenge dupwa mairu. Mairunu dokopa nakamame namba kapa puu lao nembaraminyipa namba yuu Juta epo kando nyepala kararo lao kiŋi baa lamaiyu.
Lapala dokopa embame pepa pase mende jerenepa minyuo pao akali kiŋi Asape lenge kiŋinya imwa rapu pingi akali dokome isa pinginyape imwape lapo jeramo dokome yanda singi tembole anda rapu pingi dupwana anda dokona kame kambu kameya pyakamiru. Pipala yuu taone andake dokona ka'a kame doko opetae pipala dokopa namba range anda palirunu doko opetae piruko, lamaiyu. Lamaipala dokopa nambana Anatumi namba yisiyasa kiŋi dokome namba mende pyakapyali lao piso siyunu dokopa jiya.
Jepala kiŋi akali dokome yanda singi mupwa dupwape akali ose matana petenge dupwa pipya nambamoo wambo role pyao pupwa lao nembeya. Nembeyamo dokopa yuu kingi Ipwa Yuporisa Dumarena lenge kata lyuo peyo. Papala dokona kiŋinya pepa pase doko gapomane akali dupwa maiyu.
Dokopa yuu Orane akali kingi Sanepelate lengepe akali kingi Topaya lenge yuu Amo dokona mupwa karengepe dolapome namba Isaraele wambu nyisala epeyo doko sepala ama imbuo kareyambi.
Dopa pyuo kareyambinyi dokopa namba Jerusaleme kando nyepala dokona yuu gii rema mee kareyo.
Karapala dokopa nambana Anatumi Jerusaleme dokona mende pipi lao monarena langiyamo doko nambame mendali lamai nayo. Lamai napala namba kukwa sipurapala akali mendasipa nambamoo role pyao peyamano dokopa mena donge dupwa karena lapala mendaki iki nyepala piso peyo.
Peyo dokopa kukwa dokopako nambame yuu taone doko yaki nyuo kame kambu kingi Yuu Lama Lama lenge neta yalyingi dorena singi kata dokona pao ipwa kamuo nyingi pete kingi Kau Pambeya donorena singi lenge dorena palyama palyama pao kame kambu kingi Rone Nembenge lenge doko kando nyiyama. Paole pyuo karo dokopa namba Jerusaleme kana kame lalyiyamo dokope dee kame kambu isareme rao kwaeya dusipa repeta pao poraiyuo kandama peyo.
Papala yuu taone andake dokona neta potemenge dorena dulurena pao kame kambu Ipwa Guu Lenge lenge dokona epapala Kiŋinya Ipwa Pete Singi dokona epeyo. Epeyo dokopa donge namba piso epeyono doko paramo kata doko see nayasa saka naya.
Saka napala kukwa dokopa pao yuu lama lama kingi Kitone lenge dokona lano pao dokopa kana kame doko kandama peyo. Papala namba peyono kata dokona kapa kyuo epo kame kambu kingi yuu Lama Lama lenge dokona sukusa pao yuu taone dokona kamba peyo.
Dokopa akali kamongo dupwame namba anja pupi laope apa pipi laope see nayami. See nayaminyipa Juu yango purisi akali dupwape lita akali dupwape kamongo akali dupwape wambu menge yulu dokona piramale dupwape dupwana mendepe lamai nayo.
Dopa piyunupape enakana nakama lamaiyuo, Nakama namwa randa nyimwa doko kandelyaminyi doko yuu Jerusaleme rao banamau lapya kame kambu dupwa rao kwaeyo pipyamo doko kandelyaminyi. Namwa elya napala Jerusaleme kana kame doko dee kamba range pimanale ipupwa, leyo.
Lapala dokopa nambana Anatu dokome namba nyisiyamo dokona lao nakama lamaiyuo kiŋinya pii langiya dupwa opetae lamaiyuko. Lamaiyunu dokopa nakamame namba langyuo, Sipurapala pimanale, leyami. Lapala nakama yulu keyange dokona suu pyao poraiyuo pelana kanda siyami.
Dopa piyaminyi dokopa Sanepelatemoo Topayamoo Arape akali Geseme dokomoo doo pinya piyamano doko sepala dokopa giyalya giyana pyuo lao kilya kandalya kandana pyuo dopa lao kareyami. Doko apa pilyamisi? Kiŋi doko kando kamba lao isa palyamwali lao piramisi? leyami.
Dokopa nakama isingi lamaiyu, Anatu yake panda karenge dokome namwa ree jepala mondo lao pipala karalamisi laramo dokona namwa banya kendemande wambu dupwa sipurapala pirama. Piramanopape Jerusaleme liti mende kana semene palya nasi dokome yuu nakamana ingya nalyamoko, lamaiyu.






































Sanepelateme namwa kana kame piyama dokona sepala baame imbu singi manjo Juu wambu dupwa kando giyalya giyana pyuo minyoko pili lao kareya.
Banya yangonge dupwape Samaria yanda pingi akali dupwapena lenge kambu kando dopa leya, Juu wambu wale wale lasi dupwa apa pilyamisi? Nakamame bange kwaenge dupwa kapa pyuo dee singinyili pyuo pyuo waselana pilyamisi? Nakamame mena pyao kiso maipala yuu gii mendakinya kana kame pyuo otaramisi? Kana rao longasi dupwa isa pao siyamo dupwame apa pyuo kapa nyuo kana kame piramisi? piso siya.
Piso siyamo dokopa Amo akali Topaya lenge doko akali Sanepelate role pyao karapala dopa leya. Kinyi lene. Suwa rae lenge mendeme nakamana kana kame dokona pulyara ramo dokopa kana kame doko boo lara, lamaiya.
Dokopa Niyamayame loma soo lao, Namwana Anatu wambu dupwame namwa rae pisa nalyaminyi dokona pii dake sakape. Pii doko nakama letaminyili pyuo nakama range keta kyawa sisinginya palyakamipi. Nakamana yuu doko namwana yuu kwaeya siya dopaleko ingyuo kwaeyo sinya lakape. Dee nakama dopako pyuo puu maiyuo yuu wakale mendena lanyuo pena lakape.
Akali kana kame pilyaminyi dupwana lenge kambu dokona nakamame imbu singi nyakamilyaminyi dokona nakamana yulu koo pilyaminyi dupwa nyuo kame sakami napipi.
Wambu dupwa nakamana suu pingi dokome poraiyuo suu pyapala kapa pirama leyami dokona kana kame doko piyama. Pipala dokopa kana kame doko anda kanya dokona pyuo palyiyama.
Dokopa Sanepelate Topayapa dee Arape wambu dupwape Amone wambu dupwape Asotote wambu dupwape Jerusaleme kana kame kamba waso mondo lao piyamano dokope dee kana kame lalyisi rete dupwa kanda soo upi leyaminyi dokope sepala nakama imbumi kumuyami.
Imbumi kumapala nakama peparae epo lao palyapala Jerusaleme wambu dupwa pyao yulu doko kuimu kaimu palyuo nembalana leyami.
Leyaminyipape namwame namwana Anatu baa kando lao ateŋa lapala namwana kando iso karenge akali lapo karo nyisu petenge wambu dupwa epa nana lao kando iso karena leyama.
Leyamano dokopa Juta akali dupwame kenane pyao dopa leyami. Yulu malu pipala yulu pingi akali dupwa maka suku suku nelyaminyi. Kana longasi malu sipyamosa namwame kana kame kapa pinya saka nalyamano, leyami.
Leyaminyi dokopa namwana nyisu petenge wambu dupwame lao, Nakamame namwa kando soope pipa naraminyipa sukusa epapala nakama pyao kumakao yulu doko kaena larama, leyami.
Dokopa Juu akali lapo nyisu petenge wambu maki palenge dupwa epo namwa kareyama dokona pao kamba kamba langiyaminyi siyama. Namwana nyisu petenge dupwame namwa pyalana lao lao reteyami doko langiyami.
Dopa pipala nambame nakama kana kame matarena kata rete siyamo repeta nakamana rara wambu lili pyuo petena lapala nakamana wua gelape kaku yandape dupwa rapa rapa pyuo minyaro petena leyo.
Dopa pipala kando sipurao lita akali dupwape akali isingi dupwape dee wambu menge dusipape lamaiyuo, Nakamame doloma kando paka nalapape. Kamongo wakasa ama porai doko baa suu pyapala nakamana yangongepe ikinyingipi wanengepe endape dee ree palu dupwana lao reke lao yanda pilapape, lamaiyu.
Lamaiyunu dokopa namwana nyisu petengeme nakamana pii lao palyuo reteyami doko siyamilyamo lao siyami. Siyaminyi dokopa namwa peparae kapu kyuo pao kamba kana kame yulu piyama.
Yuu gii dokona piso nambana wambu kanya dupwa liti pipala mendeme kana kame doko piyami dokopa liti mendeme namwana kakupi konambepe yandape kapame wasisi bange poraipi minyaro kareyama. Dokopa lita akali dupwame Juu wambumi kana kame pyuo kareyaminyi dupwa paka pyao siyaminyipa piyami.
Dokopa yulu bange soo epenge akali dupwame kingi pakirena yulu pyuo kingi pakimi nakamana yanda kakupi minyaro karo epeyami.














































































































Wambu dupwa peparae kana kame kambu kingi Ipwa lenge repeta kamapi dokona sukusa sukusa pyuo malu palyiyami. Dopa pipala dokopa nakamame Mawa Pii mana lenge akali kingi Esera lenge doko lamaiyuo, Mosesena Mawa Pii buku Anatumi Isaraele wambu maiyamo doko minyuo epena lamaiyami.
Purisi akali Esera dokome baa Mawa Pii buku doko wambu malu palyuo peteyaminyi dokona minyuo epeya. Epapala dokopa kana yanda ipingi yuu gii mendaki dokona enda akalipi wane wanakepe api mendeme Mawa Pii seramili dupwame soo peteyaminyipa Esera Mawa Pii doko yaka leya.
Dopa pyuo leyamopa yangamana piso pao korakama kana kame kambu kingi Ipwa lenge repeta dokona kanda kanda piso yaka leya. Dokopa wambu peparaeme kale yukupala pii sokondali pyuo peteyami.
Mawa Pii mana lenge akali Esera doko baa pii lao karenge ratende pyuo wasiyami dokona ketae kareya. Kareyamopa akali Matitayamoo Sema Anaya Uraya Ilikaya dee Masayamoo dusipa banya kingi rolaerena kareyami. Kareyaminyi dokopa akali Petayamoo Misaele Malikasa Asumu Asapatana Sakaraya dee Mesulamemoo dusipa banya kingi kyairena kareyami.
Dopa piyaminyipa Esera baa rate dokona ketae kareyamosa wambunya lenge kambu dokona buku doko lumbuyamopa kapa kandapala nakama peparae roya kareyami.
Kareyaminyi dokopa Eserame Kamongo Anatu andake ingyuo karamo doko lakandeya. Dopa pyuo lakandeyamopa wambu peparaeme nakamana kingi ketae pyambuo kinyi kinyi lamaiyami. Lamaipala dokopa nakamana wapambu pii pyaro piso Kamongona kingi lao ayemba pongwa nao peteyami.
Wambu dupwa soo kareyaminyi dokopa Jesuamoo Bani Serepaya Jamini Akupu Sapetae Otaya Masaya Keleta Asaraya Josapate Anane Pelayamoome wambu dupwa Mawa Pii dokona polo lamaiyami.
Polo lamaiyuo dokopa nakamame Anatunya Mawa Pii buku dokona kambunya eŋa nembo leyami. Dokona lao wambu dupwa soo nyeramiŋi lao renge angi polo yaka leyami.
Wambu dupwa peparaeme mawa pii sepala dokopa ee leyami.
