Dokona lao yaka leyaminyipa Niyamaya baa Jerusaleme gapomane yulu pyuo kareyamo dokope Esera purisi yulupi mawa pii mana lenge yulupi pyuo kareyamo dokope dee Lipae wambumi mawa pii polo lamaiyuo kareyaminyi dupwape nakama peparaeme wambu dopa pyuo lamaiyami, Yuu gii dake nakamana Kamongo Anatunya yuu gii poo pyasi ingyuo silyamo dokona nakama ee lao kumaralerale nyii nalapape, lamaiyami.
Dokopa Esera nakama lamaiyuo, Nakamana anda wakale wakale keyange papala nenge dupwa nao waene ipwange rende pingi doko nao dee wambu dolo nenge rapa rapa pii nayami dupwa mokwa soo maiyuo pyuo pupwale. Renge doko yuu gii dake namwana Kamongopa poo pyasi ingyuo silyamo dokona yamarangyuo ee laa nalapape. Kamongona rae maingi renge dokome nakama porainyi pyambwara, leya.
Lipae akali dupwame wambu peparae mona sinya lao lao, Yuu gii dake poo pyasi ingyuo silyamo dokome ee lao kumaralerale nyii nalapape, lamaiyami.
Pii doko soo nyiyaminyi dokome wambu peparae kata nyuo papala nenge nao ipwa nao nenge mokwa soo maiyuo raeme kumuo piyami.
Mawa Pii mana nyeramaŋa lao yuu gii lapo dokopa ree palunya rakange kyawa dupwape purisi akalipi Lipae akali dupwapeme Esera mawa pii mana lenge akali kareyamo dokona epo pyasiyami.
Dokopa nakamame mawa pii pepa pyasi Kamongo dokome Mosese keta pyao retena leyamo doko Isaraele wambu dupwa nenge yalya kando nenge nenge kana yanda ipingi dokopa anda kauwa dupwana mee palirami leyamo doko kando nyiyami.
Dopa pyuo kando nyepala dokopa yuu taone dupwanape yuu Jerusaleme dokonape pyao reto lamaiyuo, Anda kauwa pinya karo dokopa yuu kyau kuki dupwana papala isa olipi anginya wangyape olipi ayangena wangyape isa metilipi bona isape dee isa wakalena wangyape nyerami lao pyasi palamo dokona letamuli pyuo pirama.
Dopa pyuo wambumi pao nyepala dokome nakamana semene anda yangi ketae warake dupwanape kamapi dupwanape Anatunya anda kamapi dokonape kame kambu kingi Ipwa lengena kamapi dokonape dee kame kambu kingi Eporaime lengena kamapi dokonape dusipana peparae anda kauwa rangena piyami.
Dokopa wambu yuu nanesa karapusi ingyuo palyuo epeyami dupwame anda kauwa pipala paleyami. Doko yuu gii Josua Nanena ikinyingi kareyamo dokona piso pao anda kauwa dopale pii naoko pao dolomame kanda soo piyami. Dopa pyuo pipala nakama raeme kumuyami.
Koro mendakinya nenge nao peteyaminyi dokopa yuu peparae lao Esera baame Anatunya Mawa Pii palenge buku dokona yaka lapa piya. Dee yuu gii mange lama dokopa Mawa Pii leyamuli pyuo misi lao kii palyiyami.
Kana mendaki dokonako yuu gii akalisa lama ipisu kisima dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwa epo mendakinya pisipala nakamana koo dupwana lao sakame kumuo nenge naa nao peteyami.
Nakama yuu wakale range wambu dupwa liti pipala kareyami. Dopa pipala dokopa kumanda piso wapungi komau wapuo pee awaipi pyapala nakamana koope dee rora ambasupi dupwana yulu koo piyami dupwa kanda soo polo leyami.
Leyaminyi dokopa wambu lapome Anatunya mawa pii dupwa keloke gii rema nembo yaka leyami. Lapala dokopa dee keloke gii remako nembo nakamana koo dupwa polo lao dee nakamana Kamongo Anatu lakando kareyami.
Jesuamoo Bani Katemele Sepanaya Buni Serepaya Bani dee Kenanimoo dupwa peparae Lipae rara dokona kareyami. Rate kuki dokona karo nakamana Kamongo Anatu lao pii ketae palyuo ateŋa leyami.
Lipae rara dupwa ateŋa lao piyami dokona wambu dupwa dopako pyuo misi lao pinya leyami. Jesuamoo Katemele Bani Asapenaya Serepaya Otaya Sepanaya Petatayamoo dusipame lao, Roya karapala nakamana Kamongo Anatunya lao kingi lakandalapape. Baa yuu peparae lakando karalu karalapape. Karapala mee akalimi ingyuo embena kingi kapa lakanda nalyaminyipape Kamongo embena kingi neta renge doko wambu peparaeme angi ingyuo lakandenale.
Isaraele wambu dupwame ateŋa dake piyami. Kamongo doko embako iki Kamongo ingilyamo. Embame yakepe yakena buipi pyuo wasii. Embame yuupi ipwa kotape bange silyamo dupwa peparaepe embame pyuo wasii. Bange dupwa peparae embame letena renge maii. Aŋala yake panda karaminyi dupwame emba lao pangu soo lakandenge.
Emba Kamongo Anatu, embame Aporame rombo palyii. Embame baa yuu Bapilone yuu kuki Ua doko yaki nyuo lanyuo pee. Papala embame banya kingi doko alowa pyuo Aporakame lee.
Embena yulu dokona yaki nyii nao mondo lao pyakao kareyamo kandee. Dokona embame baapa kando lao kana minyuo lalu lao lee. Embame yuu Kenanepe Iti rangepe Amo rangepe Perasi rangepe Jepusi rangepe Gukase range dupwa palenge dupwanape banya ree palu dupwa palirami lao Mairu lao doko lalu lao leepya Embame lenge nyili pyuo pingi dokona embena lalu lao lenge doko kaeya nao minyingi.
Namwana rora ambasupi dupwa apa pyuo yuu Isipi dokona randa nyiyami doko kandee kande. Wambu dupwame Ipwa Kota Pete Kone lenge marenge dokona karo nyisala ipu leyami doko emba sii.
Embena wambu dupwa randa maiyami doko emba sepala Embame yulu pii nange yamarangaramili dupwa kiŋi Peraope banya akali mupwape dee banya yuu range wambupi keta randa maiyuo pii. Dopa pyuo anamasi minyii dokona embena kingi doko andake ingyuo silyamo.
Ipwa kota dokona sukusa embena wambu dupwa pena lapala kata lanyuo peenesa oo lasi siyamo dokona epeyami. Peteta epeyami dupwa embame ipwa kota kiwa dokona kana nyuo yalyalamuli pyuo nyuo yalu piipya.
Korakama dokopa kopa soo lanyuo pao kukwa dokopa isare rao lanyuo pao piipya.
Yake dokona karo epo yuu Sainai kyau dokona embena wambu dupwa pii lamaii. Mawa pii keyange dupwa maiyuo mana pii rolae dupwa lamaiyuo pii.
Juu wambunya koro petenge yuu gii poo pyasi dokona waso karena lao mana lamaiyuo dee embena kendemande Mosese keta embena mawa pii dupwa maiyuo pii.
Wambu dupwa lopayami dokopa yake dokona piso borete maiyuo dee ipwa nanayami dokopa kana dokona ipwa guu lanyi peyakamyuo piipya. Embame yuu mairu lao lalu lao lene doko nyuo kalyinya lao lamaii.
Dopa piyamopape namwana rora ambasu dupwame nakama range andanyi nembo mona kana pokapala embena mawa pii dupwa kando kamba lao kareyami.
Embena yulu piinyi dupwa nyuo kame sepala kamba leyami. Embame yulu pii napengele lapo pii kande dupwa kame sepala kamba leyami. Nakama kyaŋe soo karo akali mupwa mende Isipi dokona kapu kyuo wambu dupwa kendemande ingyuo karena lao dee lanyuo pena lao rangeme rombo palyiyami. Dopa piyamopape emba Anatu dokome nyuo kame singi. Emba ipyapala mona keyange palenge. Emba mona reto karenge. Emba waiya lao imbwa nange. Embena kondo sakange kumungi renge doko kamame andake. Embame nakama yaki nyii nange.
Wambu dupwame kingimi mena bulamakao yale mende pyuo wasapala doko namwa Isipi karo nyuo lanyuo epeya dokoŋo leyami. Yuu malu mee leyaminyi dokopa Kamongo emba isipyao leyami.
Dopa leyaminyipape embena kondo sakame kumungi renge doko kamame wakasa dokome yuu muiyane dokona embame wambu dupwa kyawa yaki nyuo kaeya naye. Kukwa korakamape kata lasaka piinyi doko isare kopape dolapo nyisa nyii naye.
Emba keta renge keyange palenge dokome nakama apa pyuo pirami dokona lao mana lamaiyuo dee nenge myanape ipwape nena lao maiyuo kareya.
Ee kana akalisa kisima dusipana yuu muiyane dokona epo kareyami dokopa nenge naramili dupwa maii. Nakamana komau dupwa kangu paa nao dee nakamana kimbu dupwa randa pyuo rondo laa nao piya.
Embame wambu rarape yuu isingipi dee nakamana yuu range dokona repeta singi yuupi anamasi minyinya lee kande kiŋi Sayone banya iso karenge yuu doko Esepone anamasi minyiyami. Dee kiŋi Okona yuu Besane doko opetaeko anamasi minyiyamiko.
Embame akali wai kisinyipa yakena bui karapyamo mendeme yaka laa nalyaminyi dopale inginyi pyambii. Nakamana rora ambasu dupwa yuu doko mairunupa palirami lao lalu lao leene dokona nakamame anamasi minyuo epo palena lee.
Nakamame yuu Kenane doko pyao isa palyiyami. Embame wambu yuu dokona paleyami dupwa pyao anamasi minyii. Minyapala dokopa wambu dupwape dee kiŋi dupwape yuu Kenane kareyaminyi dupwa nakama keta maipala pyalana suu pilyaminyili pyuo mee pinya lapala kaeyo.
Yuu taone andake kana kame porai dokome minyaro karengepe yuu amenge pingipi anda bange keyange kana malu parali dupwa pale palepe ipwa yuwale kyasi sinya singipi olipi isape jingi lyingi isa lapope dee isa girapo ee dupwape peparae embena wambu dupwame nyiyami. Nakama nalana suu piyami dupwa mee napala ando rondo lasi ingiyami. Embame bange keyange maingi dupwana lao moname nyiyami.
Dopa piinyipape embena wambu dupwame emba kando kamba lao embena Mawa Pii dupwa yalo kareyami. Nakama emba keta kapu kyuo epena lao repe repe lao kareyami poropeta akali dupwa pyao kumakayami. Nakamame emba kando yuu yangama yangama lao kilya kando lao kareyami.
Dokona embame nakamana yanda pimwai dupwame nakama anamasi minyapala iso karena lao pii. Nakamana randa nyepala emba nyisapili lao kee leyami dokopa embame yake dokona piso nakamana pii sepala nyiso karee. Embame kondo sakame kumungi dokome nakamana nyisu petenge dupwa keta kiiramo nyeramiŋi lao akali mupwa dupwa mai.
Mona kyuu lao siyamo kareyami dokopa dee yulu koo dupwa pyuoko kareyami. Dopa piyaminyisa nakamana yanda pimwai dupwame dee kamba nyuo anamasi minyinya lao kata maipala kaeye. Dopa piinyi dokopa nakamana koo dupwa polo lao dee emba nyisa lao piso siyami dokopa yake panda karo sepala embena kondo sakame kumungi renge dokome deeko kyawa lete nyuo karee.
Embena mana pii doko rape rape lao pinya lapala repe repe lamaiyuo karee. Akali mendeme embena Mawa Pii minyuo karenge doko lete para kata singi. Dopa piyamopape wambu dupwa moŋo kyaŋe siyami dokome embena Mawa Pii dupwa yaki nyakao mata maiyami. Ayemba suu pipala mona kana poko emba letenyili pyuo pii narama daa lao kareyami.
Ee kana peparae embame wambu dupwa pipya imbu singi nyii nao waa waa lao repe repe lamaiyuo karee. Embena poropeta akali dupwa keta nakama pii lamainyipa embena wambu dupwa kale poeyasa see nayami. Dokona lao wambu yuu lili wakale lapome embena wambu dupwa iso karena lao panda maiyuo kaeye.
Dopa piyamopape embena kondo sakame kumungi renge doko kamame wakasa ingiyasa nakama pyao kokwa soo koo keta palya nana lao yaki nyii naye. Emba ama sakame kumungi Anatu dokome ipyuo mona keyange palyuo dopa pyuo nyiso karenge.
Anatu, Namwana Anatu doko emba kamame wakasa. Emba ama porainya renge palenge doko wambu soo pako karaminyi. Embena pii lalu lao lao kana minyingi doko emba yaki nyii nange. Asiria kiŋi dupwame namwa piyaminyi yuu gii dokona piso pao epapu dokona namwa randa andake nyuo karamano. Namwana kiŋi dupwape namwana lita dupwape namwana purisi dupwape namwana poropeta dupwape namwana rora ambasu dupwape dee namwana wambu peparaepe randa nyuo kareyami. Dokona namwa randa kuki lama nyiyamape lao suu pyape.
Namwa koo pingi dokopa embame namwa rolae pyuo pyalana pyuo randa jingi. Dopa pyuo namwa koo pilyamanopape embame namwa yaki nyii nange.
Namwana rora ambasupi namwana kiŋipi namwana litape dee purisipi dupwa peparaeme embena Mawa Pii doko minya nayami. Nakamame embena repe repe piipi embena pinya lao pii poraiyuo ingyuo lengepe dupwa see nayami.
Embame nakama elyape keta pisi dokopa kiŋi dupwame embena wambu dupwa mondo lao iso kareyami. Embame yuu amenge kapape paleta pee lasi doko mainyipape koo dupwa wanja nayami dokome embena yulu pii nayami.
Dakepa doko embame namwa yuu amengeko nenge kakana pingi jiinyi dokona epapu kendemande ingyuo karamano.
Lao namwa koo piyamano dokome embame kiŋi dupwa namwa isinya lao jiinyisa yuunya nenge jingi wara piyama dupwa nakama keta pelyamo. Namwana mena dee namwape nakama mende pinya suu pyaminyili pyuo piminyisa randa nyuo mona rumbingi karamano.


























































































































































...






































































































































































Yuu Ase dokona akali mende kingi Jopo lenge doko kareya. Karapala baa elyape ingyuo yuu peparae yulu rolae pyuo kareya. Dee akali doko Anatu pakale pakale lao lakando pyuo yulu koo dupwa wanjo kareya.
Baame wane yanda ipingi nyepo dee wanake rema manjo pingi.
Banya mena sipisipi dupwa taosande yanda ipingi nyepo (7,000) kareyami. Banya mena kamele dupwa taosande rema (3,000) kareyami. Banya mena bulamakao yale kingi okese lenge dupwa taosande mendaki (1,000) kareyami. Banya mena donge andete kingi paki (500) kareyami dee banya kendemande akali soo kaeyoko kareyami. Kareyaminyipa Jopo baa yuu neta pyakaenge dorena kamongo doloma manda manja nayamo kareya.
Kareyamo dokopa akali dokona ikinyingi dupwame yuu gii enenge pyaka silyamo dokopa nakamana anda range dupwana nenge malu palyuo napapu pingi. Yuu gii dokopa nakamana pemalenge rema dusipa dae nengepe ipwape nala epena lapapu pingi.
Yuu gii dusipana nenge nao otelyaminyi dokopa akali Jopo banya ikinyingi dupwa kee lapala nakama kando ateŋa lakamyuo poo pyasi ingyuo pinya lao lapapu piya. Wamba kukwa sipurapala baaame wane dusipa suu pyao mena mendaki mendaki lao wakale wakale pyapapu pyakamiya. Pyakamipala dokopa dopa lao leya. Nambana ikinyingi dupwa koo mende piyami ramo doko Anatu mata maiyami ramo dokome dopa rapisi lao pilyu.
Yuu mende yake panda karenge dupwa Anatupa wato lala epeyaminyi dokopa Satane opetae epo peteya.
Epeyamo dokopa Kamongome Satane lamaiyuo, Anja piso ipisi? lamaiya. Lamaiyamo dokopa Satane isingi lamaiyuo, Yuu muu dokona kata papyuo karo pulyuo pao lupyuo epo paeyalya paeyana pyuo karo ipu, lamaiya.
Lamaiyamo dokopa Anatumi Satane piso soo, Embame nambana kendemande akali Jopo doko apyakale karamo lao soo karepe daa? piso siya. Akali mende baa yale kara nalyamo. Baa iki akali elyape ingyuo yuu peparae yulu rolae pyuo karamo. Baame namba Anatu pakale pakale lao lakando pyuo yulu koo dupwa waso karamo kande.
Dokopa Satane baame Kamongo isingi lamaiya. Jopo baame emba keta nyiso karulipi nao kararo lao kingi lakandengepe? Doko kinyi daase?
Embame baa range banya ree palupi banya bange dupwape peparae nyuo arapunya palyuo minyakamyuo karenge kandale. Embame banya yulu piya doko ando keyange ingyuo pena lao baa rangena mena wai kiso yuu keta pinya lao nyiso karene.
Karenepape embame banya bange dupwa minyando randa mairi ramo doko baame Kamongo embena lenge kambunya karo embena kingi kokwa soo lara, Sataneme lamaiya.
Lamaiyamo dokopa Kamongo dokome Satane lamaiyuo, Kapa, see. Bange baa ayapya dupwa peparae embena porai dokona silyamo. Sipyamopape banya yongo doko kokwa see napipi, lamaiya. Lamaiyamo dokopa Sataneme Kamongo baa rekya lao peya.
Yuu gii mendepa Jopo banya ikinyingi porai dokona anda ikinyingi menge dupwa pipya role pyao nengepe ipwa waenepe yalya kando nao peteyami.
Peteyaminyi dokopa pii minyuo papingi akali mendeme epo Jopo lamaiya. Mena bulamakao yale kingi okese lenge dupwame ee dokona isa ipyuo nyuo yuu apu rao karamwano dokopa mena donge dupwa isayoko nao mee repeta karami.
Karaminyipa Sapeyane akali dupwame waiya lao epo mena dupwa minyarala nyepala kendemande akali dupwa pyao kumami. Pyao kumakamisa namba iki pyakao epo emba langyala epano, lamaiya.
Pii doko ene lao wetapa nayamo dokopa kendemande akali mendeko epo lao, Yuu pele yake panda dokona piso Anatumi malyasa epo mena sipisipi kendemande akalipi dupwa nao otalamo. Namba iki pyakao epo emba langyala epano, lamaiya.
Lamaiyamopa dee akali dokome lao kareyamo dokopa kendemande akali mendeko epapala lao, Kalitia akali dupwa liti rema ingyuo mokwa soo waiya lao epapala mena kamele dupwa minyarala nyepala kendemande akali dupwape peparae pyao kumakaminyi dokopa namba iki pyakao epo emba langyala epano, lamaiya.
Dopa lao kareyamo dokopa akali mendeko epo pii lamaiya. Embena ikinyipi wanenepe dupwa nenge nao ipwa waene naope wane porai dokona anda pisimi.
Pisiminyi dokopa porambaiye andake doko yuu muiyane dokona piso minyuo epapala anda kyukyunaya dusipana lalyalamo. Lalyapala pisiminyi dokona boo lao palipala wane wanake dusipa pyao kumalamo. Namba iki pyakao epo emba langilyu, lamaiya.
Lamaiyamo dokopa Jopo roya karo banya komau pilyini nembapala yuu dokona mukumbwalo sepala baa randa epeyamo dokona kyawasi angasi pyao Anatu lakandeya.
Dee baame leya. Namba anyimi ene doo manjo nyepeyamo dokopa namba komau yambalepe wapuo epa nayo doko suu pyao kumuo paro dokopa dopako piru. Kamongo bange jiyamo dokome range nyuo pwuamo. Pwuamo dokona banya kingi doko lakandapenge, leya.
Randa malu epeyamopape Jopo yulu koo pii nao Anatu keta sero suku laa naya.
Dee yuu mende yake panda karenge dupwame Anatupa wato lala epeyaminyi dokopa Satane baa opetae sukusa epo peteya.
Epeyamo dokopa Kamongome, Emba anja piso ipisi? lao piso siya. Leyamopa Sataneme isingi lamaiya. Yuu muu dokona kata papyuo karo pulyuo pao lupyuo epo paeyalya paeyana pyuo karo ipu, lamaiya.
Lamaiyamo dokopa Kamongome Satane piso soo, Embame nambana kendemande akali Jopo doko apyakale karamo lao soo karepe daa? piso siya. Akali mende baa yale kara nalyamo. Baa iki akali elyape ingyuo yuu peparae yulu rolae pyuo karamo. Baame namba pakale pakale lao lakando pyuo yulu koo dupwa waso karamo kande. Kamongome Satane pii mende lamaiyuo, Embame Jopo mee randa maipuli lao namba kongo pyuo poraiyuo lapinyisa piyale lao panda joo kaeyapunupape Jopo baa mee wamba pingi mona dokako palyuo karamo, leya.
Sataneme Kamongo isingi lamaiyuo, Akali mendeme baa range lete karalana karo banya bange wanepe dupwa kombe maiyuo kaelyamo.
Dopa pyuo karamo dokona lao embame baa rangena yongo kulipi dokona randa mairi ramo dokopa Jopo baame embena kingi nyuo kokwa soo kando lara, lamaiya.
Lamaiyamopa Kamongo dokome Satane kando lao, Kapa lalyeneko doŋo Jopo baa embena kingi rakana karamo. Pinya suu pyarenyili pyuo piri doŋo kumasaka napipi, leya.
Dokopa Sataneme Kamongo yaki nyuo papala akali Jopo banya yongo peparaena rete kinju kiso maiya.
Dokopa Jopo bange nenge pinjingi nembenge mare dokona pao pisipala pere kambasi mende nyepala yanenge yuu pyuo peteya.
Dokopa Jopona etengeme baa lamaiya. Emba Anatu kilya kando lao nembo dee kumuo papala kaeya nana. Akipamo mee mondo mondo lao suu pyao waso karene? leya.
Leyamopa Jopo baame lamaiyuo, Emba enda kyawa sisingi pali nao mee yanenge piinde lalyaneŋe. Bange keyange Anatumi jilyamo dokopa namwa mona kare kare nyingi kandale. Dee randa jilyamo dokopa akipamo mumu laramase? leya. Randa epo kareyamopape Jopome Anatu kando kuki pipalape pii koo mendepe nenge rako ipyuo laa naya.
Akali Jopona puu minyingi rema dusipa banya randa epeyamo dokona lao sepala nakama rangena yuu dokona karo epeyami. Nakama dusipa rara Temane kingi Elipasemoo rara Sua kingi Bilitate rara Namate kingi Sopamoo wato wambo lapala enakana Jopo kondo andake piyasa yara lao yako lala monale lao epeyami.
Lapala nakama katasa epo nanesa karo baa kando gisa nayami. Enakana baa lamo lao kandapala dokopa nakama ee lao yamarangyuo nakamana komau pee pingi dupwa pilyini nembo pee awaipi pyambuyami.
Dopa pipala nakama Jopomoo pipya yuu dokona koro mendaki yalya kando peteyami. Akali dupwame randa andake nyiya doko ama reeko ingilyamo lao suu pyapala pii pyakama nao mee yalya kando peteyami.
Pii laa nao koo piku piku pao peteyaminyi dokopa Jopome baa mandeyaminyi yuu gii doko epe see naya.
O Anatu, namba mandeyaminyi yuu gii koo inginyi nembape. Dee namba anyinya ingi anda ranjama rongo piyamo yuu gii doko kooŋo lape.
<range>
Anatu yuu gii doko alowa pyuo iminjinya lape. Dee kamba yuu gii doko suu pyaa nalu nareŋe lao pipi. Doko eŋa pao see nana lape.
Yuu gii eŋa pao iminjilyamo doko kaepala iminjalu iminjo iminjinya lape. Kopame yambe pyapala neta kata doko nee pipi.
Ee kana dokona yuu gii kukwa doko pyakepanyi neta nembalu nembo nembape. Yuu gii doko dee kamba yaka lao sero kara namanale.
Kukwa gii doko rae mai nao mee pote murumuru ingyuo sinya lape.
Wambu nemonga lao oma kameya kemali pingi silyamo ipwa koko kiwa dokona pii lamaingi dupwame nemonga lapala yuu gii doko kwaenyi nembenako.
Yangama bui kana renge doko raa nana lare. Yuu yango rali pelana pilyamo doko angingyuo yango ota nana lare.
Yuu gii kukwa anyimi namba mandeyamo doko kokwa sinyi nembape. Namba mandeyamosa namba keta mona randange rengepe randa nyingi rengepe dupwa panembena epelyamo.
Namba anyinya ingi anda dokonape dee manjinyi peyareyamo dokopape kumuyuli yaka.
Akipamo nambana anyimi banya kingi kalengena reto lanyuo papiyase? Akipamo anyimi manjepala anju jiyase?
Namba dokopa kumuyuli doko dakepa koo sipuli.
Kiŋi akalipi wambu iso karenge akalipi kiŋinya anda lalyasi dee kamba piyami dupwa malu anda luu palaminyi doko suu pyao luu palipuli.
Dopa pyuo namba kiŋinya ikinyingi dupwa kana golope kana kulingipi nyuo andana retapala nakama malu anda luu palaminyi doko suu pyao sipuli.
Wane wanakepe nyaŋa manjinyi peyarelyaminyi kumungi dopale ingyuo luu palipuli.
Yulu koo pingi dupwa malu anda palenge dokopa nakamana koo dupwa pii nange. Dee yulu andake pipala makame kumungi dupwa malu anda palyuo dokopa imambu singi.
Dee karapusi palenge wambu kumapala dokopa pyalana pyuo pii porakai lengenyili pyuo letaminyi see nao koo soo palenge.
Wambu peparae kuki andakepe karaminyi dee kendemande akali anjarae karo yulu pingi dupwa kumuo palyuo dokopa mokwasi koo soo karaminyi.
Akipamo akali dupwa mona randaminyipa mee lete karena lao kaelese? Ingi randa sakame kumaminyipa akipamo yuu gii mende apeto mailisi?
Nakama kumalena kumungi renge doko epelyape lao isaro karaminyipape angi doko epa nalyamo. Nakamame bange au pisi mona nyingi dupwa angingyuo suu pyaa napala malu anda kumuo palirami dokona mona nyilyaminyi.
Nakama lete karo dokopa rae mai nao pao kumuo malu anda palyuo dokopa rae maingi.
Anatumi pinjingi mendepe kanda nalamisi lapala mee pyuo retelyamo. Baame rengya nyerali dupwa yalu pyuo retenge.
Namba nenge nenge kandale doko suu pyao mee ee lao yanga mangau lao karo. Namba ota nao mona rando ŋee lao karalu karo.
Nambame yulu mende pirali pakapunu dupwako namba keta angi pipa pilyamo.
Nambana mona kyuu lao see napyamo manda rao kara napunupa mee randa dupwa ota nao yoko lapu lapu pyuo epoko karamo, leya Jopome.
Elipaseme dopa leya. Namba pii laro dokopa emba mona kendarese? Nambame embena pii lapinyi sipunu dokome mee romo napyuo kararo ingya nalyamo.
<range>
Embame wambu malu mana lamaiyuo karee kande. Dee embame wambu yulu pii nange kingi yukusi dupwa porainyi pyambuii kande.
Wambu lapo poraiya nao luwaro sepala pao palipa piyaminyipa embame piimi lao minyalyuo karee kande.
Wambo wambu dupwa randa nyiyaminyi nyisii kande epapu kapu kyepala randa emba keta epara panda silyamo. Dokopa papa lao rolao karapala emba apa piro lao see nalene.
Wamba emba Anatu lakando karee dokopa emba keta koo mende pali naya. Dokona lao emba Anatu mende pyakara dokona suu pyale pyale karapengele ingilyamo.
Wamba piyamo yulu dupwana lapo apa piya kande lao suu pyape. Suu pyapala akali rolae pingi mende doko anjuku wambana randa andake wakasa epeyamo neya lao suu pyapala langipi.
Nambame kandeyono dokopa wambu lapome Satanena yuu dokona apyape pyao koo doko ee waingi dopale ingyuo wara pyuo kareyami. Doko lyuo nyingi mange dakepa yulu koo doko wane ingyuo manjo nyuo karaminyi kandelyo.
Anatumi wambu dupwa banya imbu singi dokome yuu galame pili lenge.
Mena laene dokome angamae manjo gaa lenge doko suu pyao wambu yulu koo andake pingi dupwame nenge sisi pyapala pii rekyae lenge. Dokopa Anatumi pii koo dupwa laa kaena lao kambu pyao pyarambulyasa nenge longo pingi.
Mena laene dupwame mena yango pyao naramili dupwa kara narami ramo dokopa nakama lopapala kumungi. Dopaleko ingyuo wambu yulu koo andake pingi dupwa kumulyaminyi dokopa nakamana wane wanake dupwa mee ralo karenge.
Yuu mendepa pii wainde yalu pyuo elya kalo epeya. Ama pii isa isa randa nao serolinde lao epeya.
Doko kukwa kombeya kopetame pyuo luu paleyono doko rokondakaya dopale ingiya.
Pii doko sepala namba walu walu lao pungwa pungwa piya. Piyamo dokopa nambana yongo peparae paka renge nyuo walu leyo.
Dokopa nambana lenge kambu dokona porambaiyende minyili leya. Minyili leyasa nambana yanenge doko kupwasa karo pakayo.
Pakapala karo namba mende dumusa kararamo kandaroli lapala nambame kandaro siyu. Siyunupape angi dokoŋo lao lenge kambu maro laa naya. Enakana koo piku piku peyamo dokopa namba pii mende siyu.
Dokona lao, Api mende Anatunya lenge kambu dorena rolae wakasa pyuo kararamo kandarase? Apimi baa pyuo wasiyamo dokona lenge kambu dorena poo pyasi ingyuo kararamo kando kararase?
Anatumi banya yake pandana aŋala pii wai minyingi dupwa rolae angyako pyuo karaminyi lao mona pyamalya nange. Kyai pilyaminyi kandengeko.
Embame suu pyapinyi dokopa wambu yuumi wasisi dupwa rolae angyako pyuo karaminyi lao mona pyamalyara lao suu pilisi? Wambu mee pyuku lasi maimai kuki kuki kumunginyili pyuo kumungi dupwa rolae ingyuo karaminyi lao mona pyamalyara lao silisi?
Akali mende yangama lete karelyamo kandenge doko alemanji see nalyaminyi mee kumungiko.
Baa kumungi dokopa banya bange dupwa yaki nyuo kaenge. Dee baa keta mona palenge singinya renge doko otengeko.
Jopo embame mendeme isingi letape lao kandalase kyakale lao kandape. Aŋala mende karara ramo doko emba nyisinya larese?
Wambu dupwame emba keta kapa pii nalyaminyi lao suu pyanyi pyano karo kumare ramo doko suu pingi pali nao kopyali ingyuo pirisa pira.
Nambame akali mona pali nange lapo mee mona palenge karele lao karaminyi kandapunupape nakamana anda yuupi dupwa kwaeyo pena lao piyu.
Nakambana wane dupwa moŋo ketako kararami kotena paraminyi dokopa mendeme nyisa narami ingyara.
Lopange wambu dupwame kopyali dokona ee kwaipi dupwana epo manjo narami ingyara. Witi jingi ikyaikyana andara dupwa lyuo naraminyipa ipwa nano kararaminyi wambu dupwame kando lyanolyano pyuo kararami.
Koo dupwa mee yuu dokona sisu lao pulya nao randa doko yuu dokona mee sisu lao sipura naoko pingi.
Wambu rangeme isare ingyuo ango karo randa nyingi.
Namba emba pyali namba Anatu keta pyamalyuo randa doko baa lamaipuli.
Baame bange andake dopa pyuo pilyamo dupwa namwa kapa soo ota nalyamano. Dee baame wambumi pii nange yulu dupwa pyuo karamo dupwa ama malu ingilyamo.
Baame yuu doko pau lena lao apunda peyo karenge.
Anatu baame wambu inyimungu karenge dupwa minyalyuo ee lao karenge dupwa rae mainyi pyambuo pingi.
Baame akali panga singi dupwana mende piru lao rapa rapa pingi dupwa nyuo laowa pipakamipala isa wambunya singinya renge dokome nyepala range randa maiyuo mangena minyingi. Dopa pilyasa nakamana yulu peparae kapa pali nange.
<range>
Nakama mee korakama karelyaminyipape kata angi doko kukwama ingilyamo karenge.
Anatumi wambu pendewa koo keta palenge dupwa yaki nyii nao pyao isa palyilyaminyi karenge dupwa kyawa lete nyuo pingi.
Baame pendewa dupwa rengya nyera dupwana soo karena lao suu pingi maiyuo koo pingi dupwa kambu pyarambuo karena lao pingi.
Wambu mende Anatumi sukunde ingyuo kiso rolara dokopa rae maiyuo karare ingilyamo. Dokona pyalana pyuo mana leya kande dokopa kapa laa nalyamo lao suu pyaa napipi.
Anatumi emba ranjama nyuo pyapala dokopa pyaramo panda doko baa rangeme yaki pyakange. Banya kingimi emba pyapala dee kingi dokomeko umbwa pyuo nyingi.
Yuu gii pao epo piramo dupwa peparaena emba koo keta palirinyi lao kyawa minyuo karenge.
Lopo singi dokopa emba nenge joo karenge. Yanda sipurelyamo dokopa emba pyaa nana lao kyawa minyuo karenge.
Piimi emba lao koo keta palyaraminyi dokopa Anatumi emba kiiramo nyera. Koo keta paliri yuu gii eparamo dokopa emba kyawa lete nyuo pira.
Ee kwaipi apa nao lopo seramo yuu gii dokopa emba mee giyuo karare. Mena rae lenge dupwa emba paka nareko ingilyamo.
Yulu pirinyi panda dupwana yuu kapa doko iki seramopa mena rae lenge dupwame emba mona jeraminyi karare.
Embena ree palu pipya komau anda dokona mona seramo palyuo karare. Embena mena sipisipi dupwa mondo lao kararaminyi dupwa kapa kandare.
Embena wane wanakepe dupwa yanginya kuku palu palu piramo mendeme yaka laa narami.
Witi jingi poo relyamo nyingi doko suu pyao emba karo pao yaku nao kumare.
Jopo pii dupwa yuu malu mee mana nyimwanopa kinyi ingilyamo. Dokona dakepa emba soo nyepe.











































































































































































































Jopome leya. Namwa endagimi manjisi porai ingya nalyamo dupwa yuu gii malu kararamo ingya nalyamopa randa doko simbwaro sipyamo karamano.
Namwa ee rasinya ambwa sinya ingyapala dee pana narama ingilyamo. Namwa mee imambulinde karapala pana narama ingilyamo.
Namba dopale ingyuo karo dokona Anatu embame namba nyuo pyalya pyana pyuo kandarese?
Akali mendaki mendemepe renge karo petenge dupwana renge poo pyasi mende alowa pyuo pirami ingya nalu nao nalyamo.
Banya yuu gii kanape karara dusipa embame lao retenge dokona kapa karapala yalara ingya nalyamo.
Dokona baa maso rae maiyuo pyuo karenale yaki nyepala kae.
Isa mende poko lakalyaminyi dokona dee imbu pira kata doko singiko. Doko dee kamba imbu pipala andengeko.
Isa pokonge dokona sinju doko yando nao pingi dupwa rumbyuo pilyamopape
imbu doko rangeme ipwa manjo andenge.
Isa doko dopa pyuo pelyamopape akali baa kumuo otengepya. Baa kumapelyamopa dee anja epo karase?
Akali kumungi doko dee epa nangepya. Mee ipwa sokole lengepya.
Yake doko singinyili pyuo silyamo dokopa akali doko luu palyuo sili lao kumasi sulu soo singipya.
Anatu embame namba luu luu kumuo puu lapala yaki nyuo kaepili yaka. Dopa pipala embena imbu singi doko otaramopa namba dee suu pyaro lao yuu gii mende nyipili yaka.
Akali doko kumara ramo doko dee lete eparase? Nambana randa epelyamo doko pao otaparamopa yuu gii elyape dokona epo kararo lao iso karapuli yaka.
Dokopa embame namba kyakale larenepa namba wasiinyi dokome pii isingi laronopa emba rae maiyuo karare.
Dopa pyuo paramo dokopa embame namba apa pyuo karena lao lee minyuo karapala koo piru dupwana yaka lao kara nare.
Embame nyuo yalu pyuo retapala kame sakao kaeyare. Koo piru dupwa kwuanyi nemboko karare.
Yuu kyau dupwa angi lakao nyingi. Rondo dupwana kana munjamae porai dupwa mendasa lakao pao singi.
Kana dupwa ipwa nyingiko. Apu reeko dupwame yuu dupwa kalao soo pengeko. Doko suu pyao embame akali doko ene suu pyao karapya dupwa kata roko pyao kumasilini.
Emba keta iki porai renge palipala akali doko dopa pyuo dee epa nara lao pyao nembalu nembo nembelene. Banya lenge kambu doko alowa pyuo gyaa kyai pyuo kumuo pelyamo.
Banya ikinyingi dupwa ketae pao akali ingyuo kararamipi panda randa mairaminyi isa paramipi lao sepa nao mee kopyali ingyuo kumuo pena letene.
Banya yanenge sii lapyamo dokona iki suu pyao kyawa sisingi baa rangena randa pipyamo dolapona iki suu pyao sepala kumulyamo.






























































































Jopome isingi lao dopa leya. Akipamo embame namba yaki nyii nao pii dokome kare kare soo randa joo epelese?
<range>
Yuu peparae embame namba mona randanyi pyambuo elya pali napala namba mona kendanyi pyambuli lao lao puu pelene.
Dee namba range koo piyunde ramo dokome apa pyuo emba randa jilyase?
Embame namba kandanyi palyili palyili lapala nambana randa nyipunu dokona namba koo pingi lao suu pilini.
Randa doko Anatumi namba jilyamo lao kanda nalese? Baame namba makande pyuo kandapyasa pilyamo.
Baame namba randa joo karamo dokona nambame baa kando mumu lapunupape mendeme see nalyaminyi. Dee nambana lao yulu rolae pyakana lao ee lapunupape mendeme see nalyaminyi.
Anatumi nambana kata rokapyamopa panya saka nalyo. Baame nambana kata doko nee pipyasa iminjilyamo.
Nee pipala Anatumi nambana bange peparae namba keta see nana lao nyipya. Nyepala nambana kingi doko kokwa sinyi nembapya.
Randa dupwa namba keta mendasa iki see nao epapala pyao bembae lapyasa mona kara napyamo karo.
Randa ipyamo dupwa Anatumi namba imbwuapala lanyuo pao mena rae lenge dopale ingyuo pyao kokwa sinyi nembelyamo. Nambana yanda pimwai angimi randa joo pirami dokona palyuo jilyamo.
Banya yanda singi ami dupwa pena lapyamopa epo nambamoo pipya yanda pyuo nakamame namba palenge yuu dokona epo kuinya palepe lao kone makapala iso karaminyi.
Anatumi nambana yangonge dupwame kyawa yaki nyuo kaena lao pilyamo. Wambo namba kandenge dupwame wakale ingyuo ii kandele letaminyi.
Dopa piminyi dokopa nambana wambu ree palupi puu minyingipi dupwa namba yaki nyilyaminyi.
Dee wambu nambana anda yalya kando petenge dupwame namba kame soo kaelyaminyi. Nambana kendemande wanake dupwame namba wakale kandele letaminyi.
Nambana kendemande akali mende kyakale lao poraiyuo nyisinya lao lapunupape dokona isingi mende laa nalyamo.
Namba ŋee ŋaepe lapunu doko enda dokome aiyerono lapala repeta epa nalyamo. Dee nambana yangonge angi dupwame dopako pilyaminyi.
Namba roya karalono dokopa wane dupwame namba kando male male lao giyalya giyana pilyaminyi.
Dee nambana puu minyingi angi dupwame namba kandaro sepala awa nalyaminyi. Wambu nambame mona retenge angi dupwame kapu kyepala kata jilyaminyi.
Dopa piminyisa namba moya nao kuli yongopa rambu letamo. Namba kumuo otapala imbu pyuo karo.
Anatumi namba randa jilyamo dokona nakama nambana puu minyingi dupwame sakame kumuo karalapape.
Doko akipamo nakamame Anatumi pipyamo dopaka pyuo namba peta ralimbulyaminyi? Nakamame namba randa andake joo otapa nalyamisi?
Wambu lapome pii nambana larono doko dopa letene lao soo suu pyao pepa pyao buku dokona retamili yaka lao suu pilyu.
Nambana pii doko ane pyanjili dokome kana dokona kiki pyuo pyaraminyi sulu seramopa wambu dupwame yaka lao kando simili yaka leto.
Dopa pyuo lapunupape akali kamame wakasa mende yake panda dokona karamo dokome lumwa pyuo epapala namba pyuo nyera lao soo otelyo.
Nambana yanenge opetae doko anga yakaneme nao kopetame kokwa sinyi nembaramopape Anatu doko kandalopono.
Dee namba rangena lenge angi dokome baa kandaronopa baa nambana puu minyingi angingyuo karalopyamo. Nakambame namba koo pingiko lao dee namba keta koo renge palengeko laminyi dokona lao
namba mona rando karapu.
Dopa pipunupape nakama yasu narami dokona kando karalapape. Anatumi koo dupwana imbwuapala nakama wua kakupi nenge dokona nyuo pisara ingilyamo. Dokopa sepala akali koo dupwana lao rolenge doko karamo lao serami.






































































































































































































































































Nambame kinyi kinyi lalu lao lapala lamaiyuo, Wanake dupwa kandapala kepo pyuo nyuo reto palipuli lao suu pyaa naro, leyo.
Anatu Porai Wakasa dokome namwa kando aki mende pirase? Wambunya yulu koo pilyaminyi dupwana apa pyuo baame yano pyarase?
Wambu lapo koo pirami dupwa baame randa andake maiyuo koo keta palyara.
Anatumi nambana yulu pilyu dupwape kata papilyu dupwape soo karamo.
Nambame yulu koo mendepe pipala wambu menge dupwa minyako pii nange lao kingi ketae nembo leto.
Anatumi sikyali angi rolae mendena namba sikyali pipala namba koo mendepe pali nalyamo doko kandara.
Namba kata keyange dokona yaki nyero ramo panda yulu koo pinya wangu lakaro ramo dee nambana kingi dokome koo piru ramo
dokopa nambana ee dupwa kokwa sinyi nembena lao dee wambu lapo dupwame nambana nenge wara pingi dupwa manjo nena lareko.
Nambana parali maki palenge akali dokona enda doko auwapala nambapa palimbwali lao suu pyapala enda banya anda kambu dokona yalu pyuo maa palyuo karapuli
dokopa nambana enda dokome akali wakale mende nenge maiyuo baapa palyuo pipyali.
Kepo yulu dopale dokome kanya pyapo lao kuma lao kyawa yaki nyasara.
Koo doko Satanena panda isareme rao karenge dopale ingyuo nambana bange peparae rao pyalingi nyera.
Nambana kendemande dokona mendeme namba kando mumu laramo dokopa nambame sepala mondo lao nyisaro.
Nambame dopa pii naro ramo doko Anatu kando apa larose? Namba keta kote laramo dokopa aki pii larose?
Anatu mendaki namba wasiyamo dokomeko nambana kendemande dupwa wasiya.
Nambame pendewa dupwa nyisalana maka suku suku nengende daa. Enda waiya dupwa pee lombanyi karalyo sinya lapala kaengende daa.
Dee namba nenge napala dokopa muiyane dupwa lopome kumuo pena lapala kaengende daa.
Yuu gii peparae nambame nakama poraiyuo suu pyao rapu pyuo karenge.
Wambu muiyane mende komau yangyaramo dupwa nyelana saka naramo kandaro ramo dokopa
komau rangena mena sipisipi yamanji wapusi keyange doko mairu. Dokopa baame banya mona andarename peparae piso rae maiyuo nambana kingi minyalyara.
Nambame kote lao wini piroŋo lao sepala wambu muiyane dupwa minyako piyuli
doko nambana kingi doko roo piyali dee nambana lange dokona piso rekya lao yuku nyisa epeyali.
Renge doko namba Anatumi kote lara ingilyamo dokona soo paka renge ipyasa namba yulu dopalepe mende kamame pii napuli lao suu pyao karo.
Namba isa bange kamongonge dupwana mona nyii nange
Nambana mena bangepe dee kana malupi retenge dupwana namba range mupwa lao suu pyaa nange.
Neta rao yanga paupau lenge dokona lao nambame neta doko lakandengende panda kana rao kendapuli minyingi dokona lao kana doko lakandengende daa.
Namba nyuo isoko kata nembaramopa dupwa kingi lakando ketae pyambulyu lao nambana kingi dupwana makando lapo pyuope pinginde daa.
Koo dopale dokome Anatu Porai Wakasa doko mata maipala kumuo randa nyingi.
Nambana nyisu petenge dupwa yasu nenge dokopa namba rae maiyuo karengende daa. Dee nakama randa andake nyingi dokopa namba kapaŋa lao rae mainginde daa.
Nambame koo pyuo wambu dupwa kuminya lao ateŋa pyakami nange.
Akali nambana yulu pyakange dupwame wambu upunili dupwa yuu peparae yako lao nenge pilyunu doko kandenge.
Wambu kata londe pena epenge dupwa katana palena lao kaeya napala nambana anda yako lao nyuo palyingi.
Akali menge dupwame nakamana koo dupwa yalu pipala kaenge. Dopa pilyaminyipape nambana koo dupwa pano polo lao karenge.
Namba wambumi mende larami dupwana paka nange. Nakamana pii koo lao giyalya giyana pyuo larami dupwana pakapala namba elya kalo andakare kara nange.
Namba pii leto dokona mendemepe aki letene lao see naramisi? Pii peparae kinyiŋi lao lalu lao leto. Anatu Porai Wakasa dokome isingi yano pyakana. Nambana koo pingi dupwana lao nambana nyisu petenge dupwame yango palyuo minyuo eparaminyi dokopa namba randa nyereŋe lao pepana pyasi sipyali
Dupwa peparae nyuo nambana lange dokona mona kare kare embo kyawa rarange ingyuo kyawana pee pyuo wambu peparaeme kandena lao dupwa ketae minyalyapuli.
Nambame yulu pipunu dusipa peparae Anatu lamaipala banya lenge kambu dokona namba enamba see napala karapuli.
Nambana ee nenge reto mena minyuo pilyunu yuu doko waa nyepala
wambu mendena wakalende nyepala dokona nenge ando karamo dupwa napala yuu range pama yulu pingi akali doko mee lopo karena lapuli
dokopa witi jingipi bali jingi andenge doko suu pyao yuu dokona mano jingipi rano pisi api pyapyali. Jopona pii dupwa oteya.





































































































































































Porambaiye minyuo apu epeyamo dokona rakapana Kamongo dokome Jopo pii lamaiya. Kamongo dokome letamo.
Emba apimi nambana singinya renge dokona piso serese? Emba pii kapa palya nao kekenge pii lenge akali dake.
Angi akali karenge doko suu pyao roya karapala nambame piso singi pii pisaro dokopa isingi yano pyape.
Nambame yuu muu dupwa wasiyu dokopa emba dokona kareese? Dokona kando siinde ramo doko dopa pyuo lao kandee lao polo langipi.
Yuu kameya apiyakale serale lao apimi suu piyase? Dee apimi yuu liti dupwa makande pyuo kandeyase? Pii dupwana isingi peparae kapa langirisi?
Yuu doko akimi pingi pyaro karase? Dee yuu muu pinjingi dusipana kaname paka pyaro karamo doko apimi kareyase?
Yuu gii yangama dokopa bui dupwa kenane pyao nyuo malu palyiyaminyi dokopa yake panda karenge dupwa rae maiyuo pii porakaeyo ketae leyami.
Ipwa kota doko singi dokona soo neta yuunya epa nana lao apimi kambu kii minyaro kareyase?
Namba dokome ipwa kota doko iminjingi dupwame nyuo yaki pipala kopa dokome yambe piyu lyakande.
Ipwa kota liti piramo yuu pinjingi dupwa nambame rombo palyuo reteyo. Retapala kame pyuo kii palyiyu.
Dopa pipala nambame ipwa baa lamaiyuo, Dake kapa andakele pee lao sepeleneŋe dee kamame andake ingyuo puŋu paŋu lao soo paa napala dakena banya kasakole minyuo pondoma pingi renge doko yaki nyuo liti pinya, leyo.
Jopo emba ando karene yuu gii dusipana yuu yangelyamo doko dopa pyuo yango rali pinya lao lamaisi?
Embame yuu yango neta koo epelyamo dokome yuu muu doko minyarala nyepala minyaro karo wambu koo yalu pyuo karaminyi dupwa minyuo walu walu lakana lao lamaisi?
Yuu yangelyamo dokopa yuu kungu rapu kukipi lama lamape dupwa liti pira pira pyuo rombo palyuo pano singi.
Yuu yango neta rao yanga paupau lenge dokome wambu yulu koo pingi dupwa pii nana lao neta ranyi pyambungi.
Emba ipwa kota doko guu lenge dokona pengese? Emba ipwa kotana isa panda dokona kimbu warendo kalyo pengese?
Mendemepe emba yuu iminjo kondo kondo lenge kumungi panda dokona rapu pingi kame kii doko lasaka pingisi?
Yuu dake andakepe panda kukipi apiyakale lao silisi? Sere ramo doko namba langipi.
Yuu yanganyi peengepe iminjinyi peengepe dolapo anja piso epelyamo lao emba silisi?
Embame dolapo anjali pao liti pipala kala pena lao larese?
Doo leto dupwa piri lao sepala leto. Renge doko yuu muu dupwa wasiyunu dokopa akali andapae dopale doko karenge karo pii lao silyu.
Nambame randake kapape apupi dupwa retenge panda doko emba pao kandengese?
Randa eparamo yuu giipi yanda pela paraminyipape dopalena rapa rapa pyuo dopalena suu pyao retenge.
Emba poraiya minyuo epenge kata dorena piso neta pyakaeyo epenge mare dokona pengese?
Apimi apu epena lao suu nyakamingisi dee apimi yuu gala lao poraiya andake dokona lao kata wapwakamingisi?
Yuu wambu pali nange dupwana apimi apu epo pena lengese?
Apimi yuu oo lasi ipwa epa nangepe dupwa isoko andena lao ipwa pingisi?
Apu pipyaepe dolapo nakambana rakange mende karengese?
Bange randake kapa yale ase lenge dokome ipwa dupwa kapu kyuo kana inginyi pyambuo dee ipwa kota dupwa manda ranyi pyambuo pingi dokona endangi doko apisi?
<range>
Bui kingi Pelaetese lenge lapo karaminyi dupwa embame nyuo kambwa pyao mendakyapala bui kingi Orayone lenge karenge dupwana panda doko dopako pyuo nyuo alowa pingisi?
Ee kana lyakange dupwana bui dupwa embame rapu pyuo pingisi? Embame bui kingi Mena Beya Kameya Beya Kukipi lenge dolapo dusa pena dusa pena lao lamaingisi?
Yake panda dopa pyuo sinya dopa pyuo sinya lao minyaro silyamo doko apa pipala silyamo lao emba singisi? Dee embame dopale ingyuo yuu dake wasarese?
Embame kopa dupwa kando pii poraiyuo lapala emba rombe lalana apu epena lao lamaingisi?
Embame yuu pele pinya lare ramo dokopa dokome emba karare dokona epapala namba embena kendemande pingi emba letene dopa pyuo piru, larase?
Apimi ipwa Naele pona dokona yaka kingi aipisi lenge yaka omani yale petamo doko ipwa andake palipyamo lao lamairase? Panda yaka kola kali doko apu epelyamo lao apimi lamairase?
Api mende soo gisingi mendeme kopa dupwa yaka lapala nyuo
kapu kyuo apu dokome sinjimu dupwa soo yuu inginyi pyambuo epenge dopa pyuo epena lao pirase?
Mena laene dupwa nakamana palenge anda dokona isaro palenge dokopape nakamana kananda dupwana yalu piro singi dokopape
embame mena laene dupwana nenge nena lao kotakamyuo laene yakane lopo karenge dupwa nenge sikya pyuo nena lao maiyuo pingisi?
Yaka orapene lenge dupwa lopo ralo karengepe dee yakane dupwa namba kando lopoe lenge dokopape wambu apimi nenge pingisi?
Mena meme yuu kyauna karenge dupwa ikyane manjira yuu gii doko emba singisi? Mena rae lenge kingi diya lenge dupwa ikyane manjana pingi dokopa emba isaro karengese?
Emba kana yaka lao karapala mena diya rae lenge nyaŋa dupwa manjira yuu gii doko singisi?
Nakama romba puu rombo minyuo wale lapala oo repeta yakane yuu muu dupwana pauwinya lao manjana pingi dokopa emba singisi?
Imwa andake dupwana mena diya yakane dupwa ando porayapala dokopa nakama rae lao puu pao penge.
Apimi mena donge rae lenge dupwa mee mokwasi karena leyase? Dee apimi mee dupwana papyuo karena leyase?
Yuu muiyane dupwa nambame nakamana anda inginyi pyambwakamyuo dee yuu lama lama kota singi dupwana palyuo karena leyo.
Nakama yuu taone andake dupwana wambunya pii dupwa pakapala nyisa wakale palenge dee mendemepe mondo pipala nyuo yulu maiya nange.
Yuu kyau dupwana isoko malu karenge nakamame nao karenge. Dokona nakama narama lao rambi kyakange mende karape lao kota penge.
Mena bulamakao rae lenge dokome embena yulu pyakarase? Dee yuu gii kukwa mendepa baa embena mena bulamakao palenge anda dokona rae maiyuo palirase?
Dokona mende embame puumi bukapala yuu ape ape pyakana larese panda embena ee yuu dokona ape ape pingi masene doko ipinya larese?
Embame banya porai dokona mona yukupala embena yulu kenda dupwa pyakaraŋa lao suu pilisi?
Embena nenge witi jingi lyingi dokopa baame nenge pyao injingi mare dokona minyakao epara lao silisi?
Yaka oserese doko papake dokome puu lao makando penge. Dopa pilyamopape yaka soko dokome waiya lao bii lao pao yaka oserese doko nyuo enakao penge.
Yuu popo dokome yaka kapa isasa piramopa seraŋa lao yaka oserese dokome banya kapa dupwa yuu dokona retenge.
Retapala dokopa baa wambumi kimbu kalyo poro lao mena rae lenge dupwame pyao kambo pirami doko suu pyaa nao mee retenge.
Baame banya kapa retenge dupwa banya lao suu pyaa napala banya yulu andake doko mee ingyuo paralyamo lapala saka nalyamo.
Renge doko nambame baa kopyali inginyi nembapala mona palenge renge doko mai nayosa pilyamo.
Dopa piyunupape baa kanda soo makandaramo dokopa baame mena osepe ose matana petenge akali dupwape nyuo enakapala nakamba kando giyalya giyana pira.
Mena ose dupwa porai wakasa ingyuo wasapala imanji matarena lamya mange imanji ingisi doko Jopo embame pyuo ingiisi?
Nakama goemba ingyuo pyaka pyaka pinya lao embame wasapala dee nakamana guu gaa dokome akali dupwa paka sinyi retaraŋa lao piisi?
Nakama yuu pau dokona moko gulugalu lao panya soo pyale letasa yuu kyasinyi nemba nemba pyuo karo nakamana porainya renge paleta dokome yanda pela penge.
Nakama keta paka renge doko see nange dee yanda pingi dokopa wua gela doko kandapala kapu kyuo ralo paa nange.
Dokopa nakamana mata dokona petenge akali dupwana wiki pepona dolapo jaa jaa lao pingi dokopa netame rapala lepolepo pipala lenge kiki pingi.
Nakama bikuli lenge dokopa ose dupwa suu makaro kara napala rae maiyuo makandapala pyala panya walu walu lenge.
Bikuli ketae poraiyuo lenge yaka lao dokopa nakamana gyaa yasu kando ketae palyapala yanda pingi maresa paa nao karo wambo ai singi. Sepala yanda singinya akali mupwa dupwame dopa pinya dopa pinya lao pii ketae letaminyi doko singiko.
Yaka ulisapu dokome bii lao yuu donorena panya dokopa banya papake bii lalana nyuo rolo piso dokopa apa pyuo bii laro lao emba piso singisi?
Yaka kambe dokome embame langirinyipa banya anda yuu kyau dokona kamame ketae piru lao isaro petengese?
Yaka dupwame kana wangya ketae wambu paa naramili dupwana anda pingi.
Dokona piso nanesa repetape dupwana baa bange lapo pyapala nara dokona suu pyao kando isaro petenge.
Bange lapo kumasi singi dupwana yaka kambe dupwa epo malu palyingi dokopa yaka kambe yakane dupwame ranjama dupwa nyuo nenge.
Kamongome lao, Jopo, embame Anatu Porai Wakasa doko makande pyuo karapi. Epapu emba sikya pilyase panda isingi mende lare ingilyase? leya.
<range>
Kamongo, namba kopyali ingyuo lao kareyo. Dokona isingi aki pii larose? Nambame dee mende laro ingya nalyamo.
<range>
Namba pii laroli dusipa lao otapu kandapi, leya Jopome.
Dokopa poraiya minyiyamo raka raka dokona Kamongo dokome Jopo dee kamba pii lamaiya.
Akali angingyuo roya karapala nambana piso singi pii dupwa yano pyakape.
Embame namba rolae pii nangeŋe lao lasaka pyuo yapalya yapana pyuo koo keta palyapala emba range rolae pingi inginyi pyambuo karese?
Emba porai namba yalese? Nambana pii poraiyuo yuu gala lele lao lenge dopa pyuo embame lengese?
Doko kinyi ramo doko emba range lakando pyakalyuo pyao karo kiŋi ingyuo suu pyao karape.
Wambu range mupwa lao suu pyao karaminyi dupwa kanda. Kandapala embena imbu singi dokome nakama randa maiyuo kuki ingyuo inyimungu karena lare.
Kinyi, nakama range ketae pyambuo karaminyi dupwa kandapala isa nyepe. Koo pyuo karaminyi panda dokona nakama pyao kokwa sepe.
Dopa pipala yuu dokona malu pepala kumungi yuu dokona kiimbanyi palyalapape.
Dopa pirinyi dokopa akali mendeme lakandapa naraminyipa nambame wambo embame yulu doko pyuo wambalene lamo lao lakandaro.
Mena ama kameya kingi Bimote lenge doko kandape. Nambame doko waso emba wasoko piyu lyakande. Baame mena bulamakao ingyuo isoko dupwa nao karenge.
Dopa pyuo nelyamopape banya yongo doko ama porai renge palenge. Banya kingi minju isa mando yale dupwa aki porai lao see nalyo.
Banya konali doko isa siya ingyuo rolae roya karenge dee banya kimbu dokona minju ama porai wakasa.
Banya kuli dupwa ama porai kana wasingi bange dopale dee banya kimbu dupwa ane isa yale.
Wambu andareleme kata papingi bange wasiyu dupwa kando yamarangyuo karaminyipape mena dake kandapala kamame yamarangyuo kandenge. Dopa pilyaminyipape wasiyamo dokome range sinyi nembo karenge.
Yuu kyau mena rae lenge dupwa male lao karenge dupwana nenge nara isoko dupwa ando karenge.
Baa nepereke renge dupwana palyuo soo dee ipwa pona waewae dupwana yalu pyuo soo pingi.
Neperekepe ipwa repeta karenge isape dupwana isarena rau lao singi.
Baa ipwa Jotane palipala ranjo epo banya lenge kambu petelyamo dokopa baa paka nao elya kalo palyuo singi.
Apimi banya lenge lukupala baa minyarapala nyerase? Apimi kone makapala gyaana minyaramo ramarase? leya Kamongo dokome.








Embame oma kameya kemali pingi Lipaetane lenge doko ukumi kapa pyao nyerese? Panda banya kekenge doko puumi bwuakarese?
Embame banya gyaa kata dokona puu pyambware panda banya angapu dokona uku puu dokome pyambwarese?
Embame nembapili lao emba piso sokondali pirase? Embame baa sakame kumapili lapala angangi pii larase?
Baame embapa lao palyapala embena yulu pyakao karalu kararo lao lalu lao larase?
Embena kendemande wanake dupwa rae maiyuo kando karamili lao suu pyao embame yaka mondo nenge ipwape maiyuo rapu pinginyili pyuo baa rapu pirisi?
Oma pingi akali dupwame baa kandapala akema lao kana kando mena belye pyuo isa nembo nyeramisi? Dee ropo pingi akali dupwame baa pyao kunjapala kana nyeramisi?
Embena oma pingi kaku dokome banya yanenge dokona yalyarase panda kaku dokome banya ayemba dokona arekyarese?
Embame yuu gii mendaki minyandare ramo doko dee minyandalana iki lara.
Mendeme oma kameya kemali pingi Lipaetane doko kandaramo doko yamarangupala mee walu lao pao palira.
Baa apu pingi dokopa mena nalana pingi ingyuo gasimwa pokelyamosa wambu mendemepe palenge dokona para ingya nange.
Api mendeme baa minyapala nyera ramo wambu doko range lete kararase? Yuu muu dupwana peparae wambu mendemepe dopa pirami ingya nange.
Nambame Lipaetanena kimbu dokona banya poraipi dee apa pyuo andake laope dolapona lao polo langiruwale.
Mendemepe banya kapa porai pee pingi dokona arekeyo pyaa narami dee banya yanenge doko minyuo pilya naramiko.
Apimi banya angapu nenge pakame kumuo karenge doko minyuo angapu lakirase?
Banya mata doko konambe wasisi dopale ingyuo pao suu lapala kana ingingi.
Mendaki mendaki lao mendena gii koo lao poraiyuo pakara pakara pyuo silyasa kanya ŋee soo kaka soope pii nange.
Dupwa peparae nyuo minyarambwapala pyuo pyakondape pilyamosa mendemepe ipyuo wakale wakale pyuo nyii nange.
Baa imaketa pilyamo dokopa yuu pele pipala yanga paupau lao rali pingi. Banya lenge doko neta potemenge dopale.
Banya nenge kata dokona isare uliyapu nyuo yanga paupau lao epo dee lelenge dupwa lele pyale pyuo nyisa epo penge.
Banya gyaa kata dokona isare sukwa epelyamo doko kulimbwanyi pelyamo dokopa isa yoko rapala kyau lenge dopale ingyuo epenge.
Banya ŋee ŋae dokome isare ingyuo kanda soo relyamo dokopa lelenge dupwa banya nenge kata dokona pyakao epenge.
Banya mange dokona porai renge wakasa palelyamosa wambu peparaeme kandelyaminyi dupwa kando paka renge nyingi.
Banya yongo doko kuki pepalape dusa piku piku laa nange ama porai ane isa mendeme minyuo punjarami ingya nange dopale ingingi.
Banya mona kana pokapala ipwa peta kana mundu ingilyasa paka nange.
Baa roya karenge dokopa imambu wakale dupwame pakapala mende pinya saka nange.
Wua gela mendemepe baa pyao ranjama nyuope wua kaku walekyape dupwame pyaraminyi kapa ingya nara.
Jopome dee Kamongo kando isingi leya.
Kamongo emba keta porai renge peparae palenge doko namba soo karo. Embame pinya suu pyare ramo dupwa mee kapa piri ingilyamo.
Namba mona kumuo kyawa kana palyapala nambame kopyali ingyuo lao karapu dokopa emba pipinyi dupwana akipamo nambame piso silini lao piso silyane. Doko yulu andake dupwana lapo kamame reeko ingiyasa Namba soo gisa nange dokona lao leyo.
Embame namba langyuo, Embena pii leto doko sokondali pipala isingi yano pyaka, lenge.
Dokopa nambame emba doko wambu menge dupwame langilyaminyi doko iki singi. Dopa pipunupape dakepa doko nambana rangena lenge angi dolapome emba kandelyo.
Dokona lao namba pii peparae lapunu dupwana elyalyo dokona kondome kumuo pee awaipi pyapala pisiru, leya Jopome.
Kamongome pii dupwa peparae Jopo keta lao otapala dokopa baame akali Elipase lamaiyuo leya. Nambana kendemande akali Jopome namba kando pii kinyi lengenyili pyuo embape embena puu minyingi lama dolapope laa nayaminyi dokona nambame nakama pipya imbwualyo.
Dokona epapu mena bulamakao kali yanda ipingi nyepo sipisipi kali yanda ipingiko nyepala minyuo Jopo karamo dokona papala emba rangena ingyuo pyao kisape. Dokopa Jopome ateŋa lakara dokopa nambame banya ateŋa doko isingi yano pyakaro dee embame yulu kopetame pipinyi dupwana nambame elya renge jii naro. Baame nambana lao pii kinyi dupwa lengenyili pyuo laa nami.
Akali Elipase Bilitate Sopamoome Kamongome pinya lamaiyamuli pyuo piyami dokopa Kamongo dokome Jopona ateŋa doko isingi yano pyakamiya.
Dokopa enakana Jopo banya puu minyingi rema dupwana lao ateŋa lakamyuo otapeyamopa Kamongome bange keyange ama malu retena lao maiyamosa bange isa peyamo dupwa dee wai kiso nyakamyuo dokopa mee lama kamame konda pyuowale maiya.
Dokopa Jopona yangonge pemalengepe dee banya wamba puu minyingi dupwape peparae baa kando yako lala epo banya anda nenge nyuo malu palyuo nao peteyami. Kamongome Jopo randa maipya dokona kondalyamano lao baa mona minyarambunyi pyambuo epeyaminyi dupwame mendaki mendaki lao kana lapope dee kana golo uriŋipi maiyami.
Kamongome wambo dokopa Jopo elyape keta pisiyamopape enakana randa maipaesa kamame wakasa elyape keta pisiya. Yuu gii dokopa Jopona mena sipisipi taosande akalisa ipisu kisima (14,000) mena kamele lenge taosande pakinyamange (6,000) mena bulamakao taosande lama (2,000) dee mena donge taosande mendaki (1,000) pyuo minyiya.
Dee banya wane yanda ipingi nyepo wanake rema dusipana rakange ingyuo kareya.
Banya wanenge porai doko kingi Jemaema lenge dokona kanya doko kingi Keseya lenge dee enakana doko kingi Kerenapuku lao mandeya.
Yuu muu dupwana Jopona wanenge ama keyange dusipa yale mende mendasa pisa nange. Nakamana rakange dokome wanake dusipape dee pemalenge dusipape peparae banya moyange bange dupwa kapa kapa pyuo mokwa soo maiya.
Maipala Jopo baa ee kana andete mendaki dee akalisako pao kisima (140) nembo kareya. Karapala banya wanena wane mandeyaminyipape dee dupwana mandeyaminyipape dupwa kapa pyuo kandeya.
Enakana baa ama emo alemo ingyuo sepala sukundala peya.
Akali mende koo pinya lao kunji pyaraminyi dupwa yaki nyuo Satanena yulu pirami dokona mana koo nyii nao Anatu kando giyalya giyana pyuo lenge dupwana role pyao kara nao piramo akalinde ramo doko rae maiyuo pyakalyuo pyao karara ingilyamo.
Yulu koo pingi kandale doko suu pyao alowa pyuo banya rae maingi dokome Kamongona Mawa Pii lasi singi dokona warombo soo yuu peparae kukwa korakamape yaka lao poraiyuo suu pingi.
Akali doko baa isa ipwa epo penge repeta ando karenge dopale doko. Yuu gii jingi mondo lao lyingi yuu gii dokopa keyange pyuo lyingi. Dee banya yoko dupwa yando naa nange. Akali dokona yulu suu pingipi peparae kapa palyuo penge.
Akali koo pingi dupwa dopale ingya nange. Yangi porambaiyeme poo lanyi nembenge dopale ingyuo penge.
Akali koo pingi dupwa Anatumi kote lao randa maira. Koo pingi dupwa yulu rolae pingi dupwa pipya mendare ingya nara.
Kamongome rolae pingi dupwa kyawa minyuo kata lasaka pyuo karamo. Dopa pyuo karapyamopape koo pingi dupwa koo dokona kimbu malyaro karaminyi.
Akipamo yuu muu dupwana wambu dupwame Kamongopa sisu nyuo karo yulu koo lapo pinya lao suu pyao rapa rapa piminyipape angi kapa pii nalyamisi?
Nakamana kiŋi dupwa porai ingyuo karo dee akali mupwa dupwa wato lao karapala Kamongope banya rombo palyisi kiŋi dokope yanda pimwailyaminyi.
Nakambame namwa isilyambinyi doko iso kara nanale ramanyi nembamana, letaminyi.
Kamongome yake panda banya kiŋinya petenge isa dokona piso nakama kopyali ingyuo pimana lao karaminyi dupwa kandapala giyalya giyana pingi.
Baame nakama imbu singi paleta repe repe pii lamaiyuo dokopa nakama pakanya pyambuo lao,
Nambana yuu kyau poo pyasi Sayone lenge dokona nambame nambana kiŋi doko rombo palyuo karena lamaipu, letamo.
Kiŋi dokome lao, Kamongo dokome lapyamo pii dupwa nambame polo larole. Baame namba langyuo, Emba nambana ikinyingiŋi. Epapu dakepa namba embena rakange ingyuo karoŋo.
Piso serene dokopa yuu muu dupwa emba jeronopa peparae embena ingyuo para.
Embame ane pangalimi pyao kambo dee nakama pee warame wasisi pyao kambele lao piri, lapya letamo.
Dakepa nakama kiŋi dupwa repe repe pii dake selapape. Wambu iso karenge akali nakamame kale yukupala doko mende lalyane lao mana nyelapa.
Kamongo baa mupwa lao suu pyao pako banya yulu pyakamyuokaralapape.
Baa mupwa lao mona nembo karo kingi wapambu lakao mona maipape. Dopa pii narami ramo banya imbu singi waiya lao sipuraramo dokopa nakama aopa kumarami. Dokona baa keta mata kui lao kararamidupwa rae mairami ingilyamo.




























































O Kamongo, namwana Kamongo, yuu muu peparae emba andake ingyuo pelyamo doko kandelyaminyi. Embena kingi lakandase dokome pao yake sungwapyamosa
wane wanakepe nyaŋape opetaeko kenane pyao lakandelyaminyi. Emba range kame pyuo minyaro karapisa yanda pimwainya panda mai nalene dokona randa jerami ingya nalyamo.
Nambame yake panda kandapu dokopa bui neta kanape nakamana yuu range karara lao wasiinyi dokona rao karapyamo kandelyo.
Wambu dupwa akinde dokona embame baa suupyale pyale karese? Dee wambu dupwa apimawana lao embame ketae pyambuo karese?
Embame emba range mupwa wakasa ingyuo kararonopa akali baa mee mende emba yaleko ingyuo karara lao wasii. Embame baa neta renge ingyuo ketae pyambuo lakanda minya minya pilini.
Embame bange peparaena baa kyawa nyuo karo wasiinyi dupwana iso karena lee.
Mena sipisipi bulamakao dee rae lengepe dupwa opetaeko rapu pyuo
oma yakape kata papingi bange peparae ipwa kotana silyamopape dupwa isinya leeyako.
O Kamongo, namwana Kamongo, yuumuu peparaena emba andake ingyuo pelyamo doko kandelyaminyi.






























































Kopyali kopetame pingi dupwame lao dokopa Anatu kara nange letaminyi. Nakama peparae kwao piminyisa pilyamo Nakama kopetame pilyaminyi. Mendakimipi rolae pyuo kararama lao suu pyaa nalyaminyi.
Kamongome yake dorena piso akali mendemepe mona palyuo baa kingi wapambupi lakao kingi letamipi lao kando karamo.
Mendakimipi rolae pirama lao ingyapa napala peparaeme mendare kata palyuo kopetame koo pyuo karaminyi.
Nakama see napala kamenge koo pilyamipi? lao Kamongome pisilyamo. Koo angi pyuo karaminyi dupwa soo gisa nange wambupi? Nakamame nambana wambu dupwana bange waa nao karapala namba lao ateŋa laa nalyaminyi.
Dopa pyuo karaminyipape Anatu doko banya rape rape lenge dupwa keta kararamosa nakama yamarangurami ingilyamo.
Wambu koo pingi dupwame akali inyimungu karenge dokona mende pinya rapa rapa pingi doko kata rokwalyaminyipape Kamongo dokome baa kyawa minyingi.
Isaraele wambu mata kyakao nyeramo doko yuu Sayonepiso epo epena lao ateŋa leto. Kamongome wambu dupwa dee minyalyaramopa Isaraele wambu dupwa raeme kumuo pisirami.
Kamongo, api embena tembole anda dokona sukusa eparape? Api embenayuu kyau poo pyasi Sayone dokona kingi lala eparape?
Akali mende Anatupa rape rape lao pyuo rolae doko anjuku lao pyuo karo pii angi nyera kinyi dupwa iki lao karenge dopale doko.
Wambu yango dupwa kilya kando laa nao banya puu dupwa kopetame pyuo pisa nao parali maki dupwa kando dopande piralyamo lao nembo nembo minyuo lao pali nange.
Anatumi awa nange dupwa baame nakama epe kanda nange. Dopa pipyamopape Kamongo rape rape lenge dupwa baame ketae pyambungi. Baame piru lengenyili pyuo kaeya nao andake dokona palyilyamopape pipala kaenge.
Bange mailyamo dokona mende konda pyuo nyipulinya suu pyaa nao mailyamo dolapoko range nyingi. Wambu koo pii nange dupwa kando wambu lapome bange jeramaŋa wambu lapo kando pii kyatepa pyuo lakana lenge dokona lakami nange. Yulu doo letamo dusipa piramo wambu doko range kame pyuo minyarasa pira.
Anatumi namba kyawa lete nyere lao suu pyapala epelyo dokona embame kyawa yaki nyii napipi.
Nambame Kamongo lamaiyuo, Emba nambana Kamongo. Nambana bange peparae keyange silyamo dupwa emba keta iki epenge lao karo.
Kamongona yulu yaki nyii nao pyakamingi wambu dupwa ama keyange wakasa. Namba nakama pipya karo dokopa rae wakasa mailyu.
Nakama lapo anatu wakale lakando pelyaminyi dokome nakama range keta randa malu sukusa nyilyaminyi. Nakamana mena pyao kiso maingi dokonape namba opetae pii naro. Nakamana anatu dupwa namba lakanda naroko.
Emba iki nambana Kamongo ingyuo karene. Mendale daa. Embame namba yano pipyamo dupwa joo karene. Namba rengyana nyera dupwa embame minyaro karene.
Embame bange elyape wakasa dupwa namba mee jiinyi dupwa ama keyange wakasa ingilyamo.
Kamongo dokome namba kata lasaka pilyamo dokona lao baa lakandelyo. Kukwa dokopa doko kyaiŋi lao repe repe pii ingyuo langilyamo.
Yuu peparae Kamongo doko namba role pyao karapyamo doko soo karo. Baa repeta karamo dokona namba walu lao kara naro.
Dopa pipyamo dokome namba rae maingi rengepe mona pyakalyuo pingi rengepe palyuo simbwalyamo. Namba embena kame dokona epo mona kare kare karo.
Rengedoko embame namba kumunginya porai renge doko neta nembo kyawa minyilini. Embame mendali mona retenge doko wambu kumasi palenge dokona nemba nangepya.
Embame kata pao lete pandana penge doko namba lasaka piri. Emba yuu peparae namba repeta karene dokome rae mainyi nembapyasa mona pyakalyuo pyao karalu kararo ingilyamo.


































































Yake dokome Kamongo Anatu baa neta renge ingyuo karamo doko panelyamo. Pyuo wasiyamo kingi mono dokome banya kingiŋi lao panelyamo.
Yuu gii kwuara yangara pyuo pao epo pipyamo dokome Anatumi pyuo wasiyaŋa lao pano lapa lapa pilyamo.
Mendasa wambu ingyuo epo pii lao dee lyapu lao pipyamo see nange.
Dopa pipyamopape nakambana neta rao yuu muu dupwana pumbinyi dokome yake yuupi rambungi dolapona kapa kapa pyuo soo otelyaminyi. Anatumi yake dokona renge kuiyuo rao karena lao panda wasakamiya.
Enda mapwae lenge kambu nyuo akali makandalana rungi rungi pingi dopale ingyuo rao potemo epenge.
Yake pinjingi pakirena kanda sepala pao pinjingi paki dokona oko singi. Kama ketae piso rao karelyamopa bange mendemepe kapa nee pii nange.
Kamongona mawa pii dupwa nyisu yakunaipi pisa nao singi dokome wambu enenge ingyuo porai renge maingi. Kamongona mawa pii dupwa soo nyepala karapenge ingilyamo dokome yangilyamo karelyaminyi wambu dupwa singinya renge maingi.
Kamongona mawa pii dupwa rolae ingyuo penge. Mendeme dokona soo rape rape lao minyaraminyi dupwa rae maiyuo parami. Banya mawa pii pinya lao lenge dupwa angi dokona lenge dokome soo nyingi renge maingi.
Kamongo lao kingi wapambupi lakao lakandenge doko keyange ingyuo singi. Dokona dopako pyuo soo para ingilyamo. Kamongome koo keyangepe lao yapalya yapana pyuo angi dokona lenge. Doko peparae rolae ingyuo penge.
Anatunya mawa pii rungi rungi pingi dupwame kana golo ama keyange doko nyuo isa palyingi. Dee mende suu pyao doko amburalinya ipwange rende pipyamopape Anatunya mawa pii doko ama rende wakasa pingi.
Mawa pii dupwame namba embena kendemande karo doko soo nyinginya renge nyuo jingi. Jilyamopa nambame banya pii doko rape rape lao pyakamingi dokona baame renge keyange isingi jingi.
Wambu dupwa range kopetamekamenge pilyaminyi doko soo gisa nalyaminyi. Kamongo embame namba koo pilyuŋu lao suu pyaa nao mee pyaka sipyamo pipilyu dupwana kingi rekyalao nyepe.
Koo pinya wangu lakao suu pilyu dupwana namba pasarene lao minyape. Dupwame namba poraiyuo minyuo isinya laa nare. Dopa pirinyi dokopa namba rolae ingyuo nyisu yakunaipi pisa naronopa mendeme namba kando koo pingiŋi laa narami ingilyamo.
Kamongo, namba kyawa lete nyepala lete wai pyao nyingi. Dokome nambanapii dee suu pingipi dolapo embame angi lalyane lao soo nyakape.

























Nambana Anatu nambana Anatu, akipamo namba kame soo yaki nyipisi? Namba saka napala nyisapili lao ee lapu. Lapunupape emba nyisala epa napi kandapi.
Nambana Anatu, korakama dokopa emba nyisapili lao kee lapu. Lapunupape pii isu pii napi. Namba kukwa dokopa kee laoko karo luu sikya sikya pilyamo.
Dopa pipunupape emba poo pyasi karenge doko kiŋi karapinyisa emba lakandelyaminyi.
Namwanakauwange rora ambasupi dupwame emba keta pyamalyapala kareyami. Dopa pyuo kareyaminyisa embame akali dupwa nyiso pyuo nyii kande.
Nakamaemba kingi lapala dokopa koo keta palirami kata doko wanjiyami. Nakama emba kapa ingingi lao suu piyaminyi dokopa nakamana mona kenda nayami.
Dopa piyamopape namba epapu wambu ingya nalyamo. Namba mee kau kui dopale. Wambu dupwame namba kando awa nao giyalya giyana pyuo karaminyi.
Wambu namba kandaminyi dupwame kando giyuo karaminyi. Nakama kambu kelo wale pyuo ayemba wangaro wangaro pyuo lao karaminyi.
Nakamame lao, Emba Kamongo keta pyamalyapala karee kande. Akipamo baame emba pyuo nyii nalyase? Kamongome emba kando awuara ramo doko akipamo nyisa nalyase? letaminyi.
Namba mandeyaminyi dokopa embame mondo lao rapu pyuo nyii. Dee dopako pyuo namba nyaŋa siyu dokopa embame namba kyawa minyuo kareepya.
Namba mandeyami gii dokopa piso embena kingi kapena siyunupa emba nambana Anatu ingyuo karee.
Randa dupwa repeta ipyamopa mendeme namba nyisarami ingya nalyamo dokona embame namba yaki nyepala nanesa kara napipi.
Nyisu petenge akali malu mee mena bulamakao kalyuwa dopale ingyuo karapala namba nyuo sukusa pyambwasi karaminyi karo. Yuu Besane bulamakao kalyuwa wambu pingi karenge dopale karaminyi.
Nakama mena laene ingyuo nenge kata ŋaa lapala gasimwa poko namba gala lapala pyao nao pilyinyi nembalana pyuo karaminyi.
Dopa piminyi dokopa nambana porainya renge doko pao otelyamo. Ipwayuunya kulimbuo penge dopale ingyuo pupya. Nambana kuli peparae bolombalo lapya. Nambana porainya renge doko mena kapa sungu pele letamo.
Nambana pendoko doko yuu sinjimu yando nasi ingyuo oo lapya. Dee nambana kekenge yando napala neketaiye dokona parapya. Embame namba sinjimu dokona soo kumalale lao yaki nyuo kaeyapi.
Akali koopingi malumi epo karo namba kako pilyaminyi. Nakamame suwa dopale ingyuowua lao namba repeta epelyaminyi. Nakamame nambana kimbupi dupwa nao rokwanyi nembelyaminyi.
Nambana kuli dupwa peparae kapa kandarami ingilyamo. Nambana nyisu petenge dupwame namba lenge poraiyuo rapala kanda yoyo letaminyi.
Nakamame nambana komau dupwa nyepala apimi nyera lao reto lake pyuo petaminyi.
Nambana Kamongo, namba yaki nyepala wakale kara napipi. Embame iliki maliki laa napala aopa epo namba nenge rekya lao nyepe.
Namba wua kakupi nenge dupwana kyawa minyuo suwa dupwa keta lete nyuo pipi.
Mena laene dupwame namba naa nana lao pyuo nyepe. Dee mena bulamakao kalyuwa rae lenge dupwame namba nala eparaminyi dokopa namba range kapa nyisaro ingya nalyamo.
Emba dopa pilinyiŋi lao nambana wambu dupwa misilarami dokopa kenane embena lao ranaisa poko pyaro ingilyamo.
Isaraele wambu Jekopena para pyasi Kamongona kendemande dupwa nakamame Anatunya kingi doko ketae pyambuo kingi wapambupi lakao baa lakando pisipwape.
Baame wambu pendewa dupwa yaki nyuo kaeya nange. Nakama randa nyilyaminyi dupwa kandapala meŋe lao kaengende daa. Baame nakama mata mai nange. Mata mai napala nyisinya lenge dokopa yano pyakamingi.
Mitiŋi andake lao pisirami dokopanambame embena yulu piinyi dupwana kingi lakando laro ingilyamo. Dopa pyuo wambu embapa kingi wapambupi lakao lakandelyaminyi dupwana lenge kambu dokona bange kiso jero lao lalu lao lasi dupwa kiso jero ingilyamo.
Pendewa dupwa nenge nalana suu pyarami dupwa nakonda pirami. Wambu Kamongo keta eparami dupwa baa lakandarami ingilyamo. Dopa pyuo nakama yuu dokona yulu pyuo nenge nao kapa palyuo karalu karena.
Dopa pyuo yuu muu peparaeme liti kuki mendepe neta paa nao dee kone pupuripi peparaemepe Kamongo lao suu pyao loma soo kingi wapambupi lakao misi larami ingilyamo.
Kamongo baa kiŋi ingyuo karamo dokome yuu muu dupwa iso karamo.
Moŋokyaŋe singi wambu dupwa baa mupwa lao pangu soo dee mendalipi karo kana ingyuo isa lumbi lyeraminde daa dupwa opetaeme baa keta pangu soo mona maiyuo kararami.
Rengyana ando kararaminyi dupwame banya yulu pyakamirami. Akali dupwame Kamongona lao enakana manjirami dupwa lamairami ingilyamo.
Kamongome banya wambu dupwa nyiso kyawa lete nyiyaŋa lao laraminyi doko wambu ene manjipa nalyaminyi dupwa manjirami dokopa serami.

Kamongo doko namba mena sipisipi ingyuo rapu pyuo karamo. Namba mendeme yangilyande daa.
Baame namba yuu isako kyakange dokona imambu soo pale lao panda joo dee ipwa pete manda rasi dokonalanyuo pao pingi.
Baame namba porai renge deeko jepa pingi. Baame dopa piro dopande pirona lao lalamuli pyuo namba kata angi dokona lasaka pingi.
Nambame koo keta palirunupape Kamongo emba role pyao karapinyi dokome mona nembo kara naro. Emba mena rapupingi akalinya pangalinya mendeke ingyuo namba pingi pyao kyawa minyuo paenge.
Embame nambana yanda pimwainya lenge kambu dokona nenge andake yaowakalana rapa rapa pilini. Embame kyawa dokona mamba kulimbwakao kisakapinyi dokome embame upinili mende epelyamo yako lao nyingi dopale ingyuo namba laku nyingi.
Namba yuu gii kararo dusipana embena keyange rengepe mona retenge rengepe dolapo namba keta soo puu paralyamo doko silyu. Dopa piramopa embena anda yuupi doko nambana ingyuo puu parolyamo.
Yuu muu silyamo dokope bange peparae yuu dokona silyamo dupwape Kamongona ingyuo silyamo. Yuu dokope wambu dokona palaminyi dupwa opetaeko banya ingyuo pelyamo.
Baame wasiyamo doko ipwa pete yalu yuu kokorena kando wasiya. Ipwa kota andake koko dokona susa ingyuo pyapala wasiya.
Kamongona yuu kyau dokona api rolae ingyuopulyuo para ingilyase? Api baa kapa pyuo banya tembole anda poo pyasi dokona konando para ingilyase?
Dokona akali mende yulu piramo dokopa koo pii nao suu pingi keyange palyuo bange kingimi wasisi dupwa lakanda nao kyambo lao kana minya nao pira.
Dopa piramo doko Kamongomebaa elyape keta piso pyuo nyera. Anatu baa kando koo mende pii nayalyamolara.
Wambu dopale Anatu keta eparaminyi dupwa. Jekopena Anatu dokona lenge kambu dokona eparamisa pira.
Kame kambu doko pyaali lao lumbuo pee lare. Kambu dowa wambarae doko lumbware. Dokopa kiŋi mupwa doko sukusa epara.
Kiŋi mupwa doko apisi? Baa Kamongo porai, porainya renge palenge doko epara. Kamongo yanda sipurenge dokopa baame nyuo anamasi minyingi doko epara.
Kame kambu doko pyaali lao lumbuo pee lare. Kambu dowa wambarae doko lumbware. Dokopa kiŋi mupwa doko sukusa epara.
Kiŋi mupwa doko apisi? Nyuo anamasi minyingi Kamongo doko baa kiŋi mupwa ingyuo karamo.


































Kamongo doko nambana pyuo nyingi kendalinya mendeke karamo dokona kupwa sipyamo karonde daa. Kamongo doko nambana matarena konambe mendeke ingyaro karapyamo karoŋo wambu pakaro doko angi api karase?
Akali koo pingi dupwame namba nyuo kuinya palyuo pyamwali lao piraminyi dokopa nakama lukumapala pao palirami ingilyamo.
Namba ami yanda singi peparaeme nyuo kako pyaraminyipape paka naro ingilyamo. Dee nambana yanda pimwai dupwame nyuo kuinya palyaraminyipape Anatu keta mona yukwarala karalu kararo.
Nambame renge mendaki mende Kamongo piso sipu. Renge mendaki iki nyelana suu pilyu. Doko namba lete kararono dokopa Kamongona anda dokona iki palyuo karapuli yaka. Dokona karobaa keyange wakasa ingyuo karamo lao soo nyuo rae maipala nambame baa kata keyange lasaka pinya lao piso soo kararowale.
Randa eparamo gii dokopa baame namba nee pyuo reto karara. Baame banya tembole anda dokonape dee kana londe ketae dokonape lete wai pyao nyuo yalu pyuo reto karara.
Dopa piramopa nambame nambana yanda pimwai karo kako pilyaminyi dupwa nyuo anamasi minyapala yuwa lao mambo pyakaro. Dokona pii ketaepalyuo rae maiyuo tembole anda dokona bange pyao kiso maipala Kamongo baa kenane pyao lakandaro ingilyamo.
Kamongo emba lao kyakale laro dokopa soo sakame kumuo karapala pii yano pyakape.
Kamongo emba karo dokona epo kingi wapambupi lakao lao pisi ipu lapinyi dokopa isingi lao, Kamongo namba eparowale, lapu.
Nambapa lao yalu pii napipi. Nambapa imbwa napipi. Embena kendemande kala pena laa napipi. O Anatu, nambana pyuo nyingi doko embame namba nyiso karapi kandapi dokona namba kyawa yaki nyuo kaeya napipi.
Nambana endangi rakangepame namba yaki nyuo kaeyarambinyipape Kamongo baame namba sakao yaki nyii nao karara.
Nambana yanda pimwai yuu silyaminyi dokona lao Kamongo embame namba apa pipili lao suu pilini dokona mana langipala elyape keta paliru kata dokona lanyuo pupi.
Nambana yanda pimwai dupwame namba kuinya palyuo kyambo pii laokoo keta pyambuo karaminyi dokona mata joo panda maiya napipi.
Dae karo dakepa Kamongome wambu keta keyange piramo doko kandalanasuu pyao karapusa pilyamo.
Kamongo keta pyamalyuo karape. Baa kapa ingingi lao suu pyao karape. Mona nemba napala baa keta pyamalyuo karape.


























































Mendena koo dupwa nyuo yambe pyao kame sakao kaeyasi seramodokona raeme kumuo pena. Akali mendena koo dupwana Kamongo Anatumi nyuo yaka lao reta nao kame sakamira doko raeme kumuo karara.
Akali panga soo laa nange dokome koo pirami dupwana Kamongome koo lao laa nara dokona rae maiyuo para.
Koo dupwa polo laa nayono dokopa ee lao karo kwuanyi serapala nenge sikya piya.
Kukwa korakamape kamongo embame namba randa jii. Panyi pipala yuu rombe laa nangenyili pyuo nambana porainya renge doko mee ingiya.
Nambana koo dupwa emba keta polo langiyu. Kopetame pingi dupwa yalu pinya saka napala emba polo langinya suu piyu. Dokona embame nambana koo pingi dupwa peparae kwuanyi nembakaeye.
Embena pii mondo laominyingi wambu dupwame yuu gii randa epelyamo dokopa emba kando loma serami ingilyamo. Randa dupwa apunda ingyuo kulimbwanyi peyo epenge dokopa randa epenge dokome nakama nyera ingya nangepya.
Emba nambana yalu pingipanda doko. Randa nyero dokopa namba nyisare ingilyamo. Emba nambana randa epara dupwana kyawa lete nyere ingilyamo dokona lao wee kenanepe lao ranaisa pokao poraiyuo lao karo.
Kamongome lao dokopa, Nambame emba apa pyuo palyuo karo piri lao mana langiru, letamo. Nambame dopa pyuo pipingi lao mana pii langiru.
Mena osepe panda dongepe kyakange ingilyamosa pii rape rape lao simili lao nenge katana kapa bange poraipi puupi dolapome anjapala minyilyaminyi paenge dopale ingyuo kara nalapape.
Koo yaki nyii nao pingi dupwa randa nao pisirami. Dopa piraminyipape Kamongo baa keta mona pyamalyuo karaminyi dupwa embena mona reto puu penge renge dokome kyawa minyarene karenale.
Rolae pyakamyuo karaminyi dupwa Kamongome nyisapya dokona rae maiyuo parami ingilyamo. Banya pii warombo singi dupwa rae maipala pii porakaiyuo lao para ingilyamo.
Rolae pingi dupwa Kamongome mende pyakapya dokona lao pii ketae palyuo lao rae maiyuo karalapape. Banya pii warombo singi dupwa peparae nakama banya kingi lakandalapape.
Kurulu rambyalu gitape dupwame Anatu dokona ange lao kingi lakando karalapape.
Banya lao kenane enenge pyao dokopa rambyalu gitape dupwa mora mora piso pyao pii ketae palyuo lao rae maiyuo karalapape.
Kamongona yulu dupwa angingyuo pao banyapii dupwa kinyi ingyuo silyamo.
Kamongome rolaena renge dokona mona retelyamopa banya mona retenge ota nange dokome yuu muu peparaena silyamo.
Yake doko Kamongo baame sinya lao lao wasiya. Neta kana buipi banya piimi sipureya.
Baame kota pete doko muupyuo yuu mendakisa sinya leya. Baame kota peteme lumu doko minyuo neta epa nana lao mapi pyao kata roko reteya.
Isa wambu peparaeme Kamongo pakalapape. Yuu muu rae lao palyuo pelene wambu peparaeme baa mupwa lao suu pyao pakale lao karalapape.
Baame pii leyamo dokopayuu muu peparae ingiya. Dopa pyuo pena leyamopa bange peparae epo maro leya.
Kamongome yuu liti andake dupwana yulu piramili dupwa kata rokonge. Pirama lao lao rapa rapa pingi dupwa pao kata roko minyilyasa pyuo pee laa nange.
Dopa pipala baa range pinya lenge dupwa waiya lao mee ingyuo paa napala kulisa ingyuo soo penge.
Yuu liti andake mende Anatu Kamongo ingyuo pelyamo lao suu pilyaminyi dupwa rae maiyuo parami. Wambu baa rangena lao rombo palyuo nyiya ingilyamo dupwa rae maiyuo parami.
Kamongome yake dorena karo kandano kandapyamo dokopa wambu peparae kando karamo.
Banya iso karenge yuu dokona karo isa yuunya wambu palaminyi dupwa kandano kandelyamo.
Baame nakamana suu pingi dupwa maiyuo dee dopande pilinilyamo lao soo karamo.
Kiŋi yanda singi malu karaminyipape nakamana porai dokome yandana pyao anamasi minyara ingya nange. Yanda singi mendeme banya porainya renge dokome anamasi minya nange.
Yanda pela penge mena ose dupwa wua rombasi ingyuo paramosa kapa pyuo wini laa narami. Nakamana porai renge dokome angi mende pii nara.
Kamongona mona reto karalu karenge dokona baa keta pyamalyuo banya pii warombo soo karenge dupwa baame kandokondali pyuo kandaro karenge.
Baame kumarami dokona kyawa minyuo karo lopo singi dokopa reto karo pingi.
Namwa Kamongo keta pyamalyapala karamano lao sepala kararama. Baame namwa nyiso kingi kapeme nee pyuo minyuo papingi.
Baa karamo dokona lao namwa rae maipala banyakingi poo pyasi doko angingyuo minyilyamano.
Emba keta mende pira lao mona kare kare karamano. Dokona embena mona retenge renge doko namwa keta palyako puu pena.
Nambame yuu peparae Kamongo kando ange lao kararo ingilyamo. Baa kaeya nao lakando karalu kararo.
Baame yulu piyamo dupwana suu pyapala lakandaro. Randa nyuo koo keta palaminyi dupwa sepala rae maiyuo parami.
Kamongo baa wakasa ingyuo karamo lao namba lamailyu dokona lamaiyuo banya kingi doko role pyao lakandamanale.
Nambame Kamongo lao loma soo piso siyunu dokopa dokona isingi langiya. Nambana paka renge dupwana baame namba kiiramo neta nyiya.
Koo keta palyaraminyi kararamidupwa baa kandalyuo kando rae mairami. Nakama isa nembenge dupwame dee laa nalu nao naraminyi kararami.
Range nyisarami ingya nange dupwa baa nyisinya larami dokopa nyisingi. Baame nakamana randa epelyamo dupwana kyawa minyuo nyiso karamo.
Kamongo banya pii rape rape lao minyingi dupwa iso karo banya aŋala dokome randa epelyamo dokopa kyawa minyuo karenge.
Kamongo doko baa apa pyuo keyangelao emba range kotapala apiyakalepe lao nakanjo soo kandare. Kamongo baakando nyeparamo doko kyawa minyara panda doko nyilyamo doko rae maiyuo karenge.
Banya wambu dupwa banya pii rape rape lao minyuo karena. Dopa pyuo karaminyi dupwa yano pipyamo dupwa nakama keta palira.
Mena laene dupwa nenge yano pilyamo dokopa mee lopome kumungi. Dopa pingi dokona wambu banya pii warombo singi dupwa mende yano pyuo yangya nange.
Wanyane wambu nambana puu minyingi dupwa epo namba apa letepe lao sela ipupwa. Dokopa apa pyuo Kamongo ketae pyambuo kararami lao mana langiru.
Emba raeme kumuo karapuli yaka lao suu pilipi daa? Emba karo yaku napala rae maiyuo kumalana suu pilipi daa?
Doko ramo doko kyambo pii laa nalu nao napala mata kando lenge dupwa yama pyuo minyuo kaeyare.
Koo dupwa mata maiyuo kaeyo keyange pipi. Mona kyuu lao singi renge dokona reoe lao yulu poraiyuo pipala koto nyere.
Kamongome waso rolae pingi dupwa kandokondali pyuo kandaro karo nakamana mona rando lenge doko soo karenge.
Dopa pipyamopape koo pyuo karenge dupwa baame kando epe nasepala mata maiyuo karenge. Renge doko nakama kumarami dokopa wambu dupwame kame soo kaena lao pingi.
Akali rolae pingi dupwa Kamongo kyakale lenge doko sakaro karenge. Randa epelyamo dupwa baame kunjinyi nembo nyingi.
