Wambu baa rangena yulu dokona uki minyuo pelyasa dokona isa pwuamano lao sepala mona nembenge dupwa keta Kamongo doko repeta karenge. Dee keyange eparali dupwa isa pwuamo lao suu pilyaminyi dupwa baame minyalyingi.
Akali keyange doko keta randa malu nyilyamopape Kamongo dokome baa nyisingi.
Kamongo baame akali keyange doko koo keta paa nana lao rapu pyuo kararamopa banya kuli dokona mendakipi koko pyaa nara.
Koo pinginya renge dokome yulu koo pingi dupwa pyao kumakara. Wambu yulu rolae pingi dupwa kando awa naraminyi wambu dupwa randa nyerami.
Kamongome banya kendemande ingyuo dupwa kyawa lete nyingi. Baa keta pao alya minyingi dupwa koo keta pali nana lao reto karenge.










































Koo pilyaminyi dupwana mona nembo kara nao kopetame pilyaminyi dupwana yango palyuo kara nao pipi.
Nakama rambi isokope mee yando nao isa pamuli pyuo waiya lao isa parami ingilyamo.
Kamongo keta pyamalyuo karapala wambu dupwa pipya yulu mondo lao pyuo karare. Dopa piri ramo dokopa embena yuu dokona koo keta pali nao mee palyuo karare.
Emba rae mairinyi renge doko Kamongo keta koto karare. Dokopa embena monarena suu pilinyili pyuo jeramo karare.
Emba Kamongo kumuo maipala baa keta pyamalyuo karare dokopa baame emba nyisara.
Baame embena yulu rolae dupwa nyepala korakama neta renge dopale ingyuo rao eŋa nembakaramo karare.
Koo dupwana dopa pirama lao wambu koo dupwame angingyuo lao rapa rapa yulu pyuo pirami dupwana mona nemba napala Kamongona lenge kambudokona mona sinya lao baame panda nyuo wambo pinya lao male soo karare.
Imbwa kaeyape dee pyalana suu pyaa napipi. Mona nembo katakaeyare renge dopaleme emba nyisa nange.
Kamongo keta pyamalyuokararami dupwa yuu range dokona nao paliraminyipa koo pirami dupwa neta nembarami ingilyamo.
Koo pyuo kararami dupwa dusa kata serandena pana narami ingilyamo. Kararaminyi kandalana piri doko kanda nareingilyamo.
Range pau lasi ingyuo kararami dupwa yuu dokona nakama kapa palyuo mona seramopa nao kararami.
Akali koo pingi dokome akali keyange pingi kando pyalana suu pingi. Suu pyapalalenge polo epe kanda nao karenge.
Dopa piramopape Kamongome akali koo pingi dupwa kando repe koo keta palyaminyi lapala giyalya giyana pyuo karenge.
Akali koo pingi dupwame nakamana wua gela dupwa nyuo wakyuo nakamana yanda dupwa ipyapala wambu pendewa dupwa pyalana lao karaminyi. Dopako pyuo akali keyange pingi dupwa opetaeko pyao kumakalana pilyaminyi.
Dopa piraminyipape nakamana wua gela dokome nakama range naramopa yanda dupwa mee punju para.
Akali keyange pingi dokona bange kuki serara dupwame akali koo pingi dupwana bange malu seraraminyi dupwa isa palyuo sera ingilyamo.
Kamongome koo pingi dupwana porai renge doko pyao bembai lanyi nembapala yulu keyange pingi dupwa yapo kame pyuo minyakamira.
Banya letamuli pyuo warombo soo pii minyingi dupwa baame mondo lao rapu pyuo kararamopa yuu doko nakamana ingyalu ingyuo ingyara.
Nakama randa eparamo dokopa moŋo nyii narami. Lopo seramo dokopa nakama nenge kapa seramopa koo keta pali narami.
Koo pyuo karenge dupwa kumarami ingilyamo. Kamongo nyisu petenge wambu dupwa mee isa jingi rele lao kalya pipala mee ingyuo pao yangama yangama kopana mendeke ingyuo meeingyuo parami ingilyamo.
Wambu kopetame pingi dupwana yulu doko bange saka napala mee yari ingyuo kee lao nyepala dee range maiyakami nange. Dopa piramopape akali keyange dokome bange mee mairamo doko ketae reto maiyuo maiyuo karara.
Kamongo baame rae maiyuo elyape keta petenge wambu dupwa yuu dokona kapa palirami. Dopa piramopape Kamongome rae mai nara wambu dupwa yuu dokona ralinyi nembara ingilyamo.
Kamongome akali baa apa pyuo karara kata dokona lanyuo penge. Dopa pyuo baa rae mainyi pyambuo pingi wambu dupwa kyawa minyuo karenge.
Isa penge ramo dokopa Kamongome nyisilyasa isa puu pao paa nange.
Namba yuu gii malu nembo kareyo doko dakepa emo kaelyo. Dopa pipunupape akali keyange mende Kamongome kyawa yaki nyiyamo kanda nayo. Dopako pyuo banya wane wanakepeme nenge jinya lao kongo pyuo kareyaminyi kanda nayo.
Yuu peparae baame pakiki maiyuo dee yano reto maiyuoko pingi. Dopa pilyamopa banya wane wanakepe dupwa baa rae mainyi pyambungi.
Yulu koo dupwa yaki nyuo kaepala keyange pyuo karape. Dopa pyuo karapala dokopa embena para pyarinyi dupwa yuu dokona mondo lao nao palyuo kararami.
Kamongome yulu rolae dupwa mona nyingi. Wambu banya yulu mondo mondo lao pingi dupwa yaki nyuo kaeyara ingya nalyamo. Kamongo baame nakama kyawa minyuo karenge. Dopa pilyamopape kopetame pinginya para pyao nyerami dupwa neta nembara.
Rolae pilyaminyi dupwa yuu range dokona mee mondo lao nao palu palirami.
Wambu mona palengena pii doko keyange ingyuo penge. Baame laramo dupwa angi kapa dokonako lara.
Baame banya Anatunya lowapii dupwa mona anda dokona reto minyingi. Yuu mendepe reto yaki nyuo kaeya nange.
Akali koo dokome akali keyange doko pyalana leeminyuo karenge.
Dopa pilyamopape Kamongo baame yanda pimwainyapawa dokona baa anamasi minyinya lao kyawa yaki nyii nara. Kote minyaramo dokopa koo pingi dokome kote pii lao wini lapala karapusi nembena lao panda mai nara.
Kamongome keyange mende pira lao suu pilini dokona baa keta pyamalyuo karapala banya mawa pii dupwa rape rape lao minyuo karape. Dokopa yuu dokona nao karalapa lao baame porai renge jeramo karo kandare dokopa koo pingi dupwa ralinyi neta nembara ingilyamo.
Akali koo sungwa sungwa pyuo kareya doko namba kandeyo. Baa iki londapala doloma nyuo isa palyuo karenge doko kandeyo.
Enakana pao karo kandeyo dokopa baa dokona kara nayamo kandeyo. Koto kareyo dokopa kando nyii nayo.
Pii dake angi mende letamo lao selapape. Wambu rolae pingi dupwana kandapala mana nyelapape. Wambu mona sinya lao piso karo pingi dokona para pyaramo dupwa nakama pisirami ingyara.
Koo pingi dupwa koo keta palirami dokopa nakamana para pyao nyisi dupwa opetae pyao nembarami.
Kamongome rolae pingi akali dupwa nyiso karapala randa epelyamo dokopa kyawa minyuo karenge.
Baame nyiso randa epelyamo dupwana lao nenge rekya lao nyingi. Koo pyuo karelyaminyi dupwana nakama koo keta pali namili lao baame nyisinya letaminyi dokopa nyiso kyawa minyingi.





































Kamongo dokome namba nyisara lao suu pyao mee isaro kareyo. Dokopa enakana nambana ee leyo doko baame siya.
Yuwale koo andake ipwanju singi mendena paleyonopa baame kyawa lete nyepala kana dokona pisiya.
Baame namba namwana Anatu lakandenge kenane enenge mende pyao mana langiya. Wambu malu dupwame dake kando pako karo repe repe laramo doko soo Kamongo baa kapa pira lao suu pyarami.
Wambu isa kanape anatu lao kingi lenge dupwape anatu kyambo lenge dupwape angi lao suu pyao kara napala Kamongo doko kapa ingingi lao suu pyao karaminyi dupwa rae maiyuo kararami.
Kamongo Anatu embame namwana renge malu pyakao karenge. Emba yale mende kara nalyamo. Embame rengya keyange nyera dupwa peparae rapa rapa pyakalene. Namba embena yulu peparaena lao lapuli doko yulu malu mee sipyamosa saka naro ingilyamo.
Emba menana rendamu nyelana rae mai napala namba yanenge wai pyapala kumuo jelase lao rapa rapa pyaane leya. Nakamana koo dupwa kame sakalase lao mena pyao kiso jilyaminyi doko rae maiyuo nyii nalene kandelyo.
Kandapala nambame buku kao pele pele lasi dokona leyamuli pyuo dae karo.
Emba suu pyarenyili pyuo piri. Embena mawa pii doko nambana monarena manjo karenge, leya.
Embena wambu dupwa wato leyami dokona nambame waili pii embame nyisiinyi doko polo lamaiyu. Nambame wambu dupwa kaeya nao lamaiyuoko kararo doko emba silini.
Lete wai pyao nyiyamo doko namba yeelyo iki sepala kaeya napu. Nambame yuu peparae embena yulu keyange pyuo nyisilini dupwa lamaiyuoko karenge. Embena wambu dupwa wato letaminyi yaka lao namba roma napyuo pisa nange. Emba alowa pii nao mona reto puu pelene dokona lao lamaiyuoko karenge.
Kamongo, embame namba yuu peparae sakame kumuo karalu karare doko namba silyu. Embena alowa pii nao mona reto karalu karenge suu pingi dokome namba yuu peparae kyawa minyuo reto karara.
Randa malu mee namba keta soo kako pipyasa kapa pyuo yaka lalana saka nalyo. Nambana koo dupwame namba kalya nasi minyapyasa kapa kandaro ingya nalyamo. Nambana ayembana kyawasi malu mee karamo dopale ingyuo sipyasa nambana suu pingi doko isa pupyamo karo.
Kamongo, embame namba pyuo nyepala dakepa nyiso karape.
Wambu nambapyao kumakalana lao suu pilyaminyi dupwa nyuo anamasi minyuo kyawa sisingi bolombalo laramo penale. Lapo namba randa nyipu dokopa rae maimi dupwa kapu kyepala elyo penale.
Namba kando giyalya giyana pimi dupwa nakama isa palaminyi dokona elyame kumuo karenale.
Embaketa epelyaminyi dupwa mona pyakalyuo pyaramopa rae maiyuo kararami. Embame pyuo nyiinyi dokona lao sangyu lao karaminyi dupwame yuu peparae lao, Kamongo doko baa aki Kamongo lao karenale.
Namba mendali range palya nao mee isale karenge. Dopa pyuo karalonopape Kamongoembame namba kame see nange. Emba nambana Anatu nambana pyuo nyingi ingyuo karene dokome waiyako lao namba nyiso karape.















O Anatu, mena diya doko ipwa manda renge doko nano karenge doko suu pyao namba embapa karalana nano karo.
Anatu emba lete karenge dokona lao ipwa ingyuo nano pipyamo karo. Anjokorape nambame embena lenge kambu dokona kingi wapambu lakao emba lakandala parose?
Kukwa korakamape ee lao karapusa ee ipwange dokome nenge ingyuo sikya pilyamo. Dopa pipyamodokopa nambana yanda pimwai dupwame piso soo, Embena Anatu doko anja karamo, lao karaminyi.
Wamba apa piyamano dokona suu pyapu dokopa nambana mona kwaelyamo. Namba wambu dupwa pipya role pyao Anatunya anda peyama dokopa wambu dupwa rae maiyuo kenane pyao pii porakai lao Anatu lakando peyaminyipa lanyuo peyo.
Akipamo namba sakame kumulyusi? Akipamo namba randa andake nyilyusi? Nambame Anatu keyange piralao suu pyao baa nambana pyuo nyingi ingyuo karamo doko dee kambalakando kararo.
Dae karapusi karo mona kenda pipyasa baa lao suu pyao karo. Baame kondo renge doko nambana mona dokona ipwaingyuo kulimbwanyi peyapya.
Randa andake dokome apunda epelyamoipwa palenge dopale ingyuo yuu kyau Emonepe yuu kyau Misape dolapona piso ipwa jerae pyao ipwa Jotane gulu galu lao malyingi dopale ingyapya.
Yuu yangaramo dokopa Kamongome banya mona reto karalu karenge doko lasaka pyuo karena. Dopa piramo dokopa nambame kukwa dokopa kenane pyao Anatu nambapa karapyamo pilyamo lao ateŋa lao piru.
Anatu nambana kyawa minyuo karenge doko kando leto. Akipamo namba yaki nyilisi? Nambana yanda pimwai dupwame akipamo namba koo keta palyuo randa joo puu pao pena lao kaelese?
Nakamana giyalya giyana pyuo pii lami dokome namba mata rukyuo pili lao, Embena Anatu doko anja karase lao piso soo karalu karaminyi.
Akipamo namba sakame kumulyusi? Akipamo namba randa andake nyilyusi? Nambame Anatumi kapa pira lao soo manjo baa nambana pyuo nyingi karamo doko dee kamba lakando kararo.

O Anatu, wambu emba suu pyaa nange dupwame namba kando pii kopetame laminyi dupwana raka dokona namba rolae ingyuo karene lao panolape. Dopa pyuo wambu yulu koo pingipi kyambo lengepe karaminyi dokona namba kyawa minyuo minyalyuo nyepe.
Emba nambana alya minyingi ingyuo karene. Akipamo embame namba yaki nyelese? Yanda pimwai dupwame namba randa kopetame ingyuo joo kararaminyipa akipamo namba randa dokonyuoko parose?
Embena yanga paupau lengepe kinyinya rengepe dolapo peyakape. Embena yuu kyau poo pyasi Sayone lenge dokonape embena tembole anda emba palenge dokonape namba dee kamba laminyuo penale.
O Anatu, enakana namba embena kana pyare laro karenge dokonaparo. Emba keta nambana mona pyakalyuo pyao rae maingi renge potemo epenge. Anatu, nambana Anatu, nambana rambyalu lao kenane pyao emba lakandaro.
Akipamo namba ama kondalyose? Akipamo nambana mona dokona randa nyilyusi? Nambana Anatu baa kapa pira lao suu pyao kararo. Baa nambana lete wai pyao nyingi baa nambana Anatu ingyuo karamo lao dee lakandaro ingilyamo.













































Anatu namwana konambena mendeke ingyuo porai renge joo pyuo karenge. Randa epelyamo dupwana kaeya nao yuu peparae rapa rapa piru karapala nyisingi.
Dokona lao isa yuu dake walu walu andake laowape dee yuu kyau dupwa poro lapala ipwa kota sukusa pao piramopape namwa paka narama.
Dee mende ipwa kota doko mangalya mangana pyuo oo lao eparamo dokopa yuu kyau dupwa walu walu laraminyipape namwa paka narama.
Ipwa Anatunya yuu taone dokona epopelyamo dokome rae maingi renge minyuo epo penge. Epo Anatu Ama Ketaena anda poo pyasi dokona penge.
Anatu baa yuu taone andake dokona palyuo karelyasa kapa kwaeya nange. Ene yango rombalo piramo dokopa baame nyisala epara.
Yuu muu ree lao dupwa peparae pakame kumaraminyipa kiŋinya isingi yulu dupwa peparae walu larami. Anatu pii reeko yuu gono lele laramo dokopa yuu dupwa mee ingyuo rali pira.
Kamongo Porai Wakasa doko namwa pipya role pyao karapyamo pilyamo. Jekopena Anatu doko namwana yalu pingi panda ingyuo karamo.
Kamongome aki yulu mende pilyamo lao kandala ipupwa. Baame yulu wambumikando yamarangungi dupwa isa yuu dakena pilyamo kandalapa.
Baame yuu muu peparaena yanda pilyaminyi dupwa kaena lao nenge rekya lao nyilyamo. Baame yanda kakupi dupwa punjinyi nembo konambe dupwa nyuo isarena yango pilyamo.
Yanda pilyaminyi dupwa kaepala namba doko Anatu ingyuo karapunu pilyamoŋo doko soo nyelapape. Yuu liti dupwanape dee yuu muu ree lao dupwanape mupwa ingyuo karoŋo letamo.
Kamongo Porai Wakasa doko namwa pipya role pyao karapyamo pilyamo. Jekopena Anatu doko namwana yalu pingi panda ingyuo karamo.

Wambu peparae rae maiyuo kingi kape pyalapape. Kenane keyange lapo poraiyuo pyao dokome Anatu lakandalapape.
Kamongo Ama Ketae doko baa andake lao suu pyao pako kararami. Baa iki kiŋi andake ingyuo karenge dokome yuu muu dupwa peparaena iso karenge.
Baame wambu peparae nyuo isa palyakao yuu liti peparae iso kararami lao pyakaya.
Namwa yuu palamano doko baame palirami lao nyuo jiya. Wambu baame mona reteyamo dupwa yuu dokonyuo palipala kimbu pisipyamo karamano lao suu pilyaminyi.
Anatu banya kiŋinya petenge isa pao nyilyamo. Nyipyamo dokopa wambu dupwa mona pyakalyuo pipyasa pii porakai lao bikuli dupwa pyao karaminyi.
Anatu lakando kenane pyamana. Namwana kiŋidoko lakandamana.
Anatu baa kiŋi doko yuu muu dupwapeparaena iso karamo dokona kenane pyao lakandamana.
Anatu banya kiŋinya petenge isa poo pyasi dokona pisapala baame wambu dupwa iso karamo.
Wambu iso karenge akali dupwa pipya Aporakamena Anatu dokona wambu dupwa role pyao karaminyi. Baame ami yanda singinya porai renge dupwa manda manja nange. Baa keta porainyarenge palipala kiŋi dupwana ketaele ingyuo iso karenge.
















Pii dake wambu piso palyuo pelene dupwame kale yukupala selapa.
Pii serami dupwa kamongo pendewape dee kuki epengepe peparaeme soo nyuoko pipwape.
Nambame pii suu pyaro dupwa koko pao suu pyaro. Pyapala soo nyinginya renge doko laro.
Dopa pyuo nambame kongwalu pii pyasi doko soo gisalena sokondali pyuo karapala renge doko rambyalu lao dokopa dokona polo larono serami.
Yanda pimwai yulu koo paleta dupwame namba nyuo sukusa palyaraminyi dokopa randa eparamopa namba pakame kumuo kara naro.
Wambu koo pingi mendeme isa bangena mona yukupala karara dokome mena bangepe dupwana iki range dokona ketae pyambuli lao lao kararasa pira dokona namba randa eparamo dokopa pakame kumuo kara naro.
Wambumi mende koo dupwana lao baa range kapa kiiramo nyii nara. Baa rangeme Anatu keta bange mendeme ropo pyapala lete karara kapa pii nara.
Renge doko akalinya koo renge dupwana bangeme ropo pyaramo dokona manda manja napala andake ingyuo pelyamo. Banya minyuo epo ropo pilyamo dupwame
baa malu anda pali nao lete eparande daa. Dee dopako pyuo baa lete renge mairamo kararandedaa.
Akali mona palenge palya nangepe dee kopetame pingipi pii nangepe peparae kumuo penge doko kandelyamano. Nakamana mena bangepe dupwa para pyaramo dupwa keta reto kumuo penge.
Dakepa yuu andape range sipyamo piso karo piminyipape rengya nakama malu pirami. Mare dokopa malu anda doko nakamana anda yuupi ingyalu ingyuo ingyaralyamo. Nakama angingyuo dokona palyuo otarami ingyara.
Akalinya kamongonge renge dokome baa kuma nana lao kyawa minyarande daa. Baa mee mena suwape ingyuo kumuo para ingilyamo.
Wambu rangena suupingi dokona iki pyamalyapala karaminyi dupwa keta aki rengende pilyamo lao kando karamanale. Mena bangepena angingyuo minyaro karaminyi dupwasa leto.
Nakama mena sipisipi kumuli lapa pirami. Piraminyipa kumunginya renge dokome nakamana mena sipisipi rapu akali ingyaro karara. Wambu dasipa kumapala nakamana yanenge kakapangepe nakama rangena anda nanesa karo kumunginya yuu dokona palyuo waiya lao rumbyuo kwaeyarami. Kwaeyaraminyipa rolae pingi dupwame nakama anamasi minyarami.
Dopa piramopape Anatumi namba kyawa minyara. Baame namba kumungi rengena porai dokona piso kingi rekya lao nyera ingilyamo.
Akali dupwa kamongoyami kande dokopape dee nakamana mena bangepe dupwame kamame andakiya kandedokopa mona kendame kumuo kara napipi.
Baa kumaramo dokopa minyuo paowape dee kyangali suku suku retapala malu anda palirande daa.
Akali baame yulu wakasa mora piso pingi lao suu pyao karo isa yulu dupwana kamongo ingyuo paramosa lakandaraminyipape
kumungi gii dokopa imbwange kauwangepe kumuo penge kata dokona puu pao para ingingi. Yuu iminjaro karalu karo karenge dokona para.
Akalinya kamongonge renge dokome baa kuma nana lao kyawa minyarande daa. Baamee mena suwape kumuli lara.
























Anatu yuu peparae kaeya nao mona reto puu penge dokona embame namba kando sakame kumuo karape. Embame namba sakame kumulini dokona nambanakoo dupwa kwuanyi nembakare.
Nambana koo dupwa peparae nyuo wate pipala elya pyuo nembakare.
Nambame kyai pyuo pingi dupwa angi silyu. Namba yuu peparae nambana koo dupwa range soo manjo karo.
Nambame emba keta koo pimwaiyuo pipu doko emba iki pimwaipu. Embame koo lao masipinyi doko peparae pipu. Dokona embame koo pipi lao lare doko rolae ingyuo lare ingilyamo. Dee embame namba koo pipi lao randa jere doko rolao laresa pira.
Namba endangimi manjipa nayamo dokopa koo doko namba keta paleya. Manjo neta nyepeyamo dokopa koo doko namba keta palamoko.
Kinyi angi kapa dokona lenge doko emba rae mailini dokona nambana kyawa sisinginya embena mona palenge singinya renge palyuo simbwakape.
Nambana koo dupwa nyuo kakondakare dokopa au pyuo keyange ingyuo pisiru. Nambana koo dupwa wate pyakarenedokopa kamame kyowao lao kopa dopakale ingyuo kararo.
Namba raemaiyuo mona elyape palenge jaa doko kale katana palenale. Namba pyao inji ranji pinyi nembapinyipape namba dee kamba rae mairu.
Nambana koo dupwana kanda nao lenge iminjapala nambana koo wakale wakale peparae kwuanyi nembakare.
O Anatu, mona au pisi sinya laowasakare. Dee imambu enenge emba keta yaki nyii nao yulu pingi doko namba keta jereko.
Namba embena arapu dokona pyao neta nemba nao embena Imambu Poo Pyasi namba keta rekya lao nyuo pii nare.
Embame namba pyuo nyiinyi dokona piso mona pyakalyuo pingi renge doko epenge. Doko dee range jepe. Jepala dokopa namba waa waa karo rape rape lao pingirenge jere.
Dokopa enakana koo pingi dupwa nambame embena mawapii dokona lamaiyakaro dokopa nakama kapu kyuo emba keta lanyuo epenale.
Anatu embame namba kyawa minyuo pyuo nyepe. Dokopa nambame rae maiyuo karo embena yulu rolae dokona lamaiyakao parowale.
O Kamongo, pii mora piso nyisape. Dokopa nambame embena kingi lakandarowale.
Emba mena pyao kiso maingi dokona rae mai nange. Rae maipili nambame kapa jipuli. Dee mena kiso rendamu pyuo maingi dokona emba rae mai nange kandaleko.
O Anatu, nambame mena pyao kiso maingi dokona lao suu pyao nambana imambu inyimungu karenge doko emba keta jilyu. Doko akali inyimungu koo dupwana kondo karenge doko emba yaki nyii nange kandale.
Anatu, embame anjiki pipala yuu kyau Sayone doko nyisape. Jerusaleme kame doko kamba piri.
Enakana angi mupwa pyao mairaminyi dokopa emba rae mairi. Mena pyao kisomaingi dupwa kandapala rae mairi. Dee bulamakao kali dupwa embena pyao kiso maingi rate dokona pyao kiso mairamiko.

















































































































































Anatu emba nambana Anatu dokoŋo. Namba embapa role pyao karapuli yaka. Nambana suu pingi peparaeme emba keta karapuli yaka lao suu pilyu. Yuu penda penda ipwa pali nange dopale ingyuo karapala nambana imambu dokome embapa karalana ipwa ingyuo nano pipyamo karo.
Nambame emba porai ingyuo yanga paupau lao karene doko misi anda dokona karo kandalana suu pyao karo.
Embame yaki nyii nao mona reto puu penge doko angi ingyapyasa isa yuu dakena piso karo pingi doko mee ingyuo pelyamo dokona embena kingi ketae pyambuo lakando kararo ingilyamo.
Namba kararo mange dupwa pipya emba kando ange lao nambana kingi ketae pyambuo ateŋa laro ingilyamo.
Nambana imambu doko imambunya nenge nao sikya pira dokopa nambame emba kenane pyao lakandaro.
Nambana luu palenge panda dokona palyuo soo dokopa embena lao suu pyao palyuo singi. Kukwa peparae namba embapa lao suu pyale pyale palenge.
Renge dokona lao embame namba yuu peparae nyisingi. Embena arapu dokona karenge dokona lao rae maingi kenane dupwa pyao karo.
Nambame emba poraiyuo minyaro soo pelyo. Dokona namba kyawa minyuo karene kande.
Wambu lapome namba pyao kumakalana pilyaminyi dupwa kumasi wambunya yuu dokona isa parami.
Nakamame yanda pipala pyaraminyipa nakamana yanenge kakapange doko suwa rae lenge dupwame nao kararami.
Anatumi pyao anamasi minyakamira dokona kiŋi baa rae maira. Wambu Anatupa pii kana minyuo lengedupwame banya kingi lakandaraminyipa kyambo lenge wambu dupwa pii pali naramo parami.












Anatu, yuu Sayone dokona namwame emba lakandapengeli ingilyamo. Namwame dopa pirama lao lalu lao lenge pii doko minyapenge ingilyamo.
Embame namwana ateŋa pii doko sepala yano pyakange dokonadopa pirama. Wambu dupwa peparae emba keta epo nakamana koo dupwa polo langyala eparami ingilyamo.
Namwana koo dupwame nyuo isa palyingi. Palyilyamopape embame namwana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakange.
Embena rombo palyisi wambu dupwa lanyuo emba pipya role pyao karaminyi dusipa rae maiyuo kararami. Embena tembole anda yapasi dokona karo embena keyange rengepe dee bangepe jingi dupwa kapa pyuo nyeramanopa mende yangya nara.
Embame namwana ateŋa lenge dupwa yano pyakao namwa keta yulu keyange pyuo kyawa lete nyuo karenge. Wambu yuumuu dupwana palaminyi dupwamepe dee ipwa kota yalo yuu nanesa range dupwamepe emba mupwa kapa pira lao suu pyao karaminyi.
Embena porai dokome yuu kyau dupwa waso pisiinyi dokome embena kamame porai renge dokolasaka pilyamo.
Ipwa kota doko kasakole minyuo gono gono lao mango epenge dokopa embame singinyili pyuo sinya lenge dokopa mee pyai nao rali pingi. Doko suu pyao wambu kilyipu kilyipu karenge dokopa embame nyuo kui lenge.
Wambu yuu muu dupwana peparaeme embena yulu andake pingi dupwa kandapala yamarangyuo mona pyakalyuo pilyamo karenge.
Embame yuu dupwa mondo lao rapu pilyuŋu lao lasaka pyuo apu peelene. Dopa pipinyi dokona yuu amenge kapape dokona nenge andenge. Embame ipwa pona dupwa ipwa epo rangu pena lao pingi. Embame yuu dupwana nenge andena lao peenge. Embame pingi doko dapa pyuo pingi.
Embame yuu ape ape pyasi dupwana apunda malu peelenepa yuu doko rombe lao singi. Embame apunda kuki raa raa pyao peenge dokome yuu dupwa pyuku lapala ee waingi dupwa andena lao pyuo karenge.
Embame wambu dupwa elyape keta pisapinyi dokome ee nengepe malu manjo nyilyaminyi. Emba anja panda anja mendasa pupinyi dupwana nenge malu silyamo.
Yuu isako malu andenge dupwana mena sipisipi malu karaminyi. Yuu kyau dupwana ee nengepe yuu sero karapyasa yuu kyau dupwa ama rae wakasa maiyuo karaminyi.
Yuu pau dupwana mena sipisipi dupwame minyarambu nyuo karaminyi. Yuu lama dupwana witi dupwame minyarambu nyuo ando karaminyi. Dopa pipyamo dokome bange peparaeme mona pyakalyuo pyao kenane pyao karaminyi.





















Anatu embame namwa sakame kumapala elyape keta piso kalya pyuo nembape. Namwa koo nono ingyuo kanda napala anjiki pyuo kandape.
Dopa pirinyi dokopa yuu muu peparaeme embena pimili lao suu pilini doko sinyale. Dopa pyuo soo embena pyuo nyingi yulu doko dopa pyuo palyuo penge lamo lao kandenale.
Wambu dupwame Anatu emba lakandenale. Wambu peparaeme emba lakandena.
Embame yuu muu peparae mondo lao kata lasaka pyuo lao rolare renge dokona embena lao mona pyakalyuo pyao rae maiyuo kenane pyao lakandenale.
Wambu dupwame Anatu emba lakandenale. wambu peparaeme emba lakandena.
Namwana Anatumi namwa nyiso elyape keta pisapinyi dokome yuu dokona nenge kakana pilyamo.
Anatumi namwa elyape keta piso nyisapyamo dokona wambu peparae anja anja palaminyi dupwame baa ketae pyambuo lakandena.





































O Anatu, ipwa dokome epo nambana mange koe nyilyamo nyisape.
Namba ipwa inju mendena nyuo yalu pilyamo. Yuu porai mende see nalyamo. Namba ipwa kota ama yalu mendenakaro. Ipwa kota kasakole minyuo ipwa dokome namba oo nyuo napalana pilyamo.
Namba nysinya lao kyakale lapu doko lao lisa pipala pendoko rokolyamo. Nyisala eparali lao lenge nyuo karo lenge alyilyamo.
Renge angi mende palya napyamopa namba awa nao karaminyi dupwa ama malu ingyapyasa nambana kyawasi malu karamo dupwa manda manja nalyamo. Nambana yanda pimwai dupwame kando kyambo lao yanda pimwailyaminyi. Nakamame namba pyalana poraiyuo kaelyaminyi. Dopa pipala bange dupwa waa nyiyu ingyuo range maiyakami letaminyi.
Nambana koo dupwa Anatu embapa yalu pyuo silyande daa. Namba kopyali ingyuo pyuo karene lao embame soo kaeyo karene doko.
Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa Ama Porai, Emba Isaraele wambunya Anatu doko. Namba koo pirunusa embena wambuemba mona retenge dupwa mona kenda nana lao suu pyao karape. Wambu kingiwapambupi lakao emba kingi lenge dupwa nambame koo pirunusa emba Isaraele wambunya Anatu elya nyii namili lao suu pyao karape.
Embena kingi reke lao karapusa wambu dupwame giyalya giyana pyuo karaminyi elyame kumulyu.
Namba nambana yangonge dupwa pipya kanda nange upunili ingyuo pelyamo. Nambana endangi rakangepa dupwa pipya namba yuu nanesa wambu enenge ingyuo pelyamo.
Embena tembole anda suu pyao yulu andake isare rao pyuo kararo. Emba kando pii kopyali minyinyi nembo leyaminyi dupwa namba keta soo punjilyamo.
Namba range inyimungu karapala nenge wasaka pyuo pisipunupa wambumi kilya kando letaminyi.
Namba kumanda piso ee lao wapungi komau wapwaro pisipu dokopa giyalya giyana pilyamini.
Kata jima jima dupwana karo nambanalao lakao karaminyipa ipwa biya nenge akali dupwame nambapa lao kenane rana isa poko pyao karaminyi.
Dopa lao karaminyipape nambaramo doko Kamongo embapa lao loma soo kararowale. Anatu, yuu gii mende embame rombo palyuo nyepala namba isingi langipi. Embame namba mona andakeretelene dokona laope embame kyawa lete nyero lenge pii doko minyingi dokome isingi langipi.
Ipwa injunya yalyilyu dokona nyisape. Nambana yanda pimwai dee ipwa andake dolapona nenge rekya lao nyepe.
Namba ipwa palyuo koo mange nelyamo dokome nyuo koko palya nanale. Namba yuwale kyasisi londe dokona malu pisi kara narowale.
Kamongo embena mona reto puu penge keyange dokona piso pii yano pyaka. Embena saka renge palenge doko paleta namba keta ipupi.
Embena kendemande akali doko kandele kanda nale lao kara napipi. Namba angi randa nyilyu dokona dakepa embame nyisa.
Namba keta epapala nyisape. Nambana yanda pimwai dapwana namba nenge rekya lao nyepe.
Nambana kingi doko kokwa soo lao koo keta palyamisa elya nyilyu doko emba silini. Embame nambana yanda pimwai dupwa peparae kandasi karene.
Kingi kokwa soo laminyi dokome nambana mona doko kwaepyasa namba kopyali pakana palamo. Namba dopa pyuo pilini lao mendeme kenda dokona nakanju sepala mona minyaramburami kandena lao lengenyipunu dokopa mendali daa ingilyamo.
Namba lopo piyamo dokopamauli nyuo jiyami. Namba ipwa nano piyamo dokopa ipwa waene kau pingi doko nyuo jiyami.
Nakamana pati andake laminyi dupwame nakama kokwa sinyi nembo penale. Nakamana nenge nenge yuu gii dokona kone makarami dokona mangena minyinya.
Pyao lenge kwaenyi nembape. Nakamana mata dupwa poraiya nanale lao pipi.
Embena imbu singi doko nakama keta kulimbwanyi palyapala imbu singi dokome pyao yamasu pyanyi palyape.
Nakamana piso palyuo pyuo papilyaminyi panda doko mee apa sinyale. Nakamana komau anda dokona mendepe lenge rao see nanale.
Embame koo piyaminyi pyao yano nyiinyi dupwako randa mailyaminyi. Nakamame embame pyao ranjama nyiinyi wambu dupwanako pii lakamyuo palaminyi.
Nakama lete parami panda dorena maiya narene. Nakamana koo dupwa mondo lao pepana pyao retakamyuo karape.
Lete karengena buku dokona nakamana kingi doko kwuanyi nembasi palena. Nakama embena wambunya kingi silyamo dokona sisara daa.
Namba mona rando mona kendo pilyu. O Anatu, embame namba minyalyuo nyepala nyisape.
Nambame banya lao suu pyao kenane romope lao rana isa poko baa suu pyao kararo. Banya yulu keyange wakasa dupwana namba banyalao sangyu lao lao panaro.
Renge dokome Kamongo baa rae mainyipyambwaramopa mena bulamakao kali kameya mairaminyi dupwa mee ingyuo para.
Pendewa dupwame doko kandaraminyi dokopa raeme kumarami. Dopako pyuo Anatu kingi lenge wambu dupwa dokome porainyi pyambwaramo larami.
Kamongome bange yano pilyamo karelyaminyi dupwana pii doko soo nyuo dee banya wambu karapusi palenge dupwa kame see naowako karo pingi.
Anatu baa yake yuupi laparaeme lakando wee kenanepe lena. Ipwa kota dee bange wasiyamo silyamo dupwa opetaeme baa lakandena.
Baame yuu Jerusaleme doko nyiso Juta wambunya taone dupwa dee kamba pyakamira dokopa banya wambu dupwa dokona yuu rombo pyao nyuo nao palirami ingilyamo.
Banya kendemande wambunya para pyao nyerami. Wambu baa mona retarami dupwame dokona panda nyuo nao palirami.































Anatu, embena rolaena renge dokona palyuo kote lalenyili pyuo lena lao kiŋi baa mana lamaipi. Dokopa emba range katalunji nembo pii lenge dopale lamairi.
Dokopa embena wambu dupwa pipya pii katalunjidokona lao dee pendewa dupwa pipya gapomane yulu angi rolae dokona palyuo iso karara.
Yuu dokona kapa palyuo nao karapala rolaenarenge doko soo nyisi kararami.
Dopa piramopa kiŋi baame mee pendewa wambu dupwa pipya kote kata angi dokona pao lena. Dopa pyuo nyisapenge kata dupwana nyiso dee ingi pungipi nao wambu pipya moŋo maiyuo karenge dupwa isa nembo karenale.
Embena wambudupwame emba neta doko rao karalu karenge doko suu pyao kingi wapambupi lakao embena kingi lakando karalu karenale. Kana doko rao karalu karara doko suupyao emba lakando puu pena.
Kiŋi baa ee yuupinya apunda kulimbwanyi peyalamuli pyuope dee apunda pura pura pyao epo yuu pyuku lanyi pyambwalamuli pyuo karena.
Rolaena renge doko baa kararamo gii dusipana mondo lao ando paramopa kukwa kana rao karalu karo kararamo dupwana banya wambu dupwa kapa palyuo nao petenale.
Banya isingi yulu doko ipwa kota mendasa piso pao kota pete mendena suu lao dee ipwa Yuporisa lenge dokona piso pao yuu wangu dolapona kapa kapa pira.
Dokopa yuu muiyanena palenge wambu dupwame baa mupwaŋa lao pongwa nao banya kingi lakandarami. Banya yanda pimwai dupwame isa yuu sinjimu dupwana yuu paro oko soo soo pirami.
Dopa pyuo yuu Sepene range kiŋipi dee yuu ipwa kota sukusa singi dupwana kiŋipi dupwame baa bange kipungi ingyuo maiyala eparaminyipa yuu Arapia rangepe yuu Itiopia rangepe dupwana kiŋi dupwame dopako pirami.
Dopa pyuo kiŋi peparaeme baa mupwa lao mona mairaminyipa yuu muu dupwana wambu peparaeme banya yulu pyakamyuo pirami.
Baame pendewa wambupi bange aeya nange wambupi dee wambu mendeme nyuo sukusa pyambwa nangepe dupwame baa kyakale larami dupwa kyawa minyara.
Baame poraya nange dupwape pendewape dupwa sakame kumuo karo dee bange yano piramo kararami dupwa kyawa minyuo karenge.
Nakama banya mona nyingi bange angi dopale ingyarasa dokona nakama pipya pyalana pingi wambu dupwa keta nenge rekya lao nyingi.
Kiŋi baa karo yaku nao kumunya. Baa yuu Arapia range wambumi kana golo maiyuo karena. Banya lao ateŋa doko lapa lapa pyuo sakaminya. Anatumi kalya pyuo nembenge renge doko baa keta palipa palipa pyuo pena.
Yuu dokona nenge witi jingipi kakana pyakaminya. Yuu kyauli dupwa ee nengepeme pana naramopa yuu Lepanone dokona nenge kakana pipyamo nelyaminyi dopaleko inginya. Yuu taone andake dupwanawambu wai kiso simbunyi pyale laramopa yangi kuku alemakai pokwalipi ingyuo pena.
Banya kingi doko kame see nao suu pyale pyale karena. Banya karenge arome pii doko neta rao karalu karenge dopale ingyuo pena. Yuu muu ree lao baa lakandenale. Wambu peparaeme kiŋidoko rae maiyuo karapyali lao Anatumi nakamba elyape keta pisinya lao pirami.
Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Anatu dokona kingi doko iki lakando palena. Baame yeelyo yulu elyape ingyuo dapwa pilyamo.
Banya kingi neta renge ingyuo karamo doko lakando karalu kararaminyipa banya neta renge yulu dokome yuu pinjingi dolapona kapa kapa pinyale.
Dakena epo akali Jesena ikinyingi Dapitimi ateŋa pii lao epo lumwa piya.
Anatumi Isaraele wambu keta yulu elyape pingi. Kinyi, wambu monarena yapasi seramo dupwa keta elyape ingyuo penge.
Dopa piramopape namba oo repeta isa paro ingiya. Nambana kimbu doko keta keta pipala Anatu kapa ingingi lao suu pingi doko oo yaki nyepala isa pwuano lao siyu.
Akali koo pingi dupwa kamongapala bange dupwa ando peyasa kandapala kyaŋe singi dupwa pipya yango palyiyu dokome namba isa paro ingiya.
Nakamana randa pingi mende epa napyamopa nakama poraiyuo yanenge keyange karo karaminyi.
Nakama wakale dupwa pilyaminyi doko suu pyaoranda nyii nalyaminyi. Wakale dupwa randa wakale wakale nyiminyi dopale doko nakama keta epa nalyamoko.
Dopa pipyasa nakama mee yongona andanyi nembo kyaŋe silyaminyi. Dopa pyuo karo akali menge dupwa pyapala kokwa sinyi nembo karaminyi.
Nakamana mona dupwana yulu koo wakale wakale dupwa neta epenge. Dee nakamana suu pingi dupwana yulu koo dupwa imambu see nao rapa rapa pilyaminyi.
Nakamame wakale dupwa kando pii koo lao giyalya giyana pilyaminyi. Nakama range mupwa lao suu pyapala enda akalipi wakale dupwa randa maiyuo kokwa seraminyi dokona lao suu pyao lao palaminyi.
Nakamame yake dorena karenge Anatu baakando pii kopetame letaminyi. Nakama rangena kingi doko ketae pyambuo lao isa wambu dupwa dopa pinya dopa pinya lao karaminyi.
Dopa piminyisa Anatunya wambu angi dupwamepe kapu kyepala nakamana pii laminyi doko soo kale yukupala angi lao suu pilyaminyi.
Namwa pilyamano dupwa Anatumi see nara, letaminyi. Kamongo Ama Ketae karenge dokome koto kanda nara, letaminyi.
Wambu koo pingi dupwana yulu doko dopa pyuo pilyaminyi. Nakama bange ama malu sipyamopape mee nyelanako suu pyao lao karaminyi.
Namba mondo lao waso karo mona yapasi silyamo dee nambana kingi dokome koo mende pii nalyo. Doko mee ingyuo parase?
Anatu, embame kukwa korakamape yuu gii yaka lao namba randa jookarenge. Dee yangama peparae namba moŋo jingi.
Namba pii kopetame leyaminyi doko lapuli embena wambu pii lao nenge rambo lao pingi dopale pii napuli.
Dokona lao renge angi dokona randa nao serama ingyapyamopape sipuli lao pyuo lisa pyuo karapu.
Dopa pipunupape namba embena tembole anda dokona papala koo pingi dupwa keta renge dopa pyuonde paliralyamo lao soo pakana palyipu.
Kinyi, embame nakama kata keta keta pyuo puu pelyamo dokona nyuo karapala pyao lukundo soo randa nyinya lao piri ingilyamo.
Nakama waiya lao koo keta palyuo randa nao otarami.
Kamongo nakama mee kukwama kombeya pipala yangama sipurenge dokopa mee ingyalya ingyana pilyasa kame soo kaenge dopakale ingyuo karaminyi.
Dokopa nambana suu pingi koo manjo mona rando karo
namba kopyali ingyapala emba angi sepa nayo. Namba rangeme embena lenge kambu dokona suwa menape ingyuo peyo.
Dopa pipunupape namba embapa role pyao karapunu dokona lao embame nambana kingi minyaro karene.
Embame dopa pyuo dapa pyuo karape lao namba kata lasaka pipinyi karo pelyo. Pao lumwa pyuo dusa nambana kingi ketae pyambuo lakando nyere ingilyamo.
Yake panda dokona api mende nambana lao karase? Embakoiki ingilyamo. Isa yuu dakena namba karapunu dokopa embapako angingyuo karo.
Nambana suu pingipi dee yongope poraya nara ramo dokopa Anatu doko nambana porainya renge ingilyamo. Anatu nambapa kararamo dokopa namba sikya pirasa pira. Mendeme yangyuo yano piramo kararonde daalamo.
Kinyi, enda akalipi emba yaki nyeraminyi dupwa kumuo parami ingyaramopa lapome embapa mondo lao au pyuo kara naraminyi dupwa embamekokwa sinyi nembo karare.
Dopa pyuo karena lao namba range doko Anatu embapa lungwa lungwa pyuo kararo doko keyange lao soo nyuo karo. Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa namba kyawa minyaramopa banya yulu pilyamo dupwa polo lao kararo.

























































































































































Isaraele Wambunya Iso Karenge embame namwana pii soo karape. Emba aŋala dupwana kyawa ingyuo karenge dokome
emba Eporaime rarape Benjamenena rarape Manasana rarape dusipa keta epo lasaka pyuo panape. Embena porai renge namwa lasaka pyuo epo namwa pyuonyepe.
Anatu embame namwa range sukusa nyepe. Embena sakame kumungi renge doko lasaka pirinyi dokopa namwa kyawa minyinyale.
Anatu Porai Wakasa doko embame yuu akipare embena wambunya ateŋa doko soo imbumi kumuo kararese?
Embame kondange renge doko nenge ingyuo nalapa lao jilini. Ee ipwange kenda doko penge kapo dokona sero simbwapala ipwa ingyuo nalapa letene.
Namwana parali maki dupwame namwana yuu doko yanda pyuo nyinya lao panda maiyuo kaelene. Yanda pimwai dupwame namwa kando pii mora nyuo giyalya giyana pilyaminyi.
Anatu Porai Wakasa dokome namwa range sukusa nyepe. Embame sakame kumungi renge doko lasaka pirinyi dokopa namwa kyawa minyinyale.
Wamba dokopa embame isa girapo mende yuu Isipi dokona nyepala minyuo epepya. Dopa pipala rara wakale dupwa pyao ralinyi karapala dokopa isa doko nakamana yuu dokona wara pinyi palyipya.
Embame andara panda doko panda pyuo renge pinyi nembeepya. Baa pingi kamame koko pao andapala angi dokome yuu peparae minyarambu nyiya.
Isa girapo doko ando pangwapala isa imambu dokome yuu kyau doko pau lao sembeya. Wangya pangepe dokome mee isa ama londe dupwa rau lanyi pyambuya.
Wangya pangepe pyao panguyamo dokome nanesa pao ipwa kota pete andake Metitaraniane lenge doko kando nyuo dee ipwa Yuporisa lenge nanesa epeya dokona kando nyuo pao suu lao piya.
Akipamo embame kame pirukarenge doko lalyinyi retelepe? Wambu peparae kata papirami dupwame kandapala isa girapo jingi waa lyuo nyerami ingilyamo.
Isa girapo doko mena rae lengeme kalyuo pyarakwaminyi dokopa wii saape mee dokome naopelyaminyi.
Anatu Porai Wakasa doko embame namwa kame soo kaeya napipi. Yake dorena karo kandanyi malyo kandapala namwa embena wambu dupwa pyuo nyepe.
Namwa embame isa girapo ingyuo wara piinyi palyipya dupwa nyisala ipu. Namwa isa girapo ene nyaŋa dopale doko embame minyuo ando porainyi pyambui.
Namwana yanda pimwai dupwame pyakepo isarena yangeyami kande dokopa embame imbu singi manjo kandapala nakama randa maiyuo kokwa sinyi nembape.
Namwa emba rangeme embena wambu lao rombo palyuo nyiinyi dokome range nyiso kando kyawa minyuo karape. Embame namwa ando porai inginyi pyambui kande.
Namwa emba deeko yaki nyuo neta paa narama. Namwa lete karalapa lao pirinyipa namwame embena kingi lakando kararama.
Kamongo Anatu Porai Wakasa dokome namwa range sukusa nyepe. Embena sakame kumungi renge doko lasaka pirinyi dokopa namwa kyawa minyinyale.













































Anatu Porai Wakasa doko embena tembole anda doko namba mona nyilyu.
Mona nyepala namba dokona karapuli lao suu pyale pyale karo. Nambana yongo mona dolapona piso renge kuiyuo Anatu lete karenge dokona lao raemaiyuo wee romope lao karo.
Kamongo emba Porai Wakasa nambana kiŋi dee nambana Anatu. Yaka mambiname dupwame nakamana yakanedupwa embena mena pyao kiso jingi kana pyare lenge dokona repeta anda pyuo retapala rapu pyuo petenge.
Wambu embena tembole anda palyuo karo piso pingi dupwame embapa rae maipala yuu peparae kenane pyao lakandenge.
Wambu dupwa emba keta porai renge nyepala yuukyau Sayone dokona panya rae wakasa maiyuo karaminyi.
Yuu pau lama lama ketange pyasi kingi Baka lenge dokona yalo pelyaminyi dokopa ipwa guu lanyi pyakamenge. Apu epa nange mange dokopa wambo epapala pete kuki malu simusae pingi.
Nakama pao dokopa ando poraiyuo penge. Nakama mee bange anatuŋu letaminyi dupwa nyuo isa palyuo Anatu mupwa doko yuu Sayone dokona kandarami.
Kamongo Anatu Porai Wakasa dokome nambana ateŋa pii doko soo karape. Jekopena Anatu embame sepe.
Anatu embame namwana kiŋi rombo palyakaene doko elyape keta pisakape.
Yuu gii mendakiembena tembole anda pao pisiru doko angingyuo papala yuu gii taosande nembo yuu wakalena mee kata papyuo kararo dusipa mee ingyuo pelyamo. Yulu koo pinginya anda dupwana kara nao nambana Anatunya anda kambu konandawamedokona karapuli yaka lao suu pilyu.
Kamongo doko baa namwana konambe ingyuo karo kiŋi neta renge ingyuo karenge. Baame namwa elyape keta piso anjiki pyuo namwa nyuo ketae pyambuo karenge. Baame wambu lapo rolae pyuo karenge dupwa bange keyange mainya kata rokwakami nange.
Anatu Porai Wakasa doko, wambu lapome emba kapa ingingi laosuu pilyaminyi dupwa rae maiyuo kararami ingilyamo.
































Yuu kyau poo pyasi dokona Kamongome banya yuu taone andake wasiya.
Isaraele dokona yuu wakale wakale singi dupwa nyuo isa palyuo Anatumi Jerusaleme doko mona wakasaretenge.
Wambu Anatunya taone andake dokona palaminyi dupwa Anatumi yulu keyange pipa pipa pyakalyamo doko selapape.
Nambapa kamba laa naminyi yuu dupwa yaka laronopa Isipi Bapilonepa opetae yaka laro ingilyamo. Pilisitia Taiya dee Itiopia wambu dusipa Jerusaleme dopakaleko ingilyamo laro.
Jerusaleme doko wambu rara wakale wakale peparaena ingilyamo lao Anatu Porai Wakasa dokome Jerusaleme doko porainyi pyambwara, larami.
Kamongo baame wambu rara peparaena yaka lao kingi pepa pyao nakama peparae yuu Jerusaleme rangeŋe lao retara.
Wambu peparae pyakalyuo pyao dopa laokyaponga pilyaminyi. Yuu Jerusaleme dokona renge keyange dupwa peparae sipurenge lao pilyaminyi.



















Kamongo embena mona reto puu penge dokona kenane pyao karalu karo embame yaki nyii nange lao polo lamairu.
Embena mona retenge renge palu palyuo palira. Dee embena yaki nyii nange renge yakena mendeko ingyuo pingi pyao sulu sera doko namba silyu.
Akali nambana rombo palyisi pipa lao kana minyilyu. Nambana kendemande akali Dapitipa
para pyao nyere dupwa kiŋiko ingyuo parami. Embena para pyao nyere wambu keta kiŋinya isingi yulu doko boneŋe sinya lao nyakaro lee kande.
Yake pandana aŋala dupwame keyange pilini dupwana kenane pilyaminyi. Kamongo, embena mondo lao pingi dokona lao pilyaminyi.
Yakena karenge dupwa Kamongo emba yale daa. Aŋala dupwa embapamanda manji nara.
Yake pandana aŋala mupwa dupwa wato lenge dokopa emba ketae nembo lenge. Peparaeme emba mupwa lao suu pyaopako karenge.
Kamongo Anatu Porai Wakasa emba yale mende daa. Yulu peparaena Kamongo emba isa paa nange.
Ipwa kotaporai doko minyuo iso karenge. Kasakole minyuo naro ipupwa lao epenge doko meme pingi.
Koo renge mena poraingi Oreapa lenge doko emba yuu mendaki kalyuo pyao kumasii. Embena porainya renge dokona embena yandapimwai dupwa nyuo anamasi minyii.
Yake doko embena ingyuo silyamo. Dee yuu doko opetaeko. Embame yuupi yuu muu dupwana bange wakale wakale singi dupwape wasii.
Yuu parali dolapo wasiinyi silyamo. Yuu Tapo Emonepa kyau dolapome embena lao rae maiyuo kenane pyakange.
Anemapwae. Emba ama porai renge wakasa palenge. Embena porai renge doko bange mendepa manda manjipa nalyamo.
Embena isingi yulu doko rolae pingi rengepe kote rolae lenge rengepe dolapona ingyuo renge kuiyaro karapyamo silyamo. Embena mona reto pingipi mondo lao pingipi dolapo yulu pipi dokona panelyamo.
Emba mona joo misi kenane pyao kingi wapambupi lakandenge wambu nakama rae maiyuo paramilyamo. Nakama embena anjiki pingi renge eŋa pasi dokona moko ware pyuo karenge.
Emba karenge dokona lao nakama rae maiyuo pao yuu kwuanyi serenge. Dopa pyuo embame keyange pingi dupwana lakandenge.
Emba keta renge kuiyuo namwa anamasi minyingi renge jingi. Embena mona retenge dokona moko karo anamasi minyingi.
Kamongo embame namwa kyawa minyara doko rombo palyiipya. Emba doko Isaraele wambunya Anatu Poo Pyasi dokome namwa kiŋi doko jiipya.
Yuu wamba embena kendemande akali yulu mondomondo lao pingi dupwa keta pii repa repa pyuo lao, Nambame ami yanda pyuo mupwa ingiyamo doko kiŋinya kyawa rarange maiyuo namba wambu kareyaminyi dokona rombo palyiyu doko kiŋinya petenge isa doko maiyu.
Nambame nambana kendemande akali Dapiti baa mamba poo pyasi dokome kiso kiŋi ingyuo karena lao piyu.
Nambana porai renge dokome baapa yuu peparae role pyao karara. Nambana porai dokome baa porai sinyi pyambwara.
Banya yanda pimwai dupwame baa randa mainya pyuo lisa pirami. Koo pingi dupwame baa kapa pyuo anamasi minya narami.
Banya yanda pimwai dupwa kalyuo inji ranji pinyi nembapala baapa epe kanda nalyaminyi dupwa pyao kumakaro.
Nambame baa mona wakasa reto baa keta renge renge soo kararo. Nambamebanya yanda pimwai anamasi minyingi inginyi pyambwaro.
Nambamebanya isingi yulu doko ipwa kota andake Metitaraniane pete lenge dokona piso renge kuiyapala pao ipwa Yuporisa dorena ando nyimbunya lao piru.
Dokopa baame namba kando, Emba nambana rakange dee nambana Anatuŋu, lara. Emba nambana kyawa minyingi dee nambana lete wai pyao nyingi akali karene, lara.
Nambame baa wane mupwasa ingyaro. Kiŋi doloma peparae manda manji nao ketaele karena lao piru.
Nambame baapa pii lalu lao leyo lao suu pyao kararo. Deelao kana minyiyambano doko sulu soo sera.
Baa keta piso kiŋi para pyao paraminyi dokona mendeko kiŋi ingyapa pira. Banya isingi yulu doko yake doko pingi pyaro karamo dopako ingyuo puu para.
Dopa pyuo paramopape banya para pyao nyeramo dupwame nambana mawa pii minya nao kamba lapala nambana yulu katape singi dokona paa napala
mata joo karapala nambana mana pii laronuli pyuo moko minyuo paa narami ramo
doko nakamana koo dupwana lao randadokome peponame ingyuo pyaro. Nambame nakamana kyai pirami dupwana randadokome isareme ingyuo kisaro.
Dopa pirunupape nambame Dapitipamona retenge kata doko rokwa napala baapa pii mende lalu lao leyo dokonaisa nemba naroko.
Nambame baapa kana minyuo lalu lao leyono doko yala naowape dee pii lalu lao leyono dupwana mendepe nyuo alowa pyuowape pii naro.
Nambana kingi poo pyasi dokona lao yuu gii mendakisa leyo doko yuu peparaena ingyuo pena lao lalu lao leyonosa piya. Doko Dapitipa kyambo ingyuo pena lao pii naro.
Yuu peparae banya para pyao pyaramo dupwa rembe naa naramopa banya kiŋi yulu doko nambana lenge kambu dokona neta rao karamo dopale ingyuo soo puu para.
Dopako pyuo kana doko yake dokona rao karalu karengeŋe lao panenge doko suu pyao banya isingi yulu doko pano sera.
Dakepa kiŋi emba range rombo palyii dokona lao emba baa mata maipala yaki nyuo imbwualene.
Embena kendemande akali kiŋi dokopa kana minyuo pii lalu lao leene doko mee inginyi nembee. Embame kiŋinya kyawa rarange doko yuunya kupinyi yaki nyipisa mee yuu parapala kwaelyamo.
Embame banya taone dokona kame porai doko pyao lalyanyi nembee. Dopa pipala banya anda porai dupwa pyao kokwa sii.
Wambu baa repetale kata pumi dupwame banya bange dupwa waa nyuo kaelyaminyi. Banya parali maki dupwame peparae baako kando giyalya giyana pilyaminyi.
Embame banya yanda pimwaimi baa pyao anamena lao kae. Nakamana monarename rae mainyipyambwakamii.
Embame banya yanda kakupi dupwa nyuo nenge kara nange ingyanyi pyambwapinyisa yanda angi dokona baa anamasi minyilyaminyi.
Embame baa kiŋi ingyuo kara nanale lao nyuo isa palyapisa banya isingi yulu doko otelyamo.
Embame baa banya yuu gii oto emapa napyamopa kanya kapwa pyuo minyuo pyaminyisa baa elyako nyilyamo.
O Kamongo, emba yuu peparae yalu pyuo karalu kararese? Yuu akipare embena imbu singi doko isare ingyuo rao kararamo kararese?
Kamongo embame akali dupwa yuu malu kararaminde daa lamo doko suu pyao karape. Embame namwa wasiinyipape namwa kumungi dokona ingyuo pelyamo laosuu pyaowako karape.
Api mendeme kuma nao mee karalu kararase? Apa pyuo malu anda paa naro lao range porayapala karalu kararamisi?
Kamongo embame baa mona retalu reto reteene doko anja peyape? Embena lalu lao lenge pii Dapitipa leyambinyi dupwa anja silyase?
Kamongo namba embena kendemande kandale doko kame soo kaeya napipi. Dopande pyuo kilya kando lalyaminyi lao sowako karape. Namba wambu Anatu suu pyaa nange dupwa peparaeme kaeya nao elya kendape dupwa jiminyi silyamo.
Kamongo, embena yanda pimwai dupwame embena rombo palyisi kiŋi doko kilya kando anja mendasa para dupwa mee lao nembowakopelyaminyi.
Kamongona kingi doko lakando karalu karamanadoko.

Kamongo emba yuu peparae namwanaanda angingyuo karenge.
Yuu kyau dupwa wasapa nao karowape dee yuu muu peparae ingyalana karowape Anatu emba letena renge palyuo Anatu ingyuo karalu karengepya. Dokoko Anatu ingyuo karo puu parepya.
Emba akali dupwa siyamo nyiinyi mare dokona range pao sinya leepya. Embame dee range alowa pyuo yuu inginyi pyambuipya.
Ee kana taosande dupwa embame kandelene dokopa mee yuu gii mendaki ingingipya. Kwuaka yuu gii pupya kandapi dopale ingingipya. Yuu gii mee kukwamuu dopale ingingipya.
Embame akalinya karenge gii doko pyarapanyi nembengepya. Kumulyaminyisa karenge gii dolapo mee kombeyame ingingipya. Nakama rambinya pipyae raiya doko mee yangama kondalamuli pyuo andarekara nao kumuo pengepya.
Nakama isa jinginya mendeke yangama dokopa rao pee lapala alemanji olo kope lao kumunginyili pyuo penge.
Embena imbu singi dokome namwa pyao kokwa sinyi nembapyamo karamano. Embena imbu singi wakasa nyipisa namwa pako karamano.
Embame namwana koo dupwa kapa kandanyi nembo karene. Namwana koo yalu pyuo pilyamano dupwa kapa kanda nare ingya nalyamo.
Namwa lete karenge renge doko embena imbu singi dokome andare kara nange. Namwa mee yuu kanda pele pele pipala pengelamo.
Ee kana akalisakao pao akalisa yanda ipingi iki dusipa angi karamano. Kararama ingilyamo dee namwa porai ingyuo kararamande ramo doko ee kana akalisa mange lama ingyuo kararama ingyara. Dopa pyuo kararamanopape dolapona angi mende ingya napala mona nembengepe dee randape dupwanako mapyaramo kararamalyamo. Dopa pipala andare kara nao otarama ingilyamo.
Emba dopa pyuo renge palyuo imbwualene lao angi apimi soo pakana palyuo silyase? Embena pakao imbwange renge minyuo epenge doko apimi pakame kumapala soo otengese?
Yuu gii langa andare see naralyamo lao mana langirinyipa mona palenge akali ingyuo soo manjo karamwali yaka.
Yuu gii akipare embena imbu singi doko mee serase? O Kamongo, embena kendemande dupwa kando sakao karape.
Yangama peparaena embena mona reto karalu karenge renge dokome pakapyakape. Dokopa kenane pyao raeme kumuo karalu kararama ingilyamo.
Namwana ee kana randa nyepala monarena londeta ingyuo kendao karalu kareyama kande dokona suu pyao rae maingi renge doko dopale manda manjo jepe.
Namwa embena kendemande dupwame embenayulu doko porainya renge kuiyuo pirinyipa kandenale. Namwana jingi parape dupwame embena neta rengena yulu porai doko kandenale lao piri.
Namwana Kamongo Anatu embena elyape renge doko namwa keta palena lapala pirama laramano dupwa peparaena kapa palyinyi pyambwakape.
Wambu mende Kamongome kyawa minyinya lao para ramo dee wambu mende Anatunya arapu porai renge palenge dokona panao mee karo pira ramo dokome Kamongo kando lamaiyuo,
Embame nambana kyawa lete nyingipi dee konambena mendeke ingyuo karene dokona nambana Anatuŋu namba emba keta pyamalyuo karo, lara.
Baame emba yulu koo kandapa nao yalu pyuo seramo dokona randa nyere dupwape dee anga renge koo wambu pyao kuma singi dupwanape emba kyawa minyuo karara.
Emba banya arapu dokona kolame yakane yambe pyalamuli pyuo lanyuo papira. Baame emba kyawa minyuo reto kararamo kapa karare. Baame banya reto yaki nyii nao pyuo karenge renge dokome pyuo emba kyawa minyara.
Emba kukwa dokopa randa jerami lao paka renge nyuowape dee korakama dokopa pyarami lao suu pyaowape
dee kukwa anga yakane koo kisaramopa koo renge dupwame yuu yangaramo dokopa emba pyao kumakara lyamo laope dusipana pako kara napipi.
Wambu dupwame emba kararene dusa wambu taosande malu pyao kuma soo eparaminyipape emba mee mondo lao karo epare ingyara.
Kopetame pingidupwa apa pyuo koo keta palyuo randa nyilyaminyi lao kando soo karare.
Embame Kamongo Ama Ketae doko embena konambe ingyaro karamo lao sepala wane nyaŋana mendeke ingyuo karapinyi pilyamo.
Dokona randa andake mendeme emba isa pyao palya nara. Koo keta palirili yulu randa dokona mende embena anda kambusa epa nara.
Emba parene kata dupwana Anatumi banya aŋala dupwa emba rapu pyakana lao jera.
Embena kimbu doko kaname isa pyaa nana lao nakamana kingi kapena emba ketae reto nyerami.
Embame mena laene wambu nenge dupwape dee kau wambu pingipi dupwa pyao rambetaku pyarene mee kimbumi nara ingilyamo.
Anatumi lao dokopa nambame namba mona retarami dupwa nyiso dee namba Kamongo doko karene lao soo karaminyi dupwa kyawa lete nyero, letamo.
Nambame nyisape lao kyakale laraminyi dokopa isingi pii yano doko pyakamiro. Nakamba randa nyepala pisiraminyi dokopa kaeya nao role pyao piso nenge rekya lao nyepala dokopa nakama lakando kingi ketae pyambuo piro.
Nambame nakama angi kyawa minyuo karo. Nakama lapo yano pyao mailyuŋu lao dokopa karo yaku nao kumunya laro ingilyamo.
















Kamongo baa kiŋi. Banya kingi kamame nyilyingi dokomepe porainya renge dokomepe range komau ingyuo pee pipala karamo. Isa yuu dake reteyamuli pyuo porai wakasa ingyuo romo pii nao sulu soo singi.
O Kamongo, embena kiŋinya yulu doko yuu kanda soo wasiyamo dokopa piso pao porai ingyuo sulu singi. Yuu gii ene kanda sepa nayamo dokopa emba mee karalu karenge.
Kamongo, ipwa kota andake ama kyuwa dokona singi dokome ama kasakole minyuo pii lao gono gono lenge.
Ipwa kota ama kasakole minyuo gono gono lao porai ingyuo silyamopape Kamongobaa yake panda dokona mupwa karo ama porai wakasa ingyuo iso karenge.
Kamongo, embena lowa dupwa yuu peparae sulu singi. Embena tembole anda doko ama poo pyasi wakasa ingyuo karalu karara.























Nakama ipupwa. Kamongo lakandamana. Anatumi namwa kyawa minyuo karenge dokonasuu pyao rae maiyuo kenane pyamana.
Namwa banya lenge kambu silyamo dokona karo sangyu lao rae maiyuo kenane rae wakasa maiyuo pingi dupwame pyao baa lakandamana.
Kamongo baa doko Anatu porai ingyuo karamo. Dokona lao baa kiŋi mupwa isame bange wasisi anatuŋu lao dupwa nyuo isa palyuo karamo.
Kananda koko dorenapiso yuu kyau ama ketae dokona pao baame yuu muu dupwa peparae iso karamo.
Yuupi ipwa kotape baame wasiya dolapo range iso karamo.
Namwa wapambu pii pyaro piso Kamongo namwa wasiyamo dokolakandamana. Ipupwa.
Baa namwana Anatu. Namwa banya wambu mena sipisipi dopale baame nenge joo rapu pyuo karamo. Epapu dokonamwa peparae baame apa letamo lao semana.
Yuu muiyane dokona yuu kingi Meripa lengepe yuu Masa lengepe dolapona nakamana rakange kyawa dupwa mona kana pokapala Anatupa male male lao kamba lao kareyami kande dokonakopalyuo pii nalapape.
Nakamame nambana yulu piyunu doko kando karapalape namba alyungu mambu ingyuo minyuo kui leyami.
Ee kana akalisa kisima namba imbu singi nyakayami. Nambame endakalipi yuu peparae kopetame suu pyao karenge, leyo. Nambana nenge rambo lao piso karo pingi doko kamba lao mana nyii nalu nao nayami.
Namba imbu singi nyepala lalu lao lao, Nambamoo pipya koo sela epa narami, leyo.
Kamongo kando kenane enenge pyalapape. Yuu muu peparaena wambu dupwame Kamongona lao kenane pyalapape.
Kamongo kando kenane pyao banya kingi ketae pyambuo karalapape. Baame namwa kyawa lete nyiyamo waili pii keyange doko yuu peparae polo lamaiyuo karalapape.
Banya neta renge wakasa ingyuo karamo dokona lao wambu rara peparae dupwa polo lamaiyuo karalapape. Banya yulu porai wakasa wambu peparae keta piyamo dokona lao polo lamaiyuoko karalapape.
Kamongo andake wakasa doko kamame ketaele lakandapengele ingilyamo. Isa bange kingimi wasisi dupwa isa palyuo baa kamame ulipili ingyuo kingi minyalyuo ketae pyambwapenge ingilyamo.
Wambu yuu liti wakale dupwa kingimi wasisi bange dupwa anatuŋu lao lakandenge. Dee Kamongo dokome yake pandape bange peparae silyamo dupwa wasiya.
Banya neta renge yulupi kingi kamame nyilyingi dokope baa keta soo awali lenge. Banya porainya rengepe keyange rengepe banya tembole anda dokona soo simbwualyamo.
Isa wambu peparaeme Kamongo lakandalapa. Banya porainya rengepe neta renge yulupi dolapona lao suu pyao lakando karalapape.
Kamongona kingi keyange ketae palenge doko lakandalapa. Bange Anatu mee maingi mende minyuo banya tembole anda dokona epo karalapape.
Nakama mona yapasi dokome Kamongona lenge kambusa wapambu pii pyaro piso lakandalapape. Wambu peparaeme baa mupwa lao suu pyao walu lao pakao karalapape.
Kamongo doko kiŋiŋi lao wambu yuu muu ree lao peparae lamailapape. Isa yuu dake reteyamuli pyuo porai wakasa ingyuo romo pii nao sulu soo silyamo. Banya kote wambu pipa lara doko rolae ingyuo lara.
Yake yuupi dupwa rae maiyuo sinya. Ipwa kotape ipwa kotana bange ama rara wakale wakale silyamo dupwape poro paro lena.
Ee yuupi dupwana bange silyamo dupwape rae maiyuo sinya. Kamongo isa yuu dakena kiŋi ingyuo isala epara dokopa
imwa kuki dupwana isa karenge dupwame rae maiyuo karo pii poraiyuo larami. Baame isa wambu dupwa iso karo rolae dokona palyuo yapalya yapana pira.






























Yuu muu peparaena wambu dupwame Kamongo kando kenane pyao karalapape.
Mona pyakalyuo pyao kenane lapo pyao rae maiyuo Kamongo lakando karalapape.
Kamongo doko Anatuŋu lao kame see nalapape. Baame namwa wasiya dokona namwa banya wambu ingilyamo. Namwa banya sipisipi dopale.
Tembole anda kambu dokona sangyu lao parami. Andakare kolando dokopa Anatunya kingi minyalyuo baa kando sangyu lao lakando pupwape.
Kamongo doko keyange. Baame namwa kulisa palyuo mona reto karalu karenge. Baame namwa yaki nyii nao namwa keta keyangeko pyuo puu penge.





































Nambana imambu dokome Kamongo doko lakandarowale. Nambana yongope suu pingi imambupi peparaeme banya kingi poo pyasi doko lakandarowale.
Baa anjiki pingi doko kame soo kaeya nao nambana imambu dokome Kamongo baa lakandaro.
Baame nambana koo dupwa peparae nyuo anamasi minyuo baame nambana anga yakane peparae pyuo lete nyuo mee ingingi.
Baame nambamalu anda pasarene lao minyaro karenge. Baame sakame kumapala mona reto nyisingi.
Baame bange keyange renge dupwa namba keta palyuo simbwange. Dokona namba enenge ingyuo karo yaka kambe yongo nyuo kararo.
Kamongome mondo lao yapalyuo wambu koo keta palyuo isingi dupwana lao rolo nakama nyelana pyuo karenge dokoko maingi.
Baame yulu lao masiyamo dusipa Mosese keta paneya. Dopa pyuo Isaraele wambu dupwame banya yulu porai dupwa kandena lao piya.
Kamongo doko baame sakame kumuo mona reto pingi. Baa waiya lao imbwa nao mona reto puupenge. Renge doko baa keta palyuo pyoko pyoko lenge.
Baame lao nembo pyalana pyuo karalu karo pii nange. Baa imbu singi nyuo karalu kara nange.
Namwa randa nyeramali dokona baame randa jii nange. Namwana koo kyai pyuo pingi dupwana yano nyeramali dokona yano pyara nange.
Wambumi baa ketae pyambungi dupwa keta banya mona retenge renge doko isa yuu dakena piso yake sungange dopale ingyuo mona retenge.
Neta epenge dokona piso pao neta yalyingi doko londesa dopale baame namwana koo dupwa nyuo kame soo nyuo nembakange.
Rakangeme banya ikinyingi kando yako yako lao anjiki pinginyili pyuo Kamongome wambu baa ketae pyambungi dupwa pipya anjiki pingi.
Baamenamwa akimi wasisi karaminyi lao soo karamo. Namwa sinjimu dokome wasisikande lao soo karamo.
Akali doko banya lete karene doko isoko dopakale. Baa ando karo epaleta isa jingi apu epelyamo dokopa elyape ingyuo lyuo panyi pilyamo dokopa loo lao pingi dopale.
Enakana porambaiye dokona minyilyamo dokopa soo neta penge. Mendeme dee kamba silyamo kanda nange.
Dopa pyuo pelyamopape wambu baa kingi ketaepyambuo lakandaraminyi dupwa Kamongona mona retenge doko nakama keta sulu soo singi.
Banya kana minyuo lalu lao lenge doko minyaro karengepe dee banya mawa pii yaki nyii nao rape rape lao minyingipi dupwana para pyao nyerami dupwa keta banya keyange renge soo puu pao penge.
Kamongome baa yake panda dokona kiŋi ingyuo pisipala wambu peparae rapu pyuo karamo.
Nakama aŋala porai banya mawa pii rape rape lao piraminyi dupwape baa laramopii doko waa lao kale yukupala soo pisiraminyi dupwapeme Kamongo doko lakandarami.
Nakama yake dokona karenge banya kendemande dupwa baame pimili lao suu pyapyamo pilyaminyi dupwame Kamongo doko lakandarami.
Yuu baame isilyamo dupwa peparaena kata papingi bange peparae Kamongo wasiyamo dupwame baa lakandarami. Dopako pyuo namba Kamongodoko lakandarowale.
Nambana imambu dokome Kamongo lakandape. O Kamongo, nambana Anatu, emba kamame mupwa wakasa. Kingi ketae pao kingi neta renge ingyuo karo pingi dopale emba ketako paleta karenge.
Emba kendali dokome komauna mendeke ingyuo pee piro karenge. Yake doko komau anda ingyuo kawake lapala karene. Ipwa ketae dorena embena anda pisi karenge kandale. Kopa dupwa mena ose ipyuo penge uliuli ingyaro karo porambaiye dokome papake ingyaro karena lao piso pengepya.
<range>
Porambaiye doko embena pii minyuo papingi ingyuo yuu pele dupwa embena kendemande ingyuo pingipya.
Embame yuu dake puu rombo minyuo susa piinyi dokopa walu walu laa naraŋa lao poraiyuo pyuokonda piinyi piro karamo.
Embame ipwa kota kameya dokome komau londe dopale inginyi pyambwapala yuu kyau dupwa yambe pyaoreteepya.
Embame ipwa poraiyuo pyalana pyuo leene dokopa waiya lao kata nyingipya. Embame pii dopa pinya lao pii ketae palyuo leene dokopa nakama aopa pengepya.
Yuu kyau dupwana lupyuo epo lama dorenaparaŋa lao panda retakaminyi dokona pengepya.
Embame ipwa doko banya kata liti pyuo pona dokona pena lee dokome dee yalo epo yuu dupwa yambe pyaa nangepya.
Embame yuu pau lama lama dupwana ipwa guu lanyi pyakamao dee ipwa pona dupwa yuu kyau kuki dupwana piso lupyuo pena leepya.
Wii saape rae lenge dupwame nao mena donge rae lenge dupwa ipwa nano pira dokopa narami lao pyakamii.
Ipwa repeta isa dupwana yaka dupwa nakambana anda pipala pii lao lyuo karenge.
Embame yake panda piso yuu kyau dupwana apunda peeyo isa yuu dake elya pyuo kalya pinyi nembelene.
Embame mena bulamakao dupwa isako doko narami lao andanyi pyambwakamingi. Nenge dupwa wambu dupwana rangeme wara pyuo narami lao pyakamingi.
Rae maiyuo kararami lao ipwa waene maiyuo gii mona paliramo karena lao olipi ipwange maiyuo lopa nao kararami lao borete maiyuo pingipya.
Kamongo rangena isa sita yuu Lepanone dokona wara piyamo dupwame apunda malu mandenge.
Yaka dupwame isa dupwana epo nakamana anda pingi. Luu isa yale dupwana yaka kameya mende soko lenge nakamana anda pingi.
Mena meme rae lenge dupwa yuu kyau manda dupwana palenge. Mena kuki saa yale dupwa yuu kana lapu lapu rondo dupwana yalu pyuo palenge.
Embame kana dokome ee kana minyinya lao wasiipya. Neta anda paramo doko soo otenge.
Embame yuu kwuange gii reteenesa kwualyamo dokopa mena suwa rae lenge dupwa neta kata nyuo epo pengepya.
Mena laene ene anda anda dupwa nuli nao nenge Anatumi mailyamo dupwana pao dokopa pii porakai lao papingipya.
Neta pyakaelyamo dokopa nakamana anda palenge dupwana kapu kyuo pao palyuo singipya.
Dokopa enakana wambu dupwa nakamana yulu pela penge. Pao pyuo karo alemanji ingingi.
Kamongo, embame bange malu mee soo kaeyo wasiipya. Apa pyuo mona palyakondali pipala wasiipi? lao suu pyao karo. Isa yuu dake embame wasiinyi dupwameko simbwaro silyamo.
Kota pete ruŋupaŋu pyuo andake waso reteenesa oo bangepe lee renge kuki epengepe dupwa mendeme yaka lao sukusa parami ingya nalyamo.
Sipu duwpa ketae papyuo karenge dupwana koko kau oma reeko mende Lipaitene lengedoko ipwa kota dokona male lao sinya lao wasii.
Nakama nenge yano pilyamo dokopa embame jingi kandale jere lao masingi.
Embame nenge rapa rapa pyuo mailini dokopa nakama nyuo nao sikya pingi.
Embame nakama yaki nyilini dokopa pakame kumuo karenge. Ŋee ŋaape singi nyokonyapinyi dokopa nakama kumulyaminyi. Kumapala yuu epeyami dokona dee range pao singi.
Dopa pipinyipape embame porambaiye maipinyi dokopa lee rao karaminyi. Embame isa yuu dake letena renge enenge maingi.
Kamongona neta renge yulu doko sulu sinya. Kamongo banya bange wasiyamo dupwana lao rae maiyuo karenale.
Baame isa yuu dake kandapyamo dokopainju ingyuo pyuku pyuku lala lala pelyamo. Yuu kyau dupwa minyandapyamo dokopa isare kyau lao nyilyilyamo.
Namba Kamongo dokona lao kenane pyao karalu kararo. Namba kararo yuu gii dusipana nambana Anatulakando kenane pyaro.
Nambana rae maingi renge doko baa keta epenge dokona nambame kenane pyaro dokome baa epe sinyale.
Wambu yulu koo pingi dupwa isa yuu dakena koo keta palyuo penale. Yulu koo pingi wambu dupwa dee pii nanale. Nambana imambu dokome Kamongodoko lakandape. Banya kingi doko minyalyuo lakando palena.
Kamongo baapa ange lao dokopa baa andake wakasale ingyuo karo yulu pipyamo dupwa kamame yamarangunyi nembo ingyuo silyamo lao yuu muu dupwana dopa pyuo karamoŋo sinya lao lamaimana.
Kenane dokome pyao dokopa yulu keyange pipyamo dupwana lamaiyuo baa lakandamanale.
Namwa banya ingyuo karamano dokona lao rae maimanale. Dopa pyuo wambu baa kingipi wapambupi lakao baa kingi letaminyi dupwa rae maiyuo penale.
Kamongo karamo dokona nyisinya lao pupwape. Papala banya kingi lakando karalu karalapape.
Nakama banya kendemande Aporakamena para pyao nyisi dupwa karaminyi. Nakama Jekope Anatumi rombo palyiyamo dokona para pyao nyiyamo dupwakaraminyiko. Dokona Anatunya yulu keyange pyuo wambumi pii nange yulu piyamopape kote rolae leyamopape dupwana doko mende kande lao suu pyao karalapape.
<range>
Kamongo doko namwana Anatuŋu. Banya mawa pii dupwa wambu yuu muu ree lao palaminyi dupwa peparaena ingyuo silyamo.
Banya pii lao kana minyalamo doko leyoŋo lao suupyao karara ingingi. Rengya para pyao puu paramo dupwanape banya lalu lao lenge pii doko ama kame see nao suu pyaro karalu karara.
Aporakamepa keta piruŋu lao kana minyuo leyamo doko kame see nao suu pyaro karara. Aisake keta lalu lao leyamo dokona dopako pira.
Dopako pyuo Kamongome Jekope keta piruŋu lao kana minyiyamo pii doko kulisa ingyo sulu sera.
Baame lao, Nambame yuu Kenanedoko nyuo jeroŋo. Jeroŋo dokopa nakama rangena ingyuo yuu nyuo palyuo kararami, leya.
Anatunya wambu kukilama yuu Kenane dokona mee upunili ingyuo peyami.
Pao dokopa yuu pandape wambu palenge dupwa nyinyi peyo dee yuu kiŋi wakalemana isingi dupwa nyuo yalo peyami.
Dopa pyuo peyaminyipape nakama Anatumi koo keta mapya naya. Anatu baame kiŋi dupwa repe repe lamaiyuo, Nambana yapalyuo nyisi kendemande dupwa meeelya pyuo karakana. Nambana poropeta akali dupwa minyandaka nalapape, leya. Dopa lao banya wambu dupwa kyawa minyuo kareya.
<range>
Anatumi lopo andake mende Isaraele wambu dupwa kiso maipala nenge dupwalembeke nyinyi nembeya.
Dopa piyamopape baame akali mende kingi Josepe lengende maipala kana ropo pyao nyiyami dokome wambo panda rapa rapa pyakamyuo karara lao piyasa piya.
Banya kimbu dokona puu saneme poraiyuo kiimbuo banya mange dokona puu sane dokome puu karo piyami.
Piyaminyipa dopa piraŋa lao pyasi paleyamo doko angi pyaka siya. Dopa piraŋa lao leyamo Kamongona pii doko kinyi angi rolae ingyuo peya.
Dokona Isipi kiŋi dokomebaa moko nembeya. Yuu dupwana isingi dokome baa kiiramo nyiya.
Baame banya gapomane yulu mupwape dee yuu litipi dokona mupwa ingyuo iso karenale lao panda maiya.
Maipala baame kiŋinya akali kyawa dupwa pawa palyuo iso karena lao panda maiya. Kiŋinya dopa piri dapa piri lao nyiso lenge akali dupwa baame lamainya lao panda maiya.
Dokopa Jekope yuu Isipi dokona pao palyuo kareya.
Kamongome banya wambu dupwa wane wai kiso nakama yanda pimwai dupwa pipya porai ingyuo karena lao piya.
Kamongome Isipi akali dupwame banya kendemande wambu dupwa pipya epe kanda napala panga silya sana pyuo karena lao piya.
Dopa pipala banya kendemande akali Mosese Eronepa baame rombo palyuo nyiyamo dolapo pena leya.
Nakamame Anatunya yulu ama andake doko pyuo mirakale yulu dupwa yuu Isipi dokona pyuo kareyambi.
Anatu baame yuu doko iminjanyi peyamopape Isipi wambu dupwame doko mende pyaamo lao leyamo dokona palyuo pii nayami.
Baame ipwa dupwa ranjama wai pyapala nakamana oma dupwa pyao kumasinyi nembeya.
Nakamana yuu liti doko mungimi simbwapala kiŋinya anda opetaeko simbuya.
Anatumi wambena dee oto epo simbunya leyamo doko suu pyao yuu liti dokona epo kete piya.
Nakamana yuu dokona apunda epenge kandale doko suu pyao yuu pele pipala randake kapa isa malyiya.
Baame nakamana isa girapope piki isape peparae kokwa sinyi nembeya. Isa dupwa peparae pyao roo pyalya pyana pinyi nembeya.
Baamegoemba mendeme kapa pyuo yaka larami ingya nara dopale dupwa epena lao nyinyi peeya.
Dopa piyasa ee nenge isokope dupwa neyamisa saa raki piso pupya ingiya.
Baame Isipi wambunya ree palu peparaena wane mupwasa dupwa mende neta paa nana lao pyao kumasiya.
Dopa pipala piso Isaraele wambu dupwa neta nyuo nembeya. Nembeyamodokopa nakamame kana kulingi golope nyuo manjo peyami. Nakama mendali anga nyuope pii nao porai ingyuo kareyami.
Isipi wambumi Isaraelewambu dupwa kando pakame kumuyaminyi dokona nakama kala peyaminyi dokoparae maiyami.
Banya wambu keta kopa soo lanyuo pao dee kukwa dokopa isare rao yanga paupau lao lanyuo peya.
Nakamame jinya lao kee leyami dokopa baame yaka kuki dupwa peyakamiya. Baame yake panda rae nenge dupwa nao sikya pinya lao maiya.
Baame kana dokona nyuo karalyapala ipwa guu lanyi peyakamiyasa yuu yando nasi dokona ipwapona wasinyuo epo peya.
Baame banya kendemande akali Aporakameketa pii yalu pyuo lalu lao leyamo doko suu pyao kareya.
Karo baame banya rombo palyisi wambu dupwa nyuo neta nembeya. Nembeyamo dokopa rae maingi kenane dupwa pii ketae palyuo lao pyao peyami.
Baame yuu wakalemana dupwa nyuo maiya. Maipala ee nengepe dokonasiyamo dupwa rombo pyao nyinya leya.
Renge doko banya wambu dupwame banya lowa dupwana kamba laa nao karo mawa pii lasi dupwa minyakao karo pirami lao piya.
















































Kamongo baa elyapeko doko karapyamopa banya mona retenge doko kulisa ingyuo silyamo dokona baa ange lao karamana.
Pii wamba ange lamwa dusipwako nyepala baa lakando dee larami ingilyamo. Nakama baame kyawa lete nyiyamo wambu dee yanda pimwai nenge rekya lao nyiyamo wambupi dupwame baa keyange ingyuo banya monaretenge kulisa ingyuo pelyamo lao lakandapa pyuo kararami.
Nakama dono yuu muu wakalemana neta pyakaenge neta yalyingi donorena dulurenape piso nyuo epeya.
Nakama lapo yuu muiyane kata see nangedokona paeyo karo yuu taonena palyuo kararama lao panya kata koto saka nayamipya.
Dopa pyuo karo nakama lopome kumuo ipwa nano pipala suu pyao kareyami dupwa mende pii naraŋa kae lapala yaki nyuo kaeyamipya.
Dopa pyuo karapala nakama rangena randa nyiyaminyi dokona Kamongome nyisinya lao kyakale leyamisa nyisiyapya.
Baame nakama taone palyuo kararami kata rolae dokona nyuo nembeyapya.
Nakamame Kamongo banya mona reto puu penge dokona baa ange lao dokopa yulu keyange nakama keta pyakamyuo karamo dupwana baa ange lapenge ingilyamo.
Baame ipwa nano pilyamo karelyaminyi dupwa sikya pinyi pyambuo dee lopange dupwa keyange dupwame iki pyasu makaro sinya lenge.
Lapo dupwa iminjingi dokona eŋa paa nayamo sanepuumi kiimbwasi randa nyuo kareyami.
Anatu Porai Wakasa dokonalowa kamba lenge ingyuo dopa pinya dapa pinya lao mana lalamo kata doko yaki nyuo karapala randa nyiyami.
Nakama yulu marakai pipala yongo kisinyi nembeyami. Nakamame isa peyaminyi dokopa mendeme nyisa naya.
Dopa pyuo karapala nakama rangena randa nyiyaminyi dokona Kamongome nyisinya lao kyakale leyamisa nyisiyapya.
Baame iminjo eŋa paa nayamo kareyaminyi dokona piso nyuo epeya. Baame puu sane dupwa pyao rokao sinjimu inginyi nembo nyuo epeya.
Nakamame Kamongo banya mona reto puu penge dokona baa ange lao dokopa yulu keyange nakama keta pyakamyuo karamo dupwana baa ange lapenge ingilyamo.
Baame kambu kana poraimi dowa wasisi dupwa pyao lalyapala aene isa dupwa pyao muu pinyi retenge.
Wambu lapo kopyali ingyuo nakamana koo piyaminyi dokona anga pyao dee randa epeyamo doko yasuko neyami.
Nakama nenge dupwa ipyapala naa napala repeta kumuo panya piyami.
Nakamana randa epeyamo dokona mona randapala Kamongo lamaiyuo nyisinya leyamisa nyisiya.
Banya dopa pyuo pinya lao lamaingi pii dokome pyuo nyepala malu anda palenge dokona pyuo nyiya.
Nakamame Kamongo banya mona reto puu penge dokona baaange lao dokopa yulu keyange nakama keta pyakamyuo karamo dupwana baa ange lapenge ingilyamo.
Nyisiyamo dupwana peparae suu pyao banya kingi lakandelyamano lao dokopa sangyu lao mena pyao kiso maiyuo dee kenane rae maiyuo pingi dupwa pyao kararami.
Wambu lapo ipwa sipu yulu pingi dupwa kota pete dokonako yulu pyuo yole nyuo nao paleyami.
Dupwame Kamongome dopa pyuo yulu andake doko piyande silyamo lao banya kingi mona doko ipwa kotana paleyamo kandeyami.
Baame dopa pinya leyamosa porambaiye andake doko pyaka soo minyapala ipwa kota doko minyuo kasakole minyinyi reteya.
Ipwa sipu dupwa kota petena ketae sepala paleta isa peyamosa kumulyamano lapala mee kikurenge kareyami.
Nakama ipwa biya napala pili lao lukumao sepala nakamana yulu mora petenge renge doko mee inginyi nembeyami.
Nakama rangena randa nyiyaminyi dokona Kamongome nyisinya lao kyakaleleyamisa nyisiyapya.
Baame ipwa kotana raiya pambake doko lambo lao serao dee pete kasakole minyuo pyakalya pyakana pingi doko pyai naopiya.
Ipwa kota lambo lao siyamo dokopa rae maiyami. Nakama epana suu pilyaminyi kipwa kipwa dokona lanyuo epo peeya.
Nakamame Kamongo banya mona reto puu penge dokona baa ange lao dokopa yulu keyange nakama keta pyakamyuo karamo dupwana baa ange lapenge ingilyamo.
Anatunya wambu malu palyuo larami panda dokona baa kamame wakasa ingilyamo dokona lao lamairami. Dopa pyuo dee lita akali wato lenge dupwa pisarami dokona lenge kambu sera dokona karo lakandarami.
Kamongome ipwa pona dupwa sokwao kee maro lao dee guu lenge dupwa pyakalyuo epa nana lao piya.
Baame wambu koo pingi dupwa yuu dokona paleyaminyisa kandapala yuu amenge pingi dupwa nyuo kwaeyo mee ketange pyanyi nembeya.
Baame yuu muiyane dupwa nyuo ipwa pete sinyi pyambuo dee oo lasi dupwa nyuo ipwa guu lanyi peeyo piya.
Baamelopange wambu dupwa yuu dokona yuu nyuo palyuo taone andake palyuo kararami doko pyuo wasinya lao piya.
Nakamame waingi dupwa randa laoisa girapo dupwa wara pyuo piyaminyi dokopa angi ando jingi dupwa kakanapiyamo lyuo nyiyami.
Baame banya wambu dupwa elyape keta pisiyasa wane wai kisiya. Dee nakamana mena bulamakao dupwa wai kiso andakyuo piya.
Wambu Anatunya wambu pyao isa palyuo kilya kandele lao isa nenge kara nange dokome suu leyamisa yasu nao karenge dokopa
Anatu baame nyisu petenge wambu dupwa epe kanda napala yuu muiyane kata see nange dokona ralinyi palyiyasa mee ralo papyuo kareyami.
Baame pendewa mona kondo petenge dupwa kiiramo nyepala ree paludoko mena ingyuo wai kisinya lao andanyi nembeya.
Dokopa rolaepingi dupwame doko kandapala rae mailyaminyipa koo pingi dupwa muu rakaro singi.
Wambu mona palenge dupwame dake doko mende lyamolao suu pyao karena. Dopa pyuo Kamongona kare kare soo mona retenge dokona suu pyapala mona kumuo maiyuo karena.













































Kamongo dokome nambana kamongo doko lamaiyuo, Nambana kingi rolaerename pisa ipu. Embena yanda pimwai ingyuo dupwa nambame nyuo embena kimbu yukuna dokona rambukinyinyi pyambwakaro.
Yuu Sayone dokona piso Kamongome embena kiŋinya yulu doko nyuo andakyanyi pyambwakaro. Dopa pipala embena yanda pimwai dupwa iso karalase lao piru, letamo.
Embame embena yanda pimwai pipya yanda pirinyi dokopa embena wambu dupwame yanda pinya mona kumapala epo yanda pimana larami. Yangama yangama pipyae raeya malu singi dopale ingyuo embena wanyane akali dupwa emba karare dokona eparami.
Kamongome lao, Purisi akali Melekiseteke pyuo kareyamodoko suu pyao emba purisi dopale mee karalu karare. Baame mee epeepe lao yakane ingyuo leyande daa. Pii lalu lao lao reteya, leya.
Kamongo baa embena kingi rolaerename karo baa imbu piramo dokopakiŋi dupwa nyuo isa palyapa pira.
Baame yuu muu dupwana nyuo kyai rolae lao kote lapala yanda pingi yuu dokona wambu malu mee pyao kumasera. Baame kiŋi yuu muu peparaena karaminyi dupwapyao nyuo isa palyara.
Kiŋi dokome kata repeta ipwaepenge dokona kamuo nara. Dopa pyuo paramopa baa porakai wakasa pyapetalende ingyuo karara.





































Emba yeelyo Kamongo. Embena kingi doko iki lakandarama. Namwana kingi doko isa palena. Emba mondo lao pyuo karo mona retalu reto retapinyi dokona lakandarama.
Akipamo wambu yuu muu dupwana peparaeme piso soo, Embena Anatu doko anja karase? letaminyi.
Namwana Anatu doko yake panda karamo. Baame pinya suu pilyamuli pyuo pingi.
Nakamana anatu dupwa kana kulingipi golope dokome wasisi. Nakamame wambunya kingi dokome yeelyo pyuo wasiyami.
Kingimi wasisi dupwa nenge kata singi dokome pii kapa laa nange. Lenge rao karenge dokome kapa pyuo kanda nange.
Nakama kale kata singi dokome pii angi see nange. Gyaa kata singi dokome kapa ai see nange.
Nakama kingi karenge dokome kapa minyanda nange. Moko karenge dokome kapa kata papya nange. Nakama kula kalu lao jaa laowape pii nange.
Wambu mee bange dupwa wasiyaminyi dupwape dee wambu bange dupwa keta mona pyamalyuo karenge dupwa nakama pao mee isa kanape dopale ingyuo pena.
Isaraele wambu dupwa Kamongo doko kapa ingingi lao suu pyalapape. Baame nakama nyiso kyawa minyuo karamo.
Nakama Anatunya purisi akali dupwa Kamongo doko kapa ingingi lao suu pyalapape. Baame nakama nyiso kyawa minyuo karamo.
Baa mupwa lao kingi wapambu lakao karenge wambu dupwame Kamongo doko kapa ingingi lao suu pyalapape. Baame nakama nyiso kyawa minyuo karamo.
Kamongome namwa suu pyao karamo dokome baame namwaelyape keta pisara. Baame Isaraele wambu dupwa elyape keta pisara. Dee Anatunya purisi akali peparae elyape keta pisarako.
Wambupeparae koo epengepe baa ketae pyambungi dupwa baame kapa elyape keta pisara.
Kamongome nakama keta wane wanakepe jinyale. Nakamape dee nakamana wane wanakepe dee dupwana para pyao nyeraminyi dupwa ketajinyaleko.
Yake pandape isa yuupi pyuo wasiyamo Kamongo dokome nakama renge keyange jinyale.
Yake panda doko Kamongonaiki silyamo. Sipyamopape Kamongome isa yuu doko mee akali dupwa keta maiya.
Wambu kumaraminyi dupwame Kamongo baa lakanda narami. Wambu lapo kumungi panda pao palyuo otaraminyi dupwame lakanda naramiko.
Dokona namwa wambu epapu lete petamano dupwame Anatu baa kando sangyu lao dakepape rengyape lao karalu karo kararama. Kamongona kingi doko lakando palena.
Nambana pii sipyamo dokona Kamongo doko mona maiyuo karo. Baame nambana ateŋa lao karapu dupwa silyamo.
Yuu mendepape kaeya nao baa kyakale lapunu yaka lao nambana pii soo karamo.
Kumunginya puu dokome namba nyuo boke bake pyuo kiimbwanyi palyiya. Kumunginya paka renge dokome repeta epo kaeya. Rengya dopa pyuo parondelyamo lao suu pyao paka dokome kumuo kareyo.
Dopa pyuo karapala nambame Kamongo doko kyakale lao poraiyuo piso sokondali pyuo lao, Nyisape, leyo.
Kamongo baa keyange renge palenge dokome sakame kumungi. Namwana Anatu dokome namwa mondo lao suu pyao karenge.
Kamongo baame rangeme kapa nyisarami ingya nange dupwa minyalyingi. Namba koo keta palyuo mona rumbingi kareyo dokopa baame nyisiya.
Kamongome namba kando keyange pilyamo dokona nambanamona doko baa keta yukulyuŋu yukwaro karape.
Kamongome namba kumaro dokona kyawa lete nyiya. Baame ee kwuakao namba pyao isa palyapa nana lao piya.
Dokona lao namba isa wambu palaminyi yuu dokona Kamongona lenge kambu sipyamo dorena role papyuo karo.
Namba kandale doko kwaeyo pao otalyano letono mange dupwanape dee paka renge nyepala api keta pyamalyuo kararo lao suu pingi dokopape baa keta mona yukwaro karalu karenge.
<range>
Kamongo baame nambapa lao yulu keyange pilyamo dokona aki mende banya pipakamiwane lao sepa nalyo.
Nambame ipwa waene doko minyuo epo Kamongome nyisiyamo dokona ange lao mairu ingilyamo.
Banya wambu epo wato larami dokona nambame baa mairu lao kaeyonuli pyuo mairu.
Kamongo banya wambu dokona mende kumungi dokopa baa mona rando karenge.
Kamongo namba embena kendemande kandapi. Nambame anyimi embena yulu pyakao kareyamo dopaleko ingyuo pyuo karo. Embame namba kumaro dokona lete wai pyao nyii kande.
Nambame ange lao emba bange pyao kiso joo dokopa nambana ateŋa pii doko opetae jero ingilyamo.
