Jerusaleme tembole anda kambu dokonape embena wambu wato laraminyi dokonape nambame emba jinya lao kaenge kandale doko jero ingilyamo. Kamongona kingi doko lakando palena.
<range>


Kamongo baa elyapeko doko karapyamopa banya mona retenge doko kulisa ingyuo silyamo dokona baa kando ange lao karamana.
Isaraele wambu dupwa nakamame banya mona retenge doko kulisa sulu sera ingyuo silyamo lena.
Banya purisi akali dupwame dopako lena.
Wambu baa kingi wapambupi lakao lakandelyaminyi dupwa opetaeme banya mona retenge doko kulisa sulu sera ingyuo silyamo lena.
Namba randa nyuo karo Kamongo kyakale leyo yuu gii dokopa baame isingi yano pyakao namba kiiramo nyiya.
Kamongo doko namba role pyao karamo dokona wambumi namba mende pirami dokona pakame kumuo kara naro.
Nambana yanda pimwai dupwa anamasi minyuoisa palirami dokopa nambana Kamongome namba nyisapyasa pilyamo lao kandaro.
Kamongo keta mona pyamalyaro kararamo doko suu pyao wambu keta mona pyamalyaro kararamo doko kapa ingya nara.
Lita akali dupwa keta pyamalyaro kararenepape Anatu keta dopa piri doko wakasa ingilyamo.
Yanda pimwai soo kaeyo dupwame nambamoo pipya karo awali laminyipape Kamongona porai dokome mee ote pinyi nembeyo.
Nakamame kata paro dupwa peparaena roko iminyipape Kamongona porai renge dokome pyao anamasi minyiyu.
Nakamame namba nyuo sukusa pyambwapala amburalimi pili laminyipa Anatunya porai renge dokome nambame nakamba nepereke palunya isare pele letosa otenge.
Namba kuinya palyimisa yasu nalyano lao mona rumbingi karapunupape Kamongo baame namba nyisingi.
Kamongo baa namba ama porai kana lopalopa inginyi pyambungi. Doko baame namba pyuo nyilyasa pingi.
Anatunya wambunya komau anda dupwana yanda pyuo rakae sepala wii aupilao kenane pyao karaminyiŋi selapa. Kamongona porainya rengedokome doko pipyasa pilyamo.
Namba banya porai renge dokome pyao anamasi minyakalyamo. Banya porai renge dokome yanda angi pyao penge.
Namba kuma naro. Kumungi kandale doko suu pyao lete karapala Kamongome apa pyakalyamo dupwa polo lamairu.
Baame namba poraiyuo yasuko nalasi lao randa jipyamopape kumunginya palyuo jii nange.
Nakamame tembole andana kame kambu doko nambana laolumbwa-kalapape. Dokopa Kamongo baapa ange lala parole.
Kamongona kame kambu doko dakena silyamoŋo dokona rolae pingi dupwa iki kolando eparami.
Nambame Kamongo embenakingi doko lakandelyo. Renge doko embame yanda dupwana pyuo rakae salaselao jingi.
Doko akali anda pyuo kareyami dupwame kana mende nyuo nembeyami. Kana doko enakana anda donge dokona mupwa ingyuo epo siya.
Yulu doko mee akalimi pii nayami. Kamongo dokome piya. Piyamo doko namwa mona nembo kandelyamano.
Yuu gii dake elyape Kamongome yandana pyao rakae selapa lao jipyasa pilyamo dokona raekomaiyuo yuu andape kalya pyuo karamanale.
Kamongo embame pyuo nyii. Embame namwa pyuo nyepala mondo lao pyuokondanyi nembo karalapa lao jere.
Kamongona kingi lao epelyamo doko Anatumi elyape keta penale. Kamongona tembole anda dokona piso emba elyape keta pisale letamano.
Kamongo doko Anatu ingyuo karamo baame namwa pipya yulu elyape pipya. Nakamana kingi raka isa yoko lakao minyarami dokome kanda soo yuu andape kalya pyuo kana pyare dokona kenane pyao awali lao pyuo kararami.
Emba nambana Anatu karene dokona kando ange leto. Nambame embena yulu wakasa ingyuo penge dupwana lao lamairu ingilyamo.
Kamongo baa keyange ingyuo karo banya mona retenge doko kulisa ingyuo pelyamo dokona ange lao karalapape.
































































































Nambame embena mawa pii dupwa mona nyepala yuu peparae kaeya nao suu pyao karo.
Embena mawa pii doko yuu peparae namba keta silyamo dokona dokome nambana yanda pimwai pipya namba nyuo mona palenge inginyi pyambulyamo.
Nambame embena dopa pinya dapa pinya lao mana lenge dupwa poraiyuo suu pyao minyapu dokona mana lenge dupwa pipya mee mende ulipili ingyuo soo karo.
Nambame embena mawa pii doko kamba laa nao karapala dokome akali andapae karaminyi dupwana nambana soo nyingi renge doko andake ingyuo palipyamo karo.
Emba suu pingi doo minyalana suu pyapala Satanena kata dupwa wasinyi nembo karo.
Emba rangeme namba mana langilini dokome embena mawa pii dupwa soo nemba nalyo.
Embena pii doko nakanju sipunupa amburali ipwangena rende dupwa nyuo isa palyuo silyamo.
Nambame embena lowana soo nyingi renge soo nyipundeme kata koo dupwa epe kanda nalyo.
Embena pii doko lambeme pinginyili pyuo namba kata lasaka pingi. Dopa pyuo namba pelyono dokona kendali ingyuo namba rao lanyuo penge.
Nambame embena mana pii rolae doko rape rape lao minyuo yaki nyii naroŋo lao pii lalu lao lenge ingyuo andakena palyuo lao retapunu pilyamo.
Namba kopeta kapeta randa nyilyu dokona Kamongo embame namba lete nyero lao lao kaene dokona palyuo pipi.
Nambana sangyu lao leto pii doko Kamongo embame soo nyepala embena mawa pii dokona mana langipi.
Randa ipyamo dokona mee mona kumapala pyuo karo. Embame lowadoko kame see nao pyuo karo.
Akali koo dupwame nambapa randa jinya puu anga retaminyipape nambame embena mawa pii doko kamba laa nalyo.
Embena mawa pii dupwa namba rangena ingyuo minyuo karalu kararo. Mawa pii dupwa nambana monarena raeme kumunginya renge doko ingyuo silyamo.
Nambame embena mawa pii kuki dupwa rape rape lao minyuo paronopa kumarono dokopa otaraŋa lao suu pilyu.
















Embena mana pii dupwa kamame wakasa. Nambana monarename pii dupwa kamba laa nao karo.
Embena mana lenge doko pano eŋa papala yakara pingi wambu dupwa soo nyingi renge maipinyipa soo karaminyi.
Nambaembena mawa pii doko ipwa ingyuo nano pipyasa suwa ingyuo make make lyepala nanumi kumulyu.
Embena mona retenge dupwa kando pingi dokosuu pyao namba lenge kambu joo sakame kumuo karape.
Satanena kata dupwame namba nyuo anamasi minyuo isa nembena lao baa panda mai naro lalu lao leenyili pyuo mai napipi.
Wambu namba keta randa jerami dokona kiiramo nyepe. Nyerenepa embena mawa pii dupwana rape rape lao piruwale.
Embame namba eŋa nembapala embena lowa dupwa mana langipi.
Wambu dupwame embena mawa pii doko minya namisa nambana ee doko ipwa ingyuo guu lao karapyamo karo.
Kamongo emba rolaena renge dokona embena lowa doko rolaeyako ingyuo silyamo.
Embena mawa pii kuki ingyuo lapo leene dupwa rolae dokona palyuo kapako ingyuo pelyamo.
Nambana nyisu petenge dupwameemba lapinyi doko sili see nale lamisa imbu singi wakasa nyilyu.
Namba embena lalu lao leene doko angi piraŋa doko soo kaepala mona nyuo karo.
Namba embapa manda daa dokona nakamame namba kando ipyarami ingilya kande. Dopa pipyamopape embena mana piikuki ingyuo retenge dupwa yaki nyii nalyo.
Embena rolaena renge dupwa mee kulisa pao sulu seramopa embena lowa dupwa yuu mendepape kyambo ingya nara.
Namba keta randa renge simbuo sipyamosa mona randame kumulyu. Dopa pipunupape embena mawa pii dokome namba rae mainyi pyambulyamo.
Embena mana langingi yulu dupwa katalunji nembo silyamo. Namba singinya renge jerenepa kararole lao pisilyu.







































Nambame yuu kyau ketae dorena kandalyo kandelyo. Nambana nyisingi doko anjapiso eparase?
Kamongo yake yuupi wasiyamo doko keta nambana nyisingi epara.
Baame emba isa pupili lao suu pyaa napala kyawa minyuo kararamo doko lenge rakaro karenge.
Isaraele wambunya kyawa minyingi dokome luu pali nao isingi.
Kamongo baame emba kararene dorena karapala emba kyawa minyaro karara.
Korakama dokopa emba neta randa nao kukwa kana raramodokopa dopako pyuo pinya lao pira.
Kamongo baame randa dupwana emba kingi raka lanyi nembo kyawa minyara.
Kamongo baame emba yulu pyuo minyuo papyuo kararene dupwana kyawa minyuo karalu karara.
Nakamame namba langyuo, Kamongona anda dokona mwua leyaminyi dokopa namba rae maiyu.
Doko epapu namwa dae angi Jerusaleme kame kambu andakarerena epo karamano.
Jerusaleme taone andake doko elya pyuo pinjingi lyolope yalu pyuo kapa kapa piyaminyi au piro karamo.
Dopa pyuo piyaminyidokome lowana letamo dokona palyuo Isaraele rara dupwame Kamongo kando ange lala epenge.
Dake Isaraele wambunya kiŋi dupwame wambunya kote pii soo peteyami.
Jerusaleme doko mona kyuu lao seramopa petena lao ateŋa lakamipwape. Wambu Jerusaleme mona nyilyaminyi dupwa yuunya amenge doko nao sikya piramo petenale.
Kana kame andakare dorena mondo lao mona seramo soo kiŋinya palenge anda dupwa moŋo see nanale.
Nambana ree palupi puu minyingipi dupwana reke lao Jerusaleme dokona mona kyuu lao seramo pisipwape, leto.
Kamongo baa dae palyuo karamo dokona lao nakamana ee yuupi ipinya lao ateŋa lakalyo.




Kamongo baa namwa role pyao kara napyali apa pipyali? Isaraele wambu dupwame isingi lalapape.
Namwana yanda pimwai dupwame namwa pyalana piyaminyi dokopa Anatu namwa pipya role pyao kara nayali doko nakamame namwa lenge rao kareyamanopa nakamana imbu singi dokome namwa lee rapeta nao goe leyamili.
<range>
Dokopaapunda epo ipwa kama piyamo dokome namwa soo pao ipwa dokome namwa yambepyao piyali.
Ipwa endangi palyuo uu lao epapala namwa nyuo yalupiyasa kumuyamali.
Namwana yanda pimwai dupwa keta pinya lao suu laa nalyamo dokona Kamongo baa lakandamanale.
Nuli nenge akalinya yaka kone makanyi palyingi dokona yaka baa kuinya palipa nao wanjingi dopale ingyuo karamano. Kone makami doko petapyasa namwa kiiramo pasi karamano.
Namwa nyisara doko Kamongo yake yuupi wasiya doko keta epenge.





Kamongome yuu Sayone dokona namwa lanyuo epeyamo dokopa mee kombeyame ingyalya ingyana piya.
Namwana giyuo giyuo piyamanopape dee kenane pyao rae rae maiyamanopape dokona yuu muu menge dupwana sepala namwana lakao Kamongo dokome yulu andake doko pyakamilyamo, leyami.
Ama kinyi kinyi baame yulu andake doko pyakayasa namwa ama raeme kumuyama.
Kamongo embame namwaipwa sokwasi doko apundame range epengenyili pyamuli pyuo namwa rangena yuunya dee lanyuo ipupi.
Dokona lao ee pipya karo ee waingi warapiyami dupwa manjo nao karo dokopa rae mainyale.
Wambu ee waingi manjo pao karo dokopa ee pipya manjo peyami dupwa angi naomanjo laeyo epo dokopa rae maiyuo kenane pyao eparami.
Kamongome anda doko pii naramo anda pingi akalimi iki sisu lao pirami ramo doko nakamana yulu doko mee ingyuo para. Kamongome taone doko kando iso kara nara ramo dokopa akali taone iso kararami dupwa mee ingyuo para.
Kamongo baame mona retenge wambu dupwa kamenge luu palenge dokopa nakama yano pilyamo dupwa maingi. Dokona suu pyao namwa kukwako sipurao yulu andake pyuo kukwako pao palyuo pyuo kararama doko meekopirama ingilyamo.
Wane wanakepe mandenge doko Kamongome mee jilyasa pingi nakama namwa elyape keta piso jipyasa pilyamo.
Akali mende wanyane ingyuo karo wane mandenge dupwa yanda singingya kingi dokona yanda kakupi minyaro karenge dopale ingyuo karaminyi.
Ikinyingi malu yanda kakupi dopale ingyuo mandamo dokome yanda pimwai dupwa kote lenge dokona nyuo anamasi minyarami ingya nalyamo dokona raemaiyuo karara.














Namba randa sepala kata mende see napyasa panya saka napala Kamongo emba kee leto.
Namba ee lao karo doko Kamongo embame sakape. Nyisapili lao kyakale leto doko kaleyukupala sepe.
Embame namwana koo dupwa peparae bukunya pyao reteeli apimi kumungi renge doko wanjiyalisi?
Doko daa ingilyamo dokona embame nyuo kame sakarenepa namwa embame lasarene lao suu suu pyao karamanale.
Namba Kamongome banya pii dokona letamodoko kinyi lao sepala nyisaramo dokona wangu lakapala isaro karo.
Yuu isingi akalimi yuu yangena lao isaro karelyaminyipape nambame Kamongo doko epena lao isaro karapu doko mee mende andarele ingilyamo.
Nakama Isaraele wambu dupwame Kamongome nakama mona reto karalu karapala baa yuu peparae nyisalana rae maipala nyiso karamo dokona nakama Kamongo Anatu baa keta pyamalyuo karalapape.
Baame banya Isaraele wambu dupwa nakamana koo dupwana nenge rekya lao nyera.



Kamongo embame Dapiti baa randa nyuo soo pyuo kareya kande doko kame see napipi.
Baame embapa lao kana minyuo Isaraele wambunya Anatu Porai dokome pii porai leyamo doko suu pyao karape.
Namba anda paowape luu palenge panda paowape
imambu soo luu palyuo soope pii naro.
Dopa pyuo pao Kamongo karara yuu dokope dee anda Isaraele wambunya Anatu Porai doko palira anda doko maipala dokopa luu palyuo nenge nao kame sero.
Yuu Beteleme dokona Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote doko silyamo dokona leyaminyi siyama. Dee yuu Jirimi dokona siyamo dokona kando nyiyama.
Namwame lao dokopa Kamongona anda dokona mwua leyama. Banya petenge isa silyamodorena kingi wapambupi lakao kyaponga pyao misi lama leyama.
O Kamongo, embena Kana Minyuo Lalu Lao Lenge Pii Palenge Bokote dokona embena porainya renge kongwalu ingyuo palamo doko tembole anda dokona minyuo epo karalu karape.
Embena purisi akali dupwa rolae doko anjuku lao pyuo karenale. Embena wambu dupwa raeko maiyuo pii porakai lenale.
Embena kendemande akali Dapitipa pii lalu lao lee kande. Embena rombo palyisi kiŋi doko mata maiyuo kaeya napipi.
Embame Dapiti kando pii lalu lao lee doko dee range nyii nare ingyara. Pii Dapiti kando leene dupwa nambame embena ikinyingi mende kiŋi wasaronopa emba karenge alo dokona nakama iso karara, lee.
Embena ikinyingi dupwame nambana lalu lao lenge pii doko minyuo karo dee nambana mawa pii maingi dupwa kamba laa narami ramo nakamana ikinyingi dupwa opetayako emba pinginyili pyuo yuu peparae kiŋi ingyuo kararami, lee.
Kamongome yuu Sayone doko rombo palyuo nyepala banya anda dokona pinya letamo.
Yuu dakena namba palyuo karalu kararo. Yuu dake nambame iso karalana suu pilyu.
Nambame yuu Sayone dokona bange yangipyamo karaminyi dokona malu mee mairu. Nambame nenge pendewa pupyamo karaminyi dokona mairunupa kapa nao sikya piramo kararami.
Nambame nakamana purisi dupwa mondo lanyipyambuo piru. Banya wambu dupwame rae maiyuo kenane pyao pii ketae palyuo lao kararami.
Nambame Dapitinya para pyasi mende dae kiŋi wakasa ingyuo karena lao wasaro. Wasapala nambana kiŋi rombo palyisi doko dae rapu pyuo karalu karena lao piru.
Nambame banya yanda pimwai dupwa elya dokome kako pyaramopa karena laro. Laronopape banya kiŋi yulu doko ando paramopa mupwa ingyuo karara.





















































Yuu Bapilone ipwa pona dupwana piso yuu Sayone suu pyao ee lao peteyama.
Ee lao piso dokopa namwanagita dupwa walilyame pusinyai dopale ipwa repeta kareyamo dupwana mee yukunyi palyiyama.
Namwa karapusi pyao lanyuo epeyami dupwame kenane pyalapa, leyami. Nakama rae maimana lapala yuu Sayone dokona lao kenane pyalapa, leyami.
Yuu wakale dokona piso apa pyuo Kamongona lao kenane pyaramase?
Nambame Jerusaleme emba kame sookaeyo laro ramo gita dee kamba pyaa nalu nao narowale.
Nambame emba kando nyilini dokopa rae andake maingiŋi lao dee suu pyaa nao kame soo kaeyo laro ramo doko kenane pinginyili pyuo paa naoyaki nyuo kaeyaro.
Kamongo embame Jerusaleme wambu anjo nyuo peyami dokopa yuu Itome wambu dupwame koo piyami kande doko kame soo kaeya napala suu pyao karape. Suu pyao karo dokopa nakamame yuu andape lalyuo bolombalo nembena lao lapa pyuo kareyami kande.
Bapilone emba koo keta palyuo pare ingilyamo. Embame namwa piinyili pyuo isingi pyakao
embena wane dupwa nyepala pyao kana dupwana piso pyakaramo akali doko rae maiyuo karara.








Kamongo embame namba mondo lao kando soo kaeyapi kandapi.
Namba pilyu dupwa peparae embame silini. Emba kamame nanesa karapalape nambame suu pilyu dupwa soo gisiliniko.
Nambame yulu angi pilipi panda mee luu palu silini lao kando silini. Dee yulu peparae pipunu dupwa embame silini.
Kamame pii ene laroli dupwa dopa larelyamo lao soo oto karene.
Namba karapunu pisipunu palipunu dusipana embako karo kapa pilini. Embena porainya renge dokome namba kyawa minyuo karene.
Embame namba apiyakale lao soo gisapinyi doko nambame soo nyero ingya nalyamo.
Nambame embena imambu dokome silini doko yuu anda mende nee pilyandena papala kanda nalase lao parose? Emba anjalapona kara napindena dokona pao yalu pirusi?
Yake panda pulyuo paroramo dokopa emba dokona karareko ingilyamo. Dee kumuo yuu koko paliru ramo dokopa emba dokona karareko ingilyamo.
Namba neta pyakaenge dorena ingyuo yalu pyuo paronopape dee neta yalyingi dorena nanesale ingyuo paronopape
embame dokonako karo namba nyiso lanyuo papiri ingilyamo.
Nambame iminjingi dokome namba karo dokona nyuo yalu pinya laope dee yangenge doko namba karo dokona iminjinya laope larolapuli kapa lapuli.
Dopa lapuliko doŋo iminjingi doko emba keta iminja nao mee korakama ingyaro karamo. Iminjingi dokope yangenge dokope emba keta mende ingya nao mee yangenge dopaleko ingilyamo.
Nambana yanenge dokona mende embame wasa naende kara nalyamo Embame namba anyinya rombanda dokona kimbu sera sera pyuo inginyi retee.
Embena kingi lakandapenge dokoko nambame lakandelyo. Embame yulu peparae pilini dupwa wambumi kanda nange keyange wakasa dupwa pilini. Dupwa nambana mona dokona soo manjo karo.
Nambana anyinya rombanda dokona nee pyuo andeyonopa kuli dupwa kimbu sera sera piyamo dokopa embame dokona palene lao soo karee.
Namba manjapa nayamopa embame kando sii. Namba ene ando karo yuu gii kararole dupwa wambo embame sepala embena buku dokona pyao retee.
O Anatu, embena suu pingi dupwa nambame randa koo nao soo nyerolyamo. Embena suu pingi dupwa mee kuki pyuo ingya nalyamo.
Nambame yakalao kandaro ramo dokopa ipwa pota kee kana dupwa nyuo isa palyili laro kararami. Namba lenge rapala dokopa emba role pyao mee kararoko.
O Anatu, nambame yulu koo pingi dupwa pyapili lao suu pilyu. Reke reke karo randa jingi akali dupwame namba wakale karalase lao kaeyamili lao suu pilyu.
Embena lao pii koo letaminyi. Embena kingi doko randa joo mokwalipi letaminyi.
O Kamongo, emba epe kanda nami dupwa nakama nambame epe kanda nalyo. Dee emba kilya kandaminyi dupwa nakama nambame kilya kando karoko.
Nambame nakama imbumi kumuo nambana yanda pimwaiŋi lao soo karo.
Embamenamba makande pyuo kandapala dopa pyuo suu pilini lao kandape. Dopa pyuonambana suu pilyu doko kando koto nyepe.
Namba keta kyambona renge mende palape lao pyapi pyuo kandapala lete karalu kararo kata dokonalanyuo papipi.



























































Nambana Anatu emba kiŋi ingyuokarene doko embena yulu andake dupwa nambame lao panaro. Nambame embena kingi dokona ange lao karalu kararo.
Yuu peparae nambame ateŋa lao embapa sangyu lao kararo. Nambame embena kingi dokona lakando puu paro.
Kamongo doko wakasa ingyuo dokome kamame ulipili lakandapengele ingilyamo. Baa mupwa wakasa ingilyamo doko mendeme kapa soonyepa nara.
Embame piinyi dupwana wane manjo parami dupwame kaeya nao lao puu pao parami. Nakamame embena yulu keyange porai piinyi dupwana polo lamairami.
Akalimi embena neta renge yulu wakasa dokona lao polo lamairami. Dokopa nambame embena yulu keyange dokona suu pyaokondali pyuo kararo.
Akalimi embena yulu porai dupwana aromepyao laraminyipa nambame emba apa pyuo wakasa dokona polo laro ingilyamo.
Nakamame embena yulu elyape pingi dokona lamaiyuo dokopa emba anjiki pingi dokona lao kenane dupwa pyarami.
Kamongo doko baame mona reto sakame kumuo karenge. Waiya lao imbu singi nyii nao meemona reto puu penge.
Baame wambu lapo iki angi angi lao yulu keyange pii nange. Baame wasiyamo dupwa peparae kondome kumuo nyiso karenge.
Wasiinyi dupwa peparaeme Kamongo emba lakandarami. Dee embena wambu dupwame emba kando sangyu larami.
Embame embena kiŋi yulu neta renge dokona lao larami. Dee embena poraidokona lao laramiko.
Dopa pyuo lao dokopa embena yulu andake dokope embena isingi yulu neta renge keyange wakasa dokope soo nyeramisa pira.
Embena isingi yulu doko ota naramopa emba kiŋi ingyuo karo puu pare. Kamongo dokome yulu pira letamo dupwapipala kaenge. Banya yulu pilyamo dupwa peparae keyange ingingi.
Baame randa nyerami dupwa nyiso dee isa parami dupwa nyuo minyalyuo pira.
Wasiinyi lete karaminyi dupwame Kamongo emba iki kando karaminyi. Dee nenge yano pilyamo dokopa embame nenge maingi.
Embame kapa naraminyili pyuo maiyuo dee nakamana yano pilyamo karenge dupwa sikya pinyi pyambungi.
Kamongo baame yulu pilyamo dupwa rolae dokonako pingi. Baa wambunya lao sakame kumuo yulupyakamyuo karenge.
Wambu dupwame baa keta kulisa palyuo kee letaminyi dupwa peparae keta baa repeta karamo.
Wambu baa ketae pyambungi dupwana yano pilyamo karenge dupwa maingi. Baame nakamanaee laminyi doko soo nyepala pyuo nyisingi.
Mendeme baapa mona retaminyi dupwa peparae nyuo arapunya palyuo baapa koo pingi dupwa peparae kokwa sinyi nembo pira.
Nambame yuu peparae Kamongo doko lakandaro. Kimbu karenge kata papingi dupwa peparaeme banya kingi poo pyasi dokona lakando karalu karena.






























Kamongo doko baa lakandamana. Yake panda range dupwame Kamongo yake ketaerena karamo doko baa lakandalapape.
Banya aŋala dupwamepe dee aŋala peparae pyaso karaminyi dupwamepe baa lakandalapape.
Neta kanapeme baa lakandalapape. Dee bui lepo pyuo rao karenge dupwame baa lakandena.
Yake kamame ketae dorenape dee ipwa yake dulurena ketaerena silyamo dokomepe baa lakandena.
Kamongome dopa pyuo pulyinya lao wasiyamo dupwa peparaeme Kamongona kingi dokona lakando karena.
Baame suu pyao wasapala rangena panda wakale wakale dokonako kararami lao maiyamo dokona kamba lao panda kareyamo dokona yaki nyii narami ingyaro karamo.
Isa yuu dakena range dupwame Kamongo lakandalapape. Ipwa kotana lenge renge bange andake silyamo dupwamepe kota pete kyuwa dupwamepe Kamongo baalakandalapape.
Yuu pelepe randake kapape ipwa ase dokope kopape porambaiye porai dupwamepe nakama pii laramuli pyuo pingi dupwame baa lakandalapape.
Yuu kyau kuki andakepe isa jingi nengelyingi isa dupwape imwa isape nakamame Kamongo lakandalapape.
Anda suwa menape suwa mena rae lengepe kimbu kara nange rombame kata papingi kaupi yakape nakamame Kamongo lakandalapape.
Kiŋipi mee wambupi kiŋinya ikinyingipi yuu isingi akali dupwamepe baa lakandalapape.
Mapwae parangepe dee andapae wane nyaŋape nakama opetae lakandalapape.
Nakama peparaeme Kamongona kingi doko lakandena. Banya kingi doko andake wakasa ingilyamo dokona menge dupwa pipya manda manja nalyamo. Banya neta renge yulu dokome yake yuupi andake ingyuo silyamo dolapo nyuo isa palyuo silyamo.
Baame banya Isaraele wambu mona wakasa retenge dupwame baa lakando kararami lao porainyi pyambuya. Kamongo baa lakandamanale.









Kamongona kingi lakando palena. Anatu banya tembole anda dokona piso baa lakandamana. Yake dorena banya porai renge palamo dokona lakandamana.
Banya yulu porai ingyuo piyamo dupwana lakando dokopa baa kamame andake wakasa dokona lao lakandamana.
Bikuli poo lao rambyalu lao gita pyao baa lakandamanale.
Baa laikuli pyao mali lyuo rambyalu kurulupi lao banya kingi lakandamanale.
Bange jaa lenge dupwame minyuo kele kalo lao baa lakandamana.
Yuu muu dupwana wasiyamo piso pelyaminyi dupwa peparaeme Kamongo lakandalapape. Kamongo baa lakandamana.
Dapitinya ikinyingi kiŋi Solomone Isaraele wambunya kiŋi dokona mana pii lasi palamo.
Palamo dupwa soo nyerami ramo dokopa pii wakale wakale laraminyi dupwana pii anjuku rolae lao soo dee pii anjuku keyange lao soo nyerami. Dopa pyuo soo dokopa renge angi koko palamo dupwa soo gisarami.
Mana pii lasi palamo dakena mana nyerami ramo dokome singinya renge palenge wambu ingyuo yulu katalunji nembo pyuo pii katalunji nembo lao pinya suu pyapala pirami.
Dokonako ingyuo sepa narami dupwame mana pii palamo dokona mana nyepala kendepuli ingyuo pirami. Dee wanyane akali dupwame mana nyepala dopa pipengelelyamo lao range koto nyuo pirami.
Dopa pyuo pii palamo dakena mana nyeraminyi dokome mona palenge soo nyingi akali dupwame kamame soo londaraminyipa mana nyisi wambu dupwa dee konda pyuo soo mana nyerami.
Dopa piramo dopaleko ingyuo mona palenge akalinya kongwalu dupwape mana pii lasi dokona renge angi palamo dupwape soo nyeramisa pira.
Wambo Kamongo baa andakeŋe lao suu pyapala dokopa nakama soo nyerami ingilyamo. Dee mona angi pali nange wambu dupwame mona palenge soo nyingi wambu dupwa meeŋe lao nyuo mambunya palyarami dokome mana nyii naramalyamo lao suu pyao karenge.
Rakane, embame rakane endakinyipame larambinyili pyuo soo pyuo karape.
Akali kalya pyuo eparamo doko kandapala au pyuo karengelamo lao suu pyarami. Doko suu pyao emba endakinyi rakanepana pii warombo soo karapala kapa palyuo karare dokopa auwo kandarami.
Rakane, yulu koo pingi akali dupwame emba koo pii lao makande piraminyi dokopa pii napipi.
Nakamame dopa lao langirami. Akali mende koto kando pyala monale. Wambu mee kamenge petaminyi dupwa male male lao pyao kumasemana.
Ene kandaparamano dokopa wambu petele larami doko kaepala pyarama dokopa kumasi pao serami ingilyamo.
Dopa pyuo pyapala nakamana pinji bange dupwa peparae namwana ingyuo nyuo retamanale.
Emba namwa ree jela ipu. Eparene dokopa pinji bange waa nyimwa dupwa mokwa soo nyerama lao langirami lyakande.
Rakane, emba dopa langirami ramo dokopa wambu dopalena pii sakami nao wakale nyokonyuo karape.
Yulu koo pinya kambu nakepanyi nembo pyaraminyi dokonako suu pyaro karaminyi.
Yaka lyinya lao kone makaramo doko kando pisiramo dokopa makara doko kapa ingya nara.
Yaka dokome kendepuli ingyuo wanjepala paramopape akali yango mende randa mainya anga pyuo karapala nakama range kame seraminyisa kone makarami dokome mangena minyarasa kumarami.
Doko suu pyao akali kendepo nenge nakama yale lapome nakama waa nenge dupwako pyao kumakarami lao letamo.
Kote lao karenge mare dokonape makete yuu dokonape yuu wambu epo malu palyuo karenge peparae dupwanape mona palenge singinya renge dokome wambu ingyuo kyakale lao karamo. Doko kale yukupala selapape.
<range>
Mona palenge singinya renge dokome wambu ingyuo pii dapa pyuo letamo. Mona pali nange wambu dupwa yuu gii akipare mona pali nange ingyuo karalana suu pilyamisi? Yuu gii akipare soo nyingi wambu dupwa kando meeŋe lao giyalya giyana pyuo nyuo mambunya palyuo kararamisi? Anjokorape mana nyelana pyuo kararamisi?
Kopetame pilyaminyi lao pyalana pyuo laro dokopa warombo selapape. Dokopa dopa pyuo role pipa lao nakama pii angi mana langiru.
Nambame nakama panda joo ipupwa lao kyakale lapunupape nakama kale yukupala see nalyaminyi. Doko mende lalyane lao wangu lakapala selana suu pyaa nalyaminyi.
Nambame nakama dopa pyuo pipingi lapunu doko sili see nale lao karaminyi. Nambame dopande piralyamo lao langyuo rolapuliŋi lao suu pyapunu doko nakamame langipili lao suu pyaa nalyaminyi.
Dokona lao nakama randa nyerami dokopa nambame giyalya giyana piru. Dopako pyuo nakama keta paka renge sukusa eparamo dokopa giyalya giyana pyuo kopyali inginyi nembaro.
Randa renge andake porambaiye koo minyuo epenge dopale ingyuo epo randa jeramo koo keta palyuo pisirami.
Dopa pyuo piso nakamame namba kyakale laraminyipape dusa karoŋo lao isingi laa naro. Karepe lao koto paeyo kararaminyi panda dupwana kararono kando nyeraminde daa.
Nakama soo nyingi akali ingyuo karapuli lao suu pyao kara nalyaminyi. Kamongo baa pakale pakale lao lakando kara nalana suu pyao karaminyi.
Nakamame nambame dopa pyuo pipingi lao langya napili lao suu pyao karaminyi. Dee nambame dopande piralyamo lao langipunu dokopa sili see nale lao karaminyi.
Dopa pyuo karo koo piminyi dokona lao koo doko nakama keta epara ingilyamo.
See nange wambu dupwa mona palenge ingyuo kara namwali lao suu pyapala kumasi ingyuo karaminyi. Wambu angi rolae suu pyaa nao mee male male lao kopyali ingyuo palyuo karo pingi dupwa kwaeyo paramisa pira.
Dopa piraminyipape mendeme doko mende lalyane lao soo nyerami dupwa range kyawa lete nyerami. Mona seramo pisipala nakama keta koo epasara lao paka narami. Dopa lao mona palenge singinya renge dokome wambu ingyuo kyakale lao karamo.


























Emba rangena suu pinginya suu pilyu ote lao pii napala mona peparaeme Anatu kapa ingingi lao suu pyao karape.
Yulu peparae pilini dupwana Kamongome kando kaeyo karamo lao suu pyao kararenepa kata rolae lasaka pira.
Emba range kamame mona palyuo mama nyinginde karo lao suu pyaa napala Kamongo baa mupwa lao pako karo koo pinya wangu laka napipi.
Dopa piri ramo doko embena kingi kimbupi pokonge dokopa maresane keyange dokome randa pilyamo dupwape dee rete angi dupwape waiya lao umbwa pingi doko suu pyao nyiso otara.
Embena yuu dokona nenge mupwasa manjo nyerene dokome Anatunya kingi lakando kisi mairi.
Emba dopa pyuo mairi ramo dokome embena nenge retenge anda dokona nenge doko soo simbwara. Dee embena ipwa waene doko kakana pirasa retenge panda dokona retalana saka nare.
Wane, emba sukunde ingyuo kiso rolo randa jiyu kande dokopa meeŋe lao suu pyaa napipi.
Baame wambu mona retelyamo dupwa baa pyalana koo pyuo leya kande dokopa monarena yamarangwa nalapape.
Akali mona palenge ingyuo pii soo nyera doko rae maiyuo karena.
Doko mona palenge singinya renge doko kana golope kulingipinya poropiti nyilyamo dupwa nyuo isa palyuo nyera ingilyamo.
Mona palenge singinya renge dokome embena mamakupi kii puupi dupwa pipya manda manja nara. Dee mona palenge singinya renge dokome embena bange nyelana suu pilini dokopa manda manja nalyamoko.
Mona palenge singinya renge dokome yaku nao kumare. Dopako pyuo emba kapa paliramo kararenepa lakandarami.
Mona palenge singinya renge dokome emba mona kyaka palyuo kata angi lasaka pyuo kyawa minyaramo karare.
Mona palenge dupwa rae maiyuo parami. Mona palenge singinya renge dokome isame jingi lyelamuli pyuo lete kararami.








































































Maka suku suku nenge wambu dupwame sipurali kando apa pyuo palu karo pingi dokona mana nyerami ingilyamo.
Nakamana kamongo mupwa mendepe dee rapu pingi mendepe kara nange.
Dopa pilyamopape apunda kana pyaka seramo dokopa naramaŋa lao nenge dupwa panyi kana dokopa nyuo malu palyuo retenge.
Yuu gii akipare akali maka suku suku nenge doko luu palu anda serase? Dee baa anjokorape sipurapala lenge rao kararase?
Baame lao, Imambu soo nambana kingi kilyanda pyapala luu kuki mee paliru, lara.
Dopa lapala ramberaku pyao paramo luu palyuo kararamo dokopa luunya renge dokome baa pendewa nembara ingilyamo.




Kamongome bange yanda ipingi nyepo epe kanda napala daa lalu lao lenge. Wambu kandamili kandamili lengepe pii kyambo lengepe wambu koo pii nalyaminyi kingimi pyao kumungipi suu pinginya suu pingi kopetame yulu pipuli lao suu pingipi koo pelana wangu lakapala makando pengepe mendali kando nembo nembo pii minyuo kyambo lakamingipi dee akali mendeme banya puu minyingi dupwa pipya pyakandanyi retengepe dupwana Kamongo doko kando epe kanda nange.
<range>
<range>
<range>
















Rakane nambame langilyu dupwa suu pyao karo dokopa nambame pipi lao langilyu dupwa kame see napipi.
Nambame mana langilyu dupwa pipala kapa karare ingilyamo. Embena bange keyange dupwa mona nyilini doko suu pyao nambana mawa pii doo mondo lao rapu pyuo pyuo karare.
Yuu gii peparae nambana mana pii doko kandokondali pyuo minyapala embena mona andarename pepa ingyuo pyasi palena.
Dopa pipala mona palenge singinya renge doko embena pemalenge ingyuo pena dee soo gisinginya renge doko embena puu minyingi kulisa ingyuo pena.
Dopa pirinyi dokome akali wakalena endape dee enda akali girisi pii lenge dupwape emba kyawa minyaramo karare ingilyamo.
Yuu mendepa nambana anda windowa dokona kata kandeyo.
Kandeyono dokopa akali parange lapo suu pyaa nao api kame kame lao papingi dupwa kareyaminyi kandeyo. Dee dokona rambe rambe wane mona pali nange kopyali mende kareyamo kandeyo.
Yuu taone kata kyukunai repeta enda pamuku angi
doko palenge dorena ingyuo yuu kwualepalepa wane doko pakiki palyama epo peyamo kandeyo.
Dokopa enakana enda dokome baa kando nyiya. Enda doko baa ama komau keyange wapupala kyawa elya pyuo koteŋa renge pyapala peteya.
Dopa pyuo pisipala enda baa elya pii nao enyeko kaeyo suu pilyu ote lao yuu peparae kata dupwana papyuo kareya.
Dopa pyuo yuu lapo baa yuu taone dokona kata kyukunai dupwana akali isaro kareya. Dee yuu lapo makete dupwana isaro karo dee yuu lapo taone dupwana isaro karo pipa piya.
Dopa pyuo enda banya kingi pee lapala wane parange doko kupyuo rau pyao laeyo nyepala akali doko lenge wane ingingi dokome rolae kandaro sepala nyinyi pyuo karo dokopa lamaiyuo lao,
Epapu namba lalu lao leyonoli pyuo mena pyao kisalono.
Dokona emba kotalana suu pyapundeme namba emba koto nyisa epanoŋo dokona emba kando nyilyu, leya.
Lapala lao, Nambana rate doko komau kalya pingi yuu Isipi raendeme kwuanyi palyapu.
Dee dopako pyuo lao mamba ama kyaa keyange pingindeme kisapunu kyaa pyuo silyamo.
Dokona nambwa range yuu gii kukwa peparae kingi mendena dokome mende kupyaramo rae maiyuo kupyaro serambaŋa bona ipu.
Nambana akalingi doko anda kara nalyamo. Baa kata londe pupya.
Pupyamo dokopa kana ama malu minyuo pupyaŋa epa naramopa koro lama para, leya.
Dopa leyamo dokopa enda dokona girisi pii dokome wane baa makande piyasa moname nyuo otapala enda doko mona maiya.
Mena kuiyalana palelyaminyipa anjiki pipala anda epamuli pyuo mona kondo pao kaenge doko laa lapala peya. Wii kone makange dokopa kamenge pao konena lyingi dopale ingyalana peya.
Dee omande sinyana malyilyaminyipa baa kumara doko see nao mee panda rapisi lao pao palipala randa nyingi dopale ingyuo wane doko baa peya.
Wane dupwa nambana pii sokondali pipala doko mende lee kande lao soo karalapape.
Karapala enda dopale dupwame nakamana monarena kongo pyuo nyuo anamasi minya nana lapala enda paramuli pyuo pete pete papyuo kara nalapape.
Enda dokome akali malu nyuo palyuo pinyi nembelyamo. Dee akali maluko reto palyuo kumanyi nembenge dupwa kapa pyuo yaka lao sukusa paa narami.
Enda banya anda dokona pare ramo doko emba kumungi yuu kata repeta dokona waiya lao pao kando nyingi dokona panya parenesa pira.
Selapa. Mona palenge singinya renge dokome wambu ingyuo kee letamo. Renge angi dokome wambu serami lao paneya.
Yuu kyau dupwana kata nemba dupwanape dee kata kandamae dupwanape baa karenge.
Yuu taone andake kambu kondandawame dokona kame kambu kilikili rename piso kyakale lenge.
Wambu dupwa nambame nakama poraiyuo piso sokondali pilyu. Nambame isa wambu peparae kando kee leto.
Emba nyaŋa ingyuo karee kande doko suu pingi ando oto kando suu pyao karape. Emba kopyali ingyuo karee kande doko kando mona palenge ingyuo karape.
Nambana pii ama keyange langilyu dupwa rolaeŋe sepe.
Namba pii kinyi angi lenge dokome pii kyambo dupwa epe kanda nange.
Dokona nambame pii letono dupwa peparae kinyiko lenge dee mendepe kyambo lapala mendena kata palyuo pii nange.
Akali mendeme mona kandapala soo walengena palyuo karenge dee mendeme mana poraiyuo nyingi ramo doko baa soo oto karenge.
Dokona kana kulingi nyingi doko suu pyao nambana mana pii doko nyelapape. Dee kana golo rao kui kui lasi rombo palyuo nyingi doko suu pyao nambana mona palenge singinya renge doko rombo palyuo nyelapape.
Namba mona palenge singinya renge doko kamame wakasa ingyapala mamakupi kalya pingi bangepe isa palyingi. Dokona ingyuo emba range nyelana suu pilini doko namba mona palenge singinya rengepa manda manja nara ingyara.
Namba mona palenge singinya renge dokome soo gisinginya renge doko namba keta palenge. Dee soo nyinginya renge palengeko dokome namba kote dupwa rolae ingyuo singi.
Nambame wambu range mupwa wakasa lao suu pyapala pii panga soo karo kata koona penge dupwa kando epe kanda nange. Dokona ingyuo akali mendeme Anatu andakeŋe lao pakao pyuo karara ramo doko baa koo dupwa epe kanda nao kararasa pira.
Nambame dopa pyuo piru lao rapa rapa pyuo pipala angi dokona palyuo pyuo penge. Dopa pyuo namba soo nyuo porai ingyuo karenge.
Nambame kiŋi dupwa iso karena lao dee gapomane dupwa lowa waso lena lao nambame nyisingi.
Isa yuu dakena gapomanena akali kamongope kiŋipi karaminyi dupwa nambame nyisapunu pyuo karaminyi.
Mendeme namba kotara ramo dokome namba kando nyera. Nambame wambu namba mona retenge dupwa isingi monako retenge.
Namba keta bange aelyamo karenge dokome mainya rae maipala ketae pyambuo maingi. Dopa pyuo namba kapa palyuo kamongapala maiyuo kumakange.
Namba keta emba bange soo nyilini dupwa kana golo rao kui kui lasi dokopa manda daa. Dee kana kulingi keyange dokopa kapa daako.
Namba yulu rolaena kata iki pao kote singi kata angi dokona moko minyuo penge.
Namba mona retenge dupwa bange malu maingi dee bange dupwame nakamana anda dupwa soo ketae penge.
Kamongome yuu wamba kanda soo dokopa bange dupwa wasalana karo dokopa namba mona palenge singinya renge doko wambo ingyuo wasiya.
Yuu muu dupwa kanda sepa nao karo wambo peparae doko namba kanda soo wasiya.
Dee namba ipwa kotape ipwa guu lao epengepe dupwa epapa nayamopa namba doko wambo manjo nyiya.
Namba yuu kyaupi dee yuu manda dupwa silyamuli pyuo sepa nayamopa namba doko wambo mandeya.
Anatumi isa yuu dakepa yuu isako pulyuo silyamo dupwape yuu sinjimu wambo siya dokope wasepa nayamopa namba doko wambo mandeya.
Dee yake doko sera panda reteyamo dokopa namba dokona kareyo. Dopa pyuo yake yuupa pakali lao koe pyao peyamo dokopa namba dokona opetae kareyoko.
Baame yake dokona kopa sinya lao ipwa kota pete dokona piso mee ipwa guu lena lao waso
dee ipwa kota dokona siyamo dupwa kando baame lao raeyo paa napala silyamuli pyuo sinya lao leyamo dokopa namba kareyo. Dopako pyuo dee yuu kikurenge dupwa waso reteyamo dokopa namba dokona kareyoko.
Yuu gii dupwa pipya namba akali anda puu rombo minyingi dopale ingyuo baa role kareyo. Yuu peparae nambame baa rae mainyi pyambuo dee namba baa role karapala rae maiyuo piyu.
Wambu isa yuunya enenge sipurao paleyaminyi dupwa kando dee yuu muu peparae dupwana kando pipala rae maiyuo kareyo.
Epapu akali parange dupwa nambana pii selapape. Sepala nambame letonoli pyuo pirami ramo doko nakama rae mairami.
Nakama mana letono doko selapa. Mona palenge singinya renge doko nyuo kame kame see nalapape.
Akali mende nambana anda kame kambu konandawame dokona isaro petengepe dee akali mende nambana pii soo nyingipi dupwa rae mairami.
Akali mendeme namba kotara dokome lete karenge renge doko kando nyera. Nyeramo dokopa Kamongome baa kando rae maira.
Akali mendeme namba kando nyii nara ramo doko baa range randa nyera. Mendeme namba epe kanda nara ramo doko baa range kumungi renge doko mona reto kararasa pira, leya.













































































































Wane mona palenge dokome rakangeme pyalana pyuo mana letamo dokopa warombo soo petenge. Dopa pilyamopape akali moŋo kyaŋe soo range wakasa lao suu pingi dokome doko pii soo nyii napala baa kopetame pyuo penge.
Dokona akali keyange dupwana pii larami dokona yano nyerami. Yano nyeraminyipape akali panga singi dupwame pyakando yanda pinya wangu lakao karaminyi.
Dopa piraminyi pii angi suu pyaa nao langa lenge dokome baa range kokwa soo koo keta penge kandale. Dokona suu pyao emba pii kandokondali pyuo lapala embena lete kyawa doko range minyuo lao karare.
Akali yulu poraiyuo pingi dokome baa nyelana suu pilyamo dupwa peparae nyingi kandale. Akali yulu pinya maka suku suku nenge dokome nyelana lao poraiyuo suu pilyamopape dupwa angi kapa nyii nange.
Wambu pii angi dokonako iki lenge dupwame kyambo pii dupwa epe kanda nange. Dopa pilyaminyipape akali kopetame pinginya pii dupwame wambu elya nyingi.
Yulu rolae pingi dokome wambu koo pii nange dupwa kyawa minyilyamopape yulu koo pingi dokome wambu koo pingi dupwa nyuo koo keta palyingi.
Wambo lapo pii dokome bange malu aenge ingyuo lenge doko reta napala mee lenge. Lapo pendewa karele lao karelyaminyipape dupwa nakama moyange bange malu retenge.
Akali bange malu retenge dokona kana dokome baa range kyawa minyara. Dopa piramopape akali pendewana bange kingi rukyu nyerami ramo doko kapa daa.
Wambu yulu rolae pingi dupwa isare pawa rao yanga paupau lao karenge dopale. Wambu yulu koo pingi dupwa isare lambe rele raa nale lao karo kunjingi dopale.
Dokona wambu range ulipili lao suu pingi dokome mende nyii napala randako iki nyingi. Wambu mendeme laraminyi soo nyelana piso singi doko renge angi soo nyingi kata dopale.
Embena bange dupwa awa awa pyuo nyuo retare ramo doko dee waiya lao nembo otare. Dopa pii napala yulu pyuo randa nao nyuo retare ramo doko kamame lapo konda pyuo sera.
Mende angi pinya karo pira lao suu pyarene doko mee kambara ramo doko embena mona doko opetae ipwa pee kambele lara. Dopa piramopape baa mende pinya lao suu piya doko angi pira ramo dokopa mona rae maingi doko ando nyimbara.
Wambu keyange mendeme nyisaro laramo daa lare ramo doko emba randa nyere. Nyiso laramo dokona moko minyuo piri ramo doko koo keta palya nare.
Akali angingyuo mona palenge dokona mana pii doko ipwa guunya mendeke ingyuo emba kararene yuu gii dusipana koo keta parene lao ramo nyuo lenge kandale.
Mee wambu dupwame akali singi dupwa yako lao ketae pyambungi. Dee wambu kapa pii nalyamo lao suu pilyaminyi doko angi kwao paramo kata dokona karelyasa pingi.
Akali mona palenge dokome baa aki piru lao wambo suu pyapala pira. Dee akali mona pali nange dokome banya yulu kopetame piramo dokopa wambu yango dupwame baa mende suu pyaa naenae pingi doko lasaka pili lao pira.
Pii angingyuo sepa naenae lenge dupwame wambu dupwa randa nyuo maingi. Dopa piramopape pii kapa larami lao suu pyarami wambu dupwame manda ranyi pyambuo pingi.
Akali mende angi mana nyii naramo doko baa elya nyuo pendewa ingyuo karara. Dee akali mende baa waipi larami doko kale yukupala sera ramo dokopa wambu menge dupwame baa yako lao ketae pyambungi.
Wambu kopyali dupwame koo dokona kapa wanjarami ingya nalyamo. Emba bange nyelana suu pilini doko nyepala dokopa rae mairi.
Emba wambu mona angi palenge dupwa pipya role pyao karo mana nyere ramo doko emba wambu mona palenge ingyuo karare. Dee akali kopyali dupwa puu minyuo karare ramo dokopa emba kwao kararesa pira.








































Wambu mendepe imbwara ramo dokopa pii anjiki pyuo laramano dokopa imbu singi doko isa para. Dopa piramopape pii poraiyuo lao imbu singi nyerama ramo dokopa isare lopo yangenge dokopa uliyapu nyuo renge dopale ingyuo imbu singi doko andara.
Akali mona angi palenge dokome pii lenge dokopa singinya renge dokona au pyuo penge. Dee akali kopyali dupwame pii lenge doko sane peena ipwa rao bolo pyao popo kau kau lao penge dopale ingingi.
Kamongo dokome yuu muu dupwana peparae apa pilyape lao kando karenge. Namwa yulu koo pilyamanopape panda keyange pilyamanopape baame kando iso karenge.
Pii anjiki pyuo lenge dokome letena renge minyuo epenge. Dee pii kanda nao imbu singi nyuo lenge dokome wambunya mona kwaenyi pyambuo lenge.
Embena rakaneme dopa pii dapa pii lao mana langira doko soo kamba lare ramo doko kopyali minyare. Dee embena rakanena mana pii laramo doko soo nyere ramo doko emba wambu angi mona palenge ingyuo karare.
Akali yulu rolae pingi dupwame nakamana bange dupwa elya pyuo retenge. Dee akali yulu koo pingi dupwame yuu gii mende randa epelyamo dokopa nakamana bange mee pyao nembenge.
Mona angi palenge akali dupwame pii lenge dokopa soo nyinginya renge doko pao raenge. Akali kopyali dupwame pii letaminyi dokopa dopa pii nange.
Akali keyange mona angi palenge dupwame ateŋa letaminyi dokopa Kamongo doko rae maingi. Dopa pilyamopape akali koo pingi dupwame mena pyao kiso mailyaminyi dokopa baame epe kanda nange.
Kamongome akali koo pingi dupwana yulu dupwa rae mai nange. Dopa pilyamopape baame akali mendeme yulu rolae pingi doko kando mona retenge.










































































































































Ipwa biya dokomepe ipwa waene dokomepe napala wambu kopyali minyinyi nembo pii poraiyuo lao lenge. Dokona ipwa nenge doko yulu koo kopyali ingyuo pelyamo.
Emba mena laene dokome wambu nalana gasimwa poko ŋiliŋili letamo doko kando pakange kandale. Doko suu pyao kiŋi akali waiya lao imbwuange doko kando pakape. Doko kaepala embame baa imbwana lao piri ramo doko emba range pyao kumakaresa pira.
Akali kopyali dupwame laiye kanda soo leyami kande dokopa emba wakale pyarepanyi pyambuo karare ramo doko keyange ingyara-mopa emba lakandarami.
Akali ee wara pingi dokome baa yuu ape ape pyarali yuu gii dokopa maka suku suku napala kaenge doko dee jingi lyuo nyingi yuu gii eparamo dokopa baa angi mende lyuo nyii nara.
Dokona akalinya suu pingi doko yuwale kyuwana ipwa pete singi dopale. Dopa pyuo seramopape wambu mende soo gisingi ramo dokome kapa kamuo nyera.
Dee wambu peparae namba au pyuo mondo lao karenge larami. Dopa laraminyipape akali koto au pyuo mondo lao karenge doko nakama randa nao koto kandarami.
Wane wanake dupwana rakangepe dupwa pii angi kinyi dokonako lao dee yulu rolae pyuo pinginde ramo doko nakama embone kone petenge.






















































Emba bange malu retarenepape embena yulu pyuo larene kata dokona embena kingi doko keyange ingyuo ketae pelyamo lao wambu menge dupwame suu pyarami doko mupwa wakasa ingilyamo.
Kamongo dokome kamongope dee pendewape laparae wasiyamo dokome mendali wakasa ingya nalyamo.
Akali poraiyuo suu pingi dokome randa epelyamo dupwa kandapala wanjinyi nembo karelyaminyipa kopyali dupwa kyawame suu lao karapala enakana randa nyingi.
Emba Kamongo doko mupwaŋa lao suu pyao pako inyimungu karapala emba kapa palyuo karo lakandaraminyipa yaku nao kumare ingilyamo.
Embena yongo doko range mona nyere ramo doko wambu yulu koo pingi dupwa nyelana anga piru silyamo dupwana repeta paa napipi.
Dopa pyuo karapala wane doko apa pyuo palyuo karo pisa dokona mana lamai. Dokopa baa ando palyuo karo piramo yuu gii dusipana doko mende kandale lao suu pyale pyale karara.





Kamongome pii kinyi lenge dupwa angingyuo pena lao karo pii kyambo lenge dupwa rolae ingyuo paa nange doko panenge.
Akali maka suku suku nao mee anda petenge dokome lao, Namba neta kamanda dupwana paro ramo doko mena laeneme baa nyuo nara ingilyamo, lenge.
Kepo pingi yulu doko kone makange dopale. Dokona wambu lapo Kamongome kando imbwuange dupwa dokona pao lyingi.
Wane wanake dupwame mee langa male male lao yulu kopetame pingi. Dopa piminyipape nakamame poraiyuo mana lao pyarami ramo dokopa nakama yulu rolae dupwana mana nyuo piramisa pira.

















Emba bange malu retapuli lao pirisa emba range kokwa soo makasareŋe. Wambu angi mona palenge ingyuo karape. Bange dupwa dusa kata serandena mee pao yuu pele pirasa saka nare ingilyamo. Yaka ulisapame kui lasi soo nembele lapala embena kana doko mee nembare ingilyamo.
<range>







Wane wanake dupwa pyao mondo lao mana lare doko kumaraminde daa. Dokona wane wanake dupwa mee wamya lyuo karena lapala mange karo kaeya napipi.
Dopa pirami dokome wane wanake dupwa koo keta pali nao kyawa lete nyeramisa pira.




Nambana ikinyingi, sepe. Emba mee langa kara napala apa pyuo palyuo karo pirusi lao suu pyakondali pyuo karape.
Dopa pyuo karapala wambu nenge malu suu lanyi pyano nengepe ipwa waene malu nengepe dupwa pipya role pyao kara napipi.
Nakama pendewa ingyarami ingilyamo dokona waso karape. Emba mende pilyu lao dokopa luuko palu nengeko pyasumako nao karare ramo doko oo repeta komau rokwasi iki wapuri ingilyamo.
Dokona rakane kara nayali doko emba andengena dopale piso karo pii napiliŋi. Rakanena pii minyuo endakinyi emaramo dokopa yaso nao mandeyaŋa dokona lao suu pyao karape.
Dokona kinyinya rengepe mona palenge singinya rengepe mana nyinginya rengepe dee keyange ingyuo soo gisingipi dusipa ama keyange. Dupwa kana malu mee ropo pyao nyepengele ingyapyamopape embena bange kulisa ingilyamo dokona rungi rungi pyao karene.
Wane akalipi rolae pingi dokopa rakange doko renge keyange dokona lao rae mairi. Dee embena ikinyi doko mona angi palenge dokona lao emba kapa lakanda minya minya pyuo ketae pyambware.
Dokona ingyuo wane embame rakane embena endakinyipi rae maiyuo karena lao yulu rolae pyuo karape. Endakinyi mandeyamo doko dopa pyuo rae maiyuo pyambwape.
Wane rakane, embame namba mona joo kararene dokopa nambana yulu pyuo pii lao kata papyuo pilyu dupwa embena ingyaramo kando mana nyere.
Enda wakalena akalingi kepo pingipi enda kana nyuo akali kepo pingipi kata doko rakaiye kyuwa rakingi dokona pao palipala kumungi dopale ingyuo silyamo.
Dokome emba epelepe lao nakama range parakinya sipinyame ingyuo isaro singi. Akali dupwa nakamana enda yaki nyinya lao pingi.
Wambu mende ipwa waene biyapa malu nengepe dee ipwa biya mendereke nalana karengepe dupwa namba lasaka pepe. Dokopa nambame wambu range kondome kumuo mona rando karenge mende emba lasaka piru. Akali doko randa mapinyi reto mumu lao suku lao manjo karenge doko banya lenge dupwa kone yuu lapala baa rangeme susu lao isakanyinginya piso pingi.
<range>
Ipwa waene rombe polende kapona auko pyuo pao sera. Dee pendoko dokona mondako lao lupyuo para ingyara. Dopa piralyamo lao kandarenepape dokome emba makande pyuo nyuo isa palya nanale.
Daaŋa lao emba napala doko palyuo sipurarene dokopa kaumi pilyamo pingi doko suu pyao yasoko nao sipurare.
Dopa pyuo paka pinya kombeya kopetame pyuo aa lao yamarangyuo kyawa sisingi bolombalo laramo karare.
Karo piso penge dokopa minyuo maka delyamisa malawai lao miku kasarami ingingi dopale ingyuo karare.
Dokopa embame lao mendeme namba pyalaminyilyamo, lare. Lapala pyaminyipape namba suu pyaa nalyo lao karare. Lao karapala akipamo nambana lenge kendaro silyape? Namba ipwa biya mende koto kandarowale, lare.


Mona palenge singinya renge dokomepe soo gisinginya renge dokomepe anda dupwana isa susa pyao pingi dopale ingilyamo.
Soo nyinginya renge soo manjipyamo palamo dorena andana andakare bange elyape rungi rungi pingi dupwame kalya pyuo retenge dopale ingyuo silyamo.
Dokona wambu porai ingyuo karenge dupwa kapako doŋo mona angi palenge dupwa ama kapa ingyuo karenge. Kinyi, porainya renge doko baa mupwako doŋo soo nyinginya renge doko baa kamame wakasa mupwa.
Dokona yanda piroŋo lapala wambo emba kandokondali pyuo lao retape. Emba nyisarali pii keyange malu dupwa soo nyepala yanda piri ramo doko emba keyange ingyuo pyao wini piri.










Embena nyisu petenge dupwa randa angi nyiyami kande dokopa emba rae mai napipi. Dee baa lukumao paleya kande dokopa rae maiyuo kara napipi.
Emba dopa piri ramo dokopa Kamongo dokome sepala rae mai nara. Dopa pipala baame wambu embena nyisu petenge doko randa mai nasera.
Wambu yulu koo pingi dupwame emba mona randanyi pyambwa nana lao karare. Dee bange lapo nakama retarami dupwana kanda lyanolyano pyuo kara napipi.
Akali koo pingi dokome karo dolapokolyamo lapala akali dokona dee rakya mende see nara. Dee keyange mende rakya nyepenge lao suu pyaa nange.
























Suu pingi angi doko rolo laramo doko golome wasisi bange keyange dopale ingyuo sera.
Singi akali dokome repe repe lamairamo wangu lakapala soo nyingi doko kana golo panda rao kui kui lasi pipa manda manja nara.
Waili pii minyingi akali baa kandokondali pyuo makando minyuo eparamo dokome yuu gii isasa pilyamopa ipwa manda renge nao mona waeŋe lenge dopalelyamo lao sera.
Wambu bange lapo wambu yango mairama lao lalu lao lapala enakana mai narami dupwa kopa soo poraiya minyuo mane mane pyuo karapala apu angi epa nange dopale ingyarami.






Embena nyisu petenge akali lopo pira ramo doko baa nenge nena lao mairi. Ipwa naa nara ramo dokopa ipwa mairi.
Dopa pira ramo dokopa baa range elyame kumara. Dokopa Kamongo keta emba yano nyere.


































Epapu rakyapena piramo doko see nalene dokona mende piru lao ene dokona range lakanda napipi.
Wambu wakale menge dupwamepe dee kamame kanda nange dupwamepe lakandenaleŋe. Emba rangeme lakanda nalu nao napipi.
Wambu kopetame pingimi randa nyingi dokome isa kanapena kenda dupwa pipya manda manja nara.
Imbu singi dokome ingi pungipi nenge ingilyamopape yango palyingi renge dokome wambu kamame kokwa sinyi nembenge.
Wambu yongo mende kando koo pira ramo dokopa masa nalene lao masa nanale. Emba rolo ketae nyuo panembena mende pipala pinya lamaipi.
Embena puu minyingi dokome emba lao randa jeramopape emba mana lao larasa pira. Dopa piramopape embena yanda pimwai dokome mange kupyuo nyiya kande dokopa kando karape.































































Mana lao pyalena pingi renge doko wane wanakepe keta keyange ingyuo pelyamo. Waneme nakama range suu pilyamano ote lao pirami ramo doko baa keta endangi elya nyera.
Akali koo pingi dupwame yuu doko isaraminyi dokopa yulu kopetame dupwa andanyi nyimbuo penge. Dopa piminyipape akali rolae pingi dupwame akali dopale isa penge dupwa kando kararami.
Embena wane doko mana lao pyalena pirinyipa yuu peparae embame baa kando rae maiyuo karare. Dopa pirinyipa baame emba raeko mainyi pyambuo karo elya renge nyuo jii nara.
Wambu rara Anatunya pii soo nyii nao mee kamba lao karaminyi dupwa ukiaki minyuo koo keta palirami. Akali mendeme Anatunya lowa pii moko minyuo kararamo doko rae maiyuo kararako.


























Yaka kambi yakena bii lalamo dokonape kau kana mandana imu papyalamo dokonape ipwa sipi kota petena kata pamo dokonape enda akalipa mange nyokonyuo mona retalambinyi dokonape renge kisima dusipa yalu pyuo sipyasa selana sakame kumulyu.
<range>























Enda ama mora piso sinyi pingi doko kalu kalu paeyo mee langa pisa nange enda doko baa ama bange mena mako rusipi dupwa nyuo isa palyuoko baa mee mende ulipiliko pisira. Enda dopale dokona mende randa nao koto nyere.
Akalingi banya mona enda baa keta yukwapala pendewa ingya narolyamo lao sepala kamenge karenge.
Baa lete pisiramo mange dusipana akalingi keta randa maiyuo mona kendanyi reta napala yulu keyange pyakamyuo petenge.
Baa range mee pisa napala romo pyuo nyuu yambale wapuo lee kyaso komau kii pyuo petenge.
Pipala karona bange nanesa sipyamo manjo epelyamo dopale ingyuo baame ee kwaipi nanesa dupwana nenge nyuo manjo anda epenge.
Enda baa ene endenge singi dokopa sipurao banya ree palu dupwana nenge rapa rapa pyuo dee banya kendemande wanake dupwa dopa pinya dapa pinya lao lamaiyuo pingi.
Baa yuu mende kandapala isa girapo dupwa dokona wara piruŋu lao sepala enda rangena kana dokome ropo pingi.
Baa enda porai wakasa yulu pinya wangu lakapala pyuo pinjingi lyolo pingi.
Baa bange wasingi dupwa dusipa nyerolyamo lao sepala yulu pyuo piso kukwa ingyapala enako luu palenge.
Baa rangeme elyoko wale pyao banya nyuu yambalepe dupwa wapungi.
Wapupala wambu pendewa ingyuo karenge dupwa mumu laa nao nyiso maiyuo petenge.
Banya ree palu dupwa kupwa komau isasa pingi waso maiyuo kaenge dokona lao kupwame kumungi yuu gii dokopa baa mona randa nange.
Baame yapo nao palenge komau dupwa waso dee komau muku keyange elyoko kumapala dokome komau waso wapungi.
Banya akalingi baa akali kyawa ingyuo karenge dokona wambu peparaeme soo gisingi.
Enda baame mola marapu dupwa pyaope dee komau dupwa wasope pipala wambu bange malu ropo pingi dupwa maipala kana nyingi.
Dopa pingi dokona wambu dupwame baa enda porai kapa palyuo petamo dopa lao suu pingi dokopa enda dokome rengya pira dupwana paka manja nao petenge.
Baa pii dupwa mona palenge singinya renge dokome soo nembo wane wane karo lenge.
Baa enda yuu peparae romo pyuo karo banya ree palu dupwa aki mende aeya napya kandapi lao poraiyuo rapu pingi.
Dopa pilyasa banya wane wanake dupwame namwana anyi doko keyangeŋe lao ketae pyambuo karenge. Dee banya akalingi dokome baa lakanda minya minya pilyamo petenge.
Pipala baame lao, Enda menge malu dupwa keyange petaminyiko doŋo emba mee mende ulipisali keyange petenge lao suu pingi.
Enda wambu yako lao laku nyingi dupwa yuu lapo mee kunji kunji pingi. Dee dopako pyuo enda keyange elyape dupwa emo otarami. Dopa piramopape Kamongopa ketae pyambuo pisiramo doko mee lakandarami ingilyamo.
Enda dopa pingi doko yulu keyange pyakayamo dupwana suu pyao awuapala banya kingi lakandapengele ingilyamo.












































Yulu peparae isa yuu muu dapwana pilyamo dupwa Anatumi yuu gii rombo palyinginyili pyuo pingi.
Mandenge yuu gii dokope kumungi yuu gii dokope ee wara pingi yuu gii dokope manjo nenge yuu gii dokope dusipa baame rombo palyuo retenge.
Yuu gii pyao kumakaraminyi dokope yuu gii pyuo lete nyeraminyi dokope yuu gii anda wambarae lalyaraminyi dokope yuu gii anda enenge piraminyi dokope baame rombo palyuo retenge.
Anjokorape mona rando karope dee rae maiyuo karope dee kumanda ee lao pisope dee rae maiyuo malya pyao kararami dusipape baame rombo palyingi.
Yuu gii enda akalipa mendakinya palenge dokope dee yuu gii pali nange dokope yuu gii bange maingi dokope yuu gii bange mai nange dokope baame pyuo waso retenge.
Yuu gii bange nembengepe yuu gii nembapala koto nyingipi yuu gii kana nyuo retengepe yuu gii kana pyao nembengepe baame rombo palyingi.
Anjokorape komau kangurami dokope kii pirami dokope romo napyuo mee pisirami dokope dee pii lao pisirami dokope dusipa baame waso retenge.
Yuu gii mona retengepe yango palyuo epe kanda nangepe yuu gii yanda pingipi yuu gii kui lao mona silyamo karengepe dusipa baame waso retengeko.
Namwa yulu andake pipala dokona aki mende nyingisi?
Anatumi kenda namwa keta retakayamo dupwa namba silyu.
Baame yulu peparae dupwana yuu gii angi rolae doko waso reteya. Retapala dokopa namwame rengya mende piraŋa lao soo nyimwali suu pingi doko Anatumi namwa keta palyakaya. Dopa piyamopape baame yulu pingi dupwana lapo namwame soo gisa narami lao piya.
Dokona lao namwa lete kararamano dokopa rae maiyuo yulu elyape pyuo kararama lao soo nyiyu.
Namwame yulu pipala nenge ipwape nyepala rae maiyuo narama. Dupwa Antumi jiya.
Anatumi yulu peparae pingi dupwa ama sulu seraŋa lao pingi doko namba silyu. Embame dokona mende konda pyuo pyuope dee dokona mende nyisa nyuo nembope pii nare ingilyamo. Anatumi namwame baa mupwa lao suu pyao pako paliramiŋi lao pingi.
Yulu lapo dakepa pilyamo dupwa wamba dopa piyako. Dee yulu lapo ene pira dupwa wamba dopa piyako. Anatumi wamba yulu pinginyili pyuo kamba kamba pyuoko pingi.
Doko iki daa. Isa yuu dakena pii doko soo rolo lengepe rolaena rengepe panda nyeramuli pyuo koonya renge singi doko namba soo nyilyu.
Yulu peparae Anatumi yuu gii rombo palyiyamuli pyuo piramo dokona baame rolae pingipi koo pingipi peparae mendare kata dokona palyuo kote lara namba rangeme lao suu pyapu.
Anatumi namwa makande pyuo nakama mena dupwa pipya manda manja nalyamo lao lasaka pipyamo doko soo nyipu.
Mena wambupi kata mendakinya pao kumungi. Dokona nakamana lete karenge renge doko kapa kapa palenge. Lete karenge dokona nakama peparae renge mende see naminyi dokona wambu dupwa nakama kamame wakasa daa mena dupwa pipya kapa kapa ingyuo pelyamo.
Dokona mena wambupi panda mendare yuu sinjimu dokona parami. Doko nakama peparae yuu sinjimu dokonako wasiyamo dokome nakama kamba dokonako parami.
Dokopa menana imambu doko isa yuu donena paramopa wambunya imambu doko ketae panda paraŋa lao wambu mendeme apa pipala soo gisilyase?
Namwa kumaparamano dokopa mende piraŋa lao seramano kata mende see nalyamo dokona namwame yulu pyuo rae maiyuo palyuo kararama ingilyamo. Yulu mende wakale pirama ingya nalyamo lao kandapu.




































































































Anatumi kapaŋa lao suu pyapyamo dokona embena nenge nao rae maiyuo karo embena ipwa waene nao gii mona palyuo karape.
Yuu peparae wambu peparaena lenge kambu dokona rae maiyuo gii mona palyuo karape.
Anatumi renge mende palya nao emba lete karape lao jiyamo dokona embapa enda embame mona retelene dokopa role pyao rae maiyuo palyuo karape. Emba randa nao karapinyipape mende nyere ingya nalyamo. Dokona lao yuu gii peparae koree ingilyamo dokona enda pipya mee rae maiyuo palyuo karape.
Kumunginya yuu dokona emba pare dokona yulu pingipi suu pingipi soo gisinginya rengepe mona palyuo soo nyinginya rengepe dupwa see naramo dokona emba yulu aki mende pinya suu pyao pilini dupwa poraiyuo pepe.
Dee mende namba lao kandapu. Doko isa yuu dakena wambu puu lao makandelyaminyipape dupwana lapome wini pii nange. Akali paka mona manja nao yanda pingi dokopa yuu peparae wini pii nangeko. Akali mona palenge dupwame bange kanape dupwa yuu peparae mondo lao reta nange. Akali kyawa sisingi palenge dupwame yuu peparae bange malu reto kamongo ingyuo kara nange. Akali mora mora petenge dupwame yuu peparae kamame ulipilipi paa nangeko. Dopa pyuo yuu gii lapona wambu peparae embone kara nao randa nyingi.
Dopa pilyamo dokona emba anjokorape embone kara nao randa nyere lao see nalene. Yaka konene lyingi dee oma sinyanana malyilyaminyipa kamenge pao palengepe dolapo suu pyao yuu gii lapo namwa see nao karo koo eparamo dokopa mee walu lao oma yakape ingyuo randa nyerama.


























Embena kana mone dokome yuu wakale wakale dupwana bisinase pepe. Pyuo karo yuu gii mendepa kamame konda pyuo manjeramopa poropiti kana nyere.
Emba isa yuu dakena koo mende piramopa apa pyuo embone kara nare lao emba see nalene dokona embena kana dupwame bisinase wakale wakale pyuo byange wakale wakalena retape.
Doko kopa dupwana ipwa malu pisipala dokopa isa yuunya apu epenge. Dee isa mende lakange dokopa wangu paki panda pakirena pao lakao palenge doko mende pii napala isa lakao pelyamuli pyuo pao palenge.
Emba ee wara pinya lao karo panda nenge manjo nyelana karo netape kopape porambaiyepe kandaro karare ramo mende wara pii nao dee nenge manja naoko piri.
Embame enda wane ranjama yaki pingi doko soo nyii nange dopako pyuo Anatumi bange peparae pyuo waso reto yulu pyuo karenge dupwa soo nyii nare ingilyamo.
Embena ee doko yangama alemanjipi laparaena wara piri. Dokona ee peparae elya pyuo andara panda mende yangama wara pirinyi doko kwaeyara dee alemanji wara pirinyi doko kapa andara lao see nange.




Yuu giipi ee kanape emba rae mai nalyo larene dupwa epapa naramopa emba parange yuu gii lete palu karo dokopa baame emba wasiyamo dokona lao suu pyaro karape.
Dokopa apu petenge dupwa kakondo nisa paa naramopa neta rao yanga paupau lenge dupwape dee bui kanape dupwape embena lenge kambu dokona kopa papyuo iminjili lara.
Dokopa enakana embena kimbu porai ingilyamo dupwa pyuku laowape embena kingi emba minyaro karamo dolapo walu walu laowape embena nenge dupwa kuki lama iki kararamopa nenge kapa naa nare dee embena lenge doko kopa papyuo iminjeramopa bange dupwa kapa pyuo kanda nare.
Embena kale dokome makete yuunya karo pii laraminyi dupwa see nao karo muu laramo dokope laikuli pii laramo dokope kuki iki serenepape emba luu palirinyi dokopa yaka kenane pyaramo dokome lenge pyale rara.
Emba kata kore pulyuo dupwana pakapala randa nyuo papyuo embena kyawa doko alowa pipala yaku epo emba ponga ponga papyuo emba wamba karo yulu pyuo nenge nao kata papyuo pelene dusipa mee ingyuo isa para. Namwa kumapala dokopa karalu kararamano panda dokona paramanopa wambu dupwa ee lao kumanda pisirami.
Dokopa embena kii puu kulingi doko roko lama ingyara. Dee lambe golome wasisi doko isa paramopa poro lara. Ipwa kamuo nyingi yuwale dokona pee warame wasisi doko puu karo malyapala ipwa kamuo nyingi puu londe doko rokwaramopa pee doko poro lao muu muu pira.
Dokopa namwana yongo doko kapu kyuo isa yuu sinjimu dokona para. Imambu lete karenge Anatumi namwa jiyamo doko dee range baa keta para.
Akali renge angi dupwana lao suu pingi dokome dopa lao, Peparae mee ingyuo penge. Renge mende pali nalyamo, leya.






...




















































































































Buku dakeme Juta wambu Jerusaleme paleyami dupwana lao kiŋi Usaya Jotame Easa Esekaya kiŋi yulu pyuo kareyami dokopa Anatumi poropeta Aisaya Emosena ikinyingi keta epo leyamo dokona lasi silyamo.
Kamongome lao, Yake yuupa dolapona nambame pii leto doko apa pyuo leene lao serambi, leya. Wane wanakepe nambame manju andanyi pyambwapu dupwame namba yanda pimwailyaminyi.
Bulamakaome otange minyingi range ai singi. Dee mena donge dupwame nenge maingi mare doko soo gisingi. Menana yulu doko nyuo isa palyuo Isaraele wambu dupwame namba keta piramili doko kaelyaminyi.
Nakama mena kuiyalana pilyaminyi anda epenge dopale ingyuo karaminyi. Nakama yuu dakena wambu dupwa mona pali napyamo koona para pyasi wambu ingyuo pelyaminyi. Embena Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Poo Pyasi Anatu doko embame mata maiyuo kaelene. Koo pilini dokome emba nyuo isa pyakalopyamolamo lao silyu.
Isaraele akipamo embame yanda pimwaiyuo puu pelepe. Emba dee kamba yasu kee letepe? Isaraele embena kyawa dorena wua kakupi nyuo pisapala mona suu pingipi dorena kumapyamo karene.
Embena yanenge peparae mendasa iki sepa nao kwaelyamo. Mendasa yaki pyuo umbwa pyuo nyisi kara nalyaminyi, leya.
Nakamana yuu doko kokwa soo dee taone dupwa lalyasi silyamo. Rara wakale wambu dupwa epo nakamame mee lenge makando pipala kaelyaminyisa epo nakamana yuu nyepakala bange singi dupwa ukiaki minyuo apa nelyaminyi.
Jerusaleme yuu taone doko iki yanda pimwai lenge lenge raminyipa ropeta ee kame piro kara nange dokona iso karenge akalinya anda kauwa ingyaro silyamo, leya.
Kamongo Porai Wakasa dokome apa pilyaminyi lao kata kandala pena lao laa nayali doko Jerusaleme mende yapa ronge nyii nao yuu Sotoma Gomorapana piyamo dopale ingyuo pupyali.
Jerusaleme akali kanjili komiti lowa minyingi dee nakamana wambupi dupwa yuu Sotoma Gomora wambu peteyaminyi dopaleko ingyuo pelyaminyi. Dupwa Kamongome nakama kando apa langilyamo lao selapa. Banya mana letamo dokona doko mende lalyamo lao wangu lakapala selapape.
Baame lao dokopa nakamame rendamu pingi namba kaeya nao kiso jilyaminyi dupwana namba kyanyi kandakalene lao suu pilyamipi? letamo. Namba nakamana mena sipisipi dee mee mena bulamakaope akipi keyange kapako namba kiso jilyaminyi dusipana deyako yano pipyamo kara nalyo. Mena sipisipi bulamakao memepena ranjama jilyaminyi dusipa epapu namba nombe nombe petamo.
Apimi tembole anda dokona nambana lao kingi wapambupi lakao pisinya dokopa bange dupwa minyakao wamya lyuo ipupwa lao lapyasa epelyape?
Nakamame kiso jilyaminyi doko mee ingyuo pelyamo. Nakamana saa yakape kiso jiminyi rendamu dokome namba nyiki nyiki pipyamo karo. Nakamana Satate Kukinyape dee kana enengena nenge malu palyuo nenge nengepe dee malu palyuo andake tembole mitiŋi lengepe dupwa nakamana koo dupwame mendena ketae ingyuo pupyasa soo rae maiyaka nalyo.
Dopako pyuo nakamana kana enengena nenge malu palyuo naminyipape dee yuu gii poo pyasi lao nyilyamano laminyipape dupwame namba kenda jimisa selana rae mai nalyo, leya.
Embame kingi ketae pyambwapala ateŋa larene dokopa nambame lengeme emba kandalena eeya lara. Ateŋa malu lare panda akipare lare dusipana namba mende saka naro ingilyamo. Renge doko emba kingi ranjamako dokome karo larenesa dokona yaka laka naro ingilyamo.
Nakama range wate pyuokondali pipala rolae ingyuo seramo karalapape. Renge koo nakama pipya nambana lenge kambu sipyamo darena silyamo dusipa ramanyi nembapala
yulu keyange dupwa mana nyuo pimwali lao pipwape. Kote dokona rolo lalapape. Randa nyilyaminyi dupwa nyisalapape. Wane wanake muiyane enda waiya dupwape bange dupwa nyiso rungi pyapeta sakaminya lao karalapape.
Kamongome dopa letamo. Dakepa kwaelyamo dupwana rolo lamanale. Nakama koo dokome ranga yuku napyasa koo pilyaminyi dopa pilyaminyiko doŋo dopa piraminyipape nambame nakamana koo dupwa wate pyuo kewa lanyi nembakaronopa maa bilima kapa ingyuo kewa lao rao karenale. Nakamana koo dupwa kamame pingi pyao silyamo doko kaepala kwuala pao kewa lenale.
Nambame laro dokona iki warombo soo pyuo larami ramo doko yuunya ando eparamo amenge kapape doko kapa nao kararami.
Kaepala sili nasili lao soo nembo larami ramo wua nenge dokome yasuko nao kumarami lao namba Kamongo dokome dopa lapyaŋa lalapape.
Taone mona kare kare mondo lao piyami kande doko epapu pundange lenge kambupi nyiyaminyi. Wamba kandeyo dokopa yulu keyange rolae dokome simbwaro siya. Dopa piyamopape epapu dakepa wambunya ranjama nenge yeelyo karaminyi, leya.
Jerusaleme emba wamba kana kulingi kulisa palengena mendekepe dee ipwa waene yapasinya mendeke ingyuope karale kandale doko kaepala dakepa mee mendena ketae ingyuo pelene, leya.
Nakamanana lita akali dupwa mendale isa palyili palyili lao waa nyingi dupwana puu kulisa ingilyaminyi. Nakama karena lakaro bange sinya lao diriki pyuo nyuo lao karaminyi. Dopako pyuo dee muiyane wambu enda waiyape dupwana moŋo ipyamo minyuo kotena iminyi dupwa mondo lao lakami nalyaminyi.
Dokona lao dakepa Anatu Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Porai Wakasa dokome apa letamo lao selapa. Nambana yanda pimwai dupwa nakamana koo dupwana bekeme pyakaronopa dokona nakamame namba isingi randa dee jeraminde daa lao silyu.
Nambame epapu nakama angi pyaro. Nambame nakama akalimi kana kisalamuli pyuo kiso kwaelyamo dupwa nembo wasaronopa angi doko randa dokome lili pyuo yapalyara, leya.
Nambame nakama akali kyawa wamba kareyami dopale lapope mende pinya dokopa banya pii sepala piyami dopale lapope wakale jero. Dopa pirunu dokopa Jerusaleme taone doko taone keyange yulu mondo lao piminyi rolae silyamo lao larami ingyara.
Kamongo baa rolaena renge palenge dokome koo dupwa koo dupwa kondarami dokopa Jerusaleme doko pyuo elyape keta pisara ingilyamo.
Dopa pyuoko dee mendeme baapa yanda pimwairaminyi dupwa minyuo poo poo lao pyanyi reto banya kingi dokona yaki nyeramo wambu doko pyao kumakao pira ingilyamo.
Dopa piramo dokopa isako waingi kemali pingi lapo wara pipalape isa renge kemali pingi laponape moname nyinyi nembo kingi lao petenge lamo dupwa yamarangyuo yaki nyuo kaeyarami ingilyamo, leya.
Nakama yuu kulisa dokopa kapya waingi ipwa pyaa nalyamo yando nalamuli pyuope ee waingi neta kone dokona ipwa yangyuo yando nalamuli pyuo soo parami, leya.
Yuu anda piro singi dokona isare kainyi palyingi dokopa mendeme minyara nange kandale. Doko suu pyao akali ama porai ingyuo karo koo pyuo karaminyi dupwa yulu koo dokome nakama nyuo orambo palyuo kokwa seramo dokopa mendeme nyisalana saka narami.
Pii dake Anatumi Juta wambu Jerusaleme paleyami dupwana lao Aisaya Emose ikinyingi doko lamaiya.
Yuu gii mende pyaka sera ingilyamo dokopa tembole anda karamo yuu kyau dokome dokopa yuu kyau doloma nyuo isa palyuo sera ingyara. Seramo dokona yuu muu doloma mee kaeya nao ipwa ingyuo kulimbwanyi peeyo epo karalu kararami ingyara.
Yuu dupwana wambu dupwame lao dokopa Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Anatunya yuu kyau tembole anda dokona monako lao parami ingyara. Namwa baame apa pimili lao suu pilyamo dokona mana nyuo baame kata parama doko wapwakao otapya dokona pao pimanale. Kamongona mana pii doko yuu Jerusaleme dokona piso epara yuu Sayone dokona piso banya wambu dupwa lamailyamo.
Baame yuu muu andake dupwana apiyanda pyuo lao kararami dupwa kooso karena lao rolara. Nakamana wua gela dupwa yanda kaepala yuu apu renge ane isa ingyuo wasarami. Nakamana kaku dupwame kope pyakepenge wua ingyuo wasarami. Yuu muu andake dupwa dee yanda pela pelyamano lao paminyili pyuo paa nao dee yanda pingya mata wara pyuo karo puminyili pyuo paraminde daa.
Dakapa Jekopena para piyamo dupwa Kamongona kata yalu pii napala ena pasi silyamo dokona papyuo pyuo karo pimanale ipupwa.

















































Nambana mona retenge dokona suu pyaa. Mona retenge kenane dokome banya girapo ee dokona pyao ranaisa poko pyarowale. Nambana mona dokome banya girapo ee doko yuu mandarena rumbyasi keyange dokona wara pipala karenge
Baame kana dupwa nyuo kakondao yuu ape ape pyao pingi. Dopa pipala baame girapo keyange wingi dupwa wara pingi. Baame girapo kingyaramo yuwale dupwa kyaso dee anda kama dululi pipala isaro karara anda doko pipala girapo poo relyape lao isaro karenge. Dopa pipyamopape girapo peparae kau pingi aiyange dupwa lyepa piya.
Dokona lao Juta Jerusaleme palenge wambu nakamame namba mende pii napusa pilyape panda girapo ee baame pilyape lao soo kandapala lalapape.
Nambame piruli mende kaeyapala namba isa pupunusa pilyape? Dopa pyuo isa paa naronde ramo doko akipamo keyange lyera lao kandaro karapunu kata dokona kau pingi aiyange doko yapo lyilyape?
Nambame piru doko dapa pyuo pirunu kandalapale. Doko kame maronge dupwa lalyuo asu pinyi nembapala kame angi suwa menape kame piro karena lao piyu dupwa lalyinyi nembo mena rakaiye wii saape kame lalyuo nyuo pirunupa nao mena gulungalu lao karenale.
Ranome ando girapo anamasi minyinya laro lao dokopa pyakepanyi nembo yuu kapu kyuo pii naro. Dopa pingi kandale doko suu pyao nepereke ikyaikyape pulyinya lao piru. Namba kopa dokome apu kata mai nana lao lamairu.
Isaraele wambu dupwa Kamongo Porai Wakasana isa girapo ee mendeke ingyuo serenge. Juta wambu dupwa girapo angi baame warapiyamo andenge dopale. Dokome baame nakama keyange pimili lao suu piyamo dokona palyuo pyuo kara napala wambu pungi yando nao kwaeyami. Rolae karamili lao suu piya dokona palya napala mendeme mendali nyuo isa palyalanako suu pyao piyaminyi dokome range mende pyao isa palyingi dokopa kote rolae lakanako lao minyuo pao karenge.























Ee kana kiŋi Usaya kumuyamo dokopa Kamongo doko kandeyo. Baa kiŋinya petenge isa dokona mupwa ingyuo peteyamo dokopa banya komau londe dokome tembole anda panda dokona soo simbwaya.
Baa peteya dokona lee renge bange lapo karo awali leyaminyi kandeyo. Dusipana mendaki mendaki lao range dokona papake pakinyamange karapa piyamo kareyaminyi kandeyo. Lee renge bange mendaki dokome rangena papake pakinyamange dokona lamame nyuo lenge kambu yambe pyao lamame nyuo yanenge dokona yambe pyao lamame nyuo bii lao pao pipa peyaminyi kandeyo.
Nakama range yango sukusa pii lao alowa pyuo lao, Poo pyasi, poo pyasi, poo pyasi, Kamongo Porai Wakasa doko poo pyasi. Banya neta renge yulu dokome yuu muu dupwana soo kapa kapa pinyale leyami.
Pii poporambaiye dokome tembole anda doko minyuo pyuku pyuku lapala isare kyau lao rali piya.
Dopa piyasa namba kumuo kaeyalyano lao mee kikurenge doko kareyo. Karo suu pyao, Nambame kambunya pii epenge dupwa karo petenge dupwako epenge dokoŋo dee wambu pii koo kambunya lao piso palyuo piminyi dupwa pipya piso palyuo pyuo karenge. Dopa pyuo karapunupape nambana lenge angi dokome Kamongo Porai Wakasa Kiŋi doko angi kandelyo lao suu piyu.
Dokopa lenge renge bange dokona mende namba kareyo dokona petakareme isarena kana pyare lasinya kiso maingi dokona isa lengya mende rapo nyiyande minyuo epeya.
Epapala isa lengya rao siya dokome nambana kambu dokona warendapala lao dakepa embena koo dupwa pupyamopa nyuo kame sakao kaeyasi silyamo, leya.
Enakana Kamongome lalyiyamo siyunupa lao, Api mendali mapanyi nembarope? Apimi mendeme nambana pii minyakao parape? leyamo siyu. Sepala nambame baa lamaiyuo, Namba parowale. Nembena, leyo.
Dokopa namba pao wambu dupwa pii dake lamaiyape, leya. Kamame malu soo kararaminyipape angi doko soo rola narami. Kamame malu kando kararaminyipape angi doko apa pipala pilyamo lao angi kando gisapa narami, leya.
Lapala namba langyuo, Nakama lengeme kando kaleme soo suu pinginya soo manji nyuo kara narami lao wambu dusipana suu pingi kendanyi nembo kale kata poeyanyi nembo lenge iminjinyi pyambuo karape. Nakama soo manji nyuo karamili mona kapu kyimili dokome namba pyuo nyipuli, leya.
Dokopa nambame baa piso soo, Kamongo yuu gii akipare dopale ingyuo serape? leyo. Baame isingi langyuo, Yuu taone andake dupwa kwaeyo alowa pyuo iki sero dee anda dupwa pii karo dee yuu angi doko muiyane ingyuo soo piramo dokopa lalono dopale pira, leya.
Nambame wambu dupwa nanesa nembapala yuu doko peparae apa sinya lao piru, leya.
Wambu akalisa dokona doloma pena lapala mendaki karo kaeyara ramo doko isa kapya angi doko poko mapu pipala angalu doko yaki nyilyaminyi doloma rapala ralamuli pyuo kokwa soo para. (Isa yanengena kongwalu pii doko Anatumi banya wambu keta yulu enenge pyakamira dokona letamo.)
Yuu gii kiŋi Easa Jotamena ikinyingi Usayana kauwange doko Juta wambunya kiŋi yulu pyuo kareyamo dokopa yanda andake sipureya. Siria wambunya kiŋi Oresenepa Isaraele wambunya kiŋi Peka Oremalayana ikinyingi dokopame Jerusaleme pyala epapeyambinyipa kapa ingya nao mee pepe piyambi.
Juta wambunya kiŋi dokome siyamo dokopa Siria wambunya ami dupwame Isaraele wambunya yuu dorena pyala epelyaminyi lamo lao sepala kiŋi baa banya wambu pipya pakao minyuo inju ingyuo pyuku pyuku lapala isa kanyinginya peteyami.
Dokopa Kamongome Aisaya lamaiyuo, Embena ikinyi Seanjasupi nyepala lanyuo kiŋi Easa karamo dokona puu, leya. Baa ipwa pete dulunya soo suunya minyuo epenge pinjingi dokona komau wasingi dupwa yulu pyuo karenge mare dorena karara kando nyere, leya.
Kiŋi doko kando nyepala lenge rao mona seramopa paka nao karena lare, leya. Kiŋi Oresene banya Siria wambu dupwape dee kiŋi Pekana imbu singi dokope mee lyipongona yao isare dopaleŋe paka nalapape, leya.
Siria wambupi Isaraele wambupi pipya dee Isaraelena kiŋipi nakambame yulu koo mende pinya lao palyiyami.
Nakamame Juta wambu dupwa pyalana pyuo nakama pipa kombani lamana epo role pinya lao lao pakasinyi serapala akali Tapalena ikinyingi doko kiŋi karena lao wasalana lao suu pilyaminyi, leya.
Dopa pilyaminyiko doŋo namba doko Kamongo dokome pano lao doo letaminyi dokona pali nara leto, leya.
Akipamo dopa letope? Renge doko Siria wambu dupwa Damasakesa wambu taone mupwa doko manda manja nara. Dee Damasakesa doko baa porai ingya naramopa kiŋi Oresene baa poraili ingyuo karamo. Dopa pyuo silyamo dokona Isaraele wambu dupwana lao ee kana 65 paparamo dokopa penge kamba sinya ipwa pele lapala dusa kata serandena minyuo rali pipala yuu liti doko angingyuo see nara, leya.
Isaraele baa Samaria wambupa manda daa. Dee Samaria wambu nakama kiŋi Pekana porai dokopa manda manja nalyamoko. Dokona lao embame kapa ingingi lao suu pingi doko ando puu paa nara ramo dokome emba kapa kara nare ingyara, leya.
Kamongome dee pii mende Easa keta lamaiya.
Doko dopa leya. Embena Kamongo Anatu dokome wambu kumuo penge yuu dorena ingyuowape dee yake ketae dulurena pisowape kongwalu mende pyuo lasaka pinya lao piso sepe, leya.
Dokopa Easame isingi lao, Nambame Kamongo Anatu doko dopale pinya lao piso see naro. Dopako pyuo Kamongo doko makande pyuo kanda naro ingilyamo, leya.
Aisayame pii dokona kando isingi lao, Kiŋi Dapitinya para pyasi doko embame dakepa mende pyamo lao sepe. Akalimi iki mali soo karo makana lao pilini doko iki kapa daaŋa. Anatu opetaeko mali soo karo makana lao piriko, leya.
Dakepa Kamongo baa rangeme emba renge lyakai mende pyuo lasaka piramo doko dopale. Doko enda mapwae mende petamo doko keta wane ingyaramo manjipala dokopa kingi doko Imanuele larami, leya. (Imanuele kingi doko Anatu namwa role pyao karamo dopale.)
Wane baa ando mona palyuo range suu pyao pingi mange kandale dokopa wambu dupwa amburali ipwangepe mena anju ipwangepe nao kararami.
Yuu gii doko pyaka sepa naramopa akali doo kiŋi lama dolapome emba paka renge jilyambinyi dolapona yuu doko apa nao kwaeyasi sera, leya.
Kamongo dokome randa mende nyuo emba embena wambu akalyanda dokona pisara ingilyamo. Randa angi doko wamba Isaraele wambu dupwa paka lakyuo Juta ingyuo peyamipya kande dopale ingya napala wakasale epara. Doko baame Asiria kiŋi doko kame lalyinyi peyara ingilyamo, leya.
Dopa piramo mange dokopako Kamongome Isipi wambu dupwa ipwa pona kuki epo Naelena donorena nanesa piso wambena polo epamuli pyuo dee Asiria wambu dupwa amburali polo epamuli pyuo epena lao kongwalu lapo pyuo nyuo peyara, leya.
Epo yuu pau lama lama kana pisalya pisana pingi dokonape kana anda imwa isako panda rambipi nepereke kaireke maupi dupwanape epo buu minyinya lao nyuo peyakara, leya.
Yuu gii doko pyaka seramo dokopa Kamongome kyawa rokonge akali Asiria kiŋi doko yuu Yuporisa dokona oko soo epena lao kyakale lao nyakaronopa dokome epo nakamana kyawasi angasi dee yongo yamanjipi dusipa roko wapya pyanyi nembakara, leya.
Yuu gii doko pyaka seramo dokopa pama akali baa mena bulamakao andanda mendaki mee mena meme lama ingyaramopape
anju ipwange soo kaeyo palirasa baa yano pirali dupwana kapa pyuo nao pisirami. Dopa piramopa yuu dokona wambu yaka lengele iki palu kararami dupwame anju ipwange amburali ipwangepe seramo nao pisirami ingyara.
Mange dokopa isa girapo puu marange taosande dokona puu wakale wakale manda manjo kana taosandeko nyingi yuu dupwa rano epale soo ikyaikya mamunyipi mau soo kwaeyara, leya.
Wambumi dokona pao yanda kakupi soo wii saape pyao nala pao kararami. Kinyi yuu lili doko peparae nepereke kairekepe pulyara, leya.
Yuu kyau ee wara pingi dupwa peparaena reke reke isa dupwame ando balo serasa wambu mendepe dusa moko palyuo paa narami, leya. Yuu doko mena sipisipi bulamakaope isako nenge nala pao kararami ingyara, leya.
Kamongome namba langyuo, Pepa yoko kameyali mende nyepala dokona pyao pingi kameya ingyuo pyapala pyao palyape. Pii dake, Waiya Lao Kokwa Soo Apa Nenge, pyao palyape.
