Baa randa yasupi naparamo dokopa enakana baa rae maingi renge dee kamba nyera. Baa doo randa naramo dupwa mee male male lao randa neyolyamo lao suu pyaa nara. Nambana kendemande dokome namba mona retenge doko kando namba rae maingi. Baame peparaena koo dupwana randa nyeramopa banya lao nambame nakamana koo dupwa kame sakamiru.
Dopa pyuo paramopa nambame baa ketae pyambuo baa akali kamame wakasa porai dupwa pipya karena laro. Wambu koo pingi dupwana panda nyuo randa nao baa range kumuo mainya mona kumapala baame wambu koo pingi malunya panda nyepala ateŋa lao Anatumi nakamana koo dupwa kame sakaminya lamaiyuo kumuya.
Jerusaleme emba enda ingi porailyamo wane manja nao petenge dopale ingilyamo karenge doko raeme kumuo kenane ketae palyuo karape. Renge doko enda akalingimi yaki nyuo peyamopa baa wane malu manjiramopa akali role pingi dokome wane mendasipa iki manjira.
Emba palirene komau anda doko andake ingyuo piri. Pipala puu doko kaka soo pyuo pee lao pyasinju lape. Pinjingi isakulimi dupwa poraiyuo pimba pyare.
Embena yuu paki pakipi peparaena liti doko yuu neta yalele lao konda pyuo nyuo kalyape. Dokopa wambu rara lapome dakepa yuu nao palaminyi dupwa embena wambu dupwame nyerami. Yuu taone apa silyamo dupwa dee wambumi palyuo kete pyarami.
Emba dee kamba elya nyii nare ingilyamo dokona pakame kumuo kara napipi. Dee mendeme emba nyuo isa palya narami. Enda akalingi kanda soo nyepala yulu mondo lao pii napala elya nyuo petengenyili pyuo petee kande dopako pyuo parende daa. Enda waiya ingyuo kale paka paka leyamo peteene kande dokona kame sere.
Bange peparae pyuo wasiyamo doko embena akalingi mendeke ingyuo karara. Dokona lao Kamongo Porai Wakasa letamano doko banya kingi dokosa lenge. Isaraele wambunya Anatu poo pyasi dokome nakama nyiso kyawa lete nyera. Doko baa yuu muu peparaena mupwa ingyuo karamo.
Isaraele emba enda mapwae akalingimi role pyaa nalyamosa randa nyingi dopale ingilyamo. Dopa pipyamopape Kamongome emba range kapu kyuo ipu lao kee lapala lao,
Yuu mange kuki lama nakama mee yaki nyuo kaeyapunu pipyaŋa. Dee nambame mona andake retapunu dokome range nyero.
Namba imbwayo dokona yuu gii kuki lama nakama mata jiyu. Dopa piyunupape nambame nambana mona retenge renge doko lasaka pyuo karalu kararo, lao Kamongo emba pyuo nyilyamo dokome letamo.
Wamba Noa kareyamo dokopa ipwame piyunu dopaleme mende pii naro lao lalu lao leyo. Dee epapu nakama kando imbu singi manja nao dee koo dupwana kando nakama koo pingiŋi laope randa jii narona lao lao lalu lao leto.
Yuu kyau kuki andakepe dupwa poro lao para. Dopa piramopape nambame nakama mona retelyo doko ota nalu nara. Nakama keta mona kyuu lao seraŋa lao lao kana minyuo leto pii doko minyaro. Kamongo nakama mona retelyamo dokome dopa letamo.
Kamongome dopa letamo. O Jerusaleme taone randako nyingi kapa mende piri ingya nange dake. Emba mendemepe mona minyarambwa narami ingilyamo. Dokona lao nambame kana bange nyingi rungi rungi pingi dupwame nakamana isa susa reto dee kamba wasakaro.
Dopa pipala namba nakamana anda ketae londe dupwa kana kone keyange dupwame pyakapala dee nakamana kame kambu dupwa kana isare ingyuo rao kui kui lasi dopaleme pyakao dee kana kame awali lao palenge doko kana golome wasisi wambumi nyuo kinginya piso kalya pingi bange dokoreme pyakao piru ingilyamo.
Namba rangeme embena wambu dupwa mana lamaikapala mona seramopa yulu peparaena kapa palyuo pena lao piru.
Rolaena renge dokome emba porainyi pyambwara. Moŋo emba keta peyo lengepe paka rengepe dupwana emba kyawa minyaramo karare.
Mendeme emba nyuo kuinya palyuo pyalana piramo doko Nambame suu pyaa naro dokona rangeme suu pilyu ote lao pira. Mendeme baa emba yanda pimwaiyuo kararamo doko isa para ingilyamo.
Nambame yanda kakupi isareme kiso poraiyuo wasingi akali doko nambame akali dopale inginyi pyambuyu. Nambame dopako pyuo ami dupwame yanda kakupi wasisi dupwa nyepala wambu pyao kumakala penge doko inginyi pyambuyu.
Dopa pyuo piyunu kaku dokona mendeme emba keta yalya nara lyakande. Emba koo keta palyuo larami dupwa lao rolakamyuo karare. Nambana kendemande dupwa arapunya palyuo reto kararonopa nakamana yanda pimwai anamasi minyuo kararami, pii doko Kamongome letamo.
Kamongome lamaiyuo, Wambu peparae nano karenge dupwa dae ipwa silyamo dokona ipupwa. Kana dalyamo dupwa palawa ropo pyao nala ipupwa. Ipwa waene susupi dupwa mee pakiki nyuo nala ipupwape.
Nenge sikya pii nara dokona akipamo kana nembo nelyamisi? Akipamo embena pee nyingi kana dokome nembo ropo pyao napapinyipape mee lopoko karese? Nambame laro doko sepala dokome moko minyuo piri dokome nenge doloma nyuo isa palyuo rae maiyuo nengende nare.
Nambana wambu dupwa pii leto dakepa sepala namba keta ipupwape. Dopa pyuo namba keta epo lete karenge renge nyerami. Dokopa nambame kana minyuo lenge pii sulu sera mende nambame Dapiti kando elyape keta pisaro lao lalu lao leyono dokona elyape keta pisingi renge doko nakama jeroko.
Nambame baa wambu rara peparaena akali kyawa ingyuo wasiyu. Wasapala baa keta nambana porai renge doko nakama lasaka piyu.
Dakepa nakamame yuu wakale range wambu dupwa epena lao kyakale larami ingilyamo. Wamba wambu dupwame nakama see nayami kande. Dopa piyaminyipape epapu nakama karaminyi dokona makando ree lao eparami ingilyamo. Namba nakamana Kamongo Anatu Isaraele wambunya Anatu poo pyasi dokome renge dupwa pyaka sinya laro. Nambame nakama kingi ketae pyambuo rape rape lena lao piru.
Kamongo baa keta kapu kyuo papala ateŋa lalapape. Dakepa baa nakama repeta epo karamo.
Wambu koo pilyaminyi dupwame nakamana yulu koo dupwa yaki nyuo kaena. Pipala nakamana suu pingi koo dupwa alowa pinya. Nakama namwana Kamongo Anatu sakame kumuo waiyuo lao nyuo kame sakamingi doko keta kapu kyuo pena.
Kamongome lao, Namba suu pyao yulu pyuo nenge rambo lao pingi dupwa nakamana dopale daa, letamo.
Yake doko yuu dokona kamame yuu ketae ingyaro karamo doko suu pyao nambana suu pingipi yulu pingipi doko kamame ketaele wakasa ingilyamo.
Apu pipyaepe dolapo mee dasa piso imbu napala yake dokona piso lyuo epo ee yuupi ipwa pyao nenge andanyi pyambungi. Dolapome nenge jingi maiyuo dee kakana pyuo pilyunupa nenge. Nambana pii doko dopale ingyuo sipyamo pilyamo.
Dopa pyuo nambame mende pirunya lao retelyono doko mee isa paa nange. Angi letono dokonako kapa wai wara pyuo pipala pyuo otenge.
Nakama yuu Bapilone mona seramopa raeme kumuo yaki nyerami. Yuu kyau kuki andakepe nakama paraminyi kata dokona silyamo dupwame puli pyao kenane pyarami dee isa dupwame rae maiyuo pii ketae palyuo larami.
Saiperese isa dupwa nepereke mau panda koo dupwana andarami. Dee matele isa dupwa ikyaikya andenge dupwana poro lao andarami. Dopa piramo dokopa namba Kamongo dokome yulu andake piiŋi lao suu pyarami lao lasaka pili laro karalu karara.

































Kamongo dokome lao, Pii poraiyuo kaeyo lao nambana Isaraele wambu dupwana koo dupwana lao lamaipi, letamo.
Nakamame namba yuu peparae kingi wapambupi lakao kingi letaminyi. Lapala lao nakamame nambana yulu dupwa soo wangu lakao nambana mawa pii rape rape lao rolae dokona palyuo pimwali lao letaminyi. Lapala nambame nakama mawa pii rolae dupwa jipiliŋi lao namba rae maiyuo lakandelyamano, letaminyi.
Lapala wambu dupwame piso soo lao, Nenge wasaka pyuo pisaramano dokopa Kamongome kando gisa nara ramo doko akipamo wasaka piramase? Namwame nenge naa nao kararamano dokopa Kamongome mende suu pyaa nara ramo akipamo namwa dopa piramase? Kamongome nakama lamaiyuo lao, Kinyi nakama nenge wasaka pilyaminyi. Piminyipape nakama rangena bange yulupi dupwana lao suu pyao nakamana yulu pingi wambu dupwa mona kendanyi pyambuo pilyaminyi.
Dopa pyuo nakamana nenge naa nao wasaka pyuo pisiminyi dokome laiya lao pyakando pyuo karaminyi. Dokona nakamame suu pyaminyi dokopa doo nenge wasaka pyuo petaminyi yulu dokome nambame nakamana ateŋa doko sakareŋe lao suu pilyamisi?
Nakama nenge wasaka piminyi gii dokopa nakama range randa nyuo rambi pau pyao kamba kamba paleyamuli pyuo ayemba rukyuo kumanda piso wapungi komau kwuayo pee lombo retapala ketae palaminyi. Doo pilyaminyi dopa pyuo nakamame nenge wasaka pilyamano lengese? Nakambame suu pyaminyi dokopa namba doko rae mairiŋi lao suu pilyamisi?
Nambame nenge wasaka pyuo petenge yulu mende suu pilyu doko dake. Wambu lapo mona kendo randa nyilyaminyi dupwape dee wambu lapo nakamana yangome nakama kando rolae ingyuo pyakamyuo kara nalyaminyi dupwape kiiramo nyerami ingilyamo.
Wambu lopange dupwa nakamana nenge maiyuo andana pali nange dupwa nakamana andana palyuo dee komau aeya nalyamo karenge dupwa komau wapunya lao maiyuo karo dokopa nakamana andare ree palu mendaki dupwa kaeya nao nyisarami ingilyamo.
Dopa pirami dokopa nambame nakama kando epe kando yangamana neta lepo lepo pyuo nakama keta ranyi peenge dopale inginyi pisaro. Dopa piru dokopa nakamana yongo dupwana mendasa wua kakupi pisiramo dokopa waiya lao umbwa pinyi retakaro. Nambame yuu peparae nakama pipya role pyao karo kyawa lete nyuo kararo. Nambame dorena darena pyuo nakama konambe ingyuo alyasa minyaro.
Nakama ateŋa laraminyi dokopa nambame yano pyakaro. Dee nakamame namba kyakale laraminyi dokopa aopa ŋee lao sakaro. Renge doko nakamame wambu randa maingi yulupi kingi sikisame suu lao kooŋo lao lengepe pii koo lengepe dupwa yaki nyuo kaepala
nakamame lopange wambu nenge maiyuo dee mende aeya naramo kararaminyi dupwa bange maiyuo kararami ramo dokopa nakama keta iminjapyamo karaminyi doko alowa pipala yango rali pira.
Dokopa yuu peparae nambame nakama bange keyange dupwame mende yangya naramo karamili lao joo kata angi lasaka pyuo kararo. Dopa pyuo dokopa nambame nakama yanenge reto porai ingyuo karalapa lao minyaro kararo. Dokopa nakama ee nenge ipwa apupi nyepala menya menya lao andenge dopale ingyuo kararami. Dee ipwa guu doko sokwa nao epo karenge dopale ingyuo palyuo karo pirami.
Dokopa nakamana wambu dupwame anda wamba kwaeyasi silyamo dupwa karenge panda dokonako dee pirami. Dokopa nakama kana kame awali lao kamba pyuo dee anda momo nao lalyuo pasi doko kamba karengenyili pyuo piyaminyi dupwaŋa lao kingi larami.
Kamongo dokome lao, Nambana koro petenge yuu gii doko poo pyasiŋi lao suu pyapala rangena rae maiyaraminyili pyuo yuu gii dokona pii nalapape. Nambana yuu gii doko rape rape lao karo kata papyuope yulu pyuope pii kopetame laope kara narami ramo
nambana yulu pyakarami dokona rae maingi renge eparamo kando nyerami. Nambame nakamana kingi ketae pyambuo yuu muu dupwana uu lepa lepa pena laronopa yuu nambame nakamana kauwane Jekope keta maiyunu dokona kapa rae maiyuo nao palirami lao namba Kamongo dokome lapunu pilyamo.





















Jerusaleme emba epapu eŋa nembo neta dopale ingyuo rao sipurape. Dokopa Kamongome banya neta renge yulu doko nakama keta ranyi pisilyamo.
Yuu muu liti wakale wakale dupwa iminjingi dokome yambe pyaramo kararami. Dopa piramopape Kamongona neta renge dokome nakama keta yanga paupau lao rao karara. Dopa pyuo banya eŋa penge renge doko nakama keta palira.
Dokopa wambu rara wakale dupwa nakamana yanga paupau lenge dokona eparami. Dee kiŋi dupwa nakamana yuu gii enenge yangaramo dokona eparami.
Nakama lenge pendekae lapala apa pilyape lao kandalapape. Nakamana wambu dupwa anda epena lao malu palyuo karaminyi. Nakama ikinyingi dupwa yuu nanesa piso eparaminyipa nakamana wanenge dupwa wane wanakepe nyaŋa ingyuo wambu wakale dupwame apu soo eparami.
Nakama doko kandapala rae wakasa maiyuo kararami. Dopa pyuo kando mona pulunongo pyao kararami. Wambu rara dupwana kamongonge bange dupwa ipwa kota dupwa yalo nakamana lao minyakao eparami.
Yuu Mitiane Epape dolapona piso mena kamele malu suku piro karo eparami. Dopa piraminyipa mena kamele lapo yuu Sipa dorena karo kana golope rendamu pingi bangepe minyuo eparami. Dokopa Kamongome yulu keyange pipyaŋa lao wambu dupwame waili pii doko larami.
Yuu Keta Nepayotepena mena sipisipi peparae nakamame pyao kiso mairamiŋi lao minyuo eparami. Doo minyuo eparaminyi dupwa kana pyare lasi dokona pyao kiso maiyuo Kamongo rae mainyi pyambwarami. Doko Kamongo dokome banya tembole anda doko kamame wakasa ingyuo neta ranyi retara.
Ipwa sipu dupwa kopa isa isa puu pae lao epamuli pyuope dee yaka waiyamu waiya lao bii lao anda epamuli pyuo epelyaminyi dupwa aki lapose?
Sipu dupwame yuu nanesa piso Anatunya wambu dupwa range anda lanyuo imisa pilyamo. Kamongo dokona kingi ketae pyambuo karena lao nakamame kana kulingipi kana golope dupwa minyuo epelyaminyi. Kamongo doo yuu muu peparaena wambu dupwame banya wambu dupwa ketae pyambuo karena lao pilyamo doko Isaraele wambunya Anatu poo pyasi ingyuo karamo.
Kamongo dokome Jerusaleme kando dopa letamo. Wambu yuu wakale range dupwame nakamana kana kame awali lao doko dee kamba pyakarami. Dokopa wambu dupwana kiŋi dupwame nakamana yulu pyakarami. Nambana imbu singi dokome nakama randa jiyu. Dopa piyunupape dakepa nambame nakama epe kando sakame kumuo kararo.
Dokopa kukwa korakamape dupwana nakamana kame kambu dupwa lumbasi sera. Seramo dokopa yuu muu dupwana kiŋi dupwame nakamana kamongonge bange dupwa minyakao epo kararami.
Dopa piraminyipa wambu yuu liti lapome nakamana yulu pyaka narami dupwa pyao kokwa soo nembalu nembo nembaro.
Dopa pirunupa isa rara wakale wakale dupwamepe dee yuu Lepanone imwa dokona isa keyange dupwamepe minyuo epo yuu Jerusaleme dee kamba wasarami. Doo minyuo eparami dokome nambana tembole anda doko au pinya lao pyuo nambana taone andake doko netaŋa rao lepo lepo pyuo karena lao wasarami.
Akali nakama randa joo kareyaminyi dupwana ikinyingi dupwame epo nakama mee mende ulipili ingyuo karaminyi karamano lao lasaka pyuo pangu serami. Wambu nakama angi mende daaŋa lao suu piyaminyi dupwame epo nakamana kimbu seramo dokona piso nakama lakando lao Kamongona yuu taone andake, larami. Lao dokopa, Isaraele wambunya Anatu poo pyasi dokona taone Sayone lenge, larami.
Dokopa nakama epe kanda naope yaki nyuo kame soope pii narami. Dopa piraminyipa yuu taone andake yaki nyuo kaelyaminyi apa soo wambu pali nalyaminyi singi dopale ingyuo see nara. Nambame nakama andake ingyuo au wakasa pyuo yuu rae maiyuo karalu karenge inginyi pyambwaro.
Dokopa endangimi dokome banya wane rapu pinginyili pyuo wambu rara dupwamepe kiŋi dupwamepe nakama rapu pirami. Dokopa namba Kamongo Isaraele wambunya Anatu porai dokome nakama kyawa lete nyuo kiiramo nyiilyamo lao serami.
Nambame kone kana jepenge doko suu pyao kana golo jero. Dee anepe isape jepenge doko suu pyao kana kulingipi kone kanape jero. Jepala mee kana jepenge doko kaepala ane jero. Dokopa nakamana akali mupwa dupwame randa joo kopetame rapu pii narami. Nambame nakama mona seramo rolae pyuo iso karena lao piru.
Yanda pelana suu pyao yanda lakange pii dopale mendepe see narami. Nakamana yuu doko dee pyao kokwa soo minjuku minyinyi nemba narami. Nambame nakama konambe mendeke ingyuo kame pyuo minyaro. Dopa pyuo kyawa lete nyerono dokona lao nakamame namba lakandarami ingilyamo.
Dopa piramopape kukwa korakamape nakamana neta dee kanape renge panda dokona namba Kamongo doko nakamana yanga paupau lenge kulisa ingyuo rao karalu kararo. Nambana neta renge dokona yanga paupau lenge doko nakama keta ranyi peyara.
Nakamana mona rando ee lenge yuu gii dusipa lumwa pira. Dokopa namba Kamongo doko kendali ingyuo neta kanape dolapo yalaponalu rao sulu sero.
Dokopa nakamana wambu dupwame rolae doko anjuku lao pyuo yuu doko nyuo palu palirami. Nambana yulu andake dupwa nakama keta lasaka pyuo panaro lao nambame nakama nyuo pingi pyao wara pipala wasiyu.
Dee nakamana ree palu kamame kukilipi inyimungu karengepe dupwa rara andake porai renge palenge dopale ingyuo palirami. Dokona yuu gii rolae doko eparamo dokopa doo leto dake waiya lao pyaka sinya laro. Namba Kamongo dokome leto.
Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome banya imambu doko namba keta palyuo simbwapya. Baame wambu pendewa dupwa waili pii keyange doko boo pyao lamaiyuo karape lao namba rombo palyapya. Mona yanyi pyapyamo karaminyi dupwa pyuo nyuo puu maisi karaminyi dupwa moko nyuo wambu isare rapyamo karaminyi dupwa mokwala pupi lapyasa epelyo.
Kamongome banya wambu lete wai pyao nyuo nakamana yanda pimwai dupwa anamasi minyara ee kana pyaka seramo yuu gii doko boo pyala pupi lapyasa epelyo leya. Dee wambu lapo ee lao kumanda petaminyi dupwa mona minyarambu puu lao peyapyasa epelyo.
Lapala lao wambu lapo yuu Sayone dokona kumanda petaminyi dupwa mona rando kondange doko suu pyao rae maingi renge maiyuo dee kumanda piso ee lenge doko suu pyao lakandenge kenane maiyuo puu lapyasa epelyo. Nakama Kamongo rangeme isa wara pilyamo andenge dopale ingyarami. Dokopa nakama peparaeme yulu rolae doko anjuku lao pirami. Dokopa Anatu baame yulu piyamo dupwana lao baa lakandarami ingyara.
Nakamame yuu taone lalyuo kwaeyasi dupwa dee kamba minyalyuo pirami.
Nambana wambu dupwa yuu wakale range wambu dupwame epo yulu pyakao kararami. Nakamana mena sipisipi dupwa rapu pyakao nakamana yuu dupwana yulu pyakao ee nengepe wara pyuo isa girapo ee dupwa mondo lao rapu pyakao pirami.
Dokopa nakama Kamongona purisi akali ingyuo karaminyi laope Anatunya kendemande akali karo pilyaminyi lao wambu menge dupwame soo nyerami. Dokopa wambu rara yuu muu dupwana kamongonge bange dupwame nakama ketae palyuo karo rae mairami. Rae maipala dupwa peparae nakamanaŋa lao yongo nyimbwaramo kararami.
Nakamana elya nyuo karenge doko mee otara. Nakamana yuu muru range dokona paliraminyipa mena bangepe dupwa mee lama opetaeli konda pyuo seramo kararami. Dopa piraminyipa nakamana rae maingi renge doko soo puu para.
Kamongo dokome lao, Namba kyai rolaepena anjuku lao lao rolenge yulu mona nyepala wambu randa maingi yulupi yulu kopetame pingipi epe kanda nange. Nambame nambana wambu dupwa yaki nyii nao nakama kingi kiso maiyuo nakama pipya kana minyuo lalu lao lenge pii ingyuo laro.
Nakamana kingi doko yuu muu dupwana ulepalepa paramopa wambu kando serami. Wambu peparae dupwana mendeme nakama kandapala dokopa nambame keyange inginyi pyambuyalyamo lao soo gisarami.
Jerusaleme enda mapwaeme akali anda panya kalya pipala penge dopale ingilyamo doko Kamongome dopa pyuonde pyakapya lao kenane pyao rae maiyuo karenge. Anatumi baa anamasi minyingi rengepe lete pyuo nyingi rengepe dolapome kalya pipala pisapyasa pilyamo.
Ee dokona wara pingi dokopa waingi dupwa poro lamu lae pipala andengenyili pyuo Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome banya wambu dupwa kyawa lete nyuo nyisara. Dokopa wambu yuu muu peparaeme baa lakandarami.












Yuu Itome dokona yuu taone Bosera lenge dokona piso epelyamo doko baa apisi? Porainya renge palenge porai wakasa mende kimbu pyao piso komau kone keyange pinginde epelyamo doko baa apisi? Doko Kamongo banya porai renge palenge dokome lete wai pyao nyingi dokome banya pyao anamasi minyingi renge dokona lao boo pyao lala epelyamo.
Akipamo banya komau doko alemakai pyao kingyuo karami ingyuo kone wakasa pilyape? leya.
Kamongome isingi lao, Nambame yuu muunya wambu rara peparae alemakai minyuo kingili lao kalyuo injo rambetaku piyunu dokopa mendemepe epo namba nyisa nayami. Dopa pyuo nambana imbu singi paleta nakama kalyuo injo rambetaku piyunusa nakamana ranjama dokome nambana komau peparaena alemakai kii ingyuo kaeyo nyiya.
Nambana wambu lete wai pyao nyerono yuu gii doko ipwamo lao soo manjo oteyo. Gii dokopa nakamana yanda pimwai dupwa pyao randa mairu doko pyaka sepelyamo lao soo nyiyu.
Nambame kandeyo dokopa mendalimipi nyisaramaŋa lao ingya nayamisa mona nembo kareyo. Dopa piyunupape nambana imbu singi andake dokome namba porainyi pyambuyasa namba rangeme pyao anamasi minyiyu.
Nambana imbu singi dokome yuu muu peparaena wambu dupwa pyao inji ranji pyuo minyuo alemakai kingili lanyi nembeyo. Nambame nakamana lete ranjama doko kulimbwanyi isa yuu dokona nembeyo.
Nambame Kamongona mona reto puu penge dokona lamairu. Nambame namwana lao yulu peparae pyakalyamo dokona lao banya kingi lakandaro. Banya mona retalu reto retenge rengepe sakame kumuo nyisingi rengepe dokome Isaraele wambu dupwa elyape keta piso nyisiya.
Kamongo dokome lao, Nakama nambana wambuŋu. Namba minyako pii narami, leya. Dopa lapala baame nakamana randa dupwana kyawa lete nyiya.
Doko aŋala mendeme nakama nyiso kyawa lete nyiyande daa. Kamongo baa rangeme nakama nyiso kyawa lete nyiya. Banya mona reto kondange renge dokome nakama kiiramo nyiya. Wamba dokopa baame nakama yuu peparae au pyuo rapu pyakamiya.
Dopa piyamopape nakamame baa kando mata maipala mona randanyi pyambuyami. Dopa piyamisa Kamongo doko nakamana yanda pimwai ingyuo papala nakama yanda piya.
Dopa piyamosa wambana Kamongona kendemande Mosese kareyamo doko suu pyapala piso soo lao, Wamba Isaraele wambunya Kamongo dokome Isaraele wambunya lita dupwa kota pete dokona kyawa lete nyisiyamo doko epapu anja karase? leyami. Akali Mosese keta banya Imambu Poo Pyasi maiyamo Kamongo doko epapu anja karase? leyami.
Kamongo banya porai renge dokome nyepala Mosese keta yulu andake piya. Wambu dupwame baa rangena kingi minyalyuo karalu kararami lao baame ipwa kota doko pyao karalyapala sukusa dokona lanyuo peyamo Kamongo doko anja karase?
Kamongome kata lanyuo epeyamo dokome nakama kimbu rukyuope lukumu soope pii nayami.
Mena bulamakao yuu anda lama lama anenge andengena lanyuo pao lasaka pinginyili pyuo Kamongo dokome banya wambu dupwa mata sisiki nembena lao lanyuo pao panda doko maiya. Dopa pyuo Kamongome banya wambu dupwa lanyuo epeyamosa banya kingi ketae paleya.
Kamongo embena yake panda poo pyasi neta renge yuu dokona palyuo karene dokona karo namwa kandanyi peyo kandape. Embena namwa poraiyuo suu pingi doko anja silyase? Embena porai renge doko anja silyase? Embame namwa mona reto kondange renge doko anja silyase? Namwa pipya kandele kanda nale laa napipi.
Emba doko namwana rakange angi. Namwana rora ambasu Aporakame Jekopepame namwa soo nyii nange. Dopa pimbinyipape emba Kamongo namwana rakange dokome yuu peparae namwa koo dupwana nenge raka lao nyuo karenge.
Akipamo embame namwa embena kata dupwana yaki nyuo ralo karalapa lao kaelese? Akipamo embame namwa yuu peparae mona kana pokalu poko pokapala yaki nyuo pumili lao pilisi? Wambu lapo embena yulu pyakalyaminyi dupwana lapolapo lao lapo yuu peparae embena ingyuo peyaminyi dupwana lapolapo lao kapu kyuo ipupi.
Namwa embena wambu poo pyasi dupwa namwana yanda pimwai dupwame pyao nyisa ralinyi nembeyaminyipa yuu gii lapo pisipeyama. Dee nakamame embena tembole anda poo pyasi doko pyao lalyuo kalyuo muu muu pinyi nembeyami.
Embame namwa iso kara nalenepa namwa embena wambu ingyuo pisi nangende ingyuo pelyamo.
Akipamo emba yake doko kanguo nyuo karalyapala isa lupyuo epa nalese? Dopa piri ramo yuu kyau dupwa emba kandapala walu lao paka renge nyerami.
Dokopa nakama pengena ipwa pisapala isare kisilyaminyipa rao bolo pinginyili pyuo walu walu larami ingilyamo. Emba epo embena wambu nyisu petenge dupwa keta embena porai renge doko panembena lasaka pepe. Lasaka pipala yuu liti wambu dupwa embena lenge kambu dokona epo walu walu lao karena lao pepe.
Embame yuu mendepa epo wambu yamarangyuo pakaramilinde piri lao see nayama dupwa pyaka soo piinyisa yuu kyau emba kandeyaminyi dupwame embapa pakame kumuo walu walu leyami kande.
Wambu Anatu embapa karo mende pirandelyamo lao soo manji nyisi karaminyi dupwa keta yulu andake pyakamingipya. Dokona Anatu emba yale mende karelyamo soo dee kando nyuowape pipa nangepya.
Wambu rolae doko anjuku lao soo nyuo rae maiyuo pingi dupwa embame yako lao nyingi. Embame nakama apa pyuo piso karo pimili lao suu pilini dokona palyuo pyuo petenge dupwa yako lao nyingipya. Embame namwa kando imbu singi nyipinyipape namwame koo doko pyuo puu pelyamano. Embame randa jelana imbu singi manjipinyipape wamba koo pyuo kareyaminyili pyuo namwa pyuoko pelyamano.
Namwa peparaeme koo pyuowako karamano. Namwana yulu rolae angi pilyamano lao pyuo pumwanopape yulu dupwanako peparae karo piso koo ingyuo pelyamo. Namwana koo dokome namwa mee isa porakana yao ingyuo soo papiyamo karamano.
Mendemepe moname nyinyi nembo emba keta nyisapili lao ateŋa pyao epana lao suu pyapa nalyaminyi. Embame namwana koo dupwana namwa yaki nyuo kaeyalana embena lenge kambu doko namwa pipya nee piru karene.
Dopa pilinyiko doŋo Kamongo emba namwana rakange. Namwa mee wara yuu komba awai dopale ingyuo karamano. Dee emba yuu dokome penge angi wasingi akali dopale ingyuo karene. Embame namwa pyuo wasii kande.
Dokona lao namwa pipya imbumi kuma napipi. Namwana koo dupwana minyaro karo moŋo joo karalu kararoŋo lao suu pyao kara napipi. Namwa embenako wambu petamano dokona sakame kumuoko karape.
Embena yuu taone poo pyasi dupwa yuu muiyane penda penda ingyuo silyamo. Jerusaleme doko apa yuu ingyuo momo nao pelyamo.
Namwa tembole anda poo pyasi au pinginde namwana rora ambasupimi embena kingi lao lakando kareyami kande doko isareme yango kokwa soo muku reteyami kande. Yuu pandape namwame mona nyingi kandale dupwa pyao kwaeyo nembasi silyamo.
Kamongome nambana wambunya ateŋa pii doko sepala yano pyalana rapa rapa piro kareyonopape angi laa nayami letamo. Nakamame namba anja karene lao koto kandamilinya kareyonopa nakamame kotalana suu pyao kara nayami. Nambame dae karo lapala nyiso yano doko pyalana lao kareyonopape yuu liti andake range karaminyi peparaeme ateŋa lao piso see nayami.
Nambame nambana wambu mona kana pokapala rangena suu pilyu ote lao rangena kata wapuo pelyaminyi dupwa yuu peparae nyisarowale lao rapa rapa piru karenge.
Nakama elya pali napala namba imbu singi nyakao pyuowako karaminyi. Nakamame semango imambu suu pyapala mena yakape yaonge mare dupwana yao maiyuo karaminyi. Dopa pyuo dokopa loma soo semango yao maingi kana pyare lasi dupwana rendamu pingi dupwa kiso maiyuo karaminyi.
Yuu gii kukwa dokopa kananda yanyandape dupwana papyuo wambu kumasinya imambu dupwame ropaka epo kemali kongwalupi pyuo langiraminyi pimana lao sela pao karaminyi. Wambu dopale dupwame mena minjupi mena ipwangepe anatu ingyuo imambu bange wakale dupwa loma soo kuiyuo maiyaminyi dupwape nao papyuo pyuo karaminyi.
Dopa pingi wambu dupwame wambu menge kando lao, Namwa angi yapasi ingyuo karamwano pilyamoŋo warendasaramiŋi repeta epa nalapape, letaminyi. Wambu dopa pilyaminyi dupwame nambana gyaa kata sisuku pyambwakaminyisa nambana imbu singi nakama keta palamo doko isare ingyuo rao kookana lokwasi lapala waiya lao awa awa pyuo otara ingya nalyamo.











Kamongome dopa letamo. Nambame yake yuupi enenge ingyuo wasaronopa wambowana pingi dupwa dopale kandape panda dapale kandape lao suu pyaa narami, letamo.
Nambame pyuo wasakaro dokona lao rae maiyuo kenane pyao karalu kararami. Nambame Jerusaleme enengende wasarono dokona raeme kumungi renge iki simbwaro seramopa banya range wambu dupwa raeme kumarami.
Yuu enengepe dokona wambu dupwape kandarono dokopa namba range keta rae maingi renge palyuo simbwara. Yuu dokona ee lengepe dee mende pirasa nyisinya lao pisingipi mende see nara.
Wane wanakepe ene nyaŋasa dokopa kuma narami. Wambu peparae palyuo karo emo kumungi kakapu kumarami. Wambu ee kana andete (100) nembo pisirami dupwa kandarami dokopa mapwae parangepeko lao kandarami. Ee kana andete (100) dusipa karapa nao wambo kanya pyapu lao kumarami ramo dokopa nambame nakama keta randa palena lapisa pilyamo larami.
Wambu dupwame anda pipala dokona nakama rangeko paliraminyipa wambu wakale mendeme panda nyakami narami. Wambu isa girapo ee wara pipala nakama rangeme jingi lyuo ipwa waene wasapala rae maiyuo naraminyipa mendeme nyakami naramiko.
Nambana wambu dupwa makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaraminyipa nakama bange nyelana randa nao yulu andake piyami dupwa nyepala rae maiyuo minyuo kararami.
Yulu pirami dupwa mona karo andaramopa nakamana wane wanakepe dupwa randa andake nyii narami. Nambame nakamape dee ene manjo para pyao paraminyi dupwape yuu gii ene eparamo dupwana elyape keta piso puu paro.
Dopa pyuowako dee nakama nambapa lao ene ateŋa lao otapa naraminyipa kanyasa isingi yano pyakamiru.
Yana suwa kararope sipisipi yakane dupwape nenge mendakinya narami. Mena laene dupwame bulamakao nenge rambi yanda dupwa nengenyili pyuo nao kararami. Kau dupwa wambu nalanako pinginyili pyuo paa napala anjiki pyuo serami. Sayone nambana yuu kyau poo pyasi dokona koo renge dee randa nyingi rengepe mende see nara.
Kamongome lao, Yake doko nambana kiŋinya isa petenge rate silyamo. Isa yuu doko nambana kimbu kararo petenge. Anda apiyakale mende pyakaramisi? Yuu anjukundena namba palirusi? letamo.
Namba rangena kingi dokome yuu muu peparae pyuo wasiyu. Wambu lapome namba iki mupwa lao suu pyao pako warombo soo nakamana koo dupwa polo lao yaki nyepala inyimungu karenge dupwa kando namba epe soo karenge, letamo.






















Pii dapwa akali Jeremaya Ilikayana ikinyingi doko pii leyamo dupwa palamo. Ilikaya baa yuu taone Anatote lenge akali Benjamena yuu lili dokona purisi yulu pyuo karenge.
Akali Josaya Amonena ikinyingi doko Juta wambunya kiŋi ee kana akalisa ipisu rema kareyamo dokopa Kamongo dokome Jeremaya keta pii lamaiya.
Dee Josayana ikinyingi Jiyoakwimi baa kiŋi kareyamo dokopa Kamongo dokome kambako pii lamaiya. Dokopa Kamongome baa enakana yuu malu mee pii lamaiyamo pao Josayana ikinyingi akali Setekaya dokome isiyamo pao ee kana akalisa ipisu mendaki ingiya. Ee kana dokona kana kingi paki dokopa Jerusaleme wambu dupwa karapusi ingyuo puu maiyuo nyuo peyami.
Kamongo dokome namba Jeremaya langyuo lao,
Nambame emba endakinyinya ingi anda dokona wane ingyalana karo dokopa wambo rombo palyiyu. Dee emba manjipa nayaminyipa wambu rara dupwana peparae emba poropeta karare lao wambo rombo palyuo kaeyo, leya.
Dopa leyamosa nambame isingi lao, Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa, namba wane ene. Namba pii lalana saka nange, leyo.
Dopa leyonopape Kamongome soo nembo lao, Emba wane ene karo laa napala pao nambame lape leto pii dupwa wambu keta lamaiyakape, leya.
Dokona lao namba embapa role pyao kyawa minyaroŋo nakamame mende pirami lao paka nyii napipi. Namba Kamongo dokome leto, leya.
Lapala enakana Kamongo banya kingi doko pyasinju lapala nambana kambu doko minyandeya. Minyandapala namba langyuo lao, See! Nambame pii emba langilyu dupwa emba kaeya nao lape.
Epapu dakepa nambame emba pawa jepala yuu muu wakale wakale dupwa kiŋinya yuu wakale wakalena iso karape lao rombo palyipunu pilyamoŋo. Pyao lalyinyi nembo pyao kokwa sinyi nembo pyao rakapyanyi nembo pyao ralyuo neta kupinyi nembo apa yuu pyao dee minyalyuo pyuo pyuo pupi lao rombo palyilyu kande, leya.
Lapala Kamongo dokome namba piso soo, Jeremaya emba aki kandelepe? leya. Dokopa nambame isingi lao, Isa mende kingi amene lenge dokona wangya doko kandelyo, leyo. Ipurunya pii dokona kingi amene doko iso kando karenge kuki dopale lenge.
Dokopa Kamongo dokome lao, Emba kapa letene. Nambana pii dupwa kinyi angingyuo epelyape lao iso kando karo, leya. Ipurunya pii dokona kingi amene doko iso kando karenge kuki dopale lenge.
Dokopa enakana Kamongo dokome namba kamba pii langyuo, Emba dee bange aki kandelese? lao namba piso siya. Dokopa nambame isingi lao, Namba kandelyo doko yuu dulurena sanapenge mendena ipwa bolo pyao karamo doko daerena ingyuo kulimbuo palinya pilyamo, leyo.
Wambu rara peparae yuu dakena palaminyi dupwa keta randa doko ipwa ingyuo bolo pyao dorena piso nakama keta epara.
Renge dokona wambu dorena ingyuo palaminyi rara dupwa peparae epena lao nambame kee leto. Nakamana kiŋi dupwame yuu Jerusaleme kana kamena kambu dokona nakamana kiŋinya petenge isa dupwa nyuo reto dee kana kame dokona awali lao reto pirami. Pipala Juta yuu menge taone karenge dupwana opetaeko awali lao pirami.
Nambana wambu dupwame yulu koo pyuo namba kame sepala yaki nyilyaminyi dokona nambame nakama randa mairu. Nakamame anatu wakale dupwa mena pyao kiso mailyaminyi dee mee bange anatu lao kingimi wasapala lakandelyaminyi.
Jeremaya, rapa rapa pipala namba emba pii peparae lape lao pii langilyu dupwa nakama pao lamaipi. Epapu nakama kando paka napipi. Epapu emba pakare ramo nakama pipya role kararaminyi dokopa emba pakanyi pyambwasasaroŋo paka napipi.
Jeremaya, emba see. Wambu peparae yuu dakena range dupwamepe Juta kiŋi dupwamepe akali mupwa dupwamepe purisi dupwamepe dee wambu dupwamepe emba kando pimwaiyuo larami. Dopa laraminyipape yuu taone porai ane isame pingi dee kone kaname kana kame awali lao pingi porai dopale ingyuo wambu dupwa nyuo isa palyuo emba karalase lao nambame porainya renge jilyu. Nakamame emba nyuo isa palya narami. Nambame emba role karo konambe ingyuo alya minyaronopa karare. Namba Kamongo dokome leto, leya.

Kamongome namba langyuo,
Wambu peparae Jerusaleme petaminyi dupwa wai pii dake lamaila pupi. Nakama wane ene dokopa namba yaki nyii nao suu pyao mona reto kareyami kande lao suu pyao karapunu pilyamo. Enda mapwae kanda soo yapo nyepala dokopa mona retalamuli pyuo nakamame namba mona reto kareyami. Nakama yuu muiyane dokonape dee yuu ee nengepe wara pii nange dokonape nakama namba moko minyuo epeyami.
Isaraele wambu nakama nambana iki yapasi ingyuo wanyi wanyi pyuo peteyami. Wambumi nakama randa jiyami dupwa keta nambane lekeleke koo rao randa nyinya lao maingi. Namba Kamongo dokome leto, leya.
Nakama Isaraele rara dupwa peparae Kamongona pii dake, selapa.
Kamongome letamo. Aki yulu koo lapo embena rora ambasu dupwame namba keta kando nyiyamisi? Aki mendeme nakama namba yaki nyuo peyamisi? Nakamame mee bange angi daale dupwa lakando papala nakama kapa palyuo kara nalyaminyi.
Namba nakama Isipi wambu keta kiiramo nyiyu. Nyepala yuu muiyane nenge pulya nange yuu yando dee dokonape mendali pao pii nange yuu dokona lanyuo peyo. Peyonopape nakamame namba Kamongo dokoŋo lao pyapi pyuo soo kara nayami.
Nambame nakama yuu amenge pingi nenge jingi lyingipi singi dupwana rae maiyuo dee nenge lapo dupwana rae maiyuo pirami lapala nambame nakama lanyuo peyo. Dopa piyunupape nakamame yuu au pyuo narami doko suu pyao nakamame nambana yuu doko lulya ranyi nembo kokwa siyami.
Purisi dupwame Kamongo anja karase? lao piso see nayami. Namba rangena purisi dupwame namba soo nyii nayami. Akali mupwa dupwame nambamoo pipya mona kana pokoyami. Poropeta dupwame mee bange kingimi wasisi Bealo lenge dokona lao poropeta pii leyami dee mee bange angi mende ingya nayamo dupwana kingi lao peyami.
Dokona lao namba Kamongo dokome nambana wambu dupwa pipya yanda pimwaiyuo nambana kote pii doko lao retakamiru. Nakamana para pyaraminyi dupwa keta nambame nakama koo piyami laro.
Neta yalyingi dorena yuu kuki Saiporasa dokona pupi. Papala yuu Keta dokona neta pyakaenge dorena ingyuo mendali pena lape. Larene dokopa yulu dapale mende wamba pii nangende piyamo kanda nangende pira doko emba kandare.
Wambu rara yuu liti wakale dupwame nakamana anatu dupwa anatu angi daa ingiyamopape yaki nyepala kaeya nange. Dopa piyamopape nambana wambu dupwa nambame nakama rape rape lao minyingi doko kaepala mee bange anatu dupwame nakama kando mende pii nara doko nambana panda dokona alowa pyuo dupwana kingi lao karaminyi.
Dokona nambame yake doko yuusili minyili lao paka pinyi pyambuo yamarangunya lao romo romo andake pinya lao leto.
Dokona lao nambana wambu dupwame yulu koo lama ingyuo piyami. Nakamame namba ipwa kamuo nenge guu lao epenge doko mata jiyami. Jepala nakamame ipwa pete sinya lao yuwale kyasiyami. Kyasiyaminyipape yuu kipwa kipwa dupwa yando nao poro lao rali pipala ipwa naku pao karo angi see naya.
Isaraele wambu dupwa nakama kendemande daa. Nakama kendemande ingyuo manjo nyii nayami. Nakamana nyisu pentenge dupwame akipamo koto pyao karamisi?
Nakamame Isaraele dupwa kando menda laene ingyuo nenge pyakilyapala pii letaminyi. Nakamame Isaraele wambunya yuu dupwa pyao apa yuu retelyaminyi. Dee nakamana yuu taone dupwa mee ukiaki minyasi sipyamo kame soo kaeyo otelyaminyi.
Waa, yuu Memipisi akalipi dee yuu Tapanese akali dupwamepe Isaraele wambunya kyawa kuli doko pyao poro lakamilyaminyi.
Nambame nakama Isaraele wambunya kata wapwakao pupunu dokopa nakamame namba nakamana Kamongo Anatu doko kame soo yaki nyiyami dokome randa dake nakama range keta nyilyaminyi.
Nakamame Isipi pao ipwa Naele dokona ipwa napala aki bange mende nyerama lao suu pilyamisi? Nakama yuu Asiria pao ipwa Yuporisa dokona ipwa napala aki bange mende nyerama lao suu pilyamisi?
Nakama rangena koo dokome nakama randa jera. Dee nakamame namba mata jiyami dokome koo ingyuo karaminyi lao lasaka pirasa pira. Dopa piramo dokopa nakamana Kamongo Anatu namba doko yaki nyuo kaeyamo doko yulu ama koo wakasa lao soo nyerami. Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa Ama Porai dokome lapunu pilyamo.
Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome lao, Isaraele wambu dupwa nakamame yuu wamba nambana porainya renge doko kilya kandeyami. Nakamame namba kamba lao warombo soo lakanda nayami. Lapala yuu kyau ketae dupwanape dee isa renge isarena dupwana anatu angi daa dupwame namwana ee nengepe menape ree palupi dupwa kapa andanyi pyambungi lao lakandeyami.
Nambame nakama isa girapo yapasi waingi angi doko dopale wara piyu. Dopa piyunupape nakama epapu apiyakale karamano lao kandalapa. Nakama isa girapo momo nao kupwa nenge koo dopale ingilyaminyi.
Nakama sopo porai dokome wate piminyipape nakamana koo doko kyaya roo dopale ingyuo mee piro karapyamo kandelyo.
Apa pyuo namwa range koo pali nangeŋe. Namwa mee bange anatu kingi Bealo doko lakanda nangeŋe laramisi? Nakama yuu anda lama lama dokona apa pyuo koo piyami doko kandalapa. Nakama mena kamele inya pundapala kalyuwa koto ralo papyuo karenge dopale ingilyaminyi.
Yuu muiyane dokona papyuo karenge mena kamele pundapala kalyuwa nyelana suu pingi dokopa mendeme baa minyaro see nange ingilyamo. Dee mena kamele kalyuwa mendeme mena kamele inya doko nyelana suu pingi dokome koto paa nange. Kamele inya dokome wambo pao rapa rapa piru karenge. Nakama dopale ingilyaminyi.
Isaraele dupwa mee anatu angi daa dupwa anja lao pete pete papiramisa nakama kimbu kape rando dee nakamana pendoko nyuo pisaraŋa dopa pyuo papi nalapape. Pii naraminyipape nakamame lao, Daaŋa namwa kapu kyuo epa narama. Namwa mee bange anatu wakale dupwa mona retapala dupwa moko minyuo panya pilyamano letaminyi.
Kamongo dokome lao, Waa nyingi akali doko minyaro nyepala kando lenge dokopa baa pakao elyange. Doko suu pyao nakama Isaraele wambu peparae elyame kumarami. Nakamana kiŋipi akali mupwa dupwape purisi dupwape poropeta dupwape peparae elyame kumarami.
Nakamame lao, Isa doko namwana rakane dee kana doko namwana endangi letaminyi. Dokona nakama peparae elya nyerami. Dokona nakamame namba mata jepala namba karo dokona kapu kyuo epa naminyidokona dake pipalako kaeyaro. Dopa piminyipape nakama randa nyepala dokopa nambame nakama kyawa lete nyele ipu lao piso singi.
Nakama rangena anatu kingimi wasiyami dupwa anja karamisi? Nakama koo keta palipala rangena anatu dupwame nyisingi ramo doko nyisinya larami. Juta wambu dupwa nakamana yuu taone malu karenge dokoko suu pyao nakamana mee bange malu anatuŋu lao karaminyi.
Nakama mumu lao pii letaminyi doko akisi? Akipamo nakamame nambamoo pipya yanda pimwaiyuo letamisi?
Nambame nakama mana langyuo pyalana pipunupape dokome nakama nyiso rola nalyamo. Nambame nakama kata rolae lasaka pyuo dopa pii dapa lao langi laa nalyaminyi. Mena laene gasimwa pokapala nenge nenge manjo pii lenge dopale ingyuo nakamame nakamana poropeta dupwa pyao kumuyami.
Isaraele wambu dupwa nambame apa letene lao selapape. Nambame nakama kando yuu muiyane dopale ingyuo dee yuu iminjingipi randa sipurengepe yuu dopale ingyuo karose? Namba dopa pii nange dokona akipamo nakama namba karo dokona kapu kyuo epa naramaŋa lao yulu nakama rae mailyamanuli pyuo pinya letamisi?
Enda mapwae dokome baa kalya pyuo akali nyela penge dokona banya mamakupi dee kalya bangepe dupwa kame soo yaki nyingisi? Doko daa. Dopa pii nange doko kaepala nambana wambu dupwame yuu gii malu namba kame silyaminyi doko yaka lapenge daa.
Isaraele wambu dupwa nakama pamuku endame akali anja karaminyi lao pyarako soo nyingi dopale ingyuo palyaminyi. Nakamame kamame koo wakasa pilyaminyi dokona pamuku enda wakale dupwa nakamana yulu koo pilyaminyi doko kando mana nyilyaminyi.
Akali kuki mee kamenge karenge dupwa waa nyakaminyipili lao pyaminyisa ranjama dupwame nakamana komau dupwa para para pilyamo. Dopa pyuo karapalape
nakamame lao, Namwa koo pii nange. Kamongo dokome namwa kando imbwa nara, lao letaminyi. Dopa laraminyipape nakama koo pipala koo pii nalyamano letaminyi dokona namba Kamongo dokome nakama randa jero.
Pamuku enda kepo pyuo papingi doko suu pyao nakamana suu pingi alowa pilya pyana pyuo kata wakale wakale pelyaminyi. Dokona Asiria wambu dupwame nakama nyisa nayami. Dopaleko ingyuo Isipi wambu dupwame nakama nyisa naramiko ingyaramopa nakama mona randarami.
Namba Kamongo dakeme wambu nakama mona mailyaminyi dupwa nambame mata mailyuŋu dokona nakama keta bange mendepe jeraminyi nyuo paa narami. Dokona nakama ayemba yuwa lapala elyame kumuo Isipi yaki nyuo eparami.






































































































Kamongo dokome banya wambu dupwa kando lao, Kata kandamae dupwana karapala kandalapa. Kandapala kata anjuku ama wambarae doko lao piso selapape. Piso sepala kata ama keyange doko anja silyape lao pisalapape. Dopa pipala dokona nakama pupwape. Dokopa mona kyuu lao singi renge doko nakama keta paliramo palyuo kararami, leya. Leyamopape nakamame lao, Namwa kata dokona paa narama, leyami.
Dokopa wambu yanda pela epelyaminyi lao pii repe repe lamaiyuo bikuli pii poo lenge doko letape lao isingi akali lapo soo karena lao Kamongo dokome rombo palyiya. Palyiyamopape nakamame lao, Namwa doko see narama, leyami.
Dokona lao Kamongo dokome lao, Nakama wambu rara dupwa peparae selapape. Sepala nambana wambu dupwa keta mende piramo doko nakama mana nyelapape.
Isa yuu dokona palaminyi dupwa selapa. Nakamame koo pimwali yaka lao suu pyao nambana pii warombo see nao dee nambana mana pii dokona kamba lao piminyi dokona wambu dupwa nambame pyao kokwa soo kumuo nembaro, leya.
Yuu Sepa piso nakamame rendamu pingi doko namba keta minyuo epeyaminyipape mona karo nyaka nalyo. Panda yuu wakale nanesa rae bange lapo nenge rende pinya lao minyuo epeyaminyipape dupwana lao mona nyii nalyo. Nakamana nenge kiso jeraminyi dupwa nambame rae maiyuo nyakami naro. Dee mena pyao kiso jeraminyi dupwana nambame rae maiyakami naroko.
Dokona lao namba Kamongo dokome wambu dupwa lukumakapala pao palena lao piru. Pirunu dokopa ikinyingi rakangepe dupwa kumarami dee parali maki palengepe puu minyingipi dupwa opetae kumaramiko.
Kamongo dokome lao, Yuu dulurena piso yuu mendena range wambu lapo epelyaminyi. Wambu rara nanesa wakale porai lapome yanda pinya lao rapa rapa pilyaminyi.
Nakama wambu sakame kumuo nyisa nao randa maiyuo pyakando pingi dupwame nakamana yandape wua gelape nyilyaminyi. Nakamana mena ose matana piso epenge dokopa ipwa kota pete doko kasakole minyuo pii lenge dopa pyuo gulu galu lao epenge. Nakama Jerusaleme wambu pipya yanda pinya lao rapa rapa pisi epelyaminyi.
Dokopa Jerusaleme wambu dupwame lao, Namwa pii doko simwa. Sepala namwa porainya renge mende pali napala namwana kingi dupwa yukyuo wale letamo. Enda wane manjinya mata pilyamo dokopa randa andake nao karenge doko suu pyao randa reeko doko namwa keta sii lao epelyamo.
Doko namwana nyisu petenge dupwame nakamana pepona dupwa minyaro karo pyalana lao rapa rapa pyuo paka renge andake paleta namwa nyuo kako pyao karaminyi dokome namwa yuu muu wangupi dee yuu katape dupwana panya pakalyamano, leyami.
Dokopa Kamongome lao, Nambana wambu dupwa kumanda piso wapungi komau doko wapuo pee pyapala kumanda pisipwape. Mendalimi nakama pyao kokwa sela epelyamo doko aopa minyarara dokona nakamana ikinyingi mendaki doko kumulyamopa ee lao kaumi kumuo petengenyili pyuo pisirami.
Jeremaya, Embame kana golo dupwa kisapala apiyakale lao makande pyuo kandenge dopale ingyuo embame nambana wambu dupwa makande pyuo kandape.
Nakama mona kana pokapala kamba lao simbi simbi pyuo pilyaminyi. Nakama kone kanape anepe poraingi dopale ingyuo pelyaminyi. Nakama peparae koo pyuo nembo nembo pii minyuo papyuo karaminyi.
Kana golope anepe kisingi panda doko rao isasa pyuo alyuo karenge. Dopa pilyamopape kana golo koo dupwa rao lili lao nyisa epo paa nange. Doko nambana wambu koo pingi dupwa nyisa nyuo paa nange dokome nakama elyape inginya lao rolo waso pii narama ingilyamo.
Namba Kamongo dokome nakama kando rae mai nao mata maiyu dokona nakama mee koo ingyuo nembenge dopale larami, Kamongome letamo.
Dokopa Kamongo dokome Juta wambu dupwa tembole anda kame kambu kingi wapambupi lakao misi lala peyaminyi dokona namba puu lao nembeya. Baame namba Jeremaya langyuo lao, Emba dokona karapala Isaraele wambunya Anatu Kamongo Porai Wakasa dokome nakama mende lamairu doko nambame nyuo lamaipi, leya. Nambame nakama palaminyi dokona palyuo karalapa lao larowaleŋe nakamana nenge nao kata papyuo pii laope dee yulu pyuope pilyaminyi dupwa alowa pipwape lapya.
<range>
<range>
Wambu lapome nakama minyako pyuo kyambo langyuo, Dake Kamongona tembole anda dokome namwa randa nyii nao kapa karamano lao larami pii dupwa soo nyii nalapape.
Nakama palu karo pilyaminyi dupwa alowa pipwape. Dee yulu pilyaminyi dupwa kaeyalapape. Nakama yango mendali kando angi angi lapala lapo kandanyi palyili lao kara nalapape.
Karo wambu yuu wakale rangepe wambu muiyanepe enda waiyape dupwa isa palyili lao laa narami. Dee yuu dakena wambu kamenge karaminyi dupwa pyao kumaka nalapape. Dopa pipala nakama kokwa sisaraŋa mee bange kingimi wasisi anatuŋu lenge dupwa lakanda nalapape.
Nakama yulu koo doko yaki nyerami ramo dokopa yuu nambame nakamana rora ambasupi maiyalu maiyuo maiyunu dakena palyuo karalu karalapa lao piru lapya Kamongo dokome.
Kandalapa. Nakamame kyambo lao panga soo minyako pyuo pii lenge dupwana soo nyuo minyilyaminyi.
Dopa pyuo pao nakamame waa nyuo wambu yango pyamwalinya suu pyao enda kepo pyuo dee kinyi angi lete lao kingi ketae nembo kyambo lengepe mee bange anatu kingimi wasisi kingi Bealo lenge doko mena pyao kiso maiyuo dee kingimi wasisi bange wakale anatuŋu lenge lapo nakama wamba soo kanda nange dupwa lakando pelyaminyi.
Nakamame namba yulu rae mai nao epe kanda napunu dupwa pilyaminyi. Pipala dokopa namba rangena tembole anda dokona epo nambana lenge kambu sipya dokona karapala lao, Namwa kyawa lete nyisi karamano, letaminyi.
Nambana tembole anda doko waa nyingi dupwana yalu pingi panda lao suu pilyamisi? Nakamame doo pilyaminyi dupwa nambame kandelyo. Nambame panda wambo kanda soo namba lakandena lao rombo palyiyunu yuu Sailo dokona pupwape. Papala dokona nambana Isaraele wambu dupwa koo piyaminyisa nambame apa pyuo randa maiyu doko kandalapape.
<range>
Nakamame yulu koo peparae nambame kingi lalono kandape dusipa pingi. Dopa piminyisa nambame nakama kamba kamba langyuo kareyonopape kamba lenge. Lapala nambame kee leyono dokona isingi yano pyaa nange.
Dokona lao yuu Sailo tembole anda dokona piyunu yulu dokoko nambana tembole anda nakama mona pyamalyaro karaminyi dakena piru. Dae yuu dake nambame nakamana rora ambasu dupwa maiyuo dee nakama joo piyunu doko nambame yuu Sailo randa maiyuo yulu piyunu doko suu pyao piru.
Nambame nakamana ree palu wambu Isaraele rara dupwa nyisa rekya lao nembeyo dokoko suu pyao nambame nakama nambana lenge kambu dokona nyisa ramanyi rekya lao nembaro lao namba Kamongo dokome leto. Kamongome lapya namba lare leya Anatumi.
Kamongo dokome lao, Jeremaya wambu dapwana lao ateŋa lakami napipi. Dee ee laope nakamana reke lao ateŋa laope pii nareko. Nambame embena ateŋa doko soo nyuo yano pyaka naroŋo dokona namba piso sokondali pyuo laa napipi.
Yuu Jerusaleme kata dupwanape dee yuu Juta taone dupwanape yulu pilyaminyi doko emba kanda nalese?
Doko wane wanake dupwame isa ponale yapo nyuo malu palyilyaminyi. Akali dupwame isare pete wasilyaminyi dokopa enda dupwame mee bange kingimi wasisi enda anatu yake pandana kuini lenge dokona nenge palawa doko ipwa pipya pyaso minyapala nenge kyake wasakamilyaminyi. Dopa pipala nakamame namba randa jelana suu pyao ipwa waene dupwa kamame kulimbuo anatu wakale dupwa mailyaminyiko.
Dopa piminyipape namba rolae angi doko randa jilyamisi? Daa nakama range keta randa nyuo dee elya renge nakama rangeme nyilyaminyiko.
Dokona lao namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome nambana imbu singi andake doko tembole anda dakena kulimbwanyi peyaro. Dee mena wambupi keta kulimbuo peyaroko. Peyapala kamame isape dee ee nengepe isa jingipi dupwana opetaeko peyaro. Nambana imbu singi doko isare dopale mendemepe kapa kunja narami.
Nambana wambu dupwa kana pyare lasi dokona mena pyao kiso jingi lapo kiso otalu oto otarami. Dopa pipala lapo nakama kiso mee joo narami. Dopa piraminyipape namba Kamongo dokome lao, Mena peparae mee langa kamenge narami, langilyu.
Nakamana rora ambasu dupwa yuu Isipi piso lanyuo epeyono dokopa nambame mena pyao kiso mukinyi nembo maingi dokonape nenge kiso maingi dokonape mawa pii mende reta nayo.
Reta nayonopape nakama nambana wambu ingyuo namba nakamana Anatu ingyuo piruŋu nakamame nambana pii dupwa warombo sinya lao lamaiyu. Dokona lao nakama keta bange peparae au pyuo puu paraŋa lao nambame nakama mawa pii lamaiyunuli pyuo palyuo kararami, lamaiyu.
Dopa lamaiyunupape nakama warombo soo kui lao karope pirami ingya nayami. Dopa pingi kandale doko suu pyao nakamana mona koo kana pokonge dupwamepe mende pinya lao lamaiyamo dupwa piyami. Pipala elyape ingyuo kararami doko suu pyao ama kopetame kareyami.
Nakamana rora ambasupi dupwa yuu Isipi yaki nyuo epeyaminyi yuu gii dokona piso pao yuu gii epapu dakepa nambana kendemande akali poropeta dupwa nakama keta peyoko karo.
Nakama kamame mendeme pii wangu lakapala soo pii nayami. Dopa pyuo au pyuo karapenge doko kaepala nakamana rora ambasupi kwaeyaminyi dokope daa. Nakama mona kana pokapala mata joo pelyaminyi.
Dokona lao Jeremaya, embame pii dasipa peparae nambana wambu dupwa lamairi. Lamairinyipape nakamame embena pii see narami. Dee embame kee larenepapae nakamame isingi yano pyao laa naramiko.
Embame nakama lamaiyuo, Nakamana rara dupwame nakamana Kamongo Anatu doko namba kando warombo see nao dee nakamana randa epeyamo dupwana mana nyuo kando soo gisa nangeko lare. Anatu kando mondo lao suu pingi doko kumuo pelyamo. Nakamame renge doko dee arome pyao see narami ingilyamo, lare leya.
Jerusaleme wambu dupwa kyawasi angasipi pyao kumanda pisipwape. Namba Kamongo dokome imbu singi nyuo nambana wambu dupwa mata maiyuo kilya kandeyo dokona yuu kyau ketae dupwana malu pinya ee lao kenane pingi pyao karalapape.
Juta wambu dupwa yulu koo piyami. Nambana tembole anda dokona nakamana mee bange kingimi wasisi anatuŋu lenge namba epe kanda napunu dupwa nambana tembole anda dokona retakapala koo inginyi nembeyami.
Dokona nakamana ikinyingi wanengepe dupwa isare dokona pyao kisaramaŋa lao yuu pau lama lama Inomo lenge dokona kana pyare kingi Topete lenge doko wasiyami. Nambame nakama dopa pinya lao lamai nayo dee doo yulu piyaminyi dokome nambana mona pyaa naya.
Dokona lao yuu koree yuu mende sepa naramopa yuu doko kingi Topete laope panda yuu pau lama lama kingi Inomo laope pii narami yuu gii doko epara. Dopa pyuo laa naraminyipape yuu doko Kingi Wambu Pyao Kumakange Yuu Pau Lama Lama larami. Dokona nakamame wambu dupwa malu piraminyi yuu mendasa wakale see nalyamo dokona wambu malu pirami.
Dokopa kumasi yongo dupwa mena rae lengepe dee yakape dupwana nenge ingyuo nao kararaminyipa mendeme pakanyi pyambuo ralinyi nemba narami.
Dokopa yuu doko muiyane ingyuo sera. Seramopa yuu Juta taone dupwanape dee yuu Jerusaleme dokona kata dupwanape mona pyakalyuo pyao rae maingi rengepe dee endakalipi yapo nyuo rae maiyuo nenge nao petenge dupwape nambame mee ote pinyi nembaro, Kamongome leya.
































Yuu kyaupi dee rambi mena nenge nengepe yando nao kyapuo oteyamo dokona mona randapala ee lao kumaralerale nyuo pisiru. Mendali dokona kata papirami ingya nalyamo. Mena bulamakaope mendepe pii laramo see narami ingilyamo. Yakape mena rae lengepe dupwa ralo puu pao peyami, namba Jeremayame leyo.
Kamongo dokome lao, Nambame yuu Jerusaleme doko kokwa sinya laro. Dopa pipala yuu doko suwa rae lenge makando karena lao piru. Juu wambunya yuu taone dupwa nyuo mee inginyi nembo yuu muiyane seramopa panda dokona mendali pali narami.
Nambame piso soo, Kamongo, akipamo yuu dokona wambu dupwa moko palyuo paa nana lao bulu bulu pyao ukiaki minyasi silyape? Akali api mende mona palikonda pingindeme renge dake soo nyerase? Api keta embame pii doko polo lamaipinyipa pao baame wakale dupwa lamairase? leyo.
Kamongome isingi dopa leya, Nambana mawa pii nakama keta pyao retapu dupwa yaki nyuo nambana kambunya pii ipyamo dupwa letamuli pyuo soo minya napala kamba letaminyi. Dee nambame mende pinya lapunu doko pii nalyaminyi.
Dopa pirami doko suu pyao mona kana pokapala nakamana rakange dupwame pinya lao mana lamaiyaminyili pyuo nakama rangena suu pingi ipyamo doko yeelyo moko minyuo mee bange anatuŋu lao kingi Bealo lenge dupwa kingi wapambupi lakao lakandelyaminyi.
Dopa pilyaminyi dokona namba Isaraele wambunya Anatu Kamongo Porai Wakasa dokome mende piru doko selapape, leya. Nambana wambu dupwa ee nenge kau pingi lapo nena lao maiyuo mauli ipwa lapo nao pinya lao mairu.
Nambame nakama yuu wakale lapo nakamape nakamana rora ambasupimi paa nange dupwana pyao ralyuo bolombalo lao pena lapala nambame ami yanda singi keta nyinyi piso pyao kokwa sinyi nembaro.
Kamongo Porai Wakasa dokome lao, Mende apa pipya kandapisi lao poraiyuo suu pyalapape. Enda kumanda piso ee lao petenge dupwa epena lalapape. Malu pinya pilyaminyipa enda lapome ee lao kenane pingi dupwa epena lalapape, leya.
Dokopa wambu dupwame lao, Yuu gii mende mee nemba nao waiya lao namwana lao malu pinya ee lao kenane pingi mende pyao petena lalapape. Namwana lenge kapa doko ee ipwangeme simbuo lembakisa doko rombe laramo pisimanale.
Ee poponge yuu Sayone dokona piso ipyamo doko apa pyuo koo keta palipala letaminyi lao selapa. Namwa elya nyulu nyuo nyilyamano. Renge namwana anda yuupi dupwa kwaeyasi silyamo dokona namwa yaki nyuo kaeyalu kaeyo kaeyarama ingilyamo.
Enda dupwa Kamongo dokome apa letamo lao sinya leyo. Banya pii doko kale yukupala selapape, leyo. Wanenge dupwa kumanda piso ee larami lao mana lamainya. Dee nakamana puu minyingi dupwa malu pinya dokopa apa pyuo kenane pingi doko mana lamairami, leyo.
Kumungi renge doko namwana windowa kata dokona kolando epelyamo. Epo namwana kiŋinya anda kambu dokona epelyamo. Epapala yuu taone kata barete andake dupwana wane wanakepe karaminyi dupwa pyao nyilyamo. Dee makete yuu dupwana akali parange karaminyi dupwa epo pyao nyilyamoko.
Dopa pipala yongo kumasi dupwa yuu dupwana muu raleya. Dopa pipala menana ii rasi yuu dupwana malu palyarapu singi dopale ingyuo silyamo. Dee witi pyakepenge dokome mungyuo nyingi akali dupwame nyerami lapala mendemepe nyuo malu palya nange pyakepo bolombalo lao yaki nyingi dopale ingyuo silyamo. Kamongo dokome pii dokona lakape, langipya, leya.
Kamongo dokome letamo. Mona palenge akali dupwame nakamana mona palyuo soo nyinginya renge doko lakanda nana. Panda akali porai dupwame nakamana porainya renge doko range lakanda nanako. Akali bange malu retenge dupwame nakamana bange dupwana lao range lakanda nanako.
Mendeme range lakandalana suu pyara ramo doko baame namba Kamongo doko soo nyuo soo giso pilyamo dokona lakandara. Renge dokona nambame wambu mona retenge doko reto puu penge. Dopako pyuo nambame pii pali nana lao yulu rolae dupwa kapa pyuo puu penge. Renge dolapome namba rae mainyi pyambungi, Kamongo dokome letamo.





























































































Yuu panyi pyuo nenge see nao piyamo dokona lao Kamongona pii doko namba Jeremaya keta epo leya.
Juta wambu dupwa ee lao kumaralerale nyuo kumanda petaminyi. Nakamana yuu taone dupwa isa pelyamo. Nakamana wambu dupwa mona randame kumuo isa yuu dupwana nangalo kyaso silyaminyi. Dee Jerusaleme wambu dupwa nyisinya lao ee letaminyi.
Wambu bange malu retenge kamongo dupwame nakamana kendemande dupwa ipwa kamwala pena lami. Ipwa petenge isa yuunya singi mauli pete yale dokona kamwala pumi doko pisa napyamo kamuo nyii nalyaminyi. Dopa pipala nakama mee pee minyuo anda epelyaminyi. Epapala nakama ipwa pisa nalyamo lao pao mona kendapala apa pirama lao ee lao lenge kambu yambe pyao nee pyuo epelyaminyi.
Dopa pyuo apu epa napyamo dokome yuu dupwa yando nao kyapwapala oo lapyasa pama akali dupwa mona yanyi pilyamo karapala nakama lenge kambu dupwa yambe pyao karaminyi.
Dokopa ee yuu rambi andenge dupwa ando kara napyamosa mena diya lenge dokome banya yakane doko anju kipa nao sinya lapala kaelyamo.
Mena donge rae lenge dupwa yuu kyau ketae dupwana karapala yana suwa kararope dopale ingyuo imambu ŋeeŋaepa lao kumuo nenge isakope naa nayami dokome lopo malawai lapyamopa karaminyi.
Nambana wambu dupwame namba kando ee langyuo dokopa namwana koo wakasa piyama dupwame namwa range randa joo koo keta palyilyamo. Namwa emba karenge lao suu pyao kara napala kata malunya mata joo pao kaeyama. Namwa emba kando koo dupwa piyama. Dopa piyamanopape Kamongo embame nyisaro lao lao kaeyene dokona palyuo nyisape.
Embame Isaraele wambu dupwame mende pirinyi lao sepala mona pyamalyuo lao karenge. Embameko namwana randa dupwana kyawa minyingi. Doko akipamo emba namwana yuu dakena upunili ingyalya ingyana pyuo yuu mendaki mee panya epo luu palipala penge dopale ingyuo karese?
Emba akipamo akali mona nembako kamenge walu lao nyingi dopale ingyuo dee akipamo emba yanda singi lapo porainya renge pali napala nyisalana pako karenge dopale ingilisi? Kamongo emba namwa role karene doko siyamano. Namwa embena wambu embame namwa kyawa yaki nyii napipi, lao letaminyi, leya.
Kamongo dokome wambu dapwana lao leya. Nakama namba yaki nyuo ralo makando pena mona nyilyaminyi. Dopa pipala nakama range kame pyuo minya narami. Dokona lao nambame nakama pipya rae mai nalyo. Dokona nakamana yulu kopetame pilyaminyi dupwa nambame suu pyaro. Suu pyapala nakamana koo dupwana randa mairu, leya.
Kamongo dokome namba langyuo lao, Wambu dapwa nyisapili lao namba piso see napipi, leya.
Nakama nenge naa napala nambame nyisa lao ee laraminyipape nambame nakamana ee see naro. Nakamame namba mena kiso joope dee nenge witi jingi kiso joope piraminyipape nambame nakama kando rae mai naro. Dokona ingyuo nambame nakama yanda pirami mendena lopo maiyuo yanyi maiyuo pyao kumakaro, leya.
Dokopa nambame lao, Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa, poropeta akali dupwame wambu dupwa lamaiyuo, Liti dakena yanda mende pii nao lopo see nara. Renge doko embame lalu lao lao mona kyuu lao singi renge doko iki yuu dakena seramo pisirami lapiŋi lao lao karaminyi, leyo.
Dopa leyonopape Kamongo dokome isingi lao, Poropeta akali dupwame nambana kingi dokona lao kyambo letaminyi. Nambame nakama lala pena lao peeya nao nambame nakama dopa pyuo lena lao pii mendaki mendepe mana lamai napu. Nakama pii repa repa pyuo lenge mee wakale lapo unyi anyi pyuo range pipala letaminyi dupwape mende nambame pinya lao maiyunde daa. Nakama dopa pira dapa piralyamo lao mee tangeme suu pyao letaminyi dupwa mee ingyuo pelyamo.
Renge dokona lao namba Kamongo dokome poropeta akali dupwa namba pena laa napunupa mee rangeme sisu lao nambana kingi lao mee letaminyi dupwa mende piru lao letoŋo. Poropeta pii lao yuu dakena lopo see nao wambu kaku wuape nenge dokona nyuo mapisa nareŋe langilyaminyi dupwa yuu dakena nakama lopo maiyuo wua kakupi nenge dokona nyinyi pisarono kumarami ingilyamo.
Wambu lapo opetae pii letaminyi doko soo karaminyi dupwa dopaleko ingyuo pyao kumakarami. Dokopa nakamana yongo dupwa yuu Jerusaleme kata barete andake dupwana nembaraminyipa wambu mendeme au pyuo nyuo malu pii narami ingyara. Doko etenge ikinyingi wanengepe wambu peparaepe dopako pirami. Nakamana yulu koo dupwana nambame yano nyuo dopa piru, leya.
Kamongo dokome nambana mona rando karapunu dokona wambu dupwa lamairi doko pii dapwa lamaipi, langiya. Nambana wambu dupwa wua kakupi piso kopeta kapeta pyami dokona kukwa korakamape ee dupwa palyamo kata pali naramopa lao kararo ingilyamo.
Namba yuu neta dorena kandaro dokopa akali ayemba pukusi dupwa male lao seramo kandarolyamo. Dee taone dorena parono dokopa wambu dupwa lopome kumuo karaminyi dupwa kandarolyamo. Poropeta purisi akalipi dupwame nakamana yulu doko mee kyawame suu lao pyuo pelyaminyiko dokoŋo angi doko aki pilyamano lao see nalyaminyi.
Kamongo, emba Juta wambu pipya kinyi kinyi mata maiyuo letese? Yuu kyau Sayone wambu dupwa embame epe kanda nalese? Akipamo embame namwa pyuo nyii namili lao randa andake jilisi? Namwa mona seramo karalana koto pumwano dokopa keyange mende kando nyii nalyamano. Namwa pyuo nyereŋe lao suu pyamwanopape paka renge doko epelyamo.
Kamongo, namwame emba kando koo pimwa. Doko namwa rangena koo dupwa polo lao dee namwana rora ambasu dupwana koo dupwa polo letamano.
Embena lalu lao lenge pii dupwa kame see napala embena kingi dokona reke lao namwa mata joo kaeya napipi. Kiŋinya palyuo karenge yuu Jerusaleme dokona elya renge doko minyuo epa napipi. Embena kana minyuo lalu lao lenge pii porai kandale doko yala napipi.
Yuu liti wakale wakale wambunya mee bange anatuŋu lao isa kanape wasisi dupwame apu peya narami. Yake dokome susu lao apu pura pura pyao epena lao nyuo peya nara. Yulu dupwa peparae embame iki inginyi peengepya. Dokona lao namwana Kamongo Anatu emba keta dupwa peparae epara lao soo karamano.
Enakana Kamongo dokome namba langyuo lao, Akali Mosese Samyuelepa dakena karapala namba piso sokondali pyuo lambili doko nambame wambu dapwa sakame kumuo pyuo nyii napuli. Wambu dupwa nyisa pena lape. Wambu dupwa nambana lenge kambu silyamo dokona kara napala neta pena lape.
Nakamame emba piso soo, Anja paramase? leyami kande dokopa nambame letono doko nakama lamaipwape. Lapo yanyi nyepala kumuo parami ingilyamo dokona nakama parami. Lapo yandana kumarami ingiyamo dokona lao parami. Lapo lopome kumuo parami ingilyamo dokona lao parami. Dee lapo dupwa karapusi pyuo minyuo parami ingilyamo dokona parami leto.
Namba Kamongo dokome yulu kisima mona randanyi pyambuo epara dusipa nakama keta pyaka sinya lao suu pyao retelyo. Nakama yanda dokona pao kumaraminyipa nakamana yanenge dupwa suwame ipyalya ipyana pyuo soo parami. Dokopa yaka dupwame napala malarami dupwa suwa menape rae lenge dupwame yuu mendaki nao yuu mapu pinyi nembarami.
Yuu muu peparaena wambu dupwa namba Juta wambu Esakayana ikinyingi Manasa baa Juta wambunya kiŋi ingyuo karo dokopa yuu Jerusaleme dokona yulu koo piyamo dokona lao isingi piru doko kando yamarangyuo pakarami.
Kamongo dokome lao, Jerusaleme wambu dupwa apimi nakama kondome kumuo dee apimi nakama mona randame kumuo ee lao apimi kapa pyuo wangu lakao karo nakama apa pipyamo karaminyi lao piso serase? letamo.
Wambu nakamame namba yaki nyuo kaeyo mata jiminyi dokona nambana imbu singi doko kame pyuo minyuo makapu dokome nambana kingi pyasinju lapala nakama pyao kokwa sinyi nembapu.
Yuu taone peparaena nambame nakama kalendakuna porakana pyao nembele lao nakama nambana wambu dupwa kokwa sinyi nembeyo. Nakamana yulu koo pingi karo doko yaki nyuo kaeya nao minyaro siyaminyi dokona nambame nakamana wane wanake dupwa opetae pyao kumakayo.
Nakama rangena yuu dokona enda waiya dupwa ipwa kota kee kana dupwa manda manja nao kamame wakasa petaminyi. Nambame nakamana wane parange andengena dupwa pyao kumakapala endangi dupwa mona rumbingi petena lao piyu kande. Aopa nambame nakama keta yuu mendaki paka rengepe mona randange rengepe paleta epo piyu.
Enda mendena wane yanda ipingi nyepo kumapyasa baa lulaka pao pembetoko pyapyasa popo nembalana saka nalyamo. Baa eŋa nembo petenge dopa pyuo pisa napala mona rumbingi petamo. Nakama lapo pyapa nalyaminyi dupwa Kamame yanda pimwai keta nyuo mapi sero dokopa pyarami. Pii dusipa namba Kamongo dokome lapusa pilyamo.
Namba keta rae maingi renge pali nalyamo doko aki akalinde karose? Akipamo nambana anyi dokome isa yuu dakena manjo nyiyase? Nambame yuu dakena wambu peparae kando laiya lao apiyanda pyuoko kararolyamo. Nambame kana lapo kyanju pyao nyakamyuope dee nambame lapo mainyi palyuowape pii nangeko. Doŋo wambu peparaeme namba koo keta palyuo letaminyi.
Kamongo nambame embena yulu pyaka nao kinyi letaminyi dupwa pyaka naronde ramo nakamame namba keta koo mende palena letaminyi pii dupwa angi inginya. Dee nambana yanda pimwai randa nao kareyaminyi dokopa nyisa naronde ramo doko randa dupwa namba keta palena.
(Mendeme ane isa doko minyuo roo pyarami ingya nalyamo. Ane isa dulurena kone kaname palya palya pyuo wasingi dupwasa leto, lao, Jeremayame leya.)
Dokopa Kamongo dokome namba langyuo lao, Nambame yanda pimwai dupwa epena lapala nambana wambunya kanape kamongonge bangepe yuu dokona silyamo dupwa nyuo soo pena laro. Renge doko nakama yuu palaminyi dokona kapa kapa pyuo koo pilyaminyi dokona randa maiyuo dopa piru.
Pipala nambana imbu singi doko isare ingyuo angao karalu karamo dokona nambame nakama see naraminyi panda mendasa nakamana yanda pimwai wambu dupwana yulu pyakaminya lao piru, leya.
Leyamo dokopa nambame lao, Kamongo emba silini. Namba suu pyapala nyisape. Wambu lapome namba randa jilyaminyi dupwa isingi randa mairuwale. Nakamame namba pyao kumakalena pilyaminyi dokona embame nakama pyuo karena lao iso karo panda maiyuo kaeya napipi. Embena kingi dokona reke lao karapusi namba kando kilya kando letaminyi doko suu pyape.
Embame namba pii langii dokopa pii mende isa nemba nao siyu kande. Kamongo Anatu Porai Wakasa doko, namba embena kandale. Dokona lao embena pii doko nambana monarena rae maingi mona pyakalyuo pingipi renge dupwa pipya palyuo simbulyamo.
Nambana yuu gii doko wambu lapo pipya mee giinyi kamba sero rae maiyuo mee role pisa nange kandale. Embena pii leene doko warombo soo namba range iki piso wambu koo piyaminyi dupwa kando imbu singi dokome palyuo simbuyamo peteyo kande.
Namba akipamo mee randa nyuoko karose? Akipamo nambana monarena rete dupwa umbwa pii nalyase? Akipamo umbwa pii nalyase? Panyi pipala ipwa epenge sokolyasa nalana lisa pingi. Nambame embapa dopale ingyuo suu pyao karalase lao pilisi?
Dokona dee Kamongo dokome isingi lao, Emba kapu kyuo epare ramo doko nambame emba nyepala dee kamba emba nambana kendemande akali ingyare. Ingyapala pii koo lao papilini doko suu pyao emba wai pii keyange doko larenepa emba dee kamba nambana poropeta akali ingyare. Wambu dupwa kapu kyuo emba karare dokona eparaminyipa emba dee nakama kararami dokona pare ingya nara.
Nambame emba kone kana yale kapa dupwame kana kame porai pingi dopale ingyuo kareene lao suu pyapala nakamame emba isa palya narami ingyara. Nambame emba kyawa minyuo lete wai pyao nyuo kararo.
Nambame akali koo kopetame pingi dupwana porainya renge dupwana emba kyawa minyuo reto kararo lao namba Kamongo dokome lapusa pilyamo, leya.
















































Kamongome namba langyuo,
Yuumi pere warake wasingi akali banya anda parenepa dokona nambana pii emba langiru, leya.
Dopa leyasa papala pere warake wasingi akali banya wasingi taepo repeta yulu pyuo peteyamo kandeyo.
Pere wasiyamo dokona pao kwaeyamo ramo dokopa dee minyuo uki minyapala wara dokome pere mendere wakale wasapa piya.
Dokopa Kamongome namba langyuo,
Nambame nakama Isaraele wambu dupwa pipya pere wasingi akalinya pere wasalana suu pyapyamo doko kaepala uki minyuo wakale wasiyamuli pyuo pii narose? Akali wara minyaro karo mende mende pyuo wasalana suu pilyamuli pyuo pingi kandale. Dopa pyuo nakama nambana kingi kapena karaminyi dupwa dokona palyuo piru.
Nambame yuu lapo maso yuu liti mende lalyuo kokwa sinyi nembaro laronopa
wambu dupwana suu pingi yulu koope dupwa mata maiyuo kaeyarami ramo dokopa namba laro dokona palya nao alowa pyuo kaeyaro, leya.
Dopa pirunupape nambame lao dokopa yuu liti mende pyuo andanyi nembaro laronopape
koo pirami ramo doko pinya larono suu pingi doko kaeyaro, leya.
Dokona lao embame Juta wambupi Jerusaleme palaminyi dupwape randa mainya pipunu dokona dakepa oo randa mainya rapa rapa pyuo kaelyo letamo lao lamaipala koo pilyaminyi dupwa yaki nyuo kata koo papilyaminyi dupwa alowa pyuo kaena lao lamaipi, leya.
Lamairinyipa nakamame isingi kamba lao, Akipamo pii naramase? Namwa mona kana pokapala koo pinya suu pilyamuli pyuo pirama larami, leya Kamongome.
Kamongome lao doko, Isaraele wambu dupwame renge ama koo wakasa lapo pilyaminyi. Renge dopale yuu liti wakale dupwana pyaka siyape lao piso sepe.
Yuu Lepanone kyau ama ketae dokona ase doko yuu lapo see nangese? Yuu manda renge kyaunya ipwa guu lapala epo penge dupwa sokongese? Dopa pii nange.
Dupwa alowa pii napyamopape nambana wambu nakamame namba kame soo kaeyapala mee bange kingimi wasisi dupwana lao rendamu pingi bange kiso mailyaminyi. Nakama paraminyi kata rolae doko ranilyaminyi. Wamba paenge kata doko yaki nyuo kaeyapala nakama kata kyakana pelyaminyi.
Nakama rangena yuu andape kwao paliminyipa kandapala giyalya giyana pyuo karalu karaminyi. Kata lalyalana pirami dupwame kando epe nasepala nenge longanyi nembo pakarami.
Nambame nambana wambu dupwa nakama mata maipala yanda pimwainya lenge kambu dokona porambaiye poraindeme sinjimu poo lao soo pyambuli laro. Lapala randa andake eparamo dokopape nyisa naro, leya Kamongome.
Sepala dokopa wambu dupwame lao, Jeremaya randa maiyuo pyao ralinyi nembamanale, leyami. Lapala dee lao purisi akali lowa mana lengepe dopa pipa dapa pipa lao mana langingi akalipi poropeta akali pii nolako lenge dusipa lao karalu kararami. Dokona lao Jeremaya banya pii laramo doko sakame naramaŋa randa maiyuo kote lamanale, leyami.
Dokona lao nambame ateŋa lao dokopa dopa leyo. O Kamongo, embame nambana pii kale yukupala soo dokopa nambana yanda pimwai dupwame namba randa jinya letaminyi doko soo karakape.
Mendeme keyange piramo dokona koo dokome yole mairaminyi kapase? Dopa piraminyi kapa ingya napyamopape rakaya palena lao kyuwa kyasingi dopale ingyuo namba randa jinya suu pyami. Wamba dokopa Kamongo embame nakama imbu singi nyii napili lapala nakamana lao langyala epeyo kande.
Dopa pyuo karakamyuo kande doko kaepala dakepa nambapa koo pilyaminyi dokona Kamongo embame nakamana wane wanakepe dupwa lopanyi nembapala kumanyi nembape. Yanda dupwana angi nyuo suu lape. Enda dupwana ikinyingi akalingipi kumanyi nembakamipi. Wanyane akali dupwa yandana nyuo papala kumaraminyipa andapae dupwa anga yakane kapape kisapala kumunyale.
Wambu yanda kambu dupwame repe repe lamai nao nakamana anda epapala andambupi nenale leto. Dopa pyuo andakare pisaraminyi dupwa pakame kumapala aa lao ipwa kaku nyinyale. Rakaya palena lao kyuwa kyasili lao namba randa jinya kone makalyaminyi.
Dopako pyuo nakamame namba pyao kumaselana suu pyao karaminyi doko Kamongo emba silini kande. Nakamana koo pilyaminyi doko kame sakami napipi. Koo dupwa nakama keta sinya kaeyape. Embame imbu singi nyepala dokona nakama isa palyuoko karena lao kandaro karape, leya Jeremayame.
Kamongo dokome namba langyuo, Ipwa pee warame wasisi mende ropo pyala puu, leya. Baame namba kamame langyuo, Wambunya akali kyawa dupwana lapope dee purisi akali dupwana lapope nyuo minyuo pupi, leya.
Papala Penge Warame Wasisi Kambilyamo Nembenge Kame Kambu dokona kata pao yuu lama Inomo lenge dokona papala dokona karo baame pii langira dupwa laro ingiya.
Dokopa Kamongo dokome namba dopa lape, langiya. Juta wambunya kiŋi dupwape Jerusaleme wambu dupwape Isaraele wambunya Anatu namba Kamongo Porai Wakasa dokome lalopono doko selapape. Nambame randa andake mende yuu dakena minyuo eparonopa wambu mendeme doko sera ramo doko mona nembo yamarangyuo karara.
Nambame doo pirunu doko wambu dupwame namba kame soo yaki nyepala yuu dake koo inginyi pyambuo kokwa soo mena pyao kiso anatu wakale dupwa maiyami. Nakamape dee nakamana rora ambasupi dee Juta wambunya kiŋi dupwape mee bange anatu see nange dupwa kiso maiyami. Nakamame wambu yulu koo pii nange dupwana ranjama dupwa kulimbuo nembo kareyami dokona dopa piru.
Dopa pipala mee bange anatu kingi Bealo lenge dokona mena kiso maingi dopale ingyuo nakamana wane wanake dupwa isarena kiso mairami dokona Bealona lao kana pyare leyami. Nambame nakama dopa pinya lao mana lamai nange. Dee suu pinginyape epa nangeko.
Dokona ingyuo yuu gii doko oo repeta epelyamo dokopa yuu dake kingi Topete panda yuu Inomo lamako laa narami Wambu Pyao Kuma Singi Yuu Lama laraminyi serami, leya.
Yuu dokona Jerusaleme wambu peparaepe dee Juta wambu peparaepe mende pirama lao lao retelyaminyi dupwa nambame ukiaki minyinyi nembaro. Nakamana yanda pimwai dupwame pyao wini pipala yandana nakama pyao kumakana laro. Nambame nakamana yanenge kakapange kumasi dupwa mena rae lenge yakape dupwame nenge ingyuo nena lao mairu.
Nambame yuu taone dakena randa dopale minyuo epo kokwa seronopa wambu kandama epo paparaminyi dupwa walu lao mona nembo kandarami.
Dokopa wambu yanda pimwai dupwame yuu taone doko nyuo sukusa palyapala wambu pyalena pirami. Pyaraminyi randa doko kamame kopetame wakasa ingyuo paramosa wambu angi yuu taone dokona pisirami dupwame yango mendeme mende pyao nao wane wanake dupwa range pyao nao pirami, leya.
Lapala Kamongo dokome namba langyuo, Akali namba role pyao iminyi dupwana lenge kambu dokona pee warame wasisi doko pyao poro lape, leya.
Lapala wambu dupwa lamaiyuo, Kamongo Porai Wakasa dokome lapya lape. Nambame wambu dupwa kanya pyao liti pyuo yuu taone dupwa pyao lalyuo pirunupa ipwa pee warame wasisi poro lasi dee kamba nyuo kimbu kimbu soo wasa nange dopale ingyarami. Wambu dupwame nakamana kumasi yongo dupwa yuu mendasa malu pirami ingya narasa yuu Topete dokonako malu pirami.
Nambame lalu lao leto. Namba yuu taone Jerusaleme dakepe wambu dakena palaminyi dupwape nyuo yuu Topete dopale inginyi pyambwaro.
Yuu Jerusaleme dokona anda dupwape Juta kiŋi dupwana andape dee anda lapo dupwanape anda yangi ketaerena rendamu pingi dupwa kiso bui dupwa kingi lao maiyami dupwape dee lapona mena kiso maingi dopale ingyuo ipwa waene dupwa mee bange anatu lenge dupwana kulimbuo palyiyami dupwa peparae yuu Topete koo dokome kwaeyasi silyamo dopale ingyuo para, leya.
Dokopa namba Kamongo banya wai pii lakala puu leyamo peyono yuu Topete doko yaki nyuo peyo. Pao tembole anda kamapisa karapala wambu peparae lamaiyuo,
Isaraele wambunya Anatu Kamongo Porai Wakasa dokome lao, Nakama mona kana pokapala nambana pii lapunu doko see nalyaminyi dokona nambame yuu taone dakenape dee yuu taone repeta silyamo dupwanape peparae randa andake mairu lao nambame leyonoli pyuo piru letamo, leyo.
Dokopa purisi akali Pasa lenge akali Imana ikinyingi doko tembole anda dokona mupwa ingyuo kareyamo dokome namba pii renge dokona lao kareyono doko siya.
Sepala baame tembole anda Benjamene Kame Kambu Ketae lenge dokona repeta namba pyapala ane angapumi kiimbuo nyinya leya.
Dokona yangama dokopa Pasame namba neta nyiyamo dokopa nambame baa lamaiyuo, Kamongo dokome embena kingi Pasa kaepala Wambu Paka Renge Maiyuo Paenge Akaliŋi lape lapya, leya.
Kamongo baa rangeme lao, Nambame emba range paka renge joo dee embena puu minyingi dupwa maiyuo pirunupa nakama peparae nakamana nyisu petenge dupwame wua gelame pyao kumakaraminyipa emba kandare, leya. Nambame Juta wambu dupwa peparae nyuo Bapilonena kiŋi akali doko keta mairunupa baa lapo karapusi ingyuo puu maiyuo nyuo banya yuu dokona lanyuo pao dee lapo pyao kumako pira, leya.
Nambame nakamana yanda pimwai dupwame yuu taone andake dakena panda maiyuo kaeyaronopa epo nakambana mena bangepe kamonganyi nembengepe rungi rungi pingipi dupwa peparae andambupi nao nyuo pao dokopa Juta kiŋi dupwana kana bangepe dupwa opetae nyuo yuu Bapilone dokona nyuo pao kaki pirami.
Pasa emba doko embena ree palu dupwape peparae minyarapala nyepala yuu Bapilone dokona lanyuo parami. Dokona emba kumarenepa embena puu minyingi lapo kyambo malu lamaiyuo kareene dupwa pipya malu pirami.
Kamongo embame namba minyoko piinyipa namba minyoko pisi karalyono silyu. Emba keta porai palenge dokome nambapa manda manja nalyamo. Dokona lao wambu dupwame namba kando giyalya giyana pyuo nyuo male male lao karaminyi.
Namba yuu peparaena pii lapunu yaka lao ee lao pii poraiyuo lao pilyu doko Randa Andake Epo Yuu Doko Kwaeyo Para ingilyamo lao lao karapunu pilyamo. Kamongo namba embena pii dokona lao lakao papipunu dokona namba kando yuu peparae giyalya giyana pyuo isa nembele lao letaminyi.
Dopa pipyamo dokona nambame Kamongo kame soo kaepala banya kingi dokona laa naro lao karapunupape Kamongo embena pii pyasi doko nambana mona dokona isare ingyuo koko rao ango silyamo. Sipyasa pii doko neta nyuo laa nalana suu pyapunupape kapa kame pyuo minyaro ingya nao nambana kambu dokona neta epelyamo.
Namba sipunu dokopa wambu peparaeme isa isa paeyo lao, Yuu peparaena paka renge dokonako maipilyamoŋo, letaminyi. Gapomane akali dupwa banya lao lamaimanale. Dopako pyuo nambana puu minyingi angi dupwame namba koo keta palepe lao kandaro karaminyi. Nakamame lao, Mendeme baa alyikilyi pyuo nyuo iso kota nembara dokopa namwame baa minyarapala moŋo mairama, letaminyi.
Dopa laminyipape Kamongo emba ama kamame porai wakasa doko nambapa karene dokona lapome namba randa jilyaminyi dupwa isa parami. Nakama pyuo ayemba palyarami ingya nalyamo dokona elya nyuo karalu kararami. Nakama wini pirama kata mende see nayasa elya nyiyama lao kararami.
Dopa piraminyipape Kamongo Porai Wakasa embame wambu peparae rolae dokona makande pyuo kandenge. Nakamana mona kyawa sisingipi dupwana aki palamo doko embame soo oto karapinyi pilyamo. Dokona nambana randa dupwa embena kingi raka dokona palyilyu. Dokona nambame nyisu petenge dupwa pipya moŋo maiya kare doko kandarowale.
Akali yulu koo pingi dupwame randa maiminyi karaminyi wambu dupwa kiiramo nyingi dokona suu pyao Kamongo doko kenane pyao banya kingi ketae pyambuo lakandamanale.
Namba mandeyaminyi yuu gii doko kopyaliŋi lamana. Anyimi namba mandeyamo yuu gii doko mupwa lao suu pyaa namanale. Kopyali ingyuo peelyamo lao suu pyamana.
Akali mendeme namba mandeyaminyi dokopa wane mende manjakalaminyi lao epo rakane lamaiyuo rae mainyi pyambuyamo akali dokona kingi kopyali ingyuo penale.
Kamongome yuu taone lapo sakame kuma nao pyao kokwa siya dopale ingyuo baa penale. Baa yangama dokopa rando ee larami dokope korakama dokopa yanda pyala panya kee kupi larami dolapo soo karena.
Renge dokona lao namba ingi anda peteyono dokopa akali dokome namba pyao kumaka naya. Manjipa nayamopa namba piyali dokopa nambana anyinya ingi anda doko nambana malu anda ingiyali.
Namba akipamo mandeyamisi? Randa nyuo mona rando elya paleta karo kumare lao mandeyamisi?












































Wambunya akali kyawa dupwame Kamongona wambu dupwa randa maiyuo pyao kokwa soo ralinyi nembo karaminyi dupwa Kamongona kote lenge yuu gii pyaka seramo dokopa randa andake nyeramilyamo.
Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Anatu dokome dopa letamo. Isaraele wambunya akali kyawa dupwame nambana wambu rapu pyakamiramili kata dokona pyaka nalyaminyi. Nakamame pyao kusape palyuo bolombalo lanyi nembakalyaminyi. Dopa pyuo yulu koo doo pilyaminyi dokona lao nambame nakama randa jero, letamo.
Nambame nambana wambu lapo dupwa bolombalo lao yuu wakale dupwana nembeyono dupwa nyuo malu palyuo lanyuo epo yuu andape range dokona peyaro. Dopa pirunupa nakama keta wane wanakepe malu wai kisaronopa rara doko ando nyimbwara.
Nambame akali kyawa lapo rombo palyapala nakama iso karena laro. Nambame nakama kamba randa mai naronopa nambana wambu dupwa dee pako yamarangyuo kara narami. Namba Kamongo dokome lapusa pilyamo.
Kamongo dokome lao, Dapitinya para pyasi dokona yulu rolae pingi mende kiŋi inginya lao wasaro yuu gii doko epelyamo. Yuu liti dokona kapa kapa pyuo kiŋi dokome mona angi palipala anjuku rolae lao rolo pyuo rapu pyuo karara.
Baa kiŋi ingyaramo dokopa Juta wambu dupwa kyawa minyara. Dee Isaraele wambu dupwa manda rao mona seramo palyuo karo pirami. Banya kingi doko Kamongo Namwana Lete Wai Pyao Nyingi, larami.
Kamongo dokome lao, Kamongo lete karalu karenge dokome Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu Isipi piso nyuo minyuo epeyono doko kando wambu dupwame pii porakai mende lalana dokopa nambana kingi lao kinyi leto lao laa narami gii doko epelyamo.
Dopa laa naraminyipape yuu dulurena dee yuu wakale wakale dupwana nambame nakama bolombalo lao nembeyono pao kareyaminyi dupwa nyuo minyuo epeyono Anatu lete karalu karenge doko kando pii porakai mende lalana dokopa nambana kingi lao kinyi leto larami.
