Dokopa nakama rangena yuu dokona palu kararami.
Namba poropeta akali dupwana lao suu pyao mona rumbingi karo mona pupyamo walu walu lao karo. Kamongo dokomepe dee banya pii poo pyasi dokomepe namba ipwa biya napala karenge dopale inginyi pyambulyamo. Akali mende ipwa waene malu napala lao kararamuli pyuo lao karalyono.
Wambu malu yuu dakena simbuo palipala Kamongona yulu mondo lao pii nao kaelyaminyi. Nakama yulu koo dupwanako suu pyao pimisa nakamana yulu angi doko yaki nyilyaminyi. Kamongome yuu doko kwaeyo pena leyamo dokona rambi isakope dupwa kyapuo yanda nao kumuo pupyamosa ee lao kumanda petaminyi.
Kamongo dokome lao, Poropeta purisi akalipi dupwa Anatu soo nyii nalyaminyi. Tembole anda angi dokona pao yulu koo pyuo kareyaminyi kando nyiyu, letamo.
Nakama kata moko minyuo pelyaminyi dupwa iminjo keta keta pira. Nambame nakama lukumakapala pao palena lao piru. Nambame nakama keta randa andake mairu. Nakamana randa nyerami yuu gii doko epelyamo. Namba Kamongo dokome leto.
Yuu Samaria dokona poropeta akali dupwame koo piminyi doko kandelyo. Nakambame mee bange anatu lao Bealo lenge dokona kingi lapala nambana wambu dupwa ralinyi neta nembelyaminyi.
Dopa piminyipape yuu Jerusaleme dokona poropeta akali karaminyi dupwame yulu koo ai pingi doko piminyi kandelyo. Nakamame enda kepo pipala pii kyambo letaminyi. Wambu dupwa yulu koo pinya lao kata lasaka pyuo karaminyi dokome wambu mendeme yulu koo dupwa yaki nyii narami ingilyamo. Nambame kandapu dokopa yuu Sotoma Gomora dolapona koo piyaminyi dopale manda manjo pelyamo.
Dokona lao namba Kamongo Porai Waksa dokome Jerusaleme poropeta dupwana lao dake leto. Nakamame Anatunya akali ingyuo kara naminyi dokona wambu dupwa mana nyilyaminyi. Dokona nambame isako kau pingi wara piru karamo dupwa nena lao maiyuo mauli dupwa ipwa ingyuo kamuo nena keko pyakamyuo piru.
Kamongo Porai Wakasa dokome Jerusaleme wambu dupwa lamaiyuo, Poropeta dupwana pii letaminyi dupwa sakami nalapape. Nakamame rengya mende pira lao kekenge pii malu letaminyi. Nambame mende lapunupa langya nalyaminyi. Nakamba range mende pira rapisi lao mee waso nyepala langilyaminyi.
Poropeta dupwame wambu lapo nambame lapunu pii dupwa selana kamba letaminyi dupwa kando lao wambu nakama keta mee kapa ingyuo para lyakande letaminyi. Karapala mona kana poko lao karenge wambu dupwa peparae lamaiyuo, Nakama dupwa keta randa andake doko epa nara, letaminyi.
Nambame lao, Poropeta akali dapwame mendemepe Kamongona suu pinginya yalu pyuo silyamo dupwa soo nyii nange. Dee nakama mendemepe banya pii doko soope dee soo nyuope pii nange. Banya pii lapyamo dupwana doko mende lalyamo lao sakaminginde daa.
Banya imbu singi doko ama raiya pambake yale dokome wambu koo pilyaminyi dupwana ayemba peparaena pyao soo kyaya lyaape ingyuo kaiki pilya pyana pyuo pira.
Dopa pyuo banya pinya suu pilyamo dupwa pyuo otaparamo dokopa banya imbu singi doko pyai nara. Enakana dokopa banya wambu dupwame dopa pyuonde piyalyamo lao soo pakana palyarami.
Kamongo dokome lao, Nambame poropeta dapwa pena laa nayonopape nakamame maso peyami. Nambame nakama dopa pyuo lena lao pii mende lamai nayonopape nakamame nambana kingi dokona mee laoko kareyami.
Nakamame nambana suu pingi yalu pyuo silyamo dupwa simili doko nakamame nambana pii dupwa nyepala nambana wambu dupwa polo lamaikaraminyipa Satane yulu dupwa yaki nyuo kaeyo karo yulu koo pyuo karaminyi dupwa alowa pyuo kaeyamili.
Namba Anatu doko yuu muu peparaena kapa kapa pyuo karenge. Mendakisa yeelyo karengende daa.
Mendemepe nambame kanda naro panda mendena yalu pyuo kara nara. Namba yake panda dorenape isa yuu panda darenape peparaena kapa kapa pyuo karo doko emba see nalese?
Poropeta akali dupwame nambana kingi dokona lao kyambo laminyi doko namba silyu. Dee nakamame polo lao nambana wai pii doko nakamana kombeya pimwa dokona jilini, letaminyi.
Yuu gii akipare poropeta dupwame nambana wambu dupwa kando mee pii waso nyepala kyambo lao kata kyai dokona lanyuoko pao kararamisi?
Nakamana rakange dupwame mee bange anatu kingi Bealo doko keta mona maiyuo papala namba kame siyami doko suu pyao nakamana kombeya lamailyamano dokome nambana wambu dupwame namba kame serami katandena pimisa pilyamo.
Doko poropeta kombeya pilyaminyi dupwame doko mee kombeyaŋa larami ingilyamo. Dopa laraminyipape poropeta nambana pii silyaminyi dupwame pii doko mondo lao polo larami ingilyamo. Nambana pii doko jingi angi ingyapyamopape poropeta akalinya pii doko mee yanenge ingilyamo.
Nambana pii doko isarena mendeke dee ama porai kana dupwa pyao longo sinjimu ingingi dopale ingyuo silyamo.
Poropeta akali dupwa nakama range yango sukusa pii lami dupwa nyepala nambame lapunu lele lao letaminyi dupwa namba kando yanda pimwaiyuo karo.
Poropeta lapo nakama rangena pii lao dokopa namba keta ipyamo soo nyepala imi ingyalya ingyana pyuo letaminyi dupwa opetae awa nao karo.
Namba Kamongo dokome mende lalyane lao selapape. Poropeta lapome nakamana kombeya dupwana kyambo pii malu palyuo laminyi dupwa awa nao karo. Nakamame kombeya dupwa lamaiyuo kyambo laminyi dupwamepe dee range ketae pyambuo lakandaminyi dupwamepe nambana wambu dupwa kata kyai dokona lanyuo pelyaminyi. Nambame nakama nembo dopa pyuo laramiŋi pena lao laa nayo. Nakamame lami dokome wambu dupwa nyiso laa nalyaminyiko. Namba Kamongo dokome lapusa pilyamo.
























































Josayana ikinyingi Jiyoakwimi lenge doko Juta wambunya kiŋi ingyuo kanda soo kareyamopa Kamongome namba kando langyuo,
Tembole anda kamapi dokona karapala wambu yuu Juta taone dupwana piso dokona lakandala eparami dupwa nambame emba pii langilyu dupwa peparae lamaipi. Pii dupwanape kuki mende kame soo yaki nyuo kaeya nao lamaipi.
Wambu dupwame pii doko sepala nakamana yulu koo dupwa kame soo yaki nyerami rapisi. Nakamana yulu koo dupwa peparaena nambame nakama keta randa mairu lao rapa rapa piyu doko nambana suu pingi alowa pyuo kaeyaro.
Kamongome wambu dupwa lamai lao namba langiya. Namba Kamongo dokome leto. Nakamame namba warombo soo nambame pii mana langilyu dupwa kamba laa nao moko minyuo pyuo karalapape.
Dopako pyuo nambana kendemande akali poropeta dupwa nakama keta kaeya nao mapanyi peyapa pyuo kareyo dupwa apa letaminyi lao sokondali pyuo karalapape. Wamba nakamana pii warombo see nayami.
Nakama mee kamba lao karalu kararami ramo doko nambame yuu Sailo tembole anda doko koo inginyi nembeyonoli pyuo tembole anda dake koo inginyi nembaroko. Dopa pirunupa wambu yuu muu dupwana palaminyi dupwame pii koo mende letamano lao dokopa yuu taone dakena kingi lapapu larami, leya.
Purisi dupwape poropeta dupwape dee wambu dupwa peparaemepe yulu dupwana lao nambame tembole anda dokona leyono doko siyami.
Kamongo dokome namba lape lao pii peparae lamaiyunuli pyuo lao otapeyono dokopa aopa role pyapeta pyakaeyapala pii poraiyuo kaeyo lao, Emba doo letene dokona pyao kumakapengele, leyami.
Dopa lapala, Akipamo embame Kamongona kingi dokona lao tembole anda dake yuu Sailo tembole koo ingiya dopale ingyaramopa yuu taone dake pyao kokwa soo piramopa wambu mendalipi dakena pali narami, letese? leyami. Lapala wambu dupwame namba nyuo sukusa palyuo kako piyami.
Dopa piyami doko Juta lita akali dupwame sepala nakamame kiŋinya anda doko yaki nyuo waiya lao tembole anda dokona papala Kame Kambu Enenge palyiyaminyi dokona isaro kareyami.
Gii dokopa purisi akalipi poropeta akalipi dupwame lita akalipi dee wambu dupwape kando lamaiyuo lao, Akali dakeme yasu kee lao namwana yuu taone doko kando koo inginyi nembo pulyuo letamo dokona baa randa maiyuo piso soo kote lao pyao kumarami ingilyamo. Dokona pii lapyamo dupwa nakama rangena kale dokome rolae simi kandapi, leyami.
Dokopa nambame lao, Yuu taone andake dakenape tembole anda dakenape pulyuo pimwaiyuo nambame pii lapunu simi kandapi dupwa peparae Kamongo dokome lala puu lapyamo epo lapu.
Nakama palyuo karo pilyaminyi kata dupwape dee pilyaminyi dupwape alowa pipwape. Pipala nakamana Kamongo Anatu dokona pii laramuli pyuo kamba laa nao pipwape. Dopa pirami ramo dokopa baame randa mende peyo pyao kokwa sero leyamo doko alowa pipala kaeyara.
Namba doko nakamana kingi raka dokona karo. Dokona nakamame namba kando aki mende nakama pipya kapa ingyuo para pinya suu pilyaminyi doko mee pipwape.
Namba pyaramiko dokona renge mende palape lao selapape. Nakamame namba pyao larami ramo doko nakamape wambu yuu taone dakena palaminyi dupwape wambu koko pii nange dokome Anatumi repe repe lala puu lapyamo ipu doko pyaramisa pira, leya.
Leyamo dokopa lita akalipi wambu dupwapeme poropeta akalipi purisi dupwape kando lamaiyuo lao, Akali dakeme namwana Kamongo Anatunya kingi lao pii langipyaŋa. Baa pyao kumaka narama ingilyamo, leyami.
Dokopa enakana akali andapae lapome sipurapala wambu malu palyuo peteyami dupwa lamaiyuo lao,
Akali Esakaya baa Juta wambunya kiŋi ingyuo kareyamo dokopa poropeta akali Maeka yuu Moresete range dokome Kamongo Porai Wakasa dokome leyamo pii dupwa wambu peparae lamaiya. Yuu Sayone doko kwai mapu lapo pyasi sili lao yuu Jerusaleme doko ama pyao kokwa sinyi nembo dee tembole anda karenge dokona imwa palyuo pira.
Lapala kiŋi Esakayamoo Juta wambu dupwapeme akali Maeka baa pyao kumaka nayami. Pyao kumakapenge doko suu pyao akali Esekayame Kamongo doko pakapala baame Kamongo rae mairali yulu lapo piya. Dopa piyasa Kamongo dokome nakama keta randa mairu leyamo doko nyuo alowa pipala kaeya. Dokona epapu namwa rangeme randa ama koo andake nyelana minji nanji pilyamano.
(Dokona akali mende wakale kingi Yuraya lenge akali Semayana ikinyingi yuu Kiriate Jirimi range doko akali Jeremayame leyamo dopako suu pyao baame Kamongona kingi dokona lao yuu taone dakepe dee wambu rara dupwape koo ingyuo paraŋa lao pulyuo pimwaiyuo leya.
Leyamo pii doko kiŋi Jiyoakwimimoo banya yanda singi dupwape dee akali mupwa dupwapeme siyami. Sepala dokopa kiŋi dokome baa nyepala pyao kumakalana suu piya. Dopa pyuo suu piyamopape doo leyaminyi pii doko akali Yurayame sepala baa pakame kumuo baa range kyawa lete nyuo yuu Isipi dokona peya.
Dopa piyamopape kiŋi Jiyoakwimi baame akali Akipona ikinyingi Elanatane dee akali lapo pipya yuu Isipi dokona akali Yuraya nyela pena lao nembeya.
Akali dusipame Yuraya nyuo lanyuo epo kiŋi Jiyoakwimi maiyamisa baame nyepala pyao kumakapala banya yongo doko wambu peparaena malu pingi yuu dokona pyao nembeyami.)
Dopa piyaminyipape namba Jeremayame akali Aikami Sapanena ikinyingi dokona matarena karo yulu piyu dokome wambu dupwame pyao kumakana lao mai nayami.































































































Kamongo dokome lao, Namba Anatu Isaraele rara peparaena ingyaronopa nakama nambana wambu ingyarami yuu gii doko repeta epelyamo.
Isaraele wambu lapo yanda pimwai keta kumarami doko wanjo epeyaminyi dupwa yuu muiyane dokona nambame sakame kumungi renge doko lasaka piyu. Dokopa nakama koo selana lao koto aiye leyaminyi dokopa
namba nanesale karo nakama keta nolakayo. Isaraele wambu dupwa nambame nakama yuu peparae mona retengenyili pyuo nambana mona reto retenge puu penge renge doko lasaka pyuo karalu kararo.
Nambame nakama dee kamba dopona pili lao andanyi pyambwaronopa nakama nakamana lakuli nyepala pyao rae maiyuo mali lyuo wamya lyuo pyakalyuo pyao kararami.
Yuu kyau Samaria dokona dee kamba isa girapo ee wara pirami. Pipala wambu wara piraminyi dupwame girapo ee dokona jingi lyeramuli pyuo lyuo narami.
Waa. Yuu kyau Eporaime dokona karo isingi akali dupwame lao lao, Yuu kyau Sayone namwana Kamongo Anatu petamo dokona monale kee larami yuu gii doko epelyamo.
Kamongo dokome letamo, Wambu rara dupwana kamame andake doko Isaraeleŋe lao lakando kenane pyalapa. Kamongo dokome banya wambu dupwa kyawa lete nyipya. Baame wambu pingyasi lapo petaminyi dupwa kiiramo nyipya dokona nakamana kenane lakando pingi doko pyalapape.
Nambame yuu dulurename piso minyuo epo dee yuu muu peparaena nakama nyuo malu palyaro. Dokopa wambu lenge koope kimbu koope enda wane paletape dee repeta manjalana piraminyipi dupwa doloma pipya role pyapeta eparami. Nakama yuu dokona rara andake ingyuo kamba eparami.
Nambana wambu dupwa ee pipya kapu kyuo ateŋa lao range lanyaronopa anda eparami. Nambame ipwa guu dupwana iso lanyuo pao dee nakama lukuma sasaramiŋi lao nambame kata rambe kwuasi dokona lanyuo paro. Dokopa namba Isaraelena rakange dopale ingyaronopa Eporaime nambana wane mupwasa ingyara.
Kamongo dokome lao, Wambu rara dupwa nambana pii selapa. Sepala yuu nanesa ipwa marenge dupwana nambana pii dupwa lamaila pupya. Nambana Isaraele wambu wakale wakale bolomabalo lao nembeyo dupwa nyuo malu palyaro. Palyapala mena sipisipi rapu pingi dokome banya mena sipisipi rapu pingi dopale ingyuo rapu piru.
Nambame Isaraele wambu dupwa manda rena lao kiiramo nyiyu. Nyepala dee akali yuu rara ama porai wakasa dupwa keta nyiso kyawa lete nyuo piyu.
Nakama yuu kyau Sayone dokona epo raeme kumuo kenane pyao pisirami. Dee nambana bange witi jingipi ipwa waenepe olipi ipwangepe mena sipisipi dee mena bulamakaope mairunu dupwa kando rae maiyuo kando nyerami. Dokopa nakama palu karo pirami dupwa ee nengepe ipwa apumi nenge pipala mena mena lao andenge dopale ingyarami dee nakama aki bange mende yano piramo kararami dupwa peparae nakama keta palira.
Dokopa wanake dupwa mali lyuo wamya lyuo rae mairami. Dee akali parange alemope dupwa rae maiyuo mona pyakalyuo pyaramo kararami. Dokopa nambame nakama mona minyarambunyi pyambwapala nakamana kumanda piso ee lao dupwa alowa pyuo mona pyakalyuo pyao rae maingi renge mairu. Dee kondange renge paleta karenge dupwa rae mainyi pyambwaro.
Dopa pipala nambame purisi dupwa nenge keyange dupwa mairu. Dee nambana wambu dupwa mende aeya naramo pisirami dupwa kando nyuo nenge piru, lao namba Kamongo dokome lapusa pilyamo.
Kamongo dokome lao, Yuu Orama dokona pii mende leyamo siyami. Ee andake lao kumaralerale nyuo lao Enda Oresolo banya wane wanakepe dupwana lao ee lao peteya. Mona minyarambu nyisalana leyami dokopa Banya wane wanakepe lete pisa nalyaminyiŋi dokona daa leya.
Embena ee letene doko kaepala embena ee ipwange dupwa pyao nembape. Embena wane wanakepe dupwana lao yulu pipi dokona emba yano nyere. Nakama nyisu petenge yuu dokona piso kapu kyuo eparami.
Embena lao rengya mende keyange pyakara. Embena wane wanake dupwa kamba kapu kyuo anda eparami. Namba, Kamongo dokome lapusa pilyamo.
Isaraele wambu dupwa mona randame kumuo laminyi doko namba silyu. Kamongo namwa mena kali rae lenge mona kana pokonge dopale ingyuo kareyama. Dopa piyamanopape namwa kamba lao nao warombo selapa lao mana langii kande. Emba Kamongo, namwana Anatu. Namwa emba keta lanyuo ipupi. Dokopa kapu kyuo emba karene dokona epanya epelyamano.
Namwa emba mata joo peyamanopape dee range epanya piyama. Embame namwa randa jiinyi dokopa namwa rangeme kyawa suu lao kondome kumuyama. Doko namwa enye wane parange karo yulu koo dupwa piyama dokona elyayama.
Isaraele nakama nambana wane mona wakasa retenge ingyuo karaminyi. Wane nambame mona angingyuo retenge dupwa nakama iki. Yuu lapo nambame nakamana kingi dokona arome pyao dokopa nambame nakama mona reto suu pyao lenge. Nambana mona doko nakama keta silyamo. Nambame nakama sakame kumuo kararo.
Nakama Isaraele dupwame kata angi doko kongwalu mende pipala pano wapuo retalapape. Nakama anjukunya namba yaki nyepala neta peyaminyi kata doko dee kotalapape. Kotapala poraiyuo suu pyalapape, Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu taone nakama yaki nyuo peyaminyi dupwana anda ipupwape.
Yuu gii akipare nakama Anatunya yulu mondo lao pyakami nao mona lamana palyuo kararamisi? Akalimi enda rapu pyuo karengenyili pyuo endame akali rapu pira ramo ama wakale ingyuo pira. Doko suu pyao nambame yulu enenge mende ama wakale ingyuo pipu.
Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Anatu Porai Wakasa dokome lao, Nambame wambu dupwa nakamana yuu palenge dokona kamba palyuo karo pinya laro dokopa yuu Juta dokonape dee dokona yuu taone dupwanape nakama dee kamba lao, Kamongo dokome Jerusaleme yuu kyau yapasi panda poo pyasi baa palu karenge doko elyape keta pisinya larami.
Wambu dupwa yuu Juta dokona palyuo dee taone dupwana palyuo pirami. Piraminyipa nakamana lapome ee wara pirami dee lapome sipisipi rapu pyuo pirami.
Dokopa wambu makarami dupwa nambame mona keyange palyinyi pyambwaro. Dee loparami dupwa nambame nenge pirunupa nao sikya piramo kararami.
Dokopa wambu dupwame lao, Namba luu palipu doko luu rende palyuo yongo keyange karo sipurelyo, larami, Kamongome letamo.
Namba Kamongo dokome leto. Isaraele wambunya yuu dokonape Juta wambunya yuu dokonape nambame mena wambupi dupwa peyaronopa kete pyao nyera leyo yuu gii doko repeta epelyamo.
Nambame nakamana ee dupwana yukunyi nembo nakamana taone dupwa kokwa sinyi nembo pyao lalyuo oteyo doko suu pyao nambame dee dopona pyuo minyalyalopono ingilyamo.
Yuu gii doko pyaka seramo dokopa wambu dupwame lao, Endangipi rakangepe dupwame isa girapo jingi keke pingi doko nelyaminyipa nakamana wane wanakepe dupwame keke doko nakanjilyaminyi lenge dopa pyuo dee laa narami.
Dokona ingyuo wambu mendeme isa girapo jingi keke pingi doko nara ramo doko baa rangeme banya nenge pinjingi dolapona nakanju sera. Dee wambu mendaki mendaki lao baa rangena koo dokona kumara.
Kamongo dokome lao, Isaraele wambu pipya dee Juta wambu pipya pii enenge kana minyuo lalu lao larono yuu gii doko epelyamo.
Pii enenge kana minyuo lalu lao larono doko nakamana kauwanemoo pipa yuu Isipi dokona neta nyiyu dokopa nambame kii minyuo pao kana minyuo pii lalu lao leyono dopale daa. Dokona namba nakamana akalingi dopale ingyuo kareyonopape nakamame kana minyuo pii lalu lao lenge doko minyuo pyuo kara nayami.
Kana minyuo lalu lao lenge pii enenge nambame Isaraele wambu pipa larono doko dapale ingyara. Nambana lowa dupwa nakamana mona anda dokona pyao retapala nakamana suu pingi dokona pyao palyakaro. Dopa pipala namba nakamana Anatu angingyuo kararonopa nakama nambana wambu angingyuo parami.
Nakamana andare dokona yango sukusa dopa pinya dapa pinya lao kara naramioko. Yuu gii dokopa wambu kuki andakepe peparae namba soo nyerami. Nambame nakamana yulu koo dupwa nyuo kame sakamirunupa dee koo piraminyi dupwana deeko suu pyale pyale kara naro. Namba Kamongo dokome lapusa pilyamo, leya.
Kamongo yuu yangama korakamape dokopa neta dokome rena lao dee kukwa dokopa kana buipi dupwame rena lao pingi. Baame ipwa kota dupwa kasakole minyuo ranju ketae epena lao pingi. Banya kingi Kamongo Porai Wakasa.
Dokona yake yuupa dolapo pinginyili pyuo kuara yangara pyuo kararamo dusipana peparae Israele rara doko palu karalu kararami, lalu lao letamo.
Yuu gii mendepa akali mendeme yake doko makande pyuo dee isa yuu dokona susa dokona koko pao soo oto pipyali doko Anatu baame Isaraele wambu dupwa dokopa iki mata maipyali. Doko nakama peparae koo piyaminyi dokome dopa pipyali, Kamongo dokome lapyasa pilyamo.
Kamongo dokome letamo, Yuu taone Jerusaleme doko nambana ingyuo dee kamba pirami doko yuu Ananele Anda Londe dambirena piso epo Donge Kame Kambu dokona suu larami yuu gii doko repeta epelyamo.
Dokopa yuu make wangu doo yuu dorena palyuoko pao pao neta anda penge dorena yuu kyau Garepe dokona pao dee yuu Goa dokona palu awali lara.
Yuu pau lama lama wambu kumasipi dee nenge pinjingipi dupwa malu palyuo nembenge doko peparaepe dee ipwa Kitone doko yuu peparaepe pao Mena Ose Kame Kambu neta pyakaenge dorena suu lao doko nambana lenge kambunya poo pyasi ingyuo sera. Yuu taone doko dee kamba kokwa soo kwaeyo lalyuo isa paa nara.















































































































Ee kana kisima dokopa akali Josayana ikinyingi Jiyoakwimi baa Juta wambunya kiŋi kareyamo dokopa Kamongo dokome namba langyuo lao,
Pepa yoko kao pele pele lasi doko nyepala nambame Isaraele wambunya laope Juta wambunya laope dee rara peparaena laope langiyunu pii dupwa peparae pepa dokona pyao retape. Yuu gii Josaya baa kiŋi kareyamo dokopa wambo langyuo pao epapu langipunupape dupwa peparae pyao retape.
Mende dee Juta wambu dupwa keta randa peparae nambame mairu lao lao reteyo doko sepala nakama koo pyuo kata koona pelyaminyi dupwa yaki nyuo kaeyaramiko rapisi. Dokopa nakamana yulu kopetame pilyaminyi dupwape dee koo pilyaminyi dupwape nambame nyuo kame sakamiru.
Dokona lao Nerayana ikinyingi Baruku kee lao nyepala Kamongome namba pii langiyamo dupwa peparae lamaiyu. Dokopa pepa yoko kao pele pele lasi dokona Baruku pyao palyiya.
Dokopa enakana nambame pii lapo opetae lamaiyuo, Namba tembole anda dokona dee kamba kolando kapa paa nalu nao naro ingilyamo.
Dopa pirunupape wambu dupwa nenge dee wasaka pyuo peteyami kande dokopa emba tembole anda dokona papala pepa kao pele pele lasi doko ketae palyuo poraiyuo yaka lape. Lare dokopa Kamongo dokome namba langipyamo pii peparae nambame emba jipunu dupwa serami. Wambu dupwa peparae serami pandandena yulu doko pipi. Dee Juta wambu dupwa nakamana yuu taone dupwana piso iminyi dupwa opetaeko serami.
Kamongo dokome banya imbu singi andake isare ingyuo ango karapya dokome wambu dupwa pipya randa mairu lapyamo doko silyaminyi dokona nakama Kamongo kando ateŋa lao nakamana koo dupwa yaki nyuo kapu kyuo eparami rapisi, leyo.
Dokona Baruku buku kao pele pele lasi doko nambame lena leyonuli pyuo wai lyaro soo tembole anda dokona yaka leya.
Ee kana kingi paki kana mange mendaki karo dokona akali Jiyoakwimi baa Juta wambunya kiŋi ingyuo kareya. Dokopa wambu dupwa Kamongome rae maiyuo karena lao pilyamano lapala nenge wasaka pyuo kareyami. Wambu Jerusaleme palenge dupwape dee wambu dupwa yuu Juta taone dupwana piso epeyami dupwape peparae nenge naa nayamiko.
Dokopa wambu dupwa peparae soo peteyaminyipa Barukumi pepa kao pele pele lasi dokona nambame pii leyono dupwa mende isa nemba nao wai lyaro soo yaka leya. Baa doo piyamo doko kiŋinya pepa pingi akali Gemaraya lenge Sapanena ikinyingi dokona panda kuki dokona karo piya. Banya panda kuki doko tembole anda dokona Kame Kambu Enenge konandowame dorena malu palyuo pii lenge panda ketae dokona ingyuo singi.
Akali Maekaya Gemarayana ikinyingi Sapanena kauwange dokome Kamongo dokome leyamo pii dupwa pepa kao pele pele lasi dokona paleyamo akali Baruku dokome yaka leyamo siya.
Sepala baa kiŋinya anda dokona peya. Pao kiŋinya pepa pingi akali dokona panda kuki dokona akali mupwa dupwa pii wato lao peteyaminyi dokona peya. Peteyaminyi akali dokona mende kiŋinya pepa pyakamingi akali Elesema dee mende Semayana ikinyingi Delaya lenge mende akali Akipona ikinyingi Elanatane lenge mende Saparena ikinyingi Gemaraya lenge dee mende Ananayana ikinyingi Setekaya lenge dee akali mupwa wakale lapo opetaeko dokona peteyami.
Dokona Maekaya akali Barukumi yaka leyamo pii siyamo dupwa peparae nakama lamaiya.
Lamaiyamosa akali mupwa dupwame akali Juti (Netanayana ikinyingi, Selamayana kauwange dee kauwange kyawa doko Kusi lenge) dokome pepa kao pele pele lasi wambu yaka lamaiyuo karapyamo doko minyuo epena Baruku lamaiyala pena leyami. Dokopa Baruku buku kao pele pele lasi doko minyuo akali mupwa dupwa peteyami dokona peya.
Peyamo dokopa nakamame lao, Isa pisipi. Pisipala pepa kao pele pele lasi doko namwa yaka lao langipi. Dokona lao Barukumi nakama yaka lao lamaiya.
Yaka lao lamaiyuo otapeyamo dokopa nakama pakame kumuo yango mendeme mende kando pipala Baruku lamaiyuo lao, Namwame pii dake pao kiŋi doko lamairama, leyami.
Lapala nakamame baa piso soo lao, Epapu dakepa namwa langyuo apa pyuo embame pii dapwa peparae pyapisi? Jeremayame pyape lao emba langipyase? leyami.
Dokopa Barukumi isingi lao, Jeremayame pii peparae langipyamopa nambame pepa kao pele pele lasi dakena pyanjilimi pyapu, leya.
Dokopa nakamame baa lamaiyuo, Embapa Jeremayapa wambu mendeme dusa petambinyi lao see nana lao yalu pela pupwape, leyami.
Akali mupwa dupwame pepa kao pele pele lasi doko kiŋinya pepa pyakamingi akali Elesemana panda kuki dokona reteyami. Retapala nakama kiŋi peteyamo panda dokona papala pii peparae paleya dupwa lamaiyami.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome Juti buku kao pele pele lasi doko nyela pena leya. Leyamosa akali Elesemana panda kuki dokona siyamo nyepala pao kiŋi akali dokope dee akali mupwa awali lao kareyami dupwa pipya yaka lao lamaiya.
Yuu gii doko kupwa pingi dokopa dokona kiŋi baa banya anda kupwa pingi yuu gii dupwana palenge dokona isare repeta petenge panda dokona soo peteya.
Dokona akali Jutimi pepa pyasi dokona lane remape kisimape mende yaka lapeyamo dokopa kiŋi dokome kema wua kuki mendeme kunjapala isarena kiso peteyamo pao buku kao pele pele lasi doko rao oteya.
Dopa piyamopape kiŋi dokope panda banya akali mupwa dupwape lapo pii doko siyaminyi dupwa nakama pakame kumuo kondapala renge lao mende lasaka pyuo pii nayami.
Akali Elanatanemoo Delayamoo Gemarayamoo dusipame buku kao pele pele lasi doko kiŋi dokome kisa napyali lao piso sokondali pyuo leyaminyipape baame nakama doko mende lalyaminyi lao see naya.
See napala baame kiŋinya ikinyingi Jeramelemoo Aserelena ikinyingi Serayamoo role pyapeta dee Apetelena ikinyingi Selemayamoome namba poropeta akali Jeremayapa nambana pepa pyakamingi akali Baruku opetaeko puu maiyuo nyela pena leya, Dopa leyamopape Kamongome nambwa nyuo yalu piya.
Baruku pii lamaiyamo pepa kao pele pele lasi dokona dupwa kiŋi Jiyoakwimi kisapeyamo dokopa Kamongo dokome namba langyuo lao,
Pepa kao pele pele lasi wakale mende nyepala pepa wambo doko pii palenge dupwa peparae pyao retape lao langiya.
Kamongome kiŋi doko dopa lamaipi, leya. Embame buku kao pele pele lasi doko kiso dokopa Jeremaya piso soo, Akipamo Bapilone kiŋi dokome epapala yuu dake pyao kokwa soo dee wambu menape dupwa pyao kumuo pira ingilyamo lapipi lee kande, leya.
Dokona lao kiŋi Jiyoakwimi, Namba Kamongo dokome emba langilyu. Embena para pyao manjo parene dokona mendeme kiŋi Dapitinya panda nyuo kiŋi yulu pii nara. Emba kumarene dokopa embena yongo doko neta renge panda mendena nembaraminyipa yuu gii korakama dokopa netame rao karara dee kukwa dokopa kalapetame pyao karara.
Nakama peparae koo pilyaminyi dokona nambame emba randa joo embena manjirinyi dupwa randa maiyuo dee embena akali mupwa dupwa randa maiyuo piru. Dokona embape dee Jerusaleme wambu dupwape Juta wambu dupwape nambana pii mende piraŋa lao repe repe langipunu dokona see nalyaminyi dokona nambame nakama peparae keta lao randa jero leyonuli pyuo pyakaro.
Dokopa enakana nambame buku kao pele pele lenge mende wakale nyepala nambana pepa pyakange akali Baruku maiyunusa akali dokome nambame pii lamaiyu dupwa peparae pyao reteya. Buku kao pele pele lasi wambo kiŋi Jiyoakwimi isarena kisiyamo dokona palenge dusipana mende pyarepala para kando lao peparae pyao reteya. Dee nambame pii dopale lapo lamaiyunu dupwa opetae konda pyuo pyao reteyako.
Kiŋi Nepukatenesa yuu Bapilone range dokome akali Setekaya yuu Juta kiŋi Josaya dokona ikinyingi doko akali Jiyoakini lenge akali Jiyoakwiminya ikinyingi dokona panda nyinya lao rombo palyiya.
Dopa piyamopape Kamongome wai pii namba lape lao jiyamo doko kiŋi Seteyakamepe wambu dupwamepe banya akali mupwa dupwamepe warombo see nayami.
Dokopa kiŋi Setekayame Selemayana ikinyingi Jukale dee Masayana ikinyingi purisi akali Sepanayapa namba peteyo dokona pena leya. Epapala nakambame namba langyuo, Namwana wambu peparae dupwana lao namwana Kamongo Anatu kando ateŋa lakape, langiyambi.
Langiyambinyi dokopa namba puu maipa nayaminyipa mee wambu pipya papyuo kareyo.
Dokopa Bapilone ami yanda singi dupwame yuu Jerusaleme doko pyao kareyami. Dopa pyuo kareyaminyipape yuu Isipi ami yanda singi dupwa Isipi yuu lili make piyami doko yalo epelyaminyi leyami doko sepala nakama yaki nyuo kala peyami.
Dopa piyamo dokopa Isaraele wambunya Kamongo Anatu dokome namba langyuo,
Akali Setekaya pii lamaipi lao leya. Yuu Isipi ami yanda singi dupwa nakama nyisalana lao enye katasa epelyaminyi. Dopa pyuo iminyipape anda kapu kyuo parami.
Dokopa Bapilone akali dupwa kapu kyuo epapala yuu taone doko panda nyepala pyao kokwa soo kiso nembarami.
Bapilone wambu dupwa kapu kyuo epapalako kaeyarami lyakande dokona lao nakama rangeme kopyali ingyuo Bapilone wambu dupwa dee kapu kyuo epa narami lao suu pyaa nalapape lao namba Kamongo dokome nakama repe repe lao langilyu.
Kamame nakamame yuu Bapilone ami yanda singi dupwa peparae pyao isa palyuo winimi piparaminyipape akali lapo nakama yanenge poro lao ranjama eparamo nakamana komau anda dokona luu palyuo seraminyi dupwame sowale pyuo karo sipurapala yuu taone dake pyao kiso isa palyarami ingilyamo. Kamongo dokome nambame Setekaya lamaipi lao langiya.
Yuu Isipi ami yanda singi dupwa repeta epeyamisa yuu Bapilone ami yanda singi dupwa Jerusaleme karo kapu kyuo peyami.
Dokopa namba yuu Jerusaleme piso yaki nyuo Benjamenena yuu dokona nambana ree palunya yuu dokona namba kararo panda dokona lama nyela peyo.
Dopa piyamopape namba Benjamenena Kame Kambu dokona pao pyaka siyunu dokopa yanda singi dupwana mupwa doko yulu paleyande baa dokona yulu pyuo kareya. Doo kareyamo akali doko kingi Irinja lenge akali Selemayana ikinyingi Ananayana kauwange dokome namba kata pasi pipala piso soo lao, Emba dae yaki nyuo Bapilone wambu pipya konda pela pelese? leya.
Nambame isingi lao, Embame angi lao nalene. Namba dokona apeto paa naro, lamaiyu. Dopa lamaiyunupape Irinjame nambana pii soo nyii naya. Dopa pipala baame namba minyaro nyepala minyuo akali mupwa dupwa peteyami dokona peya.
Peyamo dokopa akali dupwame namba kando imbumi kumapala akali lapo lamaiyuo pyarako pyapala minyuo pao kiŋinya pepa pyakamingi Jonatane lenge dokona anda palyapala kii pyao keto lena leyami. Banya anda doko karapusi anda ingyuo wasiyami.
Namba karapusi anda dokona yuu rumbyapala panda kuki singindena koko palyiyaminyi dokona yuu gii malu palyuo kareyo.
Dokopa enakana dusa kiŋi Setekaya peteya dokona namba lanyuo peyaminyipa banya anda dokona baame namba yalu pyuo piso soo lao, Wai pii mende Anatu keta piso ipyape? leya. Dokopa nambame isingi lao, Pii lapo langipya, leyo. Lapala kiŋi doko pii konda pyuo lamaiyuo, Nakama Bapilone kiŋi porainya renge palenge doko keta kingi rekya lao mairu lapya, leyo.
Lapala nambame piso soo lao, Nambame wambu dupwa kandope emba kandope dee embena akali mupwa dupwa kandope lowa anjukunya yaleyosa nakama suu pingi nyuo namba karapusi palyarami ingiyase? leyo.
Embena poropeta akali yuu Bapilone kiŋi dokome embape dee embena yuupi dupwa pyao nyii nara lao emba langiyaminyi dupwa apa piyamisi?
Dokona emba kiŋi andake doko, dakepa nambame emba piso sokondali pyuo nambana pii see lao leto. Sepala nambame emba piso silyu dokona kaeya nao pyakape. Doko embame namba akali Jonatanena anda dokona dee kamba kapu kyuo karapusi pyambwa napipi. Emba dopa piri ramo namba dokona angi kumaro ingilyamo.
Dokona lao kiŋi Setekayame namba kiŋinya yanda singi panda dokona pao karapala kii palyinya leyamo kareyo dokopa nenge borete kiso wasingi anda dokona kunjasi mendaki larapu yuu gii mendakinya lao joo kareyaminyi pao yuu taone dokona nenge borete dupwa oteya.
Akali Matanena ikinyingi Sepatayamoo Pasana ikinyingi Getalayamoo Selemayana ikinyingi Jukalemoo dee Malekayana ikinyingi Pasamoo dusipame nambame wambu dupwa lamaiyuo Kamongo dokome leyamo pii dupwa lao papilini leyami doko nakama siyami.
Lamaiyunu doko, Kamongo dokome lao wambu mendali yuu taone dakena palyuo karara ramo doko yanda andake mende piraminyi dokona kumuope panda nenge see naramo lopo andake pipala kumuope panda yanyi nyepala kumuope pirami. Dopa piraminyipape mendeme neta pao Bapilone ami dupwame waiku nyinya lapala kaeyara ramo doko baa kuma nara. Baa range yongo lete nyuo mee palyuo karara.
Nambame nakama dopako pyuo lamaiyuo, Kamongome lao dokopa yuu taone dake Bapilone ami nyerami lapya, leyo.
Dokopa akali mupwa dupwame kiŋi doko peteyamo dokona papala lamaiyuo lao, Akali dake pyao kumakamana. Baame pii dopale lapya dokome yuu taone dokona yanda singi karenge dupwa paka renge manjinyi pyambuo letamo. Dee wambu pyarepala pao yuu taone dokona pisiminyi dupwa dopako pinyi pyambuo letamo. Akali dakeme wambu dupwa nyisalana suu pyao laa nalyamo. Baame wambu dapwa isa nenge kara nange dokome suu lao randa maiyuo letamo, leyami.
Dopa leyaminyi dokona kiŋi Setekayame isingi lao, Doko kapa. Nambame nakama kaeyalapa laa naroŋo. Nakamame baa keta pinya suu pilyaminyi doko pipwape, leya.
Dokona lao kiŋinya yanda singinya panda dokona kiŋinya ikinyingi Malekayana ipwa petende singi dokona namba minyuo pao pyambuyami. Nakamame puu karapala malyiyami. Yuwale dokona ipwa pete see napala wara yeelyo siyandena namba nyuo pee kuku piya.
Dopa piyaminyipape Itiopia akali Epetemeleke lenge kiŋi dokona anda yulu pyuo kareyamo dokome namba yuwale dokona nyuo malyiyaminyi leyami doko siya. Yuu gii dokopa kiŋi doko Benjamenena Kame Kambu dokona kote soo peteya.
Dokopa akali Epetemeleke baame kiŋi doko peteyamo dokona papala lamaiyuo lao,
Emba kiŋi andake doko, akali dapwame mende piminyi doko ama kopetame pimi. Doko yuu taone dakena nenge mendepe see napya dokome nakamame akali Jeremaya doko lopome kumapala kumaraŋa lao soo yuwale dokona pyambwami, leya.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome akali Epetemeleke lamaiyuo, Akali dae karaminyi dokona rema nyepala Jeremaya baa kumapa nanaleŋe yuwale dokona palamo doko ipyuo nyela pena leyapya.
Dokona lao Epetemelekeme akali dupwa nyuo lanyuo kiŋi dokona yulu pingi bange retenge anda dokona papala komau kangusi lapo puu karo yuwale dokona namba nyelana malyiya.
Malyapala Epetemelekeme namba langyuo lao, Puu dokome emba naa nana lao komau kangusi dupwame embena arokwa kata dokona palyepala palyape, leya. Leyamuli pyuo namba dopa piyu.
Dokopa nakamame namba yuu paleta ipyuo nyiyaminyisa namba yuwale dokona nyisa epeyo. Epapala kiŋinya yanda singi panda dokona kareyo.
Yuu gii mendepa tembole anda dokona kambu repo ingyuo singi konandowame dokona namba kiŋi Setekaya peteyamo dokona lanyuo peyami. Peyaminyipa baame namba langyuo lao, Nambame emba piso singi pii mende pisaroŋo embame namba kando lapo kalyama napala angi peparae kinyi dokona langipi, leya.
Dokopa nambame isingi lao, Nambame kinyi dokona laro ramo doko embame namba pyao kumakare. Dee nambame dopa piri dapa piri lao nyiso laro ramo doko emba sili see nale lao karare, leya.
Dokona lao kiŋi Setekayame namba kando yalu pyuo pii mende lalu lao lao dopa leya, Anatu Lete Karenge dokome namwa letena renge jiyamo dokona kingi lao kana minyuo lao, Namba emba pyao kumaka naro dee akali lapome emba pyao kumalena lami dupwa keta mai naroko, leya.
Dokopa enakana nambame Setekaya lamaiyuo, Kamongo Porai Wakasa Isaraele wambunya Anatu dokome lao, Emba rangeme yuu Bapilone ami akali dupwa waiku nyinya lao kumuo maiyuo kaeyare ramo doko emba range kyawa lete nyuo dee yuu taone doko raa nara. Dee embape embena ree palupi laparae kyawa lete nyera, leya.
Dopa piraminyipape emba waiku nyinya lao kumuo maiyuo kaeya nare ramo doko yuu taone andake dake Bapilone akalinya kingi rakana palyakamiramopa pyao kisarami. Dopa piramopa emba kapa wanjo lete paa nareko, leya.
Leyamo dokopa kiŋi Setekayame isingi lao, Namwana Juu akali lapo Bapilone range ingyuo karaminyi dupwa namba pakalyo. Dokona nakamana kingi rakana palyara ramo dokopa nakamame randa jerami, leya.
Nambame lao, Emba nakamana kingi rakana palya nara. Nambame emba piso sokondali pyuo lao, Kamongo dokona wai pii doko warombo sepe. Dopa pirinyi dokopa bange peparae dupwa emba keta kapa ingyuo paramopa emba range kyawa lete pare.
Emba Bapilone ami akali dupwa waiku nyinya lao kumuo maiyuo kaeya nare ramo dokopa Kamongo dokome mende piramo doko namba pii repa repa pyuo lasaka pipya leyo.
Nambame dokona kandapunu Juta enda dokopa kiŋinya anda dokona pisimi dupwa Bapilone kiŋi dokona akali mupwa dupwa karami dokona lanyuo pumi. Dokona nakama pao karo dokopa apa lami lao sepe. Nakamame dopa lao pumi. Kiŋi dupwana puu minyingi angi dupwame baa minyoko pyuo kata koona lanyuo pumi Dokopa nakamame baa isa palyimi. Banya kimbu dolapo warana yalyipyamopa banya puu minyingi dupwame baa yaki nyimi lao puminyi sipu leya.
Dokopa nambame konda pyuo lao, Embena enda peparaepe dee wane wanakepe dupwa yuu Bapilone lanyuo parami. Dee emba range nakama keta kyawa lete nyii nareko. Emba yuu Bapilone kiŋi dokome karapusi ingyuo nyuo minyuo paramopa yuu taone dake rao muku sera, leyo.
Leyono dokopa Setekayame isingi lao, Pii doo iso letambano doko embame mendali sinya lao lamai nare ramo doko emba randa nyii nare, leya.
Akali mupwa dupwame namba embapa pii lao pisimbi lao serami ramo doko apa lambi lao emba piso sela eparami lyakande. Dokona embame pii peparae lamairi ramo doko nakamame emba kando pyao kumaka narama lao lalu lao lao langirami lyakande, leya.
Dopa laraminyipape embame nakama lamaiyuo, Namba karapusi anda dokona kumalase lao kamba lanyuo paa nana lao nambame piso sokondali pyuo pisapu lape, leya.
Leyamo dokopa akali mupwa dupwame namba peteyo dokona epapala piso siyami dokopa kiŋi dokome lape lao langiyamuli pyuo leyo. Dokopa mendemepe pii iso yalu pyuo leyambano doko see nayami dokome dee nakamame mende dusa pirami ingya naya.
Dokopa namba kiŋi dokona yanda singinya panda dokona karapusi kareyonopa Jerusaleme pyao epo anamasi minyiyami.

































































































































































































































































































































































Setekaya baa ee kana akalisa lama ipisu mendaki nembo karapala dokopa baa Juta wambunya kiŋi ingiya. Baa ee kana akalisa ipisu mendaki yuu Jerusaleme doko iso kareya. Banya endangi doko Amutale lenge. Enda doko baa akali mende wakale kingi Jeremaya lenge yuu taone Lipina palenge dokona wanenge.
Kiŋi Jiyoakwimi Kamongo dokona lenge kambu dokona yulu koo pyuo kareyamo dokoko suu pyao kiŋi Setekayame koo piya.
Dokona lao yuu Jerusaleme Juta wambupi dupwa pipya Kamongo dokome ama wakasa imbwuapala nakama karapusi ingyuo nyuo minyuo yuu wakale mendena pena lao ralinyi nembeya. Dokopa Setekaya baa yuu Bapilonena kiŋi Nepukatenesa kando isarena karalana suu pyaa napala kamba leya.
Dokona yuu gii akalisa kana akalisa dokona ee kana mange mendaki karo dokopa Setekaya baa yuu Juta dokona kiŋi ingyuo kareya. Kareyamo dokopa kiŋi Nepukatenesame banya ami yanda singi dupwa lanyuo epapala yuu Jerusaleme doko pyao nyelana piya. Pipala nakama taone kipwa kipwa dupwana komau anda pyuo palipala yanda pirama lao awali lao paka yuku karo kame piyami.
Dopa pyuo Jerusaleme taone doko nyuo kamena sukusa palyuo pisi kareyaminyipa pao Setekaya kiŋi yulu piyamo ee kana akalisa ipisu mendaki dokona ingiya.
Dokopa yuu gii mange mendaki karo kana kisima dokona ee kana mendaki dokonako lopo ama kopetame siyamosa wambu dupwa mende narami ingya naya.
Dokopa yuu taone dokona kana kame doko pyao lalyapala sukusa peyami. Dopa piyami dokopa Bapilone akali dupwa yuu taone dokona nyuo sukusa palyuo karo awali leyaminyipape Jerusaleme yanda singi dupwa kukwa dokopa mee neta peyami. Nakama kiŋinya ee dokona kata sukusa penge dokona papala kana kame pinjingi paki paki dolapo epo suu lenge dokona kame kambu kata dokona peyami. Pao yuu Jotane pau lama lama dorena ingyuo pyakao peyami.
Dopa pyuo peyaminyipape Bapilone yanda singi dupwame kiŋi Setekaya pete pete pao yuu Jereko repeta yuu lama lama dokona minyaro nyiyami. Dokopa banya yanda singi peparae dupwame baa yaki nyiyami.
Kiŋi Nepukatenesa yuu taone Oripila lenge yuu Amate dokona singi dokona kareyamo dokona kiŋi Setekaya baa karapusi pyao lanyuo peyami. Peyaminyi dokopa kiŋi Nepukatenesame piso soo kote sepala baa koo piya, leya.
Yuu Oripila dokona Setekayame kando kareyamopa Nepukatenesa baame Setekayana ikinyingi dusipa pyao kumakaya. Dee Juta akali mupwa dupwa opetaeko pyao kumakana, leya.
Dopa pipala enakana baame Setekayana lenge dolapo pyao lukwapala baa puu maipala minyuo yuu Bapilone dokona peyami. Dokona Setekaya baa karapusi palyuo karo kumuya.
Bapilone range kiŋi Nepukatenesa ee kana akalisa ipisu mange mendaki karo kareyamopa kana kingi paki dokona yuu gii akalisa dokopa kiŋinya dopa pyuo piri dapa pyuo piri lao nyiso lenge akalimi ami yanda singi iso karenge doko Nepusaratane yuu Jerusaleme dokona sukusa peya.
Papala tembole anda dokope kiŋinya anda dokope dee kamongo wambu yuu Jerusaleme palenge dupwana anda dupwape kiso oteya.
Dee banya yanda singi dupwame yuu taone dokona kana kame awali lao karenge doko pyao lalyuo isa nembeyami.
Dokopa akali Nepusaratane baame wambu yuu dokona pyarepala pao peteyami dupwape akali lapo mora petenge dupwape dee Juu akali lapo wamba Bapilone kiŋi dokona enda ingyuo kumuo maipala pao kareyami dupwape karapusi pyao minyuo yuu Bapilone dokona peya.
Dopa piyamopape Juu lapo wambu pendewa muiyane yuu reta nange dupwa baame yuu Juta dokona piso isa girapo ee dokonape dee ee yuu dupwanape yulu pinya leya.
Yuu Bapilone akali dupwame anda pinginya kone kana dopaleme wasisi ane isa pyanenge dupwape bange reto ipyuo minyuo papingi rate tembole anda dokona siyamo dupwape penge kameya mende kone kana dopaleme wasisi ipwa pisingi dokona siyamo dokope peparae pyao muu muu pyuo nembapala kone kana dupwa peparae nyuo minyuo yuu Bapilone dokona peyami.
Dee nakamame kana pyare dokona pee nyuo nembenge pengepe bange saporo kuki dupwape lambe elya pingi yulu bange dupwape dee mena pyao kiso maingi dokopa mena ranjama reto nyingi pere dupwape dee pere lapo bange rendamu pingi kiso maingi dupwape dee kone kaname wasisi bange tembole andana yulu pingi singi dupwa peparae nyuo peyami.
Nakamame bange peparae kana golope kulingipimi wasisi dupwa nyuo minyuo peyami. Pere kukipi isare sungwa lengya nembenge kapape mena pyao kiso maingi dokona ranjama retenge perepe pee nembenge pengepe lambe retenge ratepe bange rendamu pingi reto kiso maingi perepe ipwa waene Anatu reto maingi pere dupwape peparae nyuo minyuo peyami.
Dee kiŋi Solomoneme bange lapo kone kana dopaleme waso tembole anda dokona reteya. Isa pinginya lamape bange reto ipyuo minyuo papingi ratepe penge kameya mendepe dee mena bulamakao kali wasisi akalisa ipisu lamame penge minyaro karenge dupwa ama kenda pingi dokome sikyali pinya saka nayami.
Isa pinginya lama mendaki dopale. Mita mange lama londe ingiya dee wangu awali lao doko mita kingi paki ingiya. Nakamba sukusa sisingi kata singi dee kapa romende kingi lenge muu dopale ingiya.
Isa pinginya lamana ketae pinjingi dokona kyawa ingyuo kalya piyami. Doko mita lama londe ingiya. Nyuu ingyuo kalya pyuo lambuo laeyo pyuo palyuo wasisi dokona isa jingi kingi pomekaranate lengende waso kalya piyami.
Isa pinginya kyawa dokona nyuu ingyuo wasisi dokona isa jingi kingi pomekaranate lenge andete mendaki dusipana akalisa mange mendaki karo ipisu pakinyamange dusipa isa yuu dokona karo kandenge.
Doo piyamo dokopako Bapilone yanda singi dupwana mupwa isingi akali Nepusaratane lenge dokome purisi mupwa Seraya lenge dokope dee purisi lapo ingyuo karenge Sepanaya lenge dokope dee akali rema tembole anda dokona mupwa ingyuo karenge dusipa pipya karapusi pyao minyuo peya.
Yuu taone dokona akali mende Juu yanda singi ami dupwana mupwa ingyuo karenge dokope akali yanda ipingi nyepo kiŋi doko kando dopa pyuo piri dapa pyuo piri lao nyiso lenge dusipa mee yuu dokona kareyami dupwape dee yanda singi ami dupwa pepa pyakamingi akali dokope dee akali kamongo lapo akalisa pakinyamange dupwa pipya puu maiyuo nyuo peya.
Nepusarataneme akali dusipa minyuo yuu Bapilone kiŋi doko yuu taone Oripila yuu Amate dokona singi peteyamo dokona minyuo peya.
Dokona yuu Bapilone kiŋi dokome nakama randa andake maipala pyao kumakana leya. Dopa pyuo Juta wambu dupwa nakamana yuu yaki nyuo karapusi pyao minyuo yuu wakale peyami.
Nepukatenesame wambu dupwa karapusi pyao minyuo peyami pii dupwa dakena pyasi palamo. Baa ee kana yanda ipingi dokopa kiŋi karapala wambu ama malu (3,023) karapusi pyao nyuo peya.
Dee banya ee kana akalisa ipisu mange lama kiŋi karo dokopa Jerusaleme piso wambu malu 832 puu maiyuo nyuo peya.
Dee baa ee kana akalisa lama ipisu rema kiŋi karo dokopa akali Nepusarataneme wambu malu 745 puu maiyuo nyuo peya. Dokona wambu peparae nyuo pyasapala dokopa 4,600 puu maiyuo karapusi pyao nyuo peya.
Kiŋi Jiyoakini ee kana akalisa rema ipisu yanda ipingi yuu gii akalisa lama ipisu kingi paki dokona kana akalisa ipisu lama dokona karapusi dokona palyuo kareya. Kareyamo dokopa ee kana dokona akali Epelemerotake baa Bapilone wambunya kiŋi karapala yuu Juta range kiŋi Jiyoakini baa kando anjiki pyuo karapusi paleyamo doko nyiso nyisa nyiya.
Akali Epelemerotake dokome Jiyoakini baa kando anjiki pyuo elya pyuo reto karapala kiŋi menge yuu Bapilone dokona karo Jiyoakinimoo karapusi ingyuo role pyapeta paleyaminyi dupwa yulu maiyamopape baa yulu andake ama wakasa mende maiyuo banya kingi ketae pyambuo piya.
Dopa piyamo dokopa Jiyoakini banya karapusi komau dupwa alowa pipala baa lete palyuo karo piyamo yuu gii dusipana kiŋinya nenge nenge rate dokona yuu peparae role pyao piso nao kareya.
Yuu gii yaka lao baa palu karo piyamo dokopa baa nenge maiyami dopaleko ingyuo kana bangepe yano piyamo kareyamo dupwa maiyaminyi kapa nao palyuo karo piya.
...

























































































































































Namba purisi akali Isikiolo, Businya ikinyingi doko. Kana kisima yuu gii kingi paki ee kana akalisa ipisu rema dokopa Juu wambu yuu Bapilone karapusi pao kareyaminyi dupwa pipya ipwa Sepa pona dokona peteyama. Dokopa yake kata lumbwapala Anatu pii repa repa mende piyamo kandeyo.
Kiŋi Jiyoakini ee kana kingi paki karapusi anda paleyamopa kana dokona mendena yuu gii kingi paki dokona pii repa repa dake piyamo kandeyo.
Yuu Bapilone dokona ipwa Sepa nemba nemba namba Kamongome pii langiyamo siyunu dokopa banya porai renge doko namba keta ipuyamo soo kareyo.
Namba pendakae lapala kandalyapeyo dokopa kopa apupi reeko doko dulurena piso epeyamo kandeyo. Kopa dokona piso yuu pele isare ingyuo rao yake peparaena raeyo peya. Yuu pele pyakalyiyamo dokona bange kana kone lepo lepo pisi dopalende rao kareya.
Kopa apupi rakapana suku dokona bange lete karenge kisima wambu yale kandeyo.
Dusipana mendaki mendaki lao lenge kambu kisimako karo papake kisimako karo piya.
Nakamana kimbu dupwa rolae dee kimbu kaperena bulamakao kalinya kimbu kape dopale kareya. Bange dusipa kana kone isokome pyao nembasi ingyuo lepo lepo pyuo rao kareya.
Dopa pyuo karo nakama mendaki mendaki lao kisima dusipana papake isarena wambunya kingi mendakiko karapa piyamopa nyuo pyaso kisimako ingiya.
Papake yango mendena kimbu silya sana piru kareyami. Bokote pinjingi kisima ingyaro karenge dopale ingiya. Panya dokopa longo raeya nao kapu kilya kapu kyana pii nao pipala mee suu laro karo rolae peyami.
Bange lete karenge dusipana lenge kambu wakale wakale kisimako karapa piya. Lenge kambu dorena wambunya lenge kambu nyuo rolaerena mena laenena lenge kambu nyuo kyairena mena bulamakaona lenge kambu nyuo matarena yaka ulisapunya lenge kambu nyuo piyami.
Nakamana papake kisima larapu karenge dokona lama dolapome mendena pinjingi dokome pee lapala mendena pao keto lapa piyami. Dee lama dolapome nakamana yongo dokona yambe pyapapu piyami.
Nakama peparaena lenge kambu kisima karenge dokome mendasa panya dokopa kapu kyii napala mee rolelyamuli pyuo kando penge.
Bange lete karenge kareyami sukusa dokona kendapuli yale mende kaeya nao rao papyuo kareya. Kareyamo dokona isare uliyapu nyuo lelenge pyao rao peya.
Yuu pele waiya lao yanga paupau lengenyili pyuo bange lete karenge dusipa nakama lambu papa laeyo epapa pyuo peyami.
Namba bange lete karenge kisima kareyaminyi dusipana repeta nakamana uliuli bunu mendaki larapu siyamo kandeyo.
Uliuli bunu kisima dusipa mendarele ingyuo siya. Uliuli bunu dusipa kana lulya renge kana malu nembo ropo pingi dopale ingyuo lepo lepo piya. Uliuli bunu dusipa mendena lama larapu mende dokona anjokoyamo kandeyo.
Kandeyono dusipame maso kata paki pakipi nyokonyuo parami ingiya.
Uliuli bunu pinjingi dusipana peparae lenge ramurae pipala kandala kandala peyami.
Bange lete karenge dupwa mendasa panya kata nyokonyiyami dokopa uliuli bunu dupwa role pyapeta peyami. Dee pulyuo peyami dokopa uliuli bunu dusipa dopako pyuo peyami.
Bange lete karenge dupwame uliuli bunu dusipa renge kuiyuo minyaro karenge dokome nakama anja mendasa panya suu piyami dokonako palyuo uliuli bunu dusipa role pyapeta peyami.
Yuu gii peparae bange lete karenge dusipa kata paope mee karope sipuro yake ketae pao uliuli bunu dusipa mendare dokonako palyuo peyami.
Bange lete karenge dusipana kyawa siyamo ketaerena anda kauwasi yale lepo lepo pisi wasisi mende lepo lepo pyuo rao kareya.
Dokona isarena bange lete karenge dusipa mendaki mendaki lao dokona papake pakirena lama karenge dokome pee lapala yango mende dumbinya dokona keto lapa piru kareyami. Nakamana yongo doko papake paki lama dolapome yambe pyarapu piyami.
Nakamana papake dupwame bii leyaminyi dokopa poroparo lao peyamo siyu. Siyunu pii doko ipwa kota gono lele lao ami yanda kambu pili lao pyao dokopa Anatu Porai Wakasa dokona pii lele lao peyaminyi siyu. Nakama bii lao pao peteyami dokopa papake dupwa range nyuo kaki pyuo palyiyami.
Dopa piyaminyipape anda kauwasi yale nakamana kyawa ketae siyamo dorename piso pii doko lao ee epeya.
Anda kauwasi yale dokona ketaerena bange kiŋinya petenge isa yale kana kala muku dopale mende siya. Dokona wambu yale mende peteya.
Dokona wambu yale mende doko isare dokona kana kone ingyuo rao lepo lepo pyuo kareyamo kandeyo. Yanga paupau leyamo dokome puiya nengepe singi dopale ingyuo kala wakale wakale rao kareyamo doko kandeyo.
Kamongo baa yanga paupau lao karo lao lasaka piyamo kandeyo.
Dopa piyamo kandeyono dokopa nambana kingi wapambupi lakao pao paleyo. Palipala pii mende leyamo siyu dokopa, Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko nambame mende langiruwale sipura, leya.
Pii leyamo doko lao kareyamo dokopa Anatunya Imambu dokome namba keta maralyapala nambana moko dokome namba nyuo roya kareyamo dokopa pii doko leyamuli pyuo mee lalu lao kareyamo siyu.
Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko emba nyepala Isaraele wambu dupwa keta nembelyo. Nakamame namba kando kamba koo lao mata joo karaminyi kande doko wambu kauwange dupwame piyaminyili pyuoko pilyaminyi, leya.
Nakamana mona kana pokapala namba mupwa lao suu pyao pii nalyaminyi. Dokona lao nambame emba kando Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome lamailyuŋu lamaila puu, leya.
Nakamame embena pii see naraminyipape panda seraminyipape poropeta akali mendeme nakama keta epo lapyamo pilyamo lao soo nyerami.
Emba makwa isa ingyuo kuku pyaa nare akali doko nakama kando paka nao dee pii letaminyi dupwa soo pako pii napipi. Nakamame emba kando koo keta palyuo kilya kando larami ingilyamo. Isarepa moko palyuo karenge dopale ingyara. Dopa piramopape kamba lenge wambu dupwa kando paka nao dee pii larami dupwa soo paka nao pipi.
Nakama soo nyeraminyipape soo nyii naraminyipape nambame emba langilyu dupwa lamairi. Nakamba kamba lenge wambu kandape doko emba silini, leya.
Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko emba nambana pii langilyu doko sepe. Nambame jiyu kande dupwa nenge kata ŋaa lapala nape. Nakamba pilyaminyi doko suu pyao kamba lao kara napipi, leya.
Leyamo dokopa namba kareyono dorena kingi peyara kande dokopa pepa rongo pisi doko peyamo kandeyo.
Pepa rongo pisi doko kingi dokome poleyamo kande dokopa pii pyasi paki pakipa laparaena paleyamo kandeyo. Dokopa mona rando ee lenge dee kumanda piso ee lao yamarangunya pingipi pii dupwa pyasi paleyamo kandeyo.
Anatumi dopa leya, Makwa isa ingyuo kuku pyaa nare akali dake embame pepa rongo pisi dolo nyepala naa. Napala Isaraele wambu dupwa pii lamaila pupi, leya.
Dopa leyamosa nambana nenge kata ŋaa leyo dokopa pepa rongo pisi doko naa lao jiya.
Jepala baame dopa lao, Makwa isa ingyuo kuku pyaa nare akali nambame pepa rongo pisi jilyu dake nape. Nao inginya palyape, leya. Dopa leyasa neyono dokopa lyaa pala rende piya.
Dokopa Anatumi namba langyuo, Makwa isa ingyuo kuku pyaa nare akali doko emba Isaraele wambu karaminyi dokona papala nambame pii langilyu dupwa lamaila puu, leya.
Nambame emba yuu liti wakale pii wakale lenge mendena randa nao lare lao nembelyonde daa. Isaraele wambu keta emba nembelyo.
Nambame emba yuu liti wakale andake lapona nakamana pii see narele lapona nembeyoli dokopa nakamame embena pii siyamili.
Isaraele wambu dupwana mendaki mendemepe pii doko selana makarami. Nakama nambana pii see naramiko. Nakama dupwa peparae mona kana pokapala kamba letaminyi, leya.
Nakama mona kana pokapa kambako letaminyi dokona epapu nambame emba kamame mona porayapala poraiko inginyi pyambwaro ingilyamo.
Nambame emba kana dopale ingyuo porainyi pyambwaronopa kana munjamae dopale ingyuo karapala kamba letaminyi dupwa kando paka nare, leya.
Anatumi pii leyamo dokonako yaki nyii nao, Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko pii langilyu dupwa peparae aki piinde lao elya kalo soo suu pyao minyaro karape.
Embena wambu yuu wakale dokona karapusi palaminyi dupwa kando pii lamailyu dupwa soo minyarami panda see naraminyipape namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome letonuli pyuo lamaila puu, leya.
Enakana Anatunya Imambu dokome namba minyalyuo nyepala matarena karo pii poraiko leyamo siyunu dokopa Kamongo yake panda ketae karamo banya nyilyingi yulu doko ketae pyambuo lakandape, leya.
Dokopa bange lete karenge dupwana papake dupwa poroparo lao ketae kareyamo siyu dokopa dee uliuli kimbu dupwa malawai lao poraiyuo kaeyo yuusili minyilyamo uu lenge dopale ingiya.
Dokopa Kamongona Imambu dokome namba minyalyuo nyepala soo peya. Banya porai renge dokome namba keta epeyamo dokopa kata jiyasa epe see napala imbu singi nyiyu.
Dopa pyuo namba yuu Telapipi lenge ipwa Sepa repeta wambu karapusi palenge dokona epo paleyono dokopa bange doo kando soo piyunu dupwame namba nyuo kui yanyi pyapala isa palyiyasa yuu gii yanda ipingi nyepo mee peteyo.
Yuu gii yanda ipingi nyepo dusipa epo papeyamo dokopa Kamongome namba pii langiya.
Baame dopa lao, Makwa isa ingyuo kuku pyaa nare akali doko nambame emba Isaraele wambu dupwana iso karenge akali ingyuo rombo palyilyu. Nambana repe repe pii emba langirunu dupwa nakama lamaiyakare.
Akali koo pingi mende kumaraŋa lao larono sepala repe repe doko nyuo lamaiyuo mona enenge palyuo alowa pinya lamai narenepa koo paleta karo kumara ramo doko nambame emba keta renge laro.
Embame wambunya koo dupwana yaki nyinya lao repe repe lamaiparenepa minyuo yaki nyapa napala kumarami ramo dokopa emba keta pii palya nara, leya.
Akali rolae pyuo karara mendeme nambame kyawa yaki nyuo makande pyuo kandaronopa koo keta paliramo dokopa embame repe repe lamai nare ramo banya koo dokona lao kumara. Banya yulu keyange wamba pyuo kareyamo dupwa mende yaka lakami naro. Dopa pyuo koo keta palira dokona lao banya kumasi ranjama doko emba keta palena laro.
Embame akali keyange pingi doko koo pii nana lao repe repe lamairinyipa doko mende lalyane lao sepala lete para ramo dokona lao embena doko kyawa minyakaro, leya.
Kamongona porainya renge doko namba keta epo apu sepala pii mende lalyiyamo siyu dokome sipurapala yuu anda lama lama dokona puu. Dokona mende langiruwale, leya.
Dopa leyamo dokopa yuu anda lama lama dokona peyono dokopa Kamongona yanga paupau lenge ipwa Sepa dokona wamba kandeyo mee dopaleko kandeyo. Kandapala dokopa kingi wapambu lakao mona kando kareyo.
Dopa piyamo dokopa Anatunya Imambu dokome namba keta maralyapala nyuo roya kareyamo kareyo. Dokopa Kamongome namba langyuo, Anda papala embena anda dokona romo napyuo karape, leya.
Makwa isa ingyuo kuku pyaa nare akali doko emba kiimbwasi serene wambunya lenge kambu dokona kapa pare ingya nara, leya.
Wambu kamba lenge dupwa repe repe lamai nare lao nambame embena kekenge neketaiyapa dolapo kumbwa kiso rambularo, leya.
Dee enakana pii kamba langyuo, Pii manjo lenge renge doko peeyakaro dokopa namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome dopa letamo lao lamairi. Lamairinyi dokopa nakama kamba lengena para pyasi dokome lapome seraminyipape lapome see nao mata jerami, leya.
































































































































































































































































































































Kamongome namba langyuo
baame dopa leya. Dake aki kongwalu piinde wambu dupwa keta yuu Isaraele dokona kamba kamba letamisi? Rakange dupwa isa girapo kau pingi neyami. Neyaminyi dokome wane wanake dupwa nenge niki niki piya.
Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome dopa lao, Namba Anatu lete karalu karenge dokome kinyi kinyi leto. Nakamame kongwalu pii dake kamba yuu Isaraele dakena laa nalu nao narami.
Wambu peparae nambana. Rakange wanepe dupwa peparae nambanako. Mende koo pira ramo doko iki kumara.
Akali mende elyape dokome angi dokonako palyuo lao rolae pyuo pira ramo
doko baa Isaraele wambu dupwame bange lapo anatu lao wasisi semango karo bange lapo lakando pyao kiso maingi dupwana naa nange ingyara. Baa akali mendena enda kepo pyakami nao panda enda nenge range nao petenge dokopa kepo pii nange ingyuo karara.
Baame minyako pyuo waa nyii nange. Bange mende yulu pipalana lao nyuo pao dokopa range peyakarono dokopa jereŋe bange mende minyaro karena lao maipala nyuo penge doko enakana peyakamilyaminyi dokopa dolo range mondo lao maingi. Komau see nangepe dee lopolyaminyi dupwa baa nenge pyuo komau maiyuo pingi.
Baame kana matana piso nyipuli lao maiya nange. Koo dupwa pinya pakapala kote dupwana kinyi dokona iki lao kunjingi.
Akali dopale dokome namba letonuli pyuo lowa dupwana mondo lao minyingi. Baa rolae pingi dokona yuu gii andarele karara. Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome dopa letamo.
Akali dopale dokona wane mandeyande ramo dokome yulu koo doo rakange pii nange dupwa pyuo waa nao wambu pyao bange pyao kiso semango karenge dupwana nenge nao dee akali wakalena enda kepo pyakamyuo pira.
<range>
Baame wambu pendewa dupwa minyako pyuo waa nao bange lapo yulu pipala range jinya lao maingi dupwa baa nyuo semango kingi lenge mare dupwana pao bange lapo kingimi wasisi dupwa lakando
kana lapo baa matana piso nyipulinyako suu pyao maiyuo pyuo karenge. Akali dopale doko kapa lete kararase? Ama daa. Baa koo dopale dupwako pyuo papira dokome baa kumara ingilyamo. Rangeme kandakinya pyuo karapala kumuo para ingilyamo.
Dee akali mende lapo dokome wane mandeyali doko banya rakangeme koo piyamo dupwa kandapala mana nyuo pii nalana suu piya.
Isaraele wambu dupwana anatu lao isa kanapeme wasisi dupwa semango karo lakanda nao Anatumi daa lenge panda dupwana bange lapo pyao kiso maingi dupwana wane baa naa nao akali mendena enda dupwa kepo pyakami nao
wambu dupwa mata rukyuo pyao waa nyii nao pingi. Bange mende yulu pipalana nyuo pao dokopa range peyakarono dokopa jereŋe bange mende minyaro karena lao maipala nyuo penge doko enakana peyakamilyaminyi dokopa dolo range mondo lao maiyakamingi. Wambu lopalyaminyipape dee komau see nangepe dupwa komau nengepe maingi.
Baa koo dupwa pii napalape dee kana dupwa matana piso nyii nange. Baa nambana lowa minyuo letonuli pyuo karara. Dopa pira ramo doko banya rakangena yulu koo dupwana lao kuma napala baa mee lete karara.
Banya rakangena yulu doko wakale ingyuo pelyamo. Baame wambu minyako pyuo waa nao yuu peparae yulu koo pyuo kareyamo dokona kumuya.
Dopa piyamopape nakamame piso soo, Akipamo banya rakangena koo dupwana ikinyingi randa nyii nalyase? letaminyi. Dokona isingi pii doko ikinyingi doko baa keyange rolae pingi. Nambana lowa letamuli pyuo karenge dokome baa mee karara.
Mendaki doko koo pingi dokona baa kumungi. Rakangena koo piyamo dokona lao ikinyingi yano nyerande daa. Dee ikinyinginya koo pingi dokona rakange yano nyii narako. Koo keyangepe pirambinyi dokonako manda manju range yano nyingi.
Akali yulu koo pyuo karara mendeme koo yaki nyuo kaepala nambana mawa pii dupwa minyuo dee rolae pira ramo doko baa kuma nara. Baa mee lete karara.
Dopa piramopa baa yulu keyange piramo dokona banya koo wambarae dupwa nyuo kame sakamirunu baa mee karara.
Akali koo pingi kumara dokopa namba mona seramopa rae maiyuo karare lao suu pilyamisi? Dopa lao Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome piso silyamo. Ama daa baa mona enenge palyuo epo lete kararamo dokopa kando namba rae mairu.
Akali rolae pingi dokome keyange piyamo dupwa kupyuo yaki nyepala koo dupwana sukusa pao wambu wakalena koo pipala elya nyingi dupwana mana makandope nyepala pyuo karara ramo doko baa lete karara ingyarase? Ama daa mendeme banya keyange wambo piyamo dupwana dee suu pyaa naro. Baa yaki nyuo yulu koo pyuo kareyamo dokona kumara.
Nakamame dopa letaminyi. Kamongome pilyamo doko angi rolae daa letaminyi. Nakama Isaraele dupwa nambame apa leene lao soo karalapape. Nakamame nambame pilyu dupwa rolae angi daa lao suu pilyamisi? Namba daa. Nakamame angi kyai doko pimisa pilyamo.
Akali rolae pingi mendeme kaepala koo dupwa kanda soo piramopa baa kumara. Doko koo banya dokome range kumarasa pira.
Dee akali koo pingi mendeme koo doko mata maiyuo kaepala epo keyange rolae pira ramo baa range lete wai pyao nyerasa pira.
Baa koo piyamo doko soo nyepala yaki nyipyamo dokome baa kuma nao mee karara.
Nakama Isaraele dupwame dopa lao, Kamongome pilyamo doko rolae daalyamo lao karaminyi. Nakamame nambame pipu doko rolae daa lao suu pilyaminyi doko kinyisi? Nakambana pilyaminyi doko rolae daa.
Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome nakamba Isaraele wambu dupwa langilyu. Koo emba rangena pilini dokona wakale wakale yapalya yapana pyuo laro ingilyamo koo dokome nakama kokwasi nanale dupwa yaki nyepala ipupwa.
Nakamana koo doo pyuo karaminyi dupwa mata maiyuo kaeyalapa. Kaepala suu pingi enenge palyuo mona alowa pyuo pipwape. Nakama Isaraele wambu dupwa akipamo kyawa kana palyapala kumalana karamipi?
Dokona lao Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome nakama mendali kumarami dokona rae mai nalyo. Dokona lao koo dupwa yaki nyepala lete karalapa, letamo.















































































































































































































































































































































































































Kamongome namba langyuo,
Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko embena wambu dupwa lamaiyuo, Nambame yuu mendena yanda sipurelyono dokopa nakamana range akali dokona mende nyepala nakama iso kararaŋa lao rombo palyingi kandale.
Baame yanda pimwai dupwa repeta eparaminyi kandapala epelyaminyi lao lyakai pyuo bikuli pii lao wambu dupwa lamaira.
Lamairamo dokopa repe repe doko mende palyamo lao mendeme see nao mona kana pokapala sili see nale lao kararamo pyarami ramo doko baa range keta palira.
Kumaramo doko baa rangena piyamo dokona ingilyamo. Daaŋa lapala bikuli pii doko mende lalyamo lao sipyali doko kapa wanjipyali.
Dopa piramopape iso karenge akali dokome yanda pimwa eparami doko kandapala epelyaminyi lao bikuli pii laa naramopa koo pingi wambu dupwa pyao kumkarami ramo dokopa iso karenge akali dokopa nambapa pii palira.
Epapu makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko emba nambame Isaraelena yuu liti dokona iso karare lao rombo palyiyu. Dokona nambame repe repe pii langiru dupwa kaeya nao lamaipa pyuo karare.
Akali koo pingi mende kumaraŋa lao larono sepala repe repe doko nyuo lamaiyuo mona enenge palyuo alowa pinya lamai narenepa koo paleta karo kumara ramo doko nambame emba keta renge laro.
Embame wambunya koo dupwana yaki nyinya lao repe repe lamaiparenepa minyuo yaki nyapa napala kumarami ramo dokopa emba keta pii palya nara, leya.
Kamongome langyuo dopa leya. Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko embame Isaraele akali dupwame suu pyao letaminyi doko range dee kamba polo lamaiyakamipi. Dopa letaminyi, Namwana koo pimwa dupwame kendame kumuo karamano. Koo doko namwa keta suku suku palu palyuo palamo. Namwa apa pyuo piso karo piramase?
Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa doko Anatu karalu karene dokome nambame kinyi leto. Akali mende koo pyuo karo kumara ramo doko rae maiyuo kanda naro. Baa koo dupwa yaki nyepala karalu kararamo kandapuli yaka. Isaraele wambu dupwame koo pilyaminyi doko yaki nyuo kaeyalapape. Akipamo nakamba kumalana suu pilyamisi?
Dakepa makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko embame Isaraele wambu dupwa dapa lamaipi. Akali mendeme yulu keyange pyuo karapala enakana koo pira ramo doko wambo keyange pyuo karara dokome baa kyawa minya nara. Koo pyuo karenge dokona mendeme koo doko mata maiyuo kaeyara ramo doko baa range kyawa lete nyerasa pira. Dee akali keyange pingi mende yaki nyepala kanda soo koo pira ramo doko baa lete paa nara.
Nambame akali rolae pingi doko lete karara lao lalu lao laronopape baa wambo keyange pyuo kaepala karoŋo dusipa kapa lapala koo lapo pira ramo doko wambo keyange piyamo dupwa yaka lakamirunde daa. Baa rangena koo dokona kumara dokona karara ingilyamo.
Nambame akali koo pingi doko baa kumaralyamo lao repe repe lamaingi. Lamairunupape baa koo rangeme dupwa sepala yaki nyuo rolae doko anjuku lao nyuo pira ramo doko kapa ingyara.
Rolae dupwa dapale. Bange mende nyuo yulu pinya laramo maipala minyakao epare dokopa range peyakaroŋo embena wuape mende retakao kararo peena lapala anda maiyakami epenge dokopa dolo range maiyakamingi. Dopa pyuo nyuo kalyingi doko range yulu maiyakamyuo waa nyiya dupwa range maiyakamyuo koo dupwa yaki nyuo lowa anjukunya pirusa lete paro lao kata koto karara ramo doko baa kuma napala lete karara.
Nambame koo piya dupwa nyuo kame sakamirunupa baame rolae suu pyao keyange pipyamo dokona mee lete karara.
Embena wambu dupwame lao dokopa nambame pyuo karenge dupwa rolae daa letaminyi. Doko ama kapa laa nalyaminyi. Nakamana pilyaminyi dupwa rolae ingya nalyamo.
Akali wambo rolae pyuo kararamo doko kupyuo yaki nyepala koo dokona kanda soo pira ramo doko koo pira dokona baa kumara ingilyamo.
Akali wambo koo pyuo kararamo doko yaki nyepala keyange dokona rolae pira ramo dokopa baa range kyawa minyara.
Dopa pira doko sepala nakama Isaraele wambu dupwame nambame pilini dupwa rolae daa letaminyiŋi. Dokona nambame nakama pilyaminyi dupwana dopale dopale lao kote laro ingilyamo.
Yuu gii kingi paki kana akalisa ee kana akalisa ipisu lama dokona namwa anjo nyuo peyaminyi yuu wakalena kareyamano dokopa akali mende yuu Jerusaleme yaki nyuo pyakao peyandeme epo lao dopa leya. Yuu taone andake doko lalyisi silyamo, leya.
Leyamo akali doko epapyamo lao kukwa dokopa Kamongona porai renge doko namba keta epeyamo siyu. Dokona yangama akali baa epapeyamo dokopa Kamongome namba pii lengenyili pyuo lalese lao kambu range lumbakaya.
Kamongome namba dopa langiya.
Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko yuu Isaraele dokona taone pyao lalyisi dupwana palenge wambu dupwame dopa letaminyi. Aporakame baa akali mendaki doko kareyamopa Anatumi baa yuu peparae maiya. Epapu dakepa wambu malu karamano dokome yuu doko namwana ingilyamo.
Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome dopa letamo lao lamaipi. Nakama mena minju doko ranjama paleta nao isa kanape dupwame wasisi dupwa anatuŋu lao lakando karo wambu dupwa ranjama kulimbuo pyao pyuo karaminyi. Dopa pyuo karaminyi dokona apa pipala yuu doko nakamana ingyarape?
Nakama wua gela dokome kyawa minyara lao suu pyaro karo yulu pii napenge dupwa ipi pipyamopa pyuo karaminyi. Nakama peparaeme kepo yulu dokonako karaminyi. Dopa pyuo karaminyi dokona apa pipala yuu doko nakamana ingyara lao suu pilyamisi?
Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome repe repe letamo lao lamaipi. Namba Anatu karalu karenge dokome kinyi kinyi leto. Wambu lapo taone andake lalyiyamo dupwana palaminyi dupwa pyao kumarami. Mee yuu dupwana palaminyi dupwa mena rakaiya dupwame narami. Lapo yuu kyau dorenape dee kana anda dokona yalu pyuo palaminyi dupwa anga yakane nyuo kumarami.
Yuu doko ketange pyanyi nembaro. Renge porai lapo palipyamo eneko kaelyaminyi doko nyuo mee inginyi nembaro. Isaraele dokona yuu kyau dupwa apa yuu ingyuo seraronopa wambu kapa parami ingya nara.
Nambame wambu dupwa nakamana koo dokona randa maiyuo yuu doko pendewa nembaro dokopa namba Kamongo lyamo lao soo nyerami, leya.
Kamongome leya. Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko embena wambu dupwame nakamana anda kambupi yuu taone kana kame piso karenge dokonape kando nyepala dokopa nakamba lao emba kando lao karaminyi. Kamongo keta aki pii letamo lao sela mwua, lao karaminyi.
Nambana wambu soo kaeyome embame apa lene lao sela epelyaminyi. Epapalape angi pinya lamaipi doko pii nalyaminyi. Embena pii doko nyuo kuki inginyi nembapala nakama bangepe nengepe nyerami dupwana iki mona nyepala pyuo papilyaminyi.
Wane kukimi male lao kenane pili lao karaminyi dokopa wambu menge soo kando karaminyi dupwame renge mende pali nalyamo lao suu pyao mee giyuo karenge. Dopale ingyuo nambana wambu dupwame embena pii doko mee inginyi pyambuo nyuo male lapala pii angi lapinyi dokona mendakipi rape rape lao minya nalyaminyi.
Dopa pyuo lao karaminyipape embena pii lao karene doko angi pyaka sera. Pyaka seramo dokopa poropetande pii lao karapya kandapi doko anginde lamo lao soo nyerami.
Kamongome namba dopa langiya.
Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko Isaraele wambunya iso karenge akali dupwa lao nembele lao pii lamaipi. Poropeta piimi lao, Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome letamo lao lamaipi. Isaraele iso karenge akali dupwa nakama range dokona iki suu pyapala sipisipi dupwa yaki nyuo kaelyaminyi dokona nakama keta randa epara.
Nakama menana anju ipwange elyape doko nao komau kupinyi yambale ingyuo sipisipi imanjimi wapusi dupwa iki wapuo mena sipisipi angi pena pena pisi dupwa pyao kuiyuo naminyipape pyuo karaminyi. Dopa pyuo karapinyipape embame iso karalene wambu kandale dupwa yaki nyilyaminyi.
Embame porai napyamo karaminyi dupwa suu pyaa nao anga pyapyamo karaminyi dupwa pyuo nyii nao rete pipyamo dupwa yaki pyakami nao neta puminyi dupwa sukusa nyii nao pyuo karene. Dopa piri doko suu pyao wambu dupwa randa maiyuo karene.
Dopa pyuo sipisipi isingi akali yangilyamo dokona lao bolombalo lao waa keta pelyaminyi.
Dopa pyuo nambana sipisipi dupwa yuu kyau kukipi andakepe dupwana ralo pelyaminyi. Dopa pyuo bolombalo lao isa yuu peparaena puminyipa mendeme kando nyelana suu pyao kota nalyaminyi.
Dokona nakama sipisipi rapu pingi dupwa. Epapu dakepa namba Kamongo dokome aki pii mende langilini lao selapa.
Anatu doko namba kareyonoko karenge dokome langilyu. Dake doko mende lalyane lao soo nyelapa. Nambana mena sipisipi dupwa isingi dupwame iso kara namisa dokona lao suwa menape rae lenge dupwame pyapala nelyaminyi. Nambana sipisipi rapu pingi dupwame mena sipisipi dupwa anja karaminyi lao koto kandala paa napala nakama range yongo rapu pyuo karapala mena sipisipi dupwa suu pyaa nalyaminyi.
Dopa pyuo pelyamo dokona lao sipisipi rapu pingi dupwa nakama nambame apa langilini lao selapape.
Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge kandale doko epapu nakamana yanda pimwai ingyuo pelyo lao panelyo. Nambana wambu dupwa epapu range nyepala nakamame yuu mendepe rapu pyakao karalapape lao jii naro. Nakamana yanenge dokonako suu pyao alisi minyuo karaminyi. Doko dee pii nalapape lao kararoko. Nambame nambana sipisipi dupwa nakamame dee pyao naa nalamisi lao kiiramo nyero leto, leya.
Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome sipisipi dupwa namba rangeme koto nyepala mondo lao rapu pyuo kararona lao nakama langilyu.
Mena sipisipi rapu pingi akali dokome bolombalo lao pelyaminyi dupwa nyuo elyambu pingi. Doko suu pyao randa epeyamo yuu muu wakale wakale dupwana bolombalo lao peyaminyi dupwana piso range nyuo eparo.
Yuu wakale dupwana kararami dupwa nyuo malu palyuo karo nambame nakambana yuu range dokona lanyuo eparo. Lanyuo epo dokopa nakamana yuu kyau dupwana range karo dee ipwa pona kuki dupwana pyambuo pirunupa nenge malu keyange dupwa nao kararami.
Nambame yuu kyau keyange nenge malu elyape singi dupwanape dee yuu anda lama lama rambi keyange singi dupwanape nakamba koo keta pali napala nao karena lao lama pyaro.
Namba range sipisipi rapu pingi akali ingyuo karapala nakama pau lao pisirami panda doko koto nyakamiru lao Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome lapunu pilyamo.
Nambame isa pelyaminyi dupwa koto karo neta puu pao otasi dupwa nyuo lanyuo epo rete pira dupwa yaki pyakamyuo anga pyara dupwa lete nyuo pyuo kararo. Dopa pirunupape wambu rondo lasipi porai ingyuo karaminyipape dupwa pyao kokwa sinyi nembaro. Renge doko namba sipisipi rapu pingi ingyuo karo dokome rolae doko anjuku lao mee dopa piru ingilyamo.
Nambana wambu dupwa namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome koo keyangepe yapalya yapana pyuo mena sipisipi memepe yapo liti pinya karo lao nakama dakepa langilyu.
Nakama dupwana lapome nenge nao karapala kando kaeyo nao malasi dupwa moko karo rambetaku pyanyi nembenge. Nakama ipwa keyange napala malasi dorena uki palyinyi nembenge.
Nambana sipisipi lapo dupwame nenge nakamame kalyuo parakwami dupwa nao ipwa uki palyisi dupwa nao kararami.
Epapu dakepa namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome lao mena sipisipi porai ingyuo karaminyi dupwape porai ingya nao karaminyi dupwape pipala yapalya yapana pyuo laro lao langilyu.
Nakama mena sipisipi porai ingyuo karaminyi dupwame porai ingya nange dupwa yuu dokona kara nana lao pyao suu lao ralinyi nembelyaminyi.
Dopa pilyaminyi dokona nambana sipisipi dupwa kiiramo nyeronopa wakale dupwame nakama randa mende mai narami ingilyamo. Nambana sipisipi dupwa mendaki mendaki lao rolao lao dokopa koo keyangepe liti piru.
Nambame kiŋi mende nambana kendemande akali Dapiti yalende mairu. Mairunu dokome sipisipi peparaena rapu pingi mendaki doko ingyuo karapala baame mondo lao rapu pira.
Namba Kamongo doko nakamana Anatu ingyuo kararo dokopa kiŋi mende nambana kendemande akali Dapiti yale dokome nakama iso karara. Dopa lao lapunu pilyamo.
Mona seramopa koo keta pali nao kararami lao namba nakama pipya lao kana minayro. Mena suwape wambu nalana pingi dupwa yuu dokona pali nana lao pyao ralinyi nembaro dokopa nambana sipisipi dupwa yuu dokonape imwa dupwanape mondo lao palyuo kararami.
Dokopa nambame nakama kalya pinyi nembo yuu kyau poo pyasi dokona palyuo karena laro. Palyuo karo apunda ipyali lao maseraminyi dokopa nambame dupwa elyape keta pisinyi pyambuo apunda kulimbwanyi peyo mairu.
Mairunu dokopa nenge isa dupwa jingi lyuo yuu dokona nenge ando pira. Dopa piramopa nakama mendaki mendaki lao yuu renge dokona mondo lao palyuo kararami. Kararaminyi dokopa nambame nambana wambu kendemande pingi puu sane doko rokwaronopa namba Kamongo doko lyamo lao soo nyerami.
Wambu Anatu suu pyaa nange dupwame dee epo pyao bange dupwa lalyuo nyuo pii narami. Dee mena suwape wambu nalana pingi dupwame nakama pyao nao pii naramiko. Nakama mondo lao palyuo kararaminyipa mendeme nakama paka renge maiyuo pii narami ingilyamo.
Nambame yuu amenge pingi dupwa maiyuo nenge soo kakana pyuo pinya laro. Yuu muu wakale dupwame nakama kandanyi palyuo giyalya giyana pyuo lengenyili pyuo laa nana lao piru.
Wambu peparaena nambame Isaraele wambu dupwa kyawa minyilini doko nakama nambana wambu lao serami lao namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome lapusa pilyamo.
Nakama nambana sipisipi nenge jilyu dupwa nambana wambuŋu. Dee namba nakamana Anatu ingyuo dupwa nambana wambuŋu karoŋo lao namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome lapusa pilyamo.















Kamongome lao makwa isa ingyuo kuku pyaa nare akali doko Isaraelena yuu kyau dupwa kando lamaiyuo, Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge.
Dokome waili pii nakamana lao letamo doko sinya lare, langiya. Isaraelena yanda pimwai dupwame nakama range nyisu yakunaiyape mende pisi nalyamo dokona kendepulinde karamano lao suu pyapala lao dakepa yuu kyau sulu singi dupwa nakamana lyakande, letaminyi.
Dokona lao namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome pii leto doko dapa letamo lao polo lamaipi. Yuu lili wakale parali maki palenge dupwame Isaraelena yuu kyau dupwa ukiaki minyuo epo nyiyaminyi dokopa Isaraele wambu dupwa kando kilya kando lao piyami.
Dokona nakama yuu kyau kuki andakepe ipwa pona kukipi yuu anda lama lamape dee yuu kwaeyasi silyamo dupwape dee taone yuu liti wakale parali maki palenge dupwame pyuo kilya kando kwaeyaminyi dupwa mee apu silyamo dupwape namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome apa letene lao selapape.
Nakama yuu liti wakale wambu parali maki palami dupwana lao namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome imbu singi kana ingyuo rao alyuo karamo dokona piso nakama pyalana pyuo lamaipu. Yuu Itome range nakama angingyuole kando lapu. Nakamame namwa kilya kandalya kandana pipala rae maiyuo epo mena naraminyi nenge malu singi dupwa epo nyakami.
Dokona lao pii dake Isaraele wambu dupwa angingyuo lamairi. Nakama yuu liti wakale range dupwame Isaraele wambu pyao bembailanyi pyambuo elya maiyuo dee kilya kandele lao piyaminyi dokona namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome imbu singi paleta nakama pipya yango koo palyuo karoŋo dokona lao yuu kyau ipwa pona kukipi yuu lamape dupwa dopa letamo lao lamaipi.
Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome yuu liti parali maki dupwa nyuo isa nembaronopa elya nyerami lao kingi ketae nembo lapunu pilyamo.
Yuu doloma dopa pyakamirunupape Isaraele yuu kyau dupwana Isaraele wambunya lao isa dupwa deeyako yoko byalu lao angi jingi lyuo lokwaso palyuo piraŋa nakama oo repetale range anda epaminyi.
Namba nakamana dorena karapunu pilyamoŋo nakamana yuu doko ape ape pyao dokona nenge jingi randa lakao piru.
Nambame nakamana ree palu dokona wambu wai kiso andakyaro dokopa nakama yuu taone pyao lalyinyi nembeyami kwaeyasi silyamo dupwa kamba minyalyuo pirami.
Nambame mena bulamakaope dee wambupi dupwa wai kiso andakyakaro. Nakama wamba kara nange wambu dokona lama konda pyuo sipuro kararami dokopa wane maluko konda pyuo jero. Nambame nakama ee wara pyuo nao kapa palyuo wamba palyuo karengenyili pyuo karalapale lao piru doko soo kandapala dokopa namba doko Kamongo dokolyamo lao kando serami.
Nambame nakama nambana Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu range dokona palyuo karalapale lao dee lanyuo eparo. Eparono dokopa yuu doko nakama rangena ingyara. Ingyaramo dokopa nakamana wane dupwa dee dopako pyuo papyuo kararaminde daa.
Yuu dake kando wambu pyao nao yuu range wane wanakepe waa nyuo pyuo palyuo karenge lao karaminyi doko namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome soo leto.
Dopa letaminyi soo karoŋo epapu dakepana piso pao rengyape rakane nakamana wane waa nyakao wambu pyao pyakepo naope pii narami lao lapunu pilyamo.
Epapu nakamana yuu kwaeyasi doko kando dee giyalya giyana pyuo gyaa kai pyuo laa narami lyakande. Isaraele yuu dokome nakamana wane wanakepe dupwa waa nyaka narako lao namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome lapunu pilyamo.
Kamongome namba langyuo,
Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko langilyu. Nakama Isaraele akali dupwa piso palyuo piyaminyi doko nama napala myuku piya. Nambame nakama kandeyo dokopa enda kingi lanyuo petelyamo ipyange dopale ingyuo peya.
Yuu dokona wambu pyapalako karo dee kingimi wasisi dupwa kyawa nyuo kingi lao yuu doko kokwayamisa dokona nambana imbu singi doko nakama keta kulimbuo epo palira lao pena lao kaeyo.
Nakama dopa pyuo kopetame pyuo paleyaminyi dokona lao kooŋo lao lao koo keta palyapala yuu liti wakale dupwana bolombalo lao pena lao pyao ralinyi nembeyo.
Yuu wambupi wakale dupwana peyami dokopa wambu dupwame lao dokopa nakamana Anatu dokome yuu maiyamo doko yaki nyuo kaeyapenge ingiyasa yaki nyiyami leyami dokopa nambana kingi poo pyasi doko kwaeyo peya.
Isaraele wambu anja peyami dupwana nambana kingi poo pyasi doko nyuo yuu paranyi nembo peyaminyi doko kandapala nambame nambana kingi doko range sakao kareyo.
Dakepa doko namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokona pii Isaraele wambu nakama lamainya pilyu doko lamaiyakape. Nambame renge mende pyupono lamo doko Isaraele wambu nakamana reke lao pinya pilini lao suu pyasaramiŋi doko daa.
