Nakama yuu liti wakale wakale dupwana peyaminyi dokona nambana kingi poo pyasi doko nyuo yuu paranyi nembo peyaminyi dokona lao piru.
Nambame yuu liti wakalena nakama pao nambana kingi nyuo yuu paranyi nembo peyaminyi dupwana yulu angi mende kandapala nambana kingi doko poo pyasilyamo lao kando serami dokona palyuo pirunu dokopa dupwame namba doko Kamongo lao serami lyakande. Nambame nakama nyuo yulu pipala namba doko poo pyasiŋi lao yuu dupwana wambu lasaka piruŋu. Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome letoŋo.
Nambame nakama yuu liti wakale wakale kuki andakepe dupwana karaminyi doko nyepala lanyuo epo yuu nakamana range dokona dee lanyuo eparo.
Nambame nakamana kopetame koo pyuo isa kanape suu pyao karaminyi dupwana ipwa karo pisi nange dokome kulimbwanyi palyuo wate poo pyao nyero.
Nambame nakamana mona suu pingipi dolapo enenge inginyi pyambwakaro. Nakamana mona kana poko kamba lenge doko nyuo nembakapala laronuli pyuo rape rape lao pingi suu pingi doko jero.
Nambame nambana imambu doko nakamana mona rena palyapala nambana lowa pii kuki epengepe jiyunu dupwa apa pyuo minyilyaminyi lao kando kararo.
Dopa pipala dokopa nakamana rakange kyawa dupwa yuu maiyunu dokona kararami dokopa nakama nambana wambu kararaminyipa namba nakamana Anatu kararo.
Dopa pyuo paramo dokopa nambame nakama keta renge kwaeyo para mendepe epa nanya lao nyiso kararo. Nambame nakama keta lopo dee see naraŋa lapala kenapa ee dupwa ando kakana pyakaro.
Dopako pyuo lopo kone seramopa yuu liti andake dupwa pipa moŋo nyuo palya namili lapala isa jingi nenge isa dupwana lokwaso palyuo kakana pinyi nembakaro.
Dokopa nakamana yulu koo piyaminyi dupwa suu pyao lao karapala akipamo piyama lao elyame kumarami.
Nambana yulu keyange pilyu dupwa Isaraele wambu nakamana reke lao pilini lao masarami doko daa. Nakama nambana yulu keyange doko kando koo dupwana elya nyimili lapala pipunu pilyamo, dopa lao namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome pii dake lapunu pilyamo.
Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome dopa leto. Nambame nakamana koo dupwana pyuo poo pyao nyepala dokopa nakamana taone dupwana range palyuo karalapa larono dokopa yuu andape kwaeyasi dupwa range dee kamba minyalyarami.
Wambu nakamana yuu dokona kata okosowape epo pao karo kandeyami dupwame doko aki yuu lao see nayaminyipa isoko dupwa yoko lapu lapu pipala kaeya. Dopa pyuo peyamopape nambame dee singinyili pyuo penale apa yuu pyao epo palipa laro.
Wambu epo dee kandarami dupwame lao yuu taone dake wamba lalyale pau lao kwaeyo apa siya kande doko yuu porai ingyaramopa ee Etenena nenge andenge dopale ingyuo wambu palengende pyuo kareyalyamo larami.
Dopa lao yuu wakale range parali maki yuu palenge wambu dupwame yuu doko Kamongo nambame yuu taone lalyale pau lao siyamo dupwape dee yuu isa ee nengepe dupwa minyalyilinyi larami doko. Namba Kamongo dokome piso lao lao kaeyo leto. Doko dokona palyuo piru.
Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome letamo. Isaraele wambu dupwame nambame nakama nyisapili lao piso sela imili lao suu pilyu. Dee nakamana wambu doko ipwa pota kee kana ingyuo kakana pena lao suu pilyu.
Taone lalyuo buru bara pasi silyamo dupwa rengya dokopa wambu simbuo rangu papala yuu Jerusaleme dokona mena sipisipi Anatu pyao kiso maiyamisa menapa yuupa aopa laro karo pyao kiso maiyami kande dopale ingyaro karara. Doo pyuo parami doko kandapala namba doko Kamongo lao soo nyerami.
Namba Anatunya porai renge palenge doko nambapa role pyao karapyamo nakanjo sepapunu dokopa banya Imambu dokome namba nyuo soo pao yuu anda lama lama mendena pupyamo dokopa wambu kuli malu palyaro karapyamo kandapu.
Baame namba lanyuo yuu dokona sukusa pupyamo kandapu dokopa kuli dupwa ama malu mee dee ama yando mee ingyapyamo kandapu.
Dokopa namba langyuo, Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko kuli malu yando dapwa dee lete parami lape lao piso sipya. Dokopa nambame isingi lao, Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge doko embame ramo doko dopa pyuo mende pinya lao lare ingilyamo lape.
Baame isingi langyuo dokopa kuli dupwa poropeta pii lamaiyuo, Nakama kuli malu kana malu ingyaro karaminyi dapwa Kamongona pii doko mende lalyamo lao soo nyinya lamaipi.
Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge dokome pii dapa pyuo letamo lao kuli dupwa lamaipi. Doko porambaiye poo lanyi pyano nakama wambu ingyuo dee lete nyero.
Nambame kuli angae laro karamo dokona kata nyuo pena lao minju nyuo palyoko yanenge wai pyakao poo porambaiye maiyuo wambu ingyuo dee lete nyerono nakamame kandapala namba doko Kamongo lao serami.
Dokopa dopa pyuo poropeta pii lape lao langiyamo doko leyo. Ene pii lao kareyono dokopa kuli malu kaparo kareyamo dupwa ginyi ganyi keke kake lao kata nyuo pao range dokona kimbu sera sera piyaminyi siyu.
Nambame kuli angae laro kareyami dupwa apa pilyamo lao kandaro kareyonopa pao minju wailyu dee simbiyu kongapupi wailyu yanenge enenge dokona epo maralyuo piyamo kandeyo. Dopa piyamopape angi wambu ingyuo ŋeeŋae soo lete papa nayaminyi kandeyo.
Dokopa Anatumi langyuo, Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko embame porambaiye dupwa poropeta pii lamaiyuo dokopa Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome dopa pyuo letamo lao lamaipi. Porambaiye dupwa kata luna dusipana piso minyuo epo yanenge lete see nalyamo dapwana lanyi pyano lete nyinya lamairi, leya.
Leyamosa nambame poropeta pii lape leyamuli pyuo leyo. Yanenge kaoma dokona poo rambaiya minyinyi pyaneyasa wambu ingyuo lenge rao roya peteyaminyi kandeyo. Dopa pyuo yanda kambu marakai doko kareyaminyi kandeyo.
Dokopa Anatumi namba langyuo, Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko Isaraele wambu dupwa mee kuli malu sipyamo kandelene kande dopaleŋe, leya. Nakamame lao dokopa, Namwana kuli dupwa yando nao kaelyamo. Dee lenge raa narama lyamo. Namwa mee otao kaeyarama ingyuo pelyamo lao karaminyi.
Embame nambana Isaraele wambu dupwa poropeta pii lao lamaiyakao, Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome nakamana malu anda dupwa kii lumbwaro. Dopa pyuo nambame nakama neta nyuo Isaraele wambunya yuu dokona dee lanyuo paro letamo lamairi, leya.
Nambana wambu malu anda palaminyi kambu doko lumbuo neta nyerono dokopa namba Kamongo doko lao serami, lyakande.
Nambame poporambaiye maiyuo lete nyuo nakama yuu kareyaminyi dokona dee lanyuo eparono dokopa namba doko Kamongo doko lamo lao kandarami. Angi piru lao lalu lao kaeyo lapunu pilyamo doko angi pipala kaeyaro lao Kamongo nambame leto.
Kamongome namba deyako langiya.
Makwa isa ingyuo karo kuku pyaa nare akali doko isa lomasi mende nyepala dokona Jutana kiŋi yulu dokona suu pyao pepa pyape. Pepa pyapala dee isa lomasi mende nyepala dokona Israelena kiŋi yulu dokona suu pyao pepa pyare.
Pepa pyapala isa lomasi dolapona pinjingi nyuo keto laro kararene dokopa mendaki ingyuo penale, leya.
Dokopa embena wambu dupwame kandapala pilyu doko langi lao pisiyaminyi lamaiyuo kande dokopa
dapa lamairi. Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome Isaraele wambupi Juta wambupi makande pyuo silyambinyi dolapo nyepala nakamba lama ingyaro karambinyi. Doko mendaki ingyanyi pyambwapala nambana kingi rakana minyaro kararo, leya.
Isa lomasi pepa pyapinyi dolapo wambu dupwa kandena lao embena kingi rakana minyaro karape.
Dopa pyuo karo nakama lamaiyuo, Namba Kamongo Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome nambana wambu yuu muu wakale dupwana karo pelyaminyi dupwa nyuo pyaso karo yuu range dokona lanyuo epo kararo letamo, lamairi.
Dopa pipala dokopa nambame nakama wambu yuu liti mendakinya palenge dopale ingyuo pena lao yuu kyau Isaraele wambunya dupwana nyuo pyasaro. Kiŋi mendakimi iso kararamopa dee kambako yuu wambupi doko lama ingyuo karo kiŋi wakale wakale ingyuo liti pyuo karo pii narambi, leya.
Nakama mona karo petelyamopa isa kanape dupwa angiko ingyuo kingi lao wambarae yulu suu pingipi pyaminyi kata dupwana deeko pii narami. Nambame nakama koo dopale mata kando pilyaminyi dokome namba yanda pimwailyamo doko nenge rekya lao nyero. Nakama dopa pyuo poo pyao nyeronopa nakama nambana wambu paraminyipa namba nakamana Anatu kararo, leya.
Kiŋi mende nambana kendemande Dapiti yale dokome nakama iso karara. Nakama kiŋi mendakimi isaramo dokopa mendakinya ingyuo nambana mawa pii dupwa warombo soo mondoko lao minyarami.
Nakama yuu nambana kendemande akali Jekope maiyunu dokona palirami. Jekopena para pyasi nakamana rora ambasupi ingyuo dupwa palyuo kareyami. Nakamape nakamana wane dee dupwana para pyao paramo dupwape dokona palyuo karalu kararami dokopa kiŋi mende nambana kendemande akali Dapiti yale dokome nakama iso karalu karara.
Nambame nakama pipya pii lalu lao lao kana minyuo laronopa nakama keta mumbwa palyaramopa elyape keta palyuo puu parami. Namba dopa pyuo kanda soo pipala wambu wai kiso andake inginyi pyambwapala nambana tembole anda doko nakamana yuu dokona wasaronopa karalu karara, leya.
Namba doo nakama paliraminyi dokona palyuo kararo. Dopa pyuo namba nakamana Anatu ingyuo kararonopa nakama nambana wambu ingyuo kararami.
Nambame nambana tembole anda doko nakama pipya yuu dokona karalu karara lao wasarono dokopa yuu muu wakale dupwame namba Kamongo dokome Isaraele wambu dupwa rangena kipungi ingyarami lao rombo palyuo nyilyamo lao serami, leya.
























































































































































































































































































































Ee kana repo dokona akali Jiyoakwimi doko Juta wambunya kiŋi ingyuo kareyamo dokopa yuu Bapilone dokona kiŋi Nepukatenesame yuu Jerusaleme pyao nyuo kako piya.
Kamongo dokome kiŋi Nepukatenesame kiŋi Jiyoakwimipa tembole anda bange keyange singi dupwana lapope nyinya leya. Baame wambu lapo karapusi ingyuo nyuo minyuo mee bange anatuŋu lao lakandenge dupwana tembole anda yuu Bapilone dokona lanyuo peya. Dee bange keyange nyiyamo dupwa tembole anda dokona bange retenge panda dokona reteya.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome akali Asepenase banya isingi akali mupwa doko lamaiyuo, Isaraele akali karapusi palaminyi dokona kiŋinya ree palu dupwanape wambu mupwa ingyuo karenge dupwanape wane parange lapo rombo palyuo nyepe, leya.
Nakama wane au pingipi dee nakamana yanenge dokona koo mende pali nao suu pingi keyange palyuo sukuli andake mana nyisipi dee wane waiya lao soo nyingipi dupwa kapa ingyuo kiŋinya anda dokona yulu pyuo kararami lao rombo palyuo nyepe, leya. Akali Asepenase dokome nakama yuu Bapilone rangena pii yaka laowape pepa pyaowape kararami lao mana lamaira ingiya.
Dokopa wambu kiŋi dokona anda palyuo nengepe ipwa waenepe neyaminyi doko suu pyao yuu peparae nenge mendare dopako pyuo wane dusipa nena lao lamaiya. Dokopa sukuli mana nyuo karo ee kana rema epo paparamopa nakama kiŋinya lenge kambu sera dokona kandena lao epo kararami, leya.
Wane angi rombo palyiyamo dupwana wane mende kingi Daniele lenge mende Ananaya lenge dee mende Misaele lenge dee mende Asaraya lenge. Nakama peparae Jutana rara dokona ingyuo kareyami.
Dokopa akali isingi mupwa dokome wane dusipa kingi wakale enenge leya. Wane mende kingi Beletesasa mende Satarake mende Mesake dee mende Apeneko leya.
Dokopa kiŋinya anda nenge neyaminyi dokome Daniele banya yongo doko kokwa sasaroŋo naa naro lao suu pyaro kareya. Dopa pipala akali isingi mupwa Asepenase dokome baa nyisinya lao piso siya.
Dokopa akali Asepenase doko Anatumi nyisiyamosa baame Daniele kando sakame kumuo nyisalana suu piya.
Suu pyapala Asepenaseme kiŋi dokona lao pakapala Daniele lamaiyuo, Kiŋi dokome nakama nenge ipwape naramiŋi lapyamo doko lao oto lapyasa pipya. Dee wane yango menge dupwa nenge ipwape kapa napala kararaminyipa nakama lopo lenge kambu nyero kararaminyisa kandapala namba pyao kumakasara, leya.
Dopa leyamo dokopa Asepenaseme isingi akali mendeme wane rema dusipape dee Danielepe iso karena lao rombo palyiyamo doko kareyamo dokona Daniele peya.
Papala baame lao, Namwa ipwa nenge awape iki yuu gii akalisa nalapa lao joo embame makande pyuo kandape, leya.
Dokopa wane parange kiŋinya anda nenge angi nao karaminyi dupwa pipya namwa pyasapala api kapa au pyuo karamipi lao kandapala embame langiri, leya.
Dopa leyamopa akali nakamana isingi dokome yuu gii akalisa iki makande pyuo nenge awa ipwape iki nena leya.
Yuu gii akalisa dusipa epo papeyamo dokopa wane dolosipame wane menge kiŋinya nenge porai neyami dupwa isa palyuo yongo keyange karo porai ingyuo kareyami.
Dokona lao isingi akali dokome kiŋinya nenge porai maiya nao ipwa nenge awape dupwa iki maiya.
Dokopa Anatumi akali parange kisima dusipa soo nyinginya renge maiyuo buku yaka lenge dupwana mora piso elyape inginyi pyambuo dee renge wakale wakale angi dupwana soo gisinya lao maiyuo piya. Dopa pipala baame Daniele pii repa repa pingipi dee kombeya pingipi dupwana renge angi polo lara lao suu pingi keyange maiya.
Ee kana rema dusipa epo papeyamo dokopa kiŋinya lao reteyamo dokona palyuo isingi akali Asepenaseme wane parange dupwa peparae lanyuo Nepukatenesa peteyamo dokona peya.
Peyamo dokopa kiŋi dokome peparae pii lamaiyuo karo kandeyamo dokopa wane menge dupwa nyuo isa palyuo wane Danielemoo Ananayamoo Misaelemoo Asarayamoo dusipa kamame ulipili mupwa ingiyamo kando nyiya. Nyepala dokona lao nakama kiŋinya anda dokona ree palu ingyuo kareyami.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome piso singi pii mendepe dee randa mendepe sipureyamopa mali mali sakangepe nemonga lenge dupwape nyuo isa palyuo wane parange dusipame kamame ulipili ingyuo renge dupwana konda pyuo soo nyuo lao kareyami.
Daniele baa kiŋinya anda dokona yulu pyuo kareyamopa pao Sairose baa yuu Pesa wambunya kiŋi dokome Bapilone pyao nyiya.
Ee kana lapo doko Nepukatenesa baa kiŋi kareyamo dokopa baa kombeya mende piya. Dokome baa mona randa malu piyamosa kapa pyuo luu palira ingya naya.
Dokona lao banya mali mali sakangepe pipu lengepe nemonga lengepe pepe minyingipi akali dupwame kombeya dokona renge doko polo langyala epena leya. Epapala nakama kiŋinya lenge kambu siyamo dokona roya kareyami.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome lao, Namba kombeya mende pipu dokome namba mona randa pilyamo dokona namba renge angi doko apa lao pipu lao selana suu pilyu, leya.
Leyamo dokopa nakamame Arame pii lao isingi lao, Emba kiŋi dokoŋo palu karalu karena. Embena kombeya doko namwa langipi. Dopa pirinyi dokopa namwame renge doko polo langirama, leyami.
Kiŋi dokome doo pipu lenge akali dupwa lamaiyuo, Nakamame kombeya doko akiŋi laope dee renge dokonaŋa laope polo langirami lao suu pyaro karo. Dopa pyuo langya narami ramo nambame nakamana kingi kimbu yongo dupwa pyao suu lao nyuo dee nakamana anda dupwa kokwa sinyi nembo piru lao suu pyao otapu.
Dopa pirunupape nakamame kombeya dokona langyuo renge dokoŋo lao polo langirami ramo doko nambame nakama yano pyao bange lapo jero dee nakamana kingi ketae pyambuo lakandaro. Epapu dakepa kombeya doko akiŋi laope dee dokona renge dokope polo langipwape, leya.
Leyamo dokopa pipu lenge akali dupwame kiŋi kando kamba piso soo lao, Embame kombeya doko akiŋi lao langiri ramo doko renge doko polo langirama, leyami.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome pii poraiyuo lao, Nambame pii lapunu doko alowa pii naro doko kandapala nakamame kyambo yuu gii nembo letaminyi doko angi soo nyilyu.
Nakamame kombeya dokona langya narami ramo doko nakama peparae randa mendaki dokoko nyerami. Namba suu pingi alowa pipili yaka lao nakamame mona mendaki palyuo namba kyambo langirama lao lao retami. Nakamame kombeya doko akiŋi lao langirami ramo doko nakamame namba kombeyana renge dokoŋo lao langiramilyamo lao soo nyero, leya.
Leyamo dokopa kiŋinya dopa pyuo piri dapa pyuo piri lao nyiso lenge akali dupwame baa isingi lao, Emba selana suu pilini doko yuu muu peparaena mendemepe embena kombeya dokona kapa langya narami. Kiŋi kamame andake mendemepe panda ama porainya renge palenge mendemepe banya akali pipu lengepe nemonga lengepe mali mali sakangepe dupwa kando piso singi pii andake dopale mendepe piso see nange.
Emba kiŋi doko. Emba pii andake piso silini dokona mendemepe kapa isingi laa narami ingilyamo. Kapa laa naraminyipa mee bange anatuŋu lao lakandenge dupwame iki kapa langirami. Langiraminyipape nakamame mee wambu role pyao kara nange.
Yuu gii dokopa kiŋi baa imbu singi nyepala yuu Bapilone dokona kiŋi baa dopa pyuo piri dapa pyuo piri lao nyiso lamaiyuo karenge dupwa peparae lapome mange pyakepo pinya laro lao kareya.
Pii leyamo doko akali peparaepe dee Danielemoo wane dolosipa pipya peparae rambe rambe palyuo pyaroŋo lao lamaiyuo oteya.
Yanda singi dupwame kiŋi iso karenge dupwana akali mupwa Arioko lenge kareyamo dokona Daniele baa peya. Akali Arioko lenge dokome akali kombeya polo lenge dusipana mange pyakepo pinya leyamisa Daniele baa mona palipala peya.
Papala dokopa baame Arioko piso soo lao, Kiŋi dokome akipamo imbu singi nyuo pii dopale doko lapyase? leya. Leyamo dokopa Ariokome dopa piyaŋa lao Daniele lamaiya.
Dokopa Daniele aopa papala baame kiŋi doko kombeya renge angi doko polo langiru lao yuu gii kuki lama mee jinya leya.
Lapala dokopa Daniele baa anda papala banya puu minyingi Ananaya Misaele Asarayamoo doo piyamo dupwa polo lamaiya.
Yuu Bapilone dokona akali lapo kiŋi doko dopa pyuo piri dapa pyuo piri lao nyiso lenge dupwa pyao kumara dokopa namwa kumwa naramaŋa Anatu yake panda karenge dokome kondome kumuo nyiso kombeya renge angi doko polo langinya lao Anatu piso sokondali pyuo ateŋa lena leya.
Enakana yuu gii kukwa dokopa Anatumi renge angi doko Daniele keta pii repa repa pyuo lasaka piyamosa baame Anatu yake panda karenge doko lakandeya.
Anatu baa soo nyuo angingyuo porainya renge palenge dokome banya kingi lakando karalu karamana.
Baame neta pingipi apu pingipi yuu gii dupwa rapu pingi. Baame kiŋi dupwa rombo palyepala dee nyuo isa nembenge. Baame akali dupwa soo gisinginya rengepe dee singinya rengepe maingi.
Mee wambumi see nangepe dee renge yalu piru karengepe dupwa baame panenge. Dee baame lapo iminjinginya yalu pyuo singi dupwa soo gisingi. Baa keta yanga paupau lao karenge.
Embame namwa kiŋi doko aki lamairami lao lasaka pyuo embame nambana ateŋa dokona isingi yano pyakao dee embame namba soo nyinginya rengepe porainya rengepe joo pilini dokona nambana rora ambasupi dupwana Anatu nambame emba rape rape lao lakando karo.
Akali Arioko lenge dokome kiŋi baame banya dopa pyuo piri dapa pyuo piri lao nyiso lenge akali dupwana mange pyakepo pinya leyamo doko kareyamo dokona Daniele peya. Papala lao, Embame nakama pyao kumaka napipi. Nambame banya kombeya dokona renge doko polo lamairu lao namba minyuo kiŋi petamo dokona paipu, leya.
Dokopa Ariokome aopa Daniele lanyuo kiŋinya lenge kambu dokona papala kiŋi doko lamaiyuo lao, Embame wambu yuu Juta range puu maiyuo nyingi dokona mende kando nyipunu dokome embena kombeya dokona renge aki lao polo langira, leya.
Kiŋi dokome Daniele banya kingi mende Beletesasa lenge doko lamaiyuo, Embame namba kombeya pipu dokonape dee kombeya renge dokonape langirisi? leya.
Dokopa Daniele isingi lao, Emba kiŋi andake, pipu lenge akali mendepe nemonga lenge mendemepe mali mali sakange mendemepe dee akali bui rapu pingi akali dupwana mendemepe emba dokona langirami ingya nalyamo.
Dopa piramopape Anatu yake panda karenge dokome kongwalu pii dupwa pano lamaingi. O kiŋi baame emba rengya mende pira lao langipya. Emba luu palipinyi pii repa repa pipi kandapi doko kombeya dakeŋe epapu nambame polo langiruwale.
Emba kiŋi doko luu palipinyipa Anatu renge angi yalu pisi singi dupwa panenge dokome kombeyame rengya pira dupwana lao lasaka pipya.
Nambana soo nyingi renge doko andake ingyuo mee akali dupwana suu pingi nyuo isa palyuo pingindena Anatumi renge angi namba lasaka pipyande daa. Emba kiŋi andake doko embena kombeya dokona renge doko soo nyuo dee suu pingi emba keta ipyamo dupwa soo nyuo pelese lao pipya.
Emba kiŋi andake doko. Embena pii repa repa pipinyi dokopa kaname wasisi ama andake wambu yalende yanga paupau lao leya leya pipyamo doko kandalana pakapi.
Dokona kyawa doko kana golo keyangeme wasisi dee banya kingi kyangalipi dupwa kana kulingi dokome wasisi dee banya romba lengyarepe dupwa kone kana yalendeme wasisi.
Banya kimbu dolapo aneme wasisi dee kimbu kape dolapo paki aneme wasapa dee paki warame wasapa pingi.
Emba doko kando palene dokopa kana reeko wambumi minyanda nayaminyi mende maso epapala bange dokona kimbu kape ane warapeme wasisi doko piyamosa poro lao muu muu piya.
Yuu gii mendaki dokopa anepe warape bange kone kana yalepe kana kulingipi dee kana golope poro lao muu muu pipala panyi pilyamopa sinjimu singi dopale ingiya. Dopa piyamo dokopa poraiye dokome kuki mendepe pyarepala paa nana lao soo peya. Dopa piyamopape kana doko ando yuu kyau ingyuo andakyapala yuu muu dupwa peparae minyarambu nyiya.
Doko embena kombeya dokoŋo. Epapu nambame kiŋi andake doko renge angi doko polo langiruwale.
Emba kiŋi andake doko. Kiŋi menge dupwana emba iki mupwa. Anatu yake panda karenge dokome emba kiŋi rombo palyuo porainya renge joo wambu wakale dupwame emba kando rape rape lao lakando karena leya.
Dokona mena suwape yakape peparae dee wambu yuu muunya palaminyi dupwape emba mupwa ingyuo iso karare lao wasiya. Emba kyawa kana golome wasisi doko dopale karene.
Emba kiŋi karaparene dokopa dee kiŋi mendeko karara. Doko emba karene dopa pyuo andake ingyuo kara nara. Dee doko soo paparamo dokopa repo pyuo kiŋi mendeko dokome yuu muu dupwa peparae iso karara. Baa kone kana wasisi yale karara.
Dokopa enakana kiŋi kisima ingyuo doko ama porai ane dopale ingyuo karara. Ane dokome isa palipala bange lapo pyao injo muu muu pingi doko suu pyao kiŋi dokome kiŋi wamba karenge dupwa pyao nembalu nembo nembara.
Kimbu kapepe pambupi aneme pakiki wasisi dee paki warame wasisi kandee kande. Renge doko kiŋinya isingi yulu dupwa liti pyuo wakale wakale sera. Ane doko wara dokopa pyasiyamo dokona anena porainya renge mende palamo lao sera.
Doko kimbu pambu paki ane dee paki wara dokona suu pyao renge doko kiŋinya isingi yulu dokona lapo porai ingyuo dee lapo mee manda rao isa para.
Embame ane doko wara dokopa kiminjiyamo kandeko doko suu pyao doko kiŋinya isingi dokona akali mupwa dupwame nakamana ree palu nyuo pyasimwali lao mendena wanenge doko yango mendali maiyuo pilya pena pirami. Dopa piraminyipape ane doko wara dokopa kapa pyasa nangenyili pyuo nakama kapa pii narami.
Yuu gii kiŋi dusipame iso kararaminyi dokopa Anatu yake panda karenge dokome kiŋi enenge mende rombo palyuo baa mee karalu karena lara. Kiŋi wakale dupwame baa pyao anamasi minya narami. Dopa piramopape baame kiŋi doloma peparae pyao isa palyapala baa mee iso palyuo puu para.
Embame kandene dokopa kana mende yuu kyau dokona pisapala mendeme minyanda nayaminyipa rangeme lukundo epapala anepe kone kanape warape kana kulingipi dee golopeme wasisi bange wambu yale piyamo kandee kande. Anatu Kamame Andake Wakasa dokome rengya mende pira dokona emba kiŋi andake doko lasaka pilyamo. Nambame kombeya angi emba pipinyili pyuo langilyu dee dokona renge angi kinyi rolae dusipa langyuo pilyu, leya Danieleme.
Doko kiŋi Nepukatenesame Danielena lenge kambu siyamo dokona wapambu pii pyao pangu sepala baa bange lapo maiyuo dee rendamu pingi kiso maiyuo pimana lao wambu dupwa lamaiya.
Embame nambana kombeyana renge angi dokona polo langipinyi dokona embena Anatu doko kamame andake wakasa mee bange anatu dupwa nyuo isa palyuo baa Kamongo kiŋi dupwana baa ketae ingyuo karenge dee baameko kombeya renge angi dupwa panenge doko soo nyilyu, leya.
Lapala baame Daniele yulu andake maiyuo yuu Bapilone doko iso karena lao dee akali lapo kiŋi doko yulu dopa pyuo piri dapa pyuo piri lao nyiso karenge dupwana baa mupwa ingyuo karo pinya lapala bange keyange dupwa maiya.
Danieleme mende piso siyamuli pyuo kiŋi dokome Setarakemoo Mesakemoo Apenekomoo dusipa yuu Bapilone dokona yulu wakale wakale singi dupwa rapu pyuo karena leya. Leyamo dokopa Daniele baa yuu Bapilone kiŋinya anda dokona yulu pyuo kareya.
Kiŋi Nepukatenesame wambu yale kana golome banya akali dupwame wasinya leyamo doko ama londe mita akalisa lama ipisu yanda ipingi dee ama andake doko mita rema dopale ingiya. Wasapala yuu lama lama kingi Dura lenge yuu Bapilone singi dokona pisinya leya.
Lapala dokopa banya akali mupwape isingi akali dupwape kana isingi dupwape kote singi dupwape gapomane mupwa dupwape gapomane kukipi dee akali mupwa dupwa peparae yuu liti dokona range dupwape nyuo pyaso malu palyinya leya. Kiŋi Nepukatenesame mee bange wambu yale kana golome wasapala ketae pisiyamo dokona nakama lakando ketae pyambwakala epena leya.
Dokopa akali mupwa dupwa peparae epo wambu yale bange doko ketae pyambwarami lao nyuo malu palyapala wambu yale bange dokona lenge kambu siyamo dokona kareyami.
Dokopa kiŋinya pii polo lenge akali dokome pii poraiyuo ketae palyuo lao,
Akali yuu muu dupwana range peparaepe pii wakale wakale lenge dupwape, Nakama bikuli laraminyi pii doko sepala dee musiki rara wakale wakale laraminyi pii dupwa soo pipala aopa kiŋi Nepukatenesame wambu yale kana golome wasisi pisiyamo doko wapambu pii pyao pangu sepala lakandarami ingilyamo.
Wambu mendeme pangu sepala lakanda naramo doko waiya lao isare ama alyu rao karenge dokona sukusa pyambwarami, leya.
Dokona lao akali yuu muu wakale wakale rangepe pii wakale wakale lengepe dupwa peparaeme musiki doloma pii leyamo dokopa aopa pangu sepala mee bange wambu yale kana golome wasisi kiŋi Nepukatenesame pisiyamo doko lakandeyami.
Dokopa Bapilone akali lapo akali kiŋi kareyamo dokona epapala Juu akali dusipana lao yango palyuo isa palyamwali lao leyami.
Nakamame kiŋi Nepukatenesa kando lao, Emba kiŋi andake doko palu karalu karare, leyami.
Emba kiŋi andake doko, musiki kanda soo laramopa wambu peparae aopa pangu sepala mee bange wambu yale kana golome wasisi doko lakandapengele.
Dee wambu mendeme pangu soo lakanda nara ramo doko isare ama alyu uliyapu nyuo rao karenge dokona sukusa pyambwarami lapi kandape.
Juu akali lapo Setarakemoo Mesake Apenekomoo yuu Bapilone dokona mupwa ingyuo karena lao rombo palyii kande dupwame emba kiŋi andake dokome mawa pii lapinyi doko warombo see nalyaminyi. Nakamame embena mee bange anatuŋu lenge doko lakanda nao dee wambu yale kana golome wasisi pisinyi doko kando pangu soo lakanda nalyaminyiko.
Yuu gii dokopa kiŋi doko baa ama wakasa imbwuapala akali rema dusipa baa peteyamo dokona minyuo epena leya.
Lapala baame nakama lamaiyuo lao, Setarake Mesake Apeneko nakamame nambana mee bange wambu yale kana golome wasisi pisiyunu doko kando pangu soo lakanda nao dee nambana mee bange anatuŋu lenge doko lakandaka nao pimi. Doko kinyisi?
Epapu dakepa bikuli piipi musiki wakale wakale piipi laramo sepala dokopa aopa nakama pangu soo wambu yale kana golome wasisi doko lakandalapape. Daaŋa lapala nakama dopa pii narami ramo doko aopa dokopako ane isame kame pisi panda sukusa isare alyu uliyapu nyuo rao karenge dokona sukusa pyambwarami. Dokopa anatu mendeme nakama lete nyeraŋa lao suu pilyamisi? leya.
Dopa leyamo dokopa Setarake Mesake Apenekomoome isingi lao, Emba kiŋi andake doko, namwa rangena lao yanda pyuo isingi mende laa narama.
Anatu namwa yulu pyakamilyamano dokome doo isare alyu uliyapu nyingipi sukusa dokonape dee embena porai renge dokonape mee kapa pyuo kyawa lete nyero lara ramo kapa lete nyera.
Baame kamame namwa lete nyii naramopape namwa emba kiŋi doko soo lape. Namwame embena mee bange antuŋu lenge doko lakanda narama dee wambu yale kana golome wasisi pisinyi doko pangu soo lakandaka naramako, leyami.
Dokopa Setarake Mesake Apenekomoo kando kiŋi Nepukatenesa baa ama lenge kambu poro imbu manjo wakasa imbwaya. Imbwuapala banya akali dupwa lamaiyuo isare doko ama andake ingyuo rena leŋe yuu yanda ipingi ingyuo isa pyambuo kisinya leya.
Banya yanda singi ami akali porai dupwame lamaiyuo akali rema dusipa puu pyapala isare alyu uliyapu nyingi dokona pyambunya leya.
Dokona lao nakamame nakamana komau piyaminyi dupwa mee wapuro kareyaminyipa puu pyapala isare alyu uliyapu nyingi sukusa dokona pyambuyami.
Dokopa kiŋi doko pii lao isare doko ama wakasa rao alyinya leyamosa isare ulingi dupwame akali lanyuo pyao pyambwala peyami dupwa rao kumuyami.
Dokona lao wane Setarake Mesake Apenekomoo dusipa puu pyaro karo isa rao ulikasi nyuo kareyamo anda suku dokona pyambuyamisa lukundaro pao paleyami.
Dokopa Nepukatenesame banya petenge isa dokona piso pyakao epapala mona nembaoko banya akali mupwa dupwa piso soo lao, Namwame akali rema dusipa puu pyapala isare sukusa dokona pyambwa namwase? leya. Nakamame isingi lao, Emba kiŋi andake doko. Waa, namwame pyambwamwa, leyami.
Doko dee akipamo nambame akali kisima isare dokona kata papyuo karaminyi kandelyose? lao piso siya. Nakama puu pyaro kara nami dee isare dokome nakama raope pii napya. Dokona akali kisima doko baa anatu yalende karamo, leya.
Kiŋi Nepukatenesa baa isare alyu uliyapu nyuo rao karenge dokona kambu dokona papala nakama kee lao, Setarake, Mesake, Apeneko, Anatu Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokona kendemande akali dusipa nyisa ipupwa, leya. Leyamo dokopa nakama aopa nyisa epeyami.
Dokopa gapomane mupwape gapomane kuki dupwape dee kiŋinya akali mupwape nyuo pyasapala akali isarena randa nyuo raa nayaminyi dusipa kandala epeyami. Nakamana kyawasi dusipana pinjingisape mende raa nayami. Nakamana komau dupwana mende raa nayamo dee nakamana yongo dupwana isare sukwa ai pyuope pii naya.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome lao, Setarake Mesake Apenekomoona Anatu doko lakandamana. Baame banya aŋala doko peyapala akali baa keta pyamalyuo mona maiyuo karo banya yulu pyakamingi dasipa kyawa lete nyipyalyamo. Nakamame nambana pii lapunu dokona warombo see napala nakama range randa nyisasaramano lao paka napala mee bange anatuŋu lenge lapo pangu sepala lakandenge kandale doko suu pyao nakama rangena doko iki lakandeyami.
Dokona epapu namba mawa pii palyuo leto, leya. Yuu muu peparae dupwana wambu mendemepe dee pii rara wakale wakale lenge dupwana mendemepe Setarake Mesakemoo Apenekomoona Anatu dokona kingi doko nyuo isa palyaramo wambu doko banya kimbu kingipi pyao suu lanyi nembo banya anda doko yuu sinjimupi manjomomo nao para. Nakamana Anatu nyiso lete nyipyamo dopale mendepe kara nange.
Yuu Bapilone dokona wane Setarake Mesake Apenekomoo dusipa wambo yulu pyuo karengenepape kiŋi dokome yulu ulipili andake ingyuo maiya.



Yuu muu peparaena wambu palengepe dee rara wakale wakalepe dee wambu pii wakale wakale lengepe dupwa peparae kiŋi Nepukatenesame wai nembo nakama peparae, Yako leto, leya.
Anatu Mupwa Andake Wakasa yake panda karenge dokome yulu wambumi kando yamarangungipi yulu andake wambumi pii nangendepe namba keta pyuo lasaka pipyamo doko nakama langiruwale, selapape.
Anatumi yulu andake wambumi kando yamarangungi dupwa pyuo lasaka pingi. Baame yulu porai wambumi pii nange dupwa pingi. Anatu doko baa kiŋi dokome yuu gii peparae iso karo puu para.
Namba Nepukatenesa bange malu retapunu dupwana range rae maiyuo nambana anda dokona waa lao kapa palipu.
Dopa pipunupape namba luu palipunu dokopa kombeya paka pingi mende pipala pii repa repa pyuo kandapala pakame kumapu.
Dokona lao kombeya renge dokona nakamame langiramiŋi lapala nambame yuu Bapilone dokona kiŋinya akali lapo yulu dopa pyuo piri dapa pyuo piri lao nyiso lenge dupwa namba pisipu dokona lanyuo epena lapu.
Dokopa mali mali sakangepe nemonga lengepe pipu lengepe dee bui kandaro karo apa pirase lao karengepe dupwa peparae lanyuo imi. Iminyipa nambana kombeya angi piyunu doko lamaipu. Lamaipunupape nakamame renge angi doko polo langya nami.
Dokopa Daniele baa enakana andakare ipya. (Banya kingi mende doko Beletesasa lenge. Doko nambana anatuŋu lao kingi lenge doko.) Anatu Poo Pyasi dokona imambu doko baa keta paleyamo dokome kombeya angi pipunu doko nambame baa lamaipu.
Nambame baa kando lao, Beletesasa, akali mali mali sakange dupwana mupwa doko Anatu Poo Pyasi dokona imambu doko emba keta karamo doko namba emba silyu. Dokona emba kongwalu pii peparae dupwana emba silini dokona nambana kombeya pipunu doko dakeŋe. Renge aki lao namba langipi, leyo.
Namba luu palipunu dokopa yuu muu peparaena anda suku dokona isa ama londe mende karapyamo pii repa repa pyuo kandapu.
Doko ando kameyako ingyuo kamame ando ama londe ingyapala yake dulu kando nyipyamo dokopa yuu muu dupwana wambu peparaeme kandarami ingyapya.
Banya isa yokonge dupwa ama keyange wakasa dee jingi dupwa lyuo kui lao epenge dupwa yuu muu peparaena wambu karenge dupwa kapa lyuo narami ingingi. Dee mena rae lenge dupwa isa renge rau lenge dokona imambu soo karengepya dee yaka dupwa banya wangya dupwana anda pingipya. Dee bange lete karenge dupwa peparaeme banya jingi doko lyuo nengeko.
Namba pii repa repa dokona lao suu pyao palipunu dokopa aŋala yuu peparae iso karenge mende yake panda piso isa ipyamo doko kandapu.
Epapala baame pii poraiyuo lao, Isa doko poko isa palyapala wangya pangepe dupwa muu muu pepe. Dee isa yokonge dupwa loo lapala jingi dupwa yuu wakale wakale dupwana pyao nembape. Nembapala mena isa palu silyaminyi dupwa ralinyi nembo dee banya wangya dokona yaka petaminyi dupwa ralinyi nembo pipi, lapya.
Dopa pirinyipape ane puu dokome dee kone kana puu dokomepe isa sinju doko awali lao puu pyanyi palyapala kaeyape. Yuu dokona rambi pipya petena kaeyare. Epapu akali dake keta pipyae dupwa kondo petena dee baa mena rarape dee ee nenge rarape dupwana pipya role pyapeta palena.
Ee kana yanda ipingi nyepo baa keta wambunya suu pingi doko pali nara. Baa keta menana suu pingi palira.
Dake aŋala iso karalu karenge dupwana pii lalu lao lao palyimi doko. Anatu Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokona porai renge dokome mee akali kiŋi dupwana isingi yulu doko nyuo isa palyingi. Baame range maso akali mende kiŋi inginyi pyambuo rombo palyingi. Akali kamame kuki karelyaminyipape baame mende rombo palyilyamo doko kiŋi wasingi. Dokona lao pii doko wambu peparae sinya, lapya.
Kiŋi Nepukatenesame lao, Kombeya doko namba pipuŋu. Beletasasa epapu renge doko aki lao langipi. Nambana akali angi dopa pyuo piri dapa pyuo piri lao nyiso lenge dupwame langi naminyipape emba doo Anatu Poo Pyasi dokona imambu doko emba keta karapyamo dokome embame kapa langiri ingilyamo, leya.
Daniele banya kingi mende Beletesasa lenge dokome kombeya dokona lao sepala mona randame kumuo baa mende lara ingya naya. Dopa piyamosa kiŋi dokome lao, Beletesasa, emba kombeya dokomepe dee dokona renge dokomepe emba mona randanyi pyambunya laa napipi, leya. Leyamo dokopa Beletesasame isingi lao, Emba kiŋi andake doko, kombeya dokope dee dokona renge angi epara dokope emba keta pali nao embena nyisu petenge dupwa keta palipyali doko kapa ingyapyali, leya.
Isa kamame ando ama londe doko yake dulu kando nyipyamo dokopa yuu muu dupwana wambu peparaeme kandarami ingyapya.
Banya yoko dupwa ama keyange ingyapala dee banya jingi lyingi kapa lyepala yuu muu peparaena wambu dupwa kapa lyuo narami ingyapya. Dee mena suwa rae lenge dupwa isa renge rau lenge dokona imambu soo karami dee banya wangya dokona yaka dupwa anda pimi leya.
Emba kiŋi andake doko. Emba isa dopale. Emba ama londe porai wakasa. Emba ando ama andake ingyapala yake kando nyepala embena porainya renge dokome yuu muu dusipa peparae iso karenge.
Emba kiŋi andake dokome kando karapinyi dokopa aŋala mende yake panda piso epo lapya. Isa doko pokanyi isa palyapala dokopa kokwa soo nembena lapya. Dopa pirinyipape isa sinju doko yuu dokona petena kaeyare. Kaepala renge dokona ane puu dokomepe dee kone kana puu dokomepe awali lao puu pyapala yuu dokona rambi pipya petena kaeyare. Dopa pipala akali dake keta pipyae dupwa kondo petena dee ee kana yanda ipingi nyepo baa mena dupwa pipya palyuo karena lapya leya.
Emba kiŋi andake doko. Dake renge angi doko. Dake Anatu Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome emba keta piraŋa lao leyamo doko.
Emba wambu menge dupwa pipya rekya lao nyisa papala mena suwa rae lengepe pipya palyuo kararami. Dee emba mena bulamakao yale okese lenge rambi nenge dopale ingyuo nao ee kana yanda ipingi kamanda palyuo kararenepa pipyae dupwa kondo epo emba keta piso karara. Dokopa embame lao, Mee isa wambunya kiŋinya isingi yulu dupwa peparae Anatu Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome rolo rapu pyuo karenge. Baame yuu dupwana kiŋi karena lao rombo palyingi lare, leya.
Aŋala dupwame isa sinju doko mee yuu dokona petena lao pii leya. Dokona renge angi doko embame Anatumi yuu muu dupwa peparae rolo rapu pyuo karenge lao larene dokopa emba dee kamba range kiŋi karare.
Dokona lao Emba kiŋi andake doko. Namba dopa pii dapa pii leto dupwa moko minyuo piri. Koo pilini dupwa yaki nyuo kaepala yulu keyange pyuo wambu pendewa dupwa sakame kumuo nyisare. Dopa pirinyi dokopa emba dee kapa palyuo karare, leya.
Leyamuli pyuo yulu dusipa peparae kiŋi Nepukatenesa baa keta piya.
Kana akalisa ipisu lama iki papeyamo dokopa yuu Bapilone doko banya kiŋinya anda yangi ketae dokona kata papyuo kareya.
Karapala baame lao, kanda. Yuu Bapilone andake doko. Nambana taone mupwa dokome nambana porainya rengepe yanga paupau lenge rengepe neta rengepe dupwa lasaka pipuli lao piyu, leya.
Pii doko ene banya nenge kata dokona potemo lalana piyamo dokopa yake panda piso pii mende epo lao, Kiŋi Nepukatenesa, nambame pii leto dake sepe. Epapu embena kiŋinya isingi yulu doko emba keta kingi raka lao nyisa pelyamo.
Dokopa emba mee wambu dupwa palaminyi dokona dopale ingyuo pali napala nyisa pao mena suwa rae lenge pipya palu kararami. Dee mena bulamakao yale okese lenge rambi nenge dopale ingyuo rambi dupwa nao palu kararenepa ee kana yanda ipingi nyepo dusipa epo para. Dokopa embame polo lao Anatu Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome banya porainya renge dokome mee isa akali kiŋinya isingi yulu dupwa rapu pyuo karenge dee baame yuu dupwana akali mende kiŋi karena lao rombo palyingi lare, leya.
Pii doo leyamo dusipa aopa pyaka siya. Dokopa kiŋi Nepukatenesa baa wambu pipya role pyao pali napala nyisa pao mena suwa rae lenge pipya palyuo karo pyuo mena okese rambi nenge dopale ingyuo dokona nao palyuo kareya. Dokopa pipyae dupwa kondo pao baa keta piso kareya. Dee banya kyawa dupwa ando londapala yaka kambe imanji yale ingiya. Dee banya kinjipa dupwa epo kyanga ingyapala yaka kinjipa ingiya.
Kiŋi dokome lao, Ee kana yanda ipingi nyepo papeyamo dokopa yake dulu kandalyuo kandeyo. Kandapala suu pingi wambu kopyali minyuo suu pyao kareyo doko kaepala Anatu Mupwa Andake Wakasa karenge doko ketae pyambuo rape rape lao lakandeyo. Baame iso rapu pyuo karalu karara. Banya isingi yulu doko yuu gii peparae soo puu para.
Belesasa baa kiŋi ingyuo kareyamo gii dokopa pati andake lao nenge kisapala akali mupwa taosande mendaki (1,000) epena lao nakama role pyao piso ipwa waene neyami.
Nakama ipwa nao peteyaminyi dokopa Belesasame lamaiyuo, Kana golo kana kulingipimi wasisi kapope pere warakepe Jerusaleme tembole anda dokona siyamo banya rakange Nepukatenesame nyuo minyuo epeyamo dupwa minyuo epena leya. Kiŋi dokome baape banya akali mupwa dupwape banya etengepe dee enda konda pyuo nyingipi ipwa dokona kyano pyuo naramaŋa lao nyepala epena leya.
Leyamo yuu gii mendaki dokopa pere warakepe kapope dupwa nyuo minyuo epeyaminyipa dupwana ipwa waene kyano pyuo nyuo neyami.
Napala mee bange anatu kana golope kana kulingipi kone kanape anepe isape dee mee kanapeme wasisi dupwa lakandeyami.
Dokopa aopa kiŋinya anda dokona kana semene apya isare lambe reyamo dokona yanga paupau leyamo dorena ingyuo wambu kinginde epo maro lapala pepa piya. Doo pepa piyamo dokopa kiŋi dokome kingi doko kandeya.
Dokopa baa yongo nembo pakame kumuo banya kimbu dupwa walu walu leya.
Dopa pipala baa pii porai lao wambu mendeme pipu lenge akalipi nemonga lenge akalipi bui isingi ene rengya mende pira lao lenge akali dupwape nyela pena leya. Nakama epeyaminyi dokopa kiŋi dokome lamaiyuo lao, Mendeme pepa doko yaka lapala renge dokona aki lao langiramo wambu doko komau muku londe mende wapupala dee kana golo kii puu banya mange dokona soo piramo doko kandapala wambu dupwame baa lakandarami. Dokopa baa kiŋinya isingi yulu porai dokona repo ingyuo pisira.
Dokopa kiŋinya akali dopa pyuo piri dapa pyuo piri lao nyiso lenge dupwa peparae repeta epeyami. Epeyaminyipape pepa doko laope panda renge dokonape mende lamairami ingya naya.
Dokona lao kiŋi Belesasa baa mona randame kumapala ama yongo nembeyamo dokopa banya akali mupwa dupwa mende aki pirama lao see nayami.
Dokopa kiŋipi banya akali mupwape dupwana leyaminyi doko sepala enda kuini baa nenge nao petenge panda dokona konando peya. Papala baame lao, Emba kiŋi andake palu karalu karare. Emba mona randame kumuo embena yongo nemba napipi, leya.
Embena kiŋinya isingi panda dokona akali mende Anatu Poo Pyasi dokona imambu doko palengende karamo. Wamba embena rakane kiŋi kareyamo dokopa akali doko kyawa sisingi keyange palenge rengepe singinya rengepe soo nyinginya renge mee bange anatunya soo nyinginya renge dopalepe baa keta paleyamo lasaka piya. Dopa piyamosa kiŋi Nepukatenesa embena rakane dokome doo pipu lenge akalipi nemonga lengepe mali mali sakangepe dee bui isingi ene mende pira dokona polo lengepe dupwana baa mupwa ingyuo karena lao rombo palyiya.
Akali doko baa menge dupwa isa palyili lao ama mora piso kombeya rengepe kongwalu pii dupwana angi rengepe pii yalu pyuo lenge dupwana rengepe polo lao baa mona angi palyuo soo nyuo karenge. Dokona lao akali Daniele kiŋi dokome kingi mende Beletesasa leyamo doko nyela pena lape. Epapala dokopa renge angi dupwana peparae polo langira, leya.
Dokopa aopa Daniele baa minyuo kiŋinya lenge kambu dokona peyami. Dokopa kiŋi dokome kando lao, Emba Danielese? Nambana rakane kiŋi dokome Juta piso, Emba Juu akali karapusi ingyuo minyuo epeya dokose? lao piso siya.
Anatu Poo Pyasinya imambu doko emba keta palipyasa mora piso singinya rengepe soo nyinginya rengepe emba keta palamo laminyi doko namba sipu.
Doko pipu lenge akalipi dopa pyuo piri dapa pyuo piri lao nyiso lenge akalipi dupwa minyuo epo pepa pyasi dake yaka lao renge dokona namba langinya lapu. Dopa lapunupape nakamame renge angi dokona polo langya nami.
Dokona embame kongwalu pii dupwanape dee pii yalu pyuo suu pingi dupwanape koto nyuo dee renge angi dupwa embame polo lenge laminyi doko epapu namba sipu. Dokona embame pepa dake yaka lapala renge polo langiri ramo doko emba komau muku londe mende wapuri. Emba akali mupwaŋa lao wambumi serami lao kana golome wasisi kii puu doko embena mange dokona awali lao sere. Dopa pipala emba kiŋinya isingi yulu dokona repo ingyuo karare, leya.

Anatu Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokome embena rakane Nepukatenesa doko kiŋi ingyuo waso banya kingi ketae pyambuo yulu andake maiya.

Baame wambu mendali pyao kumapulinya suu pingi ramo doko pyao kumakapalako kaenge. Dee wambu mendali lete pena lao suu pingi ramo doko lete pena kaenge. Dee baa pipyae dupwana mende yambe pyaa nao kamanda mee wau kanya dupwana langa palu karo piya. Epapu renge angi doko dake. Yaka lengena renge doko. Embena kiŋinya isingi yuu gii dusipa Anatumi yaka lao karapala ote pinya nembara.

Doko Darisi baa kiŋi karo dee Sairose yuu Pesa range doko kiŋi karo piyamo dokopa Daniele baa akali andake angingyuo kapa palyuo kareya.

Ee kana mupwa dokopa akali Belesasa baa kiŋi ingyuo yuu Bapilone dokona kareya dokopa namba Danieleme kombeya pipala kukwa dokopa pii repa repa pyuo kandeyo. Kandapala kombeya angi doko pepana pyao reteyo. Kukwa dokopa angi dake kandeyo doko dee pyasi palamo.
Yuu muu kipwa kipwa dupwana peparae piso poo raiya andake minyapala ipwa kota doko pyao kupyalya kupyana piya.
Piyamo dokopa mena kisima mendare ingya nange rara wakale wakale dusipa ipwa kota dokona piso sipurao epeyami.
Mena dusipana mupwa doko mena laene yale ingiya. Ingiyamopape yaka kambe ingyuo papake kareya. Doko namba kando peteyono dokopa papake dolapo kondo yuku nyisa epeya. Dokopa mena doko nyuo minyalyapala akali dopale ingyuo roya karena leya. Enakana akalinya suu pingi renge doko baa maiya.
Nambame mena lapo doko kandeyo. Doko baa mena beya yale ingyapala banya kenge kimbu dolapome roya kareya. Karapala banya nenge dokona kanya dolapona parali kuli rema kapusaro kareya. Dokopa pii mendeme baa lamaiyuo, Minju malu mee emba nalana lao suu pilinyili pyuo nape, leya.
Namba mee dokona kandaroko siyunu dokopa mena mendeko epeyamo kandeyo. Doko mena lepete lenge dopale. Dopale ingiyamopape banya mata dokona yakana papake dopale kisima kareya. Dee banya kyawa kisimako kareya. Baa keta porainya renge paleyamo dokome wambu iso karara ingiya.
Dee dopako pyuo isaro karo kandeyono dokopa mena kisima doko kandeyo. Doko ama porai wakasa dokome wambunya mona pakanyi pyambwara ingiya. Baa nenge kameya isa ane yale karenge dokome wambu dupwa pyao lungu ranyi palyapala ketae dokona kalyuo para ingiya. Baa mena dolomana mendare ingya napala banya ayemba dokona nenge akalisa kareya.

Doko baa wambunya lenge renge dopale renge. Dee wambunya kambu dopale banya kambu kareya. Baame pii dupwa range mupwa lao lakanda minya minya pyuo leya.

Banya petenge isa dokona isare uliyapu ingyuo rao dee isa petengena kimbu ipyuo minyuo penge dusipana isare ingyuo rao piyako.
Doko rao range palu lombo nyisa epeya. Dokopa wambu ama malu mee banya yulu pyakamyuo dee wambu ama malu wakasame banya lenge kambu siyamo dokona roya kareyami. Dupwana kote pii kanda soo lalana buku dupwa lumbuyami.
Namba kandeyono dokopa nenge kuki dokome baa range mupwa lao suu pyao pii ketae palyuo laoko kareyamo siyu. Kando iso kareyono dokopa mena kisima doko pyapala banya yongo doko isare uliyapu dokona pyambuo kiso kokwa sinyi nembeyami.
Mena menge dupwana renge porai dupwa nyisa nyiya. Nyiyamopape nakama yuu gii kuki lama palu karena lao yaki nyiya.
Yuu gii kukwa dokopa kombeya pyuo pii repa repa piyunu dokonako wambu yale mende kandeyo. Baa namba kareyono dokona repeta epapala kopa dokome bolotoko lapala baa mendali lete palu karalu karenge doko peteyamo dokona peyamopa baa apipi lao polo leyami.
Dokopa wambu yuu muu peparae palenge dupwamepe pii wakale wakale lenge dupwamepe wambu rara peparae dupwamepe banya yulu pyakamirami lao baa porainya rengepe kingi ketae pyambuo lakandenge rengepe dee kiŋinya porai rengepe dusipa maiya. Banya porainya renge doko sulu sera dee banya kiŋi yulu doko ota nara ingiya.
Namba pii repa repa pyuo kandeyono dokome namba pakanyi pyambuyamosa namba yamarangyuo kareyo.
Dokopa namba wambu roya kareyaminyi dokona papala mendeme renge dupwa peparae polo langinya lao piso siyu. Dokona lao baame renge angi doko akipi lao langiya.
Dokopa baame lao, Doko doo mena kisima dusipa suu pyao doko kiŋinya isingi yulu kisimako isa yuu dakena sipurao sera.
Seramopa Anatu Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokona wambu dupwa kiŋinya porai renge nyepala minyaro karalu kararami, leya.
Leyamo dokopa nambame mena kisima doko mena menge dusipa yale daa dokona lao konda pyuo selana suu piyu. Wambu pakanyi pyambuo isa ane yale nenge karenge dee kone kana yale kinjipa wanga karenge dupwame wambu dupwa pyao lungu ranyi palyapala ketae dokona kalyuo para ingiyamo dokona lao selana suu piyu.
Dee banya ayemba dokona nenge akalisa epeyamo dusipana lao dee mendaki enakana epeya dokome nenge dolomana rema pyao lalyiyamo dokona lao selana suu piyu. Nenge enakana epeyamo doko lenge rao nenge kata soo pingindeme range ketae pyambuo lakandeya. Doloma paka piyamopape baa paka wakasa pingipya dokona renge lama kaname selanako suu piyu.

Dake renge angi doko namba polo langyuo jiya. Mena kisima doko kiŋinya isingi yulu kisima doko isa yuu dokona sera. Dokopa kiŋinya isingi yulu doloma nyuo isa palyuo doko wakale mendereko ingyuo sera. Dokome yuu muu peparae isa palyaramopa pyao injo kalyuo sinjimu ingyarami.
Menana nenge akalisa dusipa suu pyao doko kiŋi akali akalisa kiŋinya isingi yulu dokona sipurao pirami. Dokopa kiŋi wakale mende sipurao karara. Doko baa kiŋi wambo karenge dupwa yale daa. Baa kiŋi rara wakale ingyuo karara. Karapala kiŋi rema dusipa pyao nembara.

Dopa pipala baame nakamana misinya mawa piipi nenge malu palyuo lakando nao petenge yuu giipi alowa pinya piramo dokopa Anatunya wambu dupwa ee kana rema dee kanya ingyuo banya porai dokome isaramopa isarena kararami.
Dokopa yake pandana kote singi doko kote soo pisara dokome banya porai renge doko nyisa nyepala pyao kokwa soo nembalu nembo nembara.
Isa yuunya kiŋinya isingi yulu dokona yulu andakepe porai rengepe dupwa Anatu Mupwa Andake Wakasa dokona wambu dupwa nyuo maira. Mairamo dokopa isa yuunya akali mupwa karenge dupwame nakamana pii warombo soo yulu pyakamyuo kararaminyi dokopa kiŋinya porai renge nakama keta palira doko ota nalu nara.
Dokona kombeya pii repa repa angi doko dakena ote. Namba lenge kambu yongo nembapala wakasa pakayo. Dopa pyuo pakapala kombeya angi pii repa repa piyunu dusipa peparae kame see nao namba range suu pyaro kareyo.



























Akali Darisi yuu Mitia range Sekesena ikinyingi doko kiŋi ingyuo yuu Bapilone iso kareya.
Ee kana mupwa dokona akali baa kiŋi ingyuo kareyamo dokopa namba Danieleme buku poo pyasi dokona mana nyuo kareyo. Doko ee kana akalisa yanda ipingi dusipana yuu Jerusaleme doko kwaeyo momo nao paraŋa lao poropeta Jeremaya lamaiyamuli pyuo mana nyiyu.
Dokopa namba kumanda piso wapungi komau wapuo nenge wasaka pyuo peena piso Kamongo Anatu lao ateŋa poraiyuo lao baa piso sokondali pyuo peteyo.
Nambana wambu dupwana koo dupwa kame sakaminya lao nambana Kamongo Anatu kando ateŋa lakamiyu. Nambame lao, Kamongo Anatu emba kamame andake. Namwame emba ketae pyambuo rape rape lao lakando karamano. Emba embena kana minyuo lalu lao lenge pii doko suu pyao minyaro karenge. Dee wambu lapome emba mona reto embame pii lengenyili pyuo pingi dupwa embame mona retalu reto retenge.
Namwa yulu koo pingi. Namwa koo dokome kopetame pyuo karenge. Embame namwa mawa pii langyuo dopa pipwa dapa pipwa leene dupwa namwame kamba lao mata joo peyama. Dee embame yulu rolae lasaka pii dupwa yaki nyuo kaeyama.
Embena kendemande akali poropeta dupwame embena kingi dokona lao namwana kiŋi akalipi akali mupwape rora ambasupi dee namwana wambu peparaepe lamaingi dokopa namwa see nalu nayama.
Emba Kamongo yuu peparae rolae pyuo karapinyipape namwa yulu koo pyuo range keta elya nyuo karamano. Namwa wambu yuu Juta palengepe yuu Jerusaleme palengepe dee Isaraele wambu peparaepe emba yaki nyuo kaeyama. Dokona lao embame repeta nanesape dupwana palu pena lao minyuo muu raleya lao nembee dupwame dopa pyuo kareyama.
Namwana kiŋipi akali mupwape rora ambasupi dupwame yulu elya pingi dupwa pyuo dee Kamongo ema kando yulu koo pyuo kareyami.
Namwame emba kando koo pyuo mona kana poko mata jiyamanopape embame sakame kumuo kame sakame kumuo kame sakao karenge.
Embena kendemande poropeta dupwa keta lowa pii namwa jiinyi dokome laramuli pyuo palipwa lao namwa langipinyipape Kamongo Anatu namwame embena pii doko soo nyii nayama.
Isaraele wambu peparaeme embena lowa doko kamba lapala embame lapinyi dokona selena wangu laka nayami. Namwame emba kando koo piyamanosa koo keta palena lenge pii dupwa embena kendemande Mosesena lowa dokona pyasi palamo dupwa embame namwa keta palena leene.
Namwa iso karenge akali dupwape dee namwape keta mende piru leene doko mee pii. Dokona lao yuu taone isa yuu dakena silyaminyi dupwa pyao kokwa soo nembenepape embame Jerusaleme kamame wakasako ingyuo randa maiyuo pyao kokwa sinyi nembee.
Mosesena lowa dokona randa nyerami lao lapyamo dusipa pepare namwa jii. Jiinyipape kamame epapu Kamongo Anatu namwana koo dupwa yaki nyuo panda embena pii kinyi angi dokona moko minyuo pao emba rae mainyi pyambwalana lao suu pyaa nayama.
Emba namwana Kamongo Anatu doko yuu peparae rolae pingi dokome namwa randa jelana rapa rapa pipala angi randa jii kande. Dopa piinyipape namwame embena pii sili see nale lao kareyama.
Namwana Kamongo Anatu, yuu Isipi piso embena wambu dupwa lanyuo epeene dokome embena porai renge doko lasaka pii. Dokona lao wambu dupwame embena porai renge dokona lao mee suu pyaro karaminyi. Dopa piinyipa namwame kopetame pyuo yulu koo pyuo karamano.
Wamba dokopa emba namwa pipya pyamalyuo nyiso karenge. Dokona lao Jerusaleme pipya imbuo karalu kara napipi. Jerusaleme embena yuu taone doko. Dee embena yuu kyau poo pyasi. Namwana koo dupwanape dee namwana rora ambasu dupwana yulu koo piyaminyi dokona wambu yuu liti wakale wakale maki palenge dupwa peparaeme namwa kilya kandelyaminyi.
Anatu nambana ateŋa piso sokondali pyuo leto doko sepe. Sepala embena tembole anda kokwa siyamo doko karengenyili pyuo elya pepe. Emba Anatuŋu lao wambu peparaeme soo nyinyaleŋe dokona tembole anda doko kamba elya pepe.
Anatu namwana pii sepe. Sepala namwa randa aki nyilyaminyi lao kandape. Yuu taone dokona embena kingi singi dokona wambu dupwa randa nyilyaminyi doko kandape. Namwa rolae pyuo karamwandena daa. Embame sakame kumuo nyisingi dokome namwa emba kando ateŋa letamano.
Kamongo, namwana ateŋa sakape. Sakapala Kamongo namwana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakape. Kamongo namwana pii sepala namwa keta yulu keyange mende pyakape. Wambu peparaeme emba Anatu lao soo nyinyaleŋe dokona mende pinya suu pilini doko waiya lao pepe. Yuu taone dake embena. Dee wambu dae karenge dupwa embenako.
Nambame nambana Kamongo Anatu doko kando ateŋa lao nambana Isaraele wambu dupwana koo dupwa polo lakamyuo dee nambana koo dupwa polo lamaiyuo banya tembole anda poo pyasi doko karengenyili pyuo kamba elya pinya lao piso sokondali piyu.
Namba ateŋa pyao piso dokopa aŋala Geperiele kombeya wambo pii repa repa piyunu dokona kandeyono doko namba peteyono mare dokona bii lao epeyamo kandeyo. Doko kukwa mena pyao kiso maingi doko mairama yuu gii ingiyamopa kandeyo.
Baame polo lao, Daniele rengya mende pira dokona emba soo gisilase lao nyiso langyala epelyo, leya.
Embame kanda soo Anatu kando ateŋa lao piso sokondali pyuo leene dokopa baame emba isingi yano piya. Anatumi emba mona retenge dokome ateŋa isingi yano pyapyamo pii doko langyala epelyo. Dokona nambame pii repa repa angi piinyi dokona polo langirunu dokopa emba elya kalo soo pisipi.
Ee kana andete kisima ipisu akalisa mange mendaki (490) epo paparamopa Anatumi embena wambupi embena yuu taone poo pyasipi koo keta moko nyero lao rombo palyiya. Yuu gii dokopa koo dupwa kame sakaramo dokopa wambu dupwa rolae pyuo karalu kararami. Dopa piramo dokopa pii repa repa piinyi dokope dee rengya mende pira lao poropeta pii leyamo dokope angi kinyi ingyuo para. Paramo dokopa tembole anda doko dee yapasi ingyuo karara.
Dokona pii dake soo nyepe. Yuu Jerusaleme kamba elya pinya lao lamairamo yuu gii dokona piso pao Anatumi akali mende kyawa ingyuo rombo palyiyamo doko kararamo yuu gii dokopa ee kana akalisa kisima ipisu mange mendaki (49) dusipa epo para. Dokopa enakana yuu taone Jerusalemepe kata sukusa singi dupwape kana kame porai awali lao karengepe dupwa elya piraminyipa ee kana malu (434) karara. Kararamopape ee kana dusipana randa malu epara.
Ee kana 434 epo paparamopa nakamame Anatunya rombo palyisi akali mupwa doko mee langa pyao kumakarami. Dokopa wambu iso karenge akali mupwa mendena ami yanda singi dupwame epapala yuu taonepe tembole andape dupwa pyao lalyuo kokwa serami. Anatumi yanda pyuo randa epo pira lao reteyamo doko ipwa kopetame palyuo epenge dopale ingyuo lumwa pyuo epara.
Wambu iso karenge akali dokome wambu malu dupwa pipya ee kana yanda ipingi nembo mona mendaki palyuo pii walengena lao kararami. Ee kana rema dee kanya dusa ingyuo baame mena pyao kiso maingipi bange maingipi dupwa ote pyuo kaena lara. Dopa pyuo kaena lapala baame mee bange anatu kingimi wasisi mende tembole anda pinjingi londe dokona ketae pisara. Pisaramo doko pisaramoko pao akali pisiyamo dokona lao Anatumi yuu gii lumwa pyuo randa mairu lao rapa rapa pyuo reteyamo doko pyaka seramo dokopa otara.















































































Kiŋi Usaya Jotame Easa dee Esekayamoo Juta wambunya kiŋi ingyuo kareyami dee Jeropome Jewasena ikinyingi doko Isaraele wambunya kiŋi ingyuo karo piyamo yuu gii dokopa Berinya ikinyingi Osia keta Kamongo dokome wai pii lamaiyamo dupwana lao buku dakena pyasi palamo.
Kamongome wambo kanda soo Osia keta Isaraele wambu dupwa pii lamaiyamo dokopa baa dopa leya. Emba pamuku enda mende nyela puu. Embena enda dokome embapa mondo lao pali naramopa banya wane wanakepe dupwa baa yaleko ingyuo parami. Dokona suu pyao wambu yuu dakena range dupwame namba yaki nyepala bange isa kanape dupwana mona maiyuo pelyaminyi, leya.
Leyamo dokopa Osiame akali Dipilaimena wanenge Goma lenge doko nyiya. Dokopa enda doko wane paleyamopa wane ane mende mandeya.
Banya rora ambasu akali Jiyu baame yuu Jeserele dokona koo piyamo dokona nambame Isaraele wambunya kiŋi doko randa mairunu yuu gii mende mee kore yuu sera ingya nalyamo dokona lao banya kingi Jeserele lena leya Kamongo dokome. Lapala lao Jiyunya rora ambasumi Isaraele rapu pilyaminyi dupwa nambame ote pinyi nembaro, leya.
Yuu gii dokopa yuu pau lama lama Jeserele dokona Isaraele wambunya ami dokona porai renge palipyamo renge kuilyaminyi dupwa pyao kokwa sinyi nembaro, leya.
Leyamo dokopa enda Goma baa dee kamba wane paleyamopa wanake mende manjo nyiya. Yuu gii dokopa Kamongome Osia lamaiyuo, Nambame Isaraele wambu dupwa mona randame kumuo nakamana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakamiru ingya nalyamo dokona wanake kingi Mona Reta Nange lena leya.
Dopa piramopape nambame Juta wambu dupwa kondome kumuo nyisaro. Namba nakamana Kamongo Anatu dokome nakama nyisaro. Nyisarono doko yanda piraminyipa wua gelape yanda kakupimi nyisaronde daa. Dee mena osemepe mena ose matana petenge akali dupwa pipyamo nyisaronde daako.
Dokopa Goma baame wanake anju pyakapala wane paleyamopa wane ane mende kamba mandeya.
Dokopa Kamongo dokome lao, Wane banya kingi doko Nambana Wambu Daa lare, leya. Doko nakama Isaraele wambu dupwa nambana wambu daa dee namba nakamana Anatu daako, leya.
Dokona lao nakamana Isaraele yango dupwa kando Anatunya wambu ingyuo karaminyi lare Kamongo dokome mona reto karamoŋo, lare.
Nambana wane wanake dupwa. Nakamana endakinyi doko lamaiyuo, Baa nambana etenge ingya nalyamo. Namba banya akalingi ingyuo kara nalyoko lao letamo lao lamaikondali pipwape, leya. Baa lamaikondali pyuo baa akali kepo pingi yulu doko kaena larami.
Daaŋa lao kepo pyuo puu para ramo doko nambame papara pena lao rokwanyi nembakamirunupa baa ene manjinyi peyaminyi papara siyamo dopale ingyuo para. Dopa pipala enda baa yuu ingyuo ketange pyanyi pyambwaronopa ipwa nanome kumuo pisira.
Baa pamuku yulu pipala wane wanakepe dupwa mandeyamo dokona lao nambame epe kandakami nao kararo, leya.
Dokopa kepo pingi enda elya pali nange dokome lao, Nambana akali mona retenge dupwa piya paro dokopa nakamame namba nenge ipwa dee komau ipwa waene isa olipi ipwange dupwa jerami, leya.
Dokona lao nambame baa neta epa nana lao nepereke isa dupwame kame pyuo palyaro.
Dopa piramopape banya mona retenge akali dupwa kando nyipuli lapala makando kararamopape kapa pyuo kando nyii nara. Baame nakama kando nyipuli lapala lenge nyuo kararamopape angi kando nyii narako. Dopa pipala enakana enda baame lao, Namba epapu kapaŋa nambana akali wambo dokona anda range parolyamo, lara. Namba wambo dokopa kapa paleyo. Dopa pyuo dakepa pisa nalyono, lara.
Nambame baa isa olipi ipwangepe ipwa waenepe dee kenapape dupwa baa jiiŋi lao soo gisa nalyamo. Dee kana kulingi golope dupwa minyuo pao mee bange kingi Bealo lenge anatuŋu lao lakandenge dokona lakando karamo dupwa nambameko maiyu.
Dokona nenge wambu pingi kana pyaka seramo dokopa nambame kenapape waenepe maiyunu doko range nyero dee komau wapuo andu pyuo pinya lao maiyunu dupwa range nyuo piru.
Nambame banya akali mona reto kepo pyuo papilyamo dupwana lenge kambu dokona paparae pena lao pyao rokwanyi nembakamiru. Dopa pirunupa nambanya poraimi pirunu dokona mendeme baa nyisalena saka narami ingyara.
Dokopa banya ee kana yaka lao pati andakepe kana yaka lao pati lengepe dee banya koro yaka lao kalya pyuo nenge nengepe dee banya misi singi dupwa peparaepe dupwa pii nana lao ote pinyi nembaro.
Nembapala dokopa banya mona retenge akali dupwame yulu pyakape lao isa girapope isa pikipi dupwa jiyamiko letamo dupwa nambame pyao kokwa sinyi nembaro. Nambame enda banya isa girapope dee isape dupwa yuu ketange pyasi inginyi nembaronopa mena rae lenge dupwa nao kokwa sinyi nembarami.
Dee enda baame namba kame siyamo dokopa baa kalya pipala akali banya mona retenge dupwa peta ralyuo karo dee nenge rendamu pingi dupwa mee bange anatuŋu lenge Bealo doko kiso maiyuo piya dokona nambame baa randa mairu. Kamongo dokome dopa letamo.
Dokona lao nambame enda baa lanyuo yuu muiyane nenge see nange dokona dee papala mona retenge piindeme range lao laku nyero.
Dopa pipala banya isa girapo ee nyiyunu dupwa range mairu. Maipala Yuu Pau Lama Lama Randa Epenge dokona rengya mende keyange piraŋa lao mona kare kare karenge kambu doko wasaro. Dokopa enda baa yuu Isipi piso kyawa lete nyuo epeyamo dokona baa wamba mapwaesa piso piyamo dopale ingyuo banya mona retenge renge doko lasaka pyuo dee namba range keta epara.
Epapala enda baame namba kando kingi Bealo lao karalu kara nara. Dee kamba namba banya akalingi, lara.
Nambame enda baame Bealo kingi dokona dee minyalya nalu nao nana laro.
Yuu gii dokopa mena suwa rae lenge dupwa pipyape dee wii saa yaka dupwa nambamoo pipya lalu lao lapala nambana wambu dupwa randa maiyaka nana laro. Yuu dokona yanda pingi bange wua gela yandape dupwa peparae nyuo nembaro. Nembaronopa nambana wambu dupwa mona seramopa manda rao palena lao piru.
Isaraele wambu dupwa nakama nambana enda inginyi pyambwaro. Nambame yulu angingyuo mondo lao piru. Pipala nambana mona retalu reto retenge dokope dee sakao pyuo nyingi renge dokope nakama lasaka piru. Dopa pirunupa nakama nambana ingyalu ingyuo ingyarami.
Nambana lalu lao lenge pii doko range yaki pyuo minyaronopa nakama nambana ingyarami. Dokopa nakamame namba Kamongo dokoŋo lao soo nyerami.
Yuu gii dokopa nambana Isaraele wambu dupwana ateŋa dupwa isingi yano pyakamyuo isa yuu dokona nambame apu peyo piru.
Dokopa yuu dokona kenapa isa girapo jingi olipi jingipi dupwa ando lyera.
Nambame nambana wambu dupwa yuu dokona porai ingyuo kapa palyuo karena lao piru. Pipala wambu lapo nambame mona reta nalyamo letaminyi dupwa nambame mona retenge renge doko lasaka piru. Dee wambu lapome lao nakama nambana wambu daa letaminyi dupwa kando lao, Nakama nambana wambu laro. Dokopa nakamame isingi lao, Emba namwana Anatuŋu larami.


Kamongome namba dopa langiya. Enda baa akalingi wambo dokome mona reto karapyamopa wakaleko kepo pyuo pelyamoŋo doko baa range deyako pao mona retala puu, langiya. Isaraele wambu dupwame isa girapo jingi kiso isa kanape wasisi anatuŋu lenge dupwa mailyaminyi. Maiminyipako nakama mona reto karo doko suu pyao embame enda doko mona reto karape.
Dokona lao nambame enda baa kana kulingi akalisa ipisu kingi paki dee nenge bali jingi kilokerame andete mendaki dee akalisa kingi paki (150) rase bake pakinyamangena kenda dopale maiyuo nyiyu.
Nambame baa lamaiyuo, Emba nambana etenge ingyuo petene dokona yuu gii malu mee pisiri, lamaiyu. Emba pamuku yulu pyuo akali wakale mendepape pali nare lamaipala namba dopako piru, leyo.
Renge dopale dokome Isaraele wambu dupwa yuu rengyape mende nakamana kiŋi mende kara nara dee akali mupwape mende kara narako. Mena pyao kiso maiyuope mee kana mende wasapala lakandaope pyarepa kana minyuope ama rengyana mendepe koto kanda naramiko.
Dokopa enakana Isaraele wambu dupwa dee kamba nakamana Kamongo Anatu doko keta kamba range papala kiŋi Dapitinya para pyao nyeramo doko keta parami. Yuu gii doko eparamo dokopa nakama Kamongo kando baa mupwa lao suu pyao pakame kumuo karapala Anatumi bange keyange mee mairamo dupwa nyuo kararami.
Isaraele wambu nakama Anatunya pii epelyamo dake selapa. Kamongome Isaraele wambu nakama yuu dakena palaminyi dupwa pipya apiyanda pii ingyuo letamo. Yuu dakena wambu dupwame namba yaki nyuo mona reta nao namba Anatuŋu lao soo nyii nalyaminyi.
Dopa pipala wambu dupwame pii lalu lao lenge doko lapala dee yalelyaminyi. Nakama pii kyambo lao wambu yango pyao kumakao waa nyuo enda kepo pyuo pyuo karaminyi. Nakamana yulu koo dupwa ando pelyamo dee nakama wambu pyasu makao pyao kumakalyaminyi.
Dokona lao yuu doko yando nao rali piramopa bange peparae dokona palyuo ando pyuo karaminyi dupwa kumuo rali pira. Mena rara peparaepe yakape dupwa kumuo dee omape dupwa kamame kumuo rembe nara.
Kamongo dokome lao, Wambu mendemepe wambu kando koo pingi koo pingi lao lao nemba nana lalapape. Namba purisi dupwa kando suku leto.
Yuu kukwa korakama dusipana nakama mee rombalya rombana pyuo pyuo karaminyi. Poropeta dupwame nakama pimi dopako pyuo kopetame pilyaminyi. Dokona Isaraele embena endangi ingyuo siki nyilyaminyi dupwa pyao kokwa sakaro ingilyamo.
Nambana wambu dupwame namba Anatuŋu lao soo nyii nalyaminyi dokona nakama kwaeyo pelyaminyi. Nakama purisi dupwa namba soo nyii napala nambana mana lapunu pii doko nembaminyi dokona nambame nakama nembo kaepala ikinyi dupwa nambana purisi angi lao suu pyaa naro.
Purisi kamame konda pyuoko pupyamo dokopa koo renge dupwa konda pyuoko pilyaminyi. Dokona lao wambumi nakama kando ketae pyambulyaminyi karenge kandale doko epapu nyuo alowa pyuo nakama elya sinyi retaro.
Nambana wambumi koo piyami dokome nakama kamonganyi nembeyamosa dee kamba koo malu konda pyuo pimili lao suu pilyaminyi.
Nambame nakama koo piyaminyi kata dokona yano nyuo randa jero. Dokopa wambu dupwa yasu naraminyi makande dokonako nakamba yasu narami.
Isa kanapeme anatu lao wasisi nenge kiso maingi dokona nakamba mokwa soo jilyaminyi nenge dokona napalape mee sikya pii naramo kararami. Nakamame wane manjinya suu pyao isa kanape anatuŋu lenge dupwa kando kingi ketae larami. Laraminyipape nakama namba mata joo anatu wakale dupwa moko minyuo pelyaminyi dokona kamame wane manja narami.
Kamongome lao, Ipwa waene dokome nambana wambu dupwana kyawa sisingi suu pingi doko waa nyakamilyamo, letamo.
Nakamame isa lomasi doko akali kulimi yanda pepe minyinginyili pyuo mende pira dokona semana lao pisilyaminyi. Dopa pyuo karapala nakamame namba enda pamuku mee yaki nyilyaminyi papingi dopale ingyuo namba yaki nyepala nakama range anatu menge dupwa keta pyamalyuo pelyaminyi.
Papala yuu kyau ketae kemali pingi dupwana mena pyao kiso mailyaminyi dee yuu kyau kuki isa palu isarena pau lenge dupwana manda rao piso rende kyaa pingi dupwa kiso maiyuo petaminyi. Dopa pilyaminyi renge dokona nakamana wanenge dupwa pamuku ingyuo puminyipa nakamana ikinyi dupwana etenge dupwa kepo pyuo pilyaminyi.
Dopa pilyaminyi lapala nambame wanake dupwa randa mai naro. Renge doko nakama akali angi dupwame isa kanape anatuŋu lenge dupwana tembole anda dusipana pamuku enda dupwa pipya papala mena dupwa kiso mailyaminyi. Wambu suu pingi pali nange dupwa rangeme range kokwa sinyi nembelyaminyi.
Dokonako ingyuo Isaraele wambu nakamame namba yaki nyilyaminyi Juta wambu dupwa dopako pyuo koo dopaleko pii nana. Yuu Gilikale dokonape yuu Betele dokonape misi lala pao Kamongo lete karenge dokona kingi lao lalu lao lenge pii dupwa lao pii nalapape.
Nakama mena ingyuo Isaraele wambu dupwa mona kana pokolyaminyi. Dokona lao sipisipi ikyane dupwa rambi andelyamo nenge dopale ingyuo nambame nakama apa pyuo nenge pirusi?
Isaraele wambu dupwa mee bange anatu lenge dokona kingi lao karaminyi lao karena kae.
Nakama ipwa malu napala dokopa enda kepo yulu doko ketae nyepala nakambana kingi doko isa palyalana suu pilyaminyi.
Nakama mee kalendakuna porakanale lapo mee papyuo karaminyi. Mee bange dupwa anatuŋu lao lakandelyaminyi dokona elya nyerami.
Nakama purisi dupwa dake selapape. Isaraele wambu dupwa pii dake kale yukupala selapape. Nakama kiŋinya ree palu dupwa selapapeko. Nakamame kote dupwa rolae lapenge lyakande. Dokona nakama keta kote palira ingilyamoŋo kando karalapape. Yuu Misipa yuu kyau Tapo dolapona nakamame wambu nyuo koo keta palyalana anga pyuo kone makasi ingyaro silyaminyi.
Yuu Sitimi dokona yuwale kyuwa mendena koko puu pawaleko pelyaminyi dokona nambame nakama peparae randa jero.
Nambame Isaraele wambu nakama dopale kandale lao soo gisilyu dokona nakama namba kando kapa yalu pii narami. Dokona nakamame namba yaki nyepala karaminyi dokome namba lakandaraminyi kapa ingya nalyamo.
Wambu dupwana koo piminyi dokome nakama kata maipyasa Anatu keta kamba kapu kyuo eparami ingya nalyamo. Mee bange isa kanapeme wasisi anatuŋu lao karaminyi dokome nakama poraiyuo minyapyasa Kamongo doko baaŋa lao soo nyii nalyaminyi.
Isaraele wambunya range mupwa karamano lao suu pingi renge dokome nakamana lenge kambu dokona epo panelyamo. Dokopa nakamana koo dokome pyalya minyapyasa lukuma sepala isa puminyi dokona Juta wambu dupwa pale pale pelyaminyi.
Nakamame nakamana mena sipisipi bulamakaope dupwa Kamongo doko pyao kiso maiyaminyipape baa kando nyii nami. Renge doko Kamongo baame nakama yaki nyuo kaepya dokona kando nyii nami.
Nakamame Kamongo yaki nyiminyi dokona nakamana wane wanake dupwa banya ingya nalyamo. Dokona epapu nakamana yuu dupwa pyao kokwa sera.
Yanda pirama lao bikuli lenge dupwa yuu Gipiya dokona poo lalapape. Yuu Orama dokona randa epelyamo lao repe repe lamaipwape. Lamaipala yuu Betele dokona yuwa pisalapape. Benjamenena akali dupwa yanda dokona pupwa.
Isaraele wambu dupwana anda yuupi dupwa kwaeyo dusa siyaŋa larami ingilyamo. Yuu gii doko oo epelyamo. Nakama Isaraele wambu dupwa keta renge dake angi kinyi pyaka sela pyamo lyakande.
Kamongo dokome lao, Juta rarana akali kyawa dupwame Isaraele wambunya yuu waa nyakamimi dokona namba imbwualyo. Dokona lao nambana imbu singi doko nakama keta ipwa ingyuo kulimbwanyi palyaro, leya.
Wambu nyisa naramili dupwa pipa ree laminyisa Isaraele wambu dupwa randa nyuo nakamana yuu angi kulisa dupwa kombe maiyuo kaelyaminyi.
Isaraele wambu dupwa pyao kokwa sinyi nembo Juta wambu dupwa mendepe popo paa nana lao pyao piru.
Dokopa Isaraele dupwa nakama kwaeyamo doko kandeyami dee Juta wambu dupwame wua kakupi peteyamo dupwa range kandeyamiko. Kandapala Isaraele dupwame yuu Asiria dokona papala kiŋi dokome nyisinya lao piso sela peyami. Dopa pyuo pisiyaminyipape kiŋi dokome nyiso pyuo nyuo dee rete dupwa au pyuo umbwa pyuo nyera ingya naya.
Dokona nambame Isaraele wambupi Juta wambupi dupwa mena laeneme porayapala pili lao pyaro. Pyao pilyalya pilyana pyuo raepala puu pao paro. Nambame pyao ipyuo soo paronopa mendemepe nyisa narami.
Nambame nambana wambu dupwa yaki nyuo kaeyapala kararonopa nakama koo dupwana yasu nao sikya pipala dokopa namba kararo dokona nakamame koto eparami. Yasu nalu palyuo dokopa namba koto eparami rapisa.
Wambu dupwame lao, Kamongo karamo dokona range mwua. Baame namwa randa joo piyamopape dee kinyi lete nyera ingilyamo. Dee baameko namwana yongo dupwana wua kakupi nyinyi piso piyamo kata dupwa baame yaki pyakara.
Yuu gii lama remape epo paparamopa baame namwa lete nyeramopa baamoo pipya karalomano.
Dokopa Kamongo baa soo nyimwali lao suu pyao karamana. Dokona lao baa yuu rombe lao apunda epenge yuu gii dokopa epapala kaenge dee yuu yangenge gii dokopa yangapala kaenge doko suu pyao baa epapala kaeyara doko silyamano.
Kamongome lao, Isaraele Jutape dupwa nambame nakama apa pyuowase? Nakamame namba mona retami doko wamba yangama yangama kopa puu pae lapala waiya lao dusa kata silyandena pengepe dee yangamana pipyae sepala korakama waiya lao mee olo rali pingipi dopale ingyuo pilyamo.
Dokona lao nambame nambana poropeta akali dupwa keta nambana lao randa maiyuo pyao kokwa serono wai pii doko role pyapeta nakama mapanyi peeyo. Nambame nakama lapo pimili lao suu pimili lao suu pilyu dupwa panembena eŋa pao silyamo.
Mena pyao kiso jilyaminyi dupwa kapako doŋo nakamame namba kare kare soo mona retenge doko rungi rungi pyao karo. Nambana wambu dupwame mena pyao kiso joo karowape namba soo pakana palyarami doko angi ingilyamo.



































































Kamongo dokome leya. Isaraele wambu dupwa wane nyaŋana mendeke ingyuo kareyaminyi dokopa nambame mona reto kareyo. Karo yuu Isipi yaki nyuo nambana waneŋe lao neta epena leyo.
Lapala nambame nakama epenako lao kyakale lao nyuo peyonopa nakamame koo doko konda konda pyuo pyuo puu pao peyami. Nambana wambumi mee bange anatu lao wasisi kingi Bealo doko mena pyao kiso maiyuo. dee isa kanapeme wasisi dupwa rendamu pingi bange kiso maiyuoko pyuo kareyami.
Dopa piyaminyipape namba dakemeko Isaraele dupwa kata dopa pyuo pena dopa pyuo pena lao mana lamaiyuo dee nambana kingi kapena reto minyuo papyuo piya. Dopa piyunupape nakamame nambalyamo lao soo nyii nayami.
Nambame nakama anjiki pyuo mona reteyo. Nambame nakama minyalyuo nyuo angapu punji punjirena karena lao reto kareyo. Nakama peteyami dokona isa mata kui lao pisipala nenge piyu.
Nakama namba karo dokona kapu kyuo epa narama lao kamba letaminyi dokona Asiria wambu dupwame nakama rapu piraŋa yuu Isipi dokona kapu kyuo parami.
Dokopa nakamana yuu taone dokona sukusa yanda piraminyipa taonena kame kambu dupwa pyao lalyuo buru bara para. Dopa piramopa nambana wambu dupwame rangena suu pingi doko angiŋi lao minyingi dokona lao nakama pyao kokwa soo nembara.
Nakama namba mata julu jooko jilyaminyi. Dee nakama keta kenda silyamo dokome ee lao kararaminyipape mendeme nakama kiiramo minyalyuo nyii nara.
Isaraele wambu dupwa nambame nakama apa pyuo yaki nyuo kame soo kaeyarose? Yuu taone Atama Sepoimipa pyao kokwa siyunuli pyuo nakama pyarose? Namba nakama mona retapu doko mee ketae ketae reta nange dokona nakama pyaro ingya nalyamo.
Dokona lao namba mee akali daa namba Anatu. Nambana imbu singi dokome nakama randa jii naro dee Isaraele wambu dupwa dee kamba pyao kokwa see naroko. Namba doko ama Poo Pyasi ingyuo karo. Namba doko nakama role pyao karo. Dokona namba imbu singi paleta nakama keta epa naro, leya Kamongo dokome.




















Dokopa Kamongome lao, Namba nakamana Kamongo Anatu yuu Isipi piso lanyuo epeyo doko, leya. Nakamame anatu wakale mende soo nyii napala namba iki soo nyepenge. Namba ikiko nakamana pyuo nyingi ingyuo karenge.
Yuu muiyane yando nao oo lasi nenge see nange dokona nambame nakama rapu pyuo kareyo.
Dopa piyunupape nakama yuu keyange doko pao kando nyuo nenge nao sikya pipyamo kapa karapala dokopa kimbu pyao piso nakama namba kame silyaminyi.
Dokona lao nambame nakama mena laeneme minyarapala nyili lao mena lepete ingyuo nakamana kata nee paelyaminyi dupwana isaro soo piru.
Sepala mena beyame ikyane nembapala wambu kanda kanda pyao nala epamuli pyuo epo nao roko kata lumbwasero. Nambame mena laeneme nakama waiya lao nalamuli pyuo naro. Mena rae lenge ingyuo pyao suu lalya lana pyuo nembaro.
Isaraele wambu dupwa nambame pyao kokwa sero dokopa apimi nakama nyisarase?
Nakamame kiŋi akali mendepe dee akali rapu pyuo mupwa kararami lapope jii lao piso silyaminyi doko akali dusipame apa pyuo nakama akali rara doko nyiso kararamisi?
Nambana imbu singi paleta karo nakama kiŋi dupwa jiyu doko dee kamame wakasa imbwayono dokome kiŋi dupwa ramo nyisa nembeyo.
Isaraele wambunya koo piyami dupwa pepana pyasi silyamo. Dee pepana pyasi silyamo dupwa kando panda mendena retapunu silyamo.
Isaraele dupwa yuu gii mende mairunu palu kararami ingyapyamopa nakama wane nyaŋa ene manjana pilyaminyipa romba anda piso epana saka nange dopale ingyo yuu gii doko nyelana kopyali minyuo yakara pilyaminyi.
Nambame wambu dapwa kumakarami lao nyiso dee kumapala kumasi wambu penge panda dokona paka nana lao kyawa lete nyuope pii naro. Kumunginya renge porai doko epara dokopa nambame kiiramo nyii naroko. Dokona lao kumungi renge doko embena porai renge doko anja palipyandeme namwa randa jerase? Embena anamasi minyare renge doko anja silyase? Wambu dupwa kando dee sakame kumuoko karalu kara naro ingyara.
Isaraele wambu dupwa mee ee pisinya ukunanyi andele laraminyipape yuu muiyane neta pyakaenge dorena piso porambaiye ama isasa pingi mende peyaronopa dokome ipwa isa yuunya piso potemo epengepe dee ipwa guu lao epengepe dupwa soko rali pira. Dee porambaiye dokomeko nakamana bange wakale wakale mona nyingi dupwa nyuo nembarasa pira, leya.
Isaraele wambu dupwa nakamana Kamongo Anatu karamo dokona kapu kyuo pupwape. Nakamana koo dupwame nakama lukumakapala pao palimi kandape.
Kamongo karamo dokona kapu kyuo papala mena pyao kiso maingi dopale ingyuo penale ateŋa dapa lao lalapape. Namwana koo dupwa nyuo kame sakapala ateŋa letamano doko soo nyepe. Soo nyerene dokopa namwa lalu lao leyamanoli pyuo emba lakandarama.
Asiria wambu dupwame namwa nyisa naraminyipa dee yanda pingi mena ose dupwame kyawa minya naramiko. Namwame namwana isa kanapeme wasisi dupwa nakama namwana anatuŋu lao laa naramako. O Kamongo, embame wambu mendalimi nyisara ingya napyamo karaminyi dupwa sakame kumuo nyiso karenge.
Kamongome dopa leya. Nambana wambu dupwa namba range keta lanyuo eparo. Namba nakama kando imbwa nalu nao naro dokona nambana mona dokona piso mona retaro.
Nambame yuu yando oo lasinya apu epe pau lanyi pyambungi doko suu pyao Isaraele wambu pipya kararo. Dopa pirunu dokopa yuu Lepanone isa andenge dopale ingyuo poraiyuo pingi pyao karo isa jingi kalya pingi pakona pinyi peyo lokwasingi dopale ingyuo ando karo pirami.
Nakama enenge ingyuo pingi pyao olipi isa au pyuo andenge dopale ingyuo au pyuo ando kararami. Dopa pyuo nakama yuu Lepanone dokona isa kingi sita lengende kyaa keyange pilyamo karenge dopale ingyuo ando kararami.
Dopako pyuo nambame nakama kyawa minyuo kararono kararami. Nakama ee menya menya lao andenge dopale ingyuo ando isa girapo ee ando jingi lyuo kakana pingi dopale ingyuo kararami. Yuu Lepanone dokona ipwa waene ama keyange wasingi lao wambu peparaeme singi doko suu pyao nakamana kingi doko uu lepa lepa paramo kararami.
Isaraele wambu dupwa nakamana isa kanapeme wasisi dupwana lao mende piraminde daa. Nambame nakamana ateŋa dupwana isingi yano pyakao nakama rapu pyuo piru. Pipala nambame isa yoko kyako ando karalu karenge dopale ingyuo nakama keta sinyinyi peyakaro. Namba nakamana bange elyape dupwana ipwa ingyuo guu lao karakalyo.
Wambu lapo mona angi palenge dupwame pii pyasi palamo dupwa soo nyuo dokopa mona andarena soo mandenale. Kamongo banya kata dupwa rolaena renge palenge dokona wambu yulu rolae pingi dupwa rolaena renge palenge dokona ingyuo karenge. Dopa piramopape sili see nale lao koo pingi dupwa lukumapala pao palenge.

Dake Kamongona wai pii Petuwelena ikinyingi Joele lenge doko keta maiya.
Selapa, nakama wambu andapae dupwa. Wambu peparae yuu Juta dokona karaminyi dupwa peparaeme selapapeko. Yulu dapale mende emba ando karene yuu gii dokopape panda embena rakane ando kareyamo yuu gii dokopape mende piyase?
Dokona lao nakamana wane wanake dupwa lamaipwape. Dokopa nakamame nakamana wane wanake manjiraminyi dupwa lamairami dokopa dupwame rengya wai kiso nyeraminyi dupwa lamairami.
Aimbu ambo dupwa epo ee jingi dupwana minyarambuyami. Ambo mendeme neyamo pyarepala peya doko ambo enakaya nao dee dokome neyamo pyarepala peyamo doko mendeme nao piyami.
Doko girapo jingi waene enenge wasarami dupwa kokwa sipyamo dokona nakama ipwa biya nenge dupwa sipurao lenge rapala ee lao yamarangwalapape. Nakama ipwa waene nenge dupwa ee lalapapeko.
Akali rara mendeme yanda pinya nyuo suku pingi dopale ingyuo aimbu epo malu palyapala namwana ee yuupi nao otami. Nakama ama malu porai wakasa yaka lao sukusa paa napengele. Nakamana nenge wanga dupwa mena laenena nenge dopale.
Nakamame namwana isa girapo marange dupwa kokwa simi dee namwana piki isa dupwa nao rango pyanyi nembami. Dopa pyuo isa yanenge nao rekya lao nembaminyisa wangya dupwa kuli kewa lasi karaminyi.
Dokona nakama wambu dupwa wanake akali nyelana pingi kumulyamopa ee lao kumanda petenge dopale ingyuo ee lalapape.
Waene nengepe tembole anda dokona Anatu mairami mende see nalyamo. Dokona purisi dupwa Kamongo nenge jingi maingi dupwa ingi rando karaminyi.
Nenge witi jingi dupwa kokwa soo nembo girapo dupwa yanda nao olipi dupwa kyapuo pipya. Dokona yuu mee muiyane sipyamo dokona yuu dokome wambu ingyuo ee lao yamarangyuo silyamo.
Witi jingipi bali jingipi dee ee nenge dupwa peparae kokwa siyamo dokona nakama ee rapu pingi dupwa mona rando ee lao karalapape.
Girapo isape piki isape dupwa kumalana kuliya. Jingi lyuo nenge isa dupwa peparae kumapala yando nao karaminyi. Dopa pipala wambu dupwana rae maingi renge dupwa inyimungu rali pipya.
